Animate Rope.name: Ożywienie Liny
Animate Rope.description:
Sprawiasz, że cała długość lub fragment @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.fyYnQf1NAx9fWFaS]{Liny} lub podobnego obiektu ożywa i wykonuje proste polecenia. Możesz wydać mu dwa polecenia kiedy @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Rzucisz to Zaklęcie} i jedno polecenie za każdym razem kiedy je @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.3f5DMFu8fPiqHpRg]{Podtrzymasz}.

  • Omotanie (atak) Lina próbuje częściowo skrępować istotę. Wykonaj rzut ataku zaklęciem przeciw ST Refleksu celu. Jeśli odniesiesz sukces cel ponosi karę sytuacyjną –10 stóp do swojej Prędkości (-20 stóp przy krytycznym sukcesie). Ten efekt kończy się kiedy cel podejmie udaną próbę @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Ucieczki} przeciw twojemu ST zaklęć lub uszkodzi linę. (Standardowa lina poszukiwacza ma Twardość 2, PŻ 8 i Próg Uszkodzenia 4.) @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.OwvrQKuMLEktNWzA]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Ożywienie Liny}
  • Zwinięcie Lina układa się w schludny, zwinięty stos.
  • Pełzanie Lina pełźnie po ziemi niczym wąż, przesuwając jeden ze swoich końców na odległość 10 stóp. Lina musi poruszać się po powierzchni, ale powierzchnia ta nie musi być pozioma.
  • Węzeł Lina wiąże na sobie solidny węzeł.
  • Pętla Lina formuje prostą pętlę na jednym lub obu końcach lub powraca do prostej postaci.
  • Przywiązanie Lina przywiązuje się do godzącej się istoty, niepilnowanego obiektu lub do obiektu pilnowanego przez godzącą się istotę.
  • Odwiązanie Lina odwiązuje jeden ze swoich węzłów, odwiązuje się lub uwalnia istotę.

Wywyższenie (+2) Zasięg zwiększa się o 50 stóp i możesz ożywić 50 stóp liny więcej.
Animate Rope.target: do 50 stóp liny lub podobnego nieożywionego obiektu

Animated Assault.name: Animated Assault
Animated Assault.description:
You use your mind to manipulate unattended objects in the area, temporarily animating them to attack. The objects hover in the air, then hurl themselves at nearby creatures in a chaotic flurry of debris. This assault deals 2k10 bludgeoning damage (basic Reflex save) to each creature in the area. On subsequent rounds, the first time each round you Sustain this Spell, it deals @Damage[(floor(@item.level/2))d10[bludgeoning]] damage (basic Reflex save) to each creature in the area.

Wywyższenie (+2) The initial damage increases by 2k10 and the subsequent damage increases by 1k10.

Animus Mine.name: Animus Mine
Animus Mine.description:
You implant a mental mine within your psyche that detonates against anyone attempting to magically manipulate your thoughts. You can Sustain the spell to suppress the effects of the mine for 1 round to allow someone to safely use a mental effect on you. You can Dismiss the spell. The first creature that uses a magical mental effect against you triggers the animus mine, causing the spell to end. The animus mine deals 4k8 mental damage to the triggering creature, which must attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature is unaffected.

Sukces The creature takes half damage.

Porażka The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1}.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature takes double damage and is stunned 1. You're unaffected by the triggering mental effect.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 2k8.

Annunciation of the Outer Gate.name: Annunciation of the Outer Gate
Annunciation of the Outer Gate.description:
You announce yourself in the name of certain grim pacts that predate mortal life. This is not a compulsion, but rather an invitation of sorts. The invitation is understood by creatures in the area with telepathy and any who understand Aklo, Chthonian, Empyrean, Fey, or Utopian.

Those who accept the invitation cannot take hostile action against others who agreed until 10 minutes pass and can communicate telepathically with them during that time. This effect ends immediately if any hostile action is taken against a creature that agreed.

Those creatures who decline the choice or do not understand it must attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces Nothing happens.

Sukces The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1}. If it understood the invitation, its frightened status doesn't decrease at the end of any turn in which it damaged a creature that agreed to the invitation.

Porażka As success, but the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2}.

Krytyczna Porażka As success, but the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 3}.

Anointed Ground.name: Anointed Ground
Anointed Ground.description:
You sanctify the area, sprinkling it with certain oils and warding it against your foes. Choose aberrations, celestials, dragons, fiends, monitors, or undead. All creatures in the area gain a +1 status bonus to AC, attack rolls, damage rolls, and saving throws against the chosen creatures.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Wlg9dAFQBuuv9oVa]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Anointed Ground}

Ant Haul.name: Mrówczy Udźwig
Ant Haul.description:
Wzmacniasz układ mięśniowo-szkieletowy celu aby był w stanie udźwignąć więcej wagi. Cel może udźwignąć o 3 Naręcza więcej zanim stanie się @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.D5mg6Tc7Jzrj6ro7]{Przeciążony} i maksymalnie o 6 Naręczy więcej.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.5yCL7InrJDHpaQjz]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Mrówczy Udźwig}

Anticipate Peril.name: Spodziewane Niebezpieczeństwo
Anticipate Peril.description:
Zapewniasz celowi wgląd w niedaleką przyszłość. Cel zyskuje premię statusową +1 do następnego rzutu inicjatywy, po czym zaklęcie się kończy.

Wywyższenie (+2) The status bonus increases by 1, to a maximum of +4 at 7. rank.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.4ag0OHKfjROmR4Pm]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Anticipate Peril}

Antimagic Field.name: Antimagic Field
Antimagic Field.description:
You repel all magic from the target area, preventing spells and other magic from functioning. Spells can't penetrate the area, magic items cease to function within it, and no one inside can cast spells or use magic abilities, including yourself. Likewise, spells - such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Rozproszenie Magii} - can't affect the field itself unless they are of a higher level. Magic effects resume the moment they pass outside the field. For example, a ray fired from one side of the field could target a creature on the other side (as long as caster and target are both outside the field). A summoned creature winks out of existence but reappears if the field moves or ends. Invested magic items cease to function, but they remain invested and resume functioning when they exit the field; the ability boost from an apex item isn't suppressed within the field. Spells of a higher rank than the antimagic field overcome its effects, and can even be cast by a creature within the field.

The field disrupts only magic, so a +3 longsword still functions as a longsword. Magically created creatures (such as golems) function normally within an antimagic field.

Antlion Trap.name: Antlion Trap
Antlion Trap.description:
You transmute the ground into a conical pit trap of loose sand that becomes difficult terrain for the duration. A creature or unsecured object that enters the sand or starts its turn in the sand is moved toward the center, depending on the result of its Reflex save. This is forced movement. If there isn't enough space near the center of the pit, affected creatures and objects move as far as they can without being blocked, up to the amount set by their saving throw outcomes.

Krytyczny Sukces Efekt nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature moves 5 feet toward the center.

Porażka The creature moves 10 feet toward the center.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, and the creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony} in the pit. It can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} against your spell DC.

Wywyższenie (+2) Increase the area of the spell and the amount a creature moves on a failure by 5 feet.

Apex Companion.name: Apex Companion
Apex Companion.description:
You focus on the energies of all members of your animal companion's species, transforming your animal companion into its apex battle form. Your animal companion gains the following statistics and abilities while in its apex form.

  • Your animal companion becomes Huge and its attacks have 15-foot reach. It must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost.
  • 30 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • Your animal companion's attack's damage dice increase by one step, and its attack gains the deadly k12 trait.
  • +10-foot status bonus to its Speeds.
  • Ignores difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.NXzo2kdgVixIZ2T1]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Apex Companion}

Appearance of Wealth.name: Appearance of Wealth
Appearance of Wealth.description:
You create a brief vision of immense wealth filling the spell's area. Each creature within 20 feet of the area that could be enticed by material wealth must attempt a Will saving throw. A creature that enters the area automatically disbelieves the illusion, and disbelieving the illusion ends any @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Zafascynowany} condition imposed by the spell. As long as you Sustain the Spell, other creatures react to the treasure like they would any other illusion, but they are not at risk of becoming Fascinated.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature disbelieves the illusion and is unaffected by it.

Sukces The creature is Fascinated by the wealth until it has completed its first action on its next turn.

Porażka The creature is Fascinated by the illusion.

Approximate.name: Aproksymacja
Approximate.description:
Obszar 1 stopa sześcienna

Twoja magia wartko przepływa przez obszar aby pomóc ci go przeliczyć i skatalogować. Nazwij jeden konkretny rodzaj przedmiotu, którego poszukujesz w obszarsze. Otrzymujesz natychmiastowo szacunkową ilość danego rodzaju przedmiotów w danym obszarsze, które są na nim jasno widoczne. Liczba jest zaokrąglona do największej jej cyfry. Przykładowo, mógłbyś spojrzeć na stertę 180 miedzianych monet i dowiedzieć się, że znajduje się w niej około 200 monet, ale nie byłbyś w stanie określić, że znajdue się tam dokładnie 180 monet.

Rodzaj przedmiotu możesz określić tak ściśle lub tak ogólnikowo jak tylko chcesz - "wgniecione miedziane monety" to równie dobry wykaźnik co "monety" - ale wszystkie zdefiniowane kryteria muszą być widoczne gołym okiem a ponadto zaklęcie jest automatycznie oszukiwane przez próby ukrycia przedmiotu pod postacią innego przedmiotu. Przykładowo, zaklęcie zarejestrowałoby powleczone złotem miedziane monety, jako złote monety.

Aqueous Blast.name: Wodne Uderzenie
Aqueous Blast.description:
Wyczarowujesz masę wody w powietrzu wokół swojej wyciągniętej pięści. Do końca swojej tury możesz uderzać tą wodą cele w promieniu 30 stóp, za pomocją pojedynczej akcji o cechach ataku i koncentracji. Kiedy to robisz, wykonaj rzut na dystansowy atak zaklęciem. Trafienie zadaje 2k8 obrażeń obuchowych. Przy trafieniu krytycznym, uderzenie @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powala} cel.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k8.

Aqueous Orb.name: Aqueous Orb
Aqueous Orb.description:
A sphere of water 10 feet in diameter forms in an unoccupied space in range, either on the ground or on the surface of a liquid.

When you Cast this Spell and each time you Sustain it, you can roll the orb, moving it up to 10 feet along the ground or the surface of a liquid.

The orb can move through the spaces of any creatures or obstacles that wouldn't stop the flow of water. It extinguishes non-magical fires it moves through of its size or smaller, and it attempts to counteract any magical fires it moves through. If it fails to counteract a given fire, it can't counteract that fire for the duration of the spell.

The orb can engulf Large or smaller creatures it moves through, and it can contain as many creatures as fit in its space. The orb can try to engulf the same creature only once per turn, even if you roll it onto a creature's space more than once. Any Large or smaller creature whose space the orb tries to move through can attempt a Reflex save.

Sukces The creature can either let the orb pass (remaining in its space or moving out of the orb's path into a space of the creature's choice) or allow itself to be pushed in front of the orb to the end of the orb's movement.

Porażka The creature is engulfed in the orb. It moves along with the orb and must hold its breath or begin suffocating (unless it can breathe in water). An engulfed Medium or smaller creature and anyone trying to affect that creature follow the normal rules for aquatic battles. An engulfed Large creature is usually big enough that parts of it stick out from the water, and it can reach out of the water. The creature can get free either by Swimming with a successful @Check[athletics|traits:action:swim|dc:10] check or by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escaping} against your spell DC. A freed creature exits the orb's space and can immediately breathe.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the creature can't Swim to get free.

Arcane Countermeasure.name: Arcane Countermeasure
Arcane Countermeasure.description:
Aktywator A creature within range that you can see Casts a Spell.

You undermine the target spell, making it easier to defend against. You reduce the spell's rank by 1, and targets of the spell gain a +2 status bonus to any saving throws, skill checks, AC, or DC against it.

You can't reduce the spell's rank below its minimum. For example, a 5. kręgu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.xxWhyl81w3ckslAU]{Howling Blizzard} would remain 5. kręgu, but a 5. kręgu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{Fireball} would become 4. kręgu. Targets still gain all the other benefits, even if you don't reduce the spell's rank.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.14m4s0FeRSqRlHwL]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Arcane Countermeasure}

Arcane Explosion.name: Arcane Explosion
Arcane Explosion.description:
Your body is temporarily converted into a ball of pure magic, rapidly exploding outward and reforming as a glowing sphere, after which you eventually regain your normal form. All creatures and objects in the emanation take 16k6 force damage (basic Fortitude saving throw). Creatures that fail are also pushed 10 feet directly away from you; creatures that can't complete this forced movement are knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony} (but creatures who reduce this movement, such as with an ability or feat, don't fall prone). You become unfiltered magic; you gain the incorporeal trait, are immune to disease, poison, and precision damage, and gain resistance to all damage equal to your level (except force damage, spirit damage, and damage from Strikes with the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} property rune), with double the resistance against non-magical damage. While incorporeal, you can't Strike, Cast a Spell, or take any actions with the manipulate trait. Any creature that ends its turn adjacent to you while you're in this state takes @Damage[6d6[force]] damage. You remain as pure magic until you Dismiss your new form, returning to your normal state at maximum Hit Points.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.T0eQfYKgejJqZiBA]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Arcane Explosion}

Arcane Weaving.name: Arcane Weaving
Arcane Weaving.cost: rare silks worth a total value of 20 gp x the spell rank
Arcane Weaving.description:
You and the secondary casters weave together spells (and, if anadis, silk) in a complex ritual that combines magical learning with art, allowing all the participants to share spells they know with one another.

Sukces You or any secondary caster can swap any spell in your spell repertoire for a spell in the spell repertoire of any other participant. This spell can't be a higher level than the ritual's rank.

Porażka None of the participants can swap spells.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, and all participants are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 1} for 24 hours and can't reduce their stupefied condition below 1 for 24 hours.

Arctic Rift.name: Arctic Rift
Arctic Rift.description:
A jagged crack opens in the air, dealing 12k8 cold damage as it draws away warmth. Each creature along the rift must attempt a Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} until the start of your next turn.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota odnosi podwójne obrażenia, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony} by a layer of ice, and is slowed 1 as long as it's immobilized. The ice is an object with 60 Hit Points, Hardness 5, immunity to cold damage, and vulnerability 10 to fire. It has object immunities and is destroyed if the target Escapes.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k8 and the ice's Hit Points increase by 5.

Armor of Bones.name: Armor of Bones
Armor of Bones.description:
You ossify your physical form, mimicking the durability of bone. You gain resistance 3 to cold, electricity, fire, piercing, and slashing damage.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.6BjslHgY01cNbKp5]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Armor of Bones}

Wywyższenie (+1) Increase the resistance by 1.

Arms of Nature.name: Arms of Nature
Arms of Nature.description:
All wood, dead or alive, is your armory. When you cast this spell, you draw forth a +1 weapon of your choice from the target. The weapon must be 2 Bulk or less. This weapon is of the same material as the target.

Wywyższenie (3.) The weapon is a +1 striking weapon.

Wywyższenie (5.) The weapon is a +2 striking weapon.

Wywyższenie (7.) The weapon is a +3 greater striking weapon.
Arms of Nature.target: 1 drewniany obiet lub roślina o Naręczu co najmniej 4

Aromatic Lure.name: Aromatic Lure
Aromatic Lure.description:
You override a target's olfactory senses, luring them to a specific location through tantalizing false scents. Select a single square within range that is not hazardous or occupied by a creature. The target is drawn to the selected location, becoming euphoric upon arrival. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target is distracted by the tantalizing scents, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 1} for 1 round.

Porażka The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 2} and moves toward the selected location via the most direct route possible for 1 round, bypassing any obvious hazards and enemies in the way.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 4} and moves to the selected location via the most direct route possible for 1 round, bypassing any obvious hazards and enemies in the way. If the creature reaches the destination, it must remain in that location for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1k4 rounds} but can otherwise act normally.

Wywyższenie (+2) You target 1 additional creature, selecting a different square within range as their destination.

Arrow Salvo.name: Arrow Salvo
Arrow Salvo.description:
You conjure an immense wooden bow that launches a salvo of massive arrows at all nearby enemies. All creatures in the affected area take 8k10 piercing damage, with a basic Reflex save. On a critical failure, the target is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony} from the force of the impact.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k10.

Artistic Flourish.name: Artistic Flourish
Artistic Flourish.description:
You transform the target into a form that more closes matches your creative vision. It's clearly the same item, but with aesthetic details you choose. The target is a beautiful and impressive piece for its new quality, but the effect is obviously magical and temporary, so its monetary value doesn't change. If you're an expert in Crafting, the item grants a +1 item bonus to attack rolls if it's a weapon or skill checks if it's a skill tool. When you Cast this Spell, any previous casting ends.

Wywyższenie (7.) If you're a master in Crafting, the item grants a +2 item bonus.

Wywyższenie (10.) If you're legendary in Crafting, the item grants a +3 item bonus.
Artistic Flourish.target: 1 przedmiot lub dzieło sztuki, mieszczące się w całości w zasięgu

Ash Cloud.name: Chmura Popiołu
Ash Cloud.description:
Przyzywasz burzliwy obłok dymu i popiołu. Chmura jest trudnym terenem dla latających istot, a istoty wewnątrz chmury nie mogą wykryć niczego z użyciem swojego zmysłu węchu. Istoty rozpoczynające swoją turę w chmurze odnoszą 2k4 obrażeń od ognia z podstawowym rzutem obronnym Krzepy, gdy ich płuca wypełnia gorący i gryzący dym.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Cel odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia i jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} na 1 rundę.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia i jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiony} na 1 rundę.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k4.

Ash Form.name: Ash Form
Ash Form.description:
You take the form of a cloud of minuscule ash particles. You gain fast healing 3, resistance 10 to piercing and slashing damage, and immunity to bleed, falling damage, and precision damage. You can't move through solid objects, but you can stream through tiny gaps as if they were difficult terrain. Any ability with the air trait that involves blowing or shifting wind (such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.g8QqHpv2CWDwmIm1]{Podmuch Wiatru}) deals you @Damage[1d6[bludgeoning]] damage per rank of the spell each round you are in its area, in addition to its normal effects.

Wywyższenie (9.) The resistance increases to 15

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.zPPZz6lcp87ALUde]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Ash Form}

Ashen Wind.name: Ashen Wind
Ashen Wind.description:
You conjure a swirling wind of ashes that blows through the area. Each creature in the area must attempt a Fortitude save or get the cloying ash in its lungs.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1}.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 2}.

Asmodean Wager.name: Asmodean Wager
Asmodean Wager.cost: parchment, ink, and an item of value from each bettor worth at least 50 gp
Asmodean Wager.description:
You facilitate a magically binding agreement between yourself and one or more additional secondary casters, wherein each participant (hereafter referred to as the bettors) stakes something of value on the outcome of an event that has yet to be determined. The nature of the event is up to the bettors: a test of skill, a game of chance, or even something occurring in the distant future. While named for Asmodeus and invented by those with a diabolical bent, the ritual has no particular connection to Hell and instead relies on the occult connections between the bettors. The stakes can be either of the following:

  • A promise or possession. The losers of the bet are placed under the effects of a 9. kręgu geas ritual to uphold the promise or turn over a single item they own, as stated at the time of the spell's casting. Once ownership has been transferred or the promise fulfilled, nothing prevents the bettors from trying to reclaim a former possession.
  • The bettors' life. As soon as the outcome has been decided, the losers die instantly with no saving throw; this is a death effect. The next time the winner would die, they instead remain alive and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Nieprzytomny} at 0 Hit Points with a dying condition 1 lower than would kill them. Until this protection has been exhausted, the loser of the bet can't be returned to life through any means, even powerful magic such as wish. A creature already in possession of an additional life as a result of winning an Asmodean wager can't enter into a new wager with a life as collateral.

If any participant knowingly and willingly makes any attempt to cheat at or avoid fulfilling the terms of the wager, the spell automatically determines them the loser and resolves accordingly. The spell doesn't function if any participant is acting against their will or being mentally controlled or coerced by any means, or if any participant is immune to or otherwise unaffected by their wager (such as if a construct, undead, or other creature immune to death effects tried to bet its life). At the GM's discretion, if it ever becomes permanently impossible for the bet's outcome to be determined, the spell ends without any further result.

Sukces The ritual is successful.

Porażka The ritual has no effect.

Krytyczna Porażka The wording of the ritual is imperfect and subverts the bet, causing all bettors to be considered losers regardless of the actual result of the wager.

Aspirational State.name: Aspirational State
Aspirational State.cost: totems related to the associated goal
Aspirational State.description:
The primary caster takes an ethereal form composed of the combined drive of every caster to exorcise a malevolent spirit. In this form the primary caster can automatically locate the target of this common goal, and they can orient the secondary casters to this location. The primary caster can't interact with physical objects in this form, but they can interfere with the abilities of other incorporeal creatures, including spirits possessing a physical body. The primary caster can also manifest the collective intent of the ritual's participants as shifts in reality that further the casters' goal. These shifts manifest as Aspiration Points, which the secondary casters can spend on the Material Plane to aid their cause. Using Aspiration Points is described on page 7.

The magical feedback created by this ritual renders teleportation magic unstable. Any attempt by the casters or the target of the ritual to use an ability with the teleportation trait automatically fails while the ritual is in effect. When the duration expires, the primary caster must spend 1 Aspiration Point to return to the Material Plane; if insufficient Aspiration Points remain, then the primary caster becomes trapped in the Ethereal Plane.

Krytyczny Sukces The PCs gain 8 Aspiration Points. The strong connection between all the casters gives the secondary casters resistance 5 to void damage for the remainder of the adventure.

Sukces The PCs gain 6 Aspiration Points.

Porażka The PCs gain 4 Aspiration Points. The tenuous connection between the casters makes them vulnerable to entropy, giving the secondary casters weakness 5 to void damage for the remainder of the adventure.
Aspirational State.secondarycheck: DC 24 Arcana, Athletics, Nature, Occultism, Performance, Religion, or Society (DC 27 for levels 9-10)

Asterism.name: Asterism
Asterism.description:
Area (continued) five 30-foot lines

Lines of burning starlight form a constellation around you. Draw five lines, one at a time; each line must anchor at you or a creature or object already connected to a previous line, and it must end at a creature or object within 30 feet of its anchor (possibly allowing the asterism to extend to its full 150-foot range). A creature that begins its turn in one of these lines or enters one of these lines on its turn takes 4k6 fire damage (basic Reflex save). A creature can take this damage only once per turn, even if it moves through several lines. Targets that are part of the asterism do not take damage from it. If the distance between two targets (or you and a target) ever exceeds 30 feet, the line of starlight between the two breaks, and any lines that now no longer have a direct path back to you also break. You can Dismiss the spell.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k6.

Astral Labyrinth.name: Astral Labyrinth
Astral Labyrinth.description:
You connect the entire area with an invisible maze of astral energy that interferes with dimensional and mental magic. Choose a point in the area that you can see when you cast this spell. Objects other than force effects and rare metals can't block this spell's area. Astral labyrinth attempts to counteract magical mental effects targeting or including anyone other than the caster in the area, though it has no effect on mental effects that began outside the area or before the spell was cast.

In addition, any creature that tries to depart or arrive in a location in the area by teleportation or extradimensional travel (including extradimensional spaces) must attempt a Will saving throw. Summoned creatures must attempt the save when they are summoned, but not when the summoning ends.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1}.

Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1}, you are mentally alerted that something has failed its save against this spell, and the creature arrives in the empty space closest to the point you chose instead of its intended destination.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 3}, you get a mental glimpse of its appearance, and the creature arrives in the empty space closest to the point you chose instead of its intended destination.

Wywyższenie (10.) You and creatures transported by your spells can't get a result worse than success on the saving throw to teleport into or out of the area.

Astral Projection.name: Astral Projection
Astral Projection.cost: one gem worth a total value of the target's level (minimum 1) × 5 gp, for each target
Astral Projection.description:
You project the targets' spiritual essences into the Astral Plane, leaving their inanimate physical forms behind. These astral forms can be used to explore the Astral Plane indefinitely, while the targets' bodies remain safely in stasis on the plane where the ritual was cast (where they remain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Nieprzytomny} and can't be awoken normally). The casters must be in physical contact with one another in a circle for the duration of the casting, and all targets must be selected from these casters.

A target's astral form is a duplicate of the target and everything they're carrying; anything that happens to a duplicate item happens to the original as well. For instance, if you use, spend, destroy, lose, or give away an item's duplicate, the original vanishes from your possession. For the duration of the ritual, any of the targets can spend a single action to Dismiss their astral form and immediately return to their physical body. As the primary caster, when you Dismiss your astral form, you can also Dismiss all the other targets' astral forms as part of the same action, returning all targets to their physical forms simultaneously. While in the Astral Plane, the other targets are unable to navigate without you, and if they become separated from you, they must wait for your return or Dismiss their own astral forms. When the ritual ends, the targets' astral forms vanish.

A target's astral form and corresponding physical form are linked by an incorporeal silver cord, which is visible only in the Astral Plane. This nearly unbreakable cord serves as conduit and safety line; if severed, the target's astral and physical forms are both immediately slain. If the ritual is interrupted by an external force, such as dispel magic being cast on a target's physical or astral form, the target is immediately and harmlessly returned to their physical body. If a target's astral form is slain, the silver cord immediately rips them back to their physical body; the strain requires them to attempt a Fortitude save with the same DC as the ritual's primary check. On a failure, the creature dies; on a success, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 2}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 2}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 2}, and enfeebled 2 for 1 week; these conditions can't be removed or reduced by any means until the week has passed. A target's physical body remains in suspended animation for the duration of the ritual, but if it's destroyed, the creature dies and its astral form also vanishes. This ritual only projects a portion of the targets' consciousnesses onto the Astral Plane. To travel physically to the Astral Plane (to reach the Outer Planes, for example) requires spells such as interplanar teleport.

Krytyczny Sukces All targets are able to navigate independently in the Astral Plane. Each target's silver cord is stronger than usual, providing them a +4 circumstance bonus to its Fortitude save to avoid dying if its astral form dies.

Sukces You successfully project the targets.

Porażka You fail to project the targets.

Krytyczna Porażka The process of separating the targets' spirits from their bodies is complicated, and something goes catastrophically wrong. All casters become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1}, are immediately reduced to 0 Hit Points, and begin dying
Astral Projection.secondarycheck: Arcana or Occultism (whichever isn't used for the primary check), Survival
Astral Projection.target: ty i do 5 godzących się istot

Astral Rain.name: Astral Rain
Astral Rain.description:
You fling a mass of furious thoughts into the air, where they expand into numerous blades or other shapes that rain down. Any creature that's in the area or enters the area before the start of your next turn takes 4k4 bludgeoning or piercing damage (your choice), with a basic Reflex saving throw.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k4.

Athletic Rush.name: Athletic Rush
Athletic Rush.description:
Your body fills with physical power and skill. You gain a +10-foot status bonus to Speed and a +2 status bonus to Athletics checks. As a part of Casting this Spell, you can use a Stride, Leap, Climb, or Swim action. The spell's bonuses apply during that action.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.57lnrCzGUcNUBP2O]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Athletic Rush}

Atone.name: Pokuta
Atone.cost: rzadkie kadzidła i ofiara warte w sumie 20 sz × poziom celu
Atone.description:
Próbujesz pomóc istocie, wyrażającej szczerą skruchę, odpokutować za jej występki, na ogół za czyny stanowiące anatemy jej bóstwa. Jeśli cel nie wyraża szczerej skruchy, wynikiem rytuału jest zawsze krytyczna porażka. Rytuał ten wykorzystuje Przyrodę jeśli cel jest druidem oraz Religię w pozostałych przypadkach.

Krytyczny Sukces Istota uzyskuje rozgrzeszenie ze swoich przewinień, co pozwala jej na odzyskanie pozycji w oczach jej bóstwa. Odzyskuje ona wszelkie utracone umiejętności. Zanim pokuta zostanie zakończona, istota musi wykonać specjalne zadanie lub udać się na misję określoną przez twoje bóstwo, stosownie do jej przewinień. Zadanie to nie powinno zajmować więcej niż 1 miesiąca czasu, jeśli wykonane zostanie podczas przestoju. Przez 1 miesiąc cel zyskuje boskie doradztwo tóż przed popełnieniem czynu, który stanowiłby anatemę dla twojego bóstwa.

Sukces Jak krytyczny sukces, ale istota nie zyskuje żadnego rodzaju doradztwa w kwestii jego przyszłych akcji.

Porażka Istota nie uzyskuje rozgrzeszenia i musi kontynuować rekompensowanie swoich przewinień oraz medytacje nad ich znaczeniem. Jakakolwiek przyszła próba przeprowadzenia rytuału pokuty za te same występki kosztuje o połowę mniej i zyskuje premię sytuacyjną +4 do testu głównego i testów asystujących.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota obraża twoje bóstwo i zostaje permanentnie wygnana z kręgu wiernych. Istota nie może ponownie dołączyć do wyznawców tej religii bez bardziej bezpośredniej interwencji.

Wywyższenie (+1) Zwiększ maksymalny poziom celu o 2 oraz bazowy koszt o 20 sz.
Atone.secondarycheck: Przyroda lub Religia (którekolwiek używane jest do testu głównego)
Atone.target: inna istota o poziomie nie większym od 8., wyznająca to samo bóstwo lub filozofię co ty

Augury.name: Wróżba
Augury.description:
Dostrzegasz niejasny przebłysk przyszłości. Podczas rzucania tego zaklęcia, zapytaj o wynik konkretnego planu działania. Zaklęcie potrafi przewidzieć konsekwencje wybiegające do 30 minut w przyszłość ujawniając najprawdopodobniejszy zdaniem MG wynik spośród następujących: dobre, złe, mieszane (konsekwencje działania będą pod pewnymi względami złe a pod innymi dobre) lub żadne (nie wystąpią żadne szczególnie dobre lub złe konsekwencje).

MG rzuca sekretny @Check[flat|dc:6|showDC:all|traits:secret]{Test Płaski}. Przy porażce wynik to zawsze "żadne". Sprawia to, że nie sposób przewidzieć, czy wynik "żadne" jest celną wróżbą. Jeśli ktoś rzuci ponownie zaklęcie wróżby pytając o ten sam temat, MG używa tego samego wyniku rzutu sekretnego co przy poprzednim użyciu zaklęcia. Jeśli okoliczności zmienią się dostatecznie od czasu ostatniego rzucenia zaklęcia, możliwe jest uzyskanie innego rezultatu.

Aura of the Unremarkable.name: Aura of the Unremarkable
Aura of the Unremarkable.description:
You and allies in the area appear to be completely innocuous to other creatures within the spell's area, regardless of the actions you're committing. For example, if you and your allies are loudly interrogating a local for information or aiming a crossbow at a noble from a balcony, creatures who can see you might not think this is unusual. Non-allied creatures in the emanation must attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature sees your actions as they really are and announces them as such. All other creatures in the area gain a +1 circumstance bonus to their Will saves to recognize your actions as they really are.

Sukces The creature sees your actions as they really are.

Porażka The creature believes your actions are normal and unworthy of concern.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature believes you are performing other actions entirely, such as helping a local or waving to a noble, as determined by the GM. The creature doesn't have a chance of remembering events normally.

Any hostile actions by you or your allies against a creature or its allies break the effect of the spell for that creature. So, for example, if an interrogated local's friends or threatened noble's guards saw your actions, they would be unaffected by this spell. When the spell ends (or when affected allies move outside the range of the emanation), observers see things normally but the altered perceptions from earlier events remain in mind. Each mention of the events as noteworthy, such as being questioned about them by an authority figure, grants the target another Will save to break the effect and remember things normally (unless the creature critically failed their save).

Avatar.name: Awatar
Avatar.description:
You transform into an avatar of your deity, assuming a Huge battle form. You have hands in this battle form and can take manipulate actions. You can Dismiss this spell. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which deity's battle form you assume:

  • AC = 25 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 30 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to your deity's battle form, which are the only attacks you can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +33, and you use the listed damage. Melee attacks are Strength based (for the purposes of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony} condition, for example) unless they have the finesse trait, and all ranged attacks are Dexterity based.
  • Athletics modifier of +35, unless your own is higher.

You also gain the specific abilities listed for your deity below:

  • Abadar
    • Speed 50 feet, burrow Speed 30 feet, immune to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony};
    • Ranged a crossbow (range increment 120 feet, reload 1), Damage 6k10+3 piercing.
  • Achaekek
    • Speed 70 feet, climb Speed 50 feet, ignore difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain;
    • Melee a mantis claw (agile, backswing, finesse, reach 15 feet, versatile P), Damage 6k8+6 slashing;
    • Ranged a spine volley (range 60 feet), Damage 6k6+3 piercing
  • Asmodeus
    • Speed 70 feet, fly;
    • Melee a mace (reach 15 feet), Damage 6k10+6 bludgeoning;
    • Ranged a hell fire (range 120 feet), Damage 6k6+3 fire.
  • Calistria
    • Speed 30 feet, fly Speed 70 feet;
    • Melee a whip (disarm, finesse, nonlethal, reach 20 feet), Damage 6k4+6 slashing;
    • Ranged a savored sting (range 60 feet), Damage 6k6+3 poison.
  • Cayden Cailean
    • Speed 70 feet, fly, ignore difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain;
    • Melee a rapier (deadly 3k8, reach 15 feet), Damage 6k6+6 piercing;
    • Ranged a ale splash (range 120 feet), Damage 6k6+3 poison.
  • Desna
    • Speed 30 feet, fly Speed 70 feet;
    • Melee a starknife (agile, deadly 3k4, finesse, reach 15 feet, silver, thrown 60 feet), Damage 6k4+6 piercing;
    • Ranged a moonbeam (range 120 feet, silver), Damage 6k6+3 fire.
  • Erastil
    • Speed 70 feet, fly, ignore difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain;
    • Ranged a longbow (deadly 3k8, range increment 150 feet), Damage 6k8+3 piercing.
  • Gorum
    • Speed 70 feet, immune to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony};
    • Melee a greatsword (versatile P, reach 15 feet), Damage 6k12+6 slashing.
  • Gozreh
    • no land Speed, fly Speed 70 feet, swim Speed 70 feet, ignore difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain;
    • Melee a waves (reach 15 feet, shove, thrown 20 feet), Damage 6k8+6 bludgeoning;
    • Ranged a wind (versatile electricity, range 120 feet), Damage 6k6+3 bludgeoning.
  • Iomedae
    • Speed 70 feet, fly; shield (15 Hardness, can't be damaged);
    • Melee a longsword (versatile P, reach 15 feet), Damage 6k8+6 slashing.
  • Irori
    • Speed 80 feet, fly;
    • Melee a unfettered strike (agile, versatile P or S, finesse, reach 15 feet), Damage 6k8+6 bludgeoning;
    • Ranged a wind strike (range 60 feet), Damage 6k4+6 bludgeoning.
  • Lamashtu
    • Speed 30 feet, fly Speed 70 feet;
    • Melee a falchion (forceful, reach 15 feet), Damage 6k10+6 slashing;
    • Ranged a waters of Lamashtu (range 120 feet), Damage 6k6+3 poison.
  • Nethys
    • Speed 70 feet, fly;
    • Ranged a raw magic (range 120 feet; versatile cold, electricity, or fire), Damage 6k6 force.
  • Norgorber
    • Speed 70 feet, fly, ignore difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain;
    • Melee a shortsword (agile, finesse, versatile S, reach 15 feet), Damage 6k6+6 piercing;
    • Ranged a blackfinger toss (range 120 feet), Damage 6k6+3 poison.
  • Pharasma
    • Speed 70 feet, fly;
    • Melee a dagger (agile, finesse, reach 15 feet, thrown 40 feet), Damage 6k6+6 slashing;
    • Ranged a spiral blast (range 120 feet, damages only undead), Damage 6k8+3 vitality.
  • Rovagug
    • Speed 50 feet, burrow Speed 30 feet, immune to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony};
    • Melee a jaws (reach 15 feet), Damage 6k12+6 piercing;
    • Melee a leg (agile, versatile P, reach 15 feet), Damage 6k8+6 bludgeoning.
  • Sarenrae
    • Speed 30 feet, fly Speed 70 feet;
    • Melee a scimitar (forceful, nonlethal, reach 15 feet), Damage 6k6+6 slashing;
    • Ranged a everflame (nonlethal, range 120 feet), Damage 6k6+3 fire.
  • Shelyn
    • Speed 70 feet, fly, ignore difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain;
    • Melee a glaive (deadly 3k8, nonlethal, reach 20 feet), Damage 6k8+6 slashing;
    • Ranged a melody of inner beauty, (nonlethal, range 120 feet), Damage 6k6+3 sonic.
  • Torag
    • Speed 50 feet, burrow Speed 30 feet, immune to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony}; shield (15 Hardness, can't be damaged);
    • Melee a warhammer (reach 15 feet, shove), Damage 6k8+6 bludgeoning.
  • Urgathoa
    • Speed 70 feet, fly;
    • Melee a scythe (deadly 3k10, trip, reach 15 feet), Damage 6k10+6 slashing;
    • Ranged a pallid plague (range 120 feet), Damage 6k6+3 void.
  • Zon-Kuthon
    • Speed 70 feet, fly, ignore difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain;
    • Melee a spiked chain (disarm, trip, reach 15 feet), Damage 6k8+6 slashing;
    • Ranged a midnight pain (mental, nonlethal, range 120 feet), Damage 6k6+3 mental.

Awaken Animal.name: Awaken Animal
Awaken Animal.cost: herbs, 1/5 the value on Creature Creation Rituals table
Awaken Animal.description:
You grant intelligence to the target, transforming it into a beast. If it was previously an animal companion or minion, it can no longer serve as one.

Krytyczny Sukces The target's Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma modifiers each increase to +2 if they were lower, and it becomes helpful to you for awakening it.

Sukces The target's Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma modifiers increase to +0 if they were lower and it becomes friendly to you for awakening it.

Porażka You fail to awaken the target.

Krytyczna Porażka You accidentally awaken the target with a pure bestial hatred toward you. The target's Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma modifiers increase to –2 if they were lower. It becomes hostile to you, attempting to destroy you.

Creatures Creation Rituals

Awaken Animal.target: 1 animal up to the level on the table

Awaken Curse.name: Awaken Curse
Awaken Curse.description:
You siphon a tiny portion of life force from each of the ritual's casters to empower a curse against disrupting effects. The difficulty of the counteract check to remove the curse changes based on the success of the ritual. Additionally, the first three times the curse is successfully counteracted, it leaps to the closest possible target within 100 feet, forcing the new target to attempt a saving throw against the curse's initial effects. Saves against the curse are attempted at the same DC as the curse when it was cast, subject to changes based on the ritual's success. If any creature successfully saves against the curse's initial effects, the curse dissipates harmlessly.

Krytyczny Sukces The first counteract attempt against the curse automatically fails. After that, the curse's counteract rank increases by 2 (to a maximum of 10).

Sukces The curse's counteract rank increases by 1 (to a maximum of 10).

Porażka The curse's counteract rank is unchanged.

Krytyczna Porażka You fail to grasp the curse's nuances and entangle yourself in its effects. The curse is lifted from the original target, and you and each secondary caster is affected by the curse with no saving throw.

Awaken Entropy.name: Awaken Entropy
Awaken Entropy.description:
All things age, all things die, and at the end of days even the universe will grow quiet and still. You awaken the cosmic principle of entropy, accelerating time in an area-flesh falters, plants shrivel, and even stone begins to crumble. Any creature that enters or begins its turn in the area must succeed at a basic Fortitude save or take 8k6 void damage, or 8k6 force damage if the creature normally doesn't take void damage, such as if the creature is a construct or undead. Even beings such as fiends with unlimited lifespans can be worn away by entropy. The first time you Sustain the Spell on each subsequent turn, the entropic zone grows stronger in addition to having its duration increased. The radius of the burst increases by 10 feet (to a maximum of 40 feet), and the size of the damage dice increases by one step (from k6 to k8, then to k10, and finally to k12).

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k6.

Awaken Object.name: Awaken Object
Awaken Object.cost: crushed gems and spices worth 250 gp
Awaken Object.description:
You imbue a single Small or smaller object with rudimentary awareness and consciousness, and it gains mental ability modifiers depending on the results of the ritual. It gains the ability to see and hear, and the ability to understand (but not speak) a single language that you know. It's indifferent to you and all living creatures. In all other respects, it's an ordinary object of its type. An awakened object that gains the broken condition is rendered insensate until Repaired above its Broken Threshold.

Magical objects and constructs can't be awakened, nor can most spell or magic item abilities be added to an awakened object later (the process to do so is much more complicated than a ritual and essentially creates an intelligent magic item). However, an object that has already been awakened can have the animate object ritual cast on it by doubling the cost of animate object.

Krytyczny Sukces The target's Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma modifiers each increase to +2 if they were lower, and it becomes friendly to you for awakening it.

Sukces The target's Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma modifiers increase to +0.

Porażka The target is unaffected and the ritual fails.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is unaffected, and the primary caster's intellect is trapped in the object for 24 hours. During this time, their original body is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Nieprzytomny} and inert and can't be awakened by any means.
Awaken Object.secondarycheck: Crafting, Arcana or Occultism (whichever isn't used for the primary check)

Awaken Portal.name: Przebudzenie Portalu
Awaken Portal.description:
Próbujesz ponownie aktywować uśpioną bramę, portal lub @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5ZW1w9f4gWlSIuWA]{Krąg Teleportacyjny} nasycając go magiczną energią. Ten rytuał musi zostać przeprowadzony pomyślnie dwa razy, po jednym raze na każdym z końców połączenia portalu. Podczasz gdy kręgi teleportacyjne i portale znajedująće się w Komnatach Abominacji nie wymagają żadnego dodakowego kosztu do ich rozbudzenia, inne portale mogą wedle uznania MG wymagać rzadkich przedmiotów lub specjalnych materiałów jako koasztu tego rytuału — niektóre portale mogą nawet być tak potężne, że ten rytuał w ogóle nie jest w stanie ich przebudzić.

Krytyczny Sukces Przebudzasz portal. Jeśli jego drugi kraniec też jest rozbudzony, portal może być normalnie użytkowany i nie zamknie się z przyczyn naturalnych. Jeśli jego drugi kraniec nie jest rozbudzony, ten kraniec zostaje pozostaje rozbudzony przez 1 rok, co potencjalnie zapewnia ci wystarczającą ilość czasu aby odnaleźć i przebudzić drugi kraniec portalu.

Sukces Jak krytyczny sukces, ale jeśli drugi kraniec portalu nie jest rozbudzony, ten kraniec pozostaje przebuodzony jedynie przez [[/r 1d6 #dni]]{1k6 dni} zanim rozmywa się i ponownie staje się uśpiony.

Porażka Nie udaje ci się aktywować portalu a magiczne sprzężenie zwrotne pozostawia cię @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupionym 1} na 24 godziny.

Krytyczna Porażka Jak porażka, ale dodatkowo przez portal przyciągana jest wroga istota, która natychmiast atakuje wszystkich obecnych. Przyciągnięta przez portal istota może się różnić, zależnie od natury portalu.
Awaken Portal.gmNote:
ST wymagany do przebudzenia portalu różni się w zależności od siły połączenia i odległości między punktami docelowymi. Dla portali odnalezionych w Ścieżce Przygody Komnaty Abominacji, ST różni się w zależności od piętra lochu na którym się on znajduje. Użyj sekcji @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.S55aqwWIzpQRFhcq.JournalEntryPage.pBS3DUjlzVuFgapv]{ST dla Kręgów Zaklęć} w Tabeli 10-5 aby określić ST portalu, używając piętra lochu zamiast kręgu zaklęcia. Tak też, aktywacja portalu na pierwszym piętrze Komnat Abominacji wymaga udanego testu ST 15, podczas gdy aktywacja portalu na piętrze 4 wymaga udanego testu ST 23.

W Komnatach Abominacji przyzwana istota zależy od piętra lochu, na którym przeprowadzany był rytuał, tak jak rozpisano to poniżej.

  • Piętro Pierwsze @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.Actor.NQ6qRvpD9DIwVxt3]{Wampiryczna Mgła}
  • Piętro Drugie @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.abomination-vaults-bestiary.Actor.Nkz8Z5TrEqRePGlk]{Skalatrax}
  • Piętro Trzecie @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.dEAneTvoPuQXZoLR]{Bełkoczący Paszczowiec}
  • Piętro Czwarte @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-monster-core.Actor.KgJq51AeYrENo3Db]{Błędny Ognik}
  • Piętro Piąte @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.Actor.SY8pvLPqc2EgP9Xj]{Pożeracz Dusz}
  • Piętro Szóste @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.abomination-vaults-bestiary.Actor.ceLvlSQsYNORH8oM]{Pustkożerca}
  • Piętro Siódme @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.Actor.ZGEf08j9q4fIPDFd]{Przeraźliwy Upiór}
  • Piętro Ósme [Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-monster-core.Actor.LN7MXD38Zs2bDoW6]{Duch Maga}
  • Piętro Dziewiąte @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-monster-core.Actor.TwFcW5O5J1SdsYv3]{Gosreg}
  • Piętro Dziesiąte @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-monster-core.Actor.ePJcp2ADOjJYYQ5Q]{Jaśniejące Dziecię}

Bacchanalia.name: Bacchanalia
Bacchanalia.cost: a lavish meal with expensive alcohol for every caster (225 gp)
Bacchanalia.description:
You hold an elaborate feast and stoke the celebratory spirit, causing it to spread to other people nearby; you buoy them with hope and good cheer as they revel into the night. The ritual was first developed by the cult of the hero-god Kelksiomides in Iblydos and meant to be a benefit to the community during hard times, though other groups have used it for far different purposes, such as to spread chaos or to provide cover for a heist.

You and the secondary casters begin your feast in a public space where others can see you, exactly 8 hours before dusk. When dusk falls, you complete the ritual. The party spreads outward from your initial site until it slowly encompasses the settlement (for a town or smaller), or a district or division of up to approximately 1 000 people (for a larger settlement). Those partaking in the celebration are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Zafascynowany} until the ritual comes to an end (or someone uses a hostile action toward them, as usual). The partying appears to spread naturally, as others see the revelers, they too slowly join until the celebration reaches its peak size. The spell's effect ends sharply at midnight, but that doesn't mean people stop partying right away if they're enjoying themselves.

Krytyczny Sukces The party is a huge hit! The effects work as above, except that in a larger settlement, the celebration can spread to an area with as many as 10 000 people. Furthermore, the celebration leaves strong memories in the hearts of those who participated, causing locals to commemorate it or possibly outlaw such celebrations (depending on their view of the event).

Sukces The party is successful. It spreads as described in the ritual's description.

Porażka The party never really catches on. You and the secondary casters get to celebrate, but the most other people do is give you odd looks.

Krytyczna Porażka Instead of celebration, you inspire anger and resentment toward you and the secondary casters for disturbing the peace or possibly even deepening the despair of a people who are already troubled. People in the area have their attitudes toward you temporarily adjusted two steps worse than normal. Those who become hostile won't necessarily attack you, but they will mock you, break up your revelry, and potentially arrest you.

Band of Heroes.name: Band of Heroes
Band of Heroes.description:
The sun rises on a gathering of heroes bonded to a cause. While only one secondary caster can attempt the secondary check, each secondary caster must also spend 1 Mythic Point upon successful completion of the ritual (see below). A secondary caster who chooses not to spend the Mythic Point can't benefit from the ritual's effects.

Krytyczny Sukces As success, but the first time a caster gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Zgubiony}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Umierający}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Ranny} condition during the ritual's duration, reduce the value of that condition by 1 (minimum 0).

Sukces Each secondary caster must spend 1 Mythic Point. For the duration of the ritual, when a caster @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{Aids} another caster, they can attempt the associated check at mythic proficiency. On a success, the circumstance bonus the Aiding caster grants is increased to +2, and on a critical success, the circumstance bonus is increased to +5.

Porażka The ritual has no effect. The secondary casters don't need to each spend 1 Mythic Point.

Krytyczna Porażka The ritual fails, and the casters rupture their own connections to their mythic destinies. None of the casters can gain Mythic Points for 1 week.

Bandit's Doom.name: Bandit's Doom
Bandit's Doom.description:
You ward the target item against those who would steal it. When a creature attempts to take the target into its possession, it takes 8k8 mental damage and is doomed, depending on the result of its Will save. The spell then ends. You can choose up to 10 creatures when you cast this spell; if you do, those creatures can take the target item without triggering the ward. You can only have one bandit's doom active at a time. If you cast the spell again, the newer casting supersedes the older.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature takes half damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1}.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 2}.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota odnosi podwójne obrażenia and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 3}.

Wywyższenie (+2) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k8.

Bane.name: Zguba
Bane.description:
Wypełniasz umysły swoich wrogów zwątpieniem. Wrogowie w zasięgu muszą wykonać rzut obronny Woli albo ponoszą karę statusową –1 do rzutów ataku tak długo jak pozostają w obszarsze. W następnych turach możesz raz na rundę Podtrzymać zaklęcie aby zwiekszyć obszar emanacji o 10 stóp i zmusić wrogów w obszarze, którzy nie są jeszcze objęci efektem, do wykonania kolejnego rzutu obronnego.

Zguba może przeciwdziałać @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XSujb7EsSwKl19Uu]{Błogosławieństwu}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.UTLp7omqsiC36bso]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Zguba}

Banishing Touch.name: Banishing Touch
Banishing Touch.description:
Your touch projects a surge of magic that launches your target safely away. Make a melee spell attack at mythic proficiency against your target's AC. If you hit, you deal 1k6 bludgeoning damage, and you launch the target into the air and away from you; the target takes falling damage as normal. The number of actions you spend while Casting the Spell determines the damage dealt by your touch and how far the target is launched.

1 The target is launched 10 feet into the air and knocked back 10 feet.

2 Your touch deals 2k6 bludgeoning damage instead. The target is launched 20 feet into the air and pushed back 10 feet.

3 Your touch deals 2k6 bludgeoning damage instead. The target is launched 30 feet into the air and pushed back 20 feet.

Wywyższenie (4th) The initial damage increases by 1k6, and all distances increase by 10 feet for the 1-action version or 20 feet for the 2- and 3-action versions.

Wywyższenie (6th) The initial damage increases by 2k6, and all distances increase by 20 feet for the 1-action version or 60 feet for the 2- and 3-action versions.

Wywyższenie (8th) The initial damage increases by 3k6, and all distances increase by 30 feet for the 1-action version or 100 feet for the 2- and 3-action versions.

Banishment.name: Wygnanie
Banishment.description:
Odsyłasz cel z powrotem na jego plan macierzysty. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli. Możesz wydać dodatkową akcję podczas Rzucania tego Zaklęcia i dodać niego koszt, aby nałożyć na istotę karę sytuacyjną –2 do jej rzutu obronnego. Koszt musi być specjalnie zebranym przedmiotem, który jest anathemą dla istoty. To zaklęcie kończy się porażką, jeśli nie znajdujesz się na swoim planie macierzystym, gdy je rzucasz.

Krytyczny Sukces Cel opiera się wygnaniu, a ty jesteś @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1}.

Sukces Cel opiera się wygnaniu.

Porażka Cel zostaje wygnany.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel zostaje wygnany i nie może powrócić w żaden sposób na plan, z którego został wygnany, przez 1 tydzień.

Wywyższenie (9.) Możesz wybrać do 10 istot. Dodatkowy koszt wpływa na cele, dla których jest anathemą.

9.target: 10 istot, które nie znajdują się na swoim planie macierzystym

Banishment.target: 1 istota, która nie znajduje się na swoim planie macierzystym

Bathe in Blood.name: Bathe in Blood
Bathe in Blood.cost: alchemical herbs and components worth a total of 1 000 gp × the target's level
Bathe in Blood.description:
This is an old ritual, illegal in nearly every corner of Golarion, but never quite exterminated. You bathe in the freshly spilled blood of your people, whose lives and years you steal in the process.

This ritual requires that you submerge yourself in a bath of alchemically treated blood, attended by silent servants. The blood must come from the same ancestry as your own, and must have been spilled within the last 6 hours; a spell such as gentle repose can extend this time, but using such preserved blood applies a –4 circumstance penalty to the primary and secondary checks. If you're Medium, you require 30 gallons of blood to immerse yourself, and a typical Medium creature holds about 1-1/2 gallons of blood in its body. This ritual doesn't strictly require that the blood donors be killed and drained dry, but the logistical challenges of gathering enough blood without murder are beyond all but the most well-resourced casters.

Each time you enact this ritual, regardless of its success or failure, you take a penalty to the primary check for all subsequent castings. This penalty starts at –1 and increases by –1 during each casting (so if you were casting this ritual on yourself for the fifth time, you would take a –4 penalty on your Occultism check).

Krytyczny Sukces You emerge rejuvenated and revived. You become up to 40 years younger, returning to the prime of youth and life. If you're already at your desired age, your aging instead stops for the next 40 years. While remaining recognizably yourself, you also become preternaturally attractive, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to Make an Impression. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.kMoOWWBqDYmPcYyS]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Bathe in Blood}

Sukces You become 20 years younger or pause your aging for 20 years.

Porażka The ritual has no effect.

Krytyczna Porażka You die. Casters killed this way frequently return as undead, often as ghosts or vampires.
Bathe in Blood.target: 1 living creature of a level no greater than double the bathe in blood ritual's rank

Battlefield Persistence.name: Battlefield Persistence
Battlefield Persistence.description:
Aktywator You are about to attempt a saving throw, but you haven't rolled yet.

You're difficult to deter in battle. You gain a +2 status bonus to the triggering save, and if the triggering save is against an incapacitation effect, it treats you as if you were 2 levels higher.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.F1APSdrw5uv672hf]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Battlefield Persistence}

Beastmaster Trance.name: Beastmaster Trance
Beastmaster Trance.description:
You enter a magical trance that allows you to perceive through the senses of the target companion. You attempt Perception checks using your own Perception, but you have any special senses the target has, such as low-light vision or darkvision.

This spell grants no special method of communication with the chosen animal, so it follows any instructions you gave it before you entered the trance and, failing that, it does as it wishes.

For the duration of the trance, your own senses are muted, though you can still communicate. This lack of awareness makes you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda}. You can't take actions with the attack or move traits.

Wywyższenie (6.) Increase the range to 100 miles and the duration to sustained up to 10 minutes. The target can hear you through the spell, allowing you to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{Command the Animal} or use other actions that have the auditory trait.

Wywyższenie (8.) Increase the range to planetary and the duration to sustained up to 1 hour. You can communicate telepathically with the target for the duration of the trance.
Beastmaster Trance.target: one of your animal companions you can perceive

Bee-Man's Summons.name: Bee-Man's Summons
Bee-Man's Summons.description:
You recreate the Bee-Man's infamous ability to sense when someone utters their name. During the spell's duration, you mentally sense whenever someone (referred to as a speaker) speaks your full name while within the spell's area. You gain a vague sense of the speaker's identity, such as "a local farmer" or "a halfling in distress," unless the speaker is someone you have met and interacted with before, in which case you recognize the speaker specifically. As a reaction within 1 minute of the speaker's utterance, you can send the speaker a telepathic prompt, asking if they intend to summon you. If they respond affirmatively, the spell's remaining duration decreases to sustained (up to 10 minutes), during which time you know the direction to where the speaker named you and how far away they are.

Wywyższenie (4.) The emanation's radius increases to 1 000 feet.

Wywyższenie (7.) The emanation's radius increases to 1 mile, and instead of locating the speaker, you can instead converse with the speaker for 5 minutes. This otherwise works as sending.

Wywyższenie (9.) As 7., except the emanation's radius increases to 5 miles, and the duration of the conversation is 10 minutes.

Befitting Attire.name: Befitting Attire
Befitting Attire.description:
You cloak the targets in an illusion, shaping their clothing and worn items into ones suitable for a particular occasion. You visualize the occasion, and the spell creates illusory attire customized to each target. For instance, if you visualized a noble ball, armor would appear to be fine clothing. This doesn't change identifying details of the targets' appearances other than their clothes.

Any creature that touches the attire, uses the Seek action to examine it, or otherwise interacts with it can attempt to disbelieve your illusion.

Wywyższenie (4.) You can target up to 20 creatures.

Wywyższenie (5.) You can target up to 100 creatures.

Befuddle.name: Otępienie
Befuddle.description:
Zasiewasz ziarna zamieszania w umyśle celu, powodując, że jego działania i myśli stają się niezdarne.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Cel jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1} i @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 1}.

Porażka Cel jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 2} i @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 2}.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 3}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 3} i @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Zdezorientowany}.

Beheading Buzz Saw.name: Beheading Buzz Saw
Beheading Buzz Saw.description:
You compress molten scraps pulled from the Plane of Metal into a spinning disc with gruesome blades protruding from its edges. It wheels forward, slicing through anyone in its path. Each creature in the area takes 5k10 slashing damage and 4k6 persistent bleed damage, with a Reflex save.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Porażka The creature takes full damage.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature takes double damage. If the creature has a head, it must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|against:spell|traits:death,incapacitation] save or be decapitated; this kills any creature except ones that don't require a head to live. For creatures with multiple heads, this usually kills the creature only if you sever its last head. This second save has the death and incapacitation traits.

Wywyższenie (+1) The slashing damage increases by 1k10, and the persistent bleed damage increases by 1k6.

Behold the Weave.name: Behold the Weave
Behold the Weave.description:
You behold the many timelines that weave around a creature, and in so doing, you make one more likely to occur. The target must attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces You can make neither heads nor tails of the target's timeline, and the target is unaffected.

Sukces The target must commit to a single action that it will take at some point during its next turn: "Stride toward Valeros," "Cast shield," "Strike at Amiri with my jaws." That action is now locked in, and the creature must attempt it, even if the situation has changed-if the creature stated that it would Strike at Amiri with its jaws, it must try to do so. If the creature is entirely unable to fulfill the action it committed to-for instance, if it had only 1 action left and Amiri was out of the range of its jaws Strike-it loses the last action of its turn as it reels in a temporal paradox. The creature can choose to lock in a 2- or 3-action activity if it prefers to do so, but if it does, it loses all the associated actions if it can't perform the activity on its turn. If the situation changes oddly (perhaps the creature is forcibly teleported away and has no idea which direction is "toward Valeros" any longer), the GM determines what happens.

Porażka As success, but the creature must commit at least two of its actions for the next turn-"I will Stride toward Valeros and then Strike with my claws." All of these actions are similarly locked in and can't be changed, but the creature can take them in any order.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the creature must commit all of its actions for the next turn.

Wywyższenie (7.) Instead of affecting a single target, the spell affects all enemies within a @Template[emanation|distance:30].

Belittling Boast.name: Belittling Boast
Belittling Boast.description:
You boast about your skills or combat prowess, bolstering your own abilities and belittling your opponents. Select one of the following to boast about: melee attack rolls, ranged attack rolls, spell attack rolls, or a single skill. Attempt an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.action-macros.Macro.nEwqNNWX6scLt4sc]{Intimidation} check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralizacja} all enemies within 30 feet. Each creature that becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony} additionally takes a –1 circumstance penalty to the attack roll or skill you boasted about for 1 minute. If at least one creature becomes frightened, you gain a +1 status penalty to the attack roll or skill you boasted about for 1 minute.

Wywyższenie (8.) The bonus and penalty increase to 2.

Benediction.name: Benediction
Benediction.description:
Divine protection helps protect your companions. You and your allies gain a +1 status bonus to AC while within the emanation. Once per round on subsequent turns, you can Sustain the spell to increase the emanation's radius by 10 feet.

Benediction can counteract malediction.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.GogALNdgQ7Fn5oMG]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Benediction}

Beseech Arcanotheign.name: Beseech Arcanotheign
Beseech Arcanotheign.description:
With a whispered prayer or arcane sending, you conjure Arcanotheign, herald of Nethys. She's a storm of magic, half white and half black, roiling in a vaguely humanoid shape. She occupies the space of a Medium creature and has a Speed of 40 feet and a fly Speed of 60 feet.

Arrive (sonic) Storm's Unbridled Destruction Arcanotheign arrives with a flash of light and a cacophonous crash of colliding magic. All enemies in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:60] take @Damage[8d12[sonic]] damage with a basic Reflex save. A creature that critically fails is additionally @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Ogłuchły} for 10 minutes.

Depart (electricity, healing) Flash of Brilliance Arcanotheign fires a powerful arcane blast at one target within 100 feet, dealing @Damage[5d12[electricity]] damage with a basic Reflex save, and a powerful divine blast at one ally, healing 5k12 Hit Points. Then, Arcanotheign asks for payment in the form of a fond memory. If you pay this cost, you lose this memory, Arcanotheign gains this memory, and Arcanotheign whispers a secret into your mind; you can immediately @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge} on any subject at mythic proficiency.

Beseech the Sphinx.name: Beseech the Sphinx
Beseech the Sphinx.description:
You look to the great Sphinx constellation, wisest of all cosmic guides and favored of Phimater, asking them to lend their insight to the target. Choose one skill and one type of saving throw (Fortitude, Reflex, or Will). The target gains a +1 status bonus to those skill checks and saving throws for the duration.

Wywyższenie (4th) The status bonus increases to +2.

Wywyższenie (7th) The status bonus increases to +3.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.3CzDP9Bamc1aVLyh]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Beseech the Sphinx}

Bestial Curse.name: Bestial Curse
Bestial Curse.description:
You tap into the target's inner being and curse it to become a bestial version of itself. The effect is based on its Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target's body gains minor bestial features. Its insides churn as they partially transform, causing it to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1} for 1 round. When it recovers from the clumsy condition, its features revert to normal, and the spell ends.

Porażka The target transforms into a bestial form for 1 hour. The target becomes clumsy 1 and gains weakness 1 to silver. It gains a claw, hoof, horn, or jaws Strike (your choice) that uses the target's unarmed Strike statistics except that the damage type changes to bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing, as appropriate. Whenever the target attempts to use any manipulate action, it must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:5] or the action is lost.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.8wCVSzWYcURWewbd]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Bestial Curse (Porażka)}

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the duration is unlimited.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.KtAJN4Qr2poTL6BB]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Bestial Curse (Krytyczna Porażka)}

Bilocation.name: Bilocation
Bilocation.description: You exist in two places at once. When you Cast the Spell, another copy of yourself appears in an adjacent square. During bilocation's duration, whenever you act, you can choose which of your selves does so, and whenever one of you uses a move action, you can both move. Your two selves share Hit Points, and any condition or effect on one affects both. If both of your selves are in the area of the same effect, or targeted by the same multitarget effect, you are only affected once. Even if you are reduced to 0 Hit Points or killed, both selves remain until the duration expires. Your link continues at any distance, even across planar boundaries. You can Dismiss the Spell, and if you do so, you choose which of the selves vanishes and which becomes you, allowing you to extricate one of your selves from a dangerous situation.

Bind Undead.name: Związanie Nieumarłego
Bind Undead.description:
Słowem mocy przejmujesz kontrolę nad celem. Zyskuje on cechę sługusa. Jeśli ty lub sojusznik użyjecie jakichkolwiek wrogich akcji przeciwko celowi, zaklęcie kończy się.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.rVkUzqS4rpZp9LS3]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Związanie Nieumarłego}
Bind Undead.target: 1 bezmyślna nieumarła istota o poziomie nie większym niż krąg zaklęcia Związania Nieumarłego

Binding Circle.name: Binding Circle
Binding Circle.cost: warding circle ingredients worth a total value of 2 gp × the spell rank × the target's level
Binding Circle.description:
You call forth an extraplanar creature of a level no greater than double that of the binding circle ritual's rank and attempt to bargain with it, generally to perform a task for you in exchange for payment.

You conjure the extraplanar creature within your circle and negotiate a deal with it. A creature that doesn't wish to negotiate at all can attempt a Will save to stay on its home plane. Most extraplanar creatures feel that they have something better to do than cater to the whims of mortals and require a significant gift, especially if your task poses major risks. Fiends and similarly wicked extraplanar creatures are more likely to accept a bargain for a lower cost as long as it allows them to wreak havoc on the Universe or inflict evil upon the world along the way.

Monetary prices usually range from the cost of a consumable item of the creature's level for a short and simple task to a permanent magic item of the creature's level or more to persuade the creature to fight alongside you. However, some extraplanar creatures may want payments other than money, such as permission to cast a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Q690d3mw3TUrKX7E]{Geas} on you to fulfill an unspecified later favor or obtain ownership of your soul via an infernal contract.

You can add an additional secondary caster to create a warding circle that prevents the extraplanar creature from attacking or leaving the circle during the bargain. This uses the Crafting skill and has the same DC as a secondary check would. This protection ends if you use a hostile action against the extraplanar creature or the warding circle breaks.

Krytyczny Sukces You call the extraplanar creature and can prevent it from returning home for up to a full day, potentially allowing you to negotiate a better deal by threatening to leave it in the wards for the duration.

Sukces You call the extraplanar creature and must make your case succinctly, after which the creature can return home at any time.

Porażka You fail to call the extraplanar creature.

Krytyczna Porażka You call something vile and horrible, unbound by your wards, and it immediately attempts to destroy you.
Binding Circle.secondarycheck: Diplomacy or Intimidation; Arcana or Occultism (whichever isn't used for the primary check)

Binding Muzzle.name: Binding Muzzle
Binding Muzzle.description:
A shimmering muzzle of pure magical force clamps the target's mouth shut. The target can attempt a Fortitude save to resist the muzzle. For targets with more than one mouth, the caster must target a single mouth.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces For 1 round, the target can't use jaws Strikes, Breath Weapons, or any other attack that originates from the mouth, nor can they imbibe anything, including potions, mutagens, and elixirs.

Porażka As success, but the effect lasts 1 minute, and they must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:11] to Cast a Spell with verbal components.
