Krytyczna Porażka As success, but the effect lasts 1 minute and the target can't speak.

Wywyższenie (5.) You can target up to 5 creatures.

Bit of Luck.name: Bit of Luck
Bit of Luck.description:
You tilt the scales of luck slightly to protect a creature from disaster. When the target would attempt a saving throw, it can roll twice and use the better result. Once it does this, the spell ends.

If you cast bit of luck again, any previous bit of luck you cast that's still in effect ends. After a creature has been targeted with bit of luck, it becomes temporarily immune for 24 hours.

Biting Words.name: Biting Words
Biting Words.description:
You entwine magic with your voice, causing your taunts and jibes to physically harm your enemies. You can attack with your words once when you finish Casting the Spell, and can repeat the attack once on each of your subsequent turns by taking a single action, which has the attack, concentrate, and linguistic traits. After your third attack total, the spell ends.

When you attack with biting words, make a ranged spell attack roll against a creature within 30 feet, dealing 2k6 sonic damage if you hit (or double damage on a critical hit).

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6.

Black Tentacles.name: Black Tentacles
Black Tentacles.description:
Obszar 20-foot burst adjacent to a flat surface

Oily black tentacles rise up and attempt to capture creatures in the area. Make spell attack rolls against the Fortitude DC of each creature in the area. Any creature you succeed against is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Pochwycony} and takes 3k6 bludgeoning damage. Whenever a creature ends its turn in the area, the tentacles attempt to grab that creature if they haven't already, and they deal @Damage[1d6[bludgeoning]] damage to any creature already Grabbed.

The tentacles' Escape DC is equal to your spell DC. A creature can attack a tentacle in an attempt to release its grip. Its AC is equal to your spell DC, and it is destroyed if it takes 12 or more damage. Even if destroyed, additional tentacles continue to grow in the area until the duration ends. You can Dismiss the spell.

Blackfinger's Blades.name: Blackfinger's Blades
Blackfinger's Blades.description:
You pray for swift and painful death to your enemies and find your and your allies' weapons blessed to deliver just that.

The target weapons are coated with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.QGXNqpP5KvSldoZz]{Giant Scorpion Venom} with a DC equal to your spell DC.

The effects remain on a weapon for 1 minute or until the weapon deals damage, whichever comes first.
Blackfinger's Blades.target: up to 4 weapons, each wielded by a separate willing creature within range

Blade Barrier.name: Blade Barrier
Blade Barrier.description:
Blades of force form a churning wall. The wall is a straight line 20 feet high, 120 feet long, and 2 inches thick, and it provides cover. The wall deals 7k8 force damage to each creature that's in the wall's space when it is created, that attempts to pass through the wall, or that ends its turn inside the wall. A basic Reflex save reduces the damage. A creature that succeeds at this save when the wall is created is pushed to the nearest space on the side of its choice. Creatures trying to move through the wall fail to do so if they critically fail the save, ending their movement adjacent to the wall.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k8.

Blanket of Stars.name: Blanket of Stars
Blanket of Stars.description:
A flowing cloak of utter darkness drapes over you, filled with pinpricks of light like distant stars. It imparts the stillness of the cosmos to you, granting you a +2 status bonus to Stealth checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Schowanie Się} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Przekradanie Się}.

While outside under a starry night sky, you're also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialny} as long as you remain still. When moving under a starry night sky, you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} instead.

Gazing too closely into the stars is disorienting. Any creature that ends its turn adjacent to you must attempt a Will save; this is a mental, visual effect.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} until the end of its next turn.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Zdezorientowany} and dazzled until the end of its next turn.

Blast of the Bellows.name: Blast of the Bellows
Blast of the Bellows.description:
You create a churning eddy of warm air that makes it difficult to fly within the area. This area is difficult terrain for flying creatures. Each time a flying creature enters the area or ends its turn there, it must attempt an Acrobatics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Qf1ylAbdVi1rkc8M]{Maneuver in Flight}.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Porażka The creature descends 30 feet.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature descends 60 feet.

Wywyższenie (4.) Czas trwania zwiększa się do 10 minutes.

Blastback.name: Blastback
Blastback.description:
Aktywator You fall more than 10 feet.

You hit the ground with a shuddering boom, propelling the force of your fall out in a wave. You take no damage from the fall as the displaced air allows you to land gently, but all other creatures in the spell's area take 6k4 bludgeoning damage. Creatures that fail their save are also pushed back 5 feet.

Wywyższenie (+2) The emanation increases by 10 feet, and the damage increases by 1k4.

Blazing Armory.name: Blazing Armory
Blazing Armory.description:
As long as you have magic, you're never unarmed. You materialize a flaming simulacrum of any common simple or martial weapon into the target's grasp. The target must have a free hand to hold the weapon, or else the weapon falls to the ground in the target's space. The blazing weapon functions as a +1 striking weapon, and its damage type changes to fire. The damage type can't be changed using the versatile trait, modular trait, or similar methods.

A thrown weapon rematerializes in the target's hand after the Strike is complete. If you choose a ranged weapon that uses ammunition, the wielder must still reload the weapon using the normal number of actions, though this generates ammunition automatically; this functions as normal ammunition, and the blazing weapon can't use other types of ammunition.

Any creature other than you or the target that attempts to touch, make a Strike with, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Rozbrojenie} the weapon takes @Damage[1d6[fire]] damage each time.

Wywyższenie (4.) You can target up to 5 willing creatures and can choose a different weapon for each target. The weapons function as +1 striking flaming weapons.

Wywyższenie (6.) As 4., but the weapons function as +2 greater striking flaming weapons.

Wywyższenie (8.) As 4., but the weapons function as +3 greater striking greater flaming weapons.

Wywyższenie (10.) As 4., but the weapons function as +3 major striking greater flaming weapons.

Blazing Blade.name: Blazing Blade
Blazing Blade.description:
A scimitar-shaped beam of fiery light springs from your free hand. While the spell lasts, you can use a single action, which has the attack and concentrate traits, to burn your foes with the blazing blade. When you do, make a spell attack roll. On a success, the blazing blade deals 1k6 fire damage plus 1k6 spirit damage plus your spellcasting ability modifier. On a critical success, it deals double the usual damage.

Wywyższenie (4.) The blade's fire damage increases to 2k6. On a critical success, the target takes @Damage[(ternary(gte(@item.level,8),3,ternary(gte(@item.level,6),2,1)))d6[persistent,spirit]] damage.

Wywyższenie (6.) The blade's fire damage increases to 3k6. On a critical success, the target takes 2k6 persistent spirit damage.

Wywyższenie (8.) The blade's fire damage increases to 4k6. On a critical success, the target takes 3k6 persistent spirit damage.

Blazing Bolt.name: Płonący Pocisk
Blazing Bolt.description:
Wystrzeliwujesz promień gorąca i płomieni. Wykonaj atak zaklęciem przeciwko pojedynczej istocie. Przy trafieniu cel odnosi 2k6 obrażeń od ognia, a przy trafieniu krytycznym odnosi podwójne obrażenia.

Za każdą dodatkową akcję poświęconą na Rzucanie Zaklęcia możesz wystrzelić kolejny promień kierowany w inny cel, do maksymalnie trzech promieni wymierzonych w trzy różne istoty kosztem 3 akcji. Każdy z tych ataków zwieksza twoją karę za atak wielokrotny, ale nie nie zwiększasz swojej kary za atak wielokrotny dopóki nie wykonasz wszystkich rzutów ataku płonącym pociskiem. Jeśli poświęcisz 2 lub więcej akcji na Rzucenie tego Zaklęcia, obrażenia przy trafieniu zwiększają się do 4k6, a obrażenia przy trafieniu krytycznym nadal są podwojone.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zadawana każdemu z celów zwiększają się o 1k6 dla 1-akcyjnej wersji, lub o 2k6 dla 2-akcyjnej i 3-akcyjnej wersji.

Blazing Dive.name: Blazing Dive
Blazing Dive.description:
Superheated air collects under you, buoying you high into the sky before you plummet back down in a fiery comet. You Fly 15 feet straight up into the air, then Fly in a straight line to an empty space of your choice on the ground within 60 feet. When you land, the blistering air blasts out from you, dealing 3k4 bludgeoning damage and 3k6 fire damage (podstawowy rzut obronny Refleksu) to all creatures in a 10-foot emanation.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k4 bludgeoning and 1k6 fire.

Blazing Fissure.name: Blazing Fissure
Blazing Fissure.description:
A thin crack rips through the earth, erupting with magma, then swiftly seals up. Each creature along the line and on solid ground takes 4k6 bludgeoning damage and 6k6 fire damage with a Reflex save.

Krytyczny Sukces Efekt nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature takes half damage.

Porażka The creature takes full damage, and it falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia. and it falls prone.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k6 bludgeoning and 1k6 fire

Bless.name: Błogosławieństwo
Bless.description:
Błogosławieństwa zza zasłony pomagają twoim kompanom sięgać celu. Ty i twoi sojusznicy zyskujecie premię statusową +1 do rzutów ataku będąc w zasięgu emanacji. W kolejnych rundach, raz na rundę możesz Podtrzymać zaklęcie by zwiększyć prmień emanacji o 10 stóp.

Błogosławieństwo może przeciwdziałać @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.7ZinJNzxq0XF0oMx]{Zgubie}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.RfCEHpMoEAZvB9IZ]{Aura: Błogosławieństwo}
Bless.target: ty i twoi sojusznicy w obszarze

Blessed Boundary.name: Blessed Boundary
Blessed Boundary.description:
Manifestations of divine force appear in the hundreds, swirling in a massive, protective sphere. These typically look like spiky fragments, but often take on an appearance themed to the deity of the caster. The sphere is hollow, with the manifestations forming a shell 2 inches deep on the outer edge. You can choose to make the burst smaller, in 5-foot increments, when you cast it. The shell provides cover and can intersect solid terrain without affecting it. The shell deals 7k8 force damage to each creature who intersects with the shell when the sphere's created, or who attempts to move through the shell. The creature also takes the damage at the end of its turn, but only if it didn't already take damage from the shell that turn. The effects are determined by a creature's Reflex save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia, is pushed up to 10 feet in the direction of your choice, and ends its movement.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota odnosi podwójne obrażenia, is pushed up to 20 feet in the direction of your choice, and ends its movement.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k8.

Blessing of Defiance.name: Blessing of Defiance
Blessing of Defiance.description:
Channeling forth the power to persevere in the face of adversity, you grant the target the means to deny danger and avoid dire harm. Choose one saving throw: Fortitude, Reflex, or Will. The target gets a +4 status bonus to that saving throw for 1 round. The potency and number of targets of this blessing depend on how many actions you spend when Casting the Spell.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.FD9Ce5pqcZYstcMI]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Blessing of Defiance}

1 (somatic) The spell targets you or one willing ally within range.

2 (verbal) The spell targets you or one willing ally within range. If you choose Fortitude, the target gains resistance 15 to poison. If you choose Reflex, the target gains a +15-foot status bonus to its Speeds. If you choose Will, the target gains resistance 15 to mental damage.

3 (verbal) The spell targets you and all willing allies within 30 feet.

3yk7i1kixfa9prk4.target: you or one willing ally within range

7lz99ha8d7pnbnro.target: you or one willing ally within range

zyzgjes6kcerhhfz.target: you and all willing allies within range

Blight.name: Blight
Blight.description:
Obszar 1/2-mile-radius circle centered on you

You twist and stunt plants in the area, causing them to wither. In addition to other dangers from failing plant life, this decreases the crop yield for farms. If you cast this ritual in an area affected by plant growth, blight attempts to counteract plant growth instead of producing its usual effect.

Krytyczny Sukces Completely spoil the crop yield in the area, or decrease the yield by half in an area with up to a 1-mile radius.

Sukces Decease the crop yield in the area by half.

Porażka The ritual has no effect.

Krytyczna Porażka The flora in the area changes in an unexpected way, determined by the GM but generally as contradictory to your true desires as possible (for instance, enriching crops when you would prefer to blight them).

Blightburn Blast.name: Blightburn Blast
Blightburn Blast.description:
You channel a blast of powerful blightburn radiation from your hands. You deal 4k6 poison damage to creatures in the area. Creatures who fail their save are afflicted with stage 1 of blightburn sickness (on a critical failure, the creature moves immediately to stage 2). The level of blightburn sickness caused by this spell is equal to twice the spell's rank, and the disease's save DC uses the caster's DC.

Blightburn Sickness (uncommon, disease) Level 15

The ceiling of the vault of the Black Desert is studded with deadly crystals that glimmer like stars above the dark sands. These crystals are radioactive and flood the vault with lethal energy. Creatures other than those native to the vault or who have survived there for a long time develop a disease called blightburn sickness.

Creatures native to the Black Desert are immune, as are creatures who are affected by blightburn sickness but recover from it. The target can't recover from the disease's drained or sickened condition except by magic.

The surest way to avoid contracting blightburn sickness is by wearing a blightburn ward, a piece of protective jewelry often found among urdefhans' gear or for sale in Shraen.

Rzut Obronny DC 32 Fortitude

Nadejście Objawów [[/r 1d4 #days]]{1k4 days}

Stadium 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 1} (1 dzień)

Stadium 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1} (1 dzień)

Stadium 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 2} (1 week)

Stadium 4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 3} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 3} (1 month)

Stadium 5 Drained increases by 1 (1 year)

Blind Eye.name: Blind Eye
Blind Eye.description: You enchant a single object, preventing it from being used for magical observation. If you cast this spell on a non-magical item used to cast scrying spells, such as a spell component pouch or a spell focus, the item can't be used to cast the spell. If you cast blind eye on a magical item that can be activated to scry (such as a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.RM3SR1omNZfppZGl]{Crystal Ball} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.ACa9QlFqdmW4s2Th]{Hag Eye}), the item can't be activated for scrying effects. Magical items that are twice blind eye's spell rank or more aren't blocked this way.

Blinding Beauty.name: Blinding Beauty
Blinding Beauty.description:
You channel the allure of your nymph bloodline into a terribly beautiful glance. Each enemy in the area must attempt a Will saving throw.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} until the start of its next turn.

Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiony} until the start of its next turn.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is Blinded for 1 minute.

Blinding Foam.name: Blinding Foam
Blinding Foam.description:
You spray a colorful, caustic foam into the target's eyes, which clings to their face. Make a spell attack roll. If you hit, you deal 5k10 acid damage and 1k6 persistent acid damage, and the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiony} for the duration. The foam can be removed with 3 Interact actions, which ends the persistent acid damage. These Interact actions don't need to be consecutive. When the target's persistent acid damage ends, the spell automatically ends.

Wywyższenie (8.) The initial damage increases to 9k10, and the persistent acid damage increases to 2k6.

Blinding Fury.name: Blinding Fury
Blinding Fury.description:
Aktywator A creature damages you.

You curse the target with your outrage at being attacked. The effect is determined by the target's Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target can't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.1wQY3JYyhMYeeV2G]{Observe} you until the end of its turn, and if you're currently observed by it, you become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Schowany} to it.

Porażka As success, and for 1 minute, every time the target damages you, it can't observe you until the end of its turn.

Krytyczna Porażka As success, and for an unlimited duration, the first time each round the target damages a creature, it can't observe that creature until the end of its turn. If it damages several creatures at once, the creature it can't perceive is chosen randomly among those creatures.

Blindness.name: Ślepota
Blindness.description:
Oślepiasz cel. Efekt jest określany przez rzut obronny Krzepy celu. Następnie cel staje się tymczasowo niewrażliwy na 1 minutę.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Cel jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiony} do początku swojej następnej tury.

Porażka Cel jest oślepiony na 1 minutę.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel jest permanentnie oślepiony.

Blink Charge.name: Blink Charge
Blink Charge.description:
You propel yourself through the fabric of space to deal a blow carrying the momentum of your teleportation. You teleport to an empty space adjacent to a creature you can see within range, then make a Strike against the creature with a weapon you're wielding. The Strike deals damage, plus an extra 2k8 force damage, depending on the result of your Strike.

Krytyczny Sukces Double damage, plus after the Strike, you can teleport the target into an empty space up to 5 feet away from its current position. The new space must be on the ground if it started on the ground, in the air if it was flying, and so on.

Sukces The Strike deals full damage.

Porażka The Strike deals no damage, but the target takes 1k8 force damage.

Krytyczna Porażka The Strike deals no damage, and you take 1k8 force damage.

Wywyższenie (+2) The spell's range increases by 60 feet, and any force damage the spell deals is increased by 1k8 force.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.lUL4nvIVYqFOwxAZ]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Blink Charge}

Blister.name: Blister
Blister.description:
You point at a target in range, and its skin grows searing blisters filled with caustic fluid. The target must attempt a Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target grows one blister. You can spend a single action, which has the concentrate trait, to pop a blister. The target and each creature in a @Template[cone|distance:15] originating from the target takes 7k6 acid damage (basic Fortitude save). You choose the direction of the cone, which can't include the target. When no blisters are left, the spell ends.

Porażka As success, but the target grows two blisters.

Krytyczna Porażka As success, but the target grows four blisters.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage of a popped blister increases by 1k6.

Blistering Invective.name: Blistering Invective
Blistering Invective.description:
A heap of insults and invectives spew from your mouth-words so devastating your foes burn from the intensity of your diatribe. Your words deal 2k6 persistent fire damage, and the target must attempt a Will save. If the target doesn't understand the language or you're not speaking a language, it gains a +4 circumstance bonus to its save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target takes half the persistent fire damage.

Porażka The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1} and takes the full persistent fire damage.

Krytyczna Porażka The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2} and takes double the persistent fire damage.

Wywyższenie (+2) You can target two additional creatures, and the persistent damage increases by 2k6.

Blood Duplicate.name: Blood Duplicate
Blood Duplicate.description: This spell deals you 1 piercing damage as you shape a magical duplicate of the target from your blood; you can't cast this spell if you don't have blood. This spell can't duplicate an item made of precious materials, or materials with a rarity of uncommon or higher. If you're ever more than 5 feet from the duplicate, the spell's duration immediately ends. The Perception DC to recognize the duplicate as false using any sense except touch is equal to 10 + your spellcasting ability modifier + your Crafting proficiency bonus. The item feels wet and obviously fake to the touch. When the spell ends, the item collapses into a puddle of blood that quickly evaporates.
Blood Duplicate.target: 1 non-magical object of 1 Bulk or less

Blood Feast.name: Blood Feast
Blood Feast.description:
Your head splits vertically into an enormous maw, which feasts upon the target's blood, dealing 12k6 piercing damage, depending on your spell attack roll. After the spell, your head sews back together as if it had never split apart. You gain temporary Hit Points for 1 minute equal to half the piercing damage the target takes.

If you are a gug, increase the piercing damage by 2k6 and increase the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} you deal on a critical hit by 1k8. This spell doesn't alter a gug's appearance.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature takes double damage and @Damage[(@item.rank - 4)d8[bleed]].

Sukces The creature takes full damage.

Porażka You miss and the creature takes no damage.

Wywyższenie (+1) The piercing damage increases by 2k6, and the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} on a critical increases by 1.

Blood Vendetta.name: Blood Vendetta
Blood Vendetta.description:
Wymagania You can bleed.

Aktywator A creature deals piercing, slashing, or persistent bleed damage to you.

You curse the target, punishing it for having the audacity to spill your blood. The target takes 2k6 persistent bleed damage and must attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target takes half the persistent bleed damage.

Porażka The target takes the full persistent bleed damage. Until the bleeding stops, the target has weakness 1 to piercing and slashing damage. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.buXx8Azr4BYWPtFg]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Blood Vendetta (Porażka)}

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the target takes double the persistent bleed damage.

Wywyższenie (+2) The persistent bleed damage increases by 2k6.

Blood Ward.name: Blood Ward
Blood Ward.description:
Your patron's aegis descends to shield a target from harm. Designate one of the following creature traits: aberration, animal, beast, celestial, construct, dragon, elemental, fey, fiend, fungus, monitor, ooze, plant, or undead. The target gains a +1 status bonus to its saving throws and AC against creatures with that trait.

Wywyższenie (5.) The status bonus increases to +2.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.aDOL3OAEWf3ka9oT]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Blood Ward}

Blood in the Water.name: Blood in the Water
Blood in the Water.description:
Wymagania The target is taking persistent bleed damage or your last action dealt slashing damage to the target.

Predators are drawn to the scent of blood, and blood can disperse shockingly far in the water. You summon the spirits of aquatic predators to appear as a spectral swarm around the target. When you Cast or Sustain this Spell, the target takes 2k6 spirit damage (basic Reflex save). If the target takes any damage from the spell, it treats all water as difficult terrain for 1 round as the predators try to drag them down. The spectral predators don't take up space, grant flanking, or have any other attributes a creature would. If you deal slashing damage to the target while the spell is active, you automatically Sustain this Spell. If you cast blood in the water while a previous casting of this hex is still in effect, the previous effect ends.

Wywyższenie (+2) The damage dealt increases by 2k6.
Blood in the Water.requirements: The target is taking persistent bleed damage or your last action dealt slashing damage to the target.

Bloodspray Curse.name: Bloodspray Curse
Bloodspray Curse.description:
You inflict a curse upon the target that causes any wound to gush blood. The target must attempt a Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces For 1 minute, the first time each round that the target takes at least 10 @Damage[(floor(@item.rank/2))d6[piercing]]{piercing} or @Damage[(floor(@item.rank/2))d6[slashing]]{slashing} damage from a single Strike, it takes 2k6 additional damage of the same type.

Porażka As success, but when it takes the additional damage, it also takes @Damage[(floor(@item.rank/2))d6[bleed]].

Wywyższenie (+2) The additional damage increases by 1k6 and the persistent bleed damage increases by 1k6.

Blunt the Final Blade.name: Blunt the Final Blade
Blunt the Final Blade.cost: powdered dawnsilver and rare grave dirt worth 10 000 gp
Blunt the Final Blade.description:
You anoint the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.5Q5MfHX43Sjm8C6Z]{Final Blade} with powdered dawnsilver and grave dirt while speaking softly and carefully to the souls trapped within it. You create a mystical pathway for the souls to escape through and urge them to draw out the magic of the final blade with them as they depart.

Krytyczny Sukces As success, and the souls also grant a boon; the primary and secondary casters gain a +2 status bonus to saves against death and fear effects for the next year.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.eotqxEWIgaK7nMpD]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Blunt the Final Blade (Krytyczny Sukces)}

Sukces The souls escape the final blade and peacefully pass on to their eternal rewards, as appropriate for each soul. The final blade is no longer magical; it can't store anymore souls and can be destroyed as a normal guillotine.

Porażka The ritual has no effect.

Krytyczna Porażka The ritual goes horribly wrong. The souls within the final blade are released in a furious rush as a gray death that does its best to slay the ritual's casters and run amok among the living. The final blade retains it abilities and can continue to store souls.
Blunt the Final Blade.secondarycheck: Arcana, Crafting, Society, and the other skill not used for the primary check

Blur.name: Rozmycie
Blur.description: Postać celu rozmywa się. Staje się on @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty}. Jako, że natura tego efektu pozostawia pozycję celu oczywistą, cel nie może wykorzystać tego przysłonięcia aby się Schować lub Przekraść.

Boil Blood.name: Boil Blood
Boil Blood.description:
You heat a foe's blood and boil it within its veins. The target takes 10k10 fire damage, with a Fortitude save. A nonliving creature with blood in its body (such as a vampire) can be affected, but a creature with no blood is immune.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Cel odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 2}.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 3}.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k10.

Bonding Meal.name: Bonding Meal
Bonding Meal.description:
Many grow up and spend their lives eating with others, and doing so binds them — to their families, communities, and cultures. Food can form long-lasting bonds, and with a bit of extra work, those bonds can be shared.

You prepare a meal for a small gathering of up to 10 close friends, enough people to comfortably eat together at one table or in one circle. As you collect and prepare the food, you call upon spirits of home and memory. As they work through you and guide you, you perfectly recreate a dish that emotionally connects you to a place of your past: perhaps your mother's cooking when you were a child, or the way you and your comrades-in-arms cooked rations together when you fought in the war. When you're done, you share the meal and tell your new friends the story that comes with it. As they eat and drink, any participants of 4. level or lower sink into a snapshot of your past and can borrow insights from it for future use.

Krytyczny Sukces Your friends are vividly taken through your memories as you relive them, and they hold onto the experience even after the fugue ends. For the next week, they have a +4 circumstance bonus to Deception and Diplomacy checks to convince anyone from the community where the meal originated from that they are from that area or were present for events you described. Even after the raw magic infusing the memories fade, the memories don't, and your friends will be able to make the dish just as well as you can. Chances are, they like it just as much as you did.

Sukces As critical success, except your friends get a +2 circumstance bonus to Deception and Diplomacy checks instead. They also can't make the meal themselves but probably look forward to tasting it the way you make it if you ever offer to cook it again.

Porażka Your friends see the vision as planned, but the magic doesn't quite take. As success, but no one receives any bonus. The real treasure will have to be the friends you fed along the way.

Krytyczna Porażka Your friends see the vision as planned, and the magic takes hold — but it goes wrong, like a bad case of indigestion. The memories are scattered around the rest of their psyches, and it takes a week to settle down properly. They confuse parts of your past for theirs, and they take a –2 circumstance bonus to Deception and Diplomacy checks for the next week against anyone from your old community, as they confidently apply the wrong expectations from their lives across the one you were trying to introduce them to.

Wywyższenie (4.) Participants up to 8. level can gain the benefits, and the cost is 40 gp.

Wywyższenie (6.) Participants up to 12. level can gain the benefits, and the cost is 150 gp.

Wywyższenie (8.) Participants up to 16. level can gain the benefits, and the cost is 480 gp.

Wywyższenie (10.) Participants of any level can gain the benefits, and the cost is 2000 gp.
Bonding Meal.primarycheck: Cooking Lore, Crafting, Performance, or Survival (trained)

Bone Flense.name: Bone Flense
Bone Flense.description:
The target weapon becomes imbued with Achaekek's power and glows softly with crimson light akin to that shed by a candle. When a creature with a skeleton or exoskeleton takes damage from a Strike delivered by this weapon, the creature's bones nearest to the wound instantly sprout jagged, razor-sharp spurs that flense the muscle and flesh from inside out. The creature takes an additional 1k6 persistent bleed damage from the Strike. You can use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.wfUIsKBxCBfXi1TF]{Erupting Spurs} reaction.

Wywyższenie (+2) The persistent bleed damage increases by 1k6. The damage from Erupting Spurs increases by 4k6.
Bone Flense.target: 1 weapon that is either wielded by a member of the Red Mantis or is a praying mantis's leg Strike

Bone Spray.name: Bone Spray
Bone Spray.description:
You fire a torrent of jagged bone shards from your hands, dealing 2k10 piercing damage and 1 persistent bleed damage to all creatures in the area.

Wywyższenie (+1) The piercing damage increases by 1k10 and the persistent bleed damage increases by 1.

Boneshaker.name: Gnatowstrząs
Boneshaker.description:
Wyciągasz rękę aby zawładnąć szkieletem istoty z odległości, krzywdząc jej ciało i potencjalnie wlekąc ją za kości wbrew jej woli. Liczba akcji poświęconych na Rzucanie tego Zaklęcia określa jego efekty. Niezależnie od liczby akcji poświęconych na Rzucanie tego Zaklęcia cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Krzepy.

2 (koncentracja, manipulacja) Zaciskasz pięść, boleśnie miażdżąc kości celu i zadając 3k8 obrażeń obuchowych.

3 (koncentracja, manipulacja) Jak wersja 2-akcyjna, a dodatkowo przeciągasz ciało celu za jego kości, poruszając nim jak niezdarną marionetką. Ten ruch przestrzega zasad wymuszonego ruchu.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Cel odnosi połowę obrażeń. Jeśli rzuciłeś wersję 3-akcyjną, możesz przemieścić cel o nie więcej niż 5 stóp; może on zamiast tego paść @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony} aby uniknąć ruchu.

Porażka Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia i jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 1}. Jeśli rzuciłeś wersję 3-akcyjną, możesz przemieścić cel o nie więcej niż 15 stóp; może on paść powalony aby uniknąć ruchu.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia oraz jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 2}. Jeśli rzuciłeś wersję 3-akcyjną, możesz przemieścić cel o nie więcej niż 25 stóp a następnie powalić go; jeśli spróbujesz przemieścić cel w niebezpieczne miejsce, na przykład do zbiornika z kwasem lub zepchnąć go z klifu, może on paść powalony aby uniknąć ruchu.

Wywyższenie (+2) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 3k8.

Bonewall Bulwark.name: Bonewall Bulwark
Bonewall Bulwark.description:
You create a miniature replica of the infamous Bonewall of Yled, a jumble of bones with threatening limbs reaching from it. The bulwark is 10 feet high, 10 feet long, and 1 foot thick. The bulwark has an AC of 10 and 30 Hit Points. You must create the bulwark in an unbroken open space so it doesn't pass through any creatures or objects, or the bulwark's dimensions are reduced to fit the smaller space. It must pass within 5 feet of you.

The bonewall bulwark grants cover from creatures on the opposite side. At the beginning of your turn, you may have the limbs attack a single creature you're aware of within 5 feet of the wall using your spell attack modifier and dealing 3k10 bludgeoning damage. This ignores cover and concealment provided by the bonewall bulwark.

Wywyższenie (+1) The bludgeoning damage increases by 1k10 and the HP of the wall increases by 10.

Boomerang Shot.name: Boomerang Shot
Boomerang Shot.description:
You launch a curved length of wood at a foe that arcs around objects and obstacles to strike from an unexpected direction. Make a spell attack roll against the target's AC. This attack ignores the target's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} condition and ignores all cover except greater cover. If you hit, the projectile deals 7k10 bludgeoning damage.

Wywyższenie (7.) The damage increases to 9k10.

Wywyższenie (9.) The damage increases to 12k10, and the attack ignores cover completely.

Boost Eidolon.name: Wzmocnienie Eidolona
Boost Eidolon.description:
Skupiasz się głęboko na więzi łączącej cię z twoim eidolonem i wzmacniasz moc jego ataków. Twój eidolon zyskuje premię statusową +2 do rzutów obrażeń jego atakami wręcz. Jeśli Ciosy twojego eidolona zadają więcej niż jedną kość obrażeń, premia statusowa zwiększa się do +2 za każdą kość obrażeń broni, do maksymalnie +8 przy czterech kościach obrażeń broni.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.h0CKGrgjGNSg21BW]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Wzmocnienie Eidolona}

Bottle the Storm.name: Bottle the Storm
Bottle the Storm.description:
Aktywator You would take electricity damage.

When lightning is turned against you, you store the charge safely within yourself, unleashing it when the time is right. You gain electricity resistance 10 against the triggering effect. If you successfully prevent damage in this way, at any time during the spell's duration, you can spend a single action, which has the attack trait, to expend the charge and make a spell attack against the AC of a target within 60 feet. This attack deals electricity damage equal to the damage prevented by bottle the storm. If you Cast bottle the storm a second time before the original duration elapses, or if you do not make this attack within 1 minute, the stored charge dissipates harmlessly.

Wywyższenie (7th) The resistance increases to 15, and you can immediately make the spell attack granted by bottle the storm as part of the reaction used to Cast the Spell.

Wywyższenie (10th) The resistance increases to 20, and you can immediately make the spell attack granted by bottle the storm as part of the reaction used to Cast the Spell.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.GlggmEqkGVj1noOD]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Bottle the Storm}

Bottomless Stomach.name: Bottomless Stomach
Bottomless Stomach.description:
You create a shimmering extradimensional space accessible from the target's mouth. The space can hold objects and equipment, up to a total of 10 Bulk. This extradimensional storage doesn't hamper the target's ability to eat, drink, speak (if applicable), or otherwise act, as it only opens and closes when the target chooses.

The target can Interact to swallow an object of up to 1 Bulk, which doesn't harm the object or the target. If the extradimensional space is full, the target can't add any more objects until first removing one or more stored objects. Organic matter and living creatures can't be stored in this space. The extradimensional storage is obvious to any creature who looks into the target's mouth, as the entryway shimmers slightly, though this doesn't clearly reveal the contents inside.

The target can Interact to spit out a single object of its choice, causing the object to fall to the ground in the target's space. The target can Interact three times in a row to spit out the entire contents of its extradimensional storage; the target doesn't have to take these actions all in the same turn, but if it takes any other actions in between, it has to start over. The items eject into the target's space, possibly spilling out into adjacent spaces if there is too much to fit.

When the spell ends or the target falls unconscious, the contents of the extradimensional storage are disgorged in a riotous spew, landing in the nearest unoccupied space, a bit wet but otherwise unharmed.

Wywyższenie (5.) Czas trwania zwiększa się do 8 hours

Bound in Death.name: Bound in Death
Bound in Death.description:
You tether another creature's spirit to your own, shunting part of the damage dealt to you onto one of your foes. You create a life link between yourself and the target. Each time an effect damages you, the target attempts a Will save, which can cause it to take part of the damage, as detailed below. The spell ends if the target is ever more than 120 feet away from you. If either you or the target is reduced to 0 Hit Points, any damage from this spell is resolved, and then the spell ends.

Each time you sustain this spell, you can choose to deal 6k8 damage to yourself, which can be reduced with bound in death as normal.

Krytyczny Sukces The damage you take is unaffected, and the spell ends.

Sukces The damage you take is unaffected, and the target can't take damage from bound in death for 1 round.

Porażka The target takes half the damage of the effect instead of you, then can't take damage from bound in death for 1 round. Apply any immunity, resistances, or weaknesses you have to the damage before halving it, and the target still applies any immunity, resistances, weaknesses, and the like it has.

Krytyczna Porażka The target takes half the damage of the effect.

Wywyższenie (+2) The damage you can choose to deal to yourself each time you sustain the spell increases by 3k8.

Bountiful Oasis.name: Bountiful Oasis
Bountiful Oasis.cost: 3 drops of fresh water taken from a naturally occurring lake within 1 000 miles of the ritual site
Bountiful Oasis.description:
You redirect the flow of underground lakes and other nearby sources of water to cause a lush natural spring to emerge from the ground. The water of the spring is a clean source of fresh water, perfect for drinking, farming, and supporting all forms of life. The spring purifies itself every morning at dawn, removing toxins and contaminants unless they're more than double the spring's rank.

The ritual creates a spring that's geographically appropriate to the terrain where the ritual is performed; for example, it creates a desert oasis in sandy, arid regions and a natural hot spring in a mountain range.

Krytyczny Sukces A small pond or oasis appears, fed by a natural spring that discharges enough pure drinking water to sustain a small settlement. The ground in a @Template[burst|distance:20] surrounding the spring bursts with life, invigorated by the spring's irrigation. A variety of regionally appropriate, fruit-bearing plants and other crops immediately take root and prosper.

Sukces As critical success, but the oasis is a small pool that discharges enough pure drinking water to sustain roughly a dozen people, without any plants growing around the perimeter.

Porażka You're unable to redirect the flow of the water.

Krytyczna Porażka You create a small pond of fetid and stagnant water that never dries, attracting disease-carrying insects and sickening creatures who partake of its waters.

Bounty of the Sky.name: Bounty of the Sky
Bounty of the Sky.description:
You call forth a flock of geese that drop restorative fruits and breads from the sky as they fly overhead. You or an ally in the area can Interact to collect one of these gifts, and can then either consume it as part of the same action or do so with a separate Interact action later in the spell's duration. Enemies who attempt to pick up one of these gifts find that it turns to ash in their hands. Each time a character consumes one of these gifts, they can select one of the following benefits.

  • The character regains 4k6 Hit Points.
  • The character reduces the stage of one poison or disease they suffer from by one stage. This can't reduce the stage below 1 or cure the affliction.
  • The character reduces the value of their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony} condition by 2, or reduces two of the listed conditions by 1 each.

Wywyższenie (+2) The amount of Hit Points a character regains from consuming a gift increases by 2k6.

Bracing Tendrils.name: Bracing Tendrils
Bracing Tendrils.description:
Visible tendrils of force anchor your body to the ground, preventing unwanted movement. Whenever you're on the ground and a creature or effect attempts to forcibly move you from your space, you can use your spell DC in place of your Fortitude DC as the DC of the check to move you. If a creature wouldn't normally need a check to move you, it must succeed at an appropriate check (usually an Athletics check for physical movement) against your spell DC or you are unmoved; if an effect wouldn't normally need a check to move you, it must counteract bracing tendrils or you are unmoved. When a creature fails to move you in this way, you can choose to have the tendrils lash back and push them 5 feet away from you.

While the tendrils anchor you in place when you come to a stop, they uproot easily to cooperate with your own voluntary movement, so you can still move freely while under the effect of the spell.

Brain Drain.name: Brain Drain
Brain Drain.description:
You probe the target's mind to glean knowledge. This deals 1k8 mental damage with a basic Will save.

If the target fails the save, you sort through the stolen memories to attempt a single check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Pozyskanie Wiedzy}. Choose a skill that has the Recall Knowledge action, and use the target's skill modifier for the check.

Wywyższenie (+1) The mental damage increases by 1k8.

Bralani Referendum.name: Bralani Referendum
Bralani Referendum.description:
You enforce fair play with punishing zephyrs. When you Cast this Spell, choose one condition from among @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony}. When a creature in the area inflicts the chosen condition, they take 2k6 slashing damage with a basic Fortitude save. A creature can't take this damage more than once per round. You can Dismiss the spell.

Wywyższenie (+2) Choose one more condition. The slashing damage when a creature inflicts any of the chosen conditions increases by 2k6.

Bramble Bush.name: Bramble Bush
Bramble Bush.description:
In a sudden burst of growth, you cause a thorned bush to sprout from the ground, lash around, and wither. Any creature in the area takes 1k4 piercing damage with a basic Reflex saving throw.

Until the start of your next turn, the area is difficult terrain and hazardous terrain. Any creature entering the square takes @Damage[(1d4 + ceil(@item.level / 2) - 1)[piercing]] damage with a basic Reflex saving throw.

Wywyższenie (+2) The initial damage increases by 1k4, and the damage dealt by hazardous terrain increases by 1.

Brand the Impenitent.name: Brand the Impenitent
Brand the Impenitent.description:
You brand the target with an ethereal copy of your deity's religious symbol. This brand can't be hidden, but it is visible only to followers of your faith, who see it as clearly as a lit torch. Followers of your faith ignore the target's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} condition, if any, and the target gains a –1 status penalty to AC against attacks by followers of your faith. If the target is a follower of your deity in good standing, the spell fails.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The spell lasts for 1 round.

Porażka The spell lasts for 1 minute.

Krytyczna Porażka The spell has an unlimited duration.

Breadcrumbs.name: Okruszki
Breadcrumbs.description:
Chronisz swój cel przed zejściem na manowce poprzez oznaczanie miejsc gdzie już był i pomagając mu wydedukować, dokąd jeszcze musi się udać. Cel pozostawia za sobą błyszczący ślad, który utrzymuje się przez cały czas działania zaklęcia. Ten ślad nie zdradza kierunku ani kolejności w jakiej przebył swoją drogę – wskazuje jedynie, gdzie cel się poruszał w czasie działania zaklęcia.

Wywyższenie (2.) Czas trwania zwiększa się do 8 godzin.

Wywyższenie (3.) Czas trwania zwiększa się do momentu twoich następnych codziennych przygotowań.

Breath of Drought.name: Breath of Drought
Breath of Drought.description:
You fill the area with an oppressive, arid swelter that overwhelms creatures with heat exhaustion. Objects are unaffected. Each creature in the area when the spell is cast or that ends its turn in the area afterward must attempt a Fortitude save. Water creatures and plant creatures use the outcome one degree of success worse than the result of their saving throw. Creatures whose bodies contain no significant moisture (such as fire elementals) are immune to breath of drought.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1}.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 2}.

Wywyższenie (4.) Once per round when you Sustain the Spell, you can move the center of the burst to a new location within range.

Wywyższenie (7.) As the 4. kręgu version, except the range is 120 feet and the area is a 20-foot burst.

Breath of Life.name: Breath of Life
Breath of Life.description:
Aktywator A living creature within range would die.

Your blessing revives a creature at the moment of its death. You prevent the target from dying and restore 5k8 Hit Points to the target. You can't use breath of life if the triggering effect was a death effect or an effect that leaves no remains, such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r7ihOgKv19eJQnik]{Dezintegracja}

Wywyższenie (+2) The healing increases by 1k8.

Breathe Fire.name: Ognisty Oddech
Breathe Fire.description:
Z twoich ust wydobywa się strumień płomieni. Zadajesz istotom w obszarze 2k6 obrażeń od ognia z podstawowym rzutem obronnym Refleksu.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6.

Bridge of Vines.name: Most z Pnączy
Bridge of Vines.description:
Pod twoimi stopami wyrastają pnącza i rozciągają się przed tobą w linii prostej na odległość do 60 stóp, tworząc most o szerokości 10 stóp, który może omijać trudny teren i niskie przeszkody, a także sięgać wyżej położonego terenu. Most ma KP równą twojemu ST zaklęć, Twardość 10 i 20 Punktów Żywotności. Jest niewrażliwy na trafienia krytyczne i obrażenia precyzyjne. Most utrzymuje się przez czas trwania zaklęcia, dopóki nie zostanie zniszczony, lub dopóki nie Odwołasz zaklęcia.

Gdy zaklęcie jest aktywne, ty i twoi sojusznicy możecie normalnie korzystać z mostu. Jeśli jakiekolwiek inne istoty spróbują użyć mostu, pnącza próbują je podciąć i oplątać. Muszą one wykonać rzut obronny Refleksu przeciwko twojemu ST zaklęć.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Cel traktuje całą długość mostu jako trudny teren.

Porażka Jak przy sukcesie, a cel zostaje @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}.

Krytyczna Porażka Jak przy sukcesie, a cel zostaje powalony i @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Pochwycony}, dopóki nie Ucieknie (ST równy twojemu ST zaklęć) lub zaklęcie się nie zakończy.

Wywyższenie (+1) Punkty Żywotności mostu zwiększają się o 10.

Brine Dragon Bile.name: Brine Dragon Bile
Brine Dragon Bile.description:
Aktywator A creature within range takes damage from a slashing or piercing attack, or one that inflicts persistent bleed damage.

You spit a glob of caustic saltwater that stings the wounds of the creature. Make a ranged spell attack against the triggering creature's AC. On a hit, salt scours its open wound, dealing 2k6 persistent acid damage.

Wywyższenie (+2) The persistent damage increases by 2k6.

Briny Bolt.name: Morski Bełt
Briny Bolt.description:
Wystrzeliwujesz bełt z morskiej wody ze swojej wyciągniętej dłoni. Wykonaj rzut na dystansowy atak zaklęciem obierając cel w zasięgu.

Krytyczny Sukces Istota odnosi 4k6 obrażeń obuchowych i jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiona} na 1 rundę oraz @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczona} na 1 minutę w wyniku słonej wody pryskającej jej w oczy. Istota może wykorzystać akcję Interakcji aby przetrzeć oczy ze słonej wody i zakończyć status oślepienia, ale nie status zamroczenia.

Sukces Istota odnosi 2k6 obrażeń obuchowych i jest oślepiona na 1 rundę. Istota może wykorzystać akcję Interakcji aby przetrzeć oczy ze słonej wody i zakończyć status oślepienia.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6.

Buffeting Winds.name: Buffeting Winds
Buffeting Winds.description:
You release a quick burst of wind that batters your living opponents without causing them lasting harm, while also blowing undead away. The wind deals 2k4 bludgeoning damage, which is nonlethal against living creatures. Against undead, the winds are more vicious, and the spell loses the nonlethal trait against such creatures. Each creature in the area must attempt a basic Reflex save. On a failure, undead creatures are also knocked back 5 feet (or 10 feet on a critical failure).

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k4.

Bullhorn.name: Donośność
Bullhorn.description:
Wzmacniasz swój głos, czyniąc go na tyle głośnym, aby było go słychać wyraźnie nawet na wielkie odegłości. Podczas trwania zaklęcia twój głost staje się słyszalny głośno i wyraźnie dla wszystkich słuchaczy w zasięgu 500 stóp, nawet jeśli dźwięki otoczenia zwykle by go zagłuszały. Mimo tej donośności, nie czyni go to drażniącym ani rozpraszającym. Nie zwiększa to zasięgu lub obszaru działania efektów lingiwstycznych i słuchowych, a fizyczne przeszkody takie jak ściany czy drzwi nadal mogą w normalny sposób zagłuszać twój głos.

Twój donośny głos pozwala ci skuteczniej wpływać na innych a poprawiona akustyka ułatwia występy w obszernych przestrzeniach. Zyskujesz premię statusową +1 do testów @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.tHCqgwjtQtzNqVvd]{Wymuszeń} oraz testów Występów z cechą słuchowości aby @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EEDElIyin4z60PXx]{Występować} w obszernych przestrzeniach. Możesz odwołać to zaklęcie.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.9yzlmYUdvdQshTDF]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Donośność}

Wywyższenie (5.) Twój głos staje się wyraźnie słyszalny na odległość 1200 stóp.

Wywyższenie (7.) Twój głos staje się wyraźnie słyszalny na odległość do 1 mili.

Buoyant Bubbles.name: Wyporne Bąbelki
Buoyant Bubbles.description:
Tworzysz cienką warstwę spienionych bąbelków, które przywierają do celu i sprawiają, że unosi się w wodzie i podobnych płynach. Cel nie tonie, nawet jeśli nie wykonał pomyślnego testu pływania w tej rundzie; cel będący w trakcie tonięcia, wynurza się na powierzchnię z pomocą bąbelków w przeciągu 1 rundy. Jeśli woda lub płyn posiadają powierzchnię, bąbelki powstrzymują również cel przed zanurkowaniem pod tę powierzchnię, chyba że zda rzut obronny Krzepy przeciw ST twoich zaklęć.

Wywyższenie (4.) Możesz obrać za cel do 5 istot.

Burglar's Blind.name: Burglar's Blind
Burglar's Blind.description:
The only thing thieves love more than being silent and stealthy is the piles of gold they win with that silence and stealth. You mask the target with multiple illusions combined in a perfect mix, affecting them with both the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibility} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gIdDLrbswTV3OBJy]{Silence} spells. If the target takes a hostile action, burglar's blind and both the spells it grants end after the hostile action is completed.

Wywyższenie (5th) You can target up to 5 willing creatures. The spells end for all targets if any one of them takes a hostile action.

Burning Blossoms.name: Burning Blossoms
Burning Blossoms.description:
Obszar 30-foot radius, 100-foot tall cylinder

An intangible hollow tree sprouts from the ground and grows to towering height, radiating a fiery passion and fascinating viewers. The base of the tree takes up a single square and grows 100 feet upwards, while its branches extend outwards 30 feet, forming the spell's cylindrical area. The tree then blossoms, growing delicate white flowers that burn with white-hot fire. As the tree's branches gently rustle in the wind, flower petals drift to the ground in a shower of flame. Any creature that ends its turn under the tree's branches takes 6k6 fire damage from the burning petals. Any enemy that can see the tree, even if the enemy is outside the spell's area, must attempt a will save. This is an emotion, mental, and visual effect. Creatures fascinated with the tree must use at least one of their actions on each of their turns to move toward the tree.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune for 24 hours.

Sukces The creature is unaffected, but it must attempt a new save at the end of its turn if it can still see the tree.

Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Zafascynowany} with the tree until the end of its next turn. If it can still see the tree then, it must attempt a save again.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is fascinated with the tree until the spell ends. The tree's fire damage doesn't end the fascination; other hostile actions end it, as normal. If the fascination ends, the creature must attempt a new save at the end of its turn if it can still see the tree.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k6

Burrow Ward.name: Burrow Ward
Burrow Ward.description:
You solidify the earth around you, hindering burrowing creatures. Creatures that can't burrow through stone can't burrow through the area. Such creatures already underground within the area must succeed at a Fortitude save or be ejected from the area toward the surface. Those who succeed are forced out of the area but can remain underground. Creatures that can burrow through stone treat the area as difficult terrain.

Wywyższenie (5.) You create a @Template[emanation|distance:30].

Bursting Bloom.name: Bursting Bloom
Bursting Bloom.description:
You cause a rose bush to sprout from the chest of a foe, bursting out of its body and wrapping it in thorned vines. The target takes 6k6 piercing damage and 1k6 persistent bleed damage and must attempt a Fortitude save. When the target is no longer taking persistent bleed damage and is no longer encumbered, the rose bush withers away to nothing.

Krytyczny Sukces Efekt nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature takes half damage and no persistent damage.

Porażka The creature takes full damage and persistent damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.D5mg6Tc7Jzrj6ro7]{Przeciążony} for 4 rounds.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature takes double damage and persistent damage and is encumbered for 1 minute.

Wywyższenie (+2) The initial damage increases by 3k6, and the persistent bleed damage increases by 1k6.

Butterfly Bender.name: Butterfly Bender
Butterfly Bender.cost: Alcohol worth a total of 20 gp × the ritual level
Butterfly Bender.description:
Sometimes, the problems in your life are too oppressive. Sometimes, you have a case you need to crack and you have no idea where to start. When you've exhausted all options and willpower, you might as well just get drunk and call it a night. The butterfly bender is a ritual to kill two birds with one stone. By twisting fate around a session of hard drinking, you and a small party (no more than five people) suspend judgment, memory, and even consciousness as you all hurl yourselves into the arms of destiny and politely ask for a favor. You all get blackout drunk and, if all goes according to plan, you'll wake up with some progress upon a quest you've all undertaken — hopefully, without too much collateral damage.

The participants of the ritual wake up the next day with some of the following, determined by the results of the ritual. Any options that aren't chosen are temporarily lost to you.

  • Your dignity.
  • A common item that has the consumable trait of a level no higher than that of the ritual, which might be useful for an upcoming challenge. If lost, you misplace all of your currently carried items — including keys to where your equipment might be stored. With a modicum of effort, you recover your items within 1 day.
  • A new friend or connection, as though you'd succeeded at a Diplomacy check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Wywarcie Wrażenia} with a relevant NPC up to the ritual's level. If this is one of things lost, an existing friend refuses to speak to you for 1 day.
  • A useful piece of information, as though you'd succeeded at a Diplomacy check to Gather Information. If lost, you take a –4 status penalty to your next check to Recall Knowledge.
  • A convenient opportunity of the GM's choice. If there's no immediately relevant opportunity, you find an opportunity to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QyzlsLrqM0EEwd7j]{Earn Income} at the ritual's level + 1. If lost, the result of your next attempt to Earn Income is one degree of success worse.

Krytyczny Sukces Pick two options from the above list. The GM then gives you a bonus 3. option of their choice.

Sukces Pick two options from the above list.

Porażka Pick one option from the above list.

Krytyczna Porażka Pick two options from the above list. The GM gives you one of them.

Buzzing Bites.name: Buzzing Bites
Buzzing Bites.description:
You evoke buzzing and crawling insects to climb onto a foe's body and bite, dealing 1k4 piercing damage and potentially sickening the foe, depending on its Fortitude save. Once this spell ends, the target becomes temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected.

Sukces The target takes half damage.

Porażka The target takes full damage.

Krytyczna Porażka The target takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1} by the crawling insects. The sickened value can't be reduced below 1 while the spell is active.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k4.

Buzzing Servants.name: Buzzing Servants
Buzzing Servants.description:
You summon a swarm of bees from the city of Axis that rapidly constructs geometric shapes from wax. The bees appear in an unoccupied square, building a structure of hexagons, squares, and decagons that fill the space. The wax shape has a Hardness of 10 and 40 Hit Points but also decays over 24 hours.

When you Sustain the spell, you can choose another unoccupied square in range that the bees move to and fill with wax shapes. Any amount of area or splash damage to the square they're present in kills the bees, ending further construction.

Cackle.name: Rechot
Cackle.description: Za pomocą krótkiego wybuchu śmiechu, wydłużasz wytworzony przez siebie magiczny efekt. Podtrzymujesz zaklęcie.

Call Fluxwraith.name: Call Fluxwraith
Call Fluxwraith.description:
You break a mirror and cast the shards into the air. Between their thousand fractured reflections, the fluxwraith appears — a thing of broken glass, broken time and broken lives. This undead creature occupies the space of a Medium creature and has a fly Speed of 60 feet.

Arrive (transmutation) Interrupted Lives

Each enemy within a @Template[emanation|distance:10] must attempt a Will save. If a creature fails its save, it is shunted into the future, vanishing now but automatically reappearing in the same location after [[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1k4 rounds}. A creature can attempt an additional Will save at the end of each of its turns to end the duration. If its original space is occupied when it returns, the creature appears in the nearest unoccupied space. Since the creature is shunted forward in time, it doesn't experience any of the intervening time. Likewise, any effects on the creature with a duration don't decrease their duration, resuming when the creature reappears.

Depart (divination, fear, mental, prediction) Dire Foresight

Each enemy within a @Template[emanation|distance:60] must attempt a Will save. On a failed save, the creature receives a brief vision of a deeply traumatic event in that lurks among the many possibilities of its future. The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 4} on a critical failure) and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} while they are frightened.

Call Spirit.name: Call Spirit
Call Spirit.cost: rare candles and incense worth a total value of 50 gp
Call Spirit.description:
You tear the veil to the afterlife and call a spirit from its final resting place. You must call the spirit by name, and you must provide a connection to the spirit, such as a possession, a garment, or a piece of its corpse. A spirit unwilling to heed your call can attempt a Will save to avoid it; on a critical success, a trickster spirit Impersonates the spirit you meant to call. The DC of the Will save is 2 lower if you haven't met the spirit in life. Either way, the spirit appears as a wispy form of the creature you meant to call. Each minute of the duration, you can ask the spirit a question. It can answer how it pleases or even refuse to answer. If the spirit isn't in the afterlife (such as if it's an undead), all results other than critical failures use the failure effect.

Krytyczny Sukces The spirit is particularly cooperative, and even if it has strong reasons to deceive you, it takes a –2 circumstance penalty to its Deception checks.

Sukces You call the spirit.

Porażka You fail to call a spirit.

Krytyczna Porażka One or more evil spirits appear and attack.
Call Spirit.secondarycheck: Occultism or Religion (whichever isn't used for the primary check)

Call The Blood.name: Call The Blood
Call The Blood.description:
With a word and gesture, you cause streams of blood to erupt from the target's mouth, nostrils, ears, or other facial openings and come rushing into your mouth. You deal 8k4 void damage to the target.

If the target takes damage, its blood flows into your mouth. If you're a living creature and don't have void healing, you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 2}. If you're undead (or living but have void healing), you can choose to either gain temporary Hit Points equal to half of the void damage the target takes (after applying resistance and the like) and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Przyspieszony} for 1 round, or forgo the temporary Hit Points and become quickened for 1 minute. You can use this extra action only to Step, Stride, or Strike. You lose any remaining temporary Hit Points after 1 minute.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 2k4.

Call of the Grave.name: Call of the Grave
Call of the Grave.description:
You fire a ray of sickening energy. Wykonaj rzut ataku zaklęciem.

Krytyczny Sukces The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} as long as it's Sickened.

Sukces The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1}.

Porażka Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Call the Ten.name: Call the Ten
Call the Ten.description:
The Ten Magic Warriors were the first of the Magaambya's students, and they come to your aid even now. An indistinct spirit appears near each target, each wearing a different mask of the Ten Magic Warriors. The spirits then either strike their designated targets with magical energy, dealing each one 4k6 spirit damage with a basic Fortitude save, or shield them, granting their target resistance 3 to physical and spirit damage until the beginning of your next turn. You designate which targets are attacked and which are shielded.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Lno61HwUJaE4eLo8]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Call the Ten}

Wywyższenie (+2) The amount of damage increases by 1k6 and the amount of resistance increases by 2.

Call to Arms.name: Call to Arms
Call to Arms.description:
Aktywator You are about to roll for initiative.

You cry out a call to arms, inspiring your allies to enter the fray. Each ally in the area gains a +2 status bonus to their initiative roll and gains temporary Hit Points equal to the spell's rank; these temporary Hit Points last for the spell's duration.

Wywyższenie (6.) The bonus increases to +3.

Wywyższenie (9.) The bonus increases to +4.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.PNEGSVYhMKf6kQZ6]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Call to Arms}

Calm.name: Uspokojenie
Calm.description:
Zmuszasz istoty w obszarze do uspokojenia się, wyciszając ich agresję; każda istota musi wykonać rzuc obronny Woli.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Potrzeba uspokojenia nakłada karę statusową –1 na rzuty ataku istoty.

Porażka Wszelkie efekty emocjonalne, które miałoby wywrzeć wpływ na istotę, są tłamszone, a istota nie może podejmować wrogich akcji. Jeśli istota stanie się celem wrogości jakiejkolwiek innej istoty, uspokojenie przestaje na nią działać.

Krytyczna Porażka Jak przy porażce, ale wrogość innych istot nie przerywa efektu.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Qr5rgoZvI4KmFY0N]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Uspokojenie}

Camel Spit.name: Camel Spit
Camel Spit.description:
You alter your stomach, esophagus, and tongue to be able to spit partially digested food with force. You can spit at a foe once you finish Casting the Spell and can repeat the attack once on each of your subsequent turns by taking a single action, which has the acid, attack, and concentrate traits. After your third spit attack, the spell ends. When you attack with camel spit, make a ranged spell attack roll against a creature within 15 feet, dealing 1k6 acid damage and causing the target to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} for 1 round if you hit. On a critical hit, you deal double damage and the target takes @Damage[@item.level[persistent,acid]] damage.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k6, and the persistent damage on a critical hit is increased by 1.

Canopy Crawler.name: Canopy Crawler
Canopy Crawler.description:
The target grows a prehensile tail, or gains prehensile qualities in their existing tail, to help them climb with ease. For the duration of the spell, they gain a climb Speed equal to their highest Speed. The target can Climb with a hand occupied (or two hands occupied if they have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.09PurtIanNUPfNRq]{Combat Climber} feat).

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.mojpoFI7eni1RaRB]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Canopy Crawler}

Wywyższenie (5.) The spell's duration increases to 1 hour, and you can target both yourself and your animal companion with a single casting.

Canticle of Everlasting Grief.name: Canticle of Everlasting Grief
Canticle of Everlasting Grief.description:
You create a melody distilled from pure grief, conveying the inevitable loss of everything your target cherishes, audible to only them. The target takes 10k6 mental damage depending on its Will save. A creature cursed by this spell can't benefit from circumstance or status bonuses, for the duration noted in the degree of success.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target takes half damage, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1}, and is cursed for 1 round.

Porażka Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 3}, and is cursed for 1 week.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia. is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 4}, and is cursed for an unlimited duration. While the curse remains, the target's allies are also affected by the curse while within 15 feet of the creature.

Captivating Adoration.name: Captivating Adoration
Captivating Adoration.description:
You become intensely entrancing, and creatures are distracted by you as long as they remain within the area. You can exclude any creatures you choose from the effects. If a creature is in the aura when you Cast the Spell or when a creature enters the area for the first time, it must attempt a Will saving throw. If a creature leaves and reenters, it uses the results of its original save.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature is unaffected and temporarily immune for 1 hour.

Sukces The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Zafascynowany} with you for its next action, then is temporarily immune for 1 hour.

Porażka The creature is Fascinated with you.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is Fascinated with you, and its attitude toward you improves by one step.

Wywyższenie (+1) Increase the size of the emanation by 15 feet.

Carrion Mire.name: Carrion Mire
Carrion Mire.description: The ground opens into a seemingly endless mass of corpse limbs, grasping at all creatures within the area to drag them down. Creatures in the area when the spell is cast or beginning their turn in the area must succeed at a Reflex save or fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}. When a creature in the spell's area would be healed by a vitality effect, the carrion mire attempts to counteract that effect, preventing that healing but not otherwise preventing the effect if it's counteracted.

Carryall.name: Carryall
Carryall.description:
A small platform of magical force materializes adjacent to you to carry cargo. It is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialny} or has a ghostly appearance, is 2 feet in diameter, and follows 5 feet behind you, floating just above the ground. It holds up to 5 Bulk of objects (if they can fit on it). Any objects atop the platform fall to the ground when the spell ends. You can Sustain the spell to move the platform up to 30 feet along the ground, to make it stay in place, or to have it return to you and resume following you. The spell ends if a creature tries to ride atop the platform, if the platform is overloaded, if anyone tries to lift or force the platform higher above the ground, or if you move more than 60 feet away from the platform.

Wywyższenie (4.) The platform can carry 10 Bulk, creatures can ride atop it, and it can hover in the air, not just on the ground

Cascade Countermeasure.name: Cascade Countermeasure
Cascade Countermeasure.description:
You quickly adjust your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.HbejhIywqIufrmVM]{Tajemna Kaskada} to offer magical protection. You gain resistance 5 against damage from spells. As normal, using Arcane Cascade again means you've ended the stance, and the spell ends.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.SAkdopdD8IzOeqs1]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Cascade Countermeasure}

Wywyższenie (+3) The resistance increases by 5.

Cast into Time.name: Cast into Time
Cast into Time.description:
You release a wave of temporal energy that sends creatures violently tumbling through time, scarring their thoughts with the information flowing around them. Although the journey can feel like it lasts for minutes or even days, the targets reappear instantly. Witnessing this chaotic flow of time and being bashed against objects from different times deals the targets 5k8 mental damage and 5k6 bludgeoning damage, with a Fortitude save. A creature that falls into time disappears until the end of your turn. It then reappears in the same space it left; if that space is occupied, it appears in the nearest empty space, chosen by the GM.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature falls into time. When it returns, it takes half damage.

Porażka The creature falls into time. When it returns, it takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1}.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature falls into time. When it returns, it takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 2}.

Wywyższenie (+1) The bludgeoning damage increase by 2k6.

Caster's Imposition.name: Caster's Imposition
Caster's Imposition.description:
A magical interference prevents the target from contributing to any form of cooperative spellcasting. On a failed save, the target can't participate in any ritual unless they can cast the ritual alone, and they can't access any spells provided by a coven or similar cooperative ability.

Wywyższenie (4.) Increase the duration to 1 hour.

Wywyższenie (5.) Increase the duration to 1 day.

Cataclysm.name: Cataclysm
Cataclysm.description:
You call upon the unimaginable power of world-ending cataclysms, ripping a small piece of each cataclysm and combining them together into one horrifically powerful attack. The following effects come down upon all creatures in the area. Treat the resistances of creatures in the area as if they were 10 lower for the purpose of determining the cataclysm's damage. Each creature attempts one basic Reflex save that applies to all five types of damage.

  • Flesh-dissolving acid rain deals 3k10 acid damage.
  • A roaring earthquake shakes and bludgeons creatures on the ground, dealing 3k10 bludgeoning damage.
  • A blast of freezing wind deals 3k10 cold damage.
  • Incredible lightning lashes the area, dealing 3k10 electricity damage.
  • Beating winds churn across the sky, dealing 3k10 bludgeoning damage to creatures flying in the area.
  • An instant tsunami sweeps over creatures in the area, dealing 3k10 bludgeoning damage with the water trait (doubled for creatures swimming in the area).
  • A massive wildfire burns in a sudden inferno, dealing 3k10 fire damage.

Catch Your Name.name: Catch Your Name
Catch Your Name.description:
Aktywator A creature on your plane speaks your private or true name

Wymagania You know your own true name.

You learn a private name (but not the true name) of the creature who spoke your name, as well as their precise location, unless they succeed at a Will save to negate the effect. You are aware any time the trigger conditions are met as long as you have the spell prepared or in your repertoire. There is no way to distinguish one trigger of this spell from another without actually casting the spell. This can become a nuisance if you are so famous that your name is regularly on others' lips.

Caustic Blast.name: Żrący Wybuch
Caustic Blast.description:
Miotasz wielką kulą kwasu, która natychmiast eksploduje opryskując pobliskie istoty. Istoty w obszarze odnoszą 1k8 obrażeń od kwasu z podstawowym rzutem obronnym Refleksu; przy krytycznej porażce istota odnosi dodatkowo obażenia @Damage[(1+floor((@item.rank –1)/2))[persistent,acid]].

Wywyższenie (+2) Wstępne obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k8 a przewlekłe obrażenia przy krytycznej porażce zwiększają się o 1.

Cauterize Wounds.name: Cauterize Wounds
Cauterize Wounds.description:
You seal bleeding wounds with fire. Any target that has persistent bleed damage can choose to take @Damage[1[fire]|immutable:true] damage. If it does, it can attempt to recover from its persistent bleed damage, with the lower DC for particularly effective assistance. During the spell's duration, you can use a single action, which has the concentrate trait, to repeat this effect for one target of the spell.
