@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.sdKsB8dmIiPEHePZ]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Cauterize Wounds}

Cave Fangs.name: Cave Fangs
Cave Fangs.description:
Sharp flowstone formations protrude from the ground and ceiling, dealing 6k6 piercing damage to creatures in the area with a basic Reflex save. Densely packed with protrusions, the area becomes difficult terrain for the duration. The protrusions turn to dust when the spell ends. You can Dismiss the spell.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6.

Celestial Accord.name: Celestial Accord
Celestial Accord.description:
You intervene in a heated disagreement between two creatures, encouraging them to put aside their differences and find some common ground. The emotional heat of the prior moment becomes only a memory. Each target must make a Will save. A creature currently engaged in combat can't get a result worse than success, and a target that is subject to hostility from any other creature ceases to be affected by celestial accord.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature is filled with doubt about its own intentions and feels an urge to cooperate with the other. It has a –2 status penalty to attack rolls against the other target for 1 round.

Porażka The creature can't make hostile actions against the other target and its attitude toward the other target improves to indifferent for the spell's duration.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the creature's attitude toward the other target improves to friendly for the duration and is indifferent thereafter (until something happens to change that attitude normally).
Celestial Accord.target: 2 creatures that each have an unfriendly or worse attitude toward the other

Celestial Brand.name: Celestial Brand
Celestial Brand.description:
A blazing symbol appears on the target, cursing it to face divine justice. You and your allies receive a +1 status bonus to your attack rolls and skill checks against it.

Anytime a holy creature damages it, the holy creature deals an additional 1k4 spirit damage. The target is then temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Wywyższenie (+2) The spirit damage increases by 1.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.A61eVVVyUuaUl3tz]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Celestial Brand}

Censure Falsehoods.name: Censure Falsehoods
Censure Falsehoods.description:
You call on your patron to reprimand a creature that has attempted a Deception or Stealth check against you or an ally within the past month. You must be aware they did so. Whenever the target speaks, toads and serpents fall from their lips. The target attempts a Fortitude saving throw. The spell lasts as long as the target remains sickened by it.

Krytyczny Sukces A few animals fall from their lips, but they're otherwise unaffected.

Sukces The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1}.

Porażka The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 2} and if they perform an action that has the auditory trait or attempt to Cast a Spell, they must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:5], or the action is disrupted as they choke on an animal.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, and if the target attempts a Deception or Stealth check, their sickened value increases by 1 (to a maximum of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 4}).

Chain Lightning.name: Chain Lightning
Chain Lightning.description:
You discharge a powerful bolt of lightning at the target, dealing 8k12 electricity damage. The target must attempt a basic Reflex save. The electricity arcs to another creature within 30 feet of the first target, jumps to another creature within 30 feet of that target, and so on. You can end the chain at any point. You can't target the same creature more than once, and you must have line of effect to all targets. Roll the damage only once, and apply it to each target (halving or doubling as appropriate for its saving throw outcome). The chain ends if any one of the targets critically succeeds at its save.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k12.
Chain Lightning.target: 1 creature, plus any number of additional creatures

Chameleon Coat.name: Chameleon Coat
Chameleon Coat.description:
You shift the colors of the targets' outermost layer of clothing and gear to be closer to their environment when they remain still. Creatures affected by the spell gain a +3 status bonus to Stealth checks to Hide. The changed color granted by the spell always shifts to match the environment, even if there are drastic changes. If any piece of gear or clothing affected by the spell is removed from a creature, the spell ends for that creature.

Wywyższenie (6.) If a creature affected by this spell rolls a critical failure on its Stealth check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Przekradanie Się} within 30 feet of a creature that would spot it, it instead only fails its check, as the spell mildly hypnotizes the spotter.

Wywyższenie (8.) As 6. rank, and the status bonus is +4.

Champion's Sacrifice.name: Champion's Sacrifice
Champion's Sacrifice.description:
Aktywator An ally is hit by a Strike, or an ally fails a saving throw against an effect that doesn't affect you.

You form a link with an ally, allowing you to take harm in their stead. All the effects of the hit or failed save are applied to you instead of the target. For example, if the target critically fails a saving throw against a fireball, you would take double damage. These effects ignore any resistances, immunities, or other abilities you have that might mitigate them in any way, although those of the target apply before you take the effect

Charged Javelin.name: Charged Javelin
Charged Javelin.description:
You fire a javelin of electricity that leaves a charged field around its target. Make a spell attack against the target's AC. The javelin deals 1k6 electricity damage and 1 persistent electricity damage.

As long as the target is taking persistent damage from this spell, creatures gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with metal weapons or electricity effects against the target, and the target takes a –1 status penalty to saves against electricity effects.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.QrigfqVwBCGPylth]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Charged Javelin}

Krytyczny Sukces The javelin deals double damage, both initial and persistent.

Sukces The javelin deals full damage.

Wywyższenie (+1) The initial damage increases by 1k6, and the persistent damage increases by 1.

Charitable Urge.name: Charitable Urge
Charitable Urge.description:
You speak on the virtue of charity, compelling the target to give away its possessions. The target must attempt a Will save. If the target has no items on its person, the spell fails.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1} as it wrestles with the urge.

Porażka On its next turn, before it does anything else, the target must present the nearest creature with an item in its possession; the target chooses which item to give, and if the only item it has is one that it's currently using to defend itself, such as a weapon during a combat encounter, it can choose to be stunned for 1 round instead of giving up the item. This might require the target to Interact to retrieve an item or move to reach the nearest creature, and passing the item off requires an Interact action as normal.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, except the duration is 4 rounds, and the target must repeat the effects of a failure on each of its turns. At the end of each of its turns, the target can attempt a new Will save to reduce the remaining duration by 1 round, ending the effects entirely on a critical success.

Charm.name: Zauroczenie
Charm.description:
Dla celu zaklęcia twoje słowa są miodem na serce, a twoja aparycja jest niczym marzenie. Musi on wykonać rzut obronny Woli, z sytuacyjną premią +4 jeśli ty lub twoi sojusznicy niedawono mu groziliście lub podejmowaliście wobec niego wrogie akcje.

Możesz Odwołać to zaklęcie. Jeśli wykonasz wrogą wobec celu akcję, zaklęcie kończy się. Kiedy zaklęcie kończy się cel niekoniecznie zdaje sobie sprawę z faktu, że został zauroczony, chyba że przyjazne stosunki z tobą lub akcje, do których go skłoniłeś rażąco przeczą z jego oczekiwaniami. Oznacza to, że jesteś potencjalnie w stanie przekonać cel do dalszej przyjaźni za pomocą konwencjonalnych środków.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel, który ponadto zdaje sobie sprawę, że próbowałeś go zauroczyć.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel, ale myśli on, że twoje zaklęcie było czymś nieszkodliwym a nie próbą zauroczenia go, chyba że poprawnie zidentyfikuje zaklęcie.

Porażka Nastawienie celu wobec ciebie zmienia się na @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.v66R7FdOf11l94im]{Przyjazne}. Jeśli już było przyjazne, staje się @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.v44P3WUcU1j0115l]{Pomocne}. Nie może on używać wobec ciebie wrogich akcji.

Krytyczna Porażka Nastawienie celu wobec ciebie staje się Pomocne i nie może on używać wobec ciebie wrogich akcji.

Wywyższenie (4.) Czas trwania zaklęcia zwiększa się do momentu twoich następnych codziennych przygotowań.

Wywyższenie (8.) Czas trwania zaklęcia zwiększa się do momentu twoich następnych codziennych przygotowań i możesz obrać za cel 10 istot.

Charming Push.name: Charming Push
Charming Push.description:
You push at the target's mind to deflect their ire. The target must attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target takes a –1 circumstance penalty to attack rolls and damage rolls against you.

Porażka The target can't use hostile actions against you.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1} and can't use hostile actions against you.

Charming Touch.name: Charming Touch
Charming Touch.description:
You infuse your target with attraction, causing it to act friendlier toward you. The target attempts a Will save. It gains a +4 circumstance bonus to this save if you or your allies recently threatened or were hostile to it.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected and aware you tried to charm it.

Sukces The target is unaffected but thinks your spell was something harmless instead of charming touch, unless it identifies the spell.

Porażka The target's attitude becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.v66R7FdOf11l94im]{Przyjazny} toward you. If it was Friendly, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.v44P3WUcU1j0115l]{Pomocny}. It can't use hostile actions against you. If you use a hostile action against the target, the spell ends. You can Dismiss the spell. After the spell ends, the target doesn't necessarily realize it was charmed unless its friendship with you or the actions you convinced it to take clash with its expectations. If it doesn't realize you charmed it, you could potentially convince it to continue being your friend via mundane means.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the target is helpful.
Charming Touch.target: 1 creature that could find you attractive

Chastising Retort.name: Chastising Retort
Chastising Retort.description:
Aktywator A creature within range attempts a Deception check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ewwCglB7XOPLUz72]{Lie} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint}.

You unleash some choice words empowered with divine might. The creature takes 2k6 mental damage and must attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature is unaffected.

Sukces The creature takes half damage.

Porażka The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 1} for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1k4 rounds}.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the creature takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 2} for 1k4 rounds.

The creature can immediately choose to reveal the truth about its deception as a free action to immediately recover Hit Points equal to the mental damage it took and lose the stupefied condition from the spell. If it does, it quickly notes that its words and actions were lies, though it might need more time to explain the proper truth. If the creature used Deception to successfully Feint and it reveals the truth in this way, the target of the creature's Feint is no longer @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda} due to the successful Feint.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 2k6.

Chilling Darkness.name: Mrożąca Ciemność
Chilling Darkness.description:
Wystrzeliwujesz mrożący do kości promień ciemności przesyconej wyklętą energią. Wykonaj atak dystansowy zaklęciem. Promień zadaje 5k6 obrażeń od zimna. Jeśli cel ma cechę świętości, zadajesz dodatkowo 5k6 obrażeń duchowych.

Krytyczny Sukces Cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia.

Sukces Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia.

Jeśli promień przecina obszar magicznego światła lub obiera za cel istotę będącą pod wpływem magicznego światła, mrożąca ciemność próbuje przeciwdziałać światłu. Jeśli musisz określić, czy promień przechodzi przez obszar światła, nakreśl linię między sobą a celem zaklęcia.

Wywyższenie (+1) Zarówno obrażenia od zimna, co obrażenia duchowe przeciwko świętym istotom zwiększają się o 2k6.

Chilling Spray.name: Mrożący Rozprysk
Chilling Spray.description:
Z twoich rozpostartych dłoni wystrzeliwuje stożek lodowych odłamków pokrywający cele warstwą szronu. Zadajesz istotom w obszarze 2k4 obrażeń od zimna; każda z nich musi wykonać rzut obronny Refleksu.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia i ponosi karę statusową –5 stóp do swoich Prędkości na 2 rundy.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota odnosi podwójne obrażenia i ponosi karę statusową –10 stóp do swoich Prędkości na 2 rundy.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k4.

Chroma Leach.name: Chroma Leach
Chroma Leach.description:
Your hand glows with impossible colors from beyond the stars, and your touch saps both color and vitality from the living. The target must attempt a Fortitude save; creatures with the gnome trait take a –2 circumstance penalty to this save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 2} for 1 round.

Porażka The target is enfeebled 2 for 1 minute and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 1}. The target is also filled with listlessness and ennui. For 1 round, if the target tries to use a move action, it must succeed at a Will save against your spell DC or the action is lost; this effect has the mental and emotion traits.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the creature is permanently enfeebled 2 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 2} (although magic such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Et8RSCLx8w7uOLvo]{Zdrowe Ciało} can remove these conditions).

Chromatic Armor.name: Chromatic Armor
Chromatic Armor.description:
You wrap the target in armor made of sheets of colored light. The armor sheds bright light for 20 feet (and dim light for the next 20 feet). Whenever a creature attacks the target and is adjacent to it, the attacker must attempt a Will save at the end of its action. On a failure, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} until the end of its next turn. Regardless of the result of the save, the attacker is temporarily immune until the end of its next turn. The dazzling effect has the light and visual traits.

When you cast the spell, roll [[/r 2d8]]{1k8 twice} on the table below to see the armor's colors (rerolling any duplicates). Each color grants resistance 5 to the indicated damage type. If you spend three actions to Cast the Spell, roll [[/r 3d8]]{three} times instead.

  1. Red fire
  2. Orange acid
  3. Yellow electricity
  4. Green poison
  5. Blue sonic
  6. Indigo mental
  7. Violet force
  8. Matching Color The armor becomes the color matching the type of damage the target took most recently in the past minute. If it didn't take any of those seven types of damage or the armor is already that color, roll again, rerolling any results of 8.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.DHYWmMGmKOpRSqza]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Chromatic Armor}

Wywyższenie (+3) The resistance is increased by 5.

Chromatic Image.name: Chromatic Image
Chromatic Image.description:
You call forth three illusory images of yourself, and each of the four of you takes on a different color, your colors all shifting each time someone attacks you. This has the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.j8vIoIEWElvpwkcI]{Mirror Image}, except that whenever a foe destroys one of the images, roll [[/r 1d4]]{1k4} to see which color the image was when it was destroyed. The attacker takes the corresponding effect.

  1. Red @Damage[5[fire]] damage and @Damage[5[mental]] damage.
  2. Orange @Damage[5[acid]] damage and @Damage[5[mental]] damage.
  3. Yellow @Damage[5[electricity]] damage and @Damage[5[mental]] damage.
  4. Green @Damage[5[poison]] damage and @Damage[5[mental]] damage, plus it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1}.

Chromatic Ray.name: Chromatic Ray
Chromatic Ray.description:
You send out a ray of colored light streaming toward your enemy, with a magical effect depending on the ray's color. Make a spell attack roll. If you hit, roll [[/r 1d4]]{1k4} to see which beam you cast. If the ray deals damage, that damage is doubled on a critical hit. Any additional traits that apply to a ray are listed in parentheses just after the name of the color.

  1. Red (fire) The ray deals @Damage[30[fire]] damage to the target.
  2. Orange (acid) The ray deals @Damage[40[acid]] damage to the target.
  3. Yellow (electricity) The ray deals @Damage[50[electricity]] damage to the target.
  4. Green (poison) The ray deals @Damage[25[poison]] damage to the target, and the target must succeed at a Fortitude save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 1} for 1 minute (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 2} on a critical failure).

Wywyższenie (6.) The damage for @Damage[40[fire]]{Red}, @Damage[50[acid]]{Orange}, @Damage[60[electricity]]{Yellow}, and @Damage[35[poison]]{Green} each increase by 10. Roll [[/r 1d8]]{1k8} to determine the ray's color, using the results for 1-4 above and the results for 5-8 below.

  1. Blue The ray has the effect of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.znv4ECL7ZtuiagtA]{Petrify} spell. On a critical hit, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1} as long as it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony} by the flesh to stone effect.
  2. Indigo (emotion, incapacitation, mental) The ray has the effect of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.LiGbewa9pO0yjbsY]{Confusion} spell. On a critical hit, it has the effect of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8kJbiBEjMWG4VUjs]{Warp Mind} instead.
  3. Violet The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony} for 1 minute. It must also succeed at a will save or be teleported 120 feet directly away from you (if there isn't room for it to appear there, it appears in the nearest open space); this is a teleportation effect.
  4. Intense Color The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} until the end of your next turn, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiony} if your attack roll was a critical hit. Roll again and add the effects of another color (rerolling results of 8).

Chromatic Wall.name: Chromatic Wall
Chromatic Wall.description:
You create an opaque wall of light in a single vibrant color. The wall is straight and vertical, stretching 60 feet long and 30 feet high. If the wall would pass through a creature, the spell is lost. The wall sheds bright light for 20 feet on each side, and dim light for the next 20 feet. You can ignore the wall's effects.

Roll [[/r 1d4]] to determine the color of the wall. Each color has a particular effect on items, effects, or creatures that attempt to pass through. Chromatic wall can't be counteracted normally; rather, each color is automatically counteracted when targeted by a specific spell, even if that spell's rank is lower than that of chromatic wall.

  1. Red The wall destroys ranged weapon ammunition (such as arrows and crossbow bolts) that would pass through, and it deals @Damage[20[fire]] damage to anyone passing through, with a @Check[reflex|against:spell|basic] save. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.3puDanGfpEt6jK5k]{Cone of Cold} can counteract a red chromatic wall.
  2. Orange The wall destroys thrown weapons that would pass through, and it deals @Damage[25[acid]] damage to anyone passing through, with a @Check[reflex|against:spell|basic] save. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.g8QqHpv2CWDwmIm1]{Podmuch Wiatru} can counteract an orange chromatic wall.
  3. Yellow The wall stops acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, sonic, vitality, and void effects from passing through, and it deals @Damage[30[electricity]] damage to anyone passing through, with a @Check[reflex|against:spell|basic] save. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r7ihOgKv19eJQnik]{Disintegrate} can counteract a yellow chromatic wall.
  4. Green The wall stops toxins, gases, and breath weapons from passing through. It deals @Damage[10[poison]] damage to anyone passing through and makes them @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 1} for 1 minute. A @Check[fortitude|against:spell|basic] save reduces the damage and negates the Enfeebled condition on a success. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.115Xp9E38CJENhNS]{Magiczne Przejście} can counteract a green chromatic wall.

Wywyższenie (7.) The spell's duration increases to 1 hour. Roll [[/r 1d8]] to determine the wall's color; the results for 5-8 are below. A @Damage[30[fire]]{red}, @Damage[35[acid]]{orange}, @Damage[40[electricity]]{yellow}, or @Damage[20[poison]]{green} wall deals an extra 10 damage.

  1. Blue The wall stops auditory, petrification, sonic and visual effects from passing through, and creatures passing through are subject to the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.znv4ECL7ZtuiagtA]{Petrify}. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]{Grad Magii} can counteract a blue chromatic wall.
  2. Indigo The wall stops divination and mental effects from passing through, and those passing through are subject to the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8kJbiBEjMWG4VUjs]{Warp Mind}. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.DyiD239dNS7RIxZE]{Holy Light} can counteract an indigo chromatic wall.
  3. Violet The wall prevents spells from targeting the other side (area effects still cross as normal). Creatures passing through must succeed at a @Check[will|against:spell] save or they are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} for 1 minute; on a critical failure, the creature is instead sent to another plane, with the effect of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5bTt2CvYHPvaR7QQ]{Teleportacja Międzyplanarna}. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Rozproszenie Magii} can counteract a violet chromatic wall.
  4. Reroll, and creatures that pass through the wall take a –2 circumstance penalty to their saves.

Chrysopoetic Curse.name: Chrysopoetic Curse
Chrysopoetic Curse.description:
You grant the target the gift of riches, giving them the power to turn anything they touch to gold. The target must attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected.

Sukces The target's skin turns their armor and clothing partially to gold. If the target is wearing any armor or clothing, they become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.D5mg6Tc7Jzrj6ro7]{Przeciążony}.

Porażka As success, but the curse extends to the target's held weapons and other gear. If the target is holding any weapons or other objects, they become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 3}, and the objects' Hardness is reduced by 5.

Krytyczna Porażka The curse becomes even stronger, extending to the surrounding terrain. As failure, and if the creature is standing on a solid surface, the ground in their space transmutes itself into a quagmire of liquid gold. The gold is greater difficult terrain. If the creature leaves its square (or when the curse ends), any affected terrain returns to its original shape and substance and the terrain in the new square transmutes to gold.

Any objects that were turned to gold return to their previous form and original shape when they leave the target's possession or the spell ends. As long as the target did not critically succeed on their saving throw, 2k6 gp worth of gold flakes and dust are left behind as the curse recedes.

Chthonian Wrath.name: Chthonian Wrath
Chthonian Wrath.description:
You evoke the energy of a part of the Outer Rifts. The damage types of the spell (one energy and one physical) are based on the result of rolling on the table below. You deal 4k6 damage of each of the corresponding damage types to each creature in the cone (8k6 total damage).

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage for each type increases by 1k6

Chthonian Wrath

[[/r 1D4]]RealmManifestationDamage and type
1SkiesBolts and lightning and flying debrisBludgeoning and electricity
2DepthsAcid and demonic shellsAcid and slashing
3FrozenFrigid air and iceBludgeoning and cold
4VolcanicJagged volcanic rocks and magmaFire and piercing

Cinder Gaze.name: Cinder Gaze
Cinder Gaze.description:
You've learned to read the future in the patterns of flames and smoke. Though inexact and often symbolic, these readings help prepare you for upcoming events. When Casting this Spell, you must be near a fire (of any size) for the duration. Upon completion, roll 1k4 for your prediction. The benefit lasts for 10 minutes or until expended, whichever comes first. After casting cinder gaze, you can't cast it again for 10 minutes.

  1. Terrible Danger You gain a +2 status bonus to your next initiative roll.
  2. New Life The next time you take damage, just before taking the damage, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to 1 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.
  3. Vivid Insight (fortune) The next time you attempt a check to Recall Knowledge, roll twice and take the higher result.
  4. Good Fortune (fortune) The next time you attempt a saving throw, roll twice and take the better result.

Wywyższenie (+1) The number of temporary Hit Points from new life increases by 2.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.myWvjlGLvbzkSCNO]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Cinder Gaze}

Cinder Swarm.name: Cinder Swarm
Cinder Swarm.description:
You breathe life into a mass of fiery critters. They swarm the target and create an aura around it in a @Template[emanation|distance:5]. The target and enemies in the aura are subject to an effect depending on the insects you choose. On subsequent rounds, the first time you Sustain this spell each round, you repeat the effect on the target and all your enemies in the insect aura. Pick a type of insect to determine the effects.

  • Fire Ants You create fiery flying ants that deal 3k6 piercing damage plus 2k6 persistent fire damage with a basic Reflex save. A creature that fails its save must move 5 feet in a direction of your choice as it tries to escape the biting ants; this happens after all the creatures attempt their saves and can't add new creatures to the aura if the main target moves.
  • Fireflies (incapacitation) You create a flurry of fireflies that deal 3k6 fire damage and can dazzle or blind, depending on the target's Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature takes no damage.

Sukces The creature takes half damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} for 1 round.

Porażka The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiony} for 1 round. It's then temporarily immune to being blinded by cinder swarm for 24 hours.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but double damage and blinded for 1 minute.

Wywyższenie (+1) Increase the ants' piercing damage and fireflies' fire damage by 2k6.

Circle of Protection.name: Circle of Protection
Circle of Protection.description:
You ward a creature and those nearby against a specified alignment. Choose chaotic, evil, good, or lawful; this spell gains the opposing trait. Creatures in the area gain a +1 status bonus to AC against attacks by creatures of the chosen alignment and to saves against effects from such creatures. This bonus increases to +3 against effects from such creatures that directly control the target and attacks made by summoned creatures of the chosen alignment. Summoned creatures of the chosen alignment can't willingly enter the area without succeeding at a Will save; repeated attempts use the first save result.

Wywyższenie (4.) Czas trwania zwiększa się do 1 hour.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.RawLEPwyT5CtCZ4D]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Protection}

City of Sin.name: City of Sin
City of Sin.description:
Area 7-mile-radius circle centered on you

Each day during the casting of this ritual, intelligent creatures within range become increasingly prone to shed their inhibitions and give in to whatever tempts them. Exposed communities experience increases in crime, vice, and violence (however the community defines those vices). At the ritual's culmination, chaos ensues as everyone from every walk of life chooses temptation over faithfulness to their convictions.

Krytyczny Sukces Intelligent creatures in the ritual's area might betray even their most closely held convictions, including behaviors anathema to their class or faith. They take a –4 circumstance penalty to saves against mental effects and to their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.tHCqgwjtQtzNqVvd]{Wymuszenie} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]{Request} DCs.

Sukces Intelligent creatures in the ritual's area become more likely to give in to temptation, indulging vices and violating all but the strongest convictions. They take a –2 circumstance penalty to saves against mental effects and to their Coerce and Request DCs.

Porażka Intelligent creatures in the ritual's radius behave normally but gain the general sense that something unnatural tried to manipulate their actions.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure above, except communities of intelligent creatures in the ritual's area bond over any events they experienced during the ritual's casting. They commit themselves to shared principles for behavior, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against mental effects and to their Coerce and Request DCs for 1 week.

Clad In Metal.name: Clad In Metal
Clad In Metal.description:
You briefly swap the outer surface of the metal in an object with a suitable amount of a common precious metal from the Plane of Metal. You can instead choose an uncommon or rare metal if you have access to it or the GM has given you access to it.

The object functions as an item of that metal, provided the item would be 2. level or lower. For example, you could make a dagger into a cold iron or silver dagger (2. poziomu items) but couldn't make full plate into cold iron armor or silver armor (5. poziomu items). This imparts any special properties of the precious metal — a weapon clad in cold iron activates weaknesses to cold iron, for example — and suppresses any special properties of the original metal of which the item was made.

The spell neither changes the structural integrity of the item nor damages it. The object can pass a cursory inspection, but the magical effect is obvious to anyone who studies the item closely, so it doesn't alter the Price of the item if you attempt to sell it.

Wywyższenie (+1) The maximum level of the precious metal increases by 2.
Clad In Metal.target: 1 metal object of 5 Bulk or less that's unattended or attended by a willing creature

Claim Curse.name: Claim Curse
Claim Curse.description: By burning threads of fate around a target and then retying them to yourself instead, you temporarily draw their curse to you and offer them brief succor from the worst of its effects. Choose a curse affecting the target that you don't already have. For 5 minutes, you are affected by the curse (at the same stage as the target, if applicable), and the target isn't. When the duration ends, the curse's effects return to the target as normal.

Claim Undead.name: Claim Undead
Claim Undead.description:
You attempt to wrest control of a target undead or force it to recognize you as its master. If the target is controlled by another creature, that controller attempts a Will saving throw to retain control; otherwise, the target must attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Zdezorientowany} for 1 round as it fights off your commands.

Porażka The target becomes controlled by you and follows your orders. It (or the creature previously controlling it) can attempt a new Will save at the end of each of its turns; on a success, the spell ends, and the creature becomes stunned 1 and confused for 1 round. If you issue an obviously self-destructive order, the target doesn't act until you issue a new order.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the target (or the creature previously controlling it) receives a new save only if you give it a new order that is against its nature.

Clairaudience.name: Jasnosłyszenie
Clairaudience.description: Tworzysz @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialne} latające ucho w miejscu w zasięgu (nawet jeśli punkt ten jest poza twoją linią wzroku lub linią efektu). Nie może się ono poruszać, ale możesz słyszeć tym uchem, tak jak gdybyś używał swoich zwyczajnych zmysłów słuchowych.

Clairvoyance.name: Jasnowidzenie
Clairvoyance.description: Tworzysz @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialne} latające oko w miejscu w zasięgu (nawet jeśli punkt ten jest poza twoją linią wzroku lub linią efektu). Nie może się ono poruszać, ale możesz widzieć nim we wszystkie strony z tego punktu, tak jak gdybyś używał swoich zwyczajnych zmysłów wzrokowych.

Claws of the Otter.name: Claws of the Otter
Claws of the Otter.description:
Webbing grows between your fingers and your nails extend into vicious claws. For the spell's duration, you gain a +1 status bonus to Athletics checks to Swim and you gain a claws unarmed attack. They're an agile, finesse, unarmed attack that deals 1k4 slashing damage and an additional 1k6 cold damage.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.UPisuG2cfjMIJOPa]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Claws of the Otter}

Wywyższenie (+3) The additional cold damage increases by 1k6.

Clawsong.name: Clawsong
Clawsong.description:
You sing a fierce prayer, low and growling, and awaken the ancient spirit of a Terwa beast to guide and strengthen the target's unarmed blows.

The target's claw attack gains the versatile (piercing) trait, and deals 1k6 slashing damage. If the target's claw attack already deals 1k6 slashing damage, it deals 1k8 instead.

If its claw attack already had the versatile (piercing) trait, it gains the deadly 1k8 trait.

Wywyższenie (4.) The spell can affect up to 6 willing creatures with unarmed claw Strikes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.CWC2fPmlgixoIKy5]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Clawsong}

4.target: 6 willing creatures with an unarmed claw Strike

Clawsong.target: 1 willing creature with an unarmed claw Strike

Cleanse Affliction.name: Ulżenie w Dolegliwości
Cleanse Affliction.description:
Delikatna uzdrawiająca magia oddala efekty toksyn i bardziej złożonych chorób. Wybierz dolegliwość dotykającą celu, taką jak klątwa, choroba lub trucizna. Jeśli wykroczyła ona poza pierwsze stadium, zdredukuj jej stadium o jeden. Ta redukcja może być zastosowana tylko raz dla jedengo wystąpienia danej dolegliwości, gdzie pojedyncze wystąpienie danej przypadłości kończy się w momencie całkowitego jej wyleczenia. Chociaż ta redukcja nie może zostać zastosowana ponownie, wywższone wersje tego zaklęcia podejmują się próby przeciwdziałania dolegliwości z każdym ich rzuceniem.

Wywyższenie (3.) Jeśli dolegliwością jest choroba lub trucizna, podejmij próbę przeciwdziałania jej.

Wywyższenie (4.) Jeśli dolegliwością jest choroba, klątwa lub trucizna, podejmij próbę przeciwdziałania jej.

Cleanse Air.name: Cleanse Air
Cleanse Air.description:
You purify the air in the area, making it clean and breathable. The spell immediately removes inhaled poisons, pollution, and similar contaminants from the air. For the remaining duration, the spell prevents any further contamination from altering air in the area, including keeping toxic air bordering the area from coming inside. (This doesn't prevent contaminants from coming in after the spell ends.) This spell doesn't create air, so casting it underwater wouldn't create breathable air, nor would it affect any toxins within air suspended in the water

Wywyższenie (3.) The area increases to 60 feet.

Wywyższenie (4.) The area increases to 120 feet.

Wywyższenie (6.) The area increases to 500 feet.

Wywyższenie (9.) The area increases to 1 mile.

Cleanse Cuisine.name: Oczyszczenie Strawy
Cleanse Cuisine.description:
Przekształcasz wszystkie jadła i napoje w okolicy w pyszne dania, zmieniając wodę w wino lub inny wykwintny napój albo wzbogacając smak i poprawiając składniki potraw, aby uczynić je wykwintnym przysmakiem. Możesz również zdecydować się na usunięcie wszystkich toksyn i zanieczyszczeń z jedzenia. Ten czar nie zapobiega przyszłym zanieczyszczeniom, naturalnemu rozkładowi lub zepsuciu, ani nie zwiększa wartości odżywczej jedzenia.

Wywyższenie (+2) Dodaj do obszaru kolejną stopę sześcienną, która musi sąsiadować z resztą obszaru zaklęcia.

Cleansing Flames.name: Cleansing Flames
Cleansing Flames.description: You wrap the target in purifying flames. You can attempt to counteract a single poison or non-curse effect imparting the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Wyczerpany}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Sparaliżowany}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony} condition. The target can choose to empower the flames with their life force, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 1} (or increasing their drained value by 1, if already under the condition) to grant you a +1 circumstance bonus to your counteract check.

Clear Mind.name: Czysty Umysł
Clear Mind.description:
Oddalasz od umysłu celu mentalne zakłócenia. Spróbuj przeciwdziałać jednemu wybranemu przez siebie efektowi nakładającego na cel jeden z następujących statusów: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Uciekanie}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażenie} i @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupienie}. Jeśli nie udało ci się przeciwdziałać efektowi, ale udałoby się to gdyby jego ranga przeciwdziałania była o 2 niższa, zamiast tego tłumisz efekt do początku swojej następnej tury. Czas działania efektu nie upływa kiedy jest stłumiony.

To zaklęcie nie może tłumić ani przeciwdziałać klątwom, chorobom lub statusom, które są częścią normalnego stanu celu.

Wywyższenie (4.) Dodaj do listy statusów @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Dezorientację}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Kontrolowanie} i @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolnienie}.

Wywyższenie (6.) Dodaj do listy statusów @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Zgubę}.

Wywyższenie (8.) Dodaj do listy statusów @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszenie}.

Clinging Ice.name: Clinging Ice
Clinging Ice.description:
Freezing sleet and heavy snowfall collect on the target's feet and legs, dealing 1k4 cold damage and other effects depending on its Reflex save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target takes half damage.

Porażka Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia and takes a –5-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until the spell ends.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia and a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until the spell ends.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.2sMXAGZfdqiy10kk]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Clinging Ice}

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k4.

Clinging Shadows Stance.name: Clinging Shadows Stance
Clinging Shadows Stance.description:
You adopt the stance of clinging shadows. You can make shadow grasp Strikes. These deal 1k4 void damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, grapple, reach, and unarmed traits. While in clinging shadows stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Pochwycenie}, and to the DC for creatures to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} from you.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.uFYvW3kFP9iyNfVX]{Postawa: Clinging Shadows Stance}

Cloak of Colors.name: Cloak of Colors
Cloak of Colors.description:
A cloak of swirling colors shrouds the target. Creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} while adjacent to it, and attacking the target causes a brilliant flash of light. A creature that hits the target with a melee attack must attempt a Will save. The creature is then temporarily immune until the end of its turn; this effect has the incapacitation trait.

Sukces The attacker is unaffected.

Porażka The attacker is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiony} for 1 round.

Krytyczna Porażka The attacker is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony} for 1 round

Cloak of Light.name: Cloak of Light
Cloak of Light.description:
You surround yourself in holy light that restores the living and rebuffs undead. You glow with bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light to the next 30 feet. Living creatures that begin their turn adjacent to you recover 4k6 Hit Points. Undead creatures that begin their turn adjacent to you take 4k6 vitality damage (basic Fortitude save).

Wywyższenie (+2) The healing increases by 2k6, and the damage to undead increases by 2k6.

Cloak of Shadow.name: Opończa Cienia
Cloak of Shadow.description:
Okrywasz cel płaszczem wirujących cieni, które czynią go trudniejszym od dostrzeżenia. Opończa tłumi jasne światło w emanacji 20-stóp do słabego światła. Jest to rodzaj magicznej ciemności i w związku z tym może przezwyciężyć niemagiczne światła oraz podejmować próbę przeciwdziałania magicznym światłom.

Cel może użyć @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięcia} zapewnianego przez cienie aby @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Się Schować}, chociaż uważne istoty nadal mogą śledzić ruchomą aurę ciemności, co utrudnia celowi stanie się całkowicie @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Niewykrytym}. Cel może użyć akcji Interakcji aby zdjąć opończę i zostawić ją za sobą jako przynętę, gdzie pozostaje ona nieruchomo, redukując siłę światła przez pozostały czas trwania zaklęcia. Jeśli ktokolwiek podniesie opończę po tym jak zostanie ona zdjęta z pierwotnego celu zaklęcia, opończa wyparowuje a zaklęcie kończy się.

Clone.name: Clone
Clone.cost: rare laboratory supplies and reagents worth the target's level (minimum 1) × 100 gp;
Clone.description:
You collect hair, nail clippings, and samples of skin and blood from the target, who must be present throughout the ritual and can be one of the casters. You then use those samples to grow a duplicate of the target's physical form that will house the target's soul upon death. This duplicate is physically identical to the original creature.

In order to perform the ritual, you need an expanded alchemist's lab or a superior set of equipment. Once the ritual is successfully completed, the duplicate grows within the laboratory equipment for [[/r 2d4]] months. Though direct involvement isn't required during this period of growth, you must prevent any interference or interruption, or the ritual fails. When the duplicate is complete, the original creature's soul enters it as soon as their original body dies, or immediately if the creature died during the intervening months, as long as the soul is free and willing. If Pharasma has decided that the target's time has come or the target's soul is trapped or doesn't wish to return, the duplicate remains empty until the impediment is removed. While unoccupied, the inert duplicate must be preserved in suitable alchemical equipment to prevent it from rotting.

Krytyczny Sukces The cloning process is successful. When the soul occupies the completed clone, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 1}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 1} for 1 week; these conditions can't be removed or reduced by any means until the week has passed.

Sukces As critical success, but each condition value is 2.

Porażka You fail to form the clone.

Krytyczna Porażka The clone appears to be successful, but something went horribly wrong. Once it grows to its full size, it can't hold the target's soul and instead houses a malevolent intelligence or an invasive creature (such as a powerful demon).

Clone Companion.name: Clone Companion
Clone Companion.description:
You create a duplicate of your companion, and the duplicate fights alongside its twin, mirroring the original's actions. The duplicate appears adjacent to your companion and has the same statistics.

Each time you Command your companion, both your companion and its duplicate gain 2 actions. The duplicate always acts immediately after your companion and must use identical actions to the ones your companion used, in exactly the same order. However, it can use the actions differently, such as Striding to a different position or selecting a different target for a Strike. If the duplicate is unable to mimic an action, it performs the action without result and the action is wasted. The duplicate can't use any actions that can be used only a limited number of times per day.

The duplicate isn't truly alive and can't be healed in any way. If the duplicate ever reaches 0 Hit Points, it is instantly destroyed and clone companion immediately ends.

Cloud Dragon's Cloak.name: Cloud Dragon's Cloak
Cloud Dragon's Cloak.description:
Aktywator You or an ally in range is targeted by a ranged attack.

A cloud of mist enshrouds the target, appearing much like the deflecting clouds created by cloud dragons. The target is treated as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Schowany} for the purposes of resolving the triggering attack (so normally the attacker must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:11] to target it) and all ranged attacks against it for the duration.
Cloud Dragon's Cloak.target: the creature targeted by the attack

Clouded Focus.name: Clouded Focus
Clouded Focus.description:
You sharpen a creature's senses, though more distant objects become hazy, indistinct, or muted to it. The target gains a +1 status bonus to Perception checks attempted with any of its precise senses. Furthermore, any imprecise senses the target has are sharpened to precise senses (though they don't receive the status bonus). However, the target can't perceive anything beyond a range of 20 feet with any of its senses.

The duration is determined by the target's Will save. You can allow allies to choose the outcome instead of attempting a saving throw.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected.

Sukces The target is affected for 1 round.

Porażka The target is affected for 1 minute.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the target can't perceive anything beyond a range of 10 feet.

Wywyższenie (3rd) You can target up to 2 creatures.

Wywyższenie (6th) You can target up to 4 creatures.

Clownish Curse.name: Clownish Curse
Clownish Curse.description:
You afflict the target with a curse that causes it to emit ridiculous noises as it moves. Furthermore, the target's hands and feet become awkward and uncoordinated, as though it were wearing oversized gloves and shoes.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces For 1 round, the target must roll twice and use the worse result whenever attempting an Acrobatics, Stealth, or Thievery check. If the target rolls a failure at an Acrobatics, Stealth, or Thievery check, it gets a critical failure instead.

Porażka As success, but the effect is 1 hour.

Krytyczna Porażka As success, except the effect is permanent.

Coiling Dance.name: Coiling Dance
Coiling Dance.description:
You perform a dance that seeks to pass on the knowledge and wisdom of a naga. Your allies in the area are filled with sacred energy, making their spells and attacks holy. Creatures or effects that would be unholy don't gain this benefit

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.K1AHF9KV47PsPka1]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Coiling Dance}

When you cast or Sustain this spell, you can choose an ally in the area that's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Pochwycony}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Spętany}. They can immediately use a reaction to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape}; they can use your Occultism or Religion modifier for the check instead of their unarmed attack, Acrobatics, or Athletics modifier if that would be better.

Collective Memories.name: Collective Memories
Collective Memories.cost: rare incense worth a total value of 300 gp
Collective Memories.description:
You tap into other mortals' memories, knowledge, legends, tales, and lore about a subject. The subject must be an important person, place, or thing. If the subject is present, increase the degree of success of your primary skill check by one step. If you have only vague information about the subject before attempting the ritual, decrease the degree of success of your primary skill check by one step. These modifiers cancel each other out if you have a subject present with little to no baseline information.

Krytyczny Sukces For 1 hour after the ritual ends, you sort through memories that are mostly coherent, emphasizing more accurate or useful information over misremembered knowledge or exaggerated tales.

Sukces For 1 hour after the ritual ends, you learn useful information for further inquiry that remains generally incomplete or enigmatic. As is the nature of mortal memory and stories, you are likely to learn multiple contradictory versions.

Porażka You fail to learn any useful legends.

Krytyczna Porażka Your mind becomes overwhelmed with the vast array of knowledge at your disposal. You can't sense or respond to anything in the present for 1 week except to perform necessities like breathing and sleeping. When you recover, however, you can retrain one of your skills into a Lore based on the knowledge of a subject you were accessing, as if you had spent 1 week retraining.

Collective Transposition.name: Collective Transposition
Collective Transposition.description:
You teleport the targets to new positions within the area. The creatures must each be able to fit in their new space, and their positions must be unoccupied, entirely within the area, and in your line of sight. Unwilling creatures can attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces The target can teleport if it wants, but it chooses the destination within range.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Porażka You teleport the target and choose its destination.

Wywyższenie (+1) The number of targets increases by 1.

Combustion.name: Combustion
Combustion.description:
You ignite a creature in lasting flames. The fire deals 4k8 fire damage and @Damage[2d6[persistent,fire]] damage to the creature, which must attempt a Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature takes half damage and takes no persistent damage.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia, as well as full persistent damage.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota odnosi podwójne obrażenia, as well as double persistent damage.

Wywyższenie (+1) Increase the initial damage by 1k8 and the persistent damage by @Damage[1d6[fire]].

Command.name: Rozkaz
Command.description:
Wykrzykujesz rozkaz, który nie sposób zignorować. Możesz rozkazać celowi zbliżyć się do ciebie lub odbiec (tak jakby posiadał status @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Uciekający}), puścić to co trzyma, padnąć @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalonym} lub stać w miejscu. Nie może on @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.A72nHGUtNXgY5Ey9]{Opóźniać} działań ani podejmować reakcji do momentu wykonania twojego rozkazu. Efekty zależą od rzutu obronnego Woli celu.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Porażka W ramach pierwszej akcji w swojej następnej turze istota musi użyć pojedynczej akcji aby wypełnić twój rozkaz.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota musi zużyć wszystkie akcje w swojej następnej turze aby wypełnić twój rozkaz.

Wywyższenie (5.) Możesz obrać za cel do 10 istot.

Commanding Lash.name: Commanding Lash
Commanding Lash.description: With the threat of more pain, you compel a creature you've recently harmed. You issue a command to the target, with the effects of the spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aIHY2DArKFweIrpf]{Rozkaz}.If the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony}, or taking persistent damage, it takes a –2 circumstance penalty to the save. Regardless of the result, the target is then temporarily immune for 1 hour
Commanding Lash.requirements: Your most recent action dealt damage to a target.
Commanding Lash.target: A creature you dealt damage to on your most recent action.

Commune.name: Komunia
Commune.cost: rzadkie kadzidła warte w sumie 150 sz
Commune.description:
You call upon an unknown, powerful being to answer questions. The being varies depending on the skill used for the primary check.

  • Nature Primal spirits of nature, which know about animals, beasts, fey, fungi, plants, topography, and natural resources within a 3-mile radius.
  • Occultism Planar and other mysterious entities such as elementals, forgotten spirits, and monitors, which know about forgotten knowledge, the planes, obscure secrets, and other esoterica.
  • Religion Divine beings like celestials and fiends that know about the gods they serve and the god's respective purview; these are typically a servitor of your deity if you have one.

You can ask up to seven questions that could be answered with "Yes" or "No." The entity answers with one-word answers such as "Yes," "No," "Likely," and "Unknown," though its answers always reflect its own agenda and could be deceptive.

Krytyczny Sukces You contact a more powerful entity aligned strongly with your interests, possibly even your deity. The entity won't attempt to deceive you, though it still might not know the answers. When it's important to provide clarity, the entity will answer your questions with up to five words, such as "If you leave immediately" or "That was true once."

Sukces You can ask your questions and receive answers.

Porażka You fail to contact an appropriate being.

Krytyczna Porażka You are exposed to the enormity of the cosmos and are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 4} for 1 week (can't remove by any means).
Commune.secondarycheck: Okultyzm, Przyroda lub Religia (którekolwiek używane jest do testu głównego)

Commune with Corazal.name: Commune with Corazal
Commune with Corazal.description:
You tap into Corazal's innumerable senses to identify disturbances throughout the Las Werdurański.

Krytyczny Sukces You and Corazal successfully identify a flashpoint: an imminent event that could stoke distrust and unrest. You experience a sensory premonition of the event, can cast know the way as a 7. kręgu cantrip to point toward the location, and know which Elder Oak is closest to it.

Sukces As success, but the ritual heavily taxes your mind and body. You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 1}, and until the drained condition ends, you are also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 1}.

Porażka The ritual has no effect.

Krytyczna Porażka The ritual has no effect beyond burning your mind with conflicting information. You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 2}, and until the drained condition ends, you are also stupefied 1 and have the Dubious Knowledge skill feat. Whenever you would decrease this drained value, the value does not decrease unless you succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:11].
Commune with Corazal.secondarycheck: DC 24 Forest Lore, Perception, or Survival

Community Repair.name: Community Repair
Community Repair.description:
You lead your community in repairing a public work, such as a bridge, well, or mural, through the power of memory and art. The primary caster serves as an emcee or leader, while each secondary caster provides a heartfelt anecdote that somehow involves the public work; for instance, recounting a story of playing at a fountain each summer. The anecdotes don't need to be firsthand accounts-a community member might sing of how their grandparents fell in love crossing a bridge every day-but they must be directly connected in some way. The GM can offer a +1 circumstance bonus to the secondary caster whose anecdote seems most moving.

If the public work was destroyed intentionally by one of the casters, the ritual automatically critically fails.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.dU4viL9kh554TKeB]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Community Repair}

Krytyczny Sukces The public work is restored to its prior construction, and it takes on further qualities, encouraged by the thoughts of the community. For the next week, while a caster is within 60 feet of the site of the ritual, they receive a +1 status bonus to Will saves against emotion effects and a +10-foot status bonus to their Speeds.

Sukces The public work is restored to its prior construction and function.

Porażka The ritual has no effect.

Krytyczna Porażka The public work refuses to repair itself, and the memories of the community members are soured in response to the botched ritual. For the next week, while a caster is within 60 feet of the site of the ritual, they cannot receive any benefit from beneficial emotion effects, and they take a –10-foot status penalty to their Speeds as their movement slows to a morose crawl.
Community Repair.requirements: rare powdered pigments in at least three different colors, worth a total of 50 gp
Community Repair.target: 1 damaged or broken public work no larger than 3 000 cubic feet (the size of a Huge creature)

Community Restoration.name: Community Restoration
Community Restoration.description:
Aktywator You Cast a Spell from a wizard spell slot, and the spell affects one or more willing allies without damaging them.

When you use your magic to support your allies, shared strength bolsters you all. You gain 2 temporary Hit Points per rank of the triggering spell, and can grant an equal number divided as you choose among allies affected by the triggering spell. These temporary Hit Points last for 1 minute.

Compel True Name.name: Compel True Name
Compel True Name.description:
You instruct the target to do something, compelling obedience by calling it by its true name. Your instructions can't be self-destructive. Though this spell has the linguistic trait, this applies only to the instructions; the creature doesn't need to know its own true name to be affected. The target must attempt a Will saving throw.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected, is temporarily immune to further castings of this spell by you for 1 week, and learns your true name.

Sukces The target is unaffected, is temporarily immune to further castings of this spell by you for 1 day, and learns a fragment of your true name.

Porażka The target does as you command. The spell has a duration of 10 minutes, or until the target has completed a finite instruction or the instructions become selfdestructive. The creature is temporarily immune to further castings of this spell by you for 1 hour.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the spell's duration is 8 hours, and the creature is not temporarily immune.
Compel True Name.target: 1 creature whose true name you know

Competitive Edge.name: Competitive Edge
Competitive Edge.description:
Your competitiveness drives you to prove yourself against the opposition. You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and skill checks. If an enemy within 20 feet critically succeeds at an attack roll or skill check, your status bonus increases to +3 for attack rolls or that specific skill check (whichever the foe critically succeeded at) for 1 round.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.iJ7TVW5tDnZG9DG8]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Competitive Edge}

Wywyższenie (7.) Increase the base bonus to +2 and the increased bonus after an enemy critically succeeds to +4.

Concealment's Curtain.name: Concealment's Curtain
Concealment's Curtain.cost: an ornate mirror worth at least 100 gp, naturally occurring round fruit the size and number of the target's eyes, and the same amount of flawless silver needles worth at least 1 gp each
Concealment's Curtain.description:
At twilight for 5 days, you line the fruit in front of the mirror, chanting the name of the target, and envisioning its eyes in your mind. At exactly midnight on the last day, you drive the pins through the fruits, miming the action of methodically blinding the target to you and your companions. The target is immediately affected and can't visually detect any of the casters involved in the ritual-provided that the ritual was successful, the target is unaware of the effects. Since the ritual affects the target's ability to see the casters, rather than make the casters @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialny}, effects like true seeing are ineffective against concealment's curtain; instead, the target would need to remove the curse with effects like remove curse. To perform this ritual, you must have been within 5 feet of the target at least once, close enough to get a good look at its eyes. The target is temporarily immune to further castings of concealment's curtain for 1 year.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unable to visually detect the casters for the duration, and the target's detection spells don't detect the targets.

Sukces The target is unable to visually detect the casters for the duration, but it's detection spells function normally.

Porażka The ritual has no effect.

Krytyczna Porażka The ritual backfires and all casters participating in it are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiony} for the next 24 hours.

Wywyższenie (8.) You aren't satisfied with simply concealing yourself from the target. The cost of the ritual mirror increases to 1 000 gp, and a personal effect of the target is required. After completing the ritual, the target takes 6k6 mental damage and is blinded for 1 week, requiring both a remove curse and a restore senses to end the effect early. The target is aware that the ritual was cast on them; however, it doesn't have any additional information.

Concordant Choir.name: Harmonijny Chór
Concordant Choir.description:
Uwalniasz niebezpieczną harmonię donośnych dźwięków, skupioną na pojedynczym celu lub rozpraszając obrażenia pomiędzy wielu wrogów. Liczba akcji poświęconych na Rzucanie tego Zaklęcia określa jego cele, zasięg, obszar oraz inne parametry.

1 Zaklęcie zadaje pojedynczemu wrogowi 1k4 obrażeń od dźwięku z podstawowym rzutem obronnym Krzepy.

2 (manipulacja) Zaklęcie zadaje wszystkim istotom w @Template[burst|distance:10]{wybuchu 10 stóp} 2k4 obrażeń od dźwięku z podstawowym rzutem obronnym Krzepy.

3 (manipulacja) Zaklęcie zadaje wszystkim istotom w @Template[emanation|distance:30]{emanacji 30 stóp} 2k4 obrażeń od dźwięku z podstawowym rzutem obronnym Krzepy.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k4 dla wersji 1-akcyjnej lub o 2k4 dla pozostałych wersji.

Conductive Weapon.name: Elektryzacja Broni
Conductive Weapon.description:
Przepuszczasz przez metal broni potężny ładunek prądu elektrycznego, porażający tego kogo ona trafi. Cel staje się bronią porażenia +1. Jeśli cel ataku bronią nosi metalowy pancerz lub składa się w większości z metalu, kość obrażeń od elektryczności z runy porażenia wynosi 1k12.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.WdXLgPashH5in5eB]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Elektryzacja Broni}
Conductive Weapon.target: 1 metalowa broń, która jest niepilnowana lub dzierżona przez ciebie lub godzącego się sojusznika

Cone of Cold.name: Stożek Zimna
Cone of Cold.description:
Z twoich rąk wystrzeliwuje przejmujące zimno. Zadajesz istotom w obszarze 12k6 obrażeń od zimna.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6.

Confetti Cloud.name: Confetti Cloud
Confetti Cloud.description:
You conjure a dense storm of swirling confetti. All creatures within the area of the confetti become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty}, and all creatures outside the storm become concealed to creatures within it. Additionally, creatures in the area of the confetti continually hear the raucous sounds of a party or festival and take a –2 circumstance penalty on Perception checks to hear. The number of actions you spend when Casting this Spell determines its area. You can Dismiss the spell.

1 (somatic) The spell's area is a @Template[burst|distance:5].

2 (somatic, verbal) The spell's area is a @Template[burst|distance:10].

3 (material, somatic, verbal) The spell's area is a @Template[burst|distance:15].

Confront Selves.name: Confront Selves
Confront Selves.description:
You show the target the spiraling web of actions and consequences that is their life and the changes wrought by these decisions upon themselves and those around them. These events swirl around the target like shards of broken pottery. When you Cast or Sustain this Spell, you force the target to confront an alternate permutation of themselves, witnessing the events of their life as if they'd chosen another path. They take 4k6 mental damage (basic Will save) and are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1} until the beginning of your next turn. On a critical success, the spell ends.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k6.

Confusing Colors.name: Confusing Colors
Confusing Colors.description:
A cloud of cascading, ever-changing colors manifests in the air. Creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} while inside the cloud, as are those within 20 feet of the cloud's area. A creature must attempt a Will save if it is inside the cloud when you cast it, enters the cloud, ends its turn within the cloud, or uses a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Szukanie} or Interact action on the cloud. A creature currently affected by the cloud doesn't need to attempt new saves.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Zdezorientowany} for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1k4 rounds}.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony} for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1k4 rounds}. After the stunned condition ends, the creature is confused for the remaining duration of the spell.

Confusing Cry.name: Confusing Cry
Confusing Cry.description:
You give an unsettling, warbling cry that causes nearby creatures to lash out without control. Each creature in the area that can hear must attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected and immune to this spell for 1 minute.

Sukces The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1}.

Porażka The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Zdezorientowany} for 1 minute. It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns to end the confusion.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, and the creature immediately attacks itself. This Strike doesn't give the creature a flat check to recover from the confusion.

Confusion.name: Confusion
Confusion.description:
You befuddle your target with strange impulses, causing it to act randomly. The effects are determined by the target's Will save. You can Dismiss the spell.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target babbles incoherently and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1}.

Porażka The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Zdezorientowany} for 1 minute. It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns to end the confusion.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is Confused for 1 minute, with no save to end early.

Wywyższenie (8.) Możesz obrać za cel do 10 istot.

Conjured Conveyance.name: Conjured Conveyance
Conjured Conveyance.description:
You conjure an intricate vehicle, carved entirely from wood, to serve as a method of conveyance. The vehicle appears in an unoccupied area of your choice within range. The vehicle can be piloted using Arcana, Driving Lore, or Nature skill checks. The DC to pilot the vehicle and the DC of the vehicle's collision are equal to your spell DC. The vehicle's remaining statistics are presented below.

When you Cast this Spell, choose whether to create a Large skiff, a Large wagon, or a Medium cycle. With the GM's permission, you might instead summon a different vehicle of your choice with a maximum level of 1; this vehicle must be made primarily of plant matter, have common rarity, and be Large or smaller.

  • Large Skiff — Space 15 feet long, 5 feet wide, 3 feet high; Crew 1 pilot; Passengers 3; Prędkość swim 30 feet (magical)

  • Large Wagon — Space 10 feet long, 10 feet wide, 7 feet high; Crew 1 pilot; Passengers 3; Prędkość 35 feet (magical)

  • Medium Cycle — Space 5 feet long, 3 feet wide, 3 feet high; Crew 1 pilot; Passengers 0; Prędkość 40 feet (magical)

AC 13; Fortitude +8

Twardość 5, PŻ 40 (BT 20); Immunities critical hits, object immunities, precision damage; Weaknesses fire 5, slashing 5

Collision 2k6

Wywyższenie (+1) The vehicle's AC increases by 2, Fortitude bonus increases by 2, Hardness increases by 1, HP increases by 20, and the collision damage increases by [[/r 1d6]]. In addition, the maximum level of vehicle you can summon with GM permission increases by 2. The duration increases by 1 hour.

Consecrate.name: Consecrate
Consecrate.cost: rare incense and offerings worth a total value of 20 gp × the spell rank
Consecrate.description:
Area 40-foot-radius burst around an immobile altar, shrine, or fixture of your deity

Secondary Casters 2, must be worshippers of your religion

You consecrate a site to your deity, chanting praises and creating a sacred space. While within the area, worshippers of your deity gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, skill checks, saving throws, and Perception checks, and creatures anathema to your deity (such as undead for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Item.QZD0u1jxwz0kj8uI]{Farazma} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Item.BNycwu3I21dTh4D9]{Sarenrae}) take a –1 status penalty to those rolls. If your deity's divine sanctification allows you to choose holy or unholy, you can choose to make the consecrated site holy or unholy as well. If the deity's sanctification must be holy or unholy, you must make the site match that sanctification. Strikes made by worshippers of your deity within the area gain the site's sanctification trait, if any.

Krytyczny Sukces The consecration succeeds, and it either lasts for 10 years instead of 1 or covers an area with twice the radius. Occasionally, with your deity's favor, this might produce an even more amazing effect, such as a permanently consecrated area or the effect covering an entire cathedral.

Sukces The consecration succeeds.

Porażka The consecration fails.

Krytyczna Porażka The consecration fails spectacularly and angers your deity, who sends a sign of displeasure. For at least 1 year, further attempts to consecrate the site fail.

Wywyższenie (7.) The consecrated area also gains the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XZE4BawIlTf88Yl9]{Planarna Pieczęć} spell, but the effect doesn't attempt to counteract teleportation by worshippers of your deity. The cost increases to 200 gp × the spell rank.

Consecrate Flesh.name: Consecrate Flesh
Consecrate Flesh.description:
Through the strength of your faith, your body becomes infused with holy energy. You have weakness 5 to unholy. Any creature that touches or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon takes 1k6 spirit damage. Your unarmed attacks deal an additional 1 spirit damage. Your healing spells that restore Hit Points restore an additional 1k4 Hit Points when you initially cast them; as normal, if your healing spell restores Hit Points more than once, grants fast healing, or the like, the additional Hit Points still only apply once.

Wywyższenie (+3) Creatures touching you take 1k6 additional spirit damage, your unarmed Strikes deal 1 additional spirit damage, your healing spells restore 1k4 more additional Hit Points, and your weakness to unholy increases by 5.

Construct Mindscape.name: Construct Mindscape
Construct Mindscape.cost: precious clay, wood, or other modeling materials worth spell rank × 20 gp
Construct Mindscape.description:
You create an entirely mental environment called an immersive mindscape. It can have any appearance you and the secondary casters imagine and hold in your minds as you execute the ritual. A mindscape is typically veiled, disguising its nature as a mental construct, but you can choose to make it overt. Even a veiled mindscape has some signs it's not a real place that can be revealed through close inspection or by spending a long time there. Most mindscapes are incapable of physically harming those inside. Even though the mindscape you create is limited in dimension, it appears to have a convincing environment around it, such as a sky and clouds.

Krytyczny Sukces You create a mindscape approximately a half-mile in length and width, and 50 feet in height (large enough to contain a typical village). The GM might allow you to make it larger if it has little detail, such as a grassy plain. You and any secondary casters of your choice can enter it and you can leave a doorway that you and any creatures you designate can pass through.

Sukces As critical success, but the mindscape is approximately 25 feet in length, width, and height (like a modest house).

Porażka You can't hold the image together and it falls apart.

Krytyczna Porażka Your secret desires horribly warp the mindscape into a distorted mirror of what you intended.

Wywyższenie (6.) The duration is 1 week.

Wywyższenie (9.) The duration is 1 year, and the area on a critical success is 1 mile in length and width.

Wywyższenie (10.) The duration is unlimited, and the area on a critical success is 1 mile in length and width. The cost increases to 2 000 gp.

Consuming Darkness.name: Consuming Darkness
Consuming Darkness.description:
Your shadow wriggles before spreading out from you, forming a gateway of clinging, consuming shadow through which the horrors of another plane can barely be seen. The first time each turn you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.3f5DMFu8fPiqHpRg]{Sustain the Spell}, the radius increases by 5 feet. Each enemy that enters the area or begins its turn in the area takes @Damage[2d6[void]] damage and must attempt a Reflex save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature sinks partially into the shadow, taking half damage and a –5-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for as long it remains in the area.

Porażka As success, but the creature takes full damage and a 10-foot circumstance penalty.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is absorbed into the shadows, where it can be seen below the surface; it takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony} for 1 round or until it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes}.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o @Damage[1d6[void]].

Contact Friends.name: Contact Friends
Contact Friends.description:
You meditate for a quiet moment before your mind seeks out others whom you have befriended, as well as friends of any of the secondary casters. The ritual projects your mind to a blank space where you see one or more friends from your past. Once there, you can ask each friend a single question. If more than one friend is present, you can ask each one a different question. These friends aren't compelled to answer you honestly or answer at all, but those who are your friends are likely to help you if they can, barring special situations.

Krytyczny Sukces You contact up to three close friends of yourself or any of the secondary casters, and the friends attempt to help you with their knowledge. They each answer one of your questions, as described above.

Sukces As critical success, but your mind reaches one friend, instead of three.

Porażka Your mind reaches three friends you've made in the past, but each of them gives you a useless fact. None of these facts help with your situation at all.

Krytyczna Porażka Your mind freezes. You saw something that terrified you to your core, leaving you and all other casters @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 3} for 1 day.

Contagious Idea.name: Zaraźliwa Idea
Contagious Idea.description:
Nothing is so contagious as a thought. You place either a pleasant thought or a terrifying one in a creature's mind. You can then plant the same thought in a second creature's mind. You can't choose a creature that's already been a target of this casting of contagious idea, nor can you choose yourself. The second target can be beyond the range of the spell, but it must be within 30 feet of the first target.

  • Pleasant Thought The target is soothed, gaining 5 temporary Hit Points that last for 1 minute. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.VVSOzHV6Rz2YNHRl]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Contagious Idea (Pleasant Thought)}
  • Terrifying Thought The target must attempt a Will save.
    • Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected and is temporarily immune for 1 minute.
