    • Sukces The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1} and is then temporarily immune for 1 minute.
    • Porażka The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2}.
    • Krytyczna Porażka The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 3}.

Wywyższenie (+1) The temporary Hit Points for a pleasant thought increase by 1.
Contagious Idea.target: 1 or 2 creatures other than yourself (see text)

Containment.name: Zabezpieczenie
Containment.description:
Otaczasz istotę nieruchomym polem siłowym, aby chronić ją samą lub tych wokół niej. Pole siłowe blokuje ataki, efekty i próby przejścia istot przez nie, wliczając w to cel. Pole siłowe ma Twardość 10, 40 Punktów Żywotności i niewrażliwość na trafienia krytyczne oraz obrażenia precyzyjne. Jeśli cel zabezpieczenia nie godzi się na nie, rezultat jest zależny od jego rzutu obronnego Refleksu.

Krytyczny Sukces Cel umyka z pola siłowego podczas jego formowania, powodując jego zapadnięcie się.

Sukces Pole siłowe formuje się tylko cząstkowo, posiadając 10 Punktów Żywotności zamiast 40.

Porażka Pole siłowe odnosi normalny efekt.

Wywyższenie (+1) Punkty Żywotności pola siłowego zwiększają się o 5 przy sukcesie lub o 15 przy porażce.

Contingency.name: Ewentualność
Contingency.description:
Przygotowujesz zaklęcie, które zostanie wywołane w późniejszym czasie. Kiedy rzucasz ewentualność, rzucasz również inne zaklęcie o kręgu 4. lub niższym i z czasem rzucania nie większym niż 3 akcje. To towarzyszące zaklęcie, musi być zaklęciem, które jest w stanie obejmować cię za cel. Wszelkich decyzji dotyczących tego zaklęcia, takich jak wybór obrażeń dla odparcia energii, musisz dokonać w momencie rzucania ewentualności. W trakcie rzucania ewentualności, wybierz aktywator, używając do tego celu tych samych ograniczeń co w wypadku akcji Przygotowanie. Kiedy rzucona zostanie ewentualność, możesz aktywować jej zaklęcie towarzyszące w używając reakcji z tym aktywatorem. Zaklęcie to obiera za cel jedynie ciebie, nawet jeśli miałoby w ramach jego działania dotykać większej ilości istot. Jeśli określisz dla aktywatora skomplikowane warunki, może on nie zadziałać, wedle uznania MG. Jeśli ponownie rzucisz ewentualność, jej nowe rzucenie nadpisuje stare.

Wywyższenie (8.) Możesz wybrać zaklęcie kręgu 5. lub niższego.

Wywyższenie (9.) Możesz wybrać zaklęcie kręgu 6. lub niższego.

Wywyższenie (10.) Możesz wybrać zaklęcie kręgu 7. lub niższego.

Control Sand.name: Control Sand
Control Sand.description:
You whip up a small sandstorm around your body. When a creature starts its turn in the area or moves into the area, it must succeed at a Fortitude save or become dazzled for as long as it remains in the area; it is then temporarily immune to this dazzling effect for 10 minutes.

Choose one of the following additional effects when you cast this spell. On subsequent rounds, you can switch to a different effect once per round as a free action triggered by sustaining the spell.

  • Sand Shield You create a magical shield made of sand. The sand shield provides no benefit to AC, but it does allow you to use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Blok Tarczą} reaction and acts as a shield for this purpose. The sand shield has Hardness 14, 21 Hit Points, and no Broken Threshold; when the shield's HP are reduced to 0, you can't use its Shield Block reaction again until the next time you Sustain the Spell and choose the sand shield effect.
  • Sandblast You direct a jet of sand at a single target. One creature of your choice within 30 feet takes 8k6 slashing damage (podstawowy rzut obronny Refleksu). On a critical failure, the creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} for 1 minute.
  • Sandstorm The area of the spell expands to a 30-foot emanation, and any creature that starts its turn in the area or moves into the area takes 6k4 slashing damage (podstawowy rzut obronny Refleksu) and must hold its breath or begin suffocating.

Control Water.name: Control Water
Control Water.description:
By imposing your will upon the water, you can raise or lower the level of water in the chosen area by 10 feet. Creatures that have the water trait and that are in the area when you Cast the Spell must attempt a Fortitude save, with the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.WsUwpfmhKrKwoIe3]{Spowolnienie} spell.

Obszar 50 feet long by 50 feet wide

Control Weather.name: Control Weather
Control Weather.description:
Obszar 2-mile-radius circle centered on you

You alter the weather, making it calm and normal for the season or choosing up to two effects based on the season.

  • Spring drizzle, heat, hurricane, sleet, thunderstorm, tornado
  • Summer drizzle, downpour, extreme heat, hail, heat
  • Autumn cold weather, fog, mild heat, sleet
  • Winter blizzard, mild cold, extreme cold, thaw

You can't specifically control the manifestations, such as the exact path of a tornado or the targets of lightning strikes.

Krytyczny Sukces You change the weather as desired and can affect a larger area (up to a 5-mile-radius circle), or a longer duration (any number of additional k12 hours, up to 16k12).

Sukces You change the weather as desired.

Porażka You fail to change the weather as desired.

Krytyczna Porażka The weather changes in an unanticipated way, determined by the GM but generally as contradictory to your true desires as possible (for instance, a terrible storm emerges when you would prefer good weather).

Wywyższenie (9.) You can create unseasonable weather and contradictory weather effects, such as extreme cold and a hurricane. You can make the weather calm and normal weather for a different season or choose weather effects from any season's list.

Coral Eruption.name: Coral Eruption
Coral Eruption.description:
Area two 10-foot bursts that don't overlap

Razor sharp coral growths erupt from the ground, transforming the landscape into a dangerous coral reef. You can create a third nonoverlapping burst if the centers of all three bursts are underwater. Creatures in the area when the spell is cast take 6k6 piercing damage and must attempt a basic Reflex save. A creature that critically fails its saving throw also takes @Damage[1d6[bleed]]. The area becomes difficult terrain and hazardous terrain. A creature that moves through the area takes @Damage[(floor(@item.rank/2)+1)[piercing]] damage for every square of that area it moves into.

Wywyższenie (+2) The initial piercing damage increases by 3k6, and the hazardous terrain damage increases by 1.

Coral Scourge.name: Coral Scourge
Coral Scourge.description:
Barnacles, coral, and other rough aquatic creatures grow on the target's body, getting in between their joints and stiffening their movement. This impedes the target's movement depending on the result of its saving throw.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1}. The target can Interact to scrape the coral growths from its body, decreasing the clumsy condition to 0 and ending the spell.

Porażka The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 2}. Each round at the beginning of its turn, the target becomes clumsy 1 or increases its clumsy condition by 1, to a maximum of 4. The target can Interact to scrape the coral growths from its body, decreasing the clumsy condition to 0 and ending the spell. If the target's clumsy condition caused by coral scourge reaches 4, the growths spread to cover the target's entire body, and the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Sparaliżowany}.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but when the target Interacts to scrape the coral growths from its body, it reduces its clumsy condition by 1, instead of decreasing it to 0, and decreasing the clumsy condition to 0 doesn't end the spell.

Cordyceps Command.name: Cordyceps Command
Cordyceps Command.description:
You conjure a mote of cordyceps spores uniquely tailored to the target before whisking it at them. When you Cast this Spell, choose one of the following behaviors that the fungus compels: ascend, consume, descend, or lure. While the target is controlled by the cordyceps toxin's stage 3 effects, it performs that behavior. This control might include risky behavior (such as climbing down a precarious cliff or weaving between armed foes), but it doesn't compel outright lethal actions (such as leaping off the top of that same cliff). If the behavior directly leads to harm (such as falling off the cliff) or hostile actions (such as being attacked by creatures that can now reach the descending creature), the target gains a +4 bonus to their next saving throw against the poison.

Ascend: The creature tries to reach higher altitudes by any reasonable means, such as Climbing, seeking stairs, or even stacking debris to jump atop of in an attempt to be as high up as possible.

Consume: The creature greedily eats or drinks whatever is nearby, using actions to draw and consume elixirs, food, or other consumable items. If the creature has a jaws Strike, fangs Strike, or similar unarmed Strike, the creature can instead chase after and use that Strike against edible targets. If no other food or drink is accessible, the creature attempts to steal or seek nearby nutrition.

Descend: The creature tries to reach lower altitudes by any reasonable means, such as Climbing, descending while flying, or even falling @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony} and attempting to burrow into the ground.

Lure: The creature moves toward an exposed location and attempts to get bystanders' attention, such as by gesticulating, Performing, or igniting light sources. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda} while controlled in this way.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Porażka The target is afflicted with cordyceps toxin at stage 1.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is afflicted with cordyceps toxin at stage 2.

Cordyceps Toxin (poison)

Rzut Obronny @Check[fortitude|dc:28];

Maksymalny Czas Trwania 6 rund

Stadium 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 1} (1 runda)

Stadium 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Zdezorientowany} (1 runda)

Stadium 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Kontrolowany} (1 runda)

Cornucopia.name: Róg Obfitości
Cornucopia.description:
Pnącza zaplatają się w twoich dłoniach, tworząc wiklinowy róg z którego wydobywa się owoc, orzech lub podobnego rodzaju mały produkt rolny. Istota, która zje ten plon za pomocą akcji Interakcji odzyskuje 1k6+4 PŻ. Róg obfitości oraz wszystkie niespożytkowane produkty rolne więdną i psują się na koniec czasu trwania zaklęcia.

Wywyższenie (+1) Róg obfitości wytwarza dodatkowy plon. Istota może zjeść z użyciem akcji Interakcji dowolną ilość jedzenia wytworzonego w wyniku pojedynczego rzucenia tego zaklęcia. Zjedzenie sześciu produktów rolnych z rogu obfitości zapewnia typowemu człowiekowi podobne wartości odżywcze co porządny obiad.

@Damage[((@item.level)d6+(@item.level)*4)[vitality,healing]]{Zjedz wszystkie plony}

Corpse Communion.name: Corpse Communion
Corpse Communion.cost: rare spices and seasonings worth a total value of 50 gp × the spell rank
Corpse Communion.description:
The dead hold more secrets than the living ever shall. The lore possessed by the dead will only increase as time marches on. To be alive is to define your knowledge as being limited, but with the corpse communion ritual, you can, if only for a short time and through a narrow aperture, tap into the greater lore of the dead and make use of it for your own designs.

When you perform this grisly ritual, you consume a portion of a dead body, taking the decayed flesh and old bones into your system while also taking into your mind the memories etched into those mortal remains. The corpse from which you harvest your necromantic meal cannot have been dead for longer than 1 month, and it need not even be entirely intact, but enough should be present to form what would be regarded as a satisfying meal. If, in life, the corpse was the same ancestry as your own, then you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on the primary check to cast corpse communion. Note that when you perform corpse communion, the remains you consume are largely a symbolic bridge between this material world and the world of the dead. The ritual allows you to tap into the vast amount of knowledge and secrets held by the dead as a whole, not simply knowledge that may have once been held by the creature you feed upon.

When you perform this ritual, select a single Intelligence-, Wisdom-, or Charisma-based skill whose secrets you wish to delve into, but in which you possess no greater proficiency in than trained.

The ritual itself does not protect you from potential infection from eating decayed flesh, and at the GM's discretion, performing this ritual could expose you to a disease, curse, or other affliction.

If you perform corpse communion again while already under its effects, the effects of any previous success or critical success are replaced by the results of the new ritual casting.

Krytyczny Sukces You learn a significant piece of lore, a forgotten secret, or some other tantalizing nugget of knowledge that is of immediate use to you, connected to the skill you chose. The GM will provide you with some piece of information they know will aid you in your personal goals. In addition, you become trained in the use of the selected skill and gain a +1 status bonus on checks made with that skill.

Sukces You become expert in the use of the selected skill.

Porażka You fail to learn anything from the communion.

Krytyczna Porażka A malevolent spirit, be it a supernatural presence sensing an opportunity or the soul of the corpse you're feeding upon, lashes out at you as you feed, drawing from you your memories and secrets and taking them away into the realm of the dead forever. You not only become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 3}, but you no longer know the corpse communion ritual. You can attempt to learn it again, but the DC to learn this ritual increases by 5.

Wywyższenie (4.) The remains can be up to 10 years old-dry bones in sufficient enough quantity to gnaw upon will suffice. You can choose a skill you are trained or untrained in, and when you are successful at this ritual, you become master at that skill. The ritual duration extends to 1 week.

Wywyższenie (8.) The remains can be up to 100 years old-dry bones in sufficient enough quantity to gnaw upon will suffice. You can choose a skill you are trained or untrained in, and when you are successful at this ritual, you become master at that skill. The ritual duration extends to 1 month.

Wywyższenie (10.) The limit on how old the corpse must be is removed entirely-as long as enough remains, even if it's just a single skull, you can perform the ritual. You can choose a skill you are trained or untrained in, and when you are successful at this ritual, you become legendary at that skill. The ritual duration is permanent until you cast corpse communion again.

Corrosive Body.name: Corrosive Body
Corrosive Body.description:
You exhale corrosive gas, and acidic secretions coat your skin as you transform into a being of living acid. You gain acid immunity. Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed melee attack or non-reach melee weapon takes 3k6 acid damage, and your unarmed attacks deal 1k4 additional acid damage. The first time each round that you deal acid damage to a creature in this way, you gain 3k6 Temporary Hit Points temporary Hit Points as your body digests the eroded material and transforms it into a protective acid. When the spell ends, any remaining temporary HP expires as well. Your acid spells deal one additional die of acid damage (of the same damage die the spell uses). You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gISYsBFby1TiXfBt]{Acid Splash} as an innate spell; the splash damage affects all creatures within 15 feet instead of the normal 5 feet.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.LT5AV9vSN3T9x3J9]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Corrosive Body}

Wywyższenie (9.) Creatures touching you take 4k6 acid damage instead of 3k6, your unarmed attacks deal 2k4 additional acid damage, and you gain 5k6 Temporary Hit Points temporary Hit Points.

Corrosive Muck.name: Corrosive Muck
Corrosive Muck.description:
Area all squares in two @Template[burst|distance:10]{10-foot bursts}.

You create two puddles of acidic slime that hinders the movement of anyone who walks through them. The area of each pool becomes greater difficult terrain. Each round that a creature starts its turn in one of the pools or enters a pool during a move action it's using, it takes 8k6 acid damage with a basic Reflex save. A creature that critically fails its saving throw also takes @Damage[1d6[acid,persistent]]. As normal, if a Large or larger creature starts its turn in both pools, it takes the damage only once.

Wywyższenie (+2) Create an additional 10-foot burst.

Cosmic Form.name: Cosmic Form
Cosmic Form.description:
You recreate your form entirely out of cosmic energy, transforming into a Large battle form. You must have enough space to expand into, or the spell is lost. When you cast this spell, choose to take on the powers of the moon or the sun. You have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 21 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +25, and you use the listed damage. The melee attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example), and the ranged attacks are Dexterity based. If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +25, unless your own is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the stellar body:

  • Moon Speed 30 feet, fly 50 feet;
    • Melee 1 fist (agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 2k4+10 bludgeoning plus 1k6 fire;
    • Ranged 1 moonbeam (range 90 feet), Damage 2k4+10 fire; this form's fire damage is silver for resistances, weaknesses, and the like;
    • On a critical hit with either Strike, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 2} for 1 round.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.tfdDpf9xSWgQer5g]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Cosmic Form (Moon)}

  • Sun Speed 30 feet, fly 50 feet;
    • Melee 1 fist (agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 2k6+10 fire plus 1k6 persistent fire;
    • Ranged 1 sunbeam (range 90 feet), Damage 1k6+10 fire plus 1k6 persistent fire;
    • On a critical hit with either Strike, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} for 1 round.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.2Ss5VblfZNHg1HjN]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Cosmic Form (Sun)}

Counter Performance.name: Przeciwwystęp
Counter Performance.description:
Aktywator Ty albo sojusznik w zasięgu 60 stóp rzucacie rzut obronny przeciw efektowi słuchowemu lub wzrokowemu.

Twój występ chroni ciebie i twoich sojuszników. Rzuć test znanego ci rodzaju @Check[performance]{Występów} — musi być to występ słuchowy jeśli wywołujący efekt był słuchowy lub występ wzrokowy jeśli wywołujący efekt był wzrokowy, a ta akcja zyskuje cechy odpowiadające wybranemu występowi. Ty oraz sojusznicy w obszarze możecie używać lepszego wyniku spośród twojego testu Występów lub rzutu obronnego.

Countless Eyes.name: Countless Eyes
Countless Eyes.description:
Eyes form across the touched creature's body, allowing it to see in all directions at once. The subject can't be flanked for the spell's duration. In addition, when the subject succeeds when Seeking, it critically succeeds instead.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.BfaFe1cI9IkpvmmY]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Countless Eyes}

Courageous Anthem.name: Hymn Odwagi
Courageous Anthem.description:
Inspirujesz swoich kompanów słowami i dźwiękami otuchy. Ty i wszyscy sojusznicy w obszarze zyskujecie premię statusową +1 do rzutów ataku, rzutów obrażeń oraz rzutów obronnych przeciw efektom strachu.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.beReeFroAx24hj83]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Hymn Odwagi}

Cozy Cabin.name: Cozy Cabin
Cozy Cabin.description:
You shape a cabin 20 feet on each side and 10 feet high. This cabin has the structure trait and the same restrictions as magic items that create structures. The walls of the hut are simple and wooden, with small, square glass windows, and it has one wooden door. It doesn't include its own lock, but it has a fastener to which a lock can be applied.

The interior contains three cots, one chamber pot, and a small fireplace holding a magical fire. The interior is lit with a small magical light that you can light or extinguish at will using a Sustain action. The climate inside the hut is comfortable and allows creatures inside it to withstand most hostile weather conditions, but incredible heat or cold, powerful storms, and winds of hurricane force or greater destroy the hut. Other creatures can freely enter and exit the hut without damaging it, but if you exit the hut, the spell ends. You can Dismiss the spell.

Crashing Wave.name: Crashing Wave
Crashing Wave.description:
You summon a crashing wave that sweeps away from you. You deal 6k6 bludgeoning damage to creatures in the area. The water also extinguishes non-magical fires in the area.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6.

Create Demiplane.name: Create Demiplane
Create Demiplane.cost: precious materials worth a total value of 800 gp
Create Demiplane.description:
Few incantations are as renowned as the power to create worlds. To cast this ritual, you must be on the Astral Plane, the Ethereal Plane, or a plane that connects to one of the two. A demiplane created with this ritual exists on the Astral or Ethereal Plane. It can have the appearance of any mundane environment or structure, such as a glorious cathedral, a forest clearing, a comfortably furnished cavern, or anything else imaginable. All demiplanes have finite, unbreachable boundaries, which might resemble stone, wood, or something more unnatural, such as a wall of mist or unceasing void.

Demiplanes have environmental conditions appropriate for the Universe, though the primary caster can dictate a general climate or light level as well as whether the demiplane experiences seasons or a day-night cycle. The demiplane has no native plants or animals, but they can be introduced, and plants will grow in a demiplane's light.

When you first cast create demiplane, the casters are teleported to the demiplane. The demiplane has no direct access to other worlds, so @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5bTt2CvYHPvaR7QQ]{Teleportacja Międzyplanarna} or similar abilities are necessary to access it. As part of casting the ritual to create a new demiplane, you create a planar key to the demiplane that serves as an interplanar teleport locus for that demiplane. Most resemble ornate keys, but some take the form of maps, compasses, or dowsing rods.

If you have the original planar key to an existing demiplane and are also on that demiplane, you can cast this ritual again. Each time, you can either expand the demiplane's size or add one special trait or feature described below.

  • Bounteous The demiplane has a functional ecosystem with plants and animals appropriate to the environment. This ecosystem doesn't require any additional effort on your part to maintain.
  • Elemental The demiplane gains the air, earth, fire, metal, water, or wood planar essence trait.
  • Gravity The demiplane gains a gravity trait of your choice.
  • Key You create an additional planar key that can be used to access the demiplane with interplanar teleport and improve it with create demiplane.
  • Portal You create a permanent gateway between the demiplane and a single other location. You must spend the ritual's casting time constructing the gateway on the external side, which typically resembles an arch or doorway of some sort. The gate is always active, but it can be secured as you would any door.
  • Scope The demiplane can be unbounded instead of finite, though still with the same size.

Krytyczny Sukces You create a new demiplane whose area consists of 10 contiguous squares, each 100 feet on a side. The ceiling is 40 feet high. If modifying an existing demiplane, you can instead either add this area to the demiplane's size or add two special traits or features.

Sukces As critical success, but the demiplane's area is two squares, each 100 feet on a side, with a ceiling 20 feet high. If modifying an existing demiplane, you can add one special trait or feature.

Porażka The ritual has no effect.

Krytyczna Porażka Something goes horribly wrong, and all casters are teleported to an unknown but hostile plane.

Wywyższenie (10th) The ritual creates a square area 2,000 feet on a side, with a ceiling 60 feet high (or two contiguous areas of this size on a critical success). The cost of the ritual increases to 20,000 gp.
Create Demiplane.secondarycheck: Arcana, Nature, Occultism, Religion (whichever three aren't used for the primary check)

Create Food.name: Stworzenie Jadła
Create Food.description:
Tworzysz ilość jedzenia wystarczającą do wykarmienia sześciu Średnich istot na jeden dzień. Jedzenie to jest nijakie w smaku i nieapetyczne, ale mimo to pożywne. Jeśli nikt nie zje go w przeciągu 1 dnia, psuje się ono i staje niejadalne. Większość małych istot je jedną czwartą tego, co istoty Średnie (dla większości Malutkich istot jest to jedna szesnasta), a większość Dużych istot je 10 razy więcej (100 razy więcej w wypadku istot Wielkich i tak dalej).

Wywyższenie (4.) Możesz wykarmić 12 Średnich istot.

Wywyższenie (6.) Możesz wykarmić 50 Średnich istot.

Wywyższenie (8.) Możesz wykarmić 200 Średnich istot.

Create Mycoguardian.name: Create Mycoguardian
Create Mycoguardian.description:
You transform the target into an fungus creature with a level up to that allowed in the below table. There are many versions of this ritual, each specific to a particular type of mycoguardian, and the rituals that create rare mycroguardians are also rare.

Table 7-1: Creatures Creation Rituals

Poziom IstotyWymagany Krąg ZaklęciaKoszt
–1 lub 0215 sz
1260 sz
23105 sz
33180 sz
44300 sz
54480 sz
65750 sz
751 080 sz
861 500 sz
962 100 sz
1073 000 sz
1174 200 sz
1286 000 sz
1389 000 sz
14913 500 sz
15919 500 sz
161030 000 sz
171045 000 sz

Krytyczny Sukces The target becomes an fungal creature of the appropriate type. Jeśli jest co najmniej 4 poziomy niższy od twojego, możesz uczynić z niego swojego sługusa. Nadaje mu to cechę sługusa, co oznacza, że może on użyć 2 akcji kiedy wydasz mu polecenie, a wydawanie mu polecenia jest pojedynczą akcją, która ma cechy słuchowości i koncentracji. Możesz mieć pod swoją kontrolą maksymalnie czterech sługusów. If it's intelligent and doesn't become a minion, the mycoguardian is helpful to you. If it's unintelligent and doesn't become a minion, you can give it one simple command. It pursues that goal single-mindedly, ignoring any of your subsequent commands.

Sukces As critical success, except an intelligent mycoguardian that doesn't become your minion is only friendly to you, and an unintelligent undead that doesn't become your minion leaves you alone unless you attack it. It marauds the local area rather than following your command.

Porażka You fail to create the mycoguardian.

Krytyczna Porażka You create the mycoguardian, but its soul, tortured by your foul necromancy, is full of nothing but hatred for you. It attempts to destroy you.

Create Skinstitch.name: Create Skinstitch
Create Skinstitch.description:
You transform the target into a skinstitch, a hideous construct covered in the flesh of sentient humanoids.

Krytyczny Sukces The target becomes a skinstitch. If it's at least 4 levels lower than you, you can make it a minion which gives it the minion trait. You can have a maximum of four minions under your control. If it doesn't become a minion, you can give it one simple command that it pursues single-mindedly. If you aren't a follower of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Item.GX6PF9ifR47Xyjg9]{Norgorber}, it ignores any of your subsequent commands. A follower of Norgorber can give the skinstitch simple commands by presenting a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.upzjwQ96cZG0Xlmx]{Religious Symbol} of the deity and commanding it with a single action that has the auditory and concentrate traits.

Sukces As critical success, except a skinstitch that doesn't become your minion stays in place and attacks anyone that attacks or tries to move it, rather than following your command.

Porażka You fail to create the skinstitch.

Krytyczna Porażka You create the skinstitch, but it goes berserk and attempts to kill you, ignoring your commands even if you are a follower of Norgorber.
Create Skinstitch.target: 1 frame covered in the skin of sentient humanoids

Create Undead.name: Stworzenie Nieumarłego
Create Undead.cost: Czarny onyks, patrz tabela Rytuały Stworzenia Istot
Create Undead.description:
Przemieniasz cel zaklęcia w nieumarłą istotę o poziomie nie wyższym od tego dozwolonego w tabeli Rytuały Stworzenia Istot. Istnieje wiele wersji tego rytuału, każda odpowiadająca określonemu typowi nieumarłych (jeden dla wszystkich rodzajów zombie, inny dla szkieletów, inny dla ghouli i tak dalej), a rytuały tworzące rzadkich nieumarłych same również są rzadkie. Niektóre formy nieumarłych, takie jak lisze, powstają w wyniku działania własnych unikalnych metod i nie mogą zostać wytworzone za pomocą rytuału stworzenia nieumarłego.

Krytyczny Sukces Cel staje się nieumarłą istotą określonego typu. Jeśli jest co najmniej 4 poziomy niższy od twojego, możesz uczynić z niego swojego sługusa. Nadaje mu to cechę sługusa, co oznacza, że może on użyć 2 akcji kiedy wydasz mu polecenie, a wydawanie mu polecenia jest pojedynczą akcją, która ma cechy słuchowości i koncentracji. Możesz mieć pod swoją kontrolą maksymalnie czterech sługusów. Jeśli nieumarły jest inteligentny i nie staje się twoim sługusem, jest ci pomocny w podzięce za jego przebudzenie, chociaż nadal jest on odrażającą i złą do szpiku kości istotą. Jeśli brak mu inteligencji a nie stał się twoim sługusem, możesz wydać mu jedno proste polecenie. Skupia się wyłącznie na dążeniu do tego celu, ignorując wszelkie późniejsze polecenia.

Sukces Jak krytyczny sukces, ale inteligentny nieumarły, który nie staje się twoim sługusem, jest wobec ciebie jedynie przyjazny a pozbawiony inteligencji nieumarły, który nie staje się twoim sługusem, pozostawia cię w spokoju o ile go nie zaatakujesz. Zamiast wykonywać twoje polecenia, grasuje on po okolicy.

Porażka Nie udaje ci się stworzyć nieumarłego.

Krytyczna Porażka Tworzysz nieumarłego, ale jego dusza, udręczona twoją odrażającą nekromancją, wypełniona po brzegi nienawiścią do ciebie. Próbuje cię on unicestwić.

Rytuały Stworzenia Istot

Create Water.name: Stworzenie Wody
Create Water.description: Łączysz swoje dłonie i sprawiasz, że zaczyna z nich wypływać woda. Tworzysz 10 litrów wody. Jeśli nikt jej nie wypije, wyparowuje ona po 1 dniu.

Creation.name: Kreacja
Creation.description:
Przyzywasz tymczasowy obiekt z magicznej energii. Musi być on składać się z materii pochodzącej z gleby lub pochodzenia roślinnego (takiej jak drewno, papier, cegła czy kamień) i mieć objętość nie większą niż 5 stóp sześciennych (0.15 metra sześciennego). Obiekt nie może wymagać wysublimowanych zdolności rzemieślniczych ani zaiwerać ruchomych elementów, nigdy nie może stanowić kosztu ani składać się z materiałów drogocennych lub o rzadkości wyższej od powszechnej. Jestw w widoczny sposób tymczasowo przyzwany i jako taki nie może zostać sprzedany ani podany za prawdziwy obiekt. Zaklęcie zyskuje cechy odpowiadające tworzonemu przedmiotowi, na ogół ziemia, roślina lub drewno.

Wywyższenie (5.) Przedmiot jest metalowy i może zawierać powszechne minerały, takie jak skaleń lub kwarc. W wypadku użycia zaklęcia do wytworzenia metalowego obiektu, zyskuje ono cechę metal.

Creative Splash.name: Creative Splash
Creative Splash.description:
A deluge of paint or colorful illusions descend on the area, reflecting your personal creative specialty. Roll [[/r 1d4 #Creative Splash]] to determine the color of the illusion. Each creature in the area must succeed at a Will save or take the effect listed on the table for the color.

1k4ColorPorażkaKrytyczna Porażka
1White@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} for 1 roundDazzled for 1 minute
2Red@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 1} for 1 round@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 2} for 1 round
3Yellow@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1}@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2}
4Blue@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1} for 1 round@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 2} for 1 round

Crescent Scepter.name: Crescent Scepter
Crescent Scepter.description:
You hold up any object, which takes on the appearance of glowing regalia in the eyes of those who look on you, representing the political or religious institute most feared by each creature. If a creature attempts to attack you during the spell's duration, it must attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature is unaffected.

Sukces The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1}, the penalty applying to its attack roll.

Porażka As success, but @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2}.

Crimson Breath.name: Crimson Breath
Crimson Breath.description:
You turn a creature toward you and exhale a blast of crimson mist from your mouth, exposing the target to a toxic miasma. The effects are determined by the creature's Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target takes 8k6 poison damage.

Porażka The target is afflicted with breath of the mantis god poison at stage 1.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is afflicted with breath of the mantis god poison at stage 2.

Breath of the Mantis God

Rzut Obronny @Check[fortitude|dc:29]

Maksymalny Czas Trwania 6 minutes

Stadium 1 3k6 persistent bleed and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 1} (1 minuta)

Stadium 2 3k8 persistent bleed and drained 1 (1 minuta)

Stadium 3 3k10 persistent bleed and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 2} (1 minuta)

Crisis of Faith.name: Kryzys Wiary
Crisis of Faith.description:
Uderzasz w wiarę celu, przepełniając istotę wątpliwościami i mentalnemu zamętowi, zadając 6k6 obrażeń mentalnych lub 6k8 obrażeń mentalnych jeśli cel może rzucać zaklęcia boskie. Efekty zaklęcia są określane na podstawie rzutu obronnego Woli.

W oczach wielu bóstw, rzucenie tego zaklęcia na wyznawcę twojego bóstwa bez istotnego powodu, stanowi anatemę.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Cel odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia, jeśli cel może rzucać zaklęcia boskie, staje się @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 1} na 1 rundę.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia. Staje się @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 1} na 1 rundę i nie może rzucać zaklęć boskich przez 1 rundę.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6 (lub o 2k8 jeśli cel jest użytkownikiem magii boskiej).

Croak Voice.name: Croak Voice
Croak Voice.description:
You cause the target creature's vocal chords to swell like those of a frog. The target must attempt a Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target's voice becomes hoarse, and speaking becomes painful. Whenever it uses an action that has the auditory trait or attempts to Cast a Spell that doesn't have the subtle trait, it must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:5] or the action is lost. Once per round, the target can spend an Interact action to massage its throat, attempting a Fortitude save against your spell DC. On a success, the spell ends.

Porażka As success, but using an action with the auditory trait also deals 2k10 mental damage to the target as the sound of its distorted voice grates on its ears.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the damage for using an action with the auditory trait is doubled, and the target can't use an Interact action to attempt a Fortitude save to end the effect early.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage for using an action with the auditory trait increases by 1k10.

Crusade.name: Crusade
Crusade.description:
You issue a divine mandate or proclaim a cause to the targets. It can be to attain an item, claim a patch of land, slay a creature, war with a group, or be entirely peaceful. Your cause can't force the targets to harm one another or themselves. The targets become completely dedicated to that cause, depending on their levels. They choose their own actions, but they favor direct action over inaction or indirect action.

  • 13. or Lower The target is so dedicated to the cause that it pursues the cause to the death (unless you say otherwise).
  • 14. The target is dedicated to the cause, but the spell ends for the target if it's reduced to half its maximum Hit Points or fewer.
  • 15. As 14., plus the target can attempt a Will save at the end of each of its turns to end the spell for itself.

The spell ends for all creatures if you or one of your allies uses a hostile action against a target, or when the cause is completed. The GM might determine this spell has alignment traits befitting the cause.

Wywyższenie (10.) The level for each category increases by 2.

Crushing Ground.name: Crushing Ground
Crushing Ground.description:
You tear open the ground then slam it shut. The target creature takes 2k6 bludgeoning damage with a Reflex save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Cel odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda}, and takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to Speed.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia and is off-guard and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony}. It can attempt to Escape against your spell DC. If it doesn't Escape, the target takes an additional 2k6 bludgeoning damage when the spell ends.

Wywyższenie (+1) Increase the initial damage and additional damage by 2k6.

Cry of Destruction.name: Cry of Destruction
Cry of Destruction.description:
Your voice booms, smashing what's in front of you. Each creature and unattended object in the area takes 1k8 sonic damage. If you already dealt damage to an enemy this turn with a Strike or spell, increase the damage dice from this spell to k12s.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k8.

Cup of Dust.name: Cup of Dust
Cup of Dust.description:
You curse the target with a thirst no drink can quench. You can Dismiss the spell. The target must attempt a Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune for 1 hour.

Sukces The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Wyczerpany} for 1 round.

Porażka The creature is immediately afflicted by thirst as if it hadn't had a drink in days. It becomes Fatigued and takes 1k4 damage each hour that can't be healed until it quenches its thirst. No amount of drinking can quench the creature's thirst during the spell's duration.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure but the creature takes 2k4 damage each hour.

Wywyższenie (+3) The thirst becomes more unbearable, increasing the damage each hour by 1k4, or by 2k4 on a critical failure.

Curse of Calamity.name: Curse of Calamity
Curse of Calamity.description:
You condemn your targets to violent misfortune. At the GM's discretion, you can target a group of individuals within range who serve the same cause, such as a nation's army, or who have a shared identity, such as members of a single faith. You can also choose to target a settlement that's a village or town, or a neighborhood community within a larger settlement.

Krytyczny Sukces As success, and the targets experience extreme accidents that threaten life, limb, or other loss. The GM adjudicates these occurrences on a case-by-case basis, but in general, the population experiences a disturbing rise in unfortunate casualties.

Sukces The targets experience misfortune during even routine tasks that result in minor injuries. This bad luck increases when you're close; the first time each round a target within 15 feet of you attempts an attack roll or skill check, they must roll twice and use the worse result.

Porażka The ritual has no effect.

Krytyczna Porażka You unwittingly curse yourself. For the next 24 hours, each caster must roll all attack rolls and skill checks twice and use the worse result.

Curse of Death.name: Curse of Death
Curse of Death.description:
Your patron wraps a hand around your target's heart. The target must attempt a Fortitude saving throw. Regardless of the result, the target is temporarily immune to all curses of death for 1 day.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected.

Sukces The target is afflicted with the curse of death at stage 1, and the stage of the curse can't increase beyond stage 1.

Porażka The target is afflicted with the curse of death at stage 1.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is afflicted with the curse of death at stage 2

Curse of Death (curse, death, void) This curse ends when the spell ends

Stadium 1 @Damage[(max(4,(@item.rank)-1))d6[void]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Wyczerpany} (1 runda)

Stadium 2 @Damage[(max(8,@item.rank+3))d6[void]] damage and fatigued (1 runda)

Stadium 3 @Damage[(max(12,@item.rank+7))d6[void]] damage and fatigued (1 runda)

Stadium 4 death

Wywyższenie (+1) Increase the void damage taken on a success and during the first three stages of the curse by 1k6.

Curse of Lost Time.name: Curse of Lost Time
Curse of Lost Time.description:
You curse the target with rapid aging or erosion. The effect depends on whether the target is an object, a construct, or a living creature. Artifacts, along with objects and constructs made of precious materials (as determined by the GM), are immune.

  • Object If the object is attended, its bearer can attempt a Fortitude save. If the bearer fails or the object is unattended, the object immediately takes 4k6 damage (applying Hardness normally) and the item is cursed with an unlimited duration. Until the curse ends, the item becomes shoddy and can't be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.bT3skovyLUtP22ME]{Repaired}, and the curse attempts to counteract any spell that would restore the object's Hit Points. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SUKaxVZW2TlM8lu0]{Ulżenie w Dolegliwości} can target an item affected by this spell.
  • Construct The construct takes 4k6 damage (basic Fortitude save). On a failure, for 1 hour the construct is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1}, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 1}, and can't be Repaired, and the curse attempts to counteract any spell that would restore the construct's Hit Points. On a critical failure, these effects have an unlimited duration.
  • Living Creature The living creature must attempt a Fortitude save. Ageless creatures are immune.
    • Krytyczny Sukces The living creature is unaffected.
    • Sukces The living creature briefly ages, becoming clumsy 1 and enfeebled 1 for 1 round.
    • Porażka As success, with a duration of 1 hour.
    • Krytyczna Porażka As success, with an unlimited duration.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k6.
Curse of Lost Time.target: 1 Large or smaller object, construct, or living creature

Curse of the Spirit Orchestra.name: Curse of the Spirit Orchestra
Curse of the Spirit Orchestra.description:
You summon an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialny}, insubstantial group of extraplanar musicians who follow the target and play distracting music to hinder its actions. The music the musicians play is as inappropriate to the action as possible (for example, loud drumbeats as the target tries to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Przekradanie Się} or silly children's songs when the target tries to orate in a serious manner). The musicians can't be reasoned with or harmed.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Until the start of your next turn, the target must roll twice and use the worse result when it attempts a Diplomacy, Intimidation, Performance, or Stealth check. When the target rolls a critical success on any skill check, it gets a success instead. When the target rolls a failure on any skill check, it gets a critical failure instead.

Porażka As success, but the duration is 1 hour.

Krytyczna Porażka As success, but the duration is unlimited.

Cursed Metamorphosis.name: Cursed Metamorphosis
Cursed Metamorphosis.description:
You transform the target creature into a harmless animal appropriate to the area, with effects based on its Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target's body gains minor features of the harmless animal. Its insides churn as they partially transform, causing it to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1}. When it recovers from the sickened condition, its features revert to normal.

Porażka The target transforms for 1 minute but keeps its mind. If it spends all its actions on its turn concentrating on its original form, it can attempt a @Check[will] save to end the effect immediately.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is transformed into the chosen harmless animal, body and mind, for an unlimited duration.

Cutting Eye.name: Cutting Eye
Cutting Eye.description:
Aktywator You are the target of an attack or must attempt a saving throw against a spell.

Your eyes open enviously, stealing the power of an opponent for yourself. You are not @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda} to the attacker or spellcaster until the beginning of your next turn. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your AC against the triggering attack or a +2 circumstance bonus to the triggering save.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.tlbv3TAD2xPDFnAf]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Cutting Eye}
Cutting Eye.requirements: You're aware of the attack or spell.

Cutting Insult.name: Cutting Insult
Cutting Insult.description:
You utter an insult so offensive that it cuts your target to the quick. Your target takes @Damage[4d6[mental]] damage and 1 persistent bleed damage and must attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature takes half mental damage but no persistent bleed damage, and it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1}.

Porażka The creature takes full mental damage and full persistent bleed damage, and it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2}.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature takes double mental damage and double persistent bleed damage, and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 3}.

Wywyższenie (+2) The mental damage increases by 4k6, and the bleed damage increases by 1.

Cycle of Retribution.name: Cycle of Retribution
Cycle of Retribution.description:
An understanding of how violence begets more violence fills your target, causing it mental anguish when it attempts to take violent actions. The target must attempt a Will saving throw.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The next time the target takes a hostile action, the target takes 1k4 mental damage; the spell's duration then ends.

Porażka The first time in a round when the target takes a hostile action, the target takes 1k4 mental damage.

Krytyczna Porażka Each time the target takes a hostile action, the target takes 1k4 mental damage.

Wywyższenie (+1) The mental damage increases by 1k4.

Cyclone Rondo.name: Cyclone Rondo
Cyclone Rondo.description:
Playing or singing melodies discovered by the ancient Shory, you call up a whirlwind. When the whirlwind appears, each creature in its area must attempt a Reflex save or be knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}. The area of the whirlwind is difficult terrain.

The whirlwind grows harsher when you Sustain the Spell, moving up to 10 feet within your range and dealing each creature whose space it enters or passes through 4k6 damage with a basic Reflex save.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k6.

Daemon Form.name: Daemon Form
Daemon Form.description:
You infuse yourself with the corrupting death and pure malevolence of Abaddon, transforming into a Large daemon battle form. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. When you cast this spell you choose either lacridaemon, leukodaemon, meladaemon, or venedaemon. The battle form is Medium if you choose lacridaemon or venedaemon. While in this form, you gain the daemon and fiend traits. You have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 21 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 15 temporary Hit Points and weakness 5 to holy.
  • A +2 status bonus to all saving throws against death effects.
  • Resistance 10 to poison.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +21, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +23, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of Daemon you choose:

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.uStjY2mD6seP1K7I]{Lacridaemon} Speed 25 feet, fly 40 feet resistance 10 to cold

    • Melee 1 jaws (magical, unholy), Damage 1k8+12 piercing plus 1k6 cold and 1k4 poison
    • Melee 1 claw (agile, magical, unholy), Damage 1k6+12 slashing plus 1k6 cold.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.ScF0ECWnfXMHYLDL]{Leukodaemon} Speed 25 feet, fly 40 feet +2 status bonus to saves against diseases

    • Melee 1 jaws (magical, reach 10 feet, unholy), Damage 2k10+12 piercing
    • Melee 1 claw (agile, magical, reach 10 feet, unholy), Damage 2k6+12 slashing;
    • Ranged 1 composite longbow (deadly 1k10, magical, propulsive, range increment 100 feet, unholy, volley), Damage 2k8+12 piercing.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.zIRnnuj4lARq43DA]{Meladaemon} Speed 25 feet, fly 40 feet

    • Melee 1 jaws (magical, reach 10 feet, unholy), Damage 2k10+12 piercing
    • Melee 1 claw (agile, magical, reach 10 feet, unholy, void), Damage 1k6+12 slashing plus 1k6 void, and you can spend an action after a hit to attempt to Grab the target.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.dy4neJZ1g1XQnUZL]{Venedaemon} Speed 25 feet sense magical items and active spells within 60 feet as an imprecise sense

    • Melee 1 tentacle (agile, magical, reach 10 feet, unholy), Damage 2k6+12 bludgeoning.

Daemonic Pact.name: Daemonic Pact
Daemonic Pact.description:
You call upon the powers of Abaddon to grant you the assistance of a daemon. You call upon a daemon whose level can be no more than double daemonic pact's spell rank, two daemons whose levels are each at least 2 less than double the spell rank, or three daemons whose levels are each at least 3 less than double the spell rank.

Krytyczny Sukces You conjure the daemon or daemons, and they require nothing in return for their service.

Sukces You conjure the daemon or daemons, who serve you willingly, but require a sacrifice in the form of spilled blood (either another creature's or your own).

Porażka You don't conjure any daemons.

Krytyczna Porażka You don't conjure any daemons, and the self-sacrifice required to perform the ritual leaves you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 2} if the spell rank is 5 or higher).
Daemonic Pact.primarycheck: Religion (expert; you must be a daemon or an urdefhan)

Dance of Darkness.name: Dance of Darkness
Dance of Darkness.description:
You dance, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Striding} up to half your Speed. At either the start or end of your Stride, you create an area of magical darkness in a 10-foot burst centered on your location. This area is filled with magical darkness that works the same way as that created by a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4GE2ZdODgIQtg51c]{Ciemność} spell of the same rank. When you create the darkness, attempt a Performance check to dance, with a standard DC for your level, to determine the duration of the darkness.

Krytyczny Sukces 1 minute

Sukces 2 rund

Porażka 1 runda

Dancing Blade.name: Dancing Blade
Dancing Blade.description:
You telekinetically animate a weapon that's unattended or on your person. It brandishes itself at a foe of your choice as if wielded by an invisible duelist. When you first @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast the Spell}, the weapon automatically flies to the target and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strikes}. It moves along with its target, always remaining within reach. Each time you Sustain the Spell, the weapon either Changes Partners or Strikes. The weapon's attacks use and contribute to your multiple attack penalty.

  • Change Partners Change the weapon's target to a different creature within 30 feet. The weapon flies to its new target.
  • Strike (attack) The weapon attacks its target using your spell attack roll. On a hit, the weapon deals 3k6 damage, of a type determined by the weapon (if the weapon has the versatile trait or can otherwise deal multiple types of damage, you choose each time you attack).

Wywyższenie (+2) The damage increases by 1k6.

Dancing Fountain.name: Dancing Fountain
Dancing Fountain.description:
Area 30-foot burst centered on you

Tapping the ground, you create a shallow pool of water that spreads over the affected area, and majestic sprays, jets, and mists of water erupt forth in a dazzling water show. When you Cast the Spell, and the first time each round you Sustain the spell, you can command the fountain to use one of the following displays, which is accompanied by a loud burst of music. The dancing fountain is somewhat fickle in its desire for novelty, meaning it can't be commanded to use the same display on two consecutive turns.

  • Chasing Jets A series of vertical jets shoot up in a chase sequence, forcing one creature within the fountain to move 15 feet in a direction of your choice unless it succeeds at a Reflex save against your spell DC. The fountain can't make a creature move outside its area.
  • Flashing Spray Diffuse fog fills the area of the emanation. All creatures within the fountain become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty}, and all creatures outside the fountain become concealed to creatures within it. The spray persists until the beginning of your next turn.
  • Power Rings The fountain blasts a series of rings of water into the air that land with a crash in a @Template[burst|distance:10] centered on a location of your choice within the fountain. The falling torrent deals @Damage[10d6[bludgeoning]] damage to all creatures within the burst (basic Reflex).

Dancing Shield.name: Dancing Shield
Dancing Shield.description:
You levitate the touched shield and orbit it around a nearby ally. When you Cast the Spell and Sustain the Spell, the shield uses the Raise a Shield action to protect the target creature.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.2KQSsrzUqAxSXOdd]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Dancing Shield}

Wywyższenie (4.) If you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Blok Tarczą} reaction, you can use your reaction to have the target shield use Shield Block when the target creature would take damage from a physical attack, in addition to the usual trigger. In this case, Shield Block protects the target creature, rather than you. Since the shield is using Shield Block and not you, additional effects or abilities that normally apply when you Shield Block don't apply.

Darkened Eyes.name: Darkened Eyes
Darkened Eyes.description:
You infuse a creature's vision with darkness. After attempting its save, the target becomes temporarily immune for 24 hours.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target's darkvision or low-light vision is suppressed for 1 round.

Porażka As success, but the duration is 1 minute.

Krytyczna Porażka As success, but the duration is 1 minute, and the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiony} for the duration. It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns. If it succeeds, it's no longer Blinded, but its darkvision or low-light vision remains suppressed.

Darkened Forest Form.name: Darkened Forest Form
Darkened Forest Form.description:
Your apparition casts a feral shadow over your form. You can polymorph into any form listed in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gfPjmG6Fe6D3MFjl]{Postać Szkodnika}. When you transform into a form granted by a spell, you gain all the effects of the form you chose from a version of the spell heightened to darkened forest form's rank. Each time you Sustain this Spell, you can choose to change to a different shape from those available via any of the associated spells.

Wywyższenie (2nd) You can also transform into the forms listed in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wp09USMB3GIW1qbp]{Postać Zwierzęcia}.

Wywyższenie (5th) You can also transform into the forms listed in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.1K6AYGisvo9gqdhs]{Elemental Form}.

Darkened Sight.name: Darkened Sight
Darkened Sight.description:
You infuse a creature's vision with darkness. It receives greater darkvision, allowing it to see even in magical darkness.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.znWiM5RYLvf8STmR]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Darkened Sight}

Darklight.name: Darklight
Darklight.description:
Shadows pour forth from your eyes, creating a field of darkness that prevents light from emanating within the area. Light doesn't enter the area; any non-magical light sources, such as a torches or lanterns, don't emanate any light while inside the area, even if their light radius would extend beyond the darkness. The spell similarly suppresses magical light of the spell's rank or lower.

Light can't pass through, so creatures in the area can't see outside. Even creatures with darkvision (but not greater darkvision) can barely see through the darkness; any creatures seen through the darkness are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} to them. Creatures with greater darkvision can see through the darkness normally.

Creatures who move into the field or start their turn within the field have some of the life and light sucked out of them, taking 2k6 bludgeoning damage and 2k6 void damage, with a basic Fortitude save.

When you cast this spell, choose up to four allies in the area to spare from darklight's effects. Until the spell ends, they're immune to damage from darklight spells and can see through darklight (but not other darkness) as though they had greater darkvision.

Wywyższenie (10.) The bludgeoning and void damage both increase to 3k6.

Darkness.name: Ciemność
Darkness.description:
Tworzysz całun ciemności, który zapobiega przenikaniu światła przez obszar oraz opuszczaniu go. Światło nie wkracza do wewnątrz tego obszaru a wszelkie niemagiczne źródła światła, takie jak pochodnie czy latarnie, nie roztaczają żadnego światła tak długo jak znajdują się w obszarze — nawet jeśli ich promień ich światła wykraczałby poza ciemność. Przytłumia to również magiczne światła w obszarze o kręgu równym lub niższym od kręgu twojej ciemności. Jako, że światło nie dociera do obszaru, znajdujące się w nim istoty nie mogą dojrzeć otaczającej przestrzeni. Z zewnątrz zaklęcie wygląda jak sfera czystej ciemności.

Wywyższenie (4.) Nawet istoty z widzeniem w ciemności (ale nie lepszym widzeniem w ciemności) mogą ledwie przejrzeć przez tę ciemność. Traktują one cele obserwowane przez ciemność jako @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięte}.

Darkvision.name: Widzenie w Ciemności
Darkvision.description:
Zapewniasz sobie nadnaturalną zdolność do postrzegania miejsc leżących w mroku. Zyskujesz Widzenie w Ciemności.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.IXS15IQXYCZ8vsmX]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Widzenie w Ciemności}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.inNfTmtWpsxeGBI9]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Widzenie w Ciemności (24 godziny)}

Wywyższenie (3.) Zaklęcie ma zasięg dotyku oraz obejmuje za cel 1 godzącą się istotę.

Wywyższenie (5.) Zaklęcie ma zasięg dotyku oraz obejmuje za cel 1 godzącą się istotę. Czas trwania zaklęcia wydłuża się do twoich następnych codziennych przygotowań.

Dawnflower's Light.name: Dawnflower's Light
Dawnflower's Light.description:
The object glows with soft golden light that lays bare the truth, reveals hidden objects, and shines supernatural light on false orders. The object casts bright light in a 60-foot radius (and dim light for the next 60 feet). Within the area of bright light, Perception checks to locate hidden objects (including secret doors but not traps), Will saves to resist visual illusions, and Will saves to resist effects placed by evil creatures that inflict the controlled condition all gain a +2 status bonus. This light suppresses magical darkness of your Dawnflower's light spell's rank or lower.

Finally, the supernatural light created by this spell is similar to sunlight, and while it can't damage creatures normally harmed by sunlight, it does make them uncomfortable so that they suffer a –2 status penalty to saves versus fear effects while in the area of bright light.

Wywyższenie (7.) Premia statusowa zwiększa się do +3.

Wywyższenie (9.) Premia statusowa zwiększa się do +4.
Dawnflower's Light.target: 1 unattended, non-magical object of 1 Bulk or less

Day's Weight.name: Day's Weight
Day's Weight.description:
You fast-forward time for a single creature, burdening it with the aches and pain of an entire day and making it temporarily tired and weak. Istota musi wykonać rzut obronny Krzepy.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Wyczerpany} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 1} for 1 round.

Porażka The target is fatigued and enfeebled 1 for the duration.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is fatigued and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 2} for the duration. The fatigued condition doesn't end when the spell's duration does (but can still be removed with a night's rest or by similar means).

Wywyższenie (6.) Możesz obrać za cel do 10 istot.

Daydreamer's Curse.name: Klątwa Marzyciela
Daydreamer's Curse.description:
Nakładasz na cel klątwę, która powoduje u niego łatwe rozpraszanie się i niemożność skupienia myśli na zadaniach wymagających pełnej uwagi czy wnikliwości. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Przez 10 minut cel zaklęcia musi rzucać dwa razy i wybierać niższy wynik, kiedy podejmuje się testu Medycyny, Przyrody, Percepcji czy Sztuki Przetrwania. Jeśli cel odniesie krytyczny sukces na teście Percepcji lub teście umiejętności na rzecz wykonywania akcji z cechą koncentracja, uzyskuje zamiast tego sukces.

Porażka Jak sukces, ale efekt jest permanentny.

Krytyczna Porażka Jak porażka, ale cel traktuje wszystkie wyniki testów z cechą koncentracja, jako jeden stopień sukcesu gorsze od wyrzuconego (krytyczny sukces staje się sukcesem, sukces staje się porażką a porażka staje się krytyczną porażką).

Daze.name: Otumanienie
Daze.description:
Wdzierasz się do umysłu celu i otumaniasz go mentalnym impulsem. Impuls zadaje 1k6 obrażeń mentalnych z podstawowym rzutem obronnym Woli. Jeśli cel odniesie w tym rzucie krytyczną porażkę, jest dodatkowo @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1}.

Wywyższenie (+2) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k6.

Dazzling Flash.name: Dazzling Flash
Dazzling Flash.description:
You raise your religious symbol and create a blinding flash of light. Każda istota w obszarze musi wykonać rzut obronny Krzepy.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} for 1 round.

Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiony} for 1 round and Dazzled for 1 minute. The creature can spend an Interact action rubbing its eyes to end the Blinded condition.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is Blinded for 1 round and Dazzled for 1 hour.

Wywyższenie (3.) The area increases to a 30-foot cone.

Deafness.name: Deafness
Deafness.description:
The target loses hearing; it must attempt a Fortitude save. The target is then temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Ogłuchły} for 1 round.

Porażka The target is Deafened for 10 minutes.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is Deafened permanently.

Death Knell.name: Death Knell
Death Knell.description:
You snuff the life out of a creature on the brink of death. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli. If this kills it, you gain 10 temporary HP and a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls for 10 minutes.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Umierający} value increases by 1.

Porażka The target dies.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.98XT2QUk6wvXIqf7]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Death Knell}

Death Ward.name: Ochrona Przed Śmiercią
Death Ward.description:
You shield a creature from the ravages of void energy.

It receives a +4 status bonus to saves against death and void effects, gains void resistance 10, and suppresses the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Zgubiony} condition.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.s6CwkSsMDGfUmotn]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Death Ward}

Death's Call.name: Death's Call
Death's Call.description:
Aktywator A living creature within 20 feet of you dies, or an undead creature within 20 feet of you is destroyed.

Seeing another pass from this world invigorates you. You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the triggering creature's level plus your spellcasting attribute modifier. If the triggering creature was undead, double the number of temporary Hit Points you gain. These last for the duration of the spell, and the spell ends if all the temporary Hit Points are depleted earlier.

Deathless March.name: Deathless March
Deathless March.description:
You chant a marching song of Yled to empower the undead and terrify the living. Undead creatures within the area gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Przyspieszony} condition for 1 minute, which they can use only to Stride.

Living creatures in the area must attempt a Will save. This gains the emotion, fear, and mental traits for living creatures.

Krytyczny Sukces Efekt nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1}.

Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2}.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 3} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Sparaliżowany} for 1 round.

Debilitating Dichotomy.name: Debilitating Dichotomy
Debilitating Dichotomy.description:
You reveal a glimpse of the impossible conflicts between the divine anathema behind your curse, forcing you to reckon with another's conflicts as well.

You and the target each take 9k6 mental damage with a basic Will save, and the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1} if it critically fails its save. You get a degree of success one better than you rolled for your saving throw.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 3k6.

Debilitating Terror.name: Debilitating Terror
Debilitating Terror.description:
You fill the target's mind with terrifying images to disrupt their combat focus. The target must attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected.

Sukces The target takes a –1 circumstance penalty to attack and damage rolls against you.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.sipLHLOyS7sQ0KQV]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Debilitating Terror}

Porażka The target can't use hostile actions against you.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1} and can't use hostile actions against you.

Deceiver's Cloak.name: Deceiver's Cloak
Deceiver's Cloak.description:
Your patron drapes a cloak of illusion about you, making you appear as another creature of the same body shape with roughly similar height and weight as yourself. This has the effects of a 3. kręgu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Illusory Disguise}.

Wywyższenie (6.) You can appear as any creature of the same size, even with a completely different body shape.

Deep Breath.name: Głęboki Wdech
Deep Breath.description:
Bierzesz niebywale błęboki wdech i wstrzymujesz powietrze na czas trwania zaklęcia. Nie tracisz powietrza kiedy zostaniesz uderzony, ale tracisz całe wstrzymane powietrze kiedy się odezwiesz (wliczając w to Rzucanie Zaklęcia). To zaklęcie nie wytwarza powietrza; jeśli nie masz czym oddychać w momencie jego rzucania nie odnosi ono efektu.

Wywyższenie (2.) Czas trwania zwiększa się do 1 godziny i tracisz tylko 10 minut powietrza kiedy się odezwiesz.

Wywyższenie (4.) Czas trwania zwiększa się do 8 godzin i tracisz tylko 10 minut powietrza kiedy się odezwiesz.

Deep Sight.name: Deep Sight
Deep Sight.description:
Your eyes darken until they become entirely pitch black. You grant yourself the ability to see in the darkness. You gain darkvision. If you already have darkvision, you gain greater darkvision.

Wywyższenie (7.) The duration is until the next time you make daily preparations.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.UAiaJYUDLtLToRUU]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Deep Sight}

Dehydrate.name: Odwodnienie
Dehydrate.description:
Rozpalasz wewnętrzny ogień we wszelkim stworzeniu wokół, usuwając z niego wilgoć. Wszystkie istoty w obszarze odnoszą przewlekłe 1k6 obrażeń od ognia z podstawowym rzutem obronnym Krzepy. Istoty z cechami woda lub roślina odnoszą na tym rzucie stopień sukcesu o jeden niższy od wyrzuconego. Zaklęcie kończy się dla istoty w momencie kiedy przestanie odnosić przewlekłe obrażenia.

Istota pod wpływem odwodnienia wykonuje dodatkowy rzut obronny Krzepy przed końcem swojej tury, zanim rzuci rzut na zakończenie obrażeń przewlekłych. Może pominąć ten rzut, jeśli spożyła w przeciągu ostatniej rundy wodę lub podobny nawadniający płyn (wypicie takiej cieczy to na ogół jedna akcja).

Sukces Istota nie ponosi żadnego dodatkowego efektu.

Porażka Istota jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiona 1} do końca swojej następnej tury.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiona 2} do końca swojej następnej tury.

Wywyższenie (+2) Zasięg zwiększa się o 10 stóp, wybuch zwiększa się o 5 stóp a przewlekłe obrażenia od ognia zwiększają się o 3k6.

Deity's Strike.name: Deity's Strike
Deity's Strike.description:
A manifested version of your deity's favored weapon appears in the air above and attacks the target, using your spell attack roll. On a hit, the weapon deals 7k12 force damage, or double damage on a critical hit.

After the attack, whether it succeeds or fails, divine energy bursts from the weapon in a shock wave. It emits in a @Template[line|distance:30|width:10]{10-foot-wide, 30-foot-long line} starting from the target and continuing in a direction you choose. Choose an alignment your deity has (chaotic, evil, good, or lawful). Your target and any other creatures within the area of the spell take @Damage[(ternary(gte(@item.rank,9),6,5))d6[spirit]|shortLabel] damage of the chosen alignment type, with a basic Reflex save. The spell gains the trait of the alignment you choose. If your deity is true neutral, the weapon doesn't create a shock wave.

Wywyższenie (9.) The force damage increases by 1k12 and the alignment damage increases by 1k6.

Delay Affliction.name: Delay Affliction
Delay Affliction.description:
With a surge of healing energy, you push back against an affliction threatening the target and grant a small amount of healing. The target recovers 3k8 Hit Points.

You attempt to counteract any one affliction you are aware the target has, suspending its effects for 1 hour on a success rather than removing it.

The target is then temporarily immune to delay affliction for 1 day. You don't need to have identified the name of the specific affliction, but you do need to be aware of it; for instance, you couldn't delay an ingested poison during its onset period unless you were aware of the poison

Wywyższenie (+1) The target recovers an additional 1k8 Hit Points, and you can attempt to suspend an additional affliction

Delay Consequence.name: Delay Consequence
Delay Consequence.description:
Aktywator A creature or object within range is hit by an attack.

You transpose the moment that the target would be injured to a point later in its timestream. Roll damage normally, but do not reduce Hit Points or apply any other effects of the attack until the spell's duration has elapsed. When the spell ends, the target is immediately affected by the attack, taking damage and being affected by any additional effects. You can Dismiss this spell.

Deluge.name: Deluge
Deluge.description:
You unleash a catastrophic downpour in the area that vanishes an instant later. All flying creatures in the area descend 50 feet or until blocked by the ground or firm surface. Each creature whose descent was blocked by the ground or firm surface takes bludgeoning damage equal to the number of feet it fell (the creature does not also take falling damage) and is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}. Creatures on the ground, including flying creatures forced to the ground by the spell, must succeed at a Reflex save or be pushed 50 feet away from the center of the area.

Flimsy structures in the area collapse. The GM can determine other large-scale effects that result from the deluge.

Wywyższenie (+1) The area increases by 10 feet, and flying creatures fall an additional 10 feet.

Delusional Pride.name: Delusional Pride
Delusional Pride.description:
You make the target overconfident, leading it to ascribe failure to external factors. The target attempts a Will save to determine the spell's duration and is temporarily immune for 24 hours regardless of the save's result.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The duration is 1 round. If the target fails at an attack roll or skill check, it takes a –1 status penalty to attack rolls and skill checks until the end of its turn (or the end of its next turn, if it attempted the roll outside its turn). If the creature fails a second time while taking this penalty, the penalty increases to –2.

Porażka As success, but the duration is 10 minutes.

Krytyczna Porażka As success, but the duration is 24 hours.

Demon Form.name: Demon Form
Demon Form.description:
You corrupt yourself with the sin of the Outer Rifts, transforming into a Medium demon battle form. When you cast this spell, choose abrikandilu, brimorak, kithangian, or vloriak. If you choose kithangian, the battle form is Large and you must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. While in this form, you gain the demon and fiend traits. You have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 20 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 30 temporary Hit Points, weakness 5 to cold iron, and weakness 5 to holy.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +22, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your attack modifier is higher for the given unarmed attack or weapon, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +23, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of demon you choose:

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.BIIYUbCsJxb0P8gm]{Abrikandilu} Speed 25 feet;

    • Melee 1 jaws (magical, unholy), Damage 2k6+12 piercing, and clumsy 1 for 1 minute on a critical hit;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile, magic, unholy), Damage 2k6+12 slashing;
    • Ranged1 hurled debris (range increment 20 feet, unholy), Damage 2k6+6 bludgeoning.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.LzsCQ1mRnPYDzNpo]{Brimorak} Speed 30 feet;

    • Melee 1 flaming sword (magical, unholy), Damage 2k8+10 slashing plus 1k6 fire;
    • Melee 1 hoof (agile, unholy), Damage 2k4+10 bludgeoning plus 1k6 fire.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.IVAPEtALVgSNOBdk]{Kithangian} Speed 30 feet;

    • Melee 1 pincer (magical, reach 10 feet, unholy), Damage 1k12+12 slashing, and you can spend an action after a hit to attempt to Grab the target
    • Melee 1 stinger (agile, magical, reach 10 feet, unholy), Damage 1k8+12 piercing; all melee Strikes deal 2k6 additional precision damage to animals.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.jUUFipVlyAYEBFNI]{Vloriak} Speed 25 feet; resistance 10 to acid;

    • Melee 1 claw (unholy), Damage 2k6+12 piercing plus 1k6 spirit;
    • Melee 1 tongue (agile, reach 10 feet, unholy), Damage 1k6+12 acid plus 1k6 spirit.

Demonic Pact.name: Demonic Pact
Demonic Pact.description:
You call in a favor from one demon of level 2 or lower, two demons of level 0 or lower, or three demons of level –1 or lower.

Krytyczny Sukces You conjure the demon or demons. They are eager to pursue the task, so they don't ask for a favor.

Sukces You conjure the demon or demons. They are not eager to pursue the task, so they require a favor in return.

Porażka You don't conjure any demons.

Krytyczna Porażka The demon or demons are angry that you disturbed them. They appear before you, but they immediately attack you.
