Wywyższenie (+1) Increase the level of demon you call by 2 for each option.
Demonic Pact.primarycheck: Religion (expert; you must be a demon)

Desiccate.name: Desiccate
Desiccate.description:
You pull the moisture from the targets' bodies, dealing 10k10 void damage. Creatures made of water (such as water elementals) and plant creatures use the outcome for one degree of success worse than the result of their saving throw. Creatures whose bodies contain no significant moisture (such as earth elementals) are immune to desiccate.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k10.

Desperate Repair.name: Desperate Repair
Desperate Repair.description:
Aktywator A shield within range would be reduced to 0 Hit Points by a damaging effect

Wymagania The triggering shield had more than 1 Hit Point before taking damage.

You hold a shield together with the power of your magic, forcing wood and steel to fuse back together. The shield remains at 1 Hit Point and isn't destroyed. Its construction is weakened until someone takes the time to repair it, preventing desperate repair or a similar ability from saving the same shield until your next daily preparations.

Destroy Mindscape.name: Destroy Mindscape
Destroy Mindscape.description:
After you gather the anchors that make up the mindscape's structure, or in the case of anchors too immense to move, when you gain control over the region surrounding the anchors, you can perform this ritual to tear the mindscape apart from within. The ritual takes but a day to attempt, so those who would oppose such a destructive doom would do well to challenge the enemy by doing what they can to protect their mindscape's anchors. At the GM's discretion, the most powerful of mindscapes, such as those created by a deity, might be immune to this ritual's effects.

Over the course of this ritual's casting, you and the secondary casters unravel the basic and fundamental ideas of the mindscape's anchors. As you do so, flashes of memory tied to the anchor you target flood your mind, before the anchor itself dissipates. The mindscape might react with hostility to this process, manifesting creatures or swaying primary inhabitants to stop you. Regardless of how many anchors in all must be dismantled, it always takes a day to perform this ritual.

Krytyczny Sukces The mindscape is destroyed, and you and the secondary casters are returned to the plane from which you hailed before entering the mindscape.

Sukces The mindscape is destroyed, but you and the secondary casters are scattered randomly to locations on other planes.

Porażka The mindscape is not destroyed, and you and the and the secondary casters are scattered randomly to locations on other planes.

Krytyczna Porażka The mindscape is not destroyed, and you and the secondary casters become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 3} and are then each plunged into separate mindscapes. You remain trapped therein until you engineer each of your own escapes. You forget the destroy mindscape ritual and must discover it again if you wish to pursue this goal once more.

Destructive Aura.name: Destructive Aura
Destructive Aura.description:
Swirling sands of divine devastation surround you, weakening the defenses of all they touch. Reduce the resistances of yourself and creatures in the area by 2.

Wywyższenie (+2) Reduce the resistances by an additional 2.

Detect Alignment.name: Detect Alignment
Detect Alignment.description:
Your eyes glow as you sense aligned auras. Choose chaotic, evil, good, or lawful. You detect auras of that alignment. You receive no information beyond presence or absence. You can choose not to detect creatures or effects you're aware have that alignment.

Only creatures of 6. level or higher-unless divine spellcasters, undead, or beings from the Outer Sphere-have alignment auras.

Wywyższenie (2.) You learn each aura's location and strength.

Detect Creator.name: Detect Creator
Detect Creator.description: You examine the remains or spiritual residue of a destroyed undead creature to locate that undead's creator, perhaps a necromancer or vampire. If the creator is within range, you can sense the direction to them. If the creator is within 100 feet, you sense their presence within 100 feet, and the spell ends; you can't further home in on their location. If there's lead or running water between you and the undead's creator, this spell can't locate them. This spell fails automatically if the undead doesn't have a specific creator or the specific creator isn't on the same plane.

Detect Magic.name: Wykrycie Magii
Detect Magic.description:
Wysyłasz impuls rejestrujący obecność magii. Nie otrzymujesz żadnych innych informacji poza obecnością lub nieobecnością magii. Możesz wybrać, że ignorujesz magię, której jesteś w pełni świadomy, taką jak magiczne przedmioty i trwające zaklęcia twoje i twoich sojuszników. Magię iluzji wykrywasz jedynie jeśli jej krąg jest mniejszy od kręgu twojego zaklęcia wykrycia magii. Natomiast przedmioty posiadające cechę iluzji ale nie będące zwodnicze w wyglądzie (takie jak @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.bikFUFRLwfdvX2x2]{Mikstura Niewidzialności}) na ogół wykrywane są normalnie.

Wywyższenie (3.) Dowiadujesz się kręgu lub poziomu najsilniejszego z magicznych efektów, które wykryłeś, co określa MG.

Wywyższenie (4.) Jak na kręgu 3. ale dodatkowo jesteś w stanie zlokalizować źródło najsilniejszej wykrytej magii. Tak jak w wypadku zmysłu nieprecyzyjnego nie poznajesz dokładnej lokalizacji, natomiast jesteś w stanie zawężyć lokalizację źródła magii do sześcianu o boku 5 stóp (najbliższego takiego sześcianu, jeśli efekt jest większy).

Detect Metal.name: Wykrycie Metalu
Detect Metal.description:
Zestrajasz się z polami magnetycznymi, zyskując zdolność do wyczuwania metalicznych obiektów, złóż i żył w obszarze. Możesz wybrać, że ignorujesz metal, którego jesteś w pełni świadomy, taki jak ekwipunek używany bądź noszony przez ciebie i twoich sojuszników.

Wykrywasz metal ukryty przez magię iluzji (taką jak @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Niewidzialność}) tylko jeśli iluzja jest niższego kręgu niż twoje zaklęcie wykrycia metalu. Przeciw zwodniczym iluzjom ukrywającym naturę przedmiotu, wykrycie metalu zawsze informuje o braku metalu przy niemetalicznych przedmiotach schowanych pod postacią metalowych obiektów. Jednakże jeśli iluzja polega na ukrywaniu jednego metalowego obiektu pod postacią innego metalowego obiektu, na przykład udając, że miedziana moneta jest zrobiona ze złota, wykrycie metalu wykrywa jedynie obecność metalu, nie jego typ, nawet jeśli krąg twojego wykrycia metalu jest wyższy od kręgu zastosowanej iluzji.

Wywyższenie (3.) Możesz rozróżniać między rodzajami wykrywanego metalu. Twoje zaklęcie może przezwyciężać zwodnicze iluzje ukrywające jeden metal pod postacią innego, jeśli krąg zastosowanej iluzji jest mniejszy od kręgu twojego zaklęcia wykrycia metalu.

Detect Poison.name: Detect Poison
Detect Poison.description:
You detect whether a creature is venomous or poisonous, or if an object is poison or has been poisoned. You do not ascertain whether the target is poisonous in multiple ways, nor do you learn the type or types of poison. Certain substances, like lead and alcohol, are poisons and so mask other poisons.

Wywyższenie (2.) You learn the number and types of poison.

Detect Scrying.name: Detect Scrying
Detect Scrying.description:
By reading trace auras, you detect the presence of scrying effects in the area. If detect scrying is higher rank than a scrying effect, you gain a glimpse of the scrying creature and learn its approximate distance and direction.

Wywyższenie (6.) The duration is until the next time you make your daily preparations.

Detonate Magic.name: Detonacja Magii
Detonate Magic.description: Sprawiasz, że znajdująca się wewnątrz celu magia rozprasza się w niszczycielskiej eksplozji. Próbujesz przeciwdziałać celowi. Jeśli próba się powiedzie, eksplozja magicznej mocy zadaje 8k6 obrażeń od mocy z podstawowym rzutem obronnym Refleksu. Jeśli pomyślnie przeciwdziałasz magii przedmiotu, jest on dezaktywowany na 1 tydzień (lub niszczony przy krytycznym sukcesie), a eksplozja jest emanacją 5 stóp wokół przedmiotu. Jeśli pomyślnie przeciwdziałasz zaklęciu, jego efekt kończy się, a eksplozja dotyka albo wszystkich istot w obszarze zaklęcia, albo celu zaklęcia i wszystkich istot w emanacji 5 stóp wokół niego.

Devil Form.name: Devil Form
Devil Form.description:
You bind yourself to the power of Hell, transforming into a Medium devil battle form. When you cast this spell, choosecoarti, levaloch, sarglagon, or vordine. If you choose levaloch or sarglagon, the battle form is Large and you must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. While in this form you gain the devil and fiend traits. You have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 22 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 5 temporary Hit Points, resistance 5 to physical damage (except silver), and weakness 5 to holy.
  • Resistance 10 to fire.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +20, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your attack modifier is higher for the given unarmed attack or weapon, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +23, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of devil you choose:

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.1t64Sf8wYsoo7iFt]{Coarti} Speed 25 feet, fly 40 feet;

    • Melee 1 morningstar (magical, unholy, versatile P), Damage 2k6+12 bludgeoning plus 1k6 spirit;
    • Melee 1 wing (agile, unholy, versatile P), Damage 1k6+12 bludgeoning plus 1k6 fire.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.LgqKCxm8A09WCLxm]{Levaloch} Speed 30 feet, climb 30 feet; +2 circumstance bonus to Fortitude DC against being Shoved and to other saving throws to resist being moved against your will;

    • Melee 1 trident (magical, unholy) Damage 2k8+10 piercing;
    • Ranged 1 trident (magical, thrown 20 feet, unholy), Damage 2k8+10 piercing; all melee Strikes deal 2k6 additional precision damage to clumsy, enfeebled, immobilized, or restrained creatures.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.fKeZDm8kpDFK5HWp]{Sarglagon} Speed 25 feet, fly 25 feet, swim 30 feet;

    • Melee 1 fangs (magical, unholy), Damage 2k10+10 piercing;
    • Melee 1 tentacle arm (agile, magical, unholy), Damage 1k8+10 bludgeoning plus 1k6 poison.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.0JPnBD7yzrmrbZ0m]{Vordine} Speed 25 feet;

    • Melee 1 trident (magical, unholy) Damage 2k8+12 piercing;
    • Melee 1 hoof (agile, magical, unholy), Damage 1k4+12 plus 1k6 fire;
    • Melee 1 whip (disarm, magical, nonlethal, reach 10 feet, trip, unholy), Damage 2k4+10 slashing;
    • Ranged 1 trident (magical, thrown 20 feet, unholy), Damage 2k8+12 piercing.

Devour Life.name: Devour Life
Devour Life.description: You attempt to utterly consume the target's life force. The target takes 60 void damage with a basic Fortitude save. If this damage reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, it dies immediately. You regain Hit Points equal to half the void damage the target takes (after applying resistance and the like). Any excess healing is gained as temporary Hit Points, which you lose after 1 minute.

Devouring Dark Form.name: Devouring Dark Form
Devouring Dark Form.description:
Your apparition's dark power blends with your physical body, allowing you to take on terrifying characteristics of creatures that lurk in dark places. Your arms and legs transform into twisting tentacles. You gain a tentacle unarmed attack with 10-foot reach that deals 1k8 bludgeoning damage and has the grapple trait. The first time you Sustain this spell each round, you can attempt a single @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Pochwycenie} check with your tentacle against a creature within its reach.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Le5Sewk43o7V60nO]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Devouring Dark Form}

Wywyższenie (2nd) You can choose to take on the shark battle form from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wp09USMB3GIW1qbp]{Postać Zwierzęcia} instead of gaining a tentacle unarmed attack, heightened to the same level as this vessel spell. When you do, this spell loses the morph trait and gains the polymorph trait. You can attempt a jaws unarmed Strike against a creature within your reach each time you Sustain this spell.

Wywyższenie (5th) You can choose to take on the water elemental battle form from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.1K6AYGisvo9gqdhs]{Elemental Form} instead of gaining a tentacle unarmed attack, heightened to the same level as this vessel spell. When you do, this spell loses the morph trait and gains the polymorph trait. You can attempt an unarmed attack Strike against a creature within your reach each time you Sustain this spell.

Devouring Void.name: Devouring Void
Devouring Void.description:
Countless tears in space appear in the area, like hungry mouths. When the spell is cast and the first time each round it's sustained, living creatures in its area take 7k8 void damage (basic Fortitude save). A living creature using a move action to leave the area must succeed at a @Check[reflex] save or their action is disrupted at the edge of the area.

Wywyższenie (+1) The void damage increases by 1k8.

Diabolic Edict.name: Diabolic Edict
Diabolic Edict.description:
You issue a diabolic edict, demanding the target perform a particular task and offering rewards for its fulfillment. It gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and skill checks related to performing the task. If it refuses to perform the task you proclaimed, it instead takes a –1 status penalty to all its attack rolls and skill checks.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.1kelGCsoXyGRqMd9]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Diabolic Edict}

Diabolic Pact.name: Czarci Pakt
Diabolic Pact.description:
Wystosowujesz żądanie wobec potężnego czarta, prosząc go o wysłanie części jego podwładnych na twoje usługi. Jeśli odniesiesz sukces, czart przysyła ci wedle swojego uznania jednego czarta o poziomie 2. lub niższym, dwa czarty o poziomie 0. lub niższym lub trzy czarty o poziomie –1. lub niższym.

Krytyczny Sukces Czarty są ci przysyłane i służą przez [[/gmr 1d4 #Tygodni]]{1k4 tygodni}.

Sukces Czarty są ci przysyłane i służą przez [[/gmr 1d4 #Dni]]{1k4 dni}.

Porażka Twoje żądanie zostaje odrzucone.

Krytyczna Porażka Twoje żądanie jest nie tylko odrzucane, lecz i potężny czart wysyła wieści o swoim rozczarowaniu do twojego pana.

Wywyższenie (+1) Zwiększ poziom czartów wysyłanych ci w każdym z wariantów o 2.

Diadem of Divine Radiance.name: Diadem of Divine Radiance
Diadem of Divine Radiance.description:
You don a diadem of radiant light, which sheds bright light to a range of 60 feet and dim light to a further 60 feet. When you Cast the Spell and when you Sustain it during the duration, you can draw a disc of spiraling light from the diadem and throw it at a creature within 120 feet. Make a ranged spell attack at mythic proficiency against the target's AC. This action has the attack and spirit traits. On a hit, you deal 4k8 spirit damage, 1k4 persistent spirit damage, and the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} for 1 round (3 rounds on a critical hit). The persistent damage isn't doubled on a critical hit.

If the disc passes through an area of magical darkness or targets a creature affected by magical darkness, the disc's glow attempts to counteract the darkness using your Religion or Occultism skill modifier as the counteract check modifier and half your level as the counteract rank.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Hc8e3aU9yLKPSw8o]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Diadem of Divine Radiance}

Wywyższenie (+2) The disc's spirit damage increases by 2k8, and the persistent damage increases by 1k4.

Diamond Dust.name: Diamond Dust
Diamond Dust.description:
You supercool the nearby air, forming a cloud of dancing ice crystals in an emanation around you. A creature other than you that enters the area or ends its turn within the area takes 2k6 cold damage. A creature can take this damage only once per turn. The crystals scatter and refract light; if a light effect enters diamond dust's area, any creatures targeted by that effect gain a +2 status bonus to AC and saves against it. While the spell persists, you can activate or deactivate this aura by Sustaining the spell. You can Dismiss this spell.

Wywyższenie (+2) The damage increases by 1k6.

Dim the Light.name: Dim the Light
Dim the Light.description:
Aktywator You cast a darkness or shadow spell.

You magnify the darkness from the triggering effect, causing the ambient light level to flicker briefly so you can slip from sight. You can immediately attempt a Stealth check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Schować Się}, and you can become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Schowany} to a creature even if you don't have cover and aren't otherwise concealed from that creature. You cease being hidden at the end of your turn unless you move into cover or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} before then.

Dimensional Assault.name: Dimensional Assault
Dimensional Assault.description: You tumble through space, making a short dimensional hop to better position yourself for an attack. Teleport to any square in range that's within reach of a creature, and then make a melee Strike against one creature within your reach.

Dimensional Excision.name: Dimensional Excision
Dimensional Excision.description:
You manipulate the boundaries between planes like a scalpel, using it to cut away portions of a creature's essence and banishing those portions to other realities and dimensions, afflicting the target deep lacerations or even severed appendages. The creature takes 14k10 damage (no damage type) and 2k10 persistent bleed damage and must attempt a Will save. If the target is not on its home plane, it takes a –4 status penalty to this save. A creature reduced to 0 HP has their entire body sectioned out and banished across multiple planes and dimensions, leaving nothing behind but their gear.

Wywyższenie (10th) The base damage increases by 2k10, and the persistent bleed damage by 1k10.

Dimensional Steps.name: Dimensional Steps
Dimensional Steps.description:
You teleport to a location up to 20 feet away within your line of sight.

Wywyższenie (+1) The distance you can teleport increases by 5 feet.

Dinosaur Form.name: Dinosaur Form
Dinosaur Form.description:
You channel the primal forces of nature to transform into a Large animal battle form, specifically that of a powerful and terrifying dinosaur. When you Cast this Spell, choose a listed battle form. You can decide the specific type of animal, but this has no effect on the form's Size or statistics. While in this form, you gain the animal and dinosaur traits. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 15 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +16, and your damage bonus is +9. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +18, unless your own is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the form you choose:

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.0Cyf07wboRp4CmcQ]{Ankylosaurus}
    • Speed 25 feet;
    • Melee 1 tail (backswing, reach 10 feet), Damage 2k6 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 foot, Damage 2k6 bludgeoning.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.KkDRRDuycXwKPa6n]{Brontosaurus}
    • Speed 25 feet;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 15 feet), Damage 2k6 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 foot, Damage 2k8 bludgeoning.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.oJbcmpBSHwmx6FD4]{Deinonychus}
    • Speed 40 feet;
    • Melee 1 talon (agile), Damage 2k4 piercing plus 1 persistent bleed;
    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 1k10 piercing.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.T6XnxvsgvvOrpien]{Stegosaurus}
    • Speed 30 feet;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 2k8 piercing.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.iOKhr2El8R6cz6YI]{Triceratops}
    • Speed 30 feet;
    • Melee 1 horn, Damage 2k8 piercing, plus 1k6 persistent bleed on a critical hit;
    • Melee 1 foot, Damage 2k6 bludgeoning.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.542Keo6txtq7uvqe]{Tyrannosaurus}
    • Speed 30 feet;
    • Melee 1 jaws (deadly k12, reach 10 feet), Damage 1k12 piercing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 1k10 bludgeoning.

Wywyższenie (5.) Your battle form is Huge and your attacks have 15-foot reach, or 20-foot reach if they started with 15-foot reach. You instead gain 20 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +18, a damage bonus of +6, double the damage dice, and Athletics +21.

Wywyższenie (7.) Your battle form is Gargantuan and your attacks have 20-foot reach, or 25-foot reach if they started with 15-foot reach. You instead gain AC = 21 + your level, 25 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +25, a damage bonus of +15, double the damage dice, and Athletics +25.

Dinosaur Fort.name: Dinosaur Fort
Dinosaur Fort.description:
You conjure a primeval fort with walls of sharpened wood adorned with dinosaur skin and teeth, up to 300 feet on a side. Each of the four quadrants of the fort is guarded by a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-monster-core.Actor.tpNP1UooPPHMyZye]{Tyrannosaurus}. While the tyrannosauruses won't cross into the others' territories, their reach allows them to simultaneously attack an intruder near the center of the fort. The tyrannosauruses leave you and anyone you introduce to them alone but treat anyone else they find in the fort as intruders and prospective snacks. When you prepare spells, you can choose not to recover the spell slot you used to cast this spell. If you do, the fort remains for another 24 hours.

The fort must be created on a plot of land free of other structures. It adapts to the natural terrain, adopting the structural requirements for being built there. The fort adjusts around small features, such as ponds or spires of rock, but can't be created on water or other nonsolid surfaces. If created on snow, sand dunes, or other soft surfaces with a solid surface underneath, the foundation reaches solid ground. If created on a solid but unstable surface, such as a swamp or an area plagued by tremors, roll a @Check[flat|dc:3] each day the fort is present; on a failure, the fort sinks or collapses sometime during that day, and the spell ends.

The fort doesn't harm creatures within the area when it appears, and it can't be created within a crowd or in a densely populated area. Any creature inadvertently caught inside the fort when the spell is cast ends up unharmed inside the complete fort and always has a clear path of escape.

Dirge of Doom.name: Dirge of Doom
Dirge of Doom.description: Enemies within the area are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1}. They can't reduce their frightened value below 1 while they remain in the area.

Dirge of Remembrance.name: Dirge of Remembrance
Dirge of Remembrance.description:
You sing a funereal dirge to force restless spirits to fully manifest in the Material Plane. Each incorporeal creature in the area takes 4k10 sonic damage (this damage bypasses its resistances) depending on the result of its Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia and becomes semi-corporeal until the spell ends. All attacks against it get the benefit of a ghost touch rune.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but double damage.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k10.

Disappearance.name: Disappearance
Disappearance.description: You shroud a creature from others' senses. The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Niewykryty}, not just to sight but to all senses, allowing the target to count as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialny} no matter what precise and imprecise senses an observer might have. It's still possible for a creature to find the target by Seeking, looking for disturbed dust, hearing gaps in the sound spectrum, or finding some other way to discover the presence of an otherwise-undetectable creature.

Discern Lies.name: Discern Lies
Discern Lies.description: Falsehoods ring in your ears like discordant notes. You gain a +4 status bonus to Perception checks when someone Lies.

Discern Secrets.name: Discern Secrets
Discern Secrets.description:
Your patron deigns to whisper a few secrets. The target can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Szukanie}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive} as a free action. The target gains a +1 status bonus to the statistic used for the roll (a skill or Perception), as long as you Sustain the spell. The target is temporarily immune to discern secrets for 1 minute.

Wywyższenie (5.) You can target two creatures instead of one.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.pzbU0cdyRvE66XBi]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Discern Secrets}

Discomfiting Whispers.name: Discomfiting Whispers
Discomfiting Whispers.description:
You are surrounded by an aura of spiteful murmurings that incite bad luck and punish failure. Each creature that starts their turn within the area of this spell must succeed at a Will save or roll twice on their first attack roll that round and take the lower result. If an attack roll modified in this way results in a failure, the creature that rolled the failed attack takes 1k6 void damage.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.JfvVyMWuD8yvSrIe]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Discomfiting Whispers}

Wywyższenie (+2) The void damage dealt on a failure increases by 1k6.

Disguise Magic.name: Zamaskowanie Magii
Disguise Magic.description:
Zmieniasz sposób w jaki magiczna aura przedmiotu lub zaklęcia jest rejestrowana przez efekty takie jak wykrycie magii. Możesz zupełnie ukryć magiczną aurę, sprawić, że przedmiot zostanie rozpoznany jako powszechny przedmiot niższego poziomu lub sprawić, że zaklęcie zostanie rozpoznane jako powszechne zaklęcie tego samego lub niższego kręgu. Możesz Odwołać to zaklęcie. Użytkownik magii używający @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{Wykrycia Magii} lub @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.OhD2Z6rIGGD5ocZA]{Odczytania Aury} na kręgu wyższym od kręgu zamaskowania magii, może wykonać test umiejętności odpowiadającej tradycji twojego zaklęcia (Wiedza Tajemna dla magii tajemnej, Religia dla magii boskiej, Okultyzm dla magii okultystycznej i Przyroda dla magii pierwotnej) aby przestać wierzyć w iluzję. Kolejne próby podejmowane przez tego samego użytkownika magii odnoszą zawsze ten sam rezultat co pierwotna próba podważenia wiary w iluzję.

Wywyższenie (2.) Możesz rzucić to zaklęcie na istotę, maskując wszystkie posiadane przez nią przedmioty i mające na nią wpływ efekty zaklęć.

Disintegrate.name: Dezintegracja
Disintegrate.description:
W kierunku celu wystrzeliwuje czarna wiązka, która porzy kontakcie zyskuje na sile zmieniając się w potężny promień niszczycielskiej energii. Wykonaj atak zaklęciem przeciw celowi. Jeśli trafisz obiekt lub konstrukt z mocy (taki jak @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.7Iela4GgVeO3LfAo]{Ściana Magii}), jest on niszczony bez konieczności wykonywania rzutu obronnego, chyba że jest to artefakt lub przedmiot o podobnej mocy. Pojedyncze rzucenie zaklęcia niszczy nie więcej materii niż sześcian o boku 10 stóp. Jeśli trafisz istotę, otrzymuje ona 12k10 obrażeń (bez typu) z podstawowym rzutem obronnym Krzepy. Jeśli trafisz krytycznie, cel uzyskuje na rzucie obronnym stopień sukcesu o jeden niższy niż wyrzucony. Istota zredukowana do 0 PŻ jest ścierana na drobny proszek; jej ekwipunek pozostaje na miejscu.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k10.
Disintegrate.target: 1 istota, niepilnowany obiekt lub konstrukt z mocy

Disjunction.name: Disjunction
Disjunction.description: Crackling energy disjoins the target. You attempt to counteract it. If you succeed, it's deactivated for 1 week. On a critical success, it's destroyed. If it's an artifact or similar item, you automatically fail.

Dismantle.name: Dismantle
Dismantle.description:
You touch an object, and it immediately disassembles itself into its component pieces. The spell fails if the target lacks component pieces (such as a statue carved from one block of stone), and using it on a dangerous object like a snare or trap typically triggers it. The object gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6dNUvdb1dhToNDj3]{Uszkodzony} condition, and the component pieces become small enough to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Schowany} under normal clothing and armor. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} the spell.

When the spell ends, the object reassembles itself into its original form, appearing in your hand or hands if you have them free, or on the ground in front of you otherwise. Once reassembled, the object loses the Broken condition and its Hit Points return to the value the object had when you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast the Spell}.

Wywyższenie (4.) The spell lasts for 10 minutes.

Wywyższenie (6.) The spell lasts until your next daily preparations.
Dismantle.target: 1 non-magical object in your possession of 1 Bulk or less

Dispel Magic.name: Rozproszenie Magii
Dispel Magic.description: Rozplatasz magię stojącą za zaklęciem lub efektem zaklęcia. Wykonaj test przeciwdziałania celowi. Jeśli pomyślnie przeciwdziałasz magicznemu przedmiotowi, staje się on zwyczajnym przedmiotem swojego typu na 10 minut. Nie zmienia to niemagicznych właściwości przedmiotu. Jeśli cel jest artefaktem lub podobnym przedmiotm, automatycznie odnosisz porażkę.
Dispel Magic.target: 1 efekt zaklęcia lub niepilnowany magiczny przedmiot

Dispelling Globe.name: Kula Rozpraszająca
Dispelling Globe.description:
Tworzysz wokół siebie nieruchomą kulę, która próbuje przeciwdziałać każdemu zaklęciu z zewnątrz kuli, którego obszar lub cele wchodzą do kuli, tak jakby kula była zaklęciem @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Rozproszenia Magii} o kręgu o 1 niższym niż krąg, na którym rzucone zostało to zaklęcie.

Jeśli próba przeciwdziałania powiedzie się, zapobiega ona tylko tej części zaklęcia, która weszłaby do kuli (więc jeśli zaklęcie ma również cele poza kulą lub część jego obszaru znajduje się poza kulą, te cele lub ten obszar są nim normalnie objęte).

Musisz uformować sferę w nieprzerwanej otwartej przestrzeni, tak aby jej krawędzie nie przechodziły przez żadne istoty ani obiekty, w przeciwnym razie zaklęcie zostaje utracone (chociaż istoty mogą wejść do kuli po rzuceniu zaklęcia).

Disperse into Air.name: Disperse into Air
Disperse into Air.description:
Aktywator You take damage from an enemy or a hazard.

After taking the triggering damage, you transform into air. Until the end of the current turn, you can't be attacked or targeted, you don't take up space, you can't act, and any auras or emanations you have are suppressed. At the end of the turn, you re-form in any space you can occupy within 15 feet of where you were when you dispersed. Any auras or emanations you had are restored as long as their duration didn't run out while you were dispersed.

Disruptive Transfer.name: Disruptive Transfer
Disruptive Transfer.description: Using Venorium Blorm's formulas, you calculate a path through space. Teleport to an empty square you can see within range. Creatures adjacent to your initial location witness an array of overlapping destinations. Each of them must succeed at a Will save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} for 1 minute.

Distortion Lens.name: Distortion Lens
Distortion Lens.description:
You create a magical lens that distorts space as best suits you. You create the lens in a space in range, even suspended in midair. If your or an ally's ranged attack passes through the lens, the attack gains an additional 10 feet of range; if an enemy's ranged attack would pass through the lens, it requires an additional 10 feet of range to move through, though the enemy knows before using its ability whether the interference puts the target out of range. An ally whose space overlaps the lens can increase the range of its ranged attacks, but an enemy whose space overlaps the lens doesn't reduce the range of its ranged attacks.

The first time each round you Sustain the Spell, you can choose to relocate it to another square within range. The lens disappears if you cast distortion lens again.

Wywyższenie (+3) The lens increases or decreases the range of abilities by an additional 5 feet.

Distracting Chatter.name: Distracting Chatter
Distracting Chatter.description:
You bombard a target with distracting auditory illusions, surrounding them with a tumultuous cacophony of overlapping speech, whispers, screams, and muttering. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda}, takes a –2 status penalty to purely auditory Perception checks, and must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:5] to use auditory abilities or verbal spell components. Similarly, a creature who attempts to affect the target with an auditory effect must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:5] or the attempt fails. The duration depends on the target's Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The duration is 1 round.

Porażka The duration is 3 rounds.

Krytyczna Porażka The duration is 1 minute.

Wywyższenie (7.) You can target up to five creatures.

Distracting Decoy.name: Distracting Decoy
Distracting Decoy.description:
You conjure a colorful, fast-moving shape, such as a small bird or other animal that draws your target's eye. They must attempt a Will save.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda} until the start of your next turn.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the creature also takes a –2 circumstance penalty to attacks while it's off-guard.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.iwzKtzNV5t1op2xs]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Distracting Decoy}

Div Pact.name: Div Pact
Div Pact.description:
You call upon the powers of Abaddon to grant you the assistance of a div. You call upon a div whose level can be no more than double div pact's spell rank, two divs whose levels are each at least 2 less than double the spell rank, or three divs whose levels are each at least 3 less than double the spell rank.

Krytyczny Sukces You conjure the div or divs, and they require nothing in return for their service.

Sukces You conjure the div or divs. They are not eager to pursue the task, so they require a favor in return.

Porażka you don't conjure any divs.

Krytyczna Porażka You don't conjure any divs, and they send a spiritual backlash that denies your use of any of your innate divine spells for 24 hours. If you are under the effect of any of your innate divine spells, the durations end.
Div Pact.primarycheck: Religion (expert; you must be a div)

Dive and Breach.name: Dive and Breach
Dive and Breach.description:
You make the briefest of dives through the Plane of Water. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap} 10 feet, and where you would land on the ground, you instead disappear in a splash of water, your body entering the surface like a diver entering a pool. You then exit from an unoccupied surface within 40 feet, appearing in another splash of water as you Leap out, landing 10 feet away from where you exited. Each splash deals 3k10 bludgeoning damage to all creatures in a @Template[emanation|distance:5]; creatures in multiple splash zones take damage only once.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage dealt by each splash increases by 1k10.

Dividing Trench.name: Dividing Trench
Dividing Trench.description:
You dig an earthen trench across the surrounding terrain, which must be soil, clay, sand, or other soft earth, but not flooring or stone. The trench is 5 feet wide, 5 feet deep, and up to 15 feet long. You can shape the trench's path, but it must be one continuous line. You must conjure the trench in an open space so it doesn't pass through any creatures or objects. Creatures inside the trench have cover from creatures outside the trench, and creatures outside the trench have cover from creatures inside the trench. Particularly small creatures in the trench might have more cover against other creatures who aren't close to the trench's edge, and in turn, those creatures might have more cover against small creatures in the trench; the GM determines the amount of additional cover, if any. Entering or leaving the trench requires an additional 5 feet of movement but doesn't require any kind of check and isn't considered difficult terrain. At the end of the spell's duration, the trench disappears and all creatures in the trench remain in their spaces on solid ground.

Wywyższenie (+2) The trench's maximum length increases by 15 feet.

Divine Armageddon.name: Divine Armageddon
Divine Armageddon.description:
You call forth a divine cataclysm from your deity, destroying living and undead creatures in the area alike. Creatures in the area take 10k6 void damage and 10k6 alignment damage (good, evil, lawful, or chaotic), chosen from among the alignments your deity has. If your deity is true neutral, increase the void damage by 4k6 instead of dealing alignment damage. A creature harmed by vitality damage, such as one with void healing, takes vitality damage instead of void damage from this spell.

You can't cast this spell if you don't have a deity. This spell gains the trait corresponding to the alignment damage dealt.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k6 void damage, 1k6 alignment damage, and 1k6 additional void and vitality damage for a true neutral deity.

@Damage[(@item.level+2)d6[void],(@item.level+2)k6[spirit]|traits:spirit]{Leveled Void + Spirit Damage}

@Damage[(@item.level+2)d6[vitality],(@item.level+2)k6[spirit]|traits:spirit]{Leveled Vitality + Spirit Damage}

@Damage[((@item.level*2)-2)d6[void]]{Leveled Void Damage}

@Damage[((@item.level*2)-2)d6[vitality]]{Leveled Vitality Damage}

Divine Aura.name: Divine Aura
Divine Aura.description:
Divine power wards the targets, granting each a +1 status bonus to AC and saves while in the area.

Choose an alignment your deity has (chaotic, evil, good, or lawful). You can't cast this spell if you don't have a deity or your deity is true neutral. This spell gains the trait of the alignment you chose. The bonuses granted by the spell increase to +2 against attacks by-and effects created by-creatures with an alignment opposite to the spell (lawful if you chose chaotic, evil if you chose good). These bonuses increase to +4 against effects created by such creatures that attempt to impose the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Kontrolowany} condition on a target of your divine aura, as well as against attacks made by creatures summoned by anything opposite in alignment to your divine aura.

When a creature of opposite alignment hits a target with a melee attack, the creature must succeed at a Will save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiony} for 1 minute. It's then temporarily immune for 1 minute.

The first time you Sustain the Spell each round, the divine aura's radius grows 10 feet.

Divine Decree.name: Divine Decree
Divine Decree.description:
You utter a potent litany from your faith, a mandate that harms those who oppose your ideals. You deal 7k10 spirit damage to your enemies in the area; each enemy must attempt a Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 2} for 1 minute.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota odnosi podwójne obrażenia and is enfeebled 2 for 1 minute. If you're on your home plane and the creature is not, the creature is sent back to its home plane. A creature of 10. level or lower must also succeed at a Will save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Sparaliżowany} for 1 minute; if it critically fails, it dies (this is a death effect).

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k10, and the level of creatures that must attempt a second save on a critical failure increases by 2.

Divine Immolation.name: Divine Immolation
Divine Immolation.description:
Divine flames scour creatures within the area. Creatures take 6k6 fire damage and @Damage[(@item.level –3)d6[persistent,fire]] damage. The divine power within the flames scorches the spirit as well; a creature takes spirit damage instead of fire damage from divine immolation if that would be more detrimental to the creature (as determined by the GM).

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota odnosi połowę obrażeń i nie odnosi przewlekłych obrażeń.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia oraz przewlekłe obrażenia.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota odnosi podwójne obrażenia and double persistent damage.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k6 and persistent damage increases by 1k6.

Divine Inspiration.name: Divine Inspiration
Divine Inspiration.description: You infuse a target with spiritual energy, refreshing its magic. If it prepares spells, it recovers one 6. kręgu or lower spell it previously cast today and can cast that spell again. If it spontaneously casts spells, it recovers one of its 6. kręgu or lower spell slots. If it has a focus pool, it regains its Focus Points, as if it had Refocused.

Divine Lance.name: Boska Lanca
Divine Lance.description:
Uwalniasz promień boskiej energii. Wykonaj dystansowy atak zaklęciem przeciwko KP celu. Przy trafieniu, cel odnosi 2k4 obrażeń duchowych (podwójne obrażenia przy trafieniu krytycznym).

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k4.

Divine Plagues.name: Divine Plagues
Divine Plagues.description:
Your deity sends wracking plagues. The target must attempt a Fortitude save. When you Cast the Spell, decide whether the disease inflicts the clumsy, enfeebled, or stupefied condition.

Sukces The target is unaffected.

Porażka The target is afflicted with stage 1 divine plague.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is afflicted with stage 2 divine plague.

Divine Plague (disease) Level 1

Stadium 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 1}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 1} (1 runda)

Stadium 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} and clumsy 1, enfeebled 1, or stupefied 1 (1 runda)

Stadium 3 clumsy 1, enfeebled 1, or stupefied 1 and the target can't recover from the condition until they are cured (1 dzień)

Wywyższenie (5th) The divine plague disease gains the virulent trait. The condition value for the clumsy, enfeebled, or stupefied condition is 2 instead of 1

Divine Vessel.name: Divine Vessel
Divine Vessel.description:
You accept otherworldly energies into your body; while you are still recognizably yourself, you gain the features of one of your deity's servitors. Choose an alignment your deity has (chaotic, evil, good, or lawful). You can't cast this spell if you don't have a deity or your deity is true neutral. This spell gains the trait of the alignment you chose.

If you were Medium or smaller, you become Large, as the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Powiększenie}. You must have space to expand into, or the spell is lost. You also gain the following benefits.

  • 40 temporary Hit Points.
  • A fly Speed equal to your Speed.
  • Weakness 10 to the alignment opposite the one you chose.
  • A +1 status bonus to saves against spells.
  • Darkvision.
  • Your unarmed attacks and weapons deal 1 additional damage of the chosen alignment type.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks. If you chose good or lawful, your fist attacks deal 2k8 damage. If you chose chaotic, you gain a bite unarmed attack that deals 2k10 piercing damage. If you chose evil, you gain a claws unarmed attack that deals 2k8 slashing damage and has the agile and finesse traits.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.GDzn5DToE62ZOTrP]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Divine Vessel}

Wywyższenie (9.) The temporary Hit Points increase to 60, the weakness increases to 15, and the duration increases to 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.dIftJU6Ki2QSLCOD]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Divine Vessel (9. level)}

Divine Wrath.name: Divine Wrath
Divine Wrath.description:
You channel the fury of divinity against your foes. You deal 4k10 spirit damage to enemies in the area, depending on their Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1}.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 2}; while it's sickened, it's also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1}.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k10.

Diviner's Sight.name: Diviner's Sight
Diviner's Sight.description: You glimpse into the target's future. Roll a k20; when the target attempts a non-secret saving throw or skill check, it can use the number you rolled instead of rolling, and the spell ends. Alternatively, you can instead reveal the result of the die roll for one of the target's secret checks during the duration, and the spell ends. Casting it again ends any active diviner's sight you have cast, as well as any active diviner's sight on the target.

Divinity Leech.name: Divinity Leech
Divinity Leech.description:
You disrupt the connection between a divine caster or deific servitor and their deity, blocking their use of divine power. If the target fails its save, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Wyczerpany}.

For the spell's duration, whenever the target casts a divine spell, you regain @Damage[6d6[healing]] Hit Points and the target must attempt another Will save with the following effects.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Each target of the divine spell has an outcome one degree of success better than the result it rolled.

Porażka The divine spell is lost and target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1}.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony} for 1 round.

Dizzying Colors.name: Oszałamiające Barwy
Dizzying Colors.description:
Uwalniasz masę wirujących barw, które przytłaczają istoty w oparciu o ich rzut obronny Woli.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczona} na 1 rundę.

Porażka Istota jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszona 1} i @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiona} na 1 rundę oraz zamroczona na 1 minutę.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota jest ogłuszona na 1 rundę i oślepiona na 1 minutę.

Dominate.name: Dominate
Dominate.description:
You take command of the target, forcing it to obey your orders. If you issue an obviously self-destructive order, the target doesn't act until you issue a new order. The effect depends on its Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1} as it fights off your commands.

Porażka You control the target. It gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Kontrolowany} condition, but it can attempt a Will save at the end of each of its turns. On a success, the spell ends.

Krytyczna Porażka As a failure, but the target receives a new save only if you give it a new order that is against its nature, such as killing its allies.

Wywyższenie (10.) The duration is unlimited.

Domora's Defense.name: Domora's Defense
Domora's Defense.description:
Domora Hume is considered by most to be the first god caller, conjuring a god from the Plane of Water named Dyzad to protect his town from Mammoth Lord raiders. A lost story of this defense claims that Dyzad appeared to be in three places at once, blocking the raiders' spears, swords, and torches. The intended lesson is that Dyzad will overcome any barrier to protect the people of Sarkoris. This spell gives that intention physical form, allowing the caster to protect their people.

When you Cast this Spell, a watery replica of the eidolon Dyzad appears in front of each of the targets, granting them a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and fire resistance 5.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.IMKuG3m72BYeGSXS]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Domora's Defense}

While the replica persists, a target can use the Shield Block reaction with the replica. The replica has Hardness 15 (or Hardness 20 against fire damage). They can use this reaction to reduce damage from any spell or magical effect, even if it doesn't deal physical damage. After a target uses Shield Block, the replica dissipates. The spell ends when you no longer Sustain it or if all three replicas have dissipated, whichever happens first.

Door to Beyond.name: Door to Beyond
Door to Beyond.description:
Striking at thin air, you create hairline cracks in an unoccupied adjacent space that lead somewhere outside reality. Air rushes through the cracks, drawing Large or smaller creatures and objects of light Bulk or less toward the center. Large or smaller creatures in the area must attempt a Fortitude save at the start of their turn; creatures that move into the area must attempt the save upon entering.

The cracks of the door to beyond are too thin for anything to fully slip through, but decompressive effects deal 4k6 slashing damage to any creature or object that ends its turn adjacent to the door. You are unaffected by your own door to beyond. You can Dismiss the spell.

Sukces The creature is unaffected.

Porażka The creature is pulled 10 feet toward the door.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is pulled 20 feet toward the door.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k6.

Downpour.name: Downpour
Downpour.description:
You call forth a torrential downpour, which extinguishes non-magical flames. Creatures in the area are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} and gain fire resistance 10. Creatures outside the area are Concealed to those inside the area. If a creature with weakness to water ends its turn in the area, the downpour triggers its weakness.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.LMXxICrByo7XZ3Q3]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Downpour}

Wywyższenie (+1) The fire resistance increases by 2.

Draconic Barrage.name: Draconic Barrage
Draconic Barrage.description:
You shape energy into a small group of tiny dragons (or other serpentine creatures) that flit around you. Choose fire, force, mental, or spirit damage when you Cast the Spell. For the duration of the spell, your Strikes with weapons or unarmed attacks deal 1 additional damage of the chosen type, as the dragons add their energy to your attacks. You can Sustain the spell to change the damage type.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.iXQCXCMiiJ8WV6K7]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Draconic Barrage}

In addition, you can Sustain the spell to have the dragons fly off to bombard a creature within 60 feet. That creature takes 2k4 damage of the chosen type (basic Reflex save). Once the dragons have been used in this way, they wink out of existence and the spell ends.

Wywyższenie (+1) The additional amount of damage from the dragons increases by 1 and the damage dealt by the dragons' bombardment increases by 2k4.

Dragon Breath.name: Dragon Breath
Dragon Breath.description:
You spew energy from your mouth, dealing 5k6 damage with a basic Reflex save. The damage type depends on the magical tradition related to the dragon that influenced your bloodline.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 2k6.

Dragon Form.name: Dragon Form
Dragon Form.description:
Calling upon powerful magic, you gain a Large dragon battle form. When you Cast this Spell, choose one type of common dragon or another type to which your GM allows access. While in this form, you gain the dragon trait. You have hands in this battle form and can take manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 10 temporary Hit Points.
  • Speed 40 feet, fly Speed 100 feet.
  • Resistance 10 against the damage type of your Dragon Breath (see below).
  • Darkvision and imprecise scent 60 feet.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +22, and your damage bonus is +6. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead. See below for more on these attacks.
  • Athletics modifier of +23, unless your own modifier is higher.
  • Breath Weapon 2 (varies) The shape, damage, and damage type of your breath weapon depend on your specific dragon form (see below). A creature in the area attempts a basic save against your spell DC. This is a Reflex save unless stated otherwise in the special ability description for your specific dragon form. Once activated, your breath weapon can't be used again for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1k4 rounds}. Your breath weapon has the trait corresponding to the type of damage it deals.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of dragon:

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.rHXOZAFBdRXIlxt5]{Adamantine}

    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2k12 piercing plus 2k6 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 3k10 slashing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 3k10 bludgeoning;
    • breath weapon 30-foot cone, @Damage[(ternary(gte(@item.rank,8),14,10))d6[bludgeoning]|options:area-damage]

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.ETgzIIv3M2zvclAR]{Conspirator}

    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2k12 piercing plus 2k6 poison;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 3k10 slashing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 3k10 bludgeoning;
    • breath weapon 30-foot cone, @Damage[(ternary(gte(@item.rank,8),14,10))d6[poison]|options:area-damage]

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.OeCn76SB92GPOZwr]{Diabolic}

    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2k12 piercing plus 2k6 fire;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 3k10 slashing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 3k10 bludgeoning;
    • breath weapon 30-foot cone, @Damage[(ternary(gte(@item.rank,8),14,10))d6[fire]|options:area-damage]

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.jtW3VfI5Kktuy3GH]{Empyreal}

    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2k12 piercing plus 2k6 spirit;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 3k10 slashing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 3k10 bludgeoning;
    • breath weapon 30-foot cone, @Damage[(ternary(gte(@item.rank,8),14,10))d6[spirit]|options:area-damage]

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.DrNpuMj14wVj4bWF]{Fortune}

    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2k12 piercing plus 2k6 force;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 3k10 slashing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 3k10 bludgeoning;
    • breath weapon 30-foot cone, @Damage[(ternary(gte(@item.rank,8),14,10))d6[force]|options:area-damage]

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.8aNZhlkzRTRKlKag]{Horned}

    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2k12 piercing plus 2k6 poison;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 3k10 slashing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 3k10 bludgeoning;
    • breath weapon 30-foot cone, @Damage[(ternary(gte(@item.rank,8),14,10))d6[poison]|options:area-damage]

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.nWEx5kpkE8YlBZvy]{Mirage}

    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2k12 piercing plus 2k6 mental;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 3k10 slashing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 3k10 bludgeoning;
    • breath weapon 30-foot cone, @Damage[(ternary(gte(@item.rank,8),14,10))d6[mental]|options:area-damage]

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.V4a9pZHNUlddAwTA]{Omen}

    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2k12 piercing plus 2k6 mental;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 3k10 slashing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 3k10 bludgeoning;
    • breath weapon 30-foot cone, @Damage[(ternary(gte(@item.rank,8),14,10))d6[mental]|options:area-damage]

  • Tradition Resistance If the dragon's magical tradition matches that of your dragon form spell, you gain the listed ability. Arcane resistance 5 against damage from spells; divine resistance 10 to spirit, vitality, and void; occult resistance 10 to mental; primal resistance 5 to physical damage.

    Wywyższenie (8th) Your battle form is Huge, you gain a +20-foot status bonus to your fly Speed, and your attacks have 10-foot reach (or 15-foot reach if they previously had 10-foot reach). You instead gain AC = 21 + your level, 15 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +28, a damage bonus of +12, and Athletics +28. Your Dragon Breath deals an additional 4k6 damage.

Dragon Wings.name: Dragon Wings
Dragon Wings.description:
Leathery wings sprout from your back, giving you a fly Speed of 60 feet or your Speed, whichever is faster. If you're still flying when this spell's duration would end, you float to the ground, as with the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TTwOKGqmZeKSyNMH]{Gentle Landing}.

Wywyższenie (8th) The duration increases to 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.jy4edd6pvJvJgOSP]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Dragon Wings}

Drain Life.name: Drain Life
Drain Life.description:
You close your hand and pull life energy from another creature into yourself. This deals 3k4 void damage; the target must attempt a basic Fortitude save.

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the damage the target takes, after resolving its save and applying a blood magic effect if applicable. If the target's Hit Points were lower than the damage you dealt, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to their remaining Hit Points instead. The temporary Hit Points last for 1 minute.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k4.

Drain Planar Connection.name: Drain Planar Connection
Drain Planar Connection.cost: six sets of rare herbs, each worth a total of 50 gp
Drain Planar Connection.description:
You draw the planar energy from Idyllis, through the ley lines, and into the six latticework spheres.

Krytyczny Sukces You sever Idyllis's connection to the Plane of Wood permanently.

Sukces You sever Idyllis's connection to the Plane of Wood for 10 years.

Porażka You sever Idyllis's connection to the Plane of Wood for 1 year, but the ritual backfires, dealing @Damage[(4d12+26)[force]] damage to all secondary casters (@Check[reflex|dc:26|basic] save).

Krytyczna Porażka The ritual backfires as a failure but doesn't sever Idyllis's connection.
Drain Planar Connection.secondarycheck: DC 26 Diplomacy or Nature or Occultism

Draw Ire.name: Przyciągnięcie Wrogości
Draw Ire.description:
Powodujesz mentalne napięcie u istoty, podjudzając ją aby natarła właśnie na ciebie. Zadajesz istocie 1k10 obrażeń mentalnych oraz powodujesz, że ponosi ona karę statusową –1 do rzutów ataku na istoty inne niż ty. Istota musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Cel odnosi połowę obrażeń oraz karę do rzutów. Zaklęcie kończy się na koniec następnej tury celu. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.PDoTV4EhJp63FEaG]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Przyciągnięcie Wrogości (Sukces)}

Porażka Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia oraz karę do rzutów.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia a kara do rzutów zwiększa się do –2.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.0WYy3bY7HJ7TDSYD]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Przyciągnięcie Wrogości}

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k10.

Draw Moisture.name: Wyciągnięcie Wilgoci
Draw Moisture.description: Wyciągasz wilgoć z obiektu, na przykład aby usunąć plamy lub szybko wysuszyć przemoczoną koszulę lub księgę. Wyciągasz około pół litra wody z obiektu; oszusza to obiekt o Naręczu mniejszym od 1. Woda zbiera się w kulę lewitującą w twojej dłoni, którą możesz przekierować do pobliskiego zbiornika w ramach Rzucania tego Zaklęcia; w przeciwnym wypadku rozchlapuje się ona po ziemi. Można użyć wielu następujących po sobie Wyciągnięć Wilgoci aby osuszyć większe obiekty, chociaż robienie tego może zająć znaczną ilość czasu. W szczególnie wilgotnych obszarach możesz użyć tego zaklęcia aby wyciągnąć wodę pitną z powietrza, chociaż na ogół nie jesteś w stanie wydobyć z otaczającej atmosfery więcej niż kilku kubków płynu przed jej osuszeniem.

Draw the Lightning.name: Draw the Lightning
Draw the Lightning.description:
Calling out to the skies, you summon a bolt of lightning to strike through a foe above you and down into your weapon or your body, charging it with electrical power. You must hold your weapon or an empty hand aloft as part of this spell's somatic component. When you do, a bolt of lightning descends from a storm cloud in the air above your and through the target, dealing 3k12 electricity damage with a basic Reflex save. For the rest of the spell's duration, your first Strike each round with the weapon you held aloft (or with your unarmed attacks if you held an empty hand aloft) deals an additional 1k12 electricity damage.

The spell creates its own storm cloud if necessary, so you can cast draw the lightning anywhere, even underground. If draw the lightning is cast outside under a cloudy or stormy sky, increase the bolt's damage by @Damage[2d12[electricity]].

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.fCIT9YgGUwIc3Z9G]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Draw the Lightning}

Wywyższenie (8.) The damage dealt to the initial target increases by 4k12, and the additional damage dealt on the first Strike each turn increases by 1k12.
Draw the Lightning.target: 1 istota, która jest wyższa od ciebie lub znajduje się wyżej od ciebie

Dread Ambience.name: Dread Ambience
Dread Ambience.cost: candles, specialty salts, and rare herbs worth 80 gp total;
Dread Ambience.description:
In some places, it always feels like something is observing you, as if the very land doesn't want you there. Hostile creatures skitter about in the underbrush. Tendrils of mist try to lead you stray. Even the scent of the place is unwelcoming. Sometimes, this eerie atmosphere is a natural occurrence. Other times, it's the result of the dread ambience ritual.

To create this unwelcoming, intimidating aura, you must prepare the area with salts and herbs, traveling the entire edge of the area throughout the casting.

After you complete your ritual, anyone who enters the area receives a status penalty to saving throws against fear effects within the dread ambience.

Krytyczny Sukces The sense of dread is particularly powerful. Every creature in an area takes a –2 status penalty to saving throws against fear effects.

Sukces The dread ambience succeeds. Every creature in the area takes a –1 status penalty to saving throws against fear effects.

Porażka The dread ambience fails.

Krytyczna Porażka The dread ambience fails, and the casters take a –1 status penalty to all Will saves for the next week.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.FT5Tt2DKBRutDqbV]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Dread Ambience}

Wywyższenie (7.) The dread ambience costs 750 gp and remains in place for 10 years.

Wywyższenie (9.) The dread ambience costs 5,000 gp and remains in place for an unlimited duration.

Dread Secret.name: Dread Secret
Dread Secret.description:
You utter a powerful secret at odds with the fundamental nature of the target creatures. Choose a specific resistance or weakness with a numerical value that you believe one or more of the targets have due to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge} or previous experience with the targets, such as resistance to fire or weakness to silver. If the information is incorrect for a given target, the spell has no effect on that target. Affected targets must attempt a Will saving throw.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature takes 1 damage that matches the type or trait of weakness you chose (thus triggering the creature's weakness) if you chose a weakness, or loses its resistance until the end of your next turn if you chose a resistance.

Porażka As success, and the creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1} from the revelation of its dread secret.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, except the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 3}

Dream Council.name: Dream Council
Dream Council.description: When you Cast this Spell, any targets-including you-can choose to immediately fall asleep. The spell ends for any creatures that don't choose to fall asleep. Sleepers join a shared dream, where they can communicate with one another as though they were in the same room. Individual targets leave this shared dream upon awakening, and if all the targets awaken, the spell ends.
Dream Council.target: do 12 istot, które znasz z imienia i poznałeś osobiście

Dream Message.name: Dream Message
Dream Message.description:
You send a message to your target's dream. The message is one-way, up to 1 minute of speech (roughly 150 words). If the target is asleep, they receive the message instantly. If not, they receive it the next time they sleep. As soon as they receive it, the spell ends, and you know the message was sent.

Wywyższenie (4.) You can target up to 10 creatures you know by name and have met in person. You must send the same message to all of them; the spell ends for each creature individually

4.target: do 10 istot, które znasz z imienia i poznałeś osobiście

Dream Message.target: 1 istota, którą znasz z imienia i poznałeś osobiście

Dreamer's Call.name: Dreamer's Call
Dreamer's Call.description:
You create a vivid, illusory daydream drawn from the images of the target's dreams. The daydream appears in an unoccupied space in range, and you attempt to draw the target toward it.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target's attention wavers. It becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Zafascynowany} by the daydream.

Porażka The target is fascinated with the daydream and pursues a course of action you choose as its first action after you Cast the Spell: approach the daydream, run away from it (as the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Uciekający} condition), Release what it's holding as an offering, or Drop Prone in obeisance.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the target follows the course of action for as many actions as possible for the spell's duration, and does nothing else.

Dreaming Potential.name: Dreaming Potential
Dreaming Potential.description: You draw the target into a lucid dream where it can explore the endless possibilities of its own potential within the everchanging backdrop of its dreamscape. If it sleeps the full 8 hours uninterrupted, when it wakes, it counts as having spent a day of downtime retraining, though it can't use dreaming potential for any retraining that would require either an instructor or specialized knowledge it can't access within the dream.

Drop Dead.name: Drop Dead
Drop Dead.description:
The target appears to fall down dead, though it actually turns @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialny}. Its illusory corpse remains where it fell, complete with a believable fatal wound. This illusion looks and feels like a dead body. If the target's death seems absurd — for instance, a barbarian at full health appears to be slain by 2 damage — the GM can grant the attacker an immediate Perception check to disbelieve the illusion. If the target uses hostile actions, the spell ends. This ends the entire spell, so the illusory corpse disappears too.

Wywyższenie (7.) The spell doesn't end if the target uses a hostile action.

Dull Ambition.name: Dull Ambition
Dull Ambition.description:
You curse the target to fail in all avenues of its life that require drive and ambition, as it inadvertently undermines its own goals at every turn. The effect is based on the target's Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces For 1 hour, the target rolls twice and uses the lower result on initiative rolls.

Porażka For 1 day, the target rolls twice and uses the lower result on initiative rolls and any check to determine the success of a downtime activity.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the duration is unlimited.

Duplicate Foe.name: Duplicate Foe
Duplicate Foe.description:
You create a temporary duplicate of an enemy to fight on your behalf. The target can attempt a Fortitude save to disrupt the spell. The duplicate appears in an unoccupied space adjacent to the target and has the target's attack modifier, AC, saving throw modifiers, Perception, and skill modifiers, but it has only 70 Hit Points and lacks the target's special abilities, including immunities, resistances, and weaknesses. It has no magic items except weapon potency runes.

The duplicate gains the minion trait, and it can only Stride and Strike. Its Strikes deal the target's normal damage but don't apply added effects, since it doesn't have special abilities. The spell automatically ends if the duplicate's Hit Points drop to 0.

The duplicate attacks your enemies to the best of its abilities. You can also try to give it additional instructions; when you Sustain the spell, you can also Command a Minion as part of your action, but the GM determines whether the duplicate follows your command.

The duplicate is unstable, so each turn after it takes its actions, it loses 4k6 Hit Points. It's not a living creature, and it can never regain its lost Hit Points in any way.

Krytyczny Sukces You fail to create a duplicate.

Sukces The duplicate deals half damage with its Strikes and the duration is reduced to a maximum of 2 rounds.

Porażka The duplicate works as described.

Wywyższenie (+1) The level of creature you can target increases by 2. The duplicate has 10 more HP.

Dust Storm.name: Dust Storm
Dust Storm.description:
You call forth a swirling storm of dust. The dust storm obscures vision, with the effect of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{Mist}. The dust also makes the air unbreathable; creatures in the area must hold their breath, though wearing a scarf or similar clothing over the mouth increases the time the creature can hold its breath to 5 rounds. Creatures entering or starting their turn in the dust storm take 1k6 slashing damage. Creatures that have the water trait or that are made primarily of liquid take double damage.

Wywyższenie (+2) The damage increases by 1k6.

Dutiful Challenge.name: Dutiful Challenge
Dutiful Challenge.description:
As you challenge an enemy, you take some of its attention away from your allies. The target takes a –1 status penalty to attack rolls, damage rolls, and skill checks against creatures other than you, and you take a –1 status penalty to attack rolls, damage rolls, and skill checks against creatures other than the target.

Each time a creature other than you uses a hostile action that affects the challenged enemy, the enemy can attempt a Will save. On a success, the enemy no longer takes the penalty against that creature. You can Dismiss the spell, and it ends automatically if you or the target is defeated.

Wywyższenie (+3) The status penalties increase by 1.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.UH2sT6eW5e31Xytd]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Dutiful Challenge}

Déjà Vu.name: Déjà Vu
Déjà Vu.description:
Zapętlasz proces myślowy umysłu celu, zmuszając go do powtarzania akcji wykonanych w momencie chwili. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli. Jeśli cel odniesie porażkę, będzie musiał powtórzyć wszelkie wykonane w najbliższej turze akcje w turze kolejnej. Akcje muszą być powtórzone w tej samej kolejności oraz w sposób możliwie najpodobniejszy do poprzedniego. Przykładowo, jeśli cel wykonał atak, musi powótrzyć atak obierając za cel tę samą istotę, o ile to możliwe, a jeśli cel się poruszał, musi poruszyć się w następnej turze w tym samym kierunku i na tę samą odległość, o ile to możliwe.

Jeśli cel nie może powtórzyć akcji, takiej jak Rzucenie Zaklęcia, które już zużył, albo objęcie za cel istoty, która już nie żyje, może on zachować się wedle swojej woli w ramach tej akcji ale staje się on @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 1} do końca swojej tury.

Earth's Bile.name: Earth's Bile
Earth's Bile.description:
Your apparition is the will of lava and magma made manifest, the earth's molten blood unleashing devastating bursts of liquid stone and unquenchable fire at your command. When you Cast this Spell and the first time you Sustain it each round thereafter, choose an area within range. Each creature in the area takes 1k4 fire damage, 1k4 bludgeoning damage, and @Damage[(ceil(@item.rank/2))[persistent,fire]] damage (the persistent fire damage is negated on a successful save).

Wywyższenie (+2) The fire and bludgeoning damage each increase by 1k4, and the persistent fire damage increases by 1.

Earthbind.name: Uziemienie
Earthbind.description:
Używając ciężaru ziemi, ograniczasz zdolność celu do lotu, w zależności od jego rzutu obronnego Krzepy. Jeśli cel bezpiecznie dotrze do ziemi nie odnosi obrażeń od upadku.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Cel opada bezpiecznie o 120 stóp.

Porażka Cel opada bezpiecznie o 120 stóp. Jeśli dotrze do ziemi nie może Latać, lewitować albo w inny sposób odrywać się od niej przez 1 rundę.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel opada bezpiecznie o 120 stóp. Jeśli dotrze do ziemi nie może Latać, lewitować albo w inny sposób odrywać się od niej przez 1 minutę.

Earthquake.name: Trzęsienie Ziemi
Earthquake.description:
Wstrząsasz ziemią, wrzucasz istoty do rozpadlin i zawalasz konstrukcje. MG może dodać dodatkowe efekty w niektórych obszarach. Klify mogą się zawalić, powodując upadek istot, lub jezioro może wyschnąć, gdy pod jego powierzchnią otworzą się szczeliny, pozostawiając bagno ruchomych piasków.

  • Drżąca Ziemia Ziemia staje się trudnym terenem, a istoty na niej otrzymują karę sytuacyjną –2 do rzutów ataku, KP i testów umiejętności. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.09rtx50laDw68FGT]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Trzęsienie Ziemi (Drżąca Ziemia)}
  • Szczeliny Każda istota na ziemi musi wykonać rzut obronny Refleksu na początku swojej tury, aby utrzymać równowagę i uniknąć wpadnięcia do 40-stopowych szczelin, które otwierają się pod nią. Szczeliny są permanentne, a ich ściany wymagają udanego testu @Check[athletics|dc:15|traits:action:climb]{Atletyki}, aby się po nich @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Wspiąć}.
  • Zawalenie Konstrukcje i sufity mogą się zawalić. MG wykonuje test płaski dla każdej z nich (@Check[flat|dc:16]{ST 16} dla solidnej konstrukcji, @Check[flat|dc:14]{ST 14} dla przeciętnej konstrukcji i większości naturalnych formacji, @Check[flat|dc:9]{ST 9} dla tandetnej konstrukcji, wszystkie dostosowane w górę lub w dół według uznania MG). Zawał zadaje każdej schwytanej w nim istocie 11k6 obrażeń obuchowych z podstawowym rzutem obronnym Refleksu. Istota pada @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalona}, chyba że odniesie krytyczny sukces, i wpada do szczeliny, jeśli odniesie krytyczną porażkę.

Wywyższenie (10.) Tworzysz potężne trzęsienie ziemi, które może zniszczyć osadę. Zasięg zwiększa się do pół mili (0.8 km), a obszar do wybuchu o promieniu ćwierć mili (0.4 km).

Earthworks.name: Earthworks
Earthworks.description:
With a ripple of earth, you raise small barriers from the ground. The ground in the area becomes difficult terrain. The spell's area is a @Template[burst|distance:5] if you spent 1 action to cast it, a @Template[burst|distance:10] if you spent 2 actions, or a @Template[burst|distance:15] if you spent 3 actions. A creature can Interact to clear the barriers from one 5-foot square adjacent to it.

Wywyższenie (4.) You pull the barriers to float in the air, causing the spell to function as difficult terrain for flying creatures

Eat Fire.name: Pożarcie Płomienia
Eat Fire.description:
Aktywator Miałbyś odnieść obrażenia od ognia.

Pożerasz i wchłaniasz ogień, czyniąc go mniej niebezpiecznym. Do końca swojej obecnej tury zyskujesz odporność 5 na obrażenia od ognia. Przez pozostały czas trwania zaklęcia możesz użyć akcji Beknięcia Dymem. Zaklęcie kończy się jeśli staniesz się @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Nieprzytomny}, weźmiesz wdech lub zrobisz wydech (wliczając w to mówienie).

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.BGv44XBGtD4zOJBd]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Pożarcie Płomienia}

Beknięcie Dymem 1 Wydychasz to co pozostało z pożartego dymu, tworząc chmurę dymu w @Template[burst|distance:5] w odległości 20 stóp. Wszystkie istoty w chmurze dymu są @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięte} a wszystkie inne istoty są przysłonięte dla nich. Dym utrzymuje się przez 1 minutę lub aż nie zostanie rozproszony silnym wiatrem.

Wywyższenie (+3) Zyskiwana odporność zwiększa się o 5.

Echoing Weapon.name: Broń Echa
Echoing Weapon.description:
Nasycasz broń obraną za cel magiczną energią sprawiając, że z każdym zadanym ciosem powietrze wokół niej cicho buczy absorbując impet uderzenia. Jeśli na koniec tury broń ta jest dzierżona przez istotę, wyładowuje ona zgromadzoną energię poprzez uderzenie dźwięku kierowane na jedną istotę sąsiadującą z jej użytkownikiem (jeśli taka istnieje). Zadane w ten sposób obrażenia od dźwięku są równe liczbie udanych ciosów zadanych tą bronią przez jej użytkownika w tej turze (do maksymalnie 4 obrażeń od dźwięku jeśli cel trafi czterema Ciosami).

Wywyższenie (+2) Obrażenia od dźwięku za każdy Cios zwiększają się o 1 (a ich maksymalna liczba zwiększa się o 4).

Eclipse Burst.name: Wybuch Zaćmienia
Eclipse Burst.description:
Kula mrożącej ciemności eksploduje, zadając istotom w obszarze 8k10 obrażeń od zimna, plus dodatkowe 8k4 obrażeń od pustki istotom żyjącym. Każda istota w obszarze musi wykonać rzut obronny Refleksu.
