Jeśli kula pokrywa się z obszarem magicznego światła lub wpływa na istotę dotkniętą magicznym światłem, Wybuch Zaćmienia próbuje przeciwdziałać efektowi światła.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota odnosi podwójne obrażenia i zostaje @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiona} przez ciemność na nieograniczony czas.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia od zimna zwiększają się o 1k10, a obrażenia od pustki przeciwko żyjącym istotom zwiększają się o 1k4.

Ectoplasmic Expulsion.name: Ectoplasmic Expulsion
Ectoplasmic Expulsion.description: You call upon tendrils of ephemeral ectoplasm to pass through the target and carry away a harmful psychic affliction. You immediately attempt to counteract a single effect on the target with the emotion or possession trait, or an effect giving the target the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Kontrolowany} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Zafascynowany} condition. If you fail to counteract the effect, you nevertheless set up a resonance that allows the target to more ably escape the effect on its own; for the next hour, the target gains a +2 status bonus to Will saves to shrug off the effect you failed to counteract (such as Will saves to shake off control by the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wU6hNzK8Yfqdmc8m]{Possession} spell).

Ectoplasmic Interstice.name: Ectoplasmic Interstice
Ectoplasmic Interstice.description: You force the mortal Universe and Ethereal Planes to partially merge, creating a zone that causes incorporeal and spiritual entities to take on many of the aspects of corporeal creatures. Within the area of effect, incorporeal creatures can't pass through solid objects or corporeal creatures, and they can manipulate and attempt Strength-based checks against physical creatures and objects. An incorporeal PC or other creature with a normal Strength modifier simply uses that modifier, but if the creature had a Strength modifier of –5, like most incorporeal monsters, it uses a +4 modifier instead, increasing its Athletics modifier by 9 accordingly. Attacks against creatures that are within the area overcome resistances as if they were by ghost touch weapons.

Eidolon's Wrath.name: Eidolon's Wrath
Eidolon's Wrath.description:
Your eidolon releases a powerful energy attack that deals 5k6 damage of the type you chose when you took the Eidolon's Wrath feat, with a basic Reflex save.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6.

Eject Soul.name: Eject Soul
Eject Soul.description:
Your touch disrupts the connection between body and soul, possibly forcing the soul out of the body altogether. The target must attempt a Fortitude save. You can allow allies to choose the degree of success instead of rolling a saving throw.

Sukces The target is unaffected.

Porażka The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1} as its soul briefly loses its connection to their body.

Krytyczna Porażka The target's soul exits its body and the target's body becomes stunned for 1 round. While their body is stunned in this way, the target remains fully aware in soul form; they simply can't consciously move their body (though the body makes basic instinctual defensive movements). The target's soul has the incorporeal trait, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialny}, and has a fly Speed of 60 feet. It can't attack, cast spells, or attempt any skill checks that require a physical body, and it must always maintain line of effect to the target's body. When the target's body ceases being stunned, the target's soul instantly returns to their body as the target wakes.

Wywyższenie (+3) If a willing ally chooses to critically fail, they can stay in soul form for 1 additional round.
Eject Soul.target: 1 living creature that has a soul

Electric Arc.name: Łuk Elektryczny
Electric Arc.description:
Błyskawica przeskakuje z celu na cel. Każdy cel otrzymuje 2k4 obrażeń od elektryczności z podstawowym rzutem obronnym Refleksu.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k4.

Electrified Crystal Ward.name: Electrified Crystal Ward
Electrified Crystal Ward.description:
You create an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.hazards.Actor.491qhVbjsHnOuMZW]{Electric Latch Rune} hazard on the target, creating a special crystalline lock on the object. You can also substitute your spell DC for any of the hazard's listed DCs. You can have only one such hazard active at a time, and if you cast this spell while a previous electric latch rune is active, the older hazard discharges harmlessly.

Wywyższenie (+2) The hazard's damage increases by 1k12.

Element Embodied.name: Element Embodied
Element Embodied.description:
Drawing upon the deepest wells of magic in an elemental plane, you transform into a spectacular elemental. You can choose between an air elemental, earth elemental, fire elemental, or water elemental. Your battle form is Gargantuan, and you must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. While in this form, you gain the elemental trait and the trait for the element you choose. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 25 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 30 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +34, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Dexterity based if you choose an air or fire elemental, or Strength based if you choose an earth or water elemental. (This distinction doesn't change the statistics, but matters for the enfeebled and clumsy conditions, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifier of +36 for air or fire elemental or Athletics modifier of +36 for earth or water elemental, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of elemental you choose:

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.J60rN48XzBGHmR6m]{Air Elemental} fly Speed 80 feet;

    • High Winds (air, aura) 30 feet. Air within the emanation is difficult terrain for flying creatures that don't have the air trait;
    • Swiftness Your movement doesn't trigger reactions;
    • Melee 1 gust (reach 25 feet), Damage 3k12+11 bludgeoning plus Push 10 feet;
    • Ranged 1 lightning lash (range increment 80 feet), Damage 3k12+4 electricity.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.jp88SCE3VCRAyE6x]{Earth Elemental} 30 feet, burrow 20 feet; resistance 5 to physical;

    • Spike Stones (aura, earth) 30 feet. The area is difficult terrain and hazardous terrain. A creature without the earth trait that moves on the ground in the area takes 5 piercing damage for every square of that area it moves into;
    • Rocky Toughness You gain 40 temporary Hit Points when you choose this form instead of 30;
    • Melee 1 fist (reach 25 feet), Damage 3k12+15 bludgeoning;
    • Ranged 1 rock (range increment 40 feet), Damage 4k8+6 bludgeoning.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.lmAwCy7isFvLYdGd]{Fire Elemental} 50 feet; immunity to fire; weakness to cold 10;

    • Intense Heat (aura, fire) 30 feet. A creature that enters the aura or starts its turn in the aura takes 5k6 fire damage with a basic Reflex save against your spell DC. A creature can take damage from the aura only once per round;
    • Melee 1 tendril (reach 25 feet), Damage 3k10+12 fire plus 2k6 persistent fire;
    • Ranged 1 fire mote (range increment 60 feet), Damage 4k8+6 fire.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.lRfiYmsoQMJZ81NQ]{Metal Elemental} 40 feet, fly 40 feet; resistance 10 to electricity;

    • Arcing Electricity (aura, electricity, metal) 30 feet. A creature that enters the aura or starts its turn in the aura takes @Damage[2d12[electricity]] damage with a basic Reflex save against your spell DC; a creature made of metal, with the metal trait, or wearing metal armor takes a –1 circumstance penalty on this save. A creature can take damage from the aura only once per round;
    • Melee 1 blade (reach 25 feet, versatile slashing), Damage 3k12+15 piercing;
    • Ranged 1 metal shard (range increment 40 feet, versatile slashing), Damage 4k8+6 piercing.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.w1HwO7huxJoK0gHY]{Water Elemental} 40 feet, swim 80 feet; resistance 10 to fire;

    • Vortex (aura, water) 30 feet. Water within the aura that is part of the same body of water you occupy is difficult terrain for Swimming creatures that don't have the water trait;
    • Melee 1 wave (reach 25 feet), Damage 3k12+18 bludgeoning plus Push or Pull 10 feet;
    • Ranged 1 water spout (range increment 60 feet), Damage 4k8+6 bludgeoning.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.xPNKt1aQc3dquKlt]{Wood Elemental} 30 feet, climb 35 feet; resistance 5 to physical; weakness to axes 10;

    • Lush Growth (aura, wood) 30 feet. Ground in the area is difficult terrain, and any time a creature in the area regains HP from a healing vitality effect, the aura grants a +5 status bonus to the healing;
    • Woody Toughness You gain 40 temporary Hit Points when you choose this form instead of 30;
    • Melee 1 branch (reach 25 feet), Damage 3k10+18 piercing;
    • Ranged 1 seed (range increment 40 feet), Damage 4k8+6 bludgeoning.

Elemental Absorption.name: Elemental Absorption
Elemental Absorption.description:
You absorb elemental energy, which you can release as a powerful counterattack. Choose air, earth, fire, metal, water, or wood. You gain resistance 5 to damage dealt by effects with the chosen elemental trait; if you choose water, you also gain resistance to cold damage. As usual, if a spell has a multiple effects, such as a spell that deals both fire damage and bludgeoning damage with superheated rocks, you gain resistance to only the effects associated with the element you chose. Keep track of how much damage you have prevented with this spell.

As a 2-action activity, which has the concentrate trait and the trait matching the element you chose, you can release the stored energy. This deals damage equal to the amount you've stored (maximum 30 damage) to one enemy within 60 feet, with a basic Reflex save. The damage type depends on the element you chose: fire damage for fire; bludgeoning or cold damage for water; bludgeoning or slashing damage for air; bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage for earth;bludgeoning or vitality for wood; or electricity or slashing for metal. After releasing the energy, the spell ends. If you do not use the stored energy before the spell ends, the energy is lost.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.LldX5hnNhKzGtOS0]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Elemental Absorption}

Wywyższenie (+3) The resistance increases by 5 and the maximum damage increases by 30.

Elemental Annihilation Wave.name: Elemental Annihilation Wave
Elemental Annihilation Wave.description:
You draw elemental power from your surroundings, and combining it with your own magical energy, unleash a wave of utter destruction and swirling colors that deals 1k6 fire damage and 3k6 bludgeoning damage with a basic Reflex save. You can replace the air trait with the metal and wood traits when you cast the spell. The number of actions you spend when Casting this Spell determines the area and other parameters.

2 (somatic, verbal) The spell is a 30-foot cone.

3 (material, somatic, verbal) The spell is a 30-foot cone. On a failed saving throw, creatures are pushed 5 feet away from you, and on a critical failure they are pushed 10 feet away and are knocked prone.

Two Rounds If you spend 3 actions Casting the Spell, you can avoid finishing the spell and spend another 3 actions on your next turn to empower the spell even further. If you do, the spell is as 3 actions, but the area is a @Template[cone|distance:60], and for 1 round, the elements linger in the cone, racing off into the distance and making approaching you difficult, with the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.g8QqHpv2CWDwmIm1]{Podmuch Wiatru}.

Wywyższenie (+2) The damage increases by 3k6 bludgeoning and 1k6 fire, and the distance that enemies are pushed back if you spent 3 actions or 2 rounds increases by 5 feet on a failed save and 10 feet on a critical failure.

Elemental Betrayal.name: Elemental Betrayal
Elemental Betrayal.description:
Your patron uses its superior command of the elements, empowering them to undermine your foe. When you Cast this Spell, choose air, earth, metal, fire, water, or wood. The target gains weakness 2 to that trait.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.y4y0nusC97R7ZDL5]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Elemental Betrayal}

Wywyższenie (+2) Increase the weakness by 1.

Elemental Blast.name: Uderzenie Żywiołu
Elemental Blast.description:
Area @Template[burst|distance:10], @Template[cone|distance:30], or @Template[line|distance:60]

You gather elemental energy and blast your foes in one of the various listed shapes of your choosing, dealing 8k6 damage. This spell deals damage according to your elemental influence (for instance, slashing for air or fire for fire) and has your element's trait.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 2k6.

Elemental Breath.name: Elemental Breath
Elemental Breath.description:
You open a miniature portal to an elemental plane within your mouth, then exhale a powerful explosion of the plane's element. Roll 1k6 to determine the element. If you used 3 actions to Cast this Spell, you can choose the element instead. This spell gains the trait matching the element.

Each creature in the cone must attempt a basic Reflex save.

  1. Air Strong winds and lightning strikes buffet creatures in the cone, dealing @Damage[6d10[electricity]] damage. A creature that fails its save is also pushed 10 feet.
  2. Earth A cone of mud deals @Damage[5d10[bludgeoning]] damage to creatures in the area. A creature on the ground that fails its save slips and falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}.
  3. Fire A surging cone of fire deals @Damage[7d10[fire]] damage.
  4. Metal A cone of rust slices flesh and damages metal. Each creature in the area takes @Damage[5d10[slashing]] damage. A creature made of metal gets a result one degree of success worse than it rolled, and an unattended metal object gets a critical failure.
  5. Water A torrent of chilled water deals @Damage[3d10[cold]] damage and @Damage[3d10[bludgeoning]] damage.
  6. Wood Branches rip through creatures, dealing @Damage[3d10[piercing]] damage and @Damage[3d10[slashing]] damage. Ground in the area becomes difficult terrain for 1 minute.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by [[/r 1d10]]. For water and wood, you can choose which damage type increases for each rank the spell is heightened.

Elemental Confluence.name: Elemental Confluence
Elemental Confluence.description:
You conjure four types of elementals who combine forces to form into a chaotic storm. The confluence has AC 28 and 120 Hit Points, weakness 10 to area effects, and immunity to bleed and poison. Creatures can move through the confluence; creatures within the confluence are concealed, and all creatures outside the confluence are concealed to creatures within it. When you Cast or Sustain this Spell, you choose up to two different types of elementals to act.

  • Air (air, electricity) The elemental looses a bolt of electricity from the confluence, dealing @Damage[4d4[electricity]] damage to creatures within 20 feet of the confluence, with a basic Reflex save. This doesn't affect creatures that are completely inside of the confluence.
  • Earth (earth) The confluence gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and resistance 10 to all physical damage (except adamantine) for 1 round.
  • Fire (fire) Flames roar through the confluence, dealing @Damage[1d6[persistent,fire]] damage to those partially or entirely inside the confluence.
  • Metal (metal) The elemental flings shards of metal through the confluence, dealing @Damage[2d6[slashing]] damage to those partially or entirely inside the confluence with a basic Reflex save. A creature that critically fails also takes @Damage[1d6[persistent,bleed]] damage.
  • Water (attack, water) The elemental expels a powerful jet of water. Attempt a ranged spell attack against a target within 60 feet of the confluence, using your spell attack roll modifier. This attack ignores concealment granted by the confluence, and the elemental gets a +2 circumstance bonus on the spell attack roll against a target inside the confluence. The water deals @Damage[4d6[bludgeoning]] damage on a hit (doubled on a critical hit). This attack doesn't count toward your multiple attack penalty.
  • Wood (wood) Roots and stumps grow, making ground in the area difficult terrain.

Elemental Counter.name: Kontra Żywiołów
Elemental Counter.description:
Aktywator Ty lub istota w zasięgu 60 stóp wykonujecie rzut obronny przeciw zaklęciu z cechą drewno, metal, ogień, roślina, woda lub ziemia, albo stajecie się celem ataku zaklęciem z taką cechą.

Wymagania Masz przygotowaną komórkę zaklęć, z której mógłbyś Rzucić Zaklęcie o żywiole przeciwstawnym do wywołującego zaklęcia; patrz opis.

Każdy żywioł w kręgu żywiołów kontruje inny żywioł co pozwala ci używiac twoich własnych zaklęć żywiołów aby chronić się przez kontrowanymi przez nie żywiołami. Tracisz komórkę zaklęć, tak jakbyś rzucił wywołujące zaklęcie. Następnie próbujesz przeciwdziałać wywołującemu zaklęciu, używając kręgu zużytego zaklęcia jako rangi przeciwdziałania. Możesz wykorzystać zaklęcie roślin lub drewna aby kontrować ziemię, zaklęcie ziemi aby kontrować wodę, zaklęcie wody aby kontrować ogień, zaklęcie ognia aby kontrować metal lub zaklęcie metalu aby kontrować rośliny i drewno.

Elemental Form.name: Elemental Form
Elemental Form.description:
You call upon the power of the planes to transform into a Medium elemental battle form. When you Cast this Spell, choose a listed element. While in this form, you gain the corresponding trait and the elemental trait. You have hands in this battle form and can take manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 19 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 10 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +18, and your damage bonus is +9. These are Dexterity based (air, fire, or metal) or Strength based (earth, water, or wood). If your corresponding unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics (air, fire, or metal) or Athletics (earth, water, or wood) modifier of +20; ignore this change if your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of elemental you choose:

  • Air
    • fly 80 feet, movement doesn't trigger reactions;
    • Melee 1 gust, Damage 1k4 bludgeoning.
  • Earth
    • Speed 20 feet, burrow 20 feet;
    • Melee 1 boulder, Damage 2k10 bludgeoning.
  • Fire
    • Speed 50 feet; fire resistance 10, weakness 5 to cold and 5 to water;
    • Melee 1 tendril, Damage 1k8 fire plus 1k4 persistent fire.
  • Metal
    • Speed 40 feet, fly 20 feet;
    • Melee 1 blade (versatile piercing), Damage 1k8 slashing plus 1k4 electricity.
  • Water
    • Speed 20 feet, swim 60 feet; fire resistance 5;
    • Melee 1 wave, Damage 1k12 bludgeoning, and you can spend an action immediately after a hit to push the target 5 feet with the effects of a successful @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Odepchnięcie}.
  • Wood
    • Speed 20 feet, climb 30 feet;
    • Melee 1 branch, Damage 2k10 bludgeoning.

Wywyższenie (6.) Your battle form is Large and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have space to expand or the spell is lost. You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 15 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +23, a damage bonus of +13, and Acrobatics or Athletics +23.

Wywyższenie (7.) Your battle form is Huge and your attacks have 15-foot reach. You must have space to expand or the spell is lost. You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 20 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +25, a damage bonus of +11, double the number of damage dice (including persistent damage), and Acrobatics or Athletics +25.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Qp0dlhJaCzXIx73r]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Elemental Form}

Elemental Gift.name: Elemental Gift
Elemental Gift.description:
An elemental force fills your target, granting the target the swiftness of air, the ruggedness of earth, the sting of fire, or the flexibility of water, depending on which element you choose. Choose an element when you Cast the Spell. The target gains the benefit of that element as described below, and this spell gains that trait's element.

  • Air The target gains a +30-foot status bonus to its land Speed and gains a fly Speed equal to its land Speed without the status bonus.
  • Earth While on the ground, the target gets a +2 status bonus to Fortitude and Reflex saves against effects that would @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Odepchnięcie} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Podcięcie} it, and to saves against effects that would attempt to knock it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}. In addition, the ground adjacent to the target is difficult terrain, and the difficult terrain moves with the target, though the target ignores this difficult terrain with its own movement.
  • Fire The target's melee unarmed Strikes and melee weapon Strikes deal 1k6 persistent fire damage on a hit.
  • Metal The target's Strikes using a metal weapon or an unarmed attack deal an additional 1k4 electricity damage on a hit and get a +1 status bonus to the attack roll if the target is made of metal or wearing metal armor.
  • Water The target takes on a watery sheen, gaining resistance 5 to fire and a swim Speed equal to its land Speed.
  • Wood The target gains a number of temporary Hit Points equal to the spell's rank, then gains half that number of temporary HP at the start of each of its turns.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.AF4vQ1xoOiJ1ewH1]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Elemental Gift}

Wywyższenie (8.) You can target up to 5 willing creatures.

Elemental Motion.name: Elemental Motion
Elemental Motion.description:
You call upon your element to propel you, improving your Speed depending on your element. This spell has your element's trait.

  • Air You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed.
  • Earth You gain a burrow Speed of 10 feet.
  • Fire You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed.
  • Metal You gain a burrow Speed of 10 feet.
  • Water You gain a swim Speed equal to your Speed and can breathe underwater.
  • Wood You gain a climb Speed equal to your Speed.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.uPmHi7ZiCj7PWM9N]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Elemental Motion}

Wywyższenie (6.) You also gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speeds.

Wywyższenie (9.) The status bonus increases to +20 feet.

Elemental Sense.name: Elemental Sense
Elemental Sense.description:
The elements grant you sensory enhancements. Choose one of the options below. The spell gains the listed trait or traits.

  • Aquatic Echolocation (water) You use your hearing as a precise sense when underwater.
  • Heatsense (fire) You can sense creatures with a temperature of 90º Fahrenheit or higher within 30 feet as an imprecise sense.
  • Magnetoreception (metal) You can sense creatures carrying metal items with a total of 1 Bulk or greater; this is an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet. If a creature is made of metal or has the metal trait, you can detect it as though magnetoreception were a precise sense. In addition, you continuously know which direction is north.
  • Mechanoreception (air) You can see @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialny} creatures and objects. They appear to you as translucent shapes, and they are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} to you.
  • Tremorsense(earth) You gain tremorsense (imprecise) with a range of 30 feet.
  • Woodsense(plant, wood) You can sense creatures carrying wood items with a total of 1 Bulk or greater; this is an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet. If a creature is made of wood or has the plant or wood trait, you can detect it as though woodsense were a precise sense.

Wywyższenie (6.) Czas trwania zwiększa się do 8 hours, and you can take 1 minute to recalibrate the sense, switching from your current elemental sense to a different one.

Elemental Sentinel.name: Elemental Sentinel
Elemental Sentinel.cost: precious metals, rare incense, and herbs worth a total value of 15 gp per spell rank
Elemental Sentinel.description:
You place a tiny elemental wisp within a single object, usually a mirror, statue, or other mundane-looking item, to serve as an alarm. Shattering or otherwise destroying the object frees the wisp and ends the ritual's effect even if the object is magically restored.

Krytyczny Sukces The elemental wisps inhabits the object and willingly serves you to the best of its ability. The wisp becomes aware of the target object's surroundings and can telepathically contact you with a range of 500 feet. It reports to you about intruders or other changes to the room in which it's located. You must tell the wisp what the criteria for the reports will be-for instance, when anyone not openly wearing a certain symbol enters the room or when an item is removed. The wisp has a +5 Perception modifier and observes the room using normal vision, normal hearing, and touch.

Sukces As critical success, but the range of the telepathy is 100 feet and the wisp's Perception modifier is +3.

Porażka You're unable to harness the spirit. The ritual fails.

Krytyczna Porażka The elemental wisp is trapped in the object as with a success, but it refuses or is somehow unable to help you. The elemental might have extremely low Intelligence or simply be spiteful. Regardless, the object's reports are always misleading.

Wywyższenie (4.) The range of the telepathic link increases, allowing the wisp to contact you anywhere on the same planet. Its Perception modifier increases to +10, or +12 on a critical success.

Wywyższenie (6.) As 4. level, except the wisp can see invisibility, and its Perception modifier increases to +15, or +17 on a critical success.

Elemental Servitor.name: Elemental Servitor
Elemental Servitor.cost: rare items and offerings worth a total value of 2 gp x the spell rank x the target's level, see text for more details
Elemental Servitor.description:
You implore an elemental lord to send an elemental servitor of the lord's choice, with a level no greater than double the ritual's spell rank. The secondary casters explain what sort of assistance you need and why you need it; if the task is incredibly fitting to the elemental lord, the GM can grant a circumstance bonus to the secondary Diplomacy check or rule that the check is automatically a critical success. If you use the ritual without good reason, the result is automatically a critical failure.

If the ritual succeeds, you must offer the servitor payment depending on factors such as the duration and danger of the task. Payment always costs at least as much as a consumable item of the creature's level, and often costs as much as a permanent magic item of the creature's level to persuade a creature to fight alongside you. Your offerings should either align with the personal tastes of the elemental lord, or with the element — such as fresh flowers and bonsai plants for wood, or gemstones for earth.

You can alternatively name a being native to an elemental plane that you know personally, with the same level restriction. Such a creature might request something they personally want as payment, such as a favor or a game of chance.

Krytyczny Sukces Your elemental lord sends a servitor, and the servitor's payment costs only half as much as normal. If you ask for a particular elemental creature by name, your lord is likely to send them unless the creature is busy.

Sukces Your elemental lord sends a servitor.

Porażka Your elemental lord does not send a servitor.

Krytyczna Porażka Your elemental lord is offended and sends a sign of displeasure or possibly even an elemental creature to scold or attack you, depending on your lord's nature.

Elemental Tempest.name: Elemental Tempest
Elemental Tempest.description:
Your spellcasting surrounds you in a storm of elemental energy.

If the next action you take is to Cast a Spell from your wizard spell slots that's an evocation spell dealing acid, cold, electricity, or fire damage, a 10-foot emanation of energy surrounds you as you cast the spell.

Foes in the area take 1k6 damage per spell rank of the spell you just cast of the same damage type the spell deals (choose one if it deals multiple types). Combine the damage from both elemental tempest and the other spell against foes who take damage from both before applying bonuses, penalties, resistance, weakness, and the like.

Elemental Toss.name: Elemental Toss
Elemental Toss.description:
With a flick of your wrist, you fling a chunk of your elemental matter at your foe. Make a ranged spell attack roll, dealing 1k8 damage on a success and double damage on a critical success. This spell deals damage according to your elemental influence (for instance, slashing for air or fire for fire) and has your element's trait.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k8.

Elemental Zone.name: Elemental Zone
Elemental Zone.description:
Select an elemental trait: air, earth, fire, metal, water, or wood. Elemental zone gains the trait you chose. You imbue the area with the raw energy of that element, creating a zone that emits and amplifies magic of that type. The temperature might suddenly rise or fall, a storm cloud might form, and so on. Spells with the chosen elemental trait cast against creatures in the zone get a +2 status bonus to one damage type the spell deals based on the chosen trait: bludgeoning or electricity for air, bludgeoning for earth, fire for fire, electricity or slashing damage for metal, bludgeoning or cold for water, and bludgeoning or vitality damage for wood. The caster chooses one type to add the bonus to if the spell deals more than one eligible type. This bonus is halved if the spell didn't use a spell slot (such as a cantrip, focus spell, or innate spell).

The zone has no effect on the spell if the spell doesn't deal any damage of an eligible type.

Wywyższenie (+2) The status bonus increases by 1.

Elephant Form.name: Elephant Form
Elephant Form.description:
You channel the primal forces of nature to transform into a Large battle form, specifically that of a powerful and terrifying elephant or similar creature, such as a mammoth, mastodon, or anancus. This spell has the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KhM8MhoUgoUjBMIz]{Dinosaur Form}, except you gain the following specific abilities instead of the form-specific abilities of dinosaur form.

  • Speed 40 feet;
  • Melee 1 foot, Damage 2k8 bludgeoning.
  • Melee 1 trunk (reach 10 feet), Efekt grabbing trunk;
  • Melee 1 tusk (reach 10 feet), Damage 2k6 piercing.

Grabbing Trunk A creature up to two sizes smaller that's hit by your trunk is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Pochwycony}. If you succeed at your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Pochwycenie} check against a creature grabbed by your trunk, you can reposition the creature to another space within your trunk's reach.

Wywyższenie (5.) Your elephant form is Huge; your trunk and tusk attacks have 15-foot reach, and your foot attack has 10-foot reach. You instead gain 20 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +18, a damage bonus of +6, double the damage dice, and Athletics +21.

Wywyższenie (7.) Your elephant form is Gargantuan; your trunk and tusk attacks have 20-foot reach, and your foot attack has 15-foot reach. Your AC is 21 + your level and you instead gain 25 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +25, a damage bonus of +15, double the damage dice, and Athletics +25.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.IWD5RehCxZVfgrX9]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Elephant Form}

Elysian Whimsy.name: Kaprysy Elizejskie
Elysian Whimsy.description:
Jeśli cel odniesie porażkę na rzucie obronnym Woli, przepełnia go niespodziewane i nieprzewidywalne pragnienie. Rzuć [[/r 1d4]]{1k4} aby określić efekt zaklęcia.

1k4Efekt
1Cel odczuwa wszechogarniającą ochotę by tańczyć. Na 1 rundę ponosi karę statusową –5 stóp do swoich Prędkości (kara statusowa –10 w wypadku krytycznej porażki), nie mogąć się oprzeć pokusie brykania i fikania.
2Cel odczuwa pokusę głośnego śpiewania. W ramach pierwszej akcji w swojej następnej turze musi on @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EEDElIyin4z60PXx]{Występować} śpiewając znaną mu piosenkę, lub przynajmniej wokalizując przyjemnie brzmienia jeśli nie zna żadnej piosenki. Przy krytycznej porażce cel musi poświęcić wszystkie swoje akcje w następnej turze na śpiewanie piosenki.
3Cel jest przepełniony nieodpartą potrzebą wspierania kariery rozrywkowej pobliskiej istoty. W ramach pierwszej akcji w swojej następnej turze musi on przygotować Wsparcie dla testu Występów dokonywanego przez najbliższą istotę, którą widzi, a ponadto może on użyć następnej zyskanej reakcji tylko na próbę Wsparcia istoty, której pomaga. Przy krytycznej porażce cel musi poświęcić wszystkie akcje w swojej następnej turze na przygotowanie Wsparcia dla testu Występów.
4Cel jest przepełniony pragnieniem rozdawania własnego bogactwa. W ramach pierwszej akcji w swojej następnej turze musi on wykonać Interakcję na rzecz wyciągnięcia jednego cennego przedmiotu, który ma przy sobie (takiego jak moneta, biżuteria czy inny przedmiot wykonany z cennego metalu), jeśli jeszcze nie ma takiego przedmiotu w dłoni. Następnie Wypuszcza ten cenny przedmiot. Jeśli cel ani nie trzyma ani nie ma przy sobie niczego cennego, spędza zamiast tego swoją pierwszą akcję głośno przepraszając, że nie ma przy sobie nic co mógłby oddać. Przy krytycznej porażce cel musi spędzić pozostałe po tym akcje w jego turze głośno przepraszając, że nie oddał nic więcej.

Embed Message.name: Embed Message
Embed Message.description:
You specify a trigger and a message up to 25 words long. When the specified trigger occurs within 30 feet of the target, illusory text of your message circles the target accompanied by a disembodied voice. You can choose a language you know for the text and speech, and can choose what the voice sounds like. Once the message is completed, the spell ends.

Wywyższenie (4.) You can add a simple sensory component to emphasize the message, such as an odor, visual effect, or physical sensation. This addition is obviously illusory and part of the message, lasting only while the message is being read.

Wywyższenie (6.) As 4. rank, but you can choose how many times the spell repeats the message before it ends; there is no limit to the number of repetitions.

Embodied Font.name: Embodied Font
Embodied Font.cost: magic items with a value of at least 2,000 gp
Embodied Font.description:
You place the magic items into a neat pile and attempt to draw out their power to form a new body that the target can inhabit.

Krytyczny Sukces The target materializes within range, with full Hit Points, 1 Mythic Point, and as if having just completed daily preparations.

Sukces As critical success, but all the target's spells and spell slots are expended.

Porażka As success, but the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 1}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 1} for 1 week.

Krytyczna Porażka The ritual fails and can't be attempted again for that target for 1 week. The magic items are still consumed.
Embodied Font.primarycheck: skill corresponding to the target's casting tradition (trained)
Embodied Font.target: the disembodied wildspell associated with the primary caster

Embodiment of Battle.name: Embodiment of Battle
Embodiment of Battle.description:
Your apparition guides your attacks and imparts its skill to your movements. For the duration, your proficiency with martial weapons is equal to your proficiency with simple weapons, you gain a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls made with weapons or unarmed attacks, and you gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.KAVf7AmRnbCAHrkT]{Reactive Strike} reaction; this reaction gains the apparition trait. The instincts of an apparition of battle run contrary to the use of magic; for the duration of this spell, you take a –2 status penalty to your spell attack modifiers and your spell DCs.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.uiXWJVwWuMS3KvkV]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Embodiment of Battle}

Wywyższenie (4th) The status bonus to attack and damage rolls granted by this spell is increased to +2.

Wywyższenie (7th) The status bonus to attack and damage rolls granted by this spell is increased to +3.

Embrace Nothingness.name: Embrace Nothingness
Embrace Nothingness.description:
You empty your body of substance, becoming one with nothingness. You gain resistance to physical damage equal to your level. You move at half your normal Speed, but can move in any direction (including up and down). While moving, you have concealment. When it is not your turn and during your turn until you take an action with the move trait, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialny}. You can pass through solid inanimate objects as long as they are no more than 2 feet thick

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.fVEevbKVBbCc1x2F]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Embrace Nothingness}

Embrace the Pit.name: Embrace the Pit
Embrace the Pit.description:
Devil horns grow from your skull, and your skin takes on features of the devil responsible for your diabolic bloodline. You gain resistance 5 to fire and poison, and resistance 1 to physical damage (except silver).

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.gX8O0ArQXbEVDUbW]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Embrace the Pit}

Wywyższenie (+2) The resistance to fire and poison increase by 5, and the resistance to physical damage (except silver) by 2.

Empathic Link.name: Empathic Link
Empathic Link.description:
You forge a bond between yourself and the target, enabling you to feel each other's emotions. You and the target can communicate empathetically, sharing emotions, at a distance of up to 1 mile.

Wywyższenie (4.) You can target up to 4 willing creatures, and the duration increases to 8 hours.

Empower Ley Line.name: Empower Ley Line
Empower Ley Line.cost: magical foci worth a total value of 50 gp × the spell rank × the target's level
Empower Ley Line.description:
You draw upon surrounding magical energy to empower a ley line, enhancing both its positive and negative effects.

The duration of an empowered ley line's benefits increases: when you successfully @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.gxtq81VAhpmNvEgA]{Tap Ley Line} that's empowered, you gain its benefits until the end of your next turn on a success (1 minute on a critical success).

You take double the damage if you fail to Tap a Ley Line that's empowered and double the damage from the ley line's backlash effects (if any). If a backlash effect has a duration, that duration increases: a backlash effect that would ordinarily last until the end of your next turn now lasts for 1 minute, effects that last for 1 minute now last for 10 minutes, effects that last for 10 minutes now last for 1 hour, and effects that last for 1 hour now last for 1 day.

Krytyczny Sukces You empower the ley line until the next turning of the season.

Sukces You empower the ley line for 1 week.

Porażka You fail to empower the ley line.

Krytyczna Porażka All casters take damage and suffer the ley line's backlash as if they had critically failed to Tap the Ley Line. This damage and backlash is enhanced as if the ley line were successfully empowered, leading to increased damage and longer backlash effects.
Empower Ley Line.primarycheck: Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion matching the ley line's tradition (legendarność)
Empower Ley Line.target: 1 ley line or ley line node up to double this ritual's rank

Empty Inside.name: Empty Inside
Empty Inside.description:
You inject a sliver of the void into your mind, momentarily remaking it into a bleak and empty place. Attempt a counteract check against one emotion effect affecting you.

Wywyższenie (5.) You can attempt counteract checks against any number of emotion effects affecting you.

Empty Pack.name: Empty Pack
Empty Pack.description:
You render every item inside the container you touch @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialny}, although the container itself remains visible. The items within are undetected to all creatures, though a creature can attempt to find an item by reaching into the bag, making an item @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Schowany} to them instead if they succeed. Additionally, the spell doesn't prevent the items from making protrusions in the bag, adding weight, making noise when jostling around, and so on. However, the spell prevents anything within the container from falling out if it's upended. Any object removed from the container becomes visible and remains visible even if returned to the container.

Wywyższenie (4.) The duration is until the next time you make your daily preparations.

Endure.name: Wytrwanie
Endure.description:
Pobudzasz umysł dotkniętej istoty i nakłaniasz ją, by parła naprzód. Zapewniasz dotkniętej istocie 5 tymczasowych Punktów Żywotności, które utrzymują się przez 1 minutę.

Wywyższenie (+1) Tymczasowe Punkty Żywotności zwiększają się o 5.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.AAypmg9Jz6Ysf02a]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Wytrwanie}

Enduring Might.name: Enduring Might
Enduring Might.description:
Aktywator An attack or effect would deal damage to you.

Your own might mingles with divine power to protect you from harm. You gain resistance equal to 8 plus your Strength modifier against all damage from the triggering attack or effect.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.ZHVtJKnur9PAF5TO]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Enduring Might}

Wywyższenie (+1) The resistance increases by 2.

Energy Absorption.name: Energy Absorption
Energy Absorption.description:
Aktywator An effect would deal acid, cold, electricity, or fire damage to you

You're used to mitigating the damage done by bombs, siege engines, and magical artillery. You gain resistance 15 to your choice of acid, cold, electricity, or fire damage from the triggering effect. The resistance applies only to the triggering effect's initial damage.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.lEU3DH1tGjAigpEt]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Energy Absorption}

Wywyższenie (+1) The resistance increases by 5.

Energy Aegis.name: Energy Aegis
Energy Aegis.description:
You protect the target with a powerful, long-lasting energy barrier. The target gains resistance 5 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, sonic, vitality, and void damage.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.4Lo2qb5PmavSsLNk]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Energy Aegis}

Wywyższenie (9.) The resistances increase to 10.

Enervation.name: Enervation
Enervation.description:
Extending a finger, you fire a beam of void energy that weakens the life force of any creature it touches. Each living creature in the line must attempt a Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature takes @Damage[(floor(@item.rank/2))d8[persistent,void]] damage.

Porażka The creature takes @Damage[(floor(@item.rank/2)*2)d8[persistent,void]] damage and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 1}.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature takes @Damage[(floor(@item.rank/2)*2)d8[persistent,void]] damage and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1}.

Wywyższenie (+2) The persistent void damage increases by 1k8 on a success, or by 2k8 on a failure or critical failure.

Enfeeble.name: Osłabienie
Enfeeble.description:
Wysysasz z celu jego siłę, w oparciu o jego rzut obronny Krzepy.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Cel jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 1} do początku twojej następnej tury.

Porażka Cel jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 2} na 1 minutę.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 3} na 1 minutę.

Engrave Memory.name: Engrave Memory
Engrave Memory.description:
You store memories inside a stone. This memory can convey up to 10 minutes of material. When you Cast this Spell, choose a command word. Doing so creates a carved symbol on the stone that hints at the word. Any creature can access the memories stored within the stone by using an action to speak the command word.

As it imparts the memories, the stone crumbles to dust, but the memory is infallibly available to the creature that activated the stone for the next 24 hours. After that time, the creature's normal capacity for memory must be relied upon to recall the stone's imparted memory. It's up to the GM what benefit the imparted memory grants, from circumstance bonuses to checks related to the memory or clear information on subjects the memory covers.

Enhance Senses.name: Enhance Senses
Enhance Senses.description:
You enhance the target's senses. The target gains low-light vision, and all of the target's imprecise senses have their distances doubled. If the target already has low-light vision, they gain darkvision.

Wywyższenie (+2) The number of targets increases by 1.

Enhance Victuals.name: Enhance Victuals
Enhance Victuals.description:
You transform the target into delicious fare, changing water into wine or another fine beverage or enhancing the food's taste and ingredients to make it a gourmet treat.

Prior to the transformation, the spell attempts to counteract any poisons in the food or water. The food turns back to normal if not consumed before the duration expires, though any poisons that were counteracted are still gone.

Wywyższenie (+1) The number of gallons of water you can target increases by 1, or the number of pounds of food you can target increases by 5.
Enhance Victuals.target: up to 1 gallon of non-magical water or up to 5 pounds of food

Enlarge.name: Powiększenie
Enlarge.description:
Wzmacniany magiczną mocą, cel wzrasta do rozmiaru Dużego. Jego ekwipunek rośnie razem z nim, ale powraca do naturalnych rozmiarów jeśli zostanie zdjęty. Istota jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarna 1}. Jej wysięg zwiększa się o 5 stóp (lub o 10 stóp jeśli była początkowo Malutka) oraz zyskuje ona premię statusową +2 do obrażeń w zwarciu. Zaklęcie to nie odnosi efektu na istotach Dużych i większych.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.sPCWrhUHqlbGhYSD]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Powiększenie}

Wywyższenie (4.) Istota wzrasta do rozmiaru Wielkiego. Premia statusowa do obrażeń wynosi +4 a wysięg istoty zwiększa się o 10 stóp (lub o 15 stóp jeśli była początkowo Malutka). Zaklęcie to nie odnosi efektu na istotach Wielkich i większych.

Wywyższenie (6.) Wybierz wersję zaklęcia z kręgu 2. lub 4. i obejmij jej efektem 10 godzących się istot.

Enlarge Companion.name: Enlarge Companion
Enlarge Companion.description:
Your animal companion grows much larger, towering over its foes in battle. Your animal companion becomes Large, gaining the effects of a 2. kręgu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Powiększenie} spell.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.r3SWKHCXxahSV54y]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Enlarge Companion}

Wywyższenie (4.) Your animal companion instead becomes Huge, gaining the benefits of a 4. kręgu enlarge spell

Entangle Fate.name: Entangle Fate
Entangle Fate.description:
You cause a swirl of energy to entangle the fates of all caught within the blast. Każda istota w obszarze musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature's fate becomes distorted, and momentary conflicting glimpses of the immediate future cause the creature to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda} until the start of its next turn.

Porażka As success, but the creature is off-guard for the duration of the spell. If more than one of the targets failed to resist this spell, the creature also becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 1} for the duration of the spell as its fate and those of the other creatures continue to clash and strain against each other.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but any creature that becomes stupefied 1 for the duration of the spell also becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1} for the spell's duration.

Entangling Flora.name: Plącząca Flora
Entangling Flora.description:
Rośliny i grzyby rosną w błyskawicznym tempie, oplątując istoty. Wszystkie powierzchnie w obszarze stają się trudnym terenem. W każdej rundzie, w której istota zaczyna swoją turę w obszarze, musi ona wykonać rzut obronny Refleksu. Przy porażce ponosi karę sytuacyjną –10 stóp do swoich Prędkości dopóki nie opuści obszaru a przy krytycznej porażce jest dodatkowo @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiona} na 1 rundę. Istota może próbować @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Ucieczki} aby usunąć te efekty.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.rjM25qfw5BKj9h97]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Plącząca Flora}

Enthrall.name: Oczarowanie
Enthrall.description:
Twoje słowa fascynują twoje cele. Przez cały czas rzucania oraz trwania zaklęcia mówisz lub śpiewasz bez przerwy. Cele, które zauważą twoją mowę lub pieśń mogą obdarzyć cię niepodzielną uwagą; każdy cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli. MG może przyznać premię sytuacyjną (maksymalnie +4) jeśli cel wyznaje przeciwną twojej religię, jest innego przodkostwa lub stronnictwa politycznego, albo z innych powodów niechętnie zgodziłby się z twoją wypowiedzią.

Każda istota wkraczająca w zasięg zaklęcia musi wykonać rzut obronny kiedy Podtrzymujesz zaklęcie. Jeśli mówisz, oczarowanie zyskuje cechę lingwistyczność.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel, który ponadto zauważa, że próbowałeś użyć magii.

Sukces Cel nie musi poświęcać ci uwagi, ale nie zauważa, ze próbowałeś użyć magii (może nadal zauważyć, że inni są oczarowani).

Porażka Cel jest tobą @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Zafascynowany}. Może wykonać kolejny rzut obronny Woli jeśli stanie sie świadkiem akcji lub wypowiedzi, z którymi się nie zgadza. Jeśli odniesie sukces, przestaje być zafascynowany i staje się niewrażliwy na 1 godzinę. Jeśli cel stanie się obiektem wrogiej akcji, lub jeśli inna istota odniesie przeciw niemu sukces na teście Dyplomacji lub Zastraszania, fascynacja kończy się natychmiast.

Krytyczna Porażka Jak porażka, ale cel nie może podjemować rzutu obronnyego przeciw fascynacji kiedy się z tobą nie zgadza.

Entrancing Eyes.name: Entrancing Eyes
Entrancing Eyes.description:
Your eyes glow with an entrancing radiance that captivates those who meet your gaze. Any creature that ends its turn within the emanation must attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected and becomes immune to this particular casting of the spell.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Porażka Until the end of its next turn, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Zafascynowany}.

Krytyczna Porażka Until the end of its next turn, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 4}, Fascinated, and can't take reactions. In addition, all creatures and objects other than you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} from the target.

During any round you Sustain the Spell, you can use a single action, which has the manipulate trait, to focus your entrancing eyes on a single creature you can see within 30 feet. This creature must immediately make a Will save against the spell as if it were ending its turn in the emanation. If the creature was already Fascinated by your entrancing eyes before its save, a failed save causes it to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Sparaliżowany} for 1 round. You can't use this action to focus on the same creature more than once per round.

Entreat Spirit.name: Entreat Spirit
Entreat Spirit.description:
You invite a spirit you've bonded with to bolster your mind. You gain a +1 status bonus to an Intelligence-, Wisdom-, or Charisma-based skill of your choice. Additionally, you gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against curse, death, emotion, and fear effects.

Wywyższenie (4th) The status bonus to the skill and your saving throws increases to +2.

Wywyższenie (8th) The status bonus to the skill and your saving throws increases to +3.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Fms3IfhXqHiKAxlC]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Entreat Spirit}
Entreat Spirit.requirements: You must be Bonded with a Spirit

Entreat Thunderbird.name: Entreat Thunderbird
Entreat Thunderbird.cost: rare incense and offerings worth 300 gp
Entreat Thunderbird.description:
You entreat the thunderbird in the Tusk Mountains to come to your aid. While performing this ritual, the secondary casters can appeal to the thunderbird's pride or tempestuous nature to gain a +2 circumstance bonus to their checks.

Krytyczny Sukces The thunderbird is helpful to the casters for the duration.

Sukces The thunderbird is friendly to the casters for the duration.

Porażka The thunderbird ignores the entreaty and remains indifferent.

Krytyczna Porażka The thunderbird takes offense and permanently departs the area.
Entreat Thunderbird.secondarycheck: Diplomacy, Mountain Lore, Nature, or Survival

Entreat the Many.name: Entreat the Many
Entreat the Many.description:
You manifest echoes of all the spirits you've ever bonded with at once, in a spiraling cyclone of colorful forms. They deal 8k8 force damage to each enemy in the area, with a basic Fortitude save. Additionally, creatures that critically fail the save are knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k8.

Entropic Wheel.name: Entropic Wheel
Entropic Wheel.description:
Aktywator You deal cold or fire damage to an enemy

You stockpile thermal energy in a magical wheel-like construct that lets you burn opponents with cold or freeze their bodies with heat. When you Cast the Spell, the wheel has one mote of thermal energy, and when you use a cold or fire effect or deal cold or fire damage, the wheel spins, siphoning off a bit of energy and gaining another mote. The wheel can't gain motes more than once on a given turn, and the maximum number of motes is equal to entropic wheel's level.

When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Rzucanie Zaklęcia} that deals fire damage, the target also takes cold damage equal to the number of motes in the entropic wheel. When you Cast a Spell that deals cold damage, the target also takes fire damage equal to the number of motes in the entropic wheel. This applies only to the initial damage of the spell, not to any persistent damage or ongoing effects.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.znwjWUvGOFQ6VYaE]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Entropic Wheel}

Entwined Roots.name: Entwined Roots
Entwined Roots.description:
Slithering roots gird you and your allies in layers of flexible wooden protection. Each affected creature gains resistance 5 to bludgeoning and piercing damage. Whenever a creature protected by these roots is targeted by a ranged weapon attack but takes no damage (such as if the attack missed or the damage was reduced to 0 by resistance), the roots snatch up the ammunition or thrown weapon and hold it. The protected creature can retrieve the thrown weapon or ammunition as an Interact action.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.nFOJ53IkO5khO4Rr]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Entwined Roots}

Wywyższenie (7.) The resistances increase to 10.

Wywyższenie (9.) The resistances increase to 15.

Envenom Companion.name: Envenom Companion
Envenom Companion.description:
You envenom your companion or eidolon's attacks, which drip with highly toxic venom for the spell's duration. The first time each round the target hits a creature with an unarmed Strike that deals piercing or slashing damage, that Strike deals an additional 1k8 poison damage. A creature that is damaged by this poison must attempt a Fortitude save. On a failure, it's also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1} for 1 round. This spell can't target familiars.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.zPGVOLz6xhsQN35C]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Envenom Companion}

Wywyższenie (+3) The poison damage increases by 1k8 and the clumsy value imposed on a failed save increases by 1.

Environmental Endurance.name: Environmental Endurance
Environmental Endurance.description:
You shield the target against dangerous temperatures. Choose severe cold or heat. The target is protected from the temperature you chose (but not extreme cold or heat).

Wywyższenie (3.) The target is protected from severe cold and severe heat.

Wywyższenie (5.) The target is protected from severe cold, severe heat, extreme cold, and extreme heat.

Ephemeral Hazards.name: Ephemeral Hazards
Ephemeral Hazards.description:
Area (continued) four 10-foot-by-10-foot spaces

You create illusory hazards, such as spinning blades or a puddle of acid, in four 10-foot-by–10-foot spaces within range. The hazards are merely a mental projection, and a creature receives a Will save each time it touches a hazard or is occupying one's space at the start of its turn. Depending on the result, the creature takes 4k6 mental damage and might have difficulty moving through the area. A creature can take this damage only once per turn, even if it moves through several hazards. Choose bludgeoning, slashing, piercing, acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage when you Cast ephemeral hazards; resistances and weaknesses to those damage types apply if the target thinks they do, as judged by the GM. You can freely choose the appearance and damage type of each hazard as long as its appearance reflects the type of damage it deals (for instance, a hazard that deals piercing damage might take the form of sharpened spikes).

Krytyczny Sukces The creature is unaffected by the hazards and no longer needs to attempt Will saves against them.

Sukces The creature realizes the hazards aren't real but still takes half damage from them; on future Will saves against the hazards, the creature continues to use this result unless it rolls a critical success.

Porażka The target takes full damage and treats the square as difficult terrain.

Krytyczna Porażka The target takes double damage and can't pass through a square containing a hazard.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k6.

Ephemeral Tracking.name: Ephemeral Tracking
Ephemeral Tracking.description: You can look at currents in the air and water and see tracks that you can follow just as you would on land. You can use Survival to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Tropienie} through both air and water, noticing aerial or aquatic "tracks" of all creatures who passed nearby in the last hour. It's more difficult to Track in this way: the DC to Track through air or water is always at least 30, or higher after precipitation or wind (in the air) or heavy tides or currents (in the water). It's possible to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SB7cMECVtE06kByk]{Zacieranie Śladów} against this spell, but creatures might not realize they need to do so.

Eradicate Undeath.name: Eradicate Undeath
Eradicate Undeath.description:
A massive deluge of life energy causes the undead to fall apart. Each undead creature in the area takes 4k12 vitality damage.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k12.

Erase Trail.name: Erase Trail
Erase Trail.description:
You drastically reduce all signs of one specific creature's passage from the area, including footprints, handprints, dirt, and minor changes caused to the surrounding environment, like the bending of grass. The DC of checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Szukanie} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.TiNDYUGlMmxzxBYU]{Search} and discover such signs within the area gains a +4 status bonus or is equal to your spell DC, whichever is higher. This spell doesn't repair objects the creature damaged, return slain creatures to life, or remove objects or garbage left behind. It also doesn't prevent others from noticing that the creature's trail ends or begins abruptly outside the area. Finally, this spell doesn't hide the creature from sight or prevent them from leaving new signs of their presence after this spell is cast.

Wywyższenie (+2) The range increases by 100 feet, the area increases by 20 feet, and you can remove all signs of 1 additional creature's passage from the area.

Establish Nexus.name: Establish Nexus
Establish Nexus.cost: magical foci worth 100 gp × the spell rank × the node's level
Establish Nexus.description:
You focus the power of the node's intersecting ley lines into a powerful confluent point known as a ley line nexus. The ley line nexus grows out from the node in a 20-foot radius. The ley line nexus is more open and available for access to creatures you designate. When @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.gxtq81VAhpmNvEgA]{Tapping the Ley Line}, these creatures get a degree of success one better than they rolled

Krytyczny Sukces The ley line nexus is established. The nexus is particularly powerful, allowing it to continually refresh its magical energy; thus, the nexus lasts for up to 100 years, unless the ley lines shift.

Sukces The ley line nexus is established and lasts for a year and one day, unless the ley lines shift.

Porażka You fail to establish the ley line nexus.

Krytyczna Porażka All casters take damage and suffer backlash effects as if they had critically failed to Tap every Ley Line in the node simultaneously, and they can't attempt to Tap those Ley Lines for a year and one day
Establish Nexus.primarycheck: Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion, matching the ley line's tradition (mistrzostwo)
Establish Nexus.target: 1 ley line node up to double establish nexus's level

Establish Ward.name: Establish Ward
Establish Ward.description:
You bind a part of your essence to your surroundings, creating a warded area that grants you power within it, but drains you outside of it. While within the area, you can make nature's wrath Strikes by commanding plants, wind, rocks, and other natural features to attack enemies. These are melee Strikes that use your spell attack modifier, can target any creature within the ward, and deal 3k8 bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage.

Upon Casting the Spell, you can immediately make a single nature's wrath Strike. You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Przyspieszony} while inside the ward, and can use the additional action only to make nature's wrath Strikes. You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} while outside the area.

Wywyższenie (+2) The area increases by 5 feet, and the Strikes deal an additional 1k8 damage.

Ethereal Jaunt.name: Ethereal Jaunt
Ethereal Jaunt.description:
You travel to the Ethereal Plane, which overlaps the Material Plane. Material Plane creatures can't see you, and you can move through things on the Material Plane. You move at half your normal Speeds, but can move in any direction (including up and down). You can see onto the Material Plane within a radius of 60 feet; it is gray, hazy, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} from you. You can't affect the Material Plane, and you can't be affected by the Material Plane except by force effects and abjurations originating there. When the spell ends, you return to the Material Plane. If you're in the air, you fall (unless you can fly), and if you're inside an object, you're pushed into the nearest open space and take 1k6 damage per 5 feet you were pushed. If you cast this spell when not on the Material Plane, it is lost.

Wywyższenie (9.) You can target up to five additional willing creatures at a range of 30 feet. The duration is up to 10 minutes.

9.target: you and up to five additional willing creatures

Etheric Shards.name: Etheric Shards
Etheric Shards.description:
You reach out and sow glittering splinters of force throughout the area, otherworldly caltrops of will and ectoplasm. The area is difficult terrain, even to flying or incorporeal creatures. Any creature that moves through the area takes 1k4 piercing damage per square traversed, with a basic Reflex save made at the end of each move action they take through the area.

Wywyższenie (+2) The spell's area increases by 5 feet, and the piercing damage increases by 1.

Euphoric Renewal.name: Euphoric Renewal
Euphoric Renewal.description:
You view death not as an ending but a beginning, and you delight in dancing on its edge. Each time you gain the dying condition and then regain consciousness while under the effect of euphoric renewal, you gain three benefits.

  • You're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Przyspieszony} on your next turn. You can use the extra action only to Stand.
  • You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves for 1 minute.
  • You gain 8 temporary Hit Points that last for 1 minute.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.16QrxIYal7PJFL2W]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Euphoric Renewal}

Wywyższenie (+1) The number of temporary HP increases by 2.

Everlight.name: Everlight
Everlight.description:
The gemstone you touch glows, spreading bright light with a color of your choice in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet). The spell ends immediately if the gemstone is broken.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.hpbCDbDOoVyhOmck]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Everlight}
Everlight.target: a gemstone worth 6 gp or more

Evil Eye.name: Evil Eye
Evil Eye.description: Your patron's resentment manifests in a baleful, envious gaze. The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1} if it fails a Will save (or sickened 2 on a critical failure). This condition value can't be reduced below 1 while the spell is active and you can see the target.

Evolution Surge.name: Gwałtowna Ewolucja
Evolution Surge.description:
Zalewasz swojego eidolona energią, powodując tymczasową ewolucję jego zdolności. Wybierz jeden z poniższych efektów:

  • Twój eidolon zyskuje widzenie w słabym świetle i widzenie w ciemności.
  • Twój eidolon zyskuje @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.rqfnQ5VHT5hxm25r]{Węch} jako nieprecyzyjny zmysł o zasięgu 30 stóp.
  • Twój eidolon może oddychać pod wodą oraz zyskuje Prędkość pływania równą jego Prędkości lądowej lub 30 stóp, którakolwiek wartość jest mniejsza. Alternatywnie, jeśli twój eidolon jest zwykle stworzeniem wodnym, może oddychać powietrzem i zyskuje Prędkość lądową równą jego Prędkości pływania lub 30 stóp, którakolwiek wartość jest mniejsza. W obu wypadkach zyskuje cechę ziemnowodności.
  • Twój eidolon zyskuje premię statusową +20 stóp do swojej Prędkości.

Wywyższenie (3.) Dodaj do listy wyborów poniższe opcje:

  • Rozmiar twojego eidolona zmienia się na Duży. Zwiększa to wysięg twojego eidolona do 10 stóp, ale nie zmienia innych jego statystyk. Dzięki specjalnej więzi, która was łączy, możesz ujeżdżać swojego eidolona nie przeszkadzając mu w funkcjonowaniu. Jeśli inna istota spróbuje ujeżdżać twojego eidolona, zarówno ty jak i ona odzyskujecie na początku swojej tury w każdej rundzie jedynie 2 akcje, tak jak zazwyczaj ma to miejsce.
  • Twój eidolon zyskuje Prędkość wspinaczki równą jego Prędkości lądowej.

Wywyższenie (5.) Dodaj do listy wyborów opcje z wywyższenia na 3. krąg oraz poniższe opcje:

  • Rozmiar twojego eidolona zmienia się na Wielki. Ma to takie same efekty co dostępna na 3 kręgu opcja zwiększenia jego rozmiaru do Dużego, ale wysięg twojego eidolona zwiększa się do 15 stóp.
  • Twój eidolon zyskuje Prędkość latania równą jego Prędkości lądowej.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.1XlF12UbvJsTZxfp]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Gwałtowna Ewolucja}

Exchange Image.name: Wymiana Wyglądu
Exchange Image.description:
Aby zbić z tropu prześladowców, Lacunafex opracowała sposób na podmianę aparycji. Zamieniasz się wyglądem z celem, z efektem zależnym od rzutu obronnego Woli celu. Godzące się i @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Nieprzytomne} cele automatycznie uzyskują na rzucie krytyczną porażkę.

Krytyczny Sukces Brak efektu.

Sukces Przyjmujesz wygląd celu, a cel przyjmuje twój. Ma to te same efekty co zaklęcie @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Iluzorycznego Przebrania} 1. kręgu, z tą różnicą, że cel nie może Odwołać swojego przebrania. Czas trwania wynosi 1 minutę lub do Odwołania.

Porażka Jak przy sukcesie, ale czas trwania wynosi 1 godzinę lub do Odwołania.

Krytyczna Porażka Jak przy sukcesie, ale czas trwania wynosi 24 godziny lub do Odwołania.

Excise Lexicon.name: Excise Lexicon
Excise Lexicon.description:
You reach into a creature's mind and extract its knowledge of a word. Choose a word to excise when you Cast the Spell. The word must be a mundane word, not a proper noun, and not a word of power such as those used as verbal components for spells. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli. The target forgets any words you remove with this spell. While the spell lasts, the target doesn't register or understand the excised words in any form, signed, spoken, written, or otherwise, and can't comprehend them by any means, even by a tongues spell or similar magic. The spell fails if you don't share at least one language with the target. However, the target forgets the words from each language they know, not just your shared languages.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected and knows which words you attempted to excise.

Sukces The spell's duration is 1 minute.

Porażka The spell's duration is 1 day.

Krytyczna Porażka The spell's duration is unlimited.

Wywyższenie (+2) You excise one additional word.

Execute.name: Execute
Execute.description:
You point at a creature and invoke the demise of all things. The target takes 70 void damage with a basic Fortitude save. If the target is undead or otherwise has void healing, the spell loses the death and void traits and gains the vitality trait, and the target takes 70 vitality damage with a basic Fortitude save.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 10.

Expeditious Excavation.name: Expeditious Excavation
Expeditious Excavation.description:
Area (continued) cube of dirt 5 feet across or smaller

You remove loose dirt, dust, gravel, sand, and the like (though not solid stone) up to the size of a 5-foot cube. Any Medium or smaller creature standing atop the earth when the spell is cast must attempt a Reflex save or @Check[acrobatics] check.

Sukces The creature is unaffected and can choose to either descend the pit without damage or move to the nearest available space of its choice.

Porażka The creature falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony} in the nearest available space of its choice or falls into the pit if it prefers.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature falls into the pit excavated by the spell and lands prone, taking falling damage as normal.

Wywyższenie (+2) The spell can excavate an additional 5-foot cube of earth. If you excavate all four 5-foot cubes beneath a Large creature, it must attempt a Reflex save or Acrobatics check, as above.

Exploding Earth.name: Eksplodująca Ziemia
Exploding Earth.description:
Ciskasz w istotę skondendowaną kulą ziemi i kamienia, która eksploduje przy uderzeniu. Wykonaj atak zaklęciem przeciw KP istoty. Przy trafieniu zadajesz 4k6 obrażeń obuchowych plus 1k6 rozpryskowych obrażeń obuchowych. Przy trafieniu krytycznym podwój wstępne obrażenia, ale nie obrażenia rozpryskowe, a dodatkowo wróg musi wykonać rzut obronny Krzepy lub pada @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}.

Wywyższenie (+2) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6 a obrażenia rozpryskowe zwiększają się o 1k6.

Extend Blood Magic.name: Extend Blood Magic
Extend Blood Magic.description: You call upon the arcane energy coursing through your blood to extend the magic it grants. If your next action is to Cast a Spell that grants you a blood magic effect that lasts for at least 1 round, you or a target gain the blood magic effect for an additional round. You can have only one extended blood magic effect at a time.

Extend Boost.name: Extend Boost
Extend Boost.description:
You focus on the intricacies of the magic binding you to your eidolon to extend the duration of your boost eidolon or reinforce eidolon spell. If your next action is to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.HStu2Yhw3iQER9tY]{Boost Eidolon} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TYbCj4dgXDOZou9k]{Reinforce Eidolon}, attempt a skill check with the skill associated with the tradition of magic you gain from your eidolon (such as Nature for a primal eidolon). The DC is usually a standard-difficulty DC of your level, but the GM can assign a different DC based on the circumstances. The effect depends on the result of your check.

Krytyczny Sukces The spell lasts 4 rounds.

Sukces The spell lasts 3 rounds.

Porażka The spell lasts 1 round, but you don't spend the Focus Point for casting this spell.

Extend Spell.name: Extend Spell
Extend Spell.description: You call upon your blood's knowledge of the ancients to extend your magic. If your next action is to Cast a Spell with a duration of 1 minute on a single target, the spell instead lasts 10 minutes. You can extend a spell only if you cast it from a spell slot lower than your highest spell slot, and you can have only one active spell at a time extended in this way.

Extract Brain.name: Extract Brain
Extract Brain.cost: fine surgical tools and rare preservative salts and fluids worth a total value of 100 gp
Extract Brain.description:
You perform a complex magical operation on a willing or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Spętany} creature or a corpse, delicately cutting into the skull and removing the creature's brain without damaging the organ. If you have an empty brain cylinder on hand, you can place the extracted brain into the brain cylinder as part of this ritual (this includes preparing the brain cylinder for use, such as removing a previous brain and filling the cylinder with the preservative fluids required to make it function).

Or at the GM's discretion, if you have a nearly completed carrion golem at hand, you can place the extracted brain into the golem. The body of a living creature subjected to this ritual dies, regardless of the ritual's result, as does the extracted brain if it is not placed into a golem or cylinder (or otherwise preserved) within 3 rounds.

Krytyczny Sukces The ritual succeeds on a living creature, or on a corpse that has been dead no longer than 8 hours before the ritual began. If you place the brain into a golem, the golem retains the brain's memories, along with its mental ability scores, alignment, and related skills.

Sukces The ritual succeeds on a living creature or on a corpse that has been dead no longer than 1 hour before the ritual began.

Porażka The ritual fails and the brain dies.

Krytyczna Porażka The ritual seems to succeed but warps the brain unrecognizably into a hostile entity, potentially allowing an alien intelligence to seep into it.

Wywyższenie (8.) You can place the extracted brain into an inactive flesh golem on a critical success.

Wywyższenie (9.) You can place the extracted brain into an inactive alchemical golem on a critical success.
Extract Brain.target: 1 Large or smaller creature or corpse

Extract Poison.name: Extract Poison
Extract Poison.description:
With the lightest touch, you can siphon the poison from an object and save it for your own later use, making an assassin's blade or politician's wine less deadly while you become all the more so. Attempt a counteract check against one poison you're aware of on or in an object you touch. If you successfully counteract the poison, you negate the object's toxicity and transfer the poison into a weapon you are holding, coating the weapon with a simple but powerful poison. On your next successful attack with that weapon before the end of your next turn, you add 1k6 poison damage per level of the poison you counteracted. On a critically failed attack roll, you lose the extracted poison from your weapon as normal.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.fEhCbATDNlt6c1Ug]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Extract Poison}
Extract Poison.target: 1 poison on or in an object

Eyes of the Dead.name: Eyes of the Dead
Eyes of the Dead.description:
You enter a magical trance that allows you to perceive through the senses of the target creature. You attempt Perception checks using your own Perception, but you have any special senses the target has, such as low-light vision or darkvision. The spell doesn't grant any special method of communication with the target. For the duration of the trance, your own senses are muted, though you can still communicate. This lack of awareness makes you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda}. You can't take actions with the attack or move traits, nor can you cast spells.

Wywyższenie (6.) The range increases to 100 miles and the duration to sustained up to 10 minutes. You can communicate telepathically with the target for the duration of the trance, though the target is under no compulsion to follow commands if it wasn't already.
Eyes of the Dead.target: one undead creature under your control

Fabricated Truth.name: Fabricated Truth
Fabricated Truth.description:
Choose a single statement you want the targets to believe. The fact could be narrow, such as "a dragon is circling overhead and wants to kill me"; wide-reaching, such as "all humanoids are disguised abominations"; or conceptual, such as "if I don't live a kinder life, I'll be punished in the afterlife." The targets' experiences color how they react to this "truth" and how their behavior changes. If the statement changes what they perceive, they treat the change as a sudden revelation. The effect of the spell depends on the targets' Will saves. If a target is already affected by fabricated truth, your spell tries to counteract it. If the counteract check fails, the outcome of the target's saving throw can't be worse than a success.

Krytyczny Sukces The target doesn't believe the statement, and it knows you tried to trick it.

Sukces The target doesn't believe the statement or realize you tried to trick it.
