Porażka The target believes the statement for 1 week.

Krytyczna Porażka The target believes the statement with unlimited duration.

Face in the Crowd.name: Face in the Crowd
Face in the Crowd.description:
While in a crowd of roughly similar creatures, your appearance becomes bland and nondescript. You gain a +2 status bonus to Deception and Stealth checks to go incognito among the crowd, and you ignore difficult terrain caused by the crowd. This counts as setting up a disguise for the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Podszywać Się} use of Deception and you add your level even if you're untrained.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.4iakL7fDcZ8RT6Tu]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Face in the Crowd}

Wywyższenie (3.) The spell gains a range of 10 feet and can target up to 10 creatures.

Faerie Dust.name: Wróżkowy Pył
Faerie Dust.description:
Rozsypujesz w obszarze zaklęcia magiczny pył, który ułatwia oszukiwanie znajdujących się w nim osób. Każda istota w obszarze musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli. Za każdą dodatkową akcję przeznaczoną na Rzucanie Zaklęcia, zwiększ promień wybuchu o 5 stóp.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Porażka Istota nie może używać reakcji i ponosi karę statusową –2 do testów Percepcji i rzutów obronnych Woli.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.LHREWCGPkWsc4GGJ]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Wróżkowy Pył (Porażka)}

Krytyczna Porażka Jak porażka ale istota ponosi dodatkowo karę statusową –1 do testów Percepcji i rzutów obronnych Woli na 1 minutę.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.pcK88HqL6LjBNH2h]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Wróżkowy Pył (Krytyczna Porażka)}

Wywyższenie (+3) Początkowy promień zwiększa się o 5 stóp.

Faerie Fire.name: Ogień Faerie
Faerie Fire.description: Wszystkie istoty znajdujące się w obszarze w momencie rzucenia zaklęcia zostają na czas trwania zaklęcia powleczone barwnym, choć nieparzącym ogniem wybranego przez ciebie koloru. Widoczne istoty nie mogą zostać @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięte} kiedy znajdują się pod wpływem blasku Faerie. Jeśli istoty są @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialne}, zamiast być @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Niewykryte} są Przysłonięte tak długo jak znajdują się pod wpływem blasku faerie.

Falling Sky.name: Falling Sky
Falling Sky.description:
Extraordinary telekinetic pressure smashes down through the area, battering creatures within it to the ground. All flying creatures in the area descend to the bottom of the spell's area, taking twice as much bludgeoning damage as if they had fallen the distance moved, to a maximum of 60 falling Damage if they fall 60 feet. They take this falling damage even if the spell's area is entirely in the air and they don't hit the ground, as they concuss against the bottom of the spell's area at great speed. Creatures on the ground and within the spell's area, including flying creatures forced to the ground, must attempt Fortitude saves.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature is unaffected, and if it was flying, it isn't knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony} even though it took falling damage.

Sukces The creature is knocked prone.

Porażka The creature is knocked prone and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 2}.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is knocked prone and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony} for 1 round.

Falling Stars.name: Falling Stars
Falling Stars.description:
Area 4 40-foot bursts

You reach into the skies and call down an array of falling stars that explode upon colliding with the ground. Choose for the falling stars to be airbursts (sonic), asteroids (fire), comets (cold), or plasma (electricity). The spell gains the trait of the falling star type you chose. The four stars' central 10-foot bursts can't overlap. Each falling star deals 6k10 bludgeoning damage to each creature in the @Template[burst|distance:10] at the center of its area of effect before exploding, dealing 14k6 energy damage of the type you chose to each creature in its @Template[burst|distance:40]. A creature in any of the areas attempts one basic Reflex save against the spell no matter how many overlapping explosions it's caught in and can take each type of damage only once.

Wywyższenie (+1) The bludgeoning damage increases by 1k10, and the energy damage increases by 2k6.

Fallow Field.name: Fallow Field
Fallow Field.description:
A sickly yellow light fills the area as entropic forces prevent healing. When a creature within the area would regain Hit Points, such as from a healing effect or an ability like fast healing or regeneration, it must attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature regains the full number of Hit Points that would be restored by the healing effect and is temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Sukces The creature regains the full number of Hit Points that would be restored.

Porażka The creature regains only half the number of Hit Points that would be restored.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature doesn't regain Hit Points from the healing effect.

False Nature.name: False Nature
False Nature.description: You create an illusion that makes an object seem to be something entirely different. When you Cast this Spell, speak aloud a declarative statement that the target is a different, nonspecific object. Your statement can't presuppose any other facts. For instance, you could claim an object is "a stone" or "an antidote," but not "the Starstone" or "the antidote to the lethal poison you already drank." Creatures who previously observed the target receive an immediate Will save to disbelieve, but on a failure, the illusion temporarily rewrites their memory that the object was something different. A creature who failed their Will save, or didn't already see the item's original form, must Interact with the illusion as normal to receive a Perception check against the spell DC to disbelieve. When the spell ends, targets remember the object's true nature, even if they never disbelieved the spell.
False Nature.target: one unattended item or one item you're holding

False Vision.name: False Vision
False Vision.description: You create a false image that fools any attempts to scry on an area. Any scrying spell sees, hears, smells, and otherwise detects whatever you wish within the area, rather than what is actually in the area. You can Sustain the spell each round to change the illusion as you desire, including playing out a complex scene. If the scrying spell is of a higher rank than false vision, the scryer can attempt a Perception check to disbelieve the illusion, though even if they're successful, they can't learn what's truly going on in the area.

False Vitality.name: Fałszywa Witalność
False Vitality.description:
Wzmacniasz swoje ciało energiami, które na ogół używane są do manipulacji nieumarłymi. Zyskujesz 10 tymczasowych Punktów Żywotności.

Wywyższenie (+1) Tymczasowe Punkty Żywotności zwiększają się o 3.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.PANUWN5xXC20WBg2]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Fałszywa Witalność}

Falsify Heat.name: Falsify Heat
Falsify Heat.description:
You veil the signs of the fires of vitality, altering the target's apparent body temperature. This illusion applies to all senses, and a creature that touches the target can attempt to disbelieve the illusion. You can Dismiss the spell. Choose an illusory body temperature when you cast the spell.

  • Moderate The target's body temperature appears the same as the surrounding environment, giving the target a +2 circumstance bonus to Deception checks to Impersonate an undead, a cold-blooded creature, or an inanimate object (such as a corpse). The target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialny} to heatvision and other abilities that sense heat similarly.
  • Warm The target appears to emit substantial body heat, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to Deception checks to Impersonate a warm-blooded creature.

Wywyższenie (4.) You can target up to 10 creatures, and you can choose a different body temperature for each of them.

Familiar Form.name: Familiar Form
Familiar Form.description:
You transform into a Tiny animal that commonly serves as a spellcaster's familiar. You gain the effects of the spell pest form, heightened to the level of familiar form you cast. However, you can transform into only a bat, cat, raven, snake, or other Tiny animal of a type that you have seen serve as a spellcaster's familiar.

While in this form, despite the restrictions from polymorph battle forms, you retain the ability to cast spells of 1. rank or lower but only those without material components. You still can't make any Strikes or other attacks in pest form, as normal.

Wywyższenie (6.) You retain the ability to cast spells of 2. rank or lower, rather than 1., but still only those without material components. Additionally, the duration of familiar form increases to 10 minutes.

Wywyższenie (8.) You retain the ability to cast spells of 3. rank or lower, rather than 1., but still only those without material components. Additionally, the duration of familiar form increases to 10 minutes.

Familiar's Face.name: Familiar's Face
Familiar's Face.description: The target becomes a scrying sensor, allowing you to see through its eyes, smell what it smells, and similarly use its other senses. If you Cast a Spell with the revelation trait that affects your senses, such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{Dojrzenie Niedostrzegalnego}, while this spell is active, you gain the benefit of the spell through the target's senses instead of your own. You can also speak through the target with a voice much like yours, though it takes on some of the timbre and character of the target's growls or squawks. You can use Command an Animal on the target as part of Sustaining this spell. You don't need line of sight or line of effect to your target when you Cast this Spell.
Familiar's Face.target: 1 willing creature that's your animal companion or familiar

Fantastic Facade.name: Fantastic Facade
Fantastic Facade.cost: mystical paint, elaborate veils, and powdered minerals worth 20 000 gp total
Fantastic Facade.description:
Area up to 1 mile radius circle centered on you.

You draw a permanent series of complex illusions over the target settlement, choosing the look, sound, feel, and smell of the structures, terrain, and creatures within at the time the ritual is cast. You can alter the appearance of existing structures and creatures, and you can add illusory structures or creatures. For example, you could cause everything and everyone in the target area to appear green, create an illusory forest with a thick canopy that obscures the settlement from outside view, or make empty ruins seem inhabited and pristine. When you create the facade, you determine which illusory elements remain static (limited to basic natural movement, such as flags blowing in the breeze) and which follow a basic program (for example, a daily parade in the town square, complete with marching band). You're unable to alter the programs after you create the facade.

You can disguise creatures as you please, with the same effects as a 3. kręgu illusory disguise. If a creature affected by the facade leaves the area, any illusions affecting it fade after 1 day. You decide when casting the ritual whether newcomers are disguised by the illusions, and whether the disguise appears immediately or after a set period, up to 1 week.

A creature that interacts with the target settlement in a way that would suggest or reveal the illusory nature of the facade, such as by trying to paint a building affected by the facade or climbing an illusory structure, can attempt to disbelieve the illusion. The illusions created by the spell are harmless, so an illusory river of lava wouldn't cause damage, nor could thorns on an illusory rose bush prick someone.

Krytyczny Sukces You create the facade as described, and you can alter the programs within your facade by spending 1 day to reprogram them.

Sukces You create the facade as described.

Porażka Your illusions fail and the ritual has no effect.

Krytyczna Porażka Your ritual produces unexpected and uncontrolled illusions different from what you had planned, such as unexpected and slowly shifting colors across the buildings, unpleasant smells, and creatures appearing as skeletons. These effects fade after 1 month.

Wywyższenie (10.) The cost increases to 100,000 gp and the radius can be up to 5 miles

Far Sight.name: Far Sight
Far Sight.description: You can see distant objects as if they were closer. You can view creatures, objects, and terrain features that are more than 30 feet away and up to 300 feet away as though they were only 30 feet away. You can view creatures, objects, and terrain features that are 300 feet away or more as though they were only one-tenth as far away. This spell only affects your ability to discern visual details; it doesn't let you treat the objects as actually closer for the purposes of spells, ranged attacks, or otherwise. This spell doesn't affect the range of other visual senses you might have, so if you have a visual sense that extends to only 60 feet, you still can't use it to see things beyond that range, even if they would appear closer with this spell.

Far-Flung Fetch.name: Far-Flung Fetch
Far-Flung Fetch.description:
You can pilfer an object even if it's outside the reach of your fingers. You teleport the target into one of your open hands. If you don't have a hand free, it falls to the ground at your feet.

Wywyższenie (3rd) The range increases to 120 feet.

Wywyższenie (5th) The range increases to 120 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.

Wywyższenie (7th) As 5th rank, and when you Cast the Spell you can spend 3 actions instead of 1 to increase the range to planetary. If you do, you don't need line of sight to the target, but you must be extremely familiar with the target.
Far-Flung Fetch.target: 1 unattended object of light Bulk or less

Fashionista.name: Modniś
Fashionista.description:
Ubrania celu są przemieniane w ostentacyjny strój uosabiający najwyższe wydanie lokalnej mody. Żadne elementy wyglądu celu poza jego ubraniami nie ulegają przemianie, a więc jego broń i pancerz zachowują niezmieniony wygląd. Cel zyskuje premię statusową +1 do testów Oszukiwania na rzecz @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.GkmbTGfg8KcgynOA]{Stworzenia Dywersji}. Możesz Odwołać to zaklęcie. Na koniec czasu trwania zaklęcia ubrania celu powracają do ich oryginalnego stanu.

Wywyższenie (+2) Premia statusowa zwiększa się o 1 do maksymalnie +4 na kręgu 7.

Fatal Aria.name: Fatal Aria
Fatal Aria.description:
You perform music so perfect that the target may die of joy or sorrow. Once targeted, the creature becomes temporarily immune for 1 minute. The effect of the spell depends on the target's level and current Hit Points.

16. or Lower The target dies instantly.

17. If the target has 50 Hit Points or fewer, it dies instantly; otherwise, it drops to 0 Hit Points and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Umierający 1}.

18. or Higher The target takes @Damage[50[untyped]] damage. If this brings it to 0 Hit Points, it dies instantly.

Fate's Travels.name: Fate's Travels
Fate's Travels.description:
You get a vision of the creature when it was alive, and its last 10 minutes of travel. This vision gives you a clear impression of the route it took and locations it visited, if any, but not any creatures or hazards in those areas. This information is enough to automatically succeed at Tracking the creature over that distance.

Wywyższenie (6.) Your vision covers the creature's last hour of travel, and you gain an impression of the hazards, creature types, and number of creatures it encountered along the way, as well as a clear impression of how it died.

Fated Confrontation.name: Fated Confrontation
Fated Confrontation.description:
You weave the threads of fate to lead two foes into a climactic battle. The targets of this spell are the fated opponents: one of the targets of this spell must be you or a willing ally, and the other must be an enemy.

When you Cast the Spell, the ally you targeted (or you, if you targeted yourself) may teleport to any unoccupied space of their choice within 30 feet of its fated opponent. This is a teleportation effect.

You isolate the two targets for 1 round. During this time, fate refuses to allow either fated opponent to be affected by attacks or effects from a third party; a fated opponent could be affected by the other's meteor swarm or its own heal spell, but it would be entirely immune to a spell or Strike from a creature outside of the spells effects, as well including damage from a hazard or the environment. This doesn't apply to anything that was affecting the targets before you cast fated confrontation (such as a spell with a duration or persistent damage the creature had before it was affected by fated confrontation). For the duration of the spell, either fated opponent can manipulate fate once on each of its turns. This allows it to either roll twice and take the higher result on an attack roll or skill check it makes against its fated opponent (a fortune effect), or force the fated opponent to roll twice on a saving throw against one of its abilities and take the lower result (a misfortune effect).

This spell ends if either target becomes unable to act, or if they both agree to cease hostilities.

Fated Healing.name: Fated Healing
Fated Healing.description:
You speak about the consequences of actions people take against each other and how it's possible to break cycles of violence simply by making a different choice. The targets regain 1k4 Hit Points at the end of their own turns while the spell is in effect. If a target uses a hostile action against the other target, the spell ends for the target that used the hostile action.

Wywyższenie (+1) The targets regain an additional 1k4 Hit Points at the end of their own turns.
Fated Healing.target: 2 creatures who are hostile toward each other

Fateful Condemnation.name: Fateful Condemnation
Fateful Condemnation.description:
You draw upon the target's negative fate to afflict it and its nearby allies with the unintended consequences of its past lives. Spiritual echoes of the target's past lives instill overwhelming feelings of doubt, regret, and despair into the minds of the target and its nearby allies. The effects depend on the target's Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature takes 4k6 mental damage, and then an aura of shimmering mist with a @Template[emanation|distance:10] surrounds the creature. This mist isn't dense enough to affect sight, but it does cause the creature and any of its allies in the aura to take a –1 status penalty to all skill checks.

Porażka As success, but the creature takes an initial 8k6 mental damage and is then @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} for the duration of the effect.

Krytyczna Porażka As success, but the creature takes an initial 16k6 mental damage, then is slowed 1 for the duration of the effect. Any of the target's allies who begin their turn in the @Template[emanation|distance:10] is slowed 1 for 1 round.

Favorable Review.name: Favorable Review
Favorable Review.description:
You enchant a creature to ensure they have only good things to say about your show. Identify a single creature, location, or performance, such as "Dame Ellendia," "Savories Meats," or "the Theater of the Mind's latest magic show." The target must attempt Will save. You can Dismiss the spell.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected and knows you tried to trick it.

Sukces The target is unaffected but thinks your spell was something harmless instead of favorable review, unless it identifies the spell (usually using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.eReSHVEPCsdkSL4G]{Identyfikacja Magii}).

Porażka The target cannot speak unfavorably about the subject for 1 week. This doesn't change the target's opinion about the subject, but the target's attempts to speak ill of the subject-whether in speech, writing, or other communication-always twist into compliments and praise instead. The target likely becomes aware of this effect quickly and can avoid speaking about the subject entirely if they choose.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, except the duration is permanent and the target genuinely holds a favorable opinion about the subject, with their attitude toward the creature (or creatures associated with the subject, such as the owner of a location or artists in a performance) becoming two degrees better (for example, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.v44P3WUcU1j0115l]{Pomocny} instead of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fuG8dgthlDWfWjIA]{Obojętny}).

Wywyższenie (8.) The range increases to 60 feet and you can target up to 10 creatures.

Fear.name: Strach
Fear.description:
Zasiewasz nasiono strachu w swoim celu; musi on wykonać rzut obronny Woli.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Cel jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1}.

Porażka Cel jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2}.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 3} i @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Uciekający} na 1 rundę.

Wywyższenie (3.) Możesz objąć za cel do 5 istot.

Fear the Sun.name: Fear the Sun
Fear the Sun.description:
You cause the creature's vision to become particularly sensitive. Istota musi wykonać rzut obronny Krzepy. The creature is then temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} for 1 round.

Porażka The creature is dazzled for 1 minute.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature gains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.I0HYG0ctCLP5JRsW]{Light Blindness} for 1 minute. If the creature is already exposed to bright light, it immediately becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiony} until the end of its next turn, as it isn't acclimated to its newly acquired light blindness.

Wywyższenie (6.) Możesz obrać za cel do 10 istot.

Fearful Feast.name: Fearful Feast
Fearful Feast.description:
Aktywator A creature within range becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony}

You open your mouth wide and inhale sharply; you draw in the bravery, self-confidence, and hope to which the frightened target clings and then strip away the target's false assumption that these fragile emotions can save them from the oblivion of terror. You deal 6k4 mental damage to the creature, which must attempt a Will saving throw.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature is unaffected.

Sukces The creature takes half damage.

Porażka The creature takes full damage; you regain Hit Points equal to half the damage the target takes.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature's frightened condition increases by 1 (to a maximum of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 4}) and it takes double damage; you regain Hit Points equal to half the damage the target takes.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k4.

Feast of Ashes.name: Feast of Ashes
Feast of Ashes.description:
You curse the target with a hunger no food can sate. You can Dismiss the spell. The target must attempt a Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune for 1 hour.

Sukces The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Wyczerpany} for 1 round.

Porażka The creature is immediately afflicted by hunger as if it hadn't eaten food in days. It becomes fatigued and takes 1k4 damage each day that can't be healed until it sates its hunger. No amount of eating can sate the creature's hunger during the spell's duration.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the creature takes 2k4 damage each day from unbearable hunger.

Wywyższenie (+1) The hunger becomes more intolerable, increasing the damage each day by 1k4, or by 2k4 on a critical failure.

Feast of Supplication.name: Feast of Supplication
Feast of Supplication.description:
When mortals attempt to sway gods, spirits, and other beings of great spiritual power to take sides in mortal affairs, those powers demand to be impressed. And what better way to impress than a cook-off? This old ritual has roots in the spiritadjudicated village festival contests of rural Tian Xia. Two or more rival parties must participate, performing the ritual simultaneously as assistants gather and prepare ingredients while each team's head chef does their best to create the ultimate dish to satisfy their patron's palate. Cheering bystanders are usually involved. While the primary caster — the chef — is always busy with cooking, it's very normal for the secondary caster assistants to spend most of their time interfering with the other teams and slowing them down.

Krytyczny Sukces You've truly blown your patron away with the competition and the meal you've expertly crafted. The supernatural patrons you sought to impress grant a request as if you'd received a critical success to Make a Request of them, even if they're indifferent or unfriendly to you. If there's some argument or confusion on what request should be granted, the patrons grant the request of the team that achieved the highest overall result. At the GM's discretion, the attitude of any patrons pleased by the ritual can permanently increase toward all participants in the ritual. In addition, the sheer theatricality and flair of your cooking has earned you deep respect and die-hard fans from the spectators, doubly so if you tied with another contender.

Sukces You've created a wonderful meal that your patron loves. The supernatural patrons you sought to impress grant a request as if you'd received a success to Make a Request of them, even if they're indifferent to you. If there's some argument or confusion on what request should be granted, the patrons grant the request of the team that achieved the highest overall result. At the GM's discretion, the attitude of any patrons pleased by the ritual can permanently increase toward all participants in the ritual. All contestants have still earned the jovial respect and appreciation of the crowd for cooking something entertaining and lovely.

Porażka You've created a dish that doesn't impress. The winner of the competition is declared in the most unsatisfying and mechanical of manners — someone has to win, but no one is happy about it. The supernatural patrons you sought to impress politely make their excuses and leave as soon as they have a chance. At the GM's discretion, the attitude of any patrons who experienced the meal can permanently decrease toward all participants in the ritual.

Krytyczna Porażka Your team's dish is ruined at the last possible moment in a spectacular manner. You completely embarrass yourself, and the attitude of the supernatural patrons who experienced this farce permanently decreases by one step toward you. If you haven't earned the ire of your patron host, you've definitely lost the respect of any onlookers or spectators.
Feast of Supplication.primarycheck: Cooking Lore, Crafting, Performance or Survival (expert)

Feet to Fins.name: Feet to Fins
Feet to Fins.description:
The target's feet transform into fins, improving mobility in the water but reducing it on land. The target gains a swim Speed equal to its normal land Speed, but its land Speed becomes 5 feet.

Wywyższenie (6.) The spell lasts until your next daily preparations.

Feral Shades.name: Feral Shades
Feral Shades.description:
A wave of gray mist formed of void energy spills out from your outstretched hand, briefly taking the shape of a pack of predatory animals that set viciously on your foes. You deal 2k4 slashing damage and 2k4 void damage to creatures in the area. The shades set upon the vulnerable with greater ferocity: prone creatures or those taking persistent bleed damage take a –2 status penalty to the save.

Wywyższenie (+1) The slashing damage and the void damage each increase by 1k4.

Ferrous Form.name: Ferrous Form
Ferrous Form.description:
Your body transforms entirely into flexible iron. You gain resistance 10 to physical damage, except adamantine. You're immune to death effects, disease, drained, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Wyczerpany}, healing, nonlethal attacks, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Sparaliżowany}, poison, sickened, vitality, and void; any of those conditions you had when the spell is cast are suspended until the spell ends, then return with their remaining duration when the spell ends. While made of iron, you're subject to rusting effects like the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.yy2K51kK3a60rRIe]{Rust Cloud} spell.

Your fist Strikes have a 1k10 damage die, and your metal spells deal one additional die of damage (of the same damage die and damage type the spell uses). You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.iYRDFxeVpJ5KIjmr]{Needle Darts} as an innate spell; the casting is reduced from 2 actions to 1.

In this form, you don't need to breathe. Your Bulk doubles (to 6 if you're Small or 12 if you're Medium), and you become too dense to Swim in water, automatically sinking to the bottom. You can Dismiss the spell.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.qD1OA6dx8h33nKFC]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Ferrous Form}

Wywyższenie (9.) The resistance increases to 15.

Fey Abeyance.name: Fey Abeyance
Fey Abeyance.cost: rare oils, cold iron bells worth at least 5 gp
Fey Abeyance.description:
Obszar An enclosed area up to 60 feet × 60 feet, up to 20 feet high

You ward an area with cold iron bells, protecting it from the influence of the first world. Fey creatures feel uncomfortable within the area and all physical attacks against them are considered cold iron for the purposes of their Weaknesses and Resistances. Furthermore, you set up bells within 3 squares within the area (usually at entrances). When a fey creature begins its turn in a square containing bells, it takes mental damage equal to its Weakness to cold iron, if any. This damage is nonlethal.

Krytyczny Sukces You may designate up to 6 squares to contain bells.

Sukces The ritual succeeds.

Porażka The ritual has no effect.

Krytyczna Porażka The ritual has no effect and attracts the attention of a troublesome fey creature. At the GM's discretion, it might be hostile or merely mischievous.

Fey Disappearance.name: Fey Disappearance
Fey Disappearance.description:
You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialny} and ignore natural difficult terrain (such as underbrush). Any hostile action you use ends this invisibility, but you still ignore natural difficult terrain.

Wywyższenie (5.) If you use a hostile action, the invisibility doesn't end.

Fey Form.name: Fey Form
Fey Form.description:
Channeling the mischievous fey, you transform into a fey battle form, which is Medium unless stated otherwise. When you cast this spell, choose dryad, elananx, naiad, redcap, or unicorn. If you choose unicorn, the battle form is Large and you must have space to expand or the spell is lost. While in this form, you gain the fey trait. Unless you choose elananx or unicorn, you have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 19 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 15 temporary Hit Points and weakness 5 to cold iron.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +16, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Dexterity based. If your attack modifier is higher for the given unarmed attack or weapon, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifiers of +16, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of fey:

  • Dryad @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.c4cIfS2974nUJDPt]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Fey Form (Dryad)}

    • The temporary HP gained increases to 30;
    • Speed 25 feet; weakness 5 to fire;
    • Melee 1 branch, Damage 1k12+8 bludgeoning.

  • Elananx @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.S75DOLjKaSJGMc0D]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Fey Form (Elananx)}

    • Speed 30 feet;
    • resistance 5 to fire;
    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 1k6+8 piercing plus 1k6 fire;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 1k6+8 slashing.

  • Naiad @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.KcBqo33ekJHxZLHo]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Fey Form (Naiad)}

    • Speed 25 feet, swim 25 feet;
    • resistance 5 to fire;
    • Melee 1 aqueous fist (water), Damage 1k8+8 bludgeoning.

  • Redcap @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.heAj9paC8ZRh7QEj]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Fey Form (Redcap)}

    • Speed 40 feet;
    • Size Small;
    • Melee 1 scythe (deadly k10, trip), Damage 1k10+8 slashing;
    • Melee 1 boot (agile, versatile B), Damage 1k6+8 piercing.

  • Unicorn @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.DwM5qcFp4JgKhXrY]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Fey Form (Unicorn)}

    • gain the beast trait in addition to fey;
    • Speed 40 feet;
    • resistance 5 to poison;
    • Size Large;
    • Melee 1 horn, Damage 1k10+8 piercing plus 1 spirit;
    • Melee 1 hoof (agile), Damage 1k8+8 bludgeoning; all Strikes have the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} property rune.

Fey Glamour.name: Fey Glamour
Fey Glamour.description: You call upon fey glamours to cloak an area or the targets in illusion. This has the effect of either @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Ucf8eynbZMfUucjE]{Illusory Scene} on the area or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Iluzoryczne Przebranie} on the creatures, as if heightened to a rank 1 rank lower than fey glamour, using fey glamour's range and duration.

Field of Life.name: Pole Życia
Field of Life.description:
Obszar działania zaklęcia wypełnia pole życiowej energii, wydzielające ciepło i uzdrawiające znajdujących się w jego zasięgu. Każda żyjąca istota rozpoczynająca turę w obszarze zaklęcia odzyskuje 1k8 Punktów Żywotności, a każda nieumarła istota rozpoczynająca turę w obszarze zaklęcia odnosi 1k8 obrażeń od witalności.

Wywyższenie (8.) Leczenie i obrażenia zwiększają się do 1k10.

Wywyższenie (9.) Leczenie i obrażenia zwiększają się do 1k12.

Field of Razors.name: Field of Razors
Field of Razors.description:
You grind a chunk of your choice of metal to fine dust between your hands and blow it into the air, where it grows into a tangle of wires covered in razor-sharp prongs. The metal must be of a type you currently have in your possession. The covered area is difficult terrain. A creature that moves through the area takes @Damage[5[slashing]] damage per square traversed.

If a creature takes slashing, piercing, or persistent bleed damage while inside the thicket, you can spend a reaction to grow the iron in the shed blood into additional wires, expanding the burst by 5 feet. You can grow the area four times in this way, to a maximum of a @Template[burst|distance:40].

The barbed wires are made of the metal you chose and activate resistances, weaknesses, and the like normally. The metal reforms in your possession when the spell ends.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage per square increases by 2.

Fiery Body.name: Fiery Body
Fiery Body.description:
You become living flame, giving you fire immunity, resistance 10 to precision damage, and weakness 5 to cold and to water. Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon takes @Damage[3d6[fire]] damage.

Your unarmed attacks deal an additional 1k4 fire damage, and your fire spells deal one additional die of fire damage (of the same damage die the spell uses). You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6DfLZBl8wKIV03Iq]{Zapłon} as an innate spell; the casting is reduced from 2 actions to 1.

In fire form, you have a fly Speed of 40 feet and don't need to breathe.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.uIMaMzd6pcKmMNPJ]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Fiery Body}

Wywyższenie (9.) Creatures touching you take @Damage[4d6[fire]] damage instead of 3k6, your unarmed attacks deal 2k4 additional fire damage, and you have a fly Speed of 60 feet.

Figment.name: Wymysł
Figment.description:
Tworzysz prosty iluzoryczny dźwięk lub widziadło. Dźwięk dodaje do zaklęcia cechę słuchowości i nie może zawierać w sobie zrozumiałych słów lub złożonej muzyki. Widziadło dodaje do zaklęcia cechę wzrokowości, musi być nie większe niż sześcian 5 stóp a obserwowane z odległości mniejszej niż 15 stóp nadal pozostaje nieczytelne i pozbawione szczegółów. Kiedy Rzucasz lub Podtrzymujesz to Zaklęcie, możesz spróbować @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.GkmbTGfg8KcgynOA]{Stworzyć Dywersję} z pomocą iluzji, zyskując premię sytuacyjną +2 do swojego testu Oszukiwania. Jeśli ta próba nie powiedzie się przeciw istocie, istota ta przeztaje wierzyć w wymysł.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.2Hg3a06gZCSnUgSA]{Efeky Zaklęcia: Wymysł}

Final Fate of the Locust Host.name: Final Fate of the Locust Host
Final Fate of the Locust Host.description:
You conjure the rotting corpse of Deskari, previously Lord of the Locust Hosts, to the battlefield. Deskari's corpse occupies the space of a Gargantuan creature. The corpse is riddled with vermin, including countless locusts, whose collective movement grants the corpse a Speed of 60 feet and a fly Speed of 60 feet.

Arrive Behold the Rotten Lord Deskari's corpse is unspeakably foul, emitting a putrid stench, and constantly twitches thanks to the movement of the millions of insects and vermin that consume it. A loud, persistent buzzing is created by the clouds of locusts surrounding it like a haze. Each living enemy creature within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:60] must attempt a Fortitude save with the following effects.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature is unaffected.

Sukces The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 2}.

Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 3} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Ogłuchły} for the duration.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 4}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1}, and deafened for the duration.

Depart (poison) Feast of the Locust Host The millions of insects and vermin feasting on Deskari pour out of its corpse and surge across the battlefield, consuming your enemies. This swarm deals 5k8 piercing damage and 5k8 poison damage to enemy creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:60] with a basic Reflex save. A creature that critically fails is additionally @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 2}.

Final Sacrifice.name: Final Sacrifice
Final Sacrifice.description:
You channel disruptive energies through the bond between you and your minion, causing it to violently explode. The target is immediately slain, and the explosion deals 6k6 fire damage to creatures within 20 feet of it with a basic Reflex save. If the target has the cold or water trait, the spell deals cold damage and has the cold trait instead of the fire trait. Attempting to cast this spell targeting a creature that you temporarily seized control of, such as an undead commanded by bind undead, automatically fails and breaks the controlling effect.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 2k6.
Final Sacrifice.target: 1 creature with the minion trait that you summoned or permanently control

Fire Ray.name: Fire Ray
Fire Ray.description:
A blazing band of fire arcs through the air, lighting your opponent and the ground they stand upon on fire. Make a spell attack roll against the target's AC. The ray deals 2k6 fire damage on a hit (or double damage on a critical hit). On any result other than a critical failure, the ground in the target's space catches fire, dealing @Damage[(@item.rank)d6[fire]] damage to each creature that ends its turn in one of the squares.

Wywyższenie (+1) The ray's initial damage increases by 2k6, and the fire damage dealt by the burning space increases by 1k6.

Fire Seeds.name: Fire Seeds
Fire Seeds.description:
Four acorns grow in your hand, their shells streaked with pulsing red and orange patterns. You or anyone else who has one of the acorns can toss it up to 30 feet with an Interact action. It explodes in a 5-foot burst, dealing 4k6 fire damage. The save uses your spell DC, even if someone else throws the acorn. Flames continue to burn on the ground in the burst for 1 minute, dealing @Damage[2d6[fire]] damage to any creature that enters the flames or ends its turn within them. A creature can take damage from the continuing flames only once per round, even if it's in overlapping areas of fire created by different acorns. When the spell ends, any remaining acorns rot and turn to ordinary soil.

Wywyższenie (8.) The burst's damage increases to 5k6, and the continuing flames damage increases to @Damage[3d6[fire]] damage.

Wywyższenie (9.) The burst's damage increases to 6k6, and the continuing flames damage increases to 3k6.

Fire Shield.name: Fire Shield
Fire Shield.description:
You create a hovering shield made of fire. As long as the shield persists, its heat grants you cold resistance 5 and makes you immune to mild and severe environmental cold. You can Raise a Shield with the fire shield as a normal shield to gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC. You can use the Shield Block reaction with the fire shield, which has Hardness 10, is immune to fire, and has 40 HP (with no Broken Threshold), and its Hardness is halved against effects that have the water trait. If you Shield Block a melee attack that is either an unarmed attack or made by an adjacent attacker, the attacker takes 2k6 fire damage.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.1RsScTvNdGD9zGWe]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Fire Shield}

Wywyższenie (+2) The cold resistance increases by 5, the HP increase by 10, and the fire damage increases by 1k6.

Fire's Pathway.name: Fire's Pathway
Fire's Pathway.description:
You step into a blazing fire that's big enough for you to fit inside and instantly teleport to any other fire within 5 miles that also has a sufficiently large size. Once you enter the first fire, you instantly know the rough locations of other sufficiently large fires within range and can exit from the original fire, if you prefer. You can't carry extradimensional spaces with you; if you attempt to do so, the spell fails.

Wywyższenie (6.) The fire you exit can be up to 50 miles away.

Wywyższenie (8.) The fire you exit can be up to 500 miles away.

Wywyższenie (9.) The fire you exit can be anywhere on the same planet.

Fireball.name: Kula Ognia
Fireball.description:
W określonym przez ciebie miejscu eksplodują trzaskające płomienie, zadając 6k6 obrażeń od ognia.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6.

Fireproof.name: Fireproof
Fireproof.description:
You prevent the target item from conducting heat or catching fire for the spell's duration. The item gains fire resistance 10. In addition, effects with the fire trait that target the item must first succeed at a counteract check against your spell DC.

Wywyższenie (4.) The duration is 24 hours.

Wywyższenie (6.) The duration is unlimited.

Firework Blast.name: Firework Blast
Firework Blast.description:
You create a massive display of loud and colorful explosions. The explosions deal 4k6 fire damage. Creatures that fail their saves must attempt an additional @Check[fortitude] save. Creatures that critically fail their saves take a –2 circumstance penalty to this Fortitude save.

Sukces Efekt nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiony} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Ogłuchły} for 1 round.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is blinded for 1 round and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} and deafened for 1 minute.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 2k6.

Flame Barrier.name: Flame Barrier
Flame Barrier.description:
Aktywator An effect would deal fire damage to either you or an ally within range.

You swiftly deflect incoming flames. The target gains fire resistance 15 against the triggering effect.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.UXdt1WVA66oZOoZS]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Flame Barrier}

Wywyższenie (+2) The resistance increases by 5.
Flame Barrier.target: the creature that would take fire damage

Flame Dancer.name: Flame Dancer
Flame Dancer.description:
Fire encircles the target's hands and feet, and its eyes and hair catch ablaze. The target's unarmed Strikes deal an additional 2k6 fire damage. Critical hits with these Strikes also deal 2k4 persistent fire damage. Additionally, when the target attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralizacja} a foe, they can use Performance instead of Intimidation; when using Performance to Demoralize, the action loses the auditory trait but gains the visual trait, and the target doesn't take a penalty when attempting to Demoralize a creature that doesn't understand its language.

Wywyższenie (7.) The fire damage increases to 3k6, and the persistent fire damage increases to 3k4. If the target gets a critical success on a Demoralize check using Performance, the target of the Demoralize check becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Uciekający} from the target of flame dancer for 1 round.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.1cBl1gVcpzOqlluC]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Flame Dancer}

Flame Strike.name: Flame Strike
Flame Strike.description:
Area: 10-foot radius, 40-foot-tall cylinder

You call a rain of divine fire that plummets down from above, dealing 8k6 fire damage. Because the flame is infused with divine energy, creatures in the area apply only half their usual fire resistance. Creatures that are immune to fire, instead of gaining the usual benefit of immunity, treat the results of their saving throws as one degree of success better.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6.

Flame Vortex.name: Flame Vortex
Flame Vortex.description:
Obszar 5-foot radius, 40-foot tall cylinder

You combine a blazing inferno and air currents into a fiery vortex. You can Cast this Spell only if you are outside or the ceiling is 40 feet or higher. All squares in the vortex are difficult terrain for flying creatures.

All creatures in the area take 3k4 bludgeoning damage and 3k6 fire damage as gusts of fiery wind buffet them, with a basic Reflex save. Each time you Sustain the Spell, you can move the whirlwind up to 20 feet in a straight line. Each creature the whirlwind moves through takes the damage with a basic Reflex save. A creature can take damage from a flame vortex only once per round.

Wywyższenie (+2) The vortex deals an additional 1k4 bludgeoning damage and 1k6 fire damage.

Flame Wisp.name: Flame Wisp
Flame Wisp.description:
Three faintly glowing wisps of fire float around your head. Each time you hit a creature with a Strike, one of the wisps goes hurtling towards that creature, dealing 1k4 fire damage. If you Cast a Spell with the fire trait while you have fewer than three wisps, a new wisp appears.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.ei9MIyZbIaP4AZmh]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Flame Wisp}

Wywyższenie (+2) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k4.

Flames of Ego.name: Flames of Ego
Flames of Ego.description:
Elegant flames of incredible beauty coruscate across the target's body, creating overconfidence and carelessness. The target attempts a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target sheds bright light in a @Template[emanation|distance:20] (and dim light to the next 40 feet) and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Zafascynowany} with itself for 1 round. It must spend at least 1 action on its turn on a taunting display of arrogance or overconfidence. Using actions that include such a display — such as using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EEDElIyin4z60PXx]{Perform} to show off — count toward this requirement.

Porażka As success, but the duration is 1 minute and the target can't act hostile toward a creature until that creature acts hostile toward the target.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, except the target must spend at least 2 actions on its turn on a taunting display of arrogance or overconfidence.

Flaming Fusillade.name: Flaming Fusillade
Flaming Fusillade.description:
You call upon an endless barrage of flames, a series of explosions bursting around you like miniature suns. You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6DfLZBl8wKIV03Iq]{Ignition} as part of casting flaming fusillade. For the duration of flaming fusillade, ignition's casting time is reduced from 2 actions to 1.

Wywyższenie (9.) For the duration, you also gain a status bonus to damage dealt by ignition equal to flaming fusillade's spell rank.

Flammable Fumes.name: Flammable Fumes
Flammable Fumes.description:
Sending magic deep underground, you conjure a cloud of toxic gases that swiftly degenerate into volatile fumes. The gases are invisible, requiring a successful Perception check against your spell DC to detect visually, though their acrid smell and toxic effects are clear once a creature has entered the cloud. A creature that enters the cloud or is within the cloud at the start of its turn takes 2k6 poison damage. A creature can take the poison damage from flammable fumes only once per round.

One round after you conjure the cloud, the gases loses stability and become flammable. If an open flame is brought into the cloud, or if anyone within the area uses a fire effect, the cloud detonates in a massive blaze that deals @Damage[10d6[fire]] damage to all creatures within it with a @Check[reflex|basic] save, and the spell ends.

Wywyższenie (+2) The poison damage increases by 1k6 and the fire damage on an explosion increases by 2k6.

Flashy Disappearance.name: Widowiskowe Zniknięcie
Flashy Disappearance.description:
Tworzysz kłąb kolorowego dymu, który szybko się rozprasza, a ty stajesz się tymczasowo @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialny}. Stajesz się @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Niewykryty} dla wszystkich istot, chyba że posiadają one zdolność do widzenia niewidzialnych istot. Biegniesz. Na koniec swojego ruchu, jeśli masz osłonę, większą osłonę lub przysłonięcie, podejmij się testu @Check[stealth|traits:action:hide] celem Schowania Się. Zyskujesz premię statusową +2 do tego testu Skradania Się. Następnie niewidzialność się kończy i stajesz się @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.1wQY3JYyhMYeeV2G]{Postrzegany} lub @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Schowany} dla wszystkich istot w oparciu o twoją próbę Schowania Się, jeśli się jej podjąłeś.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.4vlorajqpFcS5Ozi]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Widowiskowe Zniknięcie}

Fleet Step.name: Zwiewny Krok
Fleet Step.description:
Zyskujesz premię statusową +30 stóp do swojej Prędkości.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.ThFug45WHkQQXcoF]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Zwiewny Krok}

Flense.name: Patroszenie
Flense.description:
Za pomocą dotknięcia, obdzierasz swój cel ze skóry, mięśni i organów wewnętrznych, pozostawiając jedynie kości. Efekt zaklęcia zależy od tego czy cel jest żyjącą istotą, nieumarłą istotą czy obiektem nieożywionym. Istota lub zwłoki, które nie posiadają tkanek, mięśni lub organów wewnętrznych.

Nieożywione Zwłoki Ciało, mięśnie, wnętrzności i narządy są usuwane ze zwłok i znikają, pozostawiając jedynie nagie kości.

Żyjąca Istota Wykonaj rzut ataku zaklęciem. Przy trafieniu cel odnosi 2k6 obrażeń ciętych. Przy trafieniu krytycznym cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia i dodatkowo 1k4 przewlekłych obrażeń od krwawienia. Jeśli obrażenia od tego zaklęcia zabiją istotę, pozostają po niej tylko kości.

Nieumarła Istota Wykonaj rzut ataku zaklęciem. Przy trafieniu cel odnosi 2k6 obrażeń ciętych. Przy trafieniu krytycznym cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia i dodatkowo jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 1} na 1 minutę. Jeśli obrażenia od tego zaklęcia zabiją istotę, pozostają po niej tylko kości.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia cięte zadawane żyjącym i nieumarłym istotom zwiększają się o 2k6 a przewlekłe obrażenia od krwawienia zadawane żyjącym zwiększają się o 1k4.

Flicker.name: Migotanie
Flicker.description:
Szybko migoczesz pomiędzy swoim obecnym planem a innym. Zyskujesz odporność 5 na wszystkie obrażenia, z wyjątkiem obrażeń od mocy. Na koniec każdej swojej tury automatycznie teleportujesz się 10 stóp w losowym kierunku, określonym przez MG. Możesz Podtrzymać zaklęcie, aby teleportować się w taki sposób.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.ZlsuhS9J0S3PuvCO]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Migotanie}

Wywyższenie (+2) Odporność wzrasta o 3.

Floating Flame.name: Floating Flame
Floating Flame.description:
You create a fire that burns without fuel and moves to your commands. The flame deals 3k6 fire damage to each creature in the square in which it appears, with a basic Reflex save. When you Sustain this spell, you can levitate the flame up to 10 feet. It then deals damage to each creature whose space it shared at any point during its flight. This uses the same damage and save, and you roll the damage once each time you Sustain. A given creature can take damage from floating flame only once per round.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k6.

Flourishing Flora.name: Rozkwit Roślin
Flourishing Flora.description:
Z okoliczej ziemi błyskawicznie wyrastają rośliny. Wszystkie istoty w obszarze odnoszą 2k4 obrażeń. Typ obrażeń zależy od wybranych przez ciebie roślin. Przy krytycznej porażce cel ponosi dodatkowe efekty, również zależne od tego co postanowiłeś wychodować. Rodzaj roślin oraz ich efekty wybierasz podczas Rzucania Zaklęcia.

  • Kaktusy Obrażenia kłute i obrażenia @Damage[(@item.level)[bleed]] przy krytycznej porażce.
  • Kwiaty Obrażenia od trucizny i @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczenie} na 2 rundy przy krytycznej porażce.
  • Owoce Obrażenia obuchowe i @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarność 1} na 2 rundy przy krytycznej porażce.
  • Korzenie Obrażenia obuchowe a istoty pod wpływem zaklęcia padają @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalone} przy krytycznej porażce.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k4 a przewlekłe obrażenia od krwawienia zadawane przez kaktusy zwiększają się o 1.

Flowing Strike.name: Flowing Strike
Flowing Strike.description: A wave of flowing water rushes behind you like an elegant river, pushing you across the battlefield with fluid grace. You Stride up to 50 feet. This movement doesn't trigger reactions. You can make a Strike at any point during your Stride. If your Strike hits, the wave flows after you to batter the target of your Strike as well, dealing 2k10 bludgeoning damage and pushing it 10 feet in a direction of your choice.

Flurry of Claws.name: Flurry of Claws
Flurry of Claws.description:
Vicious dragon claws appear and slash at two nearby foes. Make a spell attack roll against each creature. This counts as two attacks for your multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until you've made both attacks. On a hit, the creatures takes 1k8 slashing plus 1k4 additional damage of a type determined by the magical tradition related to the dragon that influenced your bloodline: arcane force, divine spirit, occult mental, or primal fire.

Wywyższenie (+1) The initial damage increases by 1k8 and the additional damage increases by 1k4.
Flurry of Claws.target: 2 creatures no more than 10 feet from each other

Fly.name: Fly
Fly.description:
The target can soar through the air, gaining a fly Speed equal to its Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.MuRBCiZn5IKeaoxi]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Fly}

Wywyższenie (7.) Czas trwania zwiększa się do 1 hour.

Focusing Hum.name: Focusing Hum
Focusing Hum.description: You infuse the air around you with a sustained hum that allows creatures within it to resist distractions. The DC of any flat check to Cast a Spell while stupefied for creatures within the area is 2 lower. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Zdezorientowany} creatures in the area don't attack anyone, including themselves, and instead lose the ability to speak coherently. You take a –2 penalty to Stealth checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Schować Się} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Przekradanie Się}.

Fold Metal.name: Złożenie Metalu
Fold Metal.description:
Zaginasz obiekt obrany za cel zaklęcia w małą metalową kilkę nie większą od jajka. Cel powraca do swojego oryginalnego kształtu dopiero kiedy Odwołasz zaklęcie, kiedy zakończy się czas jego działania albo jeśli kulka dotknie wody lub ognia, cokolwiek nastąpi pierwsze.

Istoty, które zobaczą przekształcony obiekt mogą podjąć się testu Percepcji przeciw twojemu ST zaklęć aby zauważyć, że kulka nie jest tym na co wygląda. Jeśli obiekt jest magiczny zachowuje swoje magiczne aury ale nie może być noszony, przymocowywany ani Aktywowany.

Wywyższenie (3.) Czas trwania zaklęcia zwiększa się do 1 godziny.
Fold Metal.target: 1 niepilnowany metaliczny obiekt o Naręczu nie większym niż 5

Font of Serenity.name: Font of Serenity
Font of Serenity.description:
A divine beacon radiates serenity, soothing nearby allies.

Allies within the area gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against emotion effects.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Bc2Bwuan3716eAyY]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Font of Serenity}

An ally can touch the font at the center of the burst as an Interact action; if they do so, the spell attempts to counteract one emotion effect affecting the ally of the ally's choice, after which that emotion effect is temporarily immune for 1 day. If the spell succeeds at the counteract check, it removes the emotion effect from your ally, though not from any other creatures the effect might be affecting.

Wywyższenie (+4) The bonus increases by 1.

For Love, For Lightning.name: For Love, For Lightning
For Love, For Lightning.description:
When you Cast the Spell, you plunge the required weapon into the ground, where it crackles with crimson lightning. When you Cast the Spell, and the first time during each of your subsequent turns that you Sustain the spell, the crimson lightning arcs. When the weapon arcs, one enemy of your choice within 30 feet of the weapon takes 3k12 electricity damage (podstawowy rzut obronny Refleksu). If you Interact to draw the weapon from the ground, the spell ends.

Wywyższenie (+2) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k12.
For Love, For Lightning.requirements: You are wielding a sword or spear made partly or wholly of metal.

Foraging Friends.name: Foraging Friends
Foraging Friends.description:
Giving a cheerful whistle, you call forth a handful of small animals, such as birds or mice, to collect food for you and your allies. The animals return 1 hour later with enough foraged goods to feed four Medium creatures for 1 day, then return to their normal behavior. If you're in a particularly strange environment, as determined by your GM, you might need a minimum proficiency with primal spell DCs, equivalent to the minimum proficiency required to Subsist in strange environments.

Wywyższenie (3.) The animals bring back enough food for eight Medium creatures for 1 day.

Wywyższenie (5.) The animals bring back enough food for 30 Medium creatures for 1 day.

Forbidden Thought.name: Zakazana Myśl
Forbidden Thought.description:
You place a psychic lock in a foe's mind that prevents it from a specific action. Choose "Strike," "Stride," "Cast a Spell," or a specific action you know the creature to have (such as "Breath Weapon" against a dragon). If the creature attempts that action on its next turn, it must surmount your lock to do so, causing it to take 2k6 mental damage (with a basic Will save). The target is then temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k6.

Forbidding Ward.name: Powstrzymująca Osłona
Forbidding Ward.description:
Osłaniasz sojusznika przed atakami i wrogimi zaklęciami wybranego przeciwnika. Wybrany za cel sojusznik zyskuje premię statusową +1 do Klasy Pancerza oraz rzutów obronnych przeciw atakom, zaklęciom i innym efektom powodowanym przez wybranego za cel wroga.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.ctMxYPGEpstvhW9C]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Powstrzymująca Osłona}

Wywyższenie (6.) Premia statusowa zwiększa się do +2.

Force Barrage.name: Grad Magii
Force Barrage.description:
Wystrzeliwujesz odłamek skrystalizowanej magii w kierunku istoty, którą widzisz. Automatycznie trafia i zadaje 1k4+1 obrażeń od mocy. Za każdą dodatkową akcję poświęconą na rzucanie zaklęcia zwiększ ilość wystrzeliwanych odłamków o jeden, do maksymalnie trzech odłamków przy czasie rzucania 3 akcji. Dla każdego odłamka wybierasz cel osobno. Jeśli wystrzelisz więcej niż jeden odłamek w ten sam cel, połącz ich obrażenia przed stosowaniem premii lub kar do obrażeń, odporności, podatności i tym podobnych.

Wywyższenie (+2) W ramach każdej poświęcanej akcji wystrzeliwujesz dodatkowy odłamek.

Force Bolt.name: Pocisk Magiczny
Force Bolt.description:
Wystrzeliwujesz podobny strzale pocisk mocy magicznej. Jedna z bardziej powszechnych i niezawodnych form magii bitewnej. Trafia automatycznie i zadaje celowi 1k4+1 obrażeń od mocy.

Wywyższenie (+2) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k4+1.

Force Fang.name: Kieł Magii
Force Fang.description:
Na moment zamieniasz swój atak w czystą moc magiczną, aby przezwyciężyć zapory wroga. Wybierz cel w swoim wysięgu lub w wysięgu broni białej, którą dzierżysz. Jeśli jesteś w stanie używać @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QDW9H8XLIjuW2fE4]{Czarociosu} z bronią dystansową (na przykład dzięki studium hybrydowemu rozgwieżdżonej rozpiętości), możesz obrać za cel istotę w pierwszym inkremencie zasięgu swojej broni dystansowej. Na moment zamieniasz swoją broń lub atak wręcz w kieł czystej mocy, zastępując wszystkie jego normalne statystyki i zdolności. Kieł magii automatycznie zadaje celowi 1k4+1 obrażeń od mocy.

Wywyższenie (+2) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k4+1.

Forced Mercy.name: Forced Mercy
Forced Mercy.description:
You soften the target's blows, ensuring they avoid vital areas and cause no lasting harm. All physical damage dealt by the target to living creatures becomes nonlethal and all persistent bleed damage dealt by the target is reduced to 0. This effect doesn't incur the typical –2 circumstance penalty for nonlethal attacks with a lethal weapon or attack. An unwilling target must attempt a Will save. A willing target can choose to critically fail their saving throw.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature is affected for 1 round.

Porażka The creature is affected for [[/r 1d4 #Rounds]]{1k4 rounds}.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is affected for 1 minute.

Wywyższenie (4.) The range increases to 100 feet, and you can target up to 8 creatures.

Forced Quiet.name: Forced Quiet
Forced Quiet.description:
You quiet the target's voice, preventing it from giving away valuable secrets. This doesn't prevent the target from talking or providing verbal spell components, but no creature more than 10 feet away can hear its whispers without succeeding at a Perception check against your spell DC, which might interfere with auditory or linguistic effects as well as communication. The spell's duration depends on the target's Fortitude save. After attempting its save, the target becomes temporarily immune for 24 hours.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The duration is 1 round.

Porażka The duration is 1 minute.

Krytyczna Porażka The duration is 10 minutes.

Forceful Hand.name: Forceful Hand
Forceful Hand.description:
A Medium floating, disembodied hand made of magical force appears in an unoccupied space adjacent to you, following you across the battlefield to shield you against your foes' attacks. Each time you Sustain the Spell, the hand moves to an unoccupied space of your choice adjacent to you. When you Sustain the Spell, you can have the hand Fly to an unoccupied space of your choice adjacent to an ally to protect that ally instead. The hand's movement does not trigger reactions based on creature movement. The forceful hand occupies its space, but creatures can move through the hand freely.

Successful attacks against the hand damage it, and damaging effects that can target a creature can target the hand. The hand has an AC of 25, 50 Hit Points, and can't recover HP by any means. A hit by a disintegrate spell or similar effect destroys the hand.

The hand's actions and the cover it provides depend on what actions you take during your turn. At the end of your turn, what the hand does is determined by the first entry on this list that matches a trait from any of the actions you used on your turn. For instance, if you Step, Stride, and Sustain the Spell, you use the entry for move actions, so the hand provides standard cover.

  • Manipulate or Attack The hand interposes between you and your foes. It provides lesser cover (+1 circumstance bonus to AC) against all attacks that pass through the hand's square.
  • Move The hand provides standard cover (+2 circumstance bonus to AC, Reflex, and Stealth checks) against all attacks that pass through the hand's square.
  • Concentrate The hand provides greater cover (+4 circumstance bonus to AC, Reflex, and Stealth checks) against all attacks that pass through the hand's square.

Wywyższenie (6th) The hand has AC 27 and 60 Hit Points. When you Cast this Spell, you can choose to replace the hand's Manipulate or Attack option with Swat.

  • Swat The hand Flies to an enemy of your choice within range and attempts to Push that enemy, using your spell attack roll instead of an Athletics check to determine the results of the Push.

Wywyższenie (7th) The hand has AC 30 and 70 Hit Points, and it is Large. When you Cast this Spell, you can choose to replace the hand's Manipulate or Attack option with Grasp or Swat.

  • Grasp The hand Flies to an enemy of your choice within range and attempts to Grapple that enemy, using your spell attack roll instead of an Athletics check to determine the results of the Grapple.

Wywyższenie (8th) The hand has AC 32 and 80 Hit Points, and it is Large. When you Cast this Spell, you can choose to replace the hand's Manipulate or Attack option with Grasp, Punch, or Swat.

  • Punch The hand Flies to an enemy of your choice within range and attempts to Strike that enemy with crushing force. The hand's Strikes use your melee spell attack modifiers and deal @Damage[7d8[force]] damage. The hand's Strikes don't use or contribute to your multiple attack penalty.

Wywyższenie (9th) The hand has AC 35 and 90 Hit Points, and it is Large. When you Cast this Spell, you can choose to replace the hand's Manipulate or Attack option with Crush, Grasp, Punch, or Swat.

  • Crush If the hand doesn't have a target grabbed, it Flies to an enemy of your choice within range and attempts to Strike that enemy with deadly crushing force. The hand's Strikes are melee spell attacks that deal @Damage[6d8[force]] damage. The hand's Strikes don't take or contribute to your multiple attack penalty. On a successful Strike, the target is grabbed by the hand until the end of your next turn, unless the hand moves or the target successfully Escapes against your spell DC. However, if the hand has a target grabbed when it uses Crush, it instead @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.g26YiEIfSHCpLocV]{Constricts} the target, dealing @Damage[6d8[force]] damage with a basic Fortitude save.

Foresee the Path.name: Foresee the Path
Foresee the Path.description:
You see just a split second into the future and glean how an enemy will move, making it easier for your allies to strike it mid-action. Make a @Check[perception]{Perception check} against the target enemy's Will DC or Deception DC, whichever is higher. The GM may judge a different DC is more appropriate if it's higher; for instance, using the Warfare Lore DC of a military captain. The target is then temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Krytyczny Sukces The target ally gains a reaction that lets it make a melee @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} against the target enemy, triggered if the enemy leaves a square within the ally's reach. If the ally already has an ability that lets it make melee Strikes as a reaction, such as Attack of Opportunity, the ally can forgo gaining the temporary reaction to instead gain a +2 status bonus to melee Strikes it makes as reactions.

Sukces As critical success, but the status bonus an ally gets if it forgoes the reaction is +1.

Porażka The spell has no effect.

Foresight.name: Przeczucie
Foresight.description:
Zyskujesz szósty zmysł ostrzegający cię przed zagrożeniem czychającym na cel zaklęcia. Jeśli obierzesz za cel zaklęcia inną istotę, tworzysz z nią mentalną więź, poprzez którą możesz poinformować go o niebezpieczeństwie. Ta więź jest efektem mentalnym. W związku z ilością informacji, które musisz przetworzyć na rzecz tego zaklęcia, nie możesz mieć aktywnego więcej niż jednego zaklęcia przeczucia na raz. Ponowne rzucenie przeczucia kończy poprzednie przeczucie. Kiedy trwa przeczucie, cel zyskuje premię statusową +2 do rzutów inicjatywy oraz nie ma @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczonej Gardy} przeciwko @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Niewykrytym} istotom ani w wyniku flankowania. Ponadtko zyskujesz natępującą reakcję: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VOEWhPQfN3lvHivK]{Przeczucie}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.X9Na6IK8FSPcTuoc]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Przeczucie}

Forge.name: Kucie
Forge.description:
To zaklęcie, służące do gwałtownego podgrzewania metali, obmyślone na długo przed powstaniem Żelaznej Laguny, znalazło również skuteczne zastosowanie bitewne. Przegrzewasz cel, zadająć 3k6 obrażeń od ognia. Jeśli cel jest metalowym obiektem, do końca twojej następnej tury zredukuj jego Twardość o liczbę zadanych obrażeń.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Cel odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia a jeśli jest metalową istotą zyskuje do końca twojej następnej tury podatność 2 na fizyczne obrażenia.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6 a podatność na fizyczne obrażenia przy trafieniu krytycznym zwiększa się o 2.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.zbTpf11NtbmizuzR]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Kucie (Krytyczna Porażka)}

Forgotten Lines.name: Forgotten Lines
Forgotten Lines.description:
Members of the Lacunafex and other allies use this spell to restore material that Thrune agents have redacted from historical or otherwise valuable texts. You learn one piece of information that was removed from the target text after its creation. You can instead learn one piece of information from a text that had been destroyed, but you must have a fragment of the text, such as a piece of the cover, a page, or even a clasp or metal fittings.

Wywyższenie (6.) The spell reconstructs all missing information regarding a specific topic of your choice.

Wywyższenie (9.) The spell also reveals information the writer self-censored and didn't commit to paper.

Form of the Sandpoint Devil.name: Form of the Sandpoint Devil
Form of the Sandpoint Devil.cost: igneous stones and gems worth 1 500 gp, bat wings, horse hooves, and at least one lizard
Form of the Sandpoint Devil.description:
You infuse yourself with incredible amounts of pure evil, subsuming your consciousness into malevolence and giving yourself a monstrous form resembling that of the Sandpoint Devil.

Beginning at dawn, you and your accomplices lay out a fire directly on loose earth, layering the igneous rocks and gems into the fire pit. When the fire is hot enough, you roast bat wings, horse hooves, and lizards over it until they're tender enough to eat; for the hooves, this could take hours. Throughout this time, you meditate and recite passages of texts holy to Lamashtu, ruminating on the beauty and necessity of the monstrous and twisting your mindset into a monstrous shape, the better to hold the evil that will come to possess you.

Once the wings, hooves, and lizards are cooked, you and your accomplices eat these items in their entirety, tearing them only with your teeth, and you must eat more than anyone else involved. You then scoop out a trench at the location where you previously lit the fire, folding the hot rocks into the earth. Your accomplices then bury you shallowly in the trench-you should be able to breathe but not necessarily able to see. Your accomplices then recite the correct texts and draw upon the power of transmutation while you infuse your mind further with the power and beauty of the monstrous. This stage continues for hours, until the setting of the sun. With the departure of its final ray and in accordance with your faith and occult power, you'll rise transformed.

Krytyczny Sukces You sprout enormous bat wings, a lizard-like tail, pointed teeth, hooves, and an equine head. You gain darkvision; if you already had darkvision, you instead gain greater darkvision. You gain jaws and hoof unarmed melee Strikes, which are the only attacks you can use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +23 or your unarmed attack modifier, whichever is higher. Your jaws Strike deals @Damage[(2d10+6)[piercing]] damage, and your hoof Strike deals @Damage[(2d6+6)[bludgeoning]] damage with the agile and versatile S traits. These attacks are Strength-based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). You gain a fly Speed of 40 feet. You also gain a version of the Sandpoint Devil's Accursed Breath: once per hour, you can breathe a @Template[cone|distance:30] of flame that deals @Damage[10d6[fire]] damage. Your mind transforms, subsuming your own personality with that of the Sandpoint Devil. Unlike many polymorph spells, you can't Dismiss this spell.

Sukces As critical success, except your fly Speed is 20 feet, and you can use your breath weapon once per day.

Porażka You fail to transform yourself.

Krytyczna Porażka Not only do you fail to transform yourself, but the ritual's secondary casters all transform into Sandpoint Devils for 1 minute, and they immediately attack you.

Fortify Summoning.name: Wzmocnienie Przywołania
Fortify Summoning.description:
Gdy przywołujesz istotę do swojego boku, twoja magia przemienia jej ciało, uwydatniając jej dzikość i odporność. Cel zyskuje premię statusową +1 do wszystkich testów i ST (w tym KP) na czas trwania jego przywołania, do 1 minuty.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.UtIOWubq7akdHMOh]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Wzmocnienie Przywołania}

Fortifying Brew.name: Fortifying Brew
Fortifying Brew.cost: high quality ingredients and brewing equipment worth 25 gp
Fortifying Brew.description:
You craft a large quantity of restorative drink, such as an invigorating tea, a refreshing ale, or a stimulative alchemical tonic. The ritual speeds along any natural processes to make the brew, such as fermenting fruit to make a wine. At the conclusion of the first 3 hours of the ritual, you produce enough brew for up to 10 people to drink, any of whom can be the secondary caster of the ritual. The brew must then be consumed over the next hour. There is no danger of the drinkers becoming drunk if the brew is alcoholic. Once that hour is completed, you and the secondary caster attempt your checks as normal.

Krytyczny Sukces The brew is delicious and revitalizing. It casts a 4. kręgu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SUKaxVZW2TlM8lu0]{Cleanse Affliction}, a 4. kręgu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.EfFMLVbmkBWmzoLF]{Clear Mind}, and a 4. kręgu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Et8RSCLx8w7uOLvo]{Sound Body} on each drinker for each relevant affliction or condition, using your modifier for the primary skill check as the counteract modifier. Each drinker also gains 20 temporary Hit Points that last 12 hours and a +2 status bonus to saves against diseases and poisons for the next 12 hours.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.IhorZCrhO4dCq6n3]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Fortifying Brew}

Sukces As critical success, except drinkers gain only 10 temporary Hit Points, and don't gain the status bonus to saves.

Porażka You and the other drinkers are left with a sour taste — something went wrong with the brewing process.

Krytyczna Porażka Your attempt to craft the drink resulted in something more akin to a poison. You and the other drinkers become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 4} and can't reduce the condition for 12 hours.

Wywyższenie (+1) The temporary Hit Points increases by 2 (or 4 on a critical success).
Fortifying Brew.secondarycheck: Alcohol Lore (or related lore), Crafting, Society

Fortissimo Composition.name: Fortissimo Composition
Fortissimo Composition.description:
You call upon your muse to greatly increase the benefits you provide with your courageous anthem, rallying anthem, or song of strength composition. If your next action is to cast one of these compositions, attempt a @Check[performance|against:will] check. The DC is usually the highest Will DC of the composition's targets, but the GM can assign a different DC based on the circumstances. The effect of your composition depends on the result of your check.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.rAW5o8MjjuIhYhLg]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Fortissimo Composition}

Krytyczny Sukces The status bonus from your composition increases to +3.

Sukces The status bonus from your composition increases to +2.

Porażka Your composition provides only its normal bonus of +1, but you don't spend the Focus Point for casting this spell.

Foul Miasma.name: Foul Miasma
Foul Miasma.description:
You multiply the disease within a creature, drawing it into an infectious mist outside their body where it can spread to other creatures. The target must attempt a Will save. If the target is willing, it can choose to take the effects of critical failure.

Krytyczny Sukces The target receives the benefit of a successful save against the lowest-level disease affecting it.

Sukces The target is unaffected.

Porażka One randomly chosen disease affecting the target fills the air in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:15] centered on the target. For the spell's duration, any creature that enters or ends its turn within the area is exposed to that disease.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, except the miasma contains all the diseases affecting the target.

Freedom.name: Freedom
Freedom.cost: valuable oils and objects associated with the target worth a total value of 100 gp × the spell rank × the target's level
Freedom.description:
You perform a ritual to free a creature imprisoned, petrified, or otherwise put into stasis by any magical effects.
