You free them from all such effects, even effects like @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.2CNqkt2s2IYkVnv6]{Imprisonment} that don't have a duration, as long as freedom's spell rank is equal to or higher than the effect's spell rank. To perform the ritual, you must be within 10 feet of the target, or within 10 feet of the place where the target was imprisoned (in the case of effects that trap the creature in an unreachable prison, like the oubliette form of imprisonment). You must know the name of the creature and details of its background; if the creature isn't a close associate, a failure or critical failure on a secondary @Check[society|overrideTraits:true] check reduces even a critical success on the primary check to a failure.

Krytyczny Sukces You free the target from all magical effects imprisoning it, petrifying it, or putting it into stasis. It gains a +1 status bonus to saving throws to resist those same magical effects for 1 week.

Sukces You free the target from all magical effects imprisoning it, petrifying it, or putting it into stasis.

Porażka You fail to free the target.

Krytyczna Porażka The magical effects imprisoning the target, petrifying the target, or putting it into stasis affect you and all secondary casters.

Freeze Time.name: Freeze Time
Freeze Time.description:
You temporarily stop time for everything but yourself, allowing you to use several actions in what appears to others to be no time at all. Immediately after casting freeze time, you can use up to 9 actions in 3 sets of up to 3 actions each.

After each set of actions, 1 round passes, but for only you, effects specifically targeting or affecting you, and effects that you create during the stoppage. All other creatures and objects are invulnerable to your attacks, and you can't target or affect them with anything.

Once you have finished your actions, time begins to flow again for the rest of the world. If you created an effect with a duration that extends beyond freeze time's duration, such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IarZrgCeaiUqOuRu]{Ściana Ognia}, it immediately affects others again, but it doesn't have any of the effects that happen only when you first Cast the Spell.

Freezing Rain.name: Freezing Rain
Freezing Rain.description:
Intense cold rain comes from nowhere, a microcosm of a sudden downpour, and a magical tweak can turn the rain to freezing sleet. The driving rain and pooling water make the area difficult terrain and extinguish non-magical fires.

On subsequent rounds, the first time you Sustain the spell each round, you can move the area up to 20 feet and can also freeze the rain. If you freeze the rain, each creature in the area takes 4k6 cold damage and might be slowed, depending on result of its Reflex save.

Krytyczny Sukces Efekt nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature takes half damage.

Porażka The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} for 1 round.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 2} for 1 round.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k6.

Frenzied Revelry.name: Frenzied Revelry
Frenzied Revelry.description:
You recall memories of hedonistic rites to send yourself into an infectious frenzy, dancing and howling wildly to encourage your companions to join in. You and your allies gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against mental effects while in the area. Whenever someone benefiting from this bonus critically succeeds at a saving throw against an enemy's mental effect, its revelry increases, granting it a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls for 1 round.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Jbj3aIUeDc7LOXH6]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Frenzied Revelry}

Wywyższenie (4.) The emanation's radius is 10 feet, and the status bonus to saves is +2.

Wywyższenie (7.) The emanation's radius is 15 feet, and the status bonus to saves is +3.
Frenzied Revelry.target: ty i twoi sojusznicy w obszarze

Friendfetch.name: Przyjaciąganie
Friendfetch.description: Wystrzeliwujesz efemeryczne, telekinetyczne wici, które przyciągają każdy z celów bezpośrednio ku tobie, zatrzymując je na najbliższym niezajętym polu na tej ścieżce. Jest to wymuszony ruch.

Frigid Flurry.name: Frigid Flurry
Frigid Flurry.description:
You place a palm to your lips and exhale a cold breath, whipping up a gust of wind that freezes the air's ambient moisture into a flurry of jagged shards. The flurry deals 9k6 cold damage and 9k6 slashing damage to all foes, with a basic Reflex save, but the gust flows harmlessly around your allies. The wind then picks you up and carries you to the other end of the area; though your movement within the gust can still trigger reactions, the storm of ice crystals prevents you from being affected by any effects, except for those that would counteract the spell's magic or that the GM decides would affect snow.

Wywyższenie (+1) The cold and slashing damage each increase by 1k6.

Frog Tongue.name: Frog Tongue
Frog Tongue.description:
Your tongue extends unnaturally, flicking out toward a creature within range and dealing 2k8 bludgeoning damage (basic Reflex save). On a failure, the creature is also stuck to the end of the tongue. It is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda} and can't move beyond the reach of your tongue. A creature can sever the tongue with a Strike that deals at least 10 slashing damage or attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} against your spell DC. The AC of the tongue is equal to your spell DC. Severing the tongue in this way deals no damage to you but ends the spell. While a creature is stuck to the end of your tongue, actions you take with the auditory trait take a –2 circumstance penalty. If you move so that the affected creature is outside of the tongue's reach, the spell ends.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 2k8.

Frost Pillar.name: Frost Pillar
Frost Pillar.description: Ice crystallizes around a creature, imprisoning it within an icy pillar. On a successful saving throw, the creature is pushed to an adjacent space of its choice; otherwise, it's frozen inside the pillar and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Spętany} as its body can barely move within the ice. The ice has AC 10, Hardness 10, and 60 Hit Points; it's immune to critical hits, cold damage, and precision damage, and it has weakness 15 to fire. If the ice is destroyed, the creature within is freed and the spell immediately ends.

Frost's Touch.name: Dotyk Lodu
Frost's Touch.description:
Twój odłamek mrozu spija pobliskie ciepło w marnej próbie nasycenia się i osiągnięcia przeszywającego zimna o jakim Świat Główny nie słyszał. Pozwala ci to schłodzić napój, ostudzenia rozgrzanego kociołka do temperatury przy której można go bezpiecznie chwycić lub osiągnięcia podobnych pomniejszych efektów. Po schłodzeniu temperatura obiektu zaczyna ponownie podlegać wpływom jego otoczenia w normalny sposób. Możesz też skondensować wilgoć z otoczenia w stały stan, tworząc obiekt; ten tymczasowy obiekt ma znikome Naręcze oraz jest wykonany z niemagicznego lodu. Obiekt wygląda prowizorycznie i wyraźnie sztucznie oraz jest niebywale kruchy — nie można go użyć jako narzędzia, broni ani lokusu czy w ramach kosztu zaklęcia. Po utworzeniu topi się z standardową prędkością topnienia lodu zależnie od warunków otoczenia.

Wywyższenie (3.) Możesz tworzyć z lodu proste obiekty o Naręczu 1 i poziomie nie większym od 1. Obiekty te muszą być sztywne. Możesz posiadać tylko jeden stworzony w ten sposób obiekt na raz; jeśli stworzysz kolejny, poprzedni obiekt natychmiastowo topnieje.

Wywyższenie (5.) Tworzone przez ciebie obiekty mogą mieć Naręcze nie większe niż 4 i poziom nie większy niż 4.

Wywyższenie (7.) Tworzone przez ciebie obiekty mogą mieć Naręcze nie większe niż 8 i poziom nie większy niż 8.

Wywyższenie (9.) Tworzone przez ciebie obiekty mogą mieć Naręcze nie większe niż 20 i poziom nie większy niż 12.

Frostbite.name: Odmrożenie
Frostbite.description:
W pobliżu celu krystalizuje się sfera przeszywającego zimna, zamrażając jego ciało. Cel odnosi 2k4 obrażeń od zimna z podstawowym rzutem obronnym Krzepy. Przy krytycznej porażce, cel dodatkowo zyskuje podatność 1 na obrażenia obuchowe do początku jego następnej tury.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.DdqWMj7cuf4S1bgr]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Odmrożenie}

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k4 a podatność przy krytycznej porażce zwiększa się o 1.

Fungal Exhalation.name: Fungal Exhalation
Fungal Exhalation.description:
You exhale toxic mold spores that fill the area. You deal 6k4 poison damage to creatures in the area. On a failure, a creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 2} on a critical failure. A creature that doesn't breathe is immune to this effect.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 2k4.

Fungal Hyphae.name: Fungal Hyphae
Fungal Hyphae.description:
Thin hyphae grow from your feet and plunge into the earth, creating a symbiotic fungal network that attaches to plants within 30 feet and connects you to their root systems. You gain an imprecise tremorsense, allowing you to sense anything directly touching plants within that distance. If you move, the hyphae snap, and the spell ends.

Wywyższenie (4th) You can control plants in the area to a small degree, allowing you to make Strikes with tree branches, exposed roots, or similarly solid plants. To do so, you use a Strike action, but you can Strike any creature you can detect with your tremorsense. These are spell attacks that deal @Damage[3d8[bludgeoning]] damage. Unusual plants, such as thorny vines, might deal a different type of damage at the GM's discretion. You can't make any other attacks through these plants, or take any other actions through them, other than these Strikes.

Wywyższenie (6th) As 4th rank, but you can use other simple manipulate actions through the plants, including having a branch pick an object up or open a door, though more complex actions, such as picking a lock or disabling a trap, remain impossible.

Fungal Infestation.name: Fungal Infestation
Fungal Infestation.description:
Toxic spores swarm over creatures in the area, causing them to erupt in grotesque fungal growths. These noxious growths deal 2k6 persistent poison damage, and each creature must attempt a Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The target takes half the persistent poison damage.

Porażka The target takes the full persistent poison damage. While it's taking this persistent poison damage, it has weakness 1 to fire and weakness 1 to slashing.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but double the persistent poison damage. While it's taking this persistent poison damage, it has weakness 2 to fire and weakness 2 to slashing.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.6gRRjn0h0DAUh7nQ]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Fungal Infestation}

Wywyższenie (+2) The persistent damage increases by 2k6, and the weakness increases by 1, or by 2 on a critical failure.

Gale Blast.name: Uderzenie Wichury
Gale Blast.description:
Z twych rozpostartych dłoni wydobywa się wiatr, wirując wokółw emanacji 5 stóp. Każda istota w obszarze otrzymuje 1k6 obrażeń obuchowych z podstawowym rzutem obronnym Krzepy.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia i jest odpychana 5 stóp od ciebie.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota odnosi podwójne obrażenia i jest odpychana 10 stóp od ciebie.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k6.

Garden of Death.name: Garden of Death
Garden of Death.cost: water infused with a dozen deadly toxins worth a total of 50 gp
Garden of Death.description:
Typically associated with the less friendly fey or druids, this ritual calls all the poisonous, toxic, and venomous plants and animals of an area to congregate in a certain place, creating a beautiful but extravagantly deadly garden.

You and the secondary casters sprinkle the ground of the garden with water infused with various poisons and a few drops of your blood. Within the bounds of the ritual, the ecosystem attracts every possible poisonous plant or animal native to the environment, with nonpoisonous plants or animals growing only if there's no toxic counterpart. This deadly ecosystem flourishes, if at all possible (plants still need light and water, for instance), for a year and gradually disperses after this period. If this ritual is successfully cast on the grounds of an existing garden of death, it resets the duration and expands the garden's radius by 20 feet instead.

The maximum level of plants or animals called by the ritual is equal to its spell rank, and the called plants and animals can use the ritual's spell DC instead of their own poison DC, whichever is higher. The garden's residents don't willingly use their poison on you or the secondary casters, but you don't otherwise control or command them.

Krytyczny Sukces A poisonous garden forms, and you and the secondary casters gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Nature or Crafting checks to deal with the plants or animals, such as feeding them or harvesting poison from them. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.5xCheSMgtQhQZm00]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Garden of Death (Krytyczny Sukces)}

Sukces As critical success, but without the circumstance bonus when interacting with the garden.

Porażka The ritual has no effect.

Krytyczna Porażka You and the secondary casters are each bitten by the most poisonous creature found naturally in the environment.

Garden of Healing.name: Garden of Healing
Garden of Healing.description:
Spirits of comfort and respite swirl around you, trailing visions of growing grass and blooming blossoms. When you cast this spell and the first time you Sustain it on each subsequent round, you generate a pulse of renewing energy that heals each creature within the emanation for 1k4 Hit Points. The calm of this effect lingers; once this spell ends, any creature that has been affected by its healing gains a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against emotion effects for 10 minutes but does not receive any healing from additional castings of the spell while the bonus persists.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.JhxAUu3JEyERedMd]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Garden of Healing}

Wywyższenie (+1) The healing granted by the spell's pulse increases by 1k4 Hit Points.

Garden of the Green Man's Growth.name: Garden of the Green Man's Growth
Garden of the Green Man's Growth.description:
You cast your magic into the earth, calling out to a powerful green man, a verdant lesser deity of nature, to come to your aid. They occupy the space of a Medium creature, have a Speed of 40 feet, and a climb Speed of 40 feet.

Arrive (plant) Verdant Bloom The green man erupts from the ground in a burst of lush growth, dealing @Damage[10d8[bludgeoning]] damage to creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:60] with a basic Reflex save. Creatures that fail this save are pushed 30 feet away from the green man and are knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}. The area becomes greater difficult terrain for 24 hours.

Depart (plant) Forest of Grasping Vines The green man casts out their arms, causing vines to rise from the ground, lash at up to six different creatures, and coil them up. Each of these vines targets a different enemy within 100 feet of the green man and deals @Damage[12d6[slashing]] damage with a basic Reflex save. A creature that fails is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Pochwycony} until it Escapes (on a critical failure it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Spętany} until it Escapes). The @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} DC is your spell DC. Each creature that begins its turn grabbed or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony} by these vines takes an additional @Damage[4d6[bludgeoning]] damage, as the vines continue to squeeze the life from it.

Gasping Marsh.name: Gasping Marsh
Gasping Marsh.description:
With a rattling hiss, you create a quickly evaporating mist of invisible poisonous marsh gas to smother creatures in the area. When you Sustain the Spell, the mist dissipates completely from the previous area, and you can select a new area within range to fill with the mist. If you don't Sustain the Spell, the mist dissipates and the spell ends.

You deal 4k6 poison damage to each breathing creature that starts its turn in the area. Each affected creature must attempt a Fortitude save.

The creature is then temporarily immune to gasping marsh for 1 minute.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1}.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota odnosi podwójne obrażenia, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 2}, and takes @Damage[1d8[persistent,poison]].

Gate.name: Gate
Gate.description: You tear open a rift to another plane, creating a portal that creatures can travel through in either direction. This portal is vertical and circular, with a radius of 40 feet. The portal appears at a location of your choice on the destination plane, assuming you have a clear idea of both the destination's location on the plane and what the destination looks like. If you attempt to create a gate into or out of the realm of a deity or another similarly powerful being, that being can prevent the gate from forming.

Gathering Call.name: Gathering Call
Gathering Call.cost: rare oils and powdered minerals worth 5,000 gp
Gathering Call.description:
You bind yourself and your allies to the specific safe location, referred to as a sanctuary, where you perform the ritual. This allows the participants to return later by simply speaking a word.

Sukces You form the connection with the sanctuary. Any participant in the ritual can Dismiss the ritual. When they do, all the participants can immediately return to the sanctuary from any distance, as long as they are on the same plane as the sanctuary. Each participant arrives in the position in which they were standing during the casting of the ritual. When the word is spoken, all other participants know it, and each can choose whether or not to return to the sanctuary at that time. The ritual then immediately ends.

Porażka You fail to form the connection between the participants and the sanctuary and are aware that the ritual has failed.

Krytyczna Porażka The ritual inadvertently forms a connection with a location on another plane. The casters are unaware of this misalignment. When the word is invoked, all ritual participants are shifted to this extraplanar location.

Wywyższenie (+1) The cost increases by 5,000 gp, the ritual can target one more creature, and the maximum level of creature it can target increases by 2.
Gathering Call.primarycheck: Arcana or Occultism (expert, the check has the secret trait)
Gathering Call.secondarycheck: Arcana or Occultism  (whichever isn't used for the primary check), Society
Gathering Call.target: up to seven willing creatures of 14. level or lower

Geas.name: Geas
Geas.description:
You enforce a magic rule on a willing target, forcing it to either perform or refrain from carrying out a certain act. A geas to perform an act is usually conditional, such as, "Always offer hospitality to strangers seeking a place to stay." An unconditional geas to perform a certain act doesn't require the target to perform that act exclusively, though it must prioritize the task above all leisurely pursuits. The most common geas to refrain from carrying out an act is a specification to avoid violating a contract. In those cases, the secondary caster usually takes charge of making sure the wording of the contract is attuned correctly with the ritual's magic. Because the target is willing, geas can have a duration that lasts for as long as the target agrees to. If the target is unable to fulfill the geas, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1}, and the sickened condition increases by 1 for each consecutive day it is prevented from following the geas, to a maximum of sickened 4. The sickened condition ends immediately when it follows the geas again; it can't remove the sickened condition in any other way. Only powerful magic such as a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{Wish} ritual can remove the effects of geas from a willing target.

Krytyczny Sukces The geas succeeds, and the target receives a +1 status bonus to skill checks that directly uphold the geas (at the GM's discretion).

Sukces The geas succeeds.

Porażka The geas fails.

Krytyczna Porażka The geas fails, and you are instead affected by the geas you were attempting to place on the target. You are considered an unwilling target, so the geas can be counteracted with a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SUKaxVZW2TlM8lu0]{Ulżenie w Dolegliwości} spell.

Wywyższenie (5.) You can use geas on an unwilling creature; it can attempt a Will save to negate the effect. If the target fails this Will save, the geas lasts up to 1 week. A cleanse affliction spell can counteract a geas on an unwilling creature, in addition to powerful magic such as a wish ritual. A clever unwilling creature can subvert the geas by contriving situations that prevent it from complying, but in that case it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony} (as described above).

Wywyższenie (7.) As 5. rank, but the geas lasts for up to 1 year on an unwilling creature.

Wywyższenie (9.) As 5. rank, but the geas lasts for a duration you choose (even unlimited) on an unwilling creature.
Geas.target: 1 creature of a level no greater than double the geas ritual's rank

Gecko Grip.name: Gecko Grip
Gecko Grip.description:
Tiny clinging hairs sprout across the creature's hands and feet, offering purchase on nearly any surface. The target gains a climb Speed equal to its Speed.

Wywyższenie (5.) Czas trwania zwiększa się do 1 hour.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.qn7uO5Ih01yLJot7]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Gecko Grip}

Genie's Veil.name: Genie's Veil
Genie's Veil.description:
Aktywator A creature within range is attacked.

With a flourish, you fulfill a creature's wish for protection, bending reality to keep them from harm. The target vanishes in a burst of brightly colored smoke and sparkles, reappearing an instant later. They become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} against the triggering attack and until the end of the current creature's turn.

Gentle Breeze.name: Gentle Breeze
Gentle Breeze.description:
A light, soothing breeze flows through the area, making it easier to rest and recover. Medicine checks attempted to benefit living creatures in the area get a +2 status bonus. Any living creature in the area also gets a +2 status bonus to saving throws against afflictions and, if it remains within the area for the full duration, regains 10 Hit Points. In addition, the cool breeze reduces the temperature effects of heat by one step for any creature in the area.

Wywyższenie (+2) The healing increases by 10 Hit Points.

Gentle Landing.name: Lekkie Lądowanie
Gentle Landing.description:
Aktywator istota w zasięgu spada

Tworzysz magiczny prąd wznoszący aby zamortyzować upadek. Spadek celu spowalnia do 60 stóp na rundę a część upadku przebyta pod wpływem działania zaklęcia nie liczy się podczas obliczania obrażeń od upadku. Jeśli cel sięgnie ziemi w trakcie czasu trwania zaklęcia nie odnosi on obrażeń od upadku. Zaklęcie kończy się kiedy tylko cel wyląduje.

Geyser.name: Geyser
Geyser.description:
Area 10-foot radius, 50-foot-tall cylinder

A powerful geyser blasts up from the ground, potentially pushing creatures on top of it into the air. The bottom of this spell's area must be on solid ground. Each creature in the area takes 3k6 bludgeoning damage and 4k6 fire damage, with a Reflex save. A creature pushed into the air by the geyser can't be pushed beyond the top of the geyser. After being pushed into the air, a creature falls unless it's flying or has some other means of staying aloft, taking falling damage (normally equal to half the distance it fell). After the geyser erupts, its area is filled with a cloud of steam for 1 round. All creatures in the steam are concealed, and all creatures outside the steam are concealed to creatures within it.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature is unaffected.

Sukces The creature takes half damage and isn't pushed into the air.

Porażka The creature takes full damage and is pushed 20 feet into the air. (@Damage[10[bludgeoning]|options:fall-damage] damage)

Krytyczna Porażka The creature takes double damage and is pushed 40 feet into the air. (@Damage[20[bludgeoning]|options:fall-damage] damage)

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k6 bludgeoning and 1k6 fire.

Ghost Sound.name: Widmowy Dźwięk
Ghost Sound.description:
Tworzysz słuchową iluzję prostych dźwięków, nie głośniejszą niż czerych krzyczących ludzi. Dźwięki dochodzą z wybranego przez ciebie pola w zasięgu. Nie możesz wytworzyć zrozumiałych słów ani innych skomplikowanych dźwieków (takich jak muzyka).

Wywyższenie (3.) Zasięg zwiększa się do 60 stóp.

Wywyższenie (5.) Zasięg zwiększa się do 120 stóp.

Ghostly Carrier.name: Ghostly Carrier
Ghostly Carrier.description: You create a Tiny, semi-corporeal figure with a form you choose. It hovers near you for the duration. When you Cast a Spell that has a range of touch, you can have the carrier move within range, deliver the spell to a creature there, and return to you. If the carrier must attempt a spell attack roll, it uses your normal bonuses. The carrier has your AC and saves, but it is destroyed by any damage.

Ghostly Shift.name: Ghostly Shift
Ghostly Shift.description:
Your body becomes insubstantial as you partially phase out. You gain resistance 2 to all damage (except force).

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.vUjRvriyuHDZrsgc]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Ghostly Shift}

Wywyższenie (+2) The resistance increases by 1.

Ghostly Tragedy.name: Ghostly Tragedy
Ghostly Tragedy.description:
This spell compels local spirits to reenact a violent event of the recent past that you're aware of and name as you Cast the Spell. You take the role of the primary victim. The reenactment plays out the final 9 minutes leading up to the death or injury of the victim and the minute after. The spirits don't change form, so this doesn't help determine perpetrators by their looks. Spiritual forms of missing creatures necessary for the event manifest as needed, and missing items appear as shadowy outlines.

Once the scene ends, you take @Damage[2d6[void]] damage for each ghostly apparition that participated in the scene (typically equal to the number of creatures involved other than the victim). Any creature that observed the ghostly recreation, including you, can attempt checks to investigate the event to discover new clues and information.

Ghostly Transcription.name: Ghostly Transcription
Ghostly Transcription.description:
Glowing letters assemble in the air, providing a transcription of the target's speech in all languages you speak. For the spell's duration, any words spoken aloud by the target are spelled out in letters in front of them.

When you Cast the Spell, you can choose whether these letters are visible to all creatures or only certain creatures you specify. Any words the target mouths silently are similarly spelled out, allowing the target to communicate silently or in areas where sound doesn't carry. This even allows the target to utter the incantations necessary for spells in such areas, but only if you choose to make the letters visible to all creatures.

Furthermore, any of the target's auditory abilities can affect creatures even in areas where sound doesn't carry as long as you have made the glyphs visible to them and they have line of sight to the target; in this case, they gain the visual trait. You can Dismiss the spell.

Ghostly Weapon.name: Duchowa Broń
Ghostly Weapon.description:
Broń będąca celem zaklęcia staje się przezroczysta i widmowa i może wywierać wpływ zarówno na cielesne co bezcielesne istoty i obiekty. Zyskuje ona efekty runy właściwości @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Duchowego Dotyku}, co oznacza, że staje się magiczna, jeśli jeszcze taka nie była, jest szczególnie skuteczna przeciw istotom bezcielesnym i może być dzierżona zarówno przez cielesne co bezcielesne istoty.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.EScdpppYsf9KhG4D]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Duchowa Broń}
Ghostly Weapon.target: 1 broń, która jest niepilnowana lub dzierżona przez godzącą się istotę

Ghoulish Cravings.name: Ghoulish Cravings
Ghoulish Cravings.description:
You touch the target to afflict it with the overwhelming desire to eat raw meat. The target must attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1} by its unbidden hunger.

Porażka The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 2} and can't reduce this condition below sickened 1 until it first consumes some raw meat; if the creature doesn't have access to raw meat, it can take a bite out of a corpse within reach as an Interact action.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the target can't reduce the condition below sickened 2 until it consumes raw meat.

Girzanje's March.name: Girzanje's March
Girzanje's March.description:
You sing a prayer for war, inspiring valor in allies who hear your song. Allied creatures who can hear and understand you gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, Fortitude saves, and Will saves against mental effects.

Wywyższenie (7.) Premia statusowa zwiększa się do +2.

Wywyższenie (10.) Premia statusowa zwiększa się do +3.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.QJRaVbulmpOzWi6w]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Girzanje's March}

Glacial Heart.name: Glacial Heart
Glacial Heart.description:
Ice and bone-deep cold assail the target, freezing it from the inside out. The frosty assault deals 10k6 cold damage, subject to the target's Fortitude save. After the effects are resolved, the target is temporarily immune for 1 day.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target takes half damage and is slowed 1 for 1 round. The spell ends.

Porażka Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1}, and must attempt a Fortitude save at the end of each of its turns; this ongoing save has the incapacitation trait. On a failed save, the slowed condition increases by 1 (or 2 on a critical failure), to a maximum of slowed 4. On a success, the slowed condition decreases by 1. If at any point the slowed condition is reduced to 0, the spell ends.

Once a creature's actions are reduced to 0 by this slowed condition, the creature is completely encased in ice. It continues making saves against glacial heart, possibly allowing it to reduce its slowed condition enough that it can act. This ice has Hardness 4 and 8 Hit Points, and its DC to Force Open is your spell DC. Breaking the ice frees the creature and ends the spell. If someone other than the target breaks the ice from outside, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1} and takes any damage dealt by the breaking effect in excess of the ice's Hit Points.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the target takes double damage and is initially @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 2}.

Wywyższenie (+1) Increase the cold damage by 2k6.

Glamorize.name: Glamorize
Glamorize.description:
Using simple magical gestures, you alter a minor detail of your appearance (add or remove highlights to your hair color, apply or remove cosmetics, add polish or accessories to your nails, etc.) or create a small environmental effect that's confined to your person (adjust surrounding lighting to favor your good side, cause a brief wind to make your hair blow dramatically, make a small chime occur as you smile, etc.). While the spell is active, you can Sustain it to make further adjustments. The changes persist until the spell's duration ends.

At the GM's discretion, such alterations might grant a +1 status bonus to certain tasks, such as Impersonate or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EEDElIyin4z60PXx]{Perform}.

Glass Form.name: Glass Form
Glass Form.description:
You grant the target properties of dull, transparent glass. The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty}, has no scent, and can't bleed. They gain resistance 5 to acid, cold, electricity, and piercing damage and weakness 5 to sonic and bludgeoning damage. A creature in this form is affected by the shatter spell as though the creature were an unattended object. Each time the target takes damage to which the spell grants resistance or weakness, reduce the duration by 1 minute.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.0lYbjDI2N3xVl24E]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Glass Form}

Wywyższenie (+2) The resistances and weaknesses increase by 5.

Glass Sand.name: Glass Sand
Glass Sand.description:
You throw a handful of sand that transforms into jagged shards of glass. Creatures in the area take 4k6 slashing damage and must attempt a Reflex save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Cel odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia and @Damage[1[bleed]]{1 persistent bleed} damage.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia and 2 persistent bleed damage.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6.

Glass Shield.name: Szklana Tarcza
Glass Shield.description:
Przyzywasz warstwę przejrzystego szkła chroniącą cię przed zagrożeniem. Liczy się to jako @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Wzniesienie Tarczy}, zapewniając ci premię sytuacyjną +1 do KP do początku twojej następnej tury, ale nie wymaga użycia ręki. Możesz @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Blokować Tarczą} z wykorzystaniem szklanej tarczy. Ma ona Twardość 2. Możesz użyć reakcji zapewnianej przez to zaklęcie do zablokowania obrażeń zadawanych przez dowolne zaklęcie lub efekt magiczny, nawet jeśli zadawane obrażenia nie są obrażeniami fizycznymi. Kiedy Zablokujesz coś Tarczą, eksploduje ona deszczem odłamków szkła. Jeśli istota, która ją zniszczyła znajduje się w promieniu 5 stóp, odłamki szkła zadają jej 1k4 obrażeń kłutych z podstawowym rzuten obronnym refleksu. Po wykonaniu Bloku Tarczą, zaklęcie kończy się a ty nie możesz rzucać go ponownie przez 10 minut.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.oDDS6D2KTjpbA491]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Szklana Tarcza}

Wywyższenie (3.) Tarcza ma Twardość 4 a obrażenia zwiększają się do 3k4.

Wywyższenie (5.) Tarcza ma Twardość 7 a obrażenia zwiększają się do 4k4.

Wywyższenie (7.) Tarcza ma Twardość 10 a obrażenia zwiększają się do 5k4.

Wywyższenie (9.) Tarcza ma Twardość 12 a obrażenia zwiększają się do 6k4.

Glimmer of Charm.name: Glimmer of Charm
Glimmer of Charm.description:
You're bathed in a smooth, almost glittering aura that improves the attitude of those near you. Any creature that ends its turn in the aura must attempt a Will saving throw with the following effects. No matter the result, it's then temporarily immune for 24 hours. The effect lasts until the spell ends, even after the creature leaves the aura.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature is unaffected and is aware of the aura.

Sukces The creature's attitude toward you improves by one step. If that improves its attitude to at least @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fuG8dgthlDWfWjIA]{Obojętny}, it can't take hostile actions against you, though the effect ends as soon as you take a hostile action against the creature or its allies.

Porażka The creature's attitude toward you improves by two steps. It can't take hostile actions against you, though the effect ends as soon as you take a hostile action against the creature or its allies.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature's attitude becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.v44P3WUcU1j0115l]{Pomocny} to you, though the effect ends as soon as you take a hostile action against the creature or its allies. While the creature is helpful, it can't take hostile actions against you.

Glimpse Weakness.name: Glimpse Weakness
Glimpse Weakness.description:
You glimpse a loose scale, a seam in a foe's armor, or a similar weakness, aiding your allies in landing a precise hit. The first ally that hits the target with a successful Strike deals additional precision damage equal to 1 + this spell's rank, and then the spell ends.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.VJpRUgSDtAO2TSRR]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Glimpse Weakness}

Glimpse the Truth.name: Glimpse the Truth
Glimpse the Truth.description:
Divine insight lets you see things as they are, unveiled by attempts to magically cloak the truth. The GM attempts a secret counteract check against each illusion that is at least partially within the area. Instead of counteracting the illusion, you see through it (for instance, if the check succeeds against an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Iluzoryczne Przebranie} spell, you see the creature's true form but illusory disguise doesn't end). Each time a new illusion comes into the aura during the duration of the spell, the GM attempts a secret counteract check for that illusion.

Wywyższenie (7.) You can allow everyone within range of the emanation to see through illusions you succeed against, not just yourself.

Glowing Trail.name: Świecąca Ścieżka
Glowing Trail.description:
Twoje ruchy pozostawiają za tobą niewyraźną świecącą ścieżkę, niczym mgliste echo twojej obecności. Chociaż twoja forma nie jest w nim rozpoznawalna, twój Rozmiar jest. Ta ścieżka zawisa w przestrzeni i nie jest przytwierdzona do jakiejkolwiek powierzchni, a więc śledzi też twoje ruchy w powietrzu. Ścieżka zanika po 10 minutach. Możesz w dowolnym momencie Odwołać to zaklęcie ale ścieżka zanika po normalnym czasie. Ścieżka może być widzialna lub @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialna}. Kiedy jest widoczna, objawia się jako lekko świecąca mgiełka o wybranym przez ciebie kolorze, chociaż nie roztacza światła poza granice swojej objętności. Kiedy jest niewidzialna nadal możesz ją wykryć, ale nie roztacza ona żadnego światła.

Wywyższenie (3.) Świecąca ścieżka zanika po 1 dniu.

Wywyższenie (5.) Świecąca ścieżka zanika po 1 tygodniu.

Wywyższenie (7.) Świecąca ścieżka zanika po 1 miesiącu.

Wywyższenie (9.) Świecąca ścieżka zanika po 1 roku.

Glutton's Jaws.name: Glutton's Jaws
Glutton's Jaws.description:
A slavering maw opens beneath a target and tries to take a bite out of them. Make a spell attack roll. On a hit, the mouth deals 2k6 piercing damage, and you gain 1k4 temporary Hit Points that last until the beginning of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.mrSulUdNbwzGSwfu]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Glutton's Jaws}

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 2k6, and the temporary Hit Points increase by 1k4.

Gluttonous Growth.name: Gluttonous Growth
Gluttonous Growth.description:
Plants in the area grow rapidly, taking on carnivorous characteristics as they seek to consume prey. All affected squares are difficult terrain, both on the ground and for flying creatures. Each creature that begins its turn in the area must attempt a Reflex save unless it's already @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Pochwycony} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Spętany}.

When you Sustain this spell, each creature grabbed or restrained by the plants takes 4k6 piercing damage.

Krytyczny Sukces Efekt nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature is grabbed until the beginning of its next turn or it Escapes.

Porażka The creature is grabbed until the spell ends or it Escapes.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is restrained until the spell ends or it Escapes.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage dealt by the plants when you Sustain the spell increases by 2k6.

Gnaw at the Moon.name: Gnaw at the Moon
Gnaw at the Moon.cost: mooncakes and rare tea worth 100 gp
Gnaw at the Moon.description:
It's said that after his demise at the hands of jealous Fumeiyoshi, Tsukiyo's lunar corpse was left unguarded as the heavens mourned; this provided a humble matron-rat opportunities to nibble at moon flesh and sip upon god blood, a meal which propelled her first steps of apotheosis into Lao Shu Po. Gnaw at the moon, an obscure folk magic ritual popular among Shenmen's downtrodden, allows you to honor the Old Rat Woman's audacity and unlikely ascent.

This ritual can only be performed on a night when the moon is visible in the sky above; you can't perform this ritual during a totally moonless night, while indoors, or while underground. Performing this ritual on the night of the full moon reduces the DCs of the ritual's skill checks by 2. You set out offerings of mooncakes and cups of tea on a flat surface (such as a table or a tray on the floor), assiduously ignore this food and drink, and praise the night's beauty while admiring and thanking the moon.

At the end of a successful ritual, bite marks appear on the mooncakes, and some of the tea disappears as if sipped while no one was looking. Supposedly, the ritual and offerings gain Lao Shu Po's attention, who sends her rodent children to eat and drink their fill and grant stolen blessings of moonlit sight. The effusive admiration for the moon is said to avert Tsukiyo's displeasure for commemorating the event of his murder; after all, old tales warn against giving offense to the moon, lest it slice your ears in retribution...

Krytyczny Sukces The targets gain darkvision.

Sukces The targets gain low-light vision.

Porażka The ritual has no effect.

Krytyczna Porażka You and the targets are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 1} for 24 hours. Your ears feel lacerated and raw as your earlobes become crisscrossed with tiny cuts.

Goblin Pox.name: Goblińska Ospa
Goblin Pox.description:
Twój dotyk zaraża cel goblińską ospą, irytującą alergiczną wysypką. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Krzepy.

Goblińska Ospa (choroba) Poziom 1; Istoty z cechą goblin oraz goblińskie psy są niewrażliwe

Stadium 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlenie 1} (1 runda)

Stadium 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlenie 1} i @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolnienie 1} (1 runda)

Stadium 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlenie 1} oraz istota nie może zmniejszyć swojej wartości Zemdlenia poniżej 1 (1 dzień)

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Cel jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1}.

Porażka Cel zostaje zarażony goblińską ospą w stadium 1.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel zostaje zarażony goblińską ospą w stadium 2.

Gouging Claw.name: Wyłupiający Szpon
Gouging Claw.description:
Tymczasowo morfujesz swoją kończynę, dodając jej szponiastą narośl. Wykonaj rzut ataku zaklęciem w zwarciu przeciwko KP celu. Jeśli trafisz, zadajesz obrażenia wybrane spośród 2k6 ciętych lub 2k6 kłutych, plus 2 przewlekłe obrażenia od krwawienia. Przy krytycznym sukcesie zadajesz podwójne obrażenia i podwójne obrażenia od krwawienia.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k6 a przewlekłe obrażenia od krwawienia zwiększają się o 1.

Grasp of the Deep.name: Grasp of the Deep
Grasp of the Deep.description:
You grip one target with the phantasmal pressure of the deep sea, disorienting and crushing its lungs and joints. The target takes 6k6 bludgeoning damage and other effects, depending on its Will saving throw.

Krytyczny Sukces Efekt nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The target takes half damage.

Porażka Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia and feels as though it's being crushed. The target also becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Pochwycony}, but it can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} with an Escape DC equal to your spell DC.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the target takes double damage.

Wywyższenie (6.) You can target up to 5 creatures.

Grasping Earth.name: Grasping Earth
Grasping Earth.description:
Handlike protrusions of rock and soil grab and bury creatures. Each creature in the area when you cast the spell, and each creature that ends its turn in the area during the spell's duration, must attempt a Fortitude save. The first time each round you Sustain this spell, each creature still @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Pochwycony} by the earth takes @Damage[1d6[bludgeoning]] damage, and each creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Spętany} by the earth takes @Damage[2d6[bludgeoning]] damage. A creature can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape}, rolling against your spell DC.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Porażka The creature is grabbed by the earth.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is restrained by the earth.

Wywyższenie (+2) The bludgeoning damage dealt when you Sustain this spell increases by 1k6 for grabbed creatures and 2k6 for restrained creatures.

Grasping Grave.name: Grasping Grave
Grasping Grave.description:
Hundreds of skeletal arms erupt from the ground in the area, clawing at creatures within and attempting to hold them in place. The skeletal arms deal 6k6 slashing damage. Każda istota w obszarze musi wykonać rzut obronny Refleksu.

Krytyczny Sukces Efekt nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature takes half damage.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia and a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota odnosi podwójne obrażenia and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony} for 1 round or until it Escapes.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6.

Grasping Vine.name: Chwytające Pnącze
Grasping Vine.description:
Grube, wijące się pnącze wyrasta z ziemi pod tobą i sięga ku celowi, pozwalając ci nim poruszać. Jeśli celem jest przedmiot, możesz przesunąć go o 10 stóp w dowolnym kierunku w zasięgu, gdy Rzucasz Zaklęcie i za pierwszym razem, gdy je Podtrzymujesz w każdej rundzie. Jeśli celem jest istota, musi ona wykonać rzut obronny Refleksu.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel i kończy się.

Sukces Cel zostaje @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Pochwycony} do końca twojej następnej tury, chyba że Ucieknie (ST @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Ucieczki} pnącza jest równy twojemu ST zaklęć) lub zniszczy pnącze (pnącze ma KP 15 i 10 Punktów Żywotności), w którym to momencie zaklęcie kończy się.

Porażka Cel zostaje pochwycony, dopóki nie Ucieknie lub nie zniszczy pnącza, w którym to momencie zaklęcie kończy się. Za pierwszym razem w każdej rundzie, gdy Podtrzymujesz to zaklęcie, możesz @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.lOE4yjUnETTdaf2T]{Przemieścić} pochwycony cel o maksymalnie 5 stóp.

Krytyczna Porażka Jak przy porażce, i możesz natychmiast Przemieścić cel o maksymalnie 10 stóp.
Grasping Vine.target: 1 niepilnowany obiekt o Naręczu nie większym niż 8, lub istota Średnia lub mniejsza, która znajduje się obecnie na ziemi

Grave Impressions.name: Grave Impressions
Grave Impressions.description:
You project a fragment of your senses into the corpse. While within 500 feet of the corpse (even if it's outside your line of sight or line of effect), you can see from where the target corpse had eyes using your normal visual senses, and you can hear from where the corpse had ears using your normal auditory senses. You can switch between your own vision and hearing, and the corpse's senses, with a single action that has the concentrate trait. If the corpse naturally lacked eyes or hearing organs in life, you cannot use that sense when using this spell. If the corpse is moved from its location, the spell ends.

Wywyższenie (4.) Czas trwania zwiększa się do 1 hour.

Wywyższenie (6.) The duration lasts until the next time you make your daily preparations.

Gravitational Pull.name: Grawitacyjne Przyciągnięcie
Gravitational Pull.description:
Zmieniasz w nagły sposób grawitację, przyciągając cel ku sobie. Cel jest przyciągany 10 stóp ku tobie chyba, że zda rzut obronny Krzepy. Przy krytycznej porażce zostaje również @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}. Efekty tego zaklęcia zmieniają się, w zależności od tego ile akcji poświęcisz na jego rzucanie.

1 (manipulacja) Zaklęcie obiera za cel jedną istotę.

2 (manipulacja, koncentracja) Zaklęcie obiera za cel jedną istotę i przyciąga ją 20 stóp zamiast 10.

3 (manipulacja, koncentracja) Zaklęcie obiera za cel do 5 istot.

Gravity Weapon.name: Broń Grawitacyjna
Gravity Weapon.description:
Kumulujesz siłę grawitacyjną i przelewasz ją w swoje uderzenia, co wzmacnia moc ataków zarówno mieczem co i łukiem. Przy swoim pierwszym Ciosie bronią w każdej rundzie, zyskujesz premię statusową do obrażeń równą podwojonej ilości kości obrażeń broni.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.tNjimcyUwn8afeH6]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Broń Grawitacyjna}

Gravity Well.name: Gravity Well
Gravity Well.description:
You create a sphere of altered gravity. All creatures and unsecured objects in the area move towards the center, depending on their Reflex saving throws. This follows the rules for forced movement. If there's not enough space near the center of the sphere, creatures and objects nearer to the center move first, and others move as far as they can without being blocked, up to the amount set by their saving throw outcomes.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature moves 5 feet toward the center.

Porażka The creature moves 15 feet toward the center.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature moves 30 feet toward the center.

Gray Shadow.name: Gray Shadow
Gray Shadow.description:
You pray over a dying creature, drawing its shadow into your service as long as its owner is stooped at death's door.

You summon a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-monster-core.Actor.5meW7DytYnF7Iq2V]{Greater Shadow} in a space adjacent to the dying creature. The greater shadow has its usual stats, with the following modifications:

  • The greater shadow's shadow hand Strike deals an additional 1k8 poison damage. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.7tYv9lY3ksSUny2h]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Gray Shadow}
  • When you Cast a Spell, you can use the greater shadow's location as the origin point instead of your own location. Upon doing so, the greater shadow immediately disappears.

If the dying creature targeted by this spell dies or regains consciousness, the greater shadow disappears and this spell ends.

Grease.name: Natłuszczenie
Grease.description:
Przyzywasz tłuszcz, wybierając obszar lub cel.

  • Obszar [4 sąsiadujące pola 5 stóp] Wszelka twarda powierzchnia w obszarze pokrywana jest tłuszczem. Każda stojąca na natłuszczonej powierzchni istota musi zdać rzut obronny Refleksu lub test Akrobatyki przeciwko twojemu ST zaklęć lub pada @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalona}. Istoty wkraczające na natłuszczoną powierzchnię w trakcie trwania zaklęcia muszą wykonać albo rzut obronny Refleksu albo test Akrobatyki aby @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.M76ycLAqHoAgbcej]{Balansować}. Istota, która wykonuje Krok lub Czołga Się nie musi podejmować tego testu lub rzutu obronnego.
  • Cel [1 obiekt o Naręczu lekkim lub mniejszym] Jeśli Rzucisz Zaklęcie na niepilnowany obiekt, ktokolwiek próbujący go potem podnieść musi zdać rzut obronny Refleksu lub test Akrobatyki przeciwko twojemu ST zaklęć aby móc to zrobić. Jeśli obierasz za cel pilnowany obiekt, istota trzymająca go musi wykonać rzut obronny Refleksu lub test Akrobatyki. Przy porażce, osoba trzymająca obiekt lub dzierżąca go ponosi karę sytuacyjną –2 do wszystkich testów związanych z jego używaniem; przy krytycznej porażce osoba trzymająca obiekt lub dzierżąca go wypuszcza go. Obiekt ląduje na sąsiednim polu wybranym przez MG. Jeśli rzucisz to zaklęcie na przemiocie noszonym przez kogoś, nosząca go osoba zyskuje premię sytuacyjną +2 do ST Krzepy przeciw próbom Pochwycenia jej.
Grease.target: 1 obiekt o Naręczu Lekkim lub mniejszym

Grim Tendrils.name: Mroczne Macki
Grim Tendrils.description:
Wici skondensowanej ciemności wynurzają się z twoich palców po czym przeszywają powietrze. Zadajesz 2k4 obrażeń od pustki oraz obrażenia @Damage[(@item.level)[bleed]] żyjącym istotom w linii. Każda żyjąca istota w tej linii musi wykonać rzut obronny Krzepy.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota odnosi połowę obrażeń od pustki i nie odnosi przewlekłych obrażeń od krwawienia.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota odnosi podwójne obrażenia od pustki i podwójne przewlekłe obrażenia od krwawienia.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia od pustki zwiększają się o 2k4 a przewlekłe obrażenia od krwawienia zwiększają się o 1.

Grisly Growths.name: Makabryczne Narośle
Grisly Growths.description:
To brutalne zaklęcie powoduje u celu wyrośnięcie nadmiarowych kończyn i organów, czy to w postaci palców powielających się dopóki dłonie nie zaczną przypominać krzewów, powiek nowych oczu rozrywających skórę w najdziwniejszych miejscach, nóg wyrastających z boku torsu czy innych tego rodzaju zmian. Cel odnosi w wyniku wyrastania nowej tkanki 10k6 obrażeń kłutych (podstawowy rzut obronny Krzepy). To zaklęcie nie ma żadnego efektu na istoty o zmiennej anatomii lub pozbawione kończyn, takie jak szlamy czy proteanie. Narośle gniją w przyspieszonym tempie i odpadają po upływie 1 rundy.

Dodatkowo, o ile pierwotny cel nie odniesie krytycznego sukcesu na rzucie obronnym, wszystkie istoty w promieniu 30 stóp od celu, wliczając w to sam cel, muszą podjąć się rzutu obronnego @Check[will]{Woli} - następnie stają się tymczasowo niewrażliwe na ten dodatkowy efekt makabrycznych narośli na 1 godzinę. Ten dodatkowy efekt jest mentalny i wzrokowy.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Porażka Istota jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlona 1}.

KrytyczD[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesna Porażka Istota jest @UUId1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlona 2}.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6.

Gritty Wheeze.name: Piaszczyste Parsknięcie
Gritty Wheeze.description:
Zioniesz małą chmurą wysuszającego piachu i pyłu. Istoty w obszarze odnoszą 2k4 obrażeń obuchowych i muszą wykonać rzut obronny Krzepy.

Istoty z cechami woda lub roślina odnoszą na tym rzucie stopień sukcesu o jeden niższy od wyrzuconego.

Krytyczny Sukces Istota nie odnosi obrażeń.

Sukces Istota odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia i jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczona} na 1 rundę.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota odnosi podwójne obrażenia i jest zamroczona na 1 minutę.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k4.

Guardian's Aegis.name: Guardian's Aegis
Guardian's Aegis.cost: rare oils worth 10 gp × the primary caster's level
Guardian's Aegis.description:
The guardian's aegis is a ritual used across numerous cultures to bind a chosen guardian and ward together so that they can complete a quest of great import. When the ritual is completed, designate one of the casters as the guardian, while the other is the ward. As long as you're on the same plane of existence, both of you are always aware of each other's relative directions and state of being, including any conditions the other is affected by. As long as you're within 30 feet of each other, whenever the ward takes damage, the damage is reduced by the amount equal to half the guardian's level, and the guardian loses an equal number of Hit Points; the target still takes additional effects like poison even if guardian's aegis reduces the damage to 0.

Krytyczny Sukces The ritual is successful, and the duration is 1 month.

Sukces The ritual is successful.

Porażka The ritual has no effect.

Krytyczna Porażka The ritual backfires. You and the secondary caster become magically isolated from each other for 1 week, unable to provide each other any beneficial effect.

Guidance.name: Wskazówki
Guidance.description:
Prosisz nadprzyrodzone istoty o przewodnictwo, zapewniając celowi premię statusową +1 do jednego rzutu ataku, testu Percepcji, rzutu obronnego lub testu umiejętności wykonywanego przez niego przed upłunięciem czasu trwania zaklęcia. Cel wybiera czy chce zastosować premię do danego rzutu przed jego wykonaniem. Jeśli cel wykorzysta premię, zaklęcie dobiega końca. Niezależnie od powyższych, cel jest następnie niewrażliwy na działanie zaklęcia przez 1 godzinę.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.3qHKBDF7lrHw8jFK]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Wskazówki}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.3LyOkV25p7wA181H]{Efekt: Niewrażliwość na Wskazówki}

Guided Introspection.name: Guided Introspection
Guided Introspection.description:
You guide the target in examining their innermost feelings, their behaviors, and the motivations behind their actions, granting them clarity and insight. The target gains a +1 status bonus to saving throws against emotion and fear.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Me470HI6inX3Bovh]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Guided Introspection}

If the target would become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Zdezorientowany} during the spell's duration, they reduce the duration of the confused condition by 1 round, to a minimum of 1 round. If the target would become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony}, they reduce the value of the frightened or stupefied condition by 1, to a minimum of 1. Once any of these conditions occur, the spell ends.

Wywyższenie (4th) The status bonus increases to +2.

Guiding Star.name: Guiding Star
Guiding Star.description: You call on the constellations of the night sky to guide a creature to the location where you Cast the Spell. Each time the target views the stars, it receives a mental nudge toward your chosen location, though it isn't compelled to follow. The target can recognize you as the source. If the creature goes to another planet or plane, the spell's effects are suppressed, but they resume if the creature returns.

Gust of Wind.name: Podmuch Wiatru
Gust of Wind.description:
A violent wind issues forth from your palm, blowing from the point where you are when you Cast the Spell to the line's opposite end. The wind extinguishes small non-magical fires, disperses fog and mist, blows objects of light Bulk or less around, and pushes larger objects. Large or smaller creatures in the area must attempt a Fortitude save. Large or smaller creatures that later move into the gust must attempt the save on entering.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature can't move against the wind.

Porażka The creature is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}. If it was flying, it takes the effects of critical failure instead.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is pushed 30 feet in the wind's direction, knocked prone, and takes 2k6 bludgeoning damage.

Hag's Fruit.name: Hag's Fruit
Hag's Fruit.description:
You imbue a single piece of fruit with a curse that leaves its victims in a magical sleep. The first person to eat the fruit within the spell's duration is subject to the Curse of Slumber, using your spell DC as the saving throw DC of the curse.

Curse of Slumber (curse, incapacitation, necromancy, sleep)

Poziom 11

Efekt You fall asleep for 1 round (or permanently on a critical failure) and seem to be dead; a creature must succeed at a @Check[medicine|dc:30] check to realize you're alive. Noise doesn't awaken you, but taking damage gives you a new saving throw against the curse.

Halcyon Infusion.name: Halcyon Infusion
Halcyon Infusion.description:
You infuse magical energy into your target, opening up their mind to the pathways of magic and granting them the ability to use magic to affect the world around them.

Choose a 1. kręgu spell you prepared today or that's in your repertoire, of the same tradition you used to cast halcyon infusion. The spell must be one that has a listed range. If the target is at least 3. level, you can choose a 2. kręgu spell instead of a 1. kręgu spell; and if the target is at least 5. level, you can choose a 3. kręgu spell. The target can Cast the Spell once per day as an innate spell of the tradition you used to cast halcyon infusion. If they are untrained in the appropriate magical tradition, their spell attack bonus is 2 + their level + their highest mental ability modifier, and their spell DC is 12 + their level + their highest mental ability modifier.

Unlike most abilities that can only be used once per day, the target refreshes their use of the granted innate spell each day only after you make your daily preparations and choose to extend halcyon infusion's duration by either refraining from preparing a spell in the slot (if you're a prepared spellcaster) or expending another spell slot (if you're a spontaneous spellcaster).

Wywyższenie (8.) If the target is at least 7. level, you can choose a 4. kręgu spell.

Wywyższenie (10.) As 8., and if the target is at least 9. level, you can choose a 5. kręgu spell.
Halcyon Infusion.target: one willing creature of lower level than you

Halcyon Mists.name: Halcyon Mists
Halcyon Mists.description:
In a moment of dire need, you call upon ancestral power to strengthen and sustain. A soothing mist gathers around the target, granting 1k8 temporary Hit Points and ending one source of persistent acid, bleed, fire, poison, or void damage affecting it. If the creature has persistent damage from more than one of these sources, you choose the one that ends.

The mists linger around the target, making them @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} until the beginning of their next turn, though this obvious concealment can't be used to Hide.

Wywyższenie (+1) The temporary Hit Points increase by 1k8.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Ore1RvtyWdioF5QW]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Halcyon Mists}

Hallowed Ground.name: Hallowed Ground
Hallowed Ground.description:
One small space becomes inhospitable to undead as you fill it with life-infused benevolent magic. Each undead creature in the area takes 1k6 vitality damage and 1k4 spirit damage when you Cast the Spell, with a basic Fortitude save. After that, undead creatures have weakness 1 to vitality damage and your necromancy spells while in the area.

This spell also automatically attempts to counteract any attempt to raise undead in the area (if either the undead would appear in the area or the effect's caster or creator is in it).

If you Cast this Spell again, any previous hallowed ground you had cast ends.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.yb9q5nVA1N0FfO6D]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Hallowed Ground}

Wywyższenie (+2) The vitality damage increases by 1k6, spirit damage increases by 1k4, and weakness increases by 1.

Hallucination.name: Hallucination
Hallucination.description:
The target consistently detects one thing as another, can't detect something that's there, or detects something that's not there, though it doesn't alter their beliefs. You choose which of these effects applies, and you determine the specifics of the hallucination. For example, you could make the target see all elves as humans, be unable to detect the presence of their brother, see their beloved good luck charm on their person even when it isn't, or see a tower in the center of town.

The target can attempt an initial Will save, with effects below. They also receive a Will save to disbelieve the hallucination every time they @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Szukanie} or directly interact with the hallucination. For example, the target could attempt to disbelieve the hallucination each time they interacted with an elf, bumped into their brother accidentally, tried to check their charm, or studied the tower. The target can attempt to disbelieve with a large circumstance bonus in situations determined by the GM, such as if the target attempted to climb the nonexistent tower.

Krytyczny Sukces Efekt nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature perceives what you chose until it disbelieves, but it knows what the hallucination is.

Porażka The creature perceives what you chose until it disbelieves.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature perceives what you chose until it disbelieves, and it trusts its false senses, taking a –4 circumstance penalty to saves to disbelieve.

Wywyższenie (6.) Choose to either target up to 10 creatures or change the spell's duration to until your next daily preparations.

Wywyższenie (8.) Choose to either target any number of creatures or change the spell's duration to unlimited.

Hand of the Apprentice.name: Dłoń Ucznia
Hand of the Apprentice.description:
Wykorzystujesz jedną z najbardziej fundamentalnych lekcji magii, aby unieść swoją broń w powietrze i miotać nią. Ciskasz trzymaną bronią do walki wręcz, w której jesteś wytrenowany, w cel, wykonując rzut ataku zaklęciem. Przy sukcesie zadajesz obrażenia broni, tak jakbyś trafił Ciosem w zwarciu, ale dodajesz do obrażeń swój modyfikator cechy rzucania zaklęć, zamiast modyfikatora Siły. Przy krytycznym sukcesie zadajesz podwójne obrażenia i dodajesz efekt krytycznej specjalizacji broni. Niezależnie od wyniku, broń wraca do ciebie i ląduje w twojej dłoni.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.MsXuzUrCGVuRGWK7]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Dłoń Ucznia}

Harm.name: Krzywdzenie
Harm.description:
Kierujesz energią pustki, krzywdząc żyjących lub lecząc nieumarłych. Jeśli cel jest żyjącą istotą, zadajesz mu 1k8 obrażeń od pustki, przeciw którym podejmuje on podstawowy rzut obronny Krzepy. Jeśli cel jest godzącym się nieumarłym, przywracasz mu podobną liczbę Punktów Żywotności. Liczba akcji poświęconych na Rzucanie tego Zaklęcia określa jego cele, zasięg, obszar oraz inne parametry.

1 Zaklęcie ma zasięg dotyku.

2 (koncentracja) Zaklęcie ma zasięg 30 stóp. Jeśli leczysz nieumarłą istotę, zwiększ liczbę przywracanych Punktów Żywotności o 8.

3 (koncentracja) Rozpraszasz energię pustki na obszarze @Template[emanation|distance:30]{emanacji 30 stóp}. Obejmuje to za cel wszystkie żyjące i nieumarłe istoty w zasięgu.

Wywyższenie (+1) Wartości leczenia i obrażeń zwiększają się o 1k8, a dodatkowe leczenie w wariancie 2-akcyjnym zwiększa się o 8.
Harm.target: 1 żyjąca istota lub 1 godząca się nieumarła istota

Harmonize Self.name: Harmonize Self
Harmonize Self.description:
You heal yourself in one of the following ways, chosen by you when you cast the spell.

  • You regain 8 Hit Points.
  • You attempt to cure one poison or disease afflicting you; attempt to counteract the affliction.

Wywyższenie (+1) If you choose to regain Hit Points, the Hit Points regained increase by 8.

Harrowing.name: Harrowing
Harrowing.cost: rare pigments and inks worth a total value of 20 gp × the target's level
Harrowing.description:
The typical harrow reading does not magically manipulate fate, but when you perform a harrowing ritual to infuse a reading with occult power, you can impart real magical benefits to the target of the reading that give them agency and control over a task or goal in their immediate future. The first 50 minutes of this ritual's casting are spent preparing the target creature for the reading by meditating, concentrating on the task or goal to be focused on, and allowing you to paint or ink occult symbols from the harrow onto the target's body to link them to the upcoming reading. The final 10 minutes of the ritual comprise the reading itself, during which the symbols placed on the target fade away while infusing their fate.

The target of harrowing must describe a set of events or course of action they intend to attempt in the near future — something like "hunting down a specific wanted criminal" or "traveling to Varisia to investigate the Storval Stairs." You can roleplay out the actual harrow reading if you wish, using any spread to perform the reading, but at the ritual's completion, a single potential opportunity for the target to manipulate fate bonds to their destiny, depending on the result of your primary skill check to perform this ritual.

As long as this ritual's duration persists, the creature is temporarily immune to further harrowing rituals.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.LfxwvZRwtrh8mQN0]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Harrowing}

Krytyczny Sukces The target gains agency over fate and chance while in the pursuit of their goal, gaining a "wild card." Randomly determine a harrow suit, either by rolling 1k6 or by drawing a card from a full harrow deck, and then consult the Associated Suit Checks table below. At any point during harrowing's duration, the creature can expend this wild card to immediately reroll any associated check they just made, gaining a +4 status bonus to the reroll. They must use the second result. Once this reroll is taken and the wild card is spent, the harrowing ritual's effects end.

Sukces As critical success, but the wild card does not grant a status bonus to the reroll.

Porażka As success, but the wild card instead grants a –4 status penalty to the reroll.

Krytyczna Porażka The target's destiny is beyond their capability to manipulate. The wild card has no effect, and further harrowing rituals cast on the target for one month automatically result in critical failures.

Wywyższenie (+1) The target gains an additional wild card. Attempt a primary skill check for each additional wild card drawn to determine that card's benefits. The harrowing's duration ends as soon as the target spends all of their wild cards.

SuitAssociated Check
1 — Hammers (Str)Strikes (both melee and ranged)
2 — Keys (Dex)Reflex saving throws
3 — Shields (Con)Fortitude saving throws
4 — Books (Int)Skill checks
5 — Stars (Wis)Will saving throws
6 — Crowns (Cha)All other checks (including flat checks)

Haste.name: Przyspieszenie
Haste.description:
Magia napędza cel, umożliwuając mu szybsze działanie. Cel zyskuje status @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Przyspieszony} i może użyć w każdej rundzie swojej dodatkowej akcji na rzecz Biegu lub Ciosu.

Wywyższenie (7.) Możesz objąć za cel zaklęcia do 6 istot.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.ElkXovNrHB0Doi6O]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Haste}

Hasted Assault.name: Hasted Assault
Hasted Assault.description: You call upon your magic to speed up your attacks. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Przyspieszony} condition and can use the extra action each round for only Strike actions.

Haunting Hymn.name: Przeraźliwy Psalm
Haunting Hymn.description:
Wyczarowujesz dźwięk rażącego psalmu, który słyszą tylko istoty w obszarze. Psalm zadaje 1k8 obrażeń od dźwięku z podstawowym rzutem obronnym Krzepy. Jeśli cel odniesie na rzyucie obronnym krytyczną porażkę, staje się również @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Ogłuchła} na 1 minutę.

Wywyższenie (+2) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k8.

Heal.name: Leczenie
Heal.description:
Kierujesz życiodajną energią, lecząc żyjących lub krzywdząc nieumarłych. Jeśli cel jest godzącą się żyjącą istotą, przywracasz mu 1k8 Punktów Żywotności. Jeśli cel jest nieumarłym, zadajesz mu podobną ilość obrażeń od witalności, przeciw którym podejmuje on podstawowy rzut obronny Krzepy. Liczba akcji poświęconych na Rzucanie tego Zaklęcia jego określa cele, zasięg, obszar oraz inne parametry.

1 Zaklęcie ma zasięg dotyku.

2 (koncentracja) Zaklęcie ma zasięg 30 stóp. Jeśli leczysz żyjącą istotę, zwiększ liczbę przywracanych Punktów Żywotności o 8.

3 (koncentracja) Rozpraszasz energię witalną na obszarze @Template[emanation|distance:30]{emanacji 30 stóp}. Obejmuje to za cel wszystkie żyjące i nieumarłe istoty w zasięgu.

Wywyższenie (+1) Wartości leczenia i obrażeń zwiększają się o 1k8, a dodatkowe leczenie w wariancie 2-akcyjnym zwiększa się o 8.
Heal.target: 1 godząca się żyjąca istota lub 1 nieumarła istota

Heal Animal.name: Heal Animal
Heal Animal.description:
You heal an animal's wounds, restoring 1k8 Hit Points to the target. The number of actions spent Casting this Spell determines its effect.

1 The spell has a range of touch.

2 (koncentracja) The spell has a range of 30 feet and restores an additional 8 Hit Points to the target.

Wywyższenie (+1) The amount of healing increases by 1k8, and the additional healing for the 2-action version increases by 8.

Heal Companion.name: Heal Companion
Heal Companion.description:
You heal your animal companion's wounds. You restore 1k10 Hit Points to your animal companion. The number of actions you spend Casting this Spell determines range and other parameters.

1 (manipulate) The spell has a range of touch.

2 (concentrate, manipulate) The spell has a range of 30 feet and restores an additional 8 Hit Points to the target.

Wywyższenie (+1) The amount of healing increases by 1k10, and the additional healing for the 2-action version increases by 8.

Healer's Blessing.name: Healer's Blessing
Healer's Blessing.description:
Your words bless a creature with an enhanced connection to vital energy. When the target regains Hit Points from a healing vitality spell, it regains 2 additional Hit Points.

The target regains additional Hit Points from healer's blessing only the first time it regains HP from a given healing spell, so a spell that heals the creature repeatedly over a duration would restore additional Hit Points only once, when they are first healed.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.IjoYgBgEYSTZKmab]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Healer's Blessing}

Wywyższenie (+1) The additional healing increases by 2 HP.

Healing Plaster.name: Lecznicza Glinka
Healing Plaster.description:
Oczyszczasz odrobinę ziemi lub błota tworząc plastyczną glinkę, która wspomaga krzepnięcie i gojenie ran. Ta lecznicza substancja może być substytutem dla zestawu uzdrowiciela podczas testów Medycyny na rzecz Udzielania Pierwszej Pomocy lub Opatrywania Ran. Jeśli glinka nie zostanie spożytkowana w czasie działania zaklęcia, lub jeśli Rzucisz to Zaklęcie ponownie przed jej wykorzystaniem, powraca ona do bycia normalną niemagiczną ziemią.

Wywyższenie (3.) Glinka zapewnia osobie wykorzystującej ją do Udzielania Pierwszej Pomocy lub Opatrywania Ran premię przedmiotu +1 do testu Medycyny.

Healing Well.name: Healing Well
Healing Well.description:
You call forth a well of healing that you and your allies can draw from later. The well appears as a disc of shimmering light on the ground in a square within range. At any time during the duration, if you or an ally are adjacent to the well, that character can Interact to tap into the well's power, recovering 4k8 Hit Points. When the well has been tapped five times, the spell ends. The well is made of insubstantial energy, allowing creatures to move through it and even end their turn in its space.

If you use an ability that increases the amount of healing this spell grants, that increase applies only to the first time someone taps the well.

Wywyższenie (+1) The healing increases by 3.

Heart's Desire.name: Heart's Desire
Heart's Desire.description:
You surround your target with wondrous illusions of their greatest desires, which distract them from reality. The target must attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces The target disbelieves the illusion and is unaffected.

Sukces For 1 round, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 2} and takes a –2 status penalty to any checks it makes to determine the effects of reactions.

Porażka For 1 minute, the target is stupefied 2 and can't use reactions.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, and all spaces are difficult terrain for the target.

Wywyższenie (+2) You can target one additional creature.

Heart's Hook.name: Heart's Hook
Heart's Hook.description:
You drive two creatures toward a fated meeting. Each will be compelled toward the other, but you can elect to have one automatically succeed on its saving throw.

Sukces The creature is unaffected.

Porażka The creature must spend the first action on its next turn to approach its partner. It can't Delay or take any reactions until it has obeyed this urge.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the target must use all its actions on its next turn.

Heartbond.name: Heartbond
Heartbond.cost: sacramental beverages and a set of matching rings or other tokens worth 20 gp per secondary caster
Heartbond.description:
You officiate the creation of a magical bond between two or more willing creatures, who are secondary casters of the ritual and must share genuine affection for one another. As part of the ritual, all members of the bond receive a ring, amulet, or similar token to symbolize their shared connection. They lose the effects of the ritual when not wearing the token, and the bond is broken if either token is destroyed.

Creatures benefiting from a successful heartbond ritual can later participate in a heightened version of the ritual without requiring new checks by spending the required time and paying the difference of the two costs. A creature can be under the effects of multiple heartbond rituals at once.

Krytyczny Sukces Once per day, each bonded creature can use a 2-action activity, which has the concentrate trait, to learn the present state of one other bonded creature. The creature knows the other creature's direction and distance and any conditions affecting them. Each participant can cast message as a divine innate spell at will, but can target only another participant.

Sukces As a critical success, except the bonded creatures can't cast message as a divine innate spell.

Porażka The ritual has no effect.

Krytyczna Porażka Magical backlash creates discordant energy among the participants. For 1 week, each secondary caster is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 2} whenever they are within 30 feet of another secondary caster.

Wywyższenie (6.) The cost increases to 300 gp per secondary caster. On a success, secondary casters permanently gain the effects of a 6. kręgu telepathy spell, but only with each other

Heat Metal.name: Heat Metal
Heat Metal.description:
This spell heats the targeted metal to become red-hot for a moment. This is usually harmless to an unattended metal item, which doesn't get a saving throw, though the GM might rule that flammable materials connected to the object catch fire or melt. If you target an item worn or carried by a creature, or you target a creature made primarily of metal, the heat deals @Damage[4d6[fire]] damage and @Damage[2d4[persistent,fire]] damage to the creature, which must attempt a Reflex saving throw.

If you target an item held by the creature, the creature can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.wQYmDStjdjn0I26t]{Release} the item to improve their degree of success by one step from the result of their saving throw. The persistent damage is associated with the object and damages whichever creature is holding or wearing it.
