It has no effect if no one is holding the item, but you continue to attempt flat checks to end the persistent damage as normal, since the item remains hot and can sear someone who picks it up.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature takes half damage and the object deals no persistent fire damage.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia and the object deals full persistent damage.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the creature takes double damage and the object deals double persistent damage.

Wywyższenie (+1) Wstępne obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6 and the persistent damage increases by 1k4.

Heatvision.name: Heatvision
Heatvision.description:
The target visually senses the heat energy emitted by the creatures and objects around it, gaining infrared vision at a range of 60 feet as a precise sense. This vision can detect any warm-blooded creature or source of heat not completely covered behind a solid object, such as a wall; this bypasses any concealment granted by smoke or darkness. It can similarly detect especially cold creatures and sources of cold. Almost all creatures with the cold or fire trait can be detected with heatvision. Undead and constructs are typically the same temperature as their environment and can't be detected with heatvision. The GM decides in other cases.

Wywyższenie (6.) The duration lasts until you next make your daily preparations, and the range increases to 120 feet.

Heaving Earth.name: Heaving Earth
Heaving Earth.description:
You strike the ground, and unleash a wave that travels through the struck surface to the target. The effect ends as soon as it can't travel through a solid surface, such as a stone floor. Each creature in a line between you and the target is shaken by tremors and must attempt a Reflex saving throw against your spell DC. A creature that fails this save is pushed 10 feet away from you.

The wave explodes once it reaches the target, showering the target with earth and stone and dealing @Damage[12d10[bludgeoning]] damage with a basic Reflex save. A target that fails its save against this explosion is also pushed back 10 feet and knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}. A creature subject to the explosion doesn't need to save against the tremors.

Wywyższenie (9.) The wave explodes on one additional target of your choice in the line to the final target.
Heaving Earth.target: 1 creature or object on the ground

Hedge Prison.name: Hedge Prison
Hedge Prison.description:
You conjure an intricate hedge prison to trap a creature, encasing them completely in a hollow cube of dense bushes. The hedge has AC 5, Hardness 5, and 20 Hit Points. It's immune to critical hits and precision damage.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature escapes the hedge before it fully forms.

Sukces The creature is trapped inside the hedge, but the hedge's Hit Points are reduced by half.

Porażka The creature is trapped inside the hedge.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is trapped inside the hedge, and the hedge's Hit Points are increased by half.

Wywyższenie (4.) The hedge's hardness increases to 7 and its Hit Points increase to 30.

Wywyższenie (5.) The hedge's hardness increases to 9 and its Hit Points increase to 40. You can target a creature of Large size or smaller.

Wywyższenie (6.) The hedge's hardness increases to 11 and its Hit Points increase to 50. You can target a creature of Large size or smaller.

Wywyższenie (7.) The hedge's hardness increases to 13 and its Hit Points increase to 60. You can target a creature of Huge size or smaller.

Wywyższenie (8.) The hedge's hardness increases to 15 and its Hit Points increase to 70. You can target a creature of Huge size or smaller.

Wywyższenie (9.) The hedge's hardness increases to 17 and its Hit Points increase to 80. You can target a creature of Huge size or smaller.

Heinous Future.name: Heinous Future
Heinous Future.description:
You hold up a fractured mirror to the target, and in that mirror it sees a thing that may yet come to pass — a ghastly foretelling that the target instinctively knows is eerily possible. It's not a guaranteed thing, just a dreadful possibility, but it haunts the target's thoughts all the same.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 1} for 1 round.

Porażka The target is slowed 1 and stupefied 1 until it next gets eight hours of rest.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 2}, decreasing these conditions by 1 for each eight hours of rest it gets.

Hellfire Plume.name: Hellfire Plume
Hellfire Plume.description:
You call forth a plume of hellfire that erupts from below, dealing 4k6 fire damage and 4k6 spirit damage.

Wywyższenie (+1) The fire and spirit damage each increase by 1k6.

Helpful Steps.name: Pomocne Stopnie
Helpful Steps.description:
Wyczarowujesz drabinę lub schody pomagające ci wspiąć się na nowe wysokości. Drabina lub schody pojawiają się w określonej przez ciebie przestrzeni i albo stoją swobodnie albo są zespolone z pobliską ścianą jeśli to możliwe. Określasz wysokość drabiny lub schodów w momencie rzucania zaklęcia, aż do maksymalnej wysokości 40 stóp. Drabina lub schody są unieruchomione magicznymi podporami i przytwierdzone do określonego miejsca w przestrzeni co pozwala ci się po nich wspinać nawet jeśli znajdują się w skądinąd pustej przestrzeni. Przyzwana drabina jest prosta w wykonaniu i zrobiona z drewna. Schody pojawiają się w postaci spiralnej klatki schodowej wykonanej z drewna. Chociaż obie formy zaklęcia są magicznie ustabilizowane i nie ma ryzyka, że się przewrócą, nadal mogą odnosić obrażenia i zostać w konwencjonalny sposób zniszczone. Klatka schodowa na ogół jest łatwiejszym sposobem wspięcia się ale jest mniej dyskretna niż drabina i może przyciągać uwagę. Możesz Odwołać to zaklęcie.

Wywyższenie (+1) Maksymalna wysokość zwiększa się o 40 stóp.

Helpful Wood Spirits.name: Helpful Wood Spirits
Helpful Wood Spirits.description:
Upon casting this spell, a cluster of little wood spirits tumbles into the area. They perform a simple task each round. These spirits are a magical echo of the true spirits that live on the Plane of Wood and can't be attacked, damaged, or otherwise interfered with. These spirits often look like kodama but can appear in any of the countless varieties of wood spirits that inhabit the Plane of Wood.

Choose the kind of aid your wood spirits supply from the list below when you Cast the Spell. The first time each round you Sustain the spell, you can move the area occupied by the apparitions up to 10 feet and you can choose the kind of aid they provide this round.

  • Chores The wood spirits perform a minor manual task of your choice, such as cleaning, opening a door, picking up an unattended object, or carrying an object from one location to another. The spirits can't pick up or carry an object of greater than 2 Bulk.
  • Distract The wood spirits distract your foes, clambering all over their feet and bodies and being a nuisance. Creatures in the area are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda} unless they succeed at a Reflex save.
  • Obstacle The wood spirits fill the area as a chaotic, bouncing mass. The area they occupy is difficult terrain.
  • Search The wood spirits @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Szukanie} in the area they occupy, using your Perception check as their own. You learn anything they do from Seeking in this way.

Hero's Defiance.name: Hero's Defiance
Hero's Defiance.description:
Aktywator An attack would bring you to 0 Hit Points.

You shout in defiance and are filled with a burst of healing. Just before applying the attack's damage, you recover 6k8+20 Hit Points. If this is enough to prevent the attack from bringing you to 0 Hit Points, you don't become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Nieprzytomny} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Umierający}. Either way, cheating death is difficult, and you can't use hero's defiance again until you Refocus or make your daily preparations. Hero's defiance can't be used against effects with the death trait or that would leave no remains, such as disintegrate.

Heroic Feat.name: Heroic Feat
Heroic Feat.description:
You gain the ability to perform a specialized combat technique from the vast wealth of martial knowledge your mystery provides.

When you Cast this Spell, you use the action granted by one common fighter feat. If you Cast this Spell using 2 actions, the granted action must be a single action, and if you Cast this Spell using 3 actions, you can instead choose a feat that grants a 2-action activity.

The chosen feat's level can be no higher than heroic feat's spell rank. The feat can't have a Frequency entry, and you must meet its prerequisites and requirements in order to select it.

Heroism.name: Heroism
Heroism.description:
You unlock the target's inner heroism, granting it a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, Perception checks, saving throws, and skill checks.

Wywyższenie (6.) Premia statusowa zwiększa się do +2.

Wywyższenie (9.) Premia statusowa zwiększa się do +3.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.l9HRQggofFGIxEse]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Heroism}

Hidden Mind.name: Hidden Mind
Hidden Mind.description:
Powerful wards hide a creature from magic that would spy on it or affect its mind. The target gains a +4 status bonus to saves against mental effects. Hidden mind attempts to counteract any detection, revelation, and scrying effects as if its spell rank were 1 higher than its actual rank. On a success, the effect functions normally except that it detects nothing about the target and its possessions. For instance, detect magic would still detect other magic in the area, but not any magic on the target.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.DBaMtFHRPEg1JeLs]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Hidden Mind}

Hidebound.name: Hidebound
Hidebound.description:
Aktywator A creature within range is hit with a Strike that deals physical damage.

The target's skin erupts in thick hide or dense scales. It gains resistance 5 to physical damage, except adamantine, until the beginning of its next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.70tKwsgD8aOj9SxG]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Hidebound}

Wywyższenie (+2) The resistance increases by 3.
Hidebound.requirements: A creature within range is hit with a Strike that deals physical damage.

Hippocampus Retreat.name: Hippocampus Retreat
Hippocampus Retreat.description:
Wymagania You're mostly or totally submerged in water.

You temporarily shape your lower limbs into the tail of a hippocampus in order to swim away from a nearby foe after dealing a parting blow. Attempt a melee spell attack roll against the target's AC, dealing 2k6 bludgeoning damage on a hit (or double damage on a critical hit). Then, Swim up to 30 feet; if you already have a swim Speed, you can Swim up to your Speed with a +10-foot circumstance bonus. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your AC against reactions triggered by this movement. At the end of the movement, your lower limbs return to normal.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.85S2TWoiPwtFsDT3]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Hippocampus Retreat}

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k6.
Hippocampus Retreat.requirements: You're mostly or totally submerged in water.

Hollow Heart.name: Hollow Heart
Hollow Heart.description:
You stoke the target's ambition beyond reason, until it believes no one is capable of helping it, or that others aren't to be trusted. The target attempts a Will saving throw.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target treats no other creature as an ally for 1 round.

Porażka The target treats no other creature as an ally for 3 rounds.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, and the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1} as it realizes it can't rely on anyone but itself.

Hologram Cage.name: Hologram Cage
Hologram Cage.description:
Area 1 cube 20 feet on each side

You weave light into a cube of vivid and fantastic patterns. The walls shed bright light for 10 feet (and dim light for the next 20 feet) and completely block line of sight; creatures within the cage can't be seen by creatures outside of it, though they can see each other, and creatures outside of it can't see into it. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} the spell, and if you Cast the Spell again, your previous hologram cage ends.

Wywyższenie (7.) The range of the spell increases to 80 feet, and you can expand the cube to be 25 feet on each side.

Holy Cascade.name: Holy Cascade
Holy Cascade.description:
You call upon sacred energy to amplify a vial of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.z9T4c1hXwOotsMCp]{Holy Water}, tossing it an incredible distance. It explodes in an enormous burst that deals 3k6 bludgeoning damage to creatures in the area from the cascade of water. The water deals an additional @Damage[((@item.level*2)-2)d6[spirit]] damage to creatures with the unholy trait in the area.

Wywyższenie (+1) The bludgeoning damage increases by 1k6, and the additional spirit damage increases by 2k6.

Holy Light.name: Święte Światło
Holy Light.description:
Wystrzeliwujesz jaśniejący promień światła nasycony świętą energią. Wykonaj dystansowy atak zaklęciem. Promień zadaje 5k6 obrażeń od ognia. Jeśli cel ma cechę wyklętości, zadajesz dodatkowe 5k6 obrażeń duchowych.

Krytyczny Sukces Cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia.

Sukces Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia.

Jeśli promień przecina obszar magicznej ciemności lub obiera za cel istotę będącą pod wpływem magicznej ciemności, święte światło próbuje przeciwdziałać ciemności. Jeśli musisz określić, czy promień przechodzi przez obszar ciemności, nakreśl linię między sobą a celem zaklęcia.

Wywyższenie (+1) Zarówno obrażenia od ognia, co obrażenia duchowe przeciwko wyklętym istotom zwiększają się o 2k6.

Home Among Mulberry Leaves.name: Home Among Mulberry Leaves
Home Among Mulberry Leaves.description:
Wymagania You're wielding qi-infused fabric.

Qi-formed threads unravel from your fabric on conjured needles as your attack makes contact with an enemy and wraps it in place like an insect in its cocoon. Make a melee Strike with your qi-infused fabric. On a success, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony} until the start of your next turn, though it can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} against your spell DC. On a critical success, your needles anchor in the target's nerve centers after the threads bind it, making it your choice of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 1} until the start of your next turn, in addition to immobilizing it.

Honeyed Words.name: Słodkie Słówka
Honeyed Words.description: Kłamstwa przechodzą przez twoje usta z niebywałą łatwością. Zyskujesz premię statusową +4 do testów Oszukiwania na rzecz Kłamania oraz przeciw testom Percepcji na rzecz określenia, czy mówisz prawdę, oraz dodajesz do nich swój poziom, nawet jeśli jesteś niewyszkolony w Oszukiwaniu. Jeśli nieprawdopodobność twoich kłamstw spowoduje dodanie kary sytuacyjnej do testu lub zwiększenie ST, zmniejsz tę karę lub wzrost ST o połowę.

Horizon Thunder Sphere.name: Sfera Grzmotliwego Horyzontu
Horizon Thunder Sphere.description:
Zbierasz w swojej dłoni magiczną energię, formując w niej kłąb skoncentrowanej elektryczności, która strzela wokół błyskawicami i grzmi niczym odległy grom. Wykonaj dystansowy atak zaklęciem przeciwko KP celu. Przy sukcesie zadajesz 3k6 obrażeń od elektryczności. Przy krytycznym sukcesie cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia oraz jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} na 1 rundę. Liczba akcji poświęconych na rzucanie tego zaklęcia określa jego zasięg oraz inne parametry.

2 Zaklęcie ma zasięg 30 stóp.

3 Zaklęcie ma zasięg 60 stóp i zadaje połowę obrażeń przy porażce (ale nie krytycznej porażce), gdy elektryczność rozpryskuje się w okolicy, porażając cel.

Dwie Rundy Jeśli poświęcisz 3 akcje na Rzucanie Zaklęcia, możesz zdecydować się nie kończyć jego rzucania i poświęcić kolejne 3 akcje w swojej następej turze aby wzmocnić je jeszcze bardziej. Jeśli to zrobisz, po zaatakowaniu celu, niezależnie od tego czy trafisz czy nie, sfera elektryczności eksploduje zadająć obrażenia @Damage[(@item.rank*2)d6[electricity]] wszystkim innym istotom w @Template[emanation|distance:10] wokół celu (podstawowy rzut obronny Refleksu). Ponadto przez 1 minutę skrzysz się elektrycznością, zadając obrażenia @Damage[(@item.rank)[electricity]] istotom, które cię Pochwycą lub trafią atakiem wręcz albo atakiem bronią białą bez cechy wysięg.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia pierwotnego trafienia oraz obrażenia wybuchu przy czasie rzucania dwóch tur zwiększają się o 2k6 a obrażenia odnoszone przez istoty, które cię Pochwycą lub trafią gdy skrzysz się elektrycznością zwiększają się o 1.

Horrific Visage.name: Horrific Visage
Horrific Visage.description:
You briefly transform your features into the horrific visage of a hag, striking fear into your enemies. Foes in the area must attempt a Will save.

Sukces The foe is unaffected.

Porażka The foe is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1}.

Krytyczna Porażka The foe is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2}.

Wywyższenie (5.) Foes in the area are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1} on a success, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2} on a failure, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 3} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Uciekający} for 1 round on a critical failure. They are still unaffected on a critical success.

Horrifying Blood Loss.name: Horrifying Blood Loss
Horrifying Blood Loss.description:
You curse the target, filling it with terror at the loss of its blood. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1}.

Porażka The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2}. Until it stops bleeding, its frightened value can't decrease below frightened 1.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 3}.

Wywyższenie (4.) You even terrify witnesses with the copious quantities of blood. You can target up to four creatures as secondary targets. These secondary targets don't need to be bleeding but must be able to see the primary target. Secondary targets must also attempt Will saves, with the same results, except their restriction on decreasing their frightened value depends on whether the primary target is still bleeding.

House of Imaginary Walls.name: House of Imaginary Walls
House of Imaginary Walls.description: You mime an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialny} 10-foot-by-10-foot wall adjacent to you and within your reach. The wall is solid to those creatures that don't disbelieve it, even incorporeal creatures. You and your allies can voluntarily believe the wall exists to continue to treat it as solid, for instance to climb onto it. A creature that disbelieves the illusion is temporarily immune to your house of imaginary walls for 1 minute. The wall doesn't block creatures that didn't see your visual performance, nor does it block objects. The wall has AC 10, Hardness equal to double the spell's rank, and HP equal to quadruple the spell's rank.

Howling Blizzard.name: Howling Blizzard
Howling Blizzard.description:
Freezing winds extend from your hands, pushing away from you with great force. If you Cast this Spell with 2 actions, it has an area of a 60-foot cone; if you Cast this Spell with 3 actions, it has a range of 500 feet and an area of a 30-foot burst. Each creature in the area takes 10k6 cold damage with a basic Reflex save. Snowdrifts and icy gales fill the area until the start of your next turn, making the area difficult terrain.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6.

Humanoid Form.name: Postać Humanoida
Humanoid Form.description:
Zmieniasz swój wygląd, przybierając postać Małego lub Średniego humanoida, takiego jak krasnolud, elf, goblin, niziołek, człowiek czy ork. W dodatku do innych swoich cech zyskujesz w tej postaci cechę humanoid, a także wszelkie cechy związane z rodzajem istoty (takie jak goblin lub człowiek). Jeśli ta transformacja zmniejsza twój rozmiar, odpowiednio zmniejsza twój wysięg (zazwyczaj do 5 stóp). Ta transformacja w żaden sposób nie zmienia twoich statystyk i nie zyskujesz żadnych specjalnych zdolności przybranej postaci humanoida. Nadal możesz nosić i używać swojego wyposażenia, które, jeśli to konieczne, zmienia rozmiar, aby dopasować się do twojej nowej postaci. Jeśli przedmioty wyjdą z twojego posiadania, wracają do swojego zwykłego rozmiaru.

Postać humanoida zapewnia ci premię statusową +4 do testów Oszustwa, aby podawać się za typowego przedstawiciela wybranego przodkostwa, i dodajesz do nich swój poziom, nawet jeśli jesteś w nim niewyszkolony, ale nie możesz nadać sobie wyglądu określonej osoby. Jeśli chcesz @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Podszyć Się} pod konkretną osobę, nadal musisz stworzyć przebranie, chociaż MG nie będzie brał pod uwagę różnicy w przodkostwie przy określaniu ST twojego testu Oszustwa. Możesz Odwołać to zaklęcie.

Wywyższenie (3.) Zyskujesz widzenie w ciemności lub widzenie w słabym świetle, jeśli postać, którą przybierasz, posiada tę zdolność.

Wywyższenie (5.) Możesz przybrać wygląd Dużego humanoida. Jeśli zwiększa to twój rozmiar, zyskujesz efekty zaklęcia @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Powiększenie}.

Hungry Depths.name: Hungry Depths
Hungry Depths.description:
A spiral of dark, corrupted water appears in the ground, plunging open a door to the depths that seems to descend for miles. Disembodied glowing eyes and gnashing teeth spin within the vortex, consuming anything that crosses their path.

All creatures in the area take 4k8 piercing damage plus 4k4 void damage (podstawowy rzut obronny Refleksu). Each time you Sustain the spell, you can increase the vortex's radius by 5 feet, to a maximum of 15 feet, or you can move the vortex up to 10 feet in a straight line. Each creature the vortex moves through takes the damage with a basic Reflex save. A creature can take damage from hungry depths only once per round.

If cast underwater, hungry depths instead fills a 40-foot-tall cylinder with a 5-foot radius.

Wywyższenie (9.) The vortex deals 5k8 piercing damage and 5k4 void damage.

Hunter's Luck.name: Hunter's Luck
Hunter's Luck.description:
Aktywator You attempt a check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Pozyskanie Wiedzy} about a creature, but you haven't rolled yet.

You have a preternatural ability to remember details about your foes. Roll the triggering check twice and use the better result.

Hunter's Vision.name: Hunter's Vision
Hunter's Vision.description: Your target glows with a magical aura visible only to you and those who follow your lead. Your target is visible to you and others sharing your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.0nIOGpHQNHsKSFKT]{Hunt Prey} benefits even if it wouldn't normally be due to lighting or the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialny} conditions, though cover from opaque objects still blocks your sight. You ignore the flat check against the target due to the Concealed condition, and the target isn't automatically @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Schowany} from you due to darkness or being Invisible.

Hurtling Stone.name: Hurtling Stone
Hurtling Stone.description:
You evoke a magical stone and throw it, with divine guide to your aim. The stone deals 2k6 bludgeoning damage depending on your spell attack roll against the target's AC.

Krytyczny Sukces Cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia and you can push it up to 10 feet.

Sukces Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia and you can push it up to 5 feet.

Wywyższenie (+1) The stone's damage increases by 1k6.

Hydraulic Push.name: Hydrauliczne Pchnięcie
Hydraulic Push.description:
Przywołujesz potężne uderzenie wody pod ciśnieniem która obija cel i odrzuca go. Wykonaj rzut na dystansowy atak zaklęciem.

Krytyczny Sukces Cel odnosi 6k6 obrażeń obuchowych i jest odrzucany od 10 stóp.

Sukces Cel odnosi 3k6 obrażeń obuchowych i jest odrzucany od 5 stóp.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia obuchowe zwiększają się o 2k6.

Hydraulic Torrent.name: Hydraulic Torrent
Hydraulic Torrent.description:
A swirling torrent of water manifests along a straight line, battering creatures and unattended objects in its path and possibly pushing them away from you. The torrent deals 8k6 bludgeoning damage. Each creature in the area must attempt a basic Fortitude save; unattended objects automatically fail. Creatures and objects that fail are also knocked back 5 feet (10 feet on a critical failure).

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6.

Hymn of Healing.name: Hymn of Healing
Hymn of Healing.description:
Your glorious singing mends wounds and provides a temporary respite from harm. The target gains fast healing 2. When you Cast the Spell and the first time each round you Sustain the Spell, the target gains 2 temporary Hit Points, which last for 1 round.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.C1GAlZ6Gmmw0QIJN]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Hymn of Healing}

Wywyższenie (+1) The fast healing and temporary Hit Points each increase by 2.

Hypercognition.name: Hiperkognicja
Hypercognition.description: Szybko katalogujesz i analizujesz informacje istotne dla twojej obecnej sytuacji. W w ramach procesu Rzucania tego Zaklęcia możesz natychmiast użyć do 6 akcji Pozyskania Wiedzy. W wypadku tych akcji nie możesz używać żadnych specjalnych zdolności, reakcji ani darmowych akcji, które aktywują się podczas Pozyskiwania Wiedzy.

Hypnopompic Terrors.name: Hypnopompic Terrors
Hypnopompic Terrors.description:
You send a wave of nightmarish visions crashing over your targets, leaving them paralyzed by fear. These visions inflict real wounds on vulnerable targets, dealing 6k12 mental damage. If you target a sleeping creature, it wakes up as it attempts the save but takes one degree of success worse than the result it rolled on its save.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected.

Sukces The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2} and takes half the mental damage.

Porażka The target is frightened 2, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Sparaliżowany} for 1 round, and takes the full mental damage.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is frightened 2, is paralyzed for 2 rounds, and takes double the mental damage.

Hypnotize.name: Hipnotyzacja
Hypnotize.description:
Tworzysz unoszącą się w powietrzu chmurę zachwycających wzorów i kolorów. Istoty są @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczone} przebywając w chmurze. Ponadto istoty muszą wykonać rzut obronny Woli jeśli przebywały w chmurze w momencie kiedy ją Rzuciłeś, kiedy wkroczą do chmury, kiedy skończą swoją turę w chmurze lub jeśli użyją akcji @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Szukania} lub Interakcji na chmurze. Istota @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Zafascynowana} w danym momencie przez hipnotyzację nie wykonuje nowych rzutów obronnych.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Porażka Cel jest zafascynowany przez chmurę.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel jest zafascynowany przez chmurę. Tak długo jak pozostaje zafascynowany, nie może używać reakcji.

Ibex's Harvest.name: Ibex's Harvest
Ibex's Harvest.description:
In the tale "Ibex's Harvest," Ibex turns from the path of a warrior to the path of a farmer, building up their community by working hard and sharing a bountiful harvest not just with their humanoid neighbors but also with their animal neighbors. Ibex initially focuses on distributing equally among the animals but learns that true equality requires knowing what each being needs. The number of actions you spend when Casting this Spell and telling the story determine its targets and effects.

1 You give a brief description of Ibex's first bounty. One willing target you can touch gains 10 temporary Hit Points that last 1 minute.

2 You tell the tale of how Ibex shared their harvest equally between Hippo and Ant. Two willing targets within 20 feet each gain 10 temporary Hit Points that last 1 minute.

3 You impart Ibex's lesson about how to prevent others from taking advantage of generosity. All creatures within a 10-foot emanation are affected by the tale. Choose one creature in the emanation to take 2k8 mental (basic Will save), while each other creature in the emanation gains 5 temporary Hit Points that last 1 minute.

Wywyższenie (+1) The temporary Hit Points increase by 3 and the mental damage for the 3-action version increases by 1k8.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.VYr6IyfCWUMcYLJH]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Ibex's Harvests}

Ice Storm.name: Ice Storm
Ice Storm.description:
You create a gray storm cloud that pelts creatures with an icy deluge. When you Cast the Spell, a burst of magical hail deals 2k8 bludgeoning damage and 2k8 cold damage to each creature in the area below the cloud (basic Reflex save). Snow and sleet continue to rain down in the area for the remainder of the spell's duration, making the area difficult terrain. Any creature that ends its turn in the storm takes @Damage[(floor(@item.level/2))[cold]] damage. If you Cast this Spell outdoors, you can create two nonoverlapping clouds instead of one. As normal, if a Large or larger creature is in both clouds, it still only takes the initial damage once and the continuing damage once per turn.

Wywyższenie (+2) The initial bludgeoning damage and cold damage increase by 1k8 each, and the cold damage creatures take at the end of their turns increases by 1.

Ideal Mimicry.name: Ideal Mimicry
Ideal Mimicry.cost: crafting materials worth at least 50 gp × the target's level; a lock of hair from the target, nail clippings from the target, or a vial of blood from the target;
Ideal Mimicry.description:
You craft a doll with care and quiet meditation on the target, inserting the fingernails into the body, tying the lock of hair around the neck of the doll, or emptying the vial of blood into the stuffing and allowing it to be absorbed. You then stuff the doll and form it to mimic the shape of the target, creating clothing and accessories for the doll that are similar to commonly worn items. You must have been within 5 feet of the target at least once and gotten a good look at them to perform this ritual. You can cast the ritual and create the doll at any range from the target.

Once the doll is complete, you can Interact with the doll violently once per round to cause pain to the target as long as they're within 200 feet. This pain manifests as mental damage inflicted on the target, and it depends on how many of the three body part components (hair, nails, or blood) you included in the creation of the doll. After the first time you manipulate the doll, you can continue to do so until either the target moves beyond 200 feet or until you Interact with the doll to cause pain 10 times, whichever comes first. After either of those conditions is met, the doll falls apart into stuffing and dust.

Krytyczny Sukces The doll becomes connected to the target. Each Interact action causes 3k6 mental damage to the target for each of the three body part components (maximum 9k6 for all three components). The connection is more powerful than normal, increasing the number of times you can Interact to cause pain from 10 to 20.

Sukces As critical success, except you can only Interact the normal 10 times.

Porażka The doll is just an ordinary doll.

Krytyczna Porażka Any Interact actions you take to cause pain to target instead cause 9k6 damage to the casters. The target is alerted to the attempt nonetheless, through a feeling of the connection being subverted.

Wywyższenie (+2) Increase the damage to the target by 1k6 per body part component, and the damage to the casters on a critical failure by 3k6.

Ignite Ambition.name: Ignite Ambition
Ignite Ambition.description:
Aktywator You or an ally in range attempt to use a mental effect to convince a creature to do something (such as a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.tHCqgwjtQtzNqVvd]{Wymuszenie}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]{Prośba}, or a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.qwlh6aDgi86U3Q7H]{Sugestia} spell).

You strengthen a target's ambition, increase its resentment of allies, and make its allegiances more susceptible to change. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected and realized you attempted to influence its reaction with magic.

Sukces The target takes a –1 status penalty to its defenses against the triggering effect. This penalty is –2 if the target is being encouraged to advance its own ambitions.The target doesn't realize you Cast the Spell on it.

Porażka As success, but the penalty is –4 if the target is being encouraged to advance its own ambitions.

Krytyczna Porażka As success, but the creature automatically follows a suggestion that advances its own ambitions.

Ignite Fireworks.name: Ignite Fireworks
Ignite Fireworks.description:
A brilliant and clamorous display of sparks and colorful fireworks explode around your enemies, dealing 1k8 fire damage and 1k8 sonic damage to creatures within a 10-foot burst. All creatures in the area must attempt a Reflex save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature takes half damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} for 1 round.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia and is dazzled for 3 rounds.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota odnosi podwójne obrażenia, takes @Damage[1d4[persistent,fire]] damage, and is dazzled for 1 minute.

Wywyższenie (+2) The initial fire damage increases by 1k8, the sonic damage increases by 1k8, and the persistent fire damage a creature takes on a critical failure increases by 1k4.

Ignition.name: Zapłon
Ignition.description:
Pstrykasz palcami i wskazujesz na cel, który zaczyna się tlić. Wykonaj rzut ataku zaklęciem przeciw KP celu, zadając 2k4 obrażeń od ognia przy trafieniu. Jeśli cel jest w twoim wysięgu walki w zwariu, możesz zamiast tego wybrać, że wykonujesz płomieniem atak zaklęciem w zwarciu, co zwiększa rozmiar wszystkich kości obrażeń zaklęcia do k6.

Krytyczny Sukces Cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia oraz 1k4 przewlekłych obrażeń od ognia.

Sukces Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia.

Wywyższenie (+1) Wstępne obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k4 oraz przewlekłe obrażenia od ognia przy trafieniu krytycznym zwiększają się o 1k4.

@Damage[(@item.rank)d4[persistent,fire]]{Przeskalowane Przewlekłe Obrażenia od Ognia}

@Damage[(@item.rank)d6[persistent,fire]]{Przeskalowane Przewlekłe Obrażenia od Ognia (W zwarciu)}

Ill Omen.name: Ill Omen
Ill Omen.description:
The target is struck with misfortune, which throws it off balance. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Porażka The first time during the duration that the target attempts an attack roll or skill check, it must roll twice and use the worse result.

Krytyczna Porażka Every time during the duration that the target attempts an attack roll or skill check, it must roll twice and use the worse result.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.AmsVO5Q6078mEvNt]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Ill Omen}

Illuminate.name: Rozświetlenie
Illuminate.description:
Zapalasz wszelkie niemagiczne źródła światła w obszarze, wykorzystujące ogień jako źródło światła — takie jak świece, lampy i kinkiety. Możesz zmienić rozmiar emanacji na dowolny wybrany, mniejszy od jego maksimum. Jeśli dane źródło światła jest doglądane przez niegodzącą się istotę, może ona wykonać rzut obronny Refleksu celem szybkiego zgaszenia światła, zanim stanie się ono zauważalne.

Wywyższenie (+1) Maksymalny obszar zwiększa się o 10 stóp.

Illusory Creature.name: Illusory Creature
Illusory Creature.description:
You create an illusory image of a Large or smaller creature. It generates the appropriate sounds, smells, and feels believable to the touch. If you and the image are ever farther than 500 feet apart, the spell ends.

The image can't speak, but you can use your actions to speak through the creature, with the spell disguising your voice as appropriate. You might need to attempt a Deception or Performance check to mimic the creature, as determined by the GM. This is especially likely if you're trying to imitate a specific person and engage with someone that person knows.

In combat, the illusion can use 2 actions per turn, which it uses when you Sustain the spell. It uses your spell attack modifier for attack rolls and your spell DC for its AC. Its saving throw modifiers are equal to your spell DC – 10. It is substantial enough that it can flank other creatures. If the image is hit by an attack or fails a save, the spell ends.

The illusion can cause damage by making the target believe the illusion's attacks are real, but it cannot otherwise directly affect the physical world. If the illusory creature hits with a Strike, the target takes @Damage[3d4[mental]] damage. The illusion's Strikes are nonlethal. If the damage doesn't correspond to the image of the monster — for example, if an illusory Large dragon deals only 5 damage — the GM might allow the target to attempt an immediate Perception check to disbelieve the spell. Any relevant resistances and weaknesses apply if the target thinks they do, as judged by the GM. For example, if the illusion wields a warhammer and attacks a creature resistant to bludgeoning damage, the creature would take less mental damage. However, illusory damage does not deactivate regeneration or trigger other effects that require a certain damage type. The GM should track illusory damage dealt by the illusion.

Any creature that touches the image or uses the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Szukanie} action to examine it can attempt to disbelieve your illusion. When a creature disbelieves the illusion, it recovers from half the damage it had taken from it (if any) and doesn't take any further damage from it.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage of the image's Strikes increases by 1k4, and the maximum size of creature you can create increases by one (to a maximum of Gargantuan).

Illusory Disguise.name: Iluzoryczne Przebranie
Illusory Disguise.description:
Tworzysz iluzję, która sprawia że cel jawi się jako inna istota o tej samej formie ciała i o względnie podobnym wzroście (w granicy 15cm) i wadze (w granicy 25kg). Przebranie jest na ogół na tyle dobre aby ukryć tożsamość celu, ale nie na tyle aby podszyć się pod konkretną osobę. Zaklęcie zmienia wygląd i głos celu, ale nie jego maniery. Możesz zmienić wygląd ubrań i ekwipunku celu, na przykład sprawić aby jego pancerz wyglądał jak suknia. Trzymane przedmioty nie są obejmowane iluzją a wszelkie noszone przedmioty wracają do ich prawdziwego wyglądu po ich zdjęciu z celu.

Rzucenie iluzorycznego przebrania liczy się jako przygotowanie przebrania na rzecz @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Podszywania Się} z użyciem Oszukiwania; ignoruje ono wszelkie kary, które cel mógłby ponieść za podszywanie się pod różniącą się wyglądem istotę, zapewnia premię statusową +4 do testów Oszukiwania na rzecz zapobiegania próbom przejrzenia przebrania przez innych i pozwala celowi na dodawanie jego poziomu do takich testów Oszukiwania, nawet jeśli jest on niewyszkolony. Możesz Odwołać to zaklęcie.

Wywyższenie (3.) Cel może jawić się jako dowolna istota o tym samym Rozmiarze, nawet jako konkretna osoba. Musiałeś widzieć osobę aby móc odwzorować jej wygląd oraz musiałeś ją słyszeć, aby móc odwzorować jej głos.

Wywyższenie (4.) Możesz objąć za cel do 10 godzących się istot. Jeśli obierzesz za cel wiele istot możesz decydować o ich indywidualnych przebraniach ale żadna z nich nie może przebierać się za konkretną osobę. Możesz Odwołać każde z przebrań niezależnie lub wszystkie na raz.

Wywyższenie (7.) Jak na kręgu 4. ale możesz wybierać przebrania odzwierciedlające wygląd konkretnych osób. Musiałeś widzieć osobę aby móc odwzorować jej wygląd oraz musiałeś ją słyszeć, aby móc odwzorować jej głos.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.3Ktyd5F9lOPo4myk]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Iluzoryczne Przebranie}

Illusory Object.name: Iluzoryczny Obiekt
Illusory Object.description:
Tworzysz iluzoryczne widziadło stacjonarnego obiektu. Cały obraz musi mieścić się w obszarze działania zakręcia. Obiekt porusza się w naturalny dla niego sposób, ale widziadło nie wydaje dźwięków ani nie generuje zapachów. Przykładowo, woda spływałaby w dół iluzorycznego wodospadu ale nie wydawałaby przy tym odgłosów.

Każda istota, która dotknie obrazu lub użyje akcji @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Szukania} aby go zbadać może spróbować podważyć wiarę w twoją iluzję.

Wywyższenie (2.) Twoje widziadło wydaje odpowiednie dźwięki, roztacza odpowiednie zpachy oraz zdaje się realne w dotyku. Zaklęcie zyskuje cechy słuchowość i węchowość. Czas trwania zwiększa się do 1 godziny.

Wywyższenie (5.) Jak na 2. kręgu ale czas trwania jest nieograniczony.

Illusory Scene.name: Illusory Scene
Illusory Scene.description:
You craft an imaginary scene that includes up to 10 discrete creatures or objects of various sizes, all of which must be within the spell's area. These elements generate appropriate sounds and smells, and they feel right to the touch. Elements of an illusory scene are incapable of speech. Unlike with the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.f8SBoXiXQjlCKqly]{Illusory Creature} spell, creatures in your scene lack combat abilities and statistics. Your scene doesn't include changes to the environment around it, though you can place your scene within the illusory environment of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.HBJPsonQnWcC3qdX]{Mirage} spell.

When you create the scene, you can choose to have it be static or follow a program. Though a static scene is stationary, it includes basic natural movement. For example, wind blowing on an illusory piece of paper would rustle it. A program can be up to 1 minute long and repeats when finished. For instance, you could create a scene of two orcs fighting each other, and the fight would go the same way for each repetition. If you create a loop, the two fighters end up in the same place at the start of the scene and at the end of it, but you can smooth the program so it's hard to tell when the loop ends and begins. Anyone observing the scene for more than a few minutes almost always notices it looping. You're unable to alter the program after you create the illusion.

Any creature that touches any part of the image or uses the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Szukanie} action to examine it can attempt to disbelieve your illusion. If they interact with a portion of the illusion, they disbelieve only that portion. They disbelieve the entire scene only on a critical success.

Wywyższenie (6.) Creatures or objects in your scene can speak. You must speak the specific lines for each actor when creating your program. The spell disguises your voice for each actor.

Wywyższenie (8.) As the 6. kręgu version, and the duration is unlimited.

Illusory Shroud.name: Illusory Shroud
Illusory Shroud.description:
You shroud the target in subtle illusions that make it difficult to detect. The target gains a +1 status bonus to Stealth checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Schować Się} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Przekradanie Się}. For the duration, the target can become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Schowany} to a creature even if they don't have cover and aren't otherwise @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} from that creature. Even if the target isn't concealed or doesn't have cover or greater cover at the end of a Sneak action, the target isn't automatically observed.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.b8JCq6n1STl3Wkwy]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Illusory Shroud}

Imaginary Lockbox.name: Imaginary Lockbox
Imaginary Lockbox.description:
You turn a container and its contents into an imaginary form stored in your mind that only you can see and interact with. The container's physical properties — the material from which it's made, any locks, or other features — are irrelevant to the casting of this spell, but the container can't contain any creatures. The container has no Bulk, and you can visualize everything inside it.

You can retrieve an item from the lockbox as an activity that takes 3 actions and has the concentrate and manipulate traits. Putting items back isn't possible. You can Dismiss the spell. When the spell ends, the container returns to its normal state, either appearing in your hands if it can fit there or on the ground adjacent to you if not.
Imaginary Lockbox.target: 1 container and its contents, totaling 10 Bulk or less

Imaginary Weapon.name: Imaginary Weapon
Imaginary Weapon.description:
You create a simple weapon of force. Make a melee spell attack roll against your target's AC. If you hit, you deal 2k8 bludgeoning or slashing damage (your choice). On a critical success, you deal double damage and can choose to detonate your weapon to push the target 10 feet away from you.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k8.

Imitate Fauna.name: Imitate Fauna
Imitate Fauna.description:
You use your knowledge of nature to pass the target off as a common animal of the same size, representing a species chosen when the spell is cast. This covers the target's visual appearance, scent, and voice. The target can communicate with other members of the species as though they shared a language but can't speak other languages while the spell persists.

Casting imitate fauna counts as setting up a disguise for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Podszywać Się} action. It allows the target to ignore any circumstance penalties they might take for being disguised as dissimilar creatures, and it gives the target a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to prevent other animals from seeing through their disguise. You can Dismiss this spell.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.yGedCb78XX6TtTq3]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Imitate Fauna}

Wywyższenie (5.) You can target up to six willing animals.

Imp Sting.name: Imp Sting
Imp Sting.description:
You reproduce an imp's evil, poisonous sting, stabbing at an enemy and possibly affecting them with the devil's benumbing venom. You deal @Damage[1d4[piercing]] damage to the touched creature and afflict the creature with imp venom. If the target takes piercing damage, they also take @Damage[1d6[spirit]] damage and must attempt a Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target takes @Damage[1d6[poison]] damage.

Porażka The target is afflicted with Imp Venom at stage 1.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is afflicted with imp venom at stage 2.

Imp Venom (poison) Level 3

Maksymalny Czas Trwania 6 rund

Stadium 1 @Damage[1d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1}

Stadium 2 @Damage[1d6[poison]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} (1 runda).

Impaling Briars.name: Impaling Briars
Impaling Briars.description:
The ground within the area transforms into a mass of dangerous briars that assault and impede your foes. When you Cast the Supell and the first time you Sustain it each turn on subsequent rounds, select one of the following effects to occur in the area.

  • Ensnare The briars clump around your foes, attempting to hold them in place. A foe within the area (or flying at most 20 feet above the area) must attempt a Reflex save. On a failure, it takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to all Speeds for 1 round, and on a critical failure, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony} for 1 round unless it Escapes.
  • Impede The briars twist and writhe, making the entire area difficult terrain.
  • Wall A @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KsWhliKfUs3IpW3c]{Wall of Thorns} appears in the area, lasting for 1 round. The wall is greater difficult terrain instead of difficult terrain.

In addition, once per round you can direct the briars to impale any target in the area (or flying up to 20 feet above the area) that you can see by using a single action, which has the concentrate and manipulate traits. Wykonaj rzut ataku zaklęciem. On a success, the target takes 10k6 piercing damage and takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to all Speeds for 1 round; on a critical success, the target is Immobilized for 1 round unless it Escapes.

Impaling Spike.name: Impaling Spike
Impaling Spike.description:
You conjure a spike that thrusts up from the earth beneath a target creature, potentially impaling it. The spike is made of cold iron and deals 8k6 piercing damage. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Refleksu.

Krytyczny Sukces The target dodges the spike and is unaffected.

Sukces The target is struck by the spike and takes half damage.

Porażka The target is impaled through a leg or another nonvital body part. The creature takes full damage and, if it's standing on solid ground, becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony}. It can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} (the DC is your spell DC). While it remains impaled, it takes damage from any weakness to cold iron it has at the end of each of its turns.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the creature is impaled through a vital organ or its center of mass, taking double damage, and it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda} as long as it's impaled.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6.

Impart Empathy.name: Impart Empathy
Impart Empathy.description:
You expand the target's ability to understand social cues that are normally beyond its comprehension. Any creature to which the target isn't unfriendly or hostile can use Diplomacy to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Wywarcie Wrażenia} on it and to make very simple Requests of it. This doesn't render the animal any more inclined to help than it otherwise would be.

Wywyższenie (4.) The spell can also target plants and fungi.

Impeccable Flow.name: Impeccable Flow
Impeccable Flow.description:
You attune yourself to an underlying cosmic order to the world. While you remain in tune with this power, you gain a +1 status bonus to Perception checks, saving throws, and skill checks. If you critically fail any check while under the effects of this spell, the bonus ends and you instead have a –1 status penalty to all checks for the remaining duration.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.slI9P4jUp3ERPCqX]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Impeccable Flow}

Wywyższenie (5.) The status bonus increases to +2.

Wywyższenie (8.) The status bonus increases to +3.

Note: The automation for the critical failure effect defaults to 10 rounds and must be altered manually.

Impending Doom.name: Impending Doom
Impending Doom.description:
You sift through myriad potential futures, seize upon one potential moment in which the target meets a particularly gruesome and fatal end, and then show it a vision of its impending demise. The intense mental vision grows more and more terrifying to the target as the doom grows closer, and it takes 3 rounds to reach its conclusion. The target must attempt a Will saving throw to determine the effects. At the end of the spell's duration, if the target was affected, the target witnesses its death and takes 6k6 mental damage.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature is unaffected for 1 round. On the second round, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda}. Finally, on the third round, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1}. At the end of the third round, it takes half damage.

Porażka The creature is immediately off-guard. On the second round, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2}. Finally, on the third round, it also becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1}. At the end of the third round, the creature takes full damage.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is immediately off-guard and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 3}. On the second round, it becomes stunned 1. Finally, on the third round, it also becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Sparaliżowany}. At the end of the third round, the creature takes double damage.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6.

Implement of Destruction.name: Implement of Destruction
Implement of Destruction.description:
You solemnly declare that the target weapon will bring death to a foe, implanting an irrational fear of the weapon into the target enemy. This link echoes at the forefront of the enemy's mind, forming a looming sense of omnipresent dread. The effect is based on the target enemy's Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces The target enemy is unaffected.

Sukces The target weapon deals an additional @Damage[2d6[mental]] damage the first time it hits the target enemy before the end of the spell's duration.

Porażka The target weapon deals an additional @Damage[2d6[persistent,mental]] damage to the target enemy. If the enemy is critically hit by the weapon, the enemy is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} for as long as it takes this persistent mental damage.

Krytyczna Porażka The target weapon deals an additional @Damage[4d6[persistent,mental]] damage to the target enemy. If the enemy is critically hit by the weapon, the enemy is doomed 1.

Wywyższenie (+2) Increase the mental damage by 1k6 on a success, and increase the persistent mental damage by 1k6 on a failure or by 2k6 on a critical failure.
Implement of Destruction.target: 1 enemy, and 1 weapon that is either unattended or wielded by you or a willing ally

Implosion.name: Implosion
Implosion.description:
You crush the target by causing it to collapse in on itself, dealing 75 damage. The first time each round you Sustain the spell, you must choose a new target to be subject to the same effect; the same creature can never be targeted more than once with a single casting of this spell. You also can't affect more than one creature per turn with implosion. You can't target a creature that's incorporeal, gaseous, or liquid, or otherwise lacking a solid form.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 10.

Imprint Message.name: Imprint Message
Imprint Message.description:
You project psychic vibrations onto the target object, imprinting it with a short message or emotional theme of your design. This imprinted sensation is revealed to a creature who casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5LYi9Efs6cko4GGL]{Object Reading} on the target object, replacing any emotional events the item was present for. If the object is in the area of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rsZ5c0AUyywe5yoK]{Retrokognicja} spell, the imprinted messages appear as major events in the timeline, but they don't interfere with any other visions.

If the object is targeted with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.OhD2Z6rIGGD5ocZA]{Odczytanie Aury} of a higher spell rank than imprint message, the caster learns that the object has been magically modified. When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast this Spell}, any prior vibrations placed on an object by previous castings of imprint message fade.

Imprisonment.name: Imprisonment
Imprisonment.cost: reagents to construct the magical prison worth a total value of 800 gp × the target's level
Imprisonment.description:
You perform a ritual to imprison a creature in one of several forms. While some versions of this ritual offer all the forms, others include only a single form or only a few of them. Whichever form you use, the effect can't be counteracted, though it can be ended by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4ddJSjC9Zz5DX0oG]{Freedom}. Some forms of imprisonment can be ended by other means. Because the ritual requires the target to remain within 10 feet at all times, it typically requires you to subdue the target first.

  • Chains You bind the creature with chains, rendering it unable to use any actions other than to speak. Other creatures that attempt to approach, harm the chains, or free the trapped creature in any way must succeed at a Will save or be unable to do so forever. The chains have Hardness equal to 5 × the imprisonment ritual's spell rank and double that many Hit Points. Destroying the chains frees the target.
  • Prison You render the creature completely unable to leave a particular confined area or structure of your choice, such as a jail cell or sealed cave. The magic also prevents the creature from damaging its prison, either directly or indirectly, to break free. If the creature's prison is entirely destroyed by some external force, the creature is freed, though for some larger or natural prisons, this might be unfeasible.
  • Slumber You put the creature into an eternal sleep. This is a sleep effect. The creature ceases aging and doesn't require food or drink. A single sincere physical display of affection from a creature who genuinely loves the target — whether romantically, filially, or otherwise — frees it from the slumber.
  • Temporal Stasis You send the creature into a state of suspended animation outside the flow of time. The creature doesn't grow older and can't be affected by any effect from within the normal timestream. While casting this ritual, you can optionally name any amount of time for the stasis; after this duration elapses, the stasis ends. Unlike other forms of imprisonment, temporal stasis can be counteracted by a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.o6YCGx4lycsYpww4]{Haste} spell.
  • Object (9th or 10th rank) You either shrink the creature to an inch in height or transform it into an insubstantial form whose body trails away into wisps below its head. Either way, you trap it inside a bottle, gem, jar, lamp, or similar container. The creature ceases aging and doesn't require food or drink. The creature is still aware of its surroundings and can move within the container and speak, but it can't use any other actions. Destroying the container kills the target rather than freeing it.

  • Oubliette (10th rank only) You entomb the target in a state of suspended animation deep beneath the surface of the ground and out of tune with reality so that it can't be reached by any means. You also prevent most magic from revealing the location where the imprisonment occurred. Powerful magic, such as the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{Wish} ritual, can reveal the location of the imprisonment, but even such magic can't free the target from the oubliette; only a 10. kręgu freedom ritual can do so.

Krytyczny Sukces You imprison the target. You can either use a form of imprisonment that usually requires a spell rank 1 higher than your ritual or impose an –2 circumstance penalty to any checks for freedom rituals that would free the creature.

Sukces You imprison the target.

Porażka You fail to imprison the target.

Krytyczna Porażka You imprison yourself and the secondary casters in the same way you intended to imprison the target.

Wywyższenie (9th) You can use the object form of imprisonment in addition to the other options, and you can target a creature of up to 18th level. The base cost increases to 2,000 gp.

Wywyższenie (10th) You can use the object and oubliette forms of imprisonment in addition to the other options, and you can target a creature of up to 20th level. The base cost increases to 6,000 gp.

Incarnate Ancestry.name: Incarnate Ancestry
Incarnate Ancestry.description:
You attempt to reach back through time to make brief contact with one of the many past lives of the willing creature, then transform their current body to incarnate elements of that past life's ancestry into the present. At the GM's option, a creature might not have any past lives to draw from, in which case this ritual fails. A PC should always be able to make full use of this ritual if it's cast on them should the GM chooses to allow this ritual into their game.

While incarnate ancestry can be cast anywhere, if cast in the vicinity of a site infused with energies conducive to reincarnation and contacting past lives (such as in area D7 of the Sanctum of the Cleansed), checks made to perform this ritual gain a +4 circumstance bonus.

Krytyczny Sukces You infuse the creature with elements from a previous incarnation. The character can reselect all ancestry feats, or even select an entirely new ancestry (choosing from those allowed by the GM). The newly incarnated ancestry must still fully support other character build options; you can't choose feats or ancestries that would invalidate class choices. The character is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 1} for 10 minutes as they acclimate to their new body.

Sukces As critical success, but the transformation is disorienting to the creature, who must come to terms with their new body and the strange echoes of memories from the past life that fade in time. The creature becomes clumsy 1 and stupefied 1 for one week; these conditions can't be removed or reduced by any means until the week has passed.

Porażka The attempt to incarnate ancestry is unsuccessful.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the attempt to transform leaves the creature feeling as if their own body were unfamiliar. They become clumsy 1 and stupefied 1 for one week; these conditions can't be removed or reduced by any means until the week has passed.

Incendiary Ashes.name: Incendiary Ashes
Incendiary Ashes.description:
A cloud of magical ashes descends upon creatures in the area. The ashes scour flesh and linger in the wounds, igniting upon the slightest flicker of flame. Creatures in the area take 4k6 slashing damage and must attempt a Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature takes half damage and has weakness to fire 3 until the start of its next turn.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia and has weakness to fire 3 for 1 minute. If the creature is killed by fire during this time it's reduced to ashes, though its gear remains.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, except the creature takes double damage.

Wywyższenie (+1) The slashing damage increases by 2k6 and weakness to fire increases by 1.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.4dnt1P2SfcePzkrF]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Incendiary Ashes (Sukces)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.TrmNSuv6zWEiceqn]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Incendiary Ashes (Porażka)}

Incendiary Aura.name: Incendiary Aura
Incendiary Aura.description:
You surround yourself with a combustible aura. Each time a creature within the emanation takes fire damage, it catches on fire, taking @Damage[(ceil(@item.level/2)+1)d4[persistent,fire]] damage.

Wywyższenie (+2) Increase the persistent damage by 1k4 and the radius of the emanation by 5 feet.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.pE2TWhG97XbhgAdH]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Incendiary Aura}

Incendiary Fog.name: Incendiary Fog
Incendiary Fog.description: You summon a cloud of flammable black dust. The cloud functions as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{Mist}. If any open flame or fire effect is within the spell's area when it's cast, or later enters or occurs within the area, the cloud ignites. Creatures in the cloud take @Damage[10d6[fire]] damage (basic Reflex save), and the spell ends.

Indestructibility.name: Indestructibility
Indestructibility.description: You sever yourself from cause and effect. For the duration of the spell, you are immune to any effect or damage that would harm you, excluding effects caused by artifacts, deific power, and similarly powerful sources. You can selectively allow yourself to be affected by anything you're willing to have affect you.

Indolent Haze.name: Indolent Haze
Indolent Haze.description:
The faint scent of poppies and a soothing calm fill the area, urging creatures to lay down and take a rest, to do nothing at all, ever again. Creatures in the area when you Cast the Spell must attempt a Will save. Creatures who end their turn in the area must also attempt the save. You can Dismiss the spell.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature is unaffected.

Sukces The creature lies down to rest, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}. If they were already prone, they instead drift off to sleep, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Nieprzytomny}.

Porażka As success, except that the creature is so happy lying down that they cannot attempt to Stand or otherwise maneuver themself off of the ground on their next turn, though they can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Tj055UcNm6UEgtCg]{Crawl} (potentially to escape the spell's area).

Krytyczna Porażka The creature immediately lies down and drifts off to sleep, becoming prone and unconscious. Any creature in the area who is already unconscious when you Cast the Spell (or whose turn ends in the spell's area while they are unconscious) takes 6k4 spirit damage as their life force is drained away through their dreams. This damage does not automatically wake them.

Wywyższenie (+1) The spirit damage increases by 2k4.

Inevitable Destination.name: Inevitable Destination
Inevitable Destination.description:
You twist the paths of the target, ensuring that each one leads to you. The target attempts a Will saving throw.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie odnosi efektu.

Sukces Your pull hampers the target's footsteps. It takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until the end of its next turn.

Porażka The target can't move any farther from you than it was when you Cast the Spell, though it can move in such a way that it maintains an equal distance. If you move farther away from the target than the initial distance, the spell ends. The targeted foe can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} against your spell DC. If it succeeds, the spell ends.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, plus the target is pulled 10 feet closer to you and falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}, tripping in its haste to move toward you.

Inevitable Disaster.name: Inevitable Disaster
Inevitable Disaster.description:
You briefly glimpse cause and effect, putting into motion a chain of events that will visit doom on your enemy at some point in the future, though you're not quite sure when or how the doom will occur. Some kind of strange accident occurs [[/gmr 1d4 #rounds]]{1k4 rounds} later, dealing 55 damage to the creature, with a basic Fortitude save. This happens regardless of where the target is located at the time, even if it travels to another plane. The GM should roll to determine when the damage occurs secretly and determine the form of the accident as well as the type of damage it deals; generally, the accident should be one that deals physical damage of some type (for instance, a tree branch might fall on the foe and deal bludgeoning damage, or a window might break and fling sharp slashing glass at them), though other damage types might be appropriate in more unusual environments.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 10.

Inexhaustible Cynicism.name: Inexhaustible Cynicism
Inexhaustible Cynicism.description:
You inflict your targets with a crushing doubt about everyone and everything around them. For the duration, each target is unwilling to receive any effects that require a willing target (in case the effect was secretly an attack), refuse to ingest anything (in case the substances have been replaced with poisons and cursed duplicates), doesn't treat anyone as an ally (in case its friends were replaced by an impostor), and doesn't believe anything it's told (in case of lies, though this doesn't mean the creature automatically believes the opposite either). It doesn't even fully trust its own ability to Recall Knowledge, as it becomes convinced it most likely remembered false information, as from a critical failure on a check to Recall Knowledge.

Finally, the creature takes 6k6 mental damage at the end of each of its turns (with no save) unless it spent at least 1 action that turn Seeking or otherwise interacting with its surroundings in an attempt to disbelieve the illusions that it feels are obviously surrounding it.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature is affected for 1 round.

Porażka The creature is affected for 1 minute.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is affected for 1 hour.

Infectious Comedy.name: Infectious Comedy
Infectious Comedy.description:
You tell a magical joke and infect a target with laughter that spreads to those nearby. The first time you Sustain the Spell each round, you can target another creature you can see that is within 30 feet of an affected target. The new target need not be able to see or hear the affected target, as the humor spreads magically. You can't target the same creature more than once with this spell.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target begins giggling and can't use reactions.

Porażka The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} and can't use reactions.

Krytyczna Porażka The target falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony} and can't use actions or reactions for 1 round. It then suffers the failure effect.

Infectious Ennui.name: Infectious Ennui
Infectious Ennui.description:
With a wave of your hand and a short invocation, you cause feelings of ennui and impending doom to well up in the mind of the targeted creature, who must attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target is momentarily overwhelmed with ennui. It becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} as it grapples mentally with the pointlessness of existence, but at the end of the target's next turn, the spell effect ends.

Porażka The target is slowed 1 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1} from the sense of ennui, and remains slowed and can't reduce the frightened condition below 1 as long as the spell is sustained. At the start of the target's turn, choose one creature within 30 feet of the target to attempt a Will save as well; on a failure, that creature is slowed 1 for 1 round; either way, they are then temporarily immune to this casting of infectious ennui. (Ennui does not continue to spread from this secondary target.)

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the primary target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2}.

Wywyższenie (5.) When a secondary target becomes slowed, it remains slowed as long as the spell is sustained.

Infectious Enthusiasm.name: Zaraźliwy Entuzjazm
Infectious Enthusiasm.description:
Z magicznie wyczarowaną werwą, motywujesz siebie samego do działania oraz dzielisz się tą motywacją z sojusznikami. Zyskujesz premię statusową +1 do jednego wybranego przez ciebie rodzaju rzutów - rzutów ataku, rzutów obronnych Woli lub testów umiejętności opartych o Charyzmę. W trakcie trwania zaklęcia, sojusznik, który zaobserwował jak Rzucasz Zaklęcie i był w tym momencie w promieniu 30 stóp od ciebie, może użyć pojedynczej akcji z cechą koncentracja, aby również zyskać wybraną przez ciebie premię do początku jego następnej tury.

Używanie tego zaklęcia w sytuacjach społecznych jest powszechnie uważane za faux pas, co neguje jego premie do testów umiejętności opartych o Charyzmę jeśli cel testu zaobserwował jak Rzucasz Zaklęcie.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.nU4SxAk6XreHUi5h]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Zaraźliwy Entuzjazm}

Infectious Melody.name: Infectious Melody
Infectious Melody.description:
You call forth the chords of a tune so catchy that foes hearing it can't help but sing along, making it harder for them to communicate. Each target must attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature is unaffected.

Sukces For 1 round, the creature can communicate only by singing along to the melody. It can speak only on its turn, and it must take the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EEDElIyin4z60PXx]{Perform} action when it does. The result of the Performance check determines how well it sang, but it stills communicate the information regardless of the result, which has no further mechanical impact than the time spent to take the action. A single Perform check is sufficient for any amount of speaking on the creature's turn. This effect might interfere with verbal components of spells or other linguistic abilities that rely on precise speech; in order to use such an ability successfully, the creature must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:5|showDC:all].

In addition, the creature takes a –2 status penalty on linguistic Intimidation checks, as singing its threats saps away some of the menace. The creature's constant humming of the tune also makes it nearly impossible for the creature to remain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Niewykryty}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.i9YITDcrq1nKjV5l]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Infectious Melody (Sukces)}

Porażka As success, but the duration is 3 rounds.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.yl0Pm78RXW5R2k50]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Infectious Melody (Porażka)}

Krytyczna Porażka As success, but the duration is 1 hour.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.XDqtLdHnjLVhtqAW]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Infectious Melody (Krytyczna Porażka)}

Infiltrator's Tunnel.name: Infiltrator's Tunnel
Infiltrator's Tunnel.description:
It's best to know the ingress and egress points for any location you plan to rob. But it's even better to make your own! You create two portals. One appears on a flat surface you can touch, and the other appears on a different flat surface in range that you can see.

You can move through the portals as though they were adjacent to each other. Any other creature attempting to move through the portals must succeed at a Will saving throw or be teleported up to 30 feet away from their starting point to a random safe space determined by the GM.

Wywyższenie (6th) When you Cast the Spell, you can designate up to 5 other creatures to freely move between the portals.

Information Overload.name: Information Overload
Information Overload.description: You call on Cobyslarni to open the target's mind to knowledge — too much knowledge. The target's thoughts flood with irrelevant and confusing information, causing it to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 1} if it fails a Will save (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 2} on a critical failure).

Infuse Vitality.name: Nasycenie Witalnością
Infuse Vitality.description:
Wzmacniasz swoje ataki energią witalności. Liczba celi zaklęcia jest równa liczbie akcji poświęconych na Rzucanie tego Zaklęcia. Ciosy bronią i wręcz wszystkich celów zadają dodatkowe 1k4 obrażeń od witalności. (Te obrażenia na ogół krzywdzą tylko nieumarłych.) Jeśli masz cechę świętości, możesz dodać ją do tego zaklęcia oraz do Ciosów objętych jego działaniem.

Wywyższenie (3.) Obrażenia zwiększają się do 2k4.

Wywyższenie (5.) Obrażenia zwiększają się do 3k4.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.X7RD0JRxhJV9u2LC]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Nasycenie Witalnością}

Inkshot.name: Inkshot
Inkshot.description:
A spray of viscous, toxic ink jets from your fingertip to strike a target creature in the face. Make a spell attack roll against the target. On a hit, you deal 2k6 poison damage, plus you blast the target's eyes, making them @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} for 1 round as the stinging ink blurs and distorts the creature's vision. On a critical hit, double the poison damage, and the target becomes dazzled for 1 minute by the foul ink.

The ink stain remains for 1 hour before fading, although vigorous cleansing (or magic such as a prestidigitation cantrip) can remove the ink before then.

Wywyższenie (+1) Increase the base poison damage by 2k6.

Inner Radiance Torrent.name: Inner Radiance Torrent
Inner Radiance Torrent.description:
You gradually manifest your spiritual energy into your cupped hands before firing off a storm of bolts and beams that deal 4k4 force damage to all creatures in a 60-foot line. Creatures in the area must attempt a basic Reflex save. On a critical failure, they're also blinded for 1 round. The number of actions you spend when Casting this Spell determines the area. If the line passes through an area of magical darkness or targets a creature affected by magical darkness, inner radiance torrent attempts to counteract the darkness.

2 (somatic, verbal) The line is 60 feet long.

3 (material, somatic, verbal) The line is @Template[line|distance:120]{120 feet} long.

Two Rounds The line is 120 feet long. If you spend 3 actions casting the spell, you can avoid finishing the spell and spend another 3 actions on your next turn to empower the spell even further. If you choose to do so, the damage dealt by this spell increases by 4k4, and you enter a shining state for 1 minute, causing you to glow with light and deal @Damage[1[force]] damage to creatures that end their turn adjacent to you.

Wywyższenie (+1) The initial damage, as well as the additional damage for the 2-round casting time, each increase by 2k4, and the damage to adjacent creatures dealt while in your shining state increases by 1.

Inner Upheaval.name: Inner Upheaval
Inner Upheaval.description:
You focus your qi into devastating magical attacks. Make an unarmed Strike or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.NLHHHiAcdnZ5ohc2]{Grad Ciosów} (this doesn't change the limit on using only one flourish per turn). You gain a +1 status bonus to your attack rolls with the Strikes, and the Strikes deal 1k6 extra damage. This damage can be any of the following types of your choice, chosen each time you Strike: force, spirit, vitality, or void.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.8olfnTmWh0GGPDqX]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Inner Upheaval}

Wywyższenie (+4) The extra damage increases by 1k6
