Magnetic Attraction.target: up to 10 metal objects with a total Bulk of 1 or less

Magnetic Dominion.name: Magnetic Dominion
Magnetic Dominion.description:
The roiling magnetic fields of the Plane of Metal radiate from you as you channel and reshape them at your merest thought. When you Cast this Spell, you can relocate each affected target to any other unoccupied space within the emanation. You can't move yourself in this way. An unwilling target can resist being moved with a successful Reflex save.

The creatures move all at once — after you know the results of all the saves, you determine which target occupies each space in whatever order you choose. You can move a creature into a space that was previously occupied by another creature so long as you also relocate the first creature elsewhere as part of the movement. If you move a target into the air, it descends to the ground harmlessly after being moved unless it chooses not to.

You can choose to be affected by an 8. kręgu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.24U1b9K4Lj94cgaj]{Magnetic Repulsion} spell that lasts for the duration of magnetic dominion. Each time you Sustain the spell, you can move one creature in the emanation, with the same targeting restrictions and stipulations as above.
Magnetic Dominion.target: any number of creatures wearing metal armor, creatures made of metal, creatures that have the metal trait, and unattended metal objects

Magnetic Repulsion.name: Magnetic Repulsion
Magnetic Repulsion.description:
You adjust your magnetic polarity, causing metal objects to jump and shudder away from you. Attacks made with metal objects against you take a –1 status penalty, and the squares adjacent to you are difficult terrain for creatures wearing metal armor. For creatures made entirely of metal, the penalty to their attack rolls is –2 and the squares adjacent to you are greater difficult terrain.

While this spell is active, you require an additional Interact action before using a metal object (including to Strike with a metal weapon), and if you're wearing metal armor, you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1}.

Wywyższenie (+3) The status penalty to attack rolls increases by 1.

Malediction.name: Malediction
Malediction.description:
You incite distress in the minds of your enemies, making it more difficult for them to defend themselves. Enemies in the area must succeed at a Will save or take a –1 status penalty to AC as long as they're in the area.

Once per round on subsequent turns, you can Sustain the spell to increase the emanation's radius by 10 feet and force enemies in the area that weren't yet affected to attempt a saving throw.

Malediction can counteract benediction.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.1jX8W0eyMPJ0MFKY]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Malediction}

Malicious Shadow.name: Malicious Shadow
Malicious Shadow.description:
Your patron warps the target's shadow into a deadly form, such as strangling hands, a dangerous weapon, harrying runes, or the like. The shadow moves along with the target, always remaining within reach. When you Cast the Spell, and each time you Sustain it, the shadow Strikes the target. The shadow's Strikes are melee spell attacks that deal damage equal to 1k10 plus your spellcasting attribute modifier. You choose the type of damage (bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing) when you Cast the Spell. The shadow uses and contributes to your multiple attack penalty. The shadow doesn't take up space, grant flanking, or have any other attributes a creature would. The shadow can't make any attacks other than its Strike.

The shadow vanishes if the target ceases to cast a shadow (usually if it moves into complete darkness or light). If another effect is controlling the target's shadow when you cast malicious shadow, you can attempt to counteract that effect to temporarily take control of the shadow for malicious shadow's duration.

Wywyższenie (+2) The Strike damage increases by 1k10.

Malignant Sustenance.name: Malignant Sustenance
Malignant Sustenance.description:
You embed a seed of void energy in an undead creature, restoring its unnatural vigor. The target gains fast healing 7.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.tjC6JeZgLDPIMHjG]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Malignant Sustenance}

Wywyższenie (+1) The fast healing increases by 2.

Manifest Will.name: Manifest Will
Manifest Will.description:
You unleash energy from the broken connection to your patron. You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} from creatures beyond the edge of the emanation but can't use that concealment to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide}. Any creature that begins its turn in the emanation is affected based on your patron's tradition.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.WtuhkNCNAW1JaGSe]{Aura: Manifest Will}

  • Arcane Raw energy and magical formulae circulate around you. A creature that begins its turn in the emanation gains weakness 1 to spell damage for 1 round.
  • Divine Divine power crashes in a cycle of life and death. A living or undead creature that begins its turn in the emanation gains 2 temporary Hit Points for 1 round. This effect has the spirit trait.
  • Occult Esoteric symbology etches the air. An allied creature that begins its turn in the emanation has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Item.I9lfZUiCwMiGogVi]{Lesser Cover} while inside the emanation, and for 1 round after it leaves.
  • Primal Plants and fungus symbolic of your patron constantly grow and wither in the emanation. A creature that begins its turn in the emanation has a –10-foot status penalty to all its Speeds for 1 round or until it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes}. This effect has the fungus, plant, and wood traits.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Vd72sGiTl7Pq8iQv]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Manifest Will}

Wywyższenie (+1) An arcane manifestation increases its weakness by 1 and a divine manifestation increases its temporary Hit Points by 2.

Manifestation.name: Manifestation
Manifestation.description: You spin secrets from the fundaments of magic, shaping them into a power with nearly unlimited potential. You duplicate a spell of 9. rank or lower of the tradition from which you cast manifestation, or a spell of 7. rank or lower from any tradition. Though you can normally choose only spells that are common or to which you have access, the GM might allow broader options.

Manifold Lives.name: Manifold Lives
Manifold Lives.description:
You cast a creature's mind back through time, forcing them to take other paths and make other choices, experiencing countless alternate lives in an instant. The creature becomes overwhelmed with regret over paths untraveled, lives unlived, and times unrealized. The creature takes 6k6 mental damage and must attempt a Will save. After the effect is resolved, the target is then temporarily immune for 1 day.

Krytyczny Sukces Efekt nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature takes half damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 2} for 1 round.

Porażka The creature takes full damage and is stupefied 2 for 1 minute. While affected, the creature must attempt another save at the start of its turn; on a failure, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} for that turn as it sobs uncontrollably.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature takes double damage and for 1 minute, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 4} and slowed 1 as it sobs uncontrollably.

Wywyższenie (+1) The mental damage increases by 1k6.

Mantis Form.name: Mantis Form
Mantis Form.description: You become a mantis. You gain the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XI6Lzd2B5pernkPd]{Insect Form}, heightened to mantis form's level, and you can only transform into a mantis.

Mantis's Grasp.name: Mantis's Grasp
Mantis's Grasp.description:
You cause red, ghostly mantis arms to sprout from a nearby surface and crush a creature, dealing 8k6 force damage and attempting to pin the target in place. The effects are determined by the creature's Reflex save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target takes half damage.

Porażka The target takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony} for 1 round.

Krytyczna Porażka The target takes double damage and is immobilized for 1 minute. At the end of each of its turns, the target can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape}. The Escape DC is equal to your spell DC.

Wywyższenie (7.) You can target up to 5 creatures.

Mantle of Heaven's Slopes.name: Mantle of Heaven's Slopes
Mantle of Heaven's Slopes.description:
You surround yourself in a mantle of heavenly power, invoking the power of the layers of the celestial mountain above. Your body warps and morphs into an angelic form, made of Heaven's light. Upon Casting this Spell, pick two different options below. As a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can lose one of the options you chose and select a different one (you don't benefit from having the same option selected twice at the same time).

  • Threshold's Walls Glimmering barriers form around you. You gain cover from the barriers.
  • Proelera's Arsenal Shimmering silver pikes surround you, imposing your might on those who would oppose you. You gain an arsenal unarmed attack, which has the reach and shove traits, in the polearm group. Your arsenal attack deals 1k10 piercing damage as its base damage, plus an additional 1k8 spirit damage, and counts as silver.
  • Clarion's Sanctity Your eyes glow with golden light, seeing that which others prefer remain unseen. You gain a +2 status bonus on checks to Recall Knowledge and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive}, and when you succeed at a check to Recall Knowledge about a creature you can see, you can attempt to Sense its Motive as a free action.
  • Requius's Rest Your hands glow with soft white energy that spreads to your wounds. You gain fast healing 2.
  • Illumis's Parlance Your voice echoes like a trumpet. You can be heard clearly up to 200 feet away when you speak, if you choose to project your voice.
  • Iuidica's Verdict Your body pulses with scarlet light, pushing away those judged to be against you. As a free action triggered by succeeding at a Strike, you can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Odepchnięcie} the creature you hit

Mantle of the Frozen Heart.name: Mantle of the Frozen Heart
Mantle of the Frozen Heart.description:
You surround yourself in a mantle of frigid ice magic, and your skin and armor morph into cold blue ice. Freezing air emanates from your body, sending a chill down anyone's spine who draws too close and leaving a fine dusting of frost in your wake. Upon Casting this Spell, pick two of the options below. As a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can change one of your chosen abilities to a different option from the list.

  • Chilling Ice The ice around your body thickens, melting off to protect you from heat while inuring you from the cold. You gain resistance 10 to cold.
  • Heart of Ice Your body temperature plummets to blistering cold. Any creature that touches you, or that hits you with a melee unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon attack, takes @Damage[2d6[cold]] damage.
  • Ice Glide Ice trails from your feet for an instant as you move, allowing you to skate rapidly along the ice. You don't need to Balance on ice, and you ignore difficult terrain caused by ice or snow. While moving along a smooth surface, you gain a +20-foot status bonus to your land Speed.
  • Icy Claws Your hands morph into vicious, piercing claws of ice useful for attacking or climbing. As long as you have both hands free, you gain a climb Speed equal to your land Speed. You gain a claw unarmed attack with the agile and finesse traits, in the brawling weapon group. Your claw attack deals 1k6 piercing damage as its base damage, plus an additional 2k6 cold damage.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.K8NWxqtnrSg26KPJ]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Mantle of the Frozen Heart}

Mantle of the Magma Heart.name: Mantle of the Magma Heart
Mantle of the Magma Heart.description:
You surround yourself in a mantle of blazing fire magic, and your skin and anything you're wearing morphs into burning hot lava. The air around you swelters with heat, and tiny sparks of flame dance behind you as you pass. Upon casting this spell, pick two of the options below. As a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can change one of your chosen abilities to a different option from the list.

  • Enlarging Eruption You erupt in lava, which clings to you and hardens, causing your body to swell and burst until you grow to size Large. You're clumsy 1. Your reach increases by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if you started out Tiny), and you gain a +2 status bonus to melee damage. You can't choose this option if you're already Large or larger.
  • Fiery Grasp Your hands swell and grow with lava. You gain a lava fist unarmed attack in the brawling weapon group. Your lava fists deal 1k8 bludgeoning damage as their base damage, plus an additional 2k6 fire damage and 1k6 persistent fire damage.
  • Heart of Fire Your body's temperature becomes so hot that any creature that touches you, or that hits you with a melee unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon attack, takes @Damage[2d6[fire]] damage.
  • Warming Flames Flames flicker around you, warming away the cold while protecting you from the heat. You gain resistance 5 to cold and fire.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.34yP4e2e6jpY1Bsi]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Mantle of the Magma Heart}

Mantle of the Melting Heart.name: Mantle of the Melting Heart
Mantle of the Melting Heart.description:
You bathe yourself in a mantle of liquid metal, gilding your skin and armor with an oily sheen. Upon Casting this Spell, pick two of the options below. As a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can change one of your chosen abilities to a different option from the list.

  • Copper Core You draw electricity toward you, then disperse it. You gain resistance 10 to electricity. All electricity effects within 30 feet of you must succeed at a counteract check against your spell DC or target you and only you.
  • Golden Flesh Your body gains the chemical inertness of gold, barely reacting to substances that would otherwise greatly disturb your physiology. You become immune to poison and disease and gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your checks against any poison and disease effects currently affecting you.
  • Reactive Touch Your touch reacts easily with other metals. Any metal that touches you or that you touch takes @Damage[2d6[acid]] damage that bypasses Hardness.
  • Weighted Grasp Your arms become long cables, your fists heavy as anchors. You gain a cabled fist unarmed attack with the disarm, finesse, reach, and trip traits and that's in the flail group. Your cabled fist deals @Damage[1d4[bludgeoning]] damage plus an additional @Damage[1d6[poison]] damage and Grab.

Mantle of the Unwavering Heart.name: Mantle of the Unwavering Heart
Mantle of the Unwavering Heart.description:
Vines and branches envelop you in an instant, growing a wild bloom of colors that open to reveal your new form. Upon Casting this Spell, pick two of the options below. As a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can change one of your chosen abilities to a different option from the list.

  • Evergreen Vitality You gain fast healing 3 and a +2 bonus to saves against poison and disease. This effect has the healing and vitality traits.
  • Overwhelming Perfume (aura, olfactory) A cloud of potent floral scent surrounds you in a @Template[emanation|distance:15]. Creatures in the aura can't benefit from the scent ability and are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1} as long as they remain in the aura. The sickness is a disease effect.
  • Towering Trunk You grow to a considerable height. Increase your size to Large. You're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1}. Your reach increases by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if you started out Tiny), and you gain a grasping branch unarmed attack; this attack is in the brawling weapon group and deals @Damage[2d8[bludgeoning]] damage plus Grab.
  • Unyielding Will Your mind becomes incredibly resilient to change. You're immune to being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Zafascynowany}, and you get a +1 bonus to saves and DCs against mental effects.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.OlkrQOPjLclyyxCw]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Mantle of the Unwavering Heart}

Mariner's Curse.name: Mariner's Curse
Mariner's Curse.description:
You afflict the target with the curse of the roiling, unforgiving sea. The target must attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1}. Reducing its sickened condition to 0 ends the curse.

Porażka The target becomes sickened 1 and can't reduce its sickened condition below 1 while the curse remains. The curse can be lifted by 4. kręgu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SUKaxVZW2TlM8lu0]{Ulżenie w Dolegliwości} or similar magic. Whenever the target is sickened and on the water at least a mile from shore, it is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1}.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 2}.

Mark of Blood.name: Mark of Blood
Mark of Blood.description:
You place a drop of your blood on a weapon and charge it with magic so that you transfer a small amount of your life essence with your attack. The next creature you successfully Strike with the weapon during the spell's duration takes damage as normal from the attack and must then attempt a Will save; regardless of the outcome of this saving throw, the duration of mark of blood ends. You can have up to one creature cursed by mark of blood at any one time. If you use this spell to mark a different creature, the curse afflicting the previous creature ends.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature gains a softly glowing mark that resembles Achaekek's symbol somewhere on their body (such as the forehead or back of the hand). This mark can be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} by clothing, but is otherwise permanent until the curse is removed.

Porażka As success, but you can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Szukanie} to attempt to know the direction and general distance (within a mile) to the marked creature if the creature is alive and both you and the creature are on the same plane of existence. When you Seek in this way, you attempt a Perception check against the marked creature's Will DC. On a success, you gain the information, which is accurate at the moment that you Seek. On a critical failure, the curse ends, and the creature's mark vanishes.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but your Perception checks to Seek the marked creature are automatically successful.
Mark of Blood.target: 1 piercing or slashing weapon you're wielding

Martyr's Intervention.name: Martyr's Intervention
Martyr's Intervention.description:
Aktywator A creature within range would take damage that reduces it to 0 Hit Points

Wymagania You don't have the wounded condition.

You shield a creature in dire need with your own life force, taking the harm upon yourself to save their life. The target is reduced to 1 Hit Point instead of 0 Hit Points. All remaining damage that was prevented from harming the target creature is instead dealt to you. Both you and the target become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Ranny 1}; targets who are already wounded increased their wounded value by 1.

Marvelous Mount.name: Wspaniały Wierzchowiec
Marvelous Mount.description:
Wyczarowujesz Dużą fantastyczną istotę, która służy celowi za wierzchowca. Wierzchowiec jest sługusem celu, ma prędkość 40 stóp i jest w stanie udźwignąć cel wraz z całym jego noszonym dobytkiem. Nie może nosić żadnej innej istoty. Wierzchowiec używa KP i rzutów obronnych celu, ale jeśli odniesie więcej niż 10 punktów obrażeń na raz, jest niszczony a zaklęcie się kończy.

Wywyższenie (3.) Wierzchowiec może chodzić po wodzie, ale musi zakończyć swoją turę na twardym gruncie lub tonie.

Wywyższenie (4.) Wierzchowiec ma Prędkość 60 stóp i może chodzić po wodzie.

Wywyższenie (5.) Wierzchowiec ma Prędkość 60 stóp i może chodzić po wodzie. Ma też Prędkość Latania 60 stóp, ale musi zakończyć turę na powierzchni lub spada.

Wywyższenie (6.) Wierzchowiec ma Prędkość lądową i Prędkość latania 80 stóp.

Mask of Terror.name: Mask of Terror
Mask of Terror.description:
The target appears to be a gruesome and terrifying creature. The effect is unique to each observer, so a human viewing the target might see a demon with bloody fangs, but a demon observing the target might see a glowing angelic visage.

When any creature attempts a hostile action against the target, the creature must attempt a Will save. It is then temporarily immune until the end of its next turn.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Porażka The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2} before using its action.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2}, and its action fails and is wasted.

Wywyższenie (8.) You can target up to 5 creatures. If a creature uses a hostile action or reaction that affects multiple targets simultaneously, it needs to attempt only one save against mask of terror.

Massacre.name: Rzeź
Massacre.description:
Uwalniasz falę śmierci, by zdusić siłę życiową tych na jej drodze. Każda żyjąca istota poziomu 17. lub niższego w linii musi wykonać rzut obronny Krzepy. Jeśli obrażenia od rzezi zredukują Punkty Żywotności istoty do 0, istota ta natychmiast umiera. Jeśli rzeź nie zabije ani jednej istoty, energia pustki łapczywie zwraca się ku tobie, zadając dodatkowe 30 obrażeń od pustki każdej żyjącej istocie na linii (nawet tym powyżej 17. poziomu) oraz 30 obrażeń od pustki tobie.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota otrzymuje 9k6 obrażeń od pustki.

Porażka Istota otrzymuje 100 obrażeń od pustki.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota umiera.

Wywyższenie (10.) Zaklęcie może wpłynąć na żyjące istoty do 19. poziomu. Zwiększ obrażenia do 10k6 przy sukcesie i do 115 przy porażce.

Maze of Locked Doors.name: Maze of Locked Doors
Maze of Locked Doors.description:
The target of your spell is drawn into a long, twisting, extradimensional hallway blocked at 30-foot intervals with high-grade duskwood doors (Hardness 20, HP 80, BT 40, @Check[athletics|dc:30|name:Force Open Duskwood Door|traits:action:force-open] to Force Open) secured with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.q2TYVAMaK6UfenbV]{Zamek (Average)} (@Check[thievery|dc:25|name:Pick Maze Lock|traits:action:pick-a-lock], 4 successful checks required). A creature trapped within this hallway can escape only when the spell expires, or when they successfully pass through the number of doors determined by their save, either by breaking through the doors or picking the locks (or any combination of these, if the target must pass through multiple doors to escape). Teleportation effects of 6. level or lower are automatically suppressed within the extradimensional hallway; higher-level teleportation effects require the caster to succeed at a counteract check against your spell DC or they fail.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target is trapped for 1 round, or until it bypasses 1 door.

Porażka The target is trapped for 1 minute, or until it bypasses 2 doors.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is trapped for 10 minutes, or until it bypasses 3 doors.

Medusa's Wrath.name: Medusa's Wrath
Medusa's Wrath.description:
You make an attack filled with a medusa's petrifying power. Make an unarmed Strike with the following additional effects.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 2} and must attempt a Fortitude save at the end of each of its turns; this ongoing save has the incapacitation trait. On a failed save, the slowed condition increases by 1 (2 on a critical failure). A successful save reduces the slowed condition by 1. When a creature is unable to act due to the slowed condition from medusa's wrath, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{Spetryfikowany} permanently. The spell ends if the creature is petrified or the slowed condition is removed.

Sukces As critical success, but the target is initially @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1}

Mending.name: Naprawa
Mending.description:
Naprawiasz obrany za cel obiekt. Przywracasz mu 5 Punktów Żywotności za każdy krąg zaklęcia, potencjalnie usuwając status @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6dNUvdb1dhToNDj3]{Uszkodzony} jeśli ta naprawa podniesie Żywotność obiektu powyżej Progu Uszkodzenia. Nie możesz zastąpić brakujących części ani naprawić obiektu, który został całkiem zniszczony.

Wywyższenie (2.) Możesz obrać za cel niemagiczny obiekt o Naręczu nie większym od 1.

Wywyższenie (3.) Możesz obrać za cel niemagiczny obiekt o Naręczu nie większym od 2 lub magiczny obiekt o Naręczu nie większym od 1.

2.target: niemagiczny obiekt o Naręczu nie większym od 1

3.target: niemagiczny obiekt o Naręczu nie większym od 2 lub magiczny obiekt o Naręczu nie większym od 1

Mending.target: niemagiczny obiekt o Naręczu nie większym od lekkiego

Mental Map.name: Mentalna Mapa
Mental Map.description:
Pozyskujesz szczegółowe informacje o konkretnym miejscu odwiedzonym przez istotę bezpośrednio z jej umysłu, chyba że odeprze cię rzutem obronnym Woli. Cel może dobrowolnie odnieść porażkę w rzucie obronnym.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Porażka Zdobywasz kluczowe informacje o danym miejscu, co zapewnia ci premię sytuacyjną +2 do testów Sztuki Przetrwania w danym miejscu oraz do wszelkich testów umiejętności na rzecz Pozyskania Wiedzy o tym miejscu przez następne 24 godziny.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.8brCESGTl4pUIjhY]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Mentalna Mapa}

Krytyczna Porażka Jak przy porażce, ale jeśli chcesz, możesz wymazać z umysłu celu całą wiedzę o tym miejscu na 24 godziny.

Mercurial Stride.name: Mercurial Stride
Mercurial Stride.description:
Your form ripples as you take on the fluidity and toxicity of quicksilver. You partially shift into a liquid metal form and Stride up to twice your speed. During this movement, you can pass through one creature's space — without needing to attempt a check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Przedarcie Się} — by splitting into droplets of mercury and reforming on the other side, though you can't end your turn in such a space. Passing through a creature's space in this way exposes it to mercury poisoning, with a Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1}.

Porażka The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 2} and takes @Damage[(@item.level+2)d6[poison]] damage.

Krytyczna Porażka The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 2} and takes @Damage[((@item.level+2)*2)d6[poison]] damage.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k6 on a failure and 2k6 on a critical failure.

Message.name: Wiadomość
Message.description:
Cicho wymawiasz słowa, ale zamiast dochodzić z twoich ust, są one przenoszone bezpośrednio do uszu celu. Podczas gdy inni słyszą twoje słowa jedynie tak dobrze jak słyszeliby je przy sposobie w jaki je wymawiasz, cel słyszy je tak dobrze jakby stał tuż przy tobie. Cel może przesłać ci krótką odpowiedź w ramach reakcji, lub jako darmową akcję w jego następnej turze jeśli woli, ale aby to zrobić musi być w stanie cię dostrzec oraz być w zasięgu. Jeśli odpowie, wiadomość jest dostarczana bezpośrednio do twoich uszu, tak jak w wypadku oryginalnej wiadomości.

Wywyższenie (3.) Zasięg zaklęcia zwiększa się do 500 stóp.

Message Rune.name: Runa Wiadomości
Message Rune.description:
Rejestrujesz wiadomość o długości nie większej niż 5 minut a następnie wypisujesz specjalną runę na niepilnowanej płaskiej powierzchni lub niewielkim obiekcie w zasięgu. Dokładna natura wyglądu runy jest do twojej decyzji, ale jest ona widzialna dla wszystkich i musi mieć średnicę nie mniejszą niż 5cm. Określasz również kryteria aktywatora, które musi spełnić istota aby aktywować runę.

Przez czas trwania zaklęcia istoty, które spełniają kryteria aktywatora mogą dotknąć runy aby usłyszeć w swojej głowie nagraną w niej wiadomość, tak jakbyś mówił do nich telepatycznie. Wiesz kiedy ktoś odsłuchuje wiadomość, ale nie wiesz kto jej słucha. Możesz Odwołać to zaklęcie.

Wywyższenie (+2) Czas trwania zwiększa się co dwa kręgi zaklęcia, odpowiednio do 1 tygodnia, 1 miesiąca, 1 roku lub nieograniczonego czasu.
Message Rune.target: 1 niepilnowana płaska powierzchnia lub niemagiczny obiekt o lekkim Naręczu

Metamorphosis.name: Metamorfoza
Metamorphosis.description:
Wykorzystując swoje mistrzostwo w magii przekształcającej, ukrywasz formy w formach. Przemieniasz się w dowolną postać, którą mógłbyś wybrać za pomocą zaklęcia polimorfii znajdującego się w twoim repertuarze zaklęć, lub które mógłbyś przygotować na 8. kręgu lub niższym (włączając wszelkie wywyższone wersje zaklęć 8. kręgu i niższych, które znasz). Zyskujesz 40 tymczasowych Punktów Żywotności zamiast ilości normalnie przyznawanej przez tę postać.

Możesz Podtrzymać zaklęcie, aby przyjąć nową postać, której nie używałeś podczas tej metamorfozy. Odnawia to twoje tymczasowe Punkty Żywotności z tego zaklęcia.

Migration.name: Migration
Migration.description:
The targets naturally take on animal forms most fitting their movement and environment. Each target gains a land, burrow, climb, fly, and swim Speed of 40 feet, and can transform into a Tiny or Small animal most appropriate for a given movement and environment. It also gains immunity to mild, severe, and extreme cold and heat, along with any other immunities common to the local wildlife, at the GM's discretion. In exploration mode, a target can move much faster, at a travel Speed of 20 miles per hour.

A target can't Strike, cast spells, or use most manipulate actions in animal form, but it can resume its normal shape by Sustaining the spell. It can Sustain the spell again to resume animal form.
Migration.target: you and up to 5 willing creatures

Mimic Spell.name: Mimic Spell
Mimic Spell.description:
Aktywator A creature you're aware of within range Casts a Spell of the same tradition as mimic spell and of the same or lower rank.

You learn the secrets of a spell just by watching someone else cast it. Attempt to counteract the spell cast by the triggering creature. If the spell would be counteracted, you instead gain the ability to Cast that Spell without expending a slot.

On your next turn, you spend the same number of actions to Cast the Spell as the triggering creature, but you choose the targets (if any) and use your spell attack modifier or spell DC as appropriate. The spell is heightened to the same rank as mimic spell. The mimicked spell is of the same tradition as the spells you normally cast.

If you don't Cast the mimicked Spell by the end of your next turn, it is lost, unless you Sustain the knowledge of it. You can Sustain this knowledge for up to 1 minute, after which it is lost.

Mimic Undead.name: Mimic Undead
Mimic Undead.description:
You take death and wrap it about you like a cloak-your colors wash out and your skin grows cold to the touch. Your heartbeat, breathing, and similar life functions become very difficult to detect. Senses such as lifesense detect you as undead unless a creature succeeds at a Perception check against the spell's DC, and on a failed check, they don't detect you at all if they only sense living creatures. Detection spells that specifically sense living creatures must succeed at a counteract check against mimic undead to detect you. You gain a +4 status bonus to Impersonate an undead but physically intact version of yourself and can add your level as your proficiency bonus even if you're untrained. You don't gain these benefits to Impersonate any other sort of undead. Mindless undead usually don't have a reason to even attempt the Perception check to notice your Impersonation unless you interact with them in some way.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.xPVOvWNJORvm8EwP]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Mimic Undead}

Mind Games.name: Mind Games
Mind Games.description:
You lock minds with the target, trying to mentally subdue them. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli. Each time you Sustain this Spell, the target attempts another Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1} and the spell ends.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Porażka The target is stunned 1.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 2}.

Mind Probe.name: Sondowanie Myśli
Mind Probe.description:
Przesyłasz swoje myśli przez umysł istoty, przeczesując go w poszukiwaniu informacji. Uzyskujesz dostęp do wspomnień i wiedzy celu, chyba że odeprze cię rzutem obronnym Woli.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Porażka W każdej rundzie trwania zaklęcia możesz Podtrzymać zaklęcie, aby zadać inne pytanie i spróbować odkryć na nie odpowiedź. Przy każdym pytaniu cel może wykonać test Oszukiwania przeciwko twojemu ST zaklęć — jeśli cel odniesie sukces, nie poznajesz odpowiedzi, a przy krytycznym sukcesie cel podaje ci fałszywą odpowiedź, którą uznajesz za prawdziwą. Gdy raz zadasz celowi dane pytanie, ponowne zadanie go, nawet przy osobnym rzuceniu Sondowania Myśli, przynosi ten sam rezultat.

Krytyczna Porażka Jak przy porażce, a cel otrzymuje karę sytuacyjną –4 do testów Oszukiwania przeciwko twoim pytaniom.

Mind Reading.name: Czytanie w Myślach
Mind Reading.description:
Próbujesz odczytać myśli celu za pomocą pobieżnego mentalnego kontaktu. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli. Cel staje się następnie tymczasowo niewrażliwy na twoje czytanie w myślach na 1 godzinę.

Krytyczny Sukces Cel postrzega twoje niejasne, powierzchowne myśli z momentu kiedy Rzucasz Zaklęcie.

Sukces Dowiadujesz sie czy modyfikator Inteligencji celu jest większy, równy, czy niższy od twojego.

Porażka Postrzegasz niejasne, powierzchowne myśli celu, z momentu kiedy Rzucasz Zaklęcie, oraz dowiadujesz sie czy modyfikator Inteligencji celu jest większy, równy, czy niższy od twojego.

Krytyczna Porażka Jak porażka oraz przez czas trwania zaklęcia możesz Podtrzymać je aby ponownie odczytać powierzchowne myśli celu. Cel nie otrzymuje dodatkowych możliwości wykonania rzutu obronnego.

Mind Swap.name: Mind Swap
Mind Swap.cost: a pair of jeweled mirrors worth a total value of 50 gp × the level of the highest-level target;
Mind Swap.description:
This ritual allows two subjects to exchange minds, fully inhabiting one another's bodies. The two targets can be chosen from you, the secondary caster, or unrelated third parties present throughout the ritual. Normally, both targets must be of the same ancestry for the minds to be fully compatible, but at the GM's discretion, for a much higher cost, the targets can be from different ancestries; this requires much more adjudication of ancestry feats and abilities. When both targets are of the same ancestry, muscle memory and the influence of their soul allow them to carry over all their mechanical abilities into each new body, except they use the other body's heritage (and lineage, if any). The GM might rule that similar physiological changes can't be overridden with a mind swap.

If a body dies, the mind and spirit controlling it dies instantly. When the spell ends, the minds and souls snap back to their original bodies. At this time, if the original body is dead, the mind and soul attempting to return to that body die as well.

Krytyczny Sukces Each target's mind and spirit possess the other's body and can control it normally. The mind swap is unusually smooth, and the targets gain a +4 circumstance bonus to Deception checks to Impersonate each other. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.4FD4vJqVpuuJjk9Q]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Mind Swap (Krytyczny Sukces)}

Sukces Each target's mind and spirit possess the other's body and can control it normally.

Porażka The ritual has no effect.

Krytyczna Porażka The ritual is scrambled, sending a welter of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Zdezorientowany} memories into the target's minds. You and the secondary casters are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 2} for the next week.

Wywyższenie (9.) You can cast the ritual without a duration, leaving no magic to counteract. The effects are reversible only by another mind swap ritual or powerful magic like wish. This increases the cost of the ritual to 10 000 gp and is an evil act unless both targets are willing.
Mind Swap.target: 2 creatures of the same ancestry, of up to twice the rank of mind swap

Mind of Menace.name: Mind of Menace
Mind of Menace.description:
This spell wards against those who attempt to subvert your mind and turns mental magic back on them. When the spell is complete, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.hi56uHG1aAb84Zzu]{Fight with Fear} reaction; once you use the reaction, the spell ends.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.7IUPl6dQUktXZh5t]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Mind of Menace}

Mindlink.name: Umysłowięź
Mindlink.description: Łączysz swój umysł z umysłem celu i natychmiast przekazujesz mu mentalnie informacje, których zakomunikowanie zajęłoby w innym wypadku do 10 minut.

Mindscape Door.name: Mindscape Door
Mindscape Door.cost: incense and focusing diagrams worth a total value of the target's level (minimum 1) × 1 gp, for each target
Mindscape Door.description:
You project the targets into an immersive mindscape or cause them to exit one. You must be aware the mindscape exists, though you don't need to know specifics. The casters must be in physical contact with one another in a circle for the duration of the casting and all targets must be selected from these casters. Your bodies typically remain behind in stasis when you enter a mindscape, though some mindscapes pull you entirely into them upon entrance. If you enter a mindscape, you can leave only by using another mindscape door ritual, finding an exit within the nature of the mindscape, or when the mindscape ceases to exist. When exiting a mindscape, you typically return to your bodies or to the location where you entered the mindscape. If the mindscape's creator wants to prevent anyone from entering or exiting, the DC of the primary check is the creator's Will DC if that would be higher than the ritual's normal DC.

Krytyczny Sukces You transport the creatures as you intended and can leave a portal that lasts for an unlimited duration. It typically looks like an ordinary door or passage appropriate to the mindscape. Any target of the spell can enter or exit through this portal as they would an ordinary door. If you wish, you can make the door passable by anyone.

Sukces You transport the creatures as you intended.

Porażka You fail to enter or exit the mindscape.

Krytyczna Porażka Something goes horribly wrong. The GM decides whether mental feedback deals @Damage[9d6[mental]] damage to all ritual casters (@Check[will|dc:26|basic]) or 1k4 casters are unwillingly pulled into the mindscape (or ejected from it).

Wywyższenie (8.) The ritual targets up to 100 willing creatures, the critical failure damage increases to 20k6, and the critical failure save DC increases to 40.
Mindscape Door.secondarycheck: Arcana or Occultism, Deception or Diplomacy, Perception
Mindscape Door.target: ty i do 5 godzących się istot

Mindscape Shift.name: Mindscape Shift
Mindscape Shift.cost: focusing diagrams and incense worth 28 gp
Mindscape Shift.gmNote:
You attempt to transport the targets from a mindscape they're currently within into an adjacent, nearly identical mindscape, such as to or from the Willowshore mindscape into Heh Shan-Bao's mindscape — the mindscape in which Governor Heh Shan-Bao is trapped. Unlike the use of mindscape door, which projects the mind into a mindscape and leaves the physical body behind, mindscape shift teleports its targets entirely into the new mindscape. If the mindscape's creator wants to prevent anyone from entering or exiting it, the DC of the primary check is the creator's Will DC if that would be higher than the ritual's normal DC (note that in this adventure, Heh Shan-Bao doesn't seek to take this action against the PCs visiting his mindscape, as he has his own plans for them). When you successfully travel to the other mindscape, you and the targets appear in the same corresponding location you occupied in the previous mindscape, and if no such corresponding location exists in the target mindscape, the ritual automatically has a critical failure result.

Krytyczny Sukces You transport the targets as intended and can leave a portal back to the previous mindscape that lasts for up to 24 hours. It typically looks like an ordinary door or passage appropriate to the mindscape. Any target of the spell can enter or exit through this portal as they would an ordinary door. If you wish, you can make this door passable by anyone.

Sukces You transport the targets as intended.

Porażka You fail to transport the targets.

Krytyczna Porażka Not only do you fail to transport the targets, you also cause mental feedback to inflict @Damage[9d6[mental]] damage to all ritual casters (@Check[will|dc:26|basic] save).

Wywyższenie (8.) You can transport the targets to any mindscape you have visited before or have detailed knowledge of. Your arrival point within the target mindscape is somewhere you've visited, or somewhere chosen by the GM.
Mindscape Shift.primarycheck: Arcana or Occultism (eksperctwo) or Willowshore Lore
Mindscape Shift.secondarycheck: Arcana, Deception, Diplomacy, Occultism, Perception, or Willowshore Lore

Miracle.name: Miracle
Miracle.description:
You request aid directly from your divine source. Your divine source always refuses a request out of line with its nature, and it might grant a different request (potentially more powerful or better fitting its nature) than the one you asked for. A casting of miracle can do any of the following things.

  • Duplicate any spell from the divine list of 9. rank or lower to which you have access.
  • Duplicate any spell from another spell list of 7. rank or lower. It must be common or you must have access.
  • Produce any effect whose power level is in line with the above effects.
  • Reverse certain effects that refer to the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{Wish} spell.

The GM might allow you to try using miracle to produce greater effects than these, but doing so may be dangerous, or the spell may have only a partial effect.

Mirage.name: Mirage
Mirage.description:
You create an illusion that causes natural terrain to look, sound, feel, and smell like a different kind of terrain. This doesn't disguise any structures or creatures in the area.

Any creature that touches the illusion or uses the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Szukanie} action to examine it can attempt to disbelieve your illusion.

Wywyższenie (5.) Your image can also disguise structures or create illusory structures (but still doesn't disguise creatures).

Mirecloak.name: Mirecloak
Mirecloak.description:
You wrap the targeted creatures in thin, sickly green shrouds that sap information from attackers. The shroud settles about each target's shoulders, granting a +1 status bonus to AC and a +2 status bonus to Stealth checks, both only while the target is in dim light or darkness.

If a creature deals damage in melee to or touches a cloaked creature, the cloak wraps around the attacker, temporarily connecting the psyches of the cloaked creature and the attacker and violently prying a random piece of interesting information from the attacker's mind. The attacker takes 2k8 mental damage and must attempt a Will save.

Afterward, the spell ends for the cloaked creature, and the attacker is temporarily immune to mirecloak for 24 hours.

Krytyczny Sukces The attacker is unaffected.

Sukces The attacker takes half damage.

Porażka The attacker takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1}. In addition, the cloaked creature gleans a piece of information from the attacker's mind. The details and extent of this information are at the GM's discretion.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the attacker takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 2}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.mzDgsuuo5wCgqyxR]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Mirecloak}

Mirror Image.name: Lustrzane Odbicia
Mirror Image.description:
Trzy iluzoryczne odbicia ciebie samego wirują w twoim polu, potencjalnie przyciągając ciosy napastników. Każdy atak, który miałby cię trafić ma losową szansę na trafienie zamiast tego jednego z twoich obrazów. Jeśli obecne są wszystkie trzy obrazy, istnieje jedna czwarta szansa na trafienie cię (1 na [[/r 1d4]]{1k4}). Jeśli pozostają dwa, istnieje jedna trzecia szansy na trafienie cię (1-2 na [[/r 1d6]]{1k6}). Jeśli pozostaje tylko jeden obraz, szansa wynosi jedna druga (1-3 na [[/r 1d6]]{1k6}).

Kiedy obraz zostanie trafiony, jest niszczony. Jeśli atak nie trafia twojej KP ale nie jest krytyczną porażką, niszczy on obraz, ale nie wywiera żadnego dodatkowego efektu (nawet jeśli normalnie atak wywoływałby efekt przy porażce). Jeśli atak jest krytycznym sukcesem i trafiłby jeden z twoich obrazów, jeden z twoich obrazów jest nieszczony a atak staje się krytycznym sukcesem wymierzonym w ciebie. Kiedy wszystkie obrazy zostaną zniszczone zaklęcie kończy się.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.0PO5mFRhh9HxGAtv]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Lustrzane Odbicia}

Mirror Malefactors.name: Mirror Malefactors
Mirror Malefactors.description:
You completely surround a Large or smaller creature in a shimmering ring of illusory mirrors that follows it as it moves, even when the creature moves outside the range of the spell. These mirrors reflect the target, though if the target has no reflection, like a vampire, it's unaffected by mirror malefactors. As long as the target is surrounded by mirrors, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1}, and it can't reduce its frightened value.

When you Cast the Spell, the reflections leap from the mirrors and attack the target, dealing 7k8 mental damage with a basic Will save. On subsequent turns, this effect repeats the first time you Sustain the spell that turn. If the target succeeds at any Will save it attempts against mirror malefactors, the illusory mirrors shatter and the spell ends.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage for both the initial effect and on subsequent turns increases by 1k8.

Mirror's Misfortune.name: Mirror's Misfortune
Mirror's Misfortune.description:
You split into your real self and a mirrored version of yourself that curses would-be attackers with misfortune on their next attacks. When you cast this spell, you seem to split in two. As you do, you can Step to any adjacent square. In either your initial square, or another square adjacent to your initial square, an exact illusory duplicate of you appears. You decide a simple course of action for the duplicate to follow, such as to walk to a specific point or wave its hands in the air, but more complex routines are beyond its abilities. A creature can distinguish between you and the duplicate only if it spends an action to Seek and succeeds at a Perception check against the spell's DC.

If a creature takes a hostile action against the duplicate, the illusion shatters into mirrorlike shards, inflicting bad luck on the attacker's next few attacks as misfortune's toll for shattering the mirror. The attacker must attempt a Will save with the following effects; this is a curse and misfortune effect. When the duplicate shatters, the spell ends.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Porażka Within the next hour, the creature must roll its next two attack rolls twice and take the lower result.

Krytyczna Porażka Within the next hour, the creature must roll its next four attack rolls twice and take the lower result.

Mislead.name: Mislead
Mislead.description:
You turn yourself @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialny} and create an illusory duplicate of yourself. When you Sustain the spell, you can mentally dictate a course of action for your duplicate to follow that round. Your duplicate acts as though it had your full number of actions, though it can't actually affect anything in the environment. Both the duplicate and your invisibility persist for the spell's duration. Performing a hostile action doesn't end mislead's invisibility, just like a 4. kręgu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Niewidzialność} spell. A creature that determines the duplicate is an illusion doesn't necessarily know you're invisible, and one that can see your invisible form doesn't necessarily know your duplicate is an illusion.

If you Cast a Spell, attack, or otherwise interact with another creature, as a part of that action you can attempt a Deception check against observers' Perception DCs to convince them your duplicate used that action. This doesn't fool anyone who's aware your duplicate is an illusion, nor does it work if the attack obviously couldn't have come from the duplicate. For instance, if you fired a ray, you could make it look like it came from the duplicate as long as the duplicate was positioned appropriately, but if you attacked with a sword and your duplicate was across the room from the target, your Deception check would automatically fail.

Missed Cue.name: Missed Cue
Missed Cue.description:
You make the spell's target believe they had something incredibly important to say but forgot to say it, and now they've missed their opportunity. Sensations of overwhelming panic akin to stage fright flood the target's mind, causing them to suffer excruciating mental anguish and take 12k6 mental damage. The target might even become filled with the conviction that they've doomed themselves by missing their cue. The target must attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces The conviction of a missed cue is only a fleeting notion that passes quickly without any effect on the target.

Sukces The target takes half damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1}.

Porażka The target takes full damage and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2}. In addition, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} for as long as they remain frightened.

Krytyczna Porażka The target takes double damage and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 3}. In addition, the target is slowed 1 for as long as they remain frightened.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 2k6.

Mist.name: Mist
Mist.description: You call forth a cloud of mist. All creatures within the mist become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty}, and all creatures outside the mist become concealed to creatures within it. You can Dismiss the cloud.

Misty Memory.name: Misty Memory
Misty Memory.description:
Some say water holds memories or impressions of the past, and you can raise those memories to the surface to glimpse recent events. When you Cast the Spell, you fix your mind on an amount of time in the past, up to 24 hours ago. A mist rises from the target body of water, filling a @Template[burst|distance:30] and coalescing into a misty scene of the events that took place at that time within 60 feet of the water.

Any creature who can see the area can observe the images produced, which are a translucent white color and detailed enough to show a silhouette, outline, or contour of creatures and objects that passed through the area and the motions they took. Fine details, such as facial features or written letters, are too precise for the mist to form, and the scene is silent.

You can Sustain the spell to cause the mist to play events backward or forward, with each minute spent Sustaining corresponding to a minute of playback.

Strong winds from a magical source can disrupt this spell if the effect succeeds at a counteract check against your spell DC.
Misty Memory.target: 1 body of water of at least 5 square feet

Moment of Renewal.name: Moment of Renewal
Moment of Renewal.description: The targets experience a day's worth of recovery in an instant. Any detrimental effects that would be gone after 24 hours end, though this doesn't shorten the duration of any active spells affecting the targets. The targets regain Hit Points and recover from conditions as if they had taken 24 hours of rest, but they do not make their daily preparations again or gain any benefits of rest other than healing. The targets are then temporarily immune for 1 day.

Momentary Recovery.name: Momentary Recovery
Momentary Recovery.description: You instantly teleport yourself and any items you're wearing or holding from your current space to a clear space within range that you can see. If this teleportation would bring another creature with you-even if you're carrying it in an extradimensional container-the spell is lost. After you vanish but before you arrive, you can take up to 2 actions (or the number of actions you spent to cast momentary recovery, if it was fewer than 2 actions). You can't target any other creatures or objects with anything during these actions and any effect with a duration that you create during these actions ends immediately when you arrive. After you arrive, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} until the end of your next turn.

Monstrosity Form.name: Monstrosity Form
Monstrosity Form.description:
You transform into the shape of a legendary monster, assuming a Huge battle form. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. When you cast this spell, choose phoenix, cave worm, or sea serpent. While in this form, you gain the beast trait (for phoenix) or the animal trait (for cave worm or sea serpent). You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 20 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +28, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +30, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of monster you choose:

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.rEsgDhunQ5Yx8KZx]{Cave Worm}
    • Speed 40 feet, burrow 30 feet, swim 20 feet;
    • Melee 1 jaws (reach 10 feet), Damage 2k12+20 piercing;
    • Melee 1 stinger (agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 2k8+15 piercing plus 2k6 persistent poison;
    • Melee 1 body (reach 10 feet) Damage 2k8+20 bludgeoning;
    • Inexorable You automatically recover from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Sparaliżowany}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony} conditions at the end of each of your turns. You're also immune to being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony} and ignore difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.b8bfWIICHOsGVzjp]{Phoenix}
    • Speed 30 feet, fly 90 feet;
    • Melee 1 beak (reach 15 feet), Damage 2k6+12 piercing plus 2k4 fire and 2k4 persistent fire;
    • Melee 1 talon (agile, reach 15 feet), Damage 2k8+12 slashing;
    • Shroud of Flame (aura, fire, primal) 20 feet. You gain an aura of fire that extends out from you. A creature that enters or ends its turn within the aura takes 2k6 fire damage. A creature can take this damage only once per turn. You can activate or deactivate this aura with a Sustain action.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Eik8Fj8nGo2GLcbn]{Sea Serpent}
    • Speed 20 feet, swim 90 feet;
    • Melee 1 jaws (reach 15 feet), Damage 2k12+20 piercing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 25 feet), Damage 2k8+20 bludgeoning;
    • Spine Rake 2 (ruch) You extend your spines and Swim or Stride. Each creature you're adjacent to at any point during your movement takes 4k8+10 slashing damage (basic Reflex against your spell DC).

Wywyższenie (9.) You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 25 temporary HP, attack modifier +31, increase damage by one damage die, and Athletics +33.

Moon Frenzy.name: Moon Frenzy
Moon Frenzy.description:
A feral aspect overcomes the targets, filling them with strength and ferocity. Targets gain 5 temporary Hit Points, a +10-foot status bonus to their Speeds, and weakness 5 to silver. They also grow vicious fangs and claws, which are unarmed attacks. The fangs deal 2k8 piercing damage; the claws deal 2k6 slashing damage and have the agile and finesse traits. The targets use their highest weapon or unarmed attack proficiency with these attacks, and if they have weapon specialization or greater weapon specialization, they add this damage as well. On a critical hit with one of these unarmed attacks, the creature struck takes 1k4 persistent bleed damage.

The targets can't use concentrate actions unless those actions also have the rage trait, with the exception of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Szukanie}. A creature can attempt to end the spell's effect on itself by using a single action, which has the rage trait, to attempt a Will save against your spell DC; on a success, it ends the spell's effect on itself.

If a target is in the light of a full moon, it also grows by one size if it were Medium or smaller. This increases the reach of a Medium or Tiny creature by 5 feet.

Wywyższenie (6.) The temporary Hit Points increase to 10, the silver weakness to 10, and the damage dealt by the attacks to three dice.

Wywyższenie (10.) The temporary Hit Points increase to 20, the silver weakness to 20, and the damage dealt by the attacks to four dice.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.zRKw95WMezr6TgiT]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Moon Frenzy}

Moonbeam.name: Moonbeam
Moonbeam.description:
You shine a ray of moonlight. Wykonaj rzut ataku zaklęciem. The beam of light deals 2k6 fire damage. This is silver damage for the purposes of weaknesses, resistances, and the like.

Krytyczny Sukces The beam deals double damage, and the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} for 1 minute.

Sukces The beam deals full damage, and the target is Dazzled for 1 round.

Wywyższenie (+1) The ray's damage increases by 1k6.

Moonburst.name: Moonburst
Moonburst.description:
A powerful globe of chilling moonlight explodes in the area, dealing 8k10 cold damage to all creatures in the area, plus an additional @Damage[(@item.rank+1)d10[vitality]] damage to undead creatures.

Moonburst's cold damage is silver damage for the purposes of weaknesses, resistances, and the like. Each creature and object in the area must attempt a Reflex save.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature is unaffected.

Sukces The creature takes half damage.

Porażka The creature takes full damage.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature takes full damage and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiony} permanently. If the globe overlaps with an area of magical darkness, moonburst attempts to counteract the darkness effect.

Wywyższenie (+1) The cold damage increases by 1k10, and the vitality damage against undead increases by 1k10.

Moonlight Bridge.name: Moonlight Bridge
Moonlight Bridge.description:
You summon a bridge of radiant, shimmering moonlight.

The 10-foot-wide span must start at the ground on a point within range, and it extends as a horizontal plane, either in a straight line or at any angle up to 45 degrees upward or downward, for up to 120 feet.

This bridge has AC 10, Hardness 30, and 60 Hit Points, and it's immune to all damage (except force, spirit, and damage from Strikes with the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} property rune). You and your allies can cross the bridge normally, but other creatures simply pass through it if they try to do so. The bridge blocks physical, ethereal, and incorporeal attacks from crossing, whether from above or below.

You can Dismiss the spell.

Wywyższenie (+1) The length of the bridge increases by 20 feet, and its Hit Points increase by 20, and you can increase the width of the span by up to an additional 5 feet.

Moonlight Ray.name: Moonlight Ray
Moonlight Ray.description:
You unleash a holy beam of freezing moonlight. Make a ranged spell attack. The ray deals 5k6 cold damage; if the target has the unholy trait, you deal an extra 5k6 spirit damage.

Moonlight ray's cold damage is silver damage for the purposes of weaknesses, resistances, and the like.

Krytyczny Sukces The target takes double cold damage, as well as double spirit damage if a fiend or undead.

Sukces The target takes full damage.

If the light passes through an area of magical darkness or targets a creature affected by magical darkness, moonlight ray attempts to counteract the darkness. If you need to determine whether the light passes through an area of darkness, draw a line between yourself and the spell's target.

Wywyższenie (+1) The cold damage increases by 2k6, and the spirit damage against fiends and undead increases by 2k6.

Morass of Ages.name: Morass of Ages
Morass of Ages.description:
You surround yourself in temporal eddies that draw out time for those around you, making every step feel like an eternity endured. A creature in the emanation, or that later enters the emanation, must attempt a Fortitude save. The creature makes this save only once and uses the same effect for the duration of the spell. Each time you Sustain the Spell, you can choose to increase the emanation's radius by 5 feet, to a maximum of 60 feet.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Squares in the emanation are difficult terrain for the creature.

Porażka Squares in the emanation are difficult terrain for the creature, and the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} when it starts its turn in the emanation.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, plus the creature also becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Spętany}. The creature can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} against your spell DC to remove the restrained condition.

Mosquito Blight.name: Mosquito Blight
Mosquito Blight.cost: amber and rare incense worth 750 gp
Mosquito Blight.description:
You infest the area with tenacious, biting insects that disease and drain life from creatures in the area. Arthropods (insects, spiders, and similar invertebrates) are unaffected and instead gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, skill checks, saving throws, and Perception checks while within the area. All other creatures are harassed by insects and exposed to the disease witch's hunger when they enter the area and once per day thereafter that they remain in the area. As part of casting this ritual, you create a Tiny ritual insect hive (Hardness 5, 10 HP) that must remain in the ritual's area. If the hive is removed or destroyed, the ritual's effect ends 1 hour later.

Witch's Hunger (choroba)

Rzut Obronny Fortitude

Nadejście Objawów [[/r 1d6 #godzin]]{1k6 godzin}

Stadium 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabienie 1} (1 dzień)

Stadium 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabienie 2} (1 dzień)

Stadium 3 enfeebled 2 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} (1 dzień)

Stadium 4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Nieprzytomny}

Stadium 5 death

Krytyczny Sukces As success, and the disease is especially deadly, with Stage 3 instead causing unconsciousness and Stage 4 instead causing death.

Sukces You create the ritual hive and cast the ritual.

Porażka You fail to cast the ritual.

Krytyczna Porażka You fail to cast the ritual and instead cause ravenous insects to torment you, immediately exposing you to the witch's hunger disease.
Mosquito Blight.primarycheck: Nature (expert; you must be the Mosquito Witch)

Moth's Supper.name: Moth's Supper
Moth's Supper.description:
You sigh, and your breath transforms into delicate, black-winged butterflies and huge death's-head hawkmoths. They flutter about you briefly, and then range forth in search of sustenance- fresh-spilled blood, by preference, but rotting corpses, flowering plants, or even left-behind food will do in a pinch. They then return, perching on your hair or shoulders and whispering their secrets into your ears. This has three effects.

  • You heal 2k4 Hit Points every 10 minutes.
  • The first time during the duration when someone successfully Treats your Wounds, you regain an additional 4k4 Hit Points.
  • You gain an imprecise sense out to 30 feet that senses only freshly spilled blood and rotten flesh.

Wywyższenie (+1) The amount of Hit Points healed every 10 minutes increases by 1k4 and the amount of Hit Points regained from the first @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Opatrywanie Ran} increases by 2k4.

Mother's Blessing.name: Mother's Blessing
Mother's Blessing.cost: at least 1 gallon of clean river water
Mother's Blessing.description:
You attempt to purify and stabilize the life inside of Ulgrem-Axaan's last remaining clutch of eggs. With its blessing, you wash the eggs clean from the filth of undeath and bury them in warm sand by the banks of a river in Garund.

Krytyczny Sukces The ritual is successful and the eggs hatch, giving life to an ancient species brought to the brink of extinction by the destruction of their home.

Sukces As critical success, but only half of the eggs hatch (rounded up). You can try again with the remaining eggs.

Porażka No effect, and you must wait a week to try again.

Krytyczna Porażka 90% of the eggs shatter (rounded up). You must wait a month to try again.

Mountain Resilience.name: Mountain Resilience
Mountain Resilience.description:
The target's skin hardens like the stone of a mountain face. It gains resistance 5 to physical damage, except adamantine. Each time the target is hit by a bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing attack, mountain resilience's duration decreases by 1 minute.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.JHpYudY14g0H4VWU]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Mountain Resilience}

Wywyższenie (6.) The resistance increases to 10.

Wywyższenie (8.) The resistance increases to 15.

Wywyższenie (10.) The resistance increases to 20.

Movanic Glimmer.name: Movanic Glimmer
Movanic Glimmer.description:
You give the target animal a glimmer of awareness, not truly awakening it but allowing it to better understand its surroundings. The target gains a +2 status bonus to Perception checks and Will saves, and any Nature checks to Command the target Animal gain a +1 status bonus from its increased understanding. Additionally, if the target animal has the minion trait, it can take one action each turn even if its master doesn't use an action to Command it, which it can use to perform any basic action it knows. This doesn't prevent a target that was summoned from disappearing if its summoner doesn't Sustain the Spell, but does allow the target to perform one action before disappearing.

Wywyższenie (8.) You can target up to 5 animals.

Mud Pit.name: Błotnista Niecka
Mud Pit.description: Gęste, lepkie, głębokie na 1 stopę błoto pokrywa ziemię. Błoto to jest trudnym terenem.

Murderous Vine.name: Murderous Vine
Murderous Vine.description:
You summon a slithering, thorny vine that attempts to constrict and crush a foe against a wall or other surface. Make a spell attack roll against the target's Fortitude DC. On a success, the creature is grabbed and takes 3k6 bludgeoning damage and 2k8 piercing damage. At the end of that creature's turn, if it's still grabbed by the vine, it takes @Damage[(floor(@item.level/2))d6[bludgeoning]] damage.

The vine's Escape DC is equal to your spell DC. A creature can attack the vine in an attempt to break its grip. The vine's AC is equal to your spell DC, and the vine is destroyed if it takes 20 or more damage. Destroying or escaping from the vines ends the spell. You can Dismiss the spell.

Wywyższenie (+2) The initial bludgeoning damage increases by 1k6, the initial piercing damage increases by 1k8, and the damage a creature takes for ending its turn grabbed by the vine increases by 1k6.

Murmuration.name: Murmuration
Murmuration.description:
The target feels the brush of feathers against its skin and hears screeches in its ears, warning it to keep away from a creature you designate that's within 30 feet of you when you Cast this Spell (which can include yourself). Once per round, if the target moves closer to the designated creature, it must attempt a Will save or take 1k4 piercing or sonic damage.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target takes half damage.

Porażka Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia.

Krytyczna Porażka The target takes 1k4 sonic and 1k4 piercing damage, and if it attempts an attack roll or hostile skill check this round, it takes a –2 status penalty to the roll.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k4, or by 2k4 on a critical failure (1k4 of which is sonic and 1k4 of which is piercing).

Mushroom Patch.name: Mushroom Patch
Mushroom Patch.description:
You cause mushrooms to sprout in the area. The area becomes difficult terrain. When the spell is cast and at the beginning of each round, the mushroom's release a cloud of irritating spores. Creatures in the area must attempt a Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces Efekt nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} for 1 round. If the creature moves to outside area, they can spend 1 action to rub their eyes, removing the dazzled condition.

Porażka The creature becomes dazzled for 1 round.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature becomes dazzled and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} for 1 round.

Wywyższenie (3.) The range increases to 90 feet and the area increases to a 20-foot-radius burst.

Wywyższenie (6.) The range increases to 120 feet and the area increases to a 30-foot-radius burst.

Wywyższenie (9.) The range increases to 150 feet, the area increases to a 40-foot-radius burst, and when a creature would become dazzled, they become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiony} instead.

Musical Accompaniment.name: Muzyczny Akompaniament
Musical Accompaniment.description:
Otacza cię orchiestralna muzyka, która zmienia się i dostosowuje do twojego zachowania. Muzyka ta zapewnia premię statusową +1 do testów Występów. Wedle uznania MG może ona również zapewniać tę premię do testów Oszukiwania, Dyplomacji i Zastraszania ,jako że muzyka zmienia się podkreślając twoje działania w stytuacjach społecznych, chociaż niektóre istoty są niewrażliwe na tak oczywistą próbę wykorzystania magii aby wywołać w nich określone emocje. Muzyka przemieszcza się razem z tobą a jej maksymalna głośność to nie więcej niż cztery krzyczące osoby. Tak długo, jak gra muzyka, ponosisz karę –4 do testów Skradania Się. Nie masz wpływu na to, jaką dokładnie muzykę zagra zaklęcie. Muzyka nie wytwarza zrozumiałych słów lub śpiewu. Możesz Odwołać to zaklęcie.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.nLige83aiMBh0ylb]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Muzyczny Akompaniament}

Wywyższenie (2.) Czas trwania zwiększa się do 10 minut.

Musical Shift.name: Musical Shift
Musical Shift.description:
With a quick series of wrist flicks, music fills the air. While the music can be heard as if it were performed normally at a distance, creatures in the spell's area become affected in more significant ways. When you cast musical shift, select a key signature (to affect enemies) and a time signature (to affect allies) from the options below; all creatures within the area are affected as indicated. You can change the key signature or time signature as part of the action you take when you Sustain the spell.

Flat (key signature) Whenever an enemy critically fails at a Strike, saving throw, or skill check, they fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony} in addition to other effects from the critical failure.

Natural (key signature) Enemies take a –2 status penalty to attack rolls.

Sharp (key signature) Whenever an enemy takes piercing or slashing damage, they also take 2k6 persistent bleed damage.

Double (time signature) You and your allies become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Przyspieszony} and can use the extra action each round only for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap}, Stand, Step, or Stride actions.

Quadruple (time signature) You and your allies gain a +2 status bonus to attack rolls.

Triple (time signature) You and your allies gain a +2 status bonus to Armor Class and Reflex saving throws.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.1W1LZ3qrZLXr2Mn7]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Musical Shift}

Mutilate.name: Mutilate
Mutilate.description:
You cut your own body in a ritualistic manner, causing similar damage to a creature in your line of sight. These cuts are superficial and cause 1k4 slashing damage to you; however, the wounds that open up on our target's body are far deeper. The targeted creature takes 5k8 slashing damage; a creature that critically fails this saving throw also takes @Damage[(1d8 + @item.level -4)[bleed]] damage. If you cast this as a three-action spell, the spell instead affects a 5-foot burst.

Wywyższenie (+1) Increase the damage dealt to the target by 1k8, and increase the persistent bleed damage by 1.

Mycological Malady.name: Mycological Malady
Mycological Malady.description:
You infect your target with fungal spores to hasten the cycle of decay. The target must attempt a Fortitude saving throw. Undead that aren't incorporeal, such as skeletons and zombies, don't have their normal immunity to this disease, as the spores can still colonize their remaining flesh and bone. This might also apply to other non-living creatures made of organic material at the GM's discretion.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target sprouts mushrooms and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 2} for 1 round.

Porażka The target is afflicted with voidcap spores at stage 1.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is afflicted with voidcap spores at stage 2.

Voidcap Spores (disease) This disease ends when the spell ends;

Stadium 1 enfeebled 2 (1 runda)

Stadium 2 enfeebled 2 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} (1 runda)

Stadium 3 enfeebled 2, slowed 1, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 2} (1 runda)

Mystic Armor.name: Mistyczna Zbroja
Mystic Armor.description:
Ochraniasz się za pomocą połyskującej magicznej energii zyskując premię przedmiotu +1 do KP plus maksymalny możliwy modyfikator Zręczności +5. Kiedy nosisz mistyczną zbroję, używasz swojej biegłości w obronie bez pancerza do obliczania swojej KP.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.qkwb5DD3zmKwvbk0]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Mistyczna Zbroja}

Wywyższenie (4.) Zyskujesz premię przedmiotu +1 do rzutów obronnych.

Wywyższenie (6.) Premia przedmiotu do KP zwiększa się do +2 i zyskujesz premię przedmiotu +1 do rzutów obronnych.

Wywyższenie (8.) Premia przedmiotu do KP zwiększa się do +2 i zyskujesz premię przedmiotu +2 do rzutów obronnych.

Wywyższenie (10.) Premia przedmiotu do KP zwiększa się do +3 i zyskujesz premię przedmiotu +3 do rzutów obronnych.

Mystic Beacon.name: Mystic Beacon
Mystic Beacon.description: The next damaging or healing spell the target casts before the start of your next turn deals damage or restores Hit Points as if the spell were heightened 1 rank higher than its actual rank. This applies only to initial healing or damage when the spell is cast, not any ongoing effects. The spell otherwise functions at its actual rank. Once the target casts the spell, mystic beacon ends.

Mystic Carriage.name: Mystic Carriage
Mystic Carriage.cost: toy carriage, horse statues, rare incense, and feathers worth 50 gp
Mystic Carriage.description:
This ritual allows you and the other casters to conjure a magical carriage that transports you to a destination of your choice. To summon the mystic carriage, you must be within 250 miles of your destination and spend 1 hour burning incense and feathers while chanting the name of the location you wish the carriage to take you to. When it arrives, the carriage is a Large vehicle that can fit 4 Medium or smaller passengers, as well as 100 Bulk. It has a Speed of 60 feet, AC of 14, Fortitude saving throw modifier of +8, Hardness 5, 100 Hit Points (BT 50), object immunities, and immunities to critical hits and precision damage.

Once loaded and boarded, the mystic carriage sets out at a Speed of 60 feet, heading unerringly towards its destination using whatever roads and trails are available. If it's attacked, it continues going as long as nothing blocks its passage. If something blocks its way, living or otherwise, it will stop until the way is cleared, waiting to continue until all of its passengers are aboard once more.

Krytyczny Sukces You create a mystic carriage that lasts for 2 weeks, instead of 1 week. It can take you to up to two destinations, the first of which must be within 250 miles and the second of which must be within 250 miles of the first destination.

Sukces You create a mystic carriage as described above.

Porażka You don't create a mystic carriage.

Krytyczna Porażka You don't create a mystic carriage, and you're attacked by a herd of four riding horses.

Wywyższenie (+1) The carriage's AC, Fortitude save, and Hardness increase by 2, its Hit Points increase by 20, and its Broken Threshold increases by 10.

Nature Incarnate.name: Nature Incarnate
Nature Incarnate.description:
The primal power of the world flows through you. You transform into an incarnation of nature, either a green man or a kaiju.
