Your battle form is Medium for a green man or Gargantuan (30-foot-by-30-foot space) for a kaiju. While in this form, you gain the plant trait (for a green man) or the beast trait (for a kaiju). You can Dismiss the spell. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 25 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 30 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +34, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +36, unless your own is higher.

You gain specific abilities based on the incarnation you choose:

  • Green Man
    • Speed 40 feet, climb 40 feet;
    • Melee 1 vines (reach 30 feet, versatile P), Damage 6k8+12 bludgeoning;
    • Ranged 1 thorns (range 100 feet), Damage 6k6+6 piercing;
    • Green Caress (aura, primal) 60 feet. Enemies other than plants must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|against:spell] against your spell DC or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1} for 1 round (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 2} on a critical failure).
  • Kaiju
    • Speed 50 feet; resistance 5 to physical damage;
    • Melee 1 jaws (reach 30 feet), Damage 6k10+10 piercing;
    • Melee 1 claws (agile, reach 30 feet), Damage 6k8+8 slashing;
    • Melee 1 foot (agile, reach 15 feet), Damage 6k6+10 bludgeoning;
    • Unstoppable You are immune to being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony} and ignore difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain;
    • Trample 3 You move up to double your Speed and move through the spaces of Huge or smaller creatures, trampling each creature whose space you enter. A trampled creature takes foot damage with a @Check[reflex|against:spell|basic] save against your spell DC.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.hfcFc8cV5wF2evWP]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Nature Incarnate}

Nature's Bounty.name: Nature's Bounty
Nature's Bounty.description:
A palm-sized raw fruit or vegetable of your choice appears in your open hand. A creature can consume the food with an Interact action to regain 3k10+12 Hit Points and be nourished as if it had eaten a meal. If uneaten, the food crumbles to dust after 1 minute.

Wywyższenie (+1) The Hit Points restored increase by 6.

Nature's Enmity.name: Nature's Enmity
Nature's Enmity.description:
Animals, plants, and fungi in the area turn against the targets. Each target suffers from the following effects as long as it remains in the area.

  • Vegetation springs up from every surface, giving each target a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speed any time it's adjacent to the plants and fungi.
  • Aggressive animals attack unpredictably. At the start of its turn, each target rolls a @Check[flat|dc:8]. On a failure, it's attacked by creatures that deal @Damage[2d10[slashing]] damage. The target attempts a basic Reflex save and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda} for 1 round on any outcome other than a critical success.

  • The target loses any connection to nature or natural creatures. The target must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:5] when casting any primal spell or the spell fails. Furthermore, animal, fungus, and plant creatures become hostile to it, even one with a strong bond to the target, such as an animal companion.

The GM might decide that you can't subject some creatures, such as an emissary of a nature deity, to the ire of nature.

Nature's Pathway.name: Nature's Pathway
Nature's Pathway.description:
You step into a living tree with a trunk big enough for you to fit inside it and instantly teleport to any tree within 5 miles that also has a sufficiently large trunk. Once you enter the first tree, you instantly know the rough locations of other sufficiently large trees within range and can exit from the original tree, if you prefer. You can't carry extradimensional spaces with you; if you attempt to do so, the spell fails.

Wywyższenie (6.) The tree you exit can be up to 50 miles away.

Wywyższenie (8.) The tree you exit can be up to 500 miles away.

Wywyższenie (9.) The tree you exit can be anywhere on the same planet.

Nature's Reprisal.name: Nature's Reprisal
Nature's Reprisal.description:
The plant life within the area begins to writhe and lash out against your enemies as you call upon nature to impede your foes. To your enemies, the area becomes difficult terrain, and areas that were naturally difficult terrain due to plants become greater difficult terrain as well as hazardous terrain, dealing 6 poison damage to an enemy each time it enters an affected square.

Wywyższenie (+1) The poison damage of the hazardous terrain increases by 1.
Nature's Reprisal.target: all squares on the ground that contain plants in an 80-foot burst

Necromancer's Generosity.name: Szczodrość Nekromanty
Necromancer's Generosity.description:
Przesyłasz energię pustki przez swoją magiczną więź z nieumarłym sługusem aby wzmocnić tę istotę. Cel odzyskuje 1k8+4 Punktów Żywotności kiedy Rzucasz Zaklęcie i zyskuje na czas jego trwania premię statusową +2 do rzutów obronnych przeciw efektom witalności.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.cwetyC5o4dRyFWJZ]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Szczodrość Nekromanty}

Wywyższenie (+1) Leczenie zwiększa się o 1k8+4.

Necrotic Radiation.name: Necrotic Radiation
Necrotic Radiation.description:
You imbue the touched object or space with slow-acting necrotic radiation. If you cast the spell on an object, any creature ending its turn holding or carrying the object takes 2k6 void damage. If you cast the spell on an area, any creature ending its turn in the area takes 2k6 void damage. You can attempt to use this spell on an attended object by touching the object. If you do, the creature attempts a Reflex save to reduce the effect.

Krytyczny Sukces The object is unaffected.

Sukces The creature pulls the object away quickly. The spell only lasts 1 minute.

Porażka The creature manages to slightly protect the object. The spell lasts 10 minutes.

Krytyczna Porażka The spell lasts the full 24 hours.

Wywyższenie (+2) Increase the radiation's void damage by 1k6

Necrotize.name: Necrotize
Necrotize.description:
You necrotize part of a creature's body, harming it and debilitating it as its body putrefies, mimicking the natural process of decay. The target takes 12k6 void damage and one of the following debilitations; roll [[/r 1d4]] to randomly determine which. The effects depend on its Fortitude save.

  1. Bones The target's bones necrotize and become spongy and weak, giving it weakness 3 to bludgeoning damage.
  2. Joints The target's joints necrotize, making its movements ungainly and clumsy. It becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1}.
  3. Legs The target's legs necrotize, as well as any other limbs associated with forms of movement, making it harder for the creature to move. The target takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speeds. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.ndj0TpLxyzbyzcm4]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Necrotize (Legs)}
  4. Muscles The target's muscles necrotize, rotting away. The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 1}.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target takes half damage and the debilitation lasts until the end of your next turn.

Porażka Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia and the debilitation lasts for 1 minute.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia. and you can pick a second debilitation to apply, in addition to the one you rolled randomly. Both debilitations last for 1 minute.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6.

Needle Darts.name: Iglaste Rzutki
Needle Darts.description:
Wytwarzasz trzy igiełki z posiadanego fragmentu metalu i wysyłasz je w zwartym szyku w kierunku celu. Wykonaj rzut ataku zaklęciem przeciwko KP celu. Iglaste rzutki zadają 3k4 obrażeń kłutych i mogą wywołać krwawienie.

Igiełki otrzymują wszelkie specjalne właściwości metalu, z którego zostały wykonane; przykładowo, igiełki z zimnego żelaza zadają dodatkowe obrażenia istotom z podatnością na zimne żelazo. Wszystkie igełki są wykonane z tego samego metalu, a sam metal wraca do ciebie po wykonaniu ataku.

Krytyczny Sukces Cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia i obrażenia @Damage[(@item.level)[bleed]].

Sukces Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia.

Wywyższenie (+1) Wysyłasz dodatkową igiełkę zwiększając podstawowe obrażenia o 1k4 i zwiększając przewlekłe obrażenia od krwawienia przy trafieniu krytycznym o 1.

Needle of Vengeance.name: Needle of Vengeance
Needle of Vengeance.description:
A long, jagged needle jabs into the target foe's psyche whenever it tries to attack a creature your patron holds in special regard. Name yourself or one of your allies. The target takes 2 mental damage any time it uses a hostile action against the named creature, with a basic Will save.

Wywyższenie (+1) Increase the damage by 2.

Negate Aroma.name: Negacja Aromatu
Negate Aroma.description:
Cel traci swoją woń, co zapobiega jego wykrywaniu przez istoty za pomocą samego węchu, nawet jeśli dysponują one węchem jako zmysłem precyzyjnym lub nieprecyzyjnym. Istota wykonująca test Percepcji podczas Szukania za pomocą węchu połączonego z innymi zmysłami, może zauważyć brak naturalnego aromatu. Jeśli cel posiada jakiekolwiek zdolności polegające na jego zapachu, takie jak p, such as an przytłaczająca woń, umiejętności te również są negowane.

Wywyższenie (5.) Zasięg zwiększa się do 30 stóp i możesz obrać za cel zaklęcia do 10 istot.

Nettleskin.name: Nettleskin
Nettleskin.description:
Thorns sprout from your body; they pass through and don't damage any clothing or armor you wear.

Adjacent creatures that hit you with a melee or unarmed attack take 1k4 piercing damage as the nettles jab them and break off. Each time a creature takes damage in this way, nettleskin's duration decreases by 1 round.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k4.

Never Mind.name: Never Mind
Never Mind.description:
You drastically reduce the target's mental faculties. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli. The effects of this curse can be removed only through effects that target curses.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 2} for 1 round.

Porażka The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 4} with an unlimited duration.

Krytyczna Porażka The target's intellect is permanently reduced below that of an animal, and it treats its Charisma, Intelligence, and Wisdom modifiers as –5. It loses all class abilities that require mental faculties, including all spellcasting. If the target is a PC, they become an NPC under the GM's control.

Nightmare.name: Nightmare
Nightmare.description:
You send disturbing nightmares to your target. The next time the target falls asleep, it must attempt a Will save. If you know the target only by name and have never met them, the target gets a +4 circumstance bonus to the Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces The target suffers no adverse effects and is temporarily immune for 1 week.

Sukces The target experiences the nightmares but suffers no adverse effects other than unpleasant memories.

Porażka The target experiences the nightmares and awakens @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Wyczerpany}.

Krytyczna Porażka The target experiences the nightmares, awakens Fatigued, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 2} until it is no longer Fatigued.

Noise Blast.name: Huk Hałasu
Noise Blast.description:
W miejscu zaklęcia rozlega się kakofoniczny hałas, zadając 2k10 obrażeń od dźwięku. Każda istota musi wykonać rzut obronny Krzepy.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia oraz jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Ogłuchła} na 1 rundę.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota odnosi podwójne obrażenia, jest ogłuchła na 1 minutę oraz @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszona 1}.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k10.

Nothing Up My Sleeve.name: Nothing Up My Sleeve
Nothing Up My Sleeve.description:
You create an extradimensional space within each of your sleeves. If you're not wearing clothing with sleeves, the spell also produces a simple shirt with long sleeves for you for the duration. Each of the extradimensional spaces can hold objects and equipment, up to a total of 1 Bulk. Organic matter and living creatures can't be stored in these spaces. You are the only person who can access or perceive these extradimensional spaces.

You can Interact to place an object into the extradimensional space or to draw an object from the extradimensional storage. When you draw an object from the extradimensional storage, the object appears in one of your empty hands. If you don't have an empty hand, you can't draw an object from the extradimensional storage. For the duration, whenever you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ijZ0DDFpMkWqaShd]{Zgarnięcie Obiektu}, you can choose to place the palmed object directly into one of the two extradimensional spaces if that space has sufficient capacity to hold the object. When the spell ends or you die, the contents of both extradimensional spaces are ejected and land without harm on the ground in your space.

Noxious Metals.name: Noxious Metals
Noxious Metals.description:
This spell forces toxic metal to coalesce on the skin or surface of all living creatures in the area, dealing 4k6 poison damage with a basic Fortitude save. Any creature that has the plant trait, has the wood trait, or has an anathema toward metal, takes the following effects depending on the result of that Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature suffers no additional effects.

Sukces The creature takes @Damage[1[persistent,poison]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1} as long as it takes this persistent damage.

Porażka As success, except @Damage[1d4[persistent,poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 2}.

Krytyczna Porażka As success, except @Damage[1d8[persistent,poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 3}.

Wywyższenie (+1) The initial poison damage increases by 2k6.

Noxious Vapors.name: Toksyczne Opary
Noxious Vapors.description:
Roztaczasz chmurę toksycznych oparów, które tymczasowo ukrywają twoją sylwetkę. Wszystkie istoty poza tobą, w obszarze w którym Rzuciłeś Zaklęcie, odnoszą 1k6 obrażeń od trucizny (podstawowy rzut obronny Krzepy). Istota, która odniesie na rzucie obronnym krytyczną porażkę, staje się dodatkowo @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlona 1}. Wszystkie istoty w obszarze stają się @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysonięte} a wszystkie istoty znajdujące się poza oparami są przysłonięte dla nich. Opary te mogą zostać rozwiane przez silny wiatr.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k6.

Nudge Fate.name: Nudge Fate
Nudge Fate.description:
The barest spin of your patron's spool is enough to alter fate. When the target fails an attack roll, skill check, or saving throw and a +1 status bonus would turn a critical failure into a failure, or failure into a success, you grant the target a +1 status bonus to the check retroactively, changing the outcome appropriately. The spell then ends.

If you cast nudge fate while a previous casting of this hex is still in effect, the previous effect ends

Nudge the Odds.name: Szturchnięcie Szans
Nudge the Odds.description:
Zapewniasz sobie nadnaturalne szczęście kartach, kościach i innych grach losowych. Zyskujesz premię statusową +1 do testów Obeznania w Grach na rzecz hazardu, a kiedy odniesiesz na takim teście krytyczną porażkę, uzyskujesz zamiast niej porażkę; zaklęcie to jest natomiast zbyt krótkotrwałe aby wykorzystać je do testu na rzecz Zarabiania Pieniędzy przez hazard.

Kiedy jesteś pod wpływem szturchnięcia szans, jeden z widocznych na twojej twarzy elementów aparycji, taki jak kosmyk włosów czy tęczówka oka, przyjmuje charakterystyczny złoty kolor; MG wybiera jaki, kiedy rzucasz zaklęcie. Zmiana ta przeciwstawia się wszelkim magicznym próbom jej zamaskowania, chociaż może być ukryta lub zakamuflowana niemagicznymi sposobami. Istota zauważająca tę zmianę, może rozpoznać to zaklęcie z użyciem Pozyskania Wiedzy. W związku z tym, że zapobiega ono wielkim przegranym, hazdziści uważają szturchnięcie szans za odrażającą formę oszustwa. Jeśli zostaniesz przyłapany na jego używaniu tego zaklęcia, najpewniej spotkają cię poważne konsekwencje, w zależności od tego kogo oszukałeś.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.lTL5VwNrZ5xiitGV]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Szturchnięcie Szans}

Wywyższenie (5.) Premia statusowa zwiększa się do +2 a czas trwania zwiększa się do twoich następnych codziennych przygotowań. Jeśli będziesz regularnie zużywać komórki zaklęć aby podtrzymywać zaklęcie, pozwala ci to na używanie go do testów wykonywanych na rzecz Zarabiania Pieniędzy podczas przestoju.

Nullify.name: Nullify
Nullify.description:
Aktywator A foe within range casts a 9. kręgu or lower spell.

You instantly destroy the incoming spell, though at the cost of sending magical feedback through your body. You automatically counteract the spell, but the feedback brings you unavoidable harm. You lose 1k8 Hit Points per rank of the triggering spell.

Nymph's Grace.name: Nymph's Grace
Nymph's Grace.description: Your apparition manifests as a mask of unearthly beauty that bewilders your enemies. The first time an enemy enters the aura each round, or if they start their turn within the aura, they must succeed at a Will saving throw or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Zdezorientowany} for 1 round. While confused by this effect, the creature's confused actions never include harming you.

Nymph's Token.name: Nymph's Token
Nymph's Token.description:
You grant an ally a token of favor. You create a token, such as a lock of your hair or a flower, that persists for the spell's duration; as part of Casting the Spell, you can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to pass the token to an ally within your reach.

As long as the ally has the token on their person, they gain a +1 status bonus to Performance checks and Will saves.

You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} the spell as a free action.

Wywyższenie (4.) As long as the ally has the token on their person, you can cast spells that have a range of touch on them at a range of 30 feet.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.zjFN1cJEl3AMKiVs]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Nymph's Token}

Oaken Resilience.name: Dębowa Wytrzymałość
Oaken Resilience.description:
Skóra celu staje się twardą skorupą o konsystencji kory lub drewna. Cel zyskuje odporność 2 na obrażenia obuchowe i kłute oraz podatność 3 na ogień. Po odniesieniu obrażeń od ognia cel może Odwołać zaklęcie w ramach darmowej akcji wywoływanej odniesieniem obrażeń; zrobienie tego nie zmniejsza odniesionych obrażeń od ognia.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.HoOujAdQWCN4E6sQ]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Dębowa Wytrzymałość}

Wywyższenie (+2) Odporności zwiększają się o 2 a podatność zwiększa się o 3.

Oathkeeper's Insignia.name: Oathkeeper's Insignia
Oathkeeper's Insignia.description:
Aktywator You make a promise or deal.

A magical indicator assures a creature that you've upheld your end of a bargain. When you Cast the Spell, you create a bracelet, flower, or other such trinket. If, while the spell persists, you complete the terms of the promise or deal you made, the trinket fades away with a pleasant chime; if you violate the terms instead, the trinket breaks with a dissonant crash.

Wywyższenie (3.) The duration becomes 1 day.

Wywyższenie (5.) The duration becomes 1 week.

Wywyższenie (7.) The duration becomes 1 month.

Wywyższenie (9.) The duration becomes 1 year.

Object Memory.name: Object Memory
Object Memory.description:
By touching an object, you draw forth the experience of those who created and used it. If you touch a weapon, your proficiency rank with that weapon temporarily increases to trained (if it is not already trained or better). If you touch a tool, your proficiency rank with the next skill check you attempt with that tool (such as a Crafting check with a blacksmith's hammer) within the spell's duration temporarily increases to trained (if it is not already trained or better). This spell has no benefit for activities that take longer than a minute to complete.

Wywyższenie (6th) Your proficiency rank increases to expert instead of trained.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.uDOxq24S7IT2EcXv]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Object Memory (Weapon)}

Object Reading.name: Object Reading
Object Reading.description:
You place a hand on an object to learn a piece of information about an emotional event that occurred involving the object within the past week, determined by the GM. If you cast object reading on the same item multiple times, you can either concentrate on a single event to gain additional pieces of information about that event, or you can gain a piece of information about another emotional event in the applicable time frame.

Wywyższenie (2.) You can learn about an event that occurred within the last month.

Wywyższenie (4.) You can learn about an event that occurred within the last year.

Wywyższenie (6.) You can learn about an event that occurred within the last decade.

Wywyższenie (8.) You can learn about an event that occurred within the last century.

Wywyższenie (9.) You can learn about an event that occurred within the entirety of the object's history.

Oblivious Expulsion.name: Oblivious Expulsion
Oblivious Expulsion.cost: incense worth a total value of 150 gp
Oblivious Expulsion.description:
Severing ties with a member of a cult courts danger and threatens to undermine the secrecy of the group, whether that secrecy protects its worshippers or enables them to operate in the shadows. Many cults end their association with a wayward member on the edge of a blade, but there are options that preserve both secrecy and the life of the expelled member. An oblivious expulsion removes knowledge of the cult but is time-consuming enough that a cult usually reserves it for only the most well-regarded members who nevertheless need to be removed-or for sleeper agents the cult wishes to place among society and activate later.

It's difficult to cast this ritual unless the target is willing or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Spętany}. If the creature is unwilling to accept the ritual, it can attempt a Will save to negate the effect. The effects of the ritual depend on the results of your Occultism check.

Krytyczny Sukces The ritual removes all memories of the cult's activity, practices, and secrets from the target's memory. The target remembers only what an average citizen of the larger society would know, which is typically nothing or a few rumors with very little detail. The spell is hard to detect: a detect magic spell or similar effect must be a higher level than oblivious expulsion to detect it. You can Dismiss the spell. While casting the spell, you can choose to give the secondary casters the ability to Dismiss it. You can also choose to set a key phrase or event that causes the spell to be Dismissed. When the target witnesses this phrase or event, the spell immediately ends.

Sukces As critical success, except the spell isn't harder to detect with detect magic.

Porażka The ritual fails.

Krytyczna Porażka The ritual fails, and the target is temporarily immune for 1 month.

Ocean's Roar.name: Ocean's Roar
Ocean's Roar.cost: 1 or more boats or ships worth a total of 10,000 gp
Ocean's Roar.description:
You invoke consciousness in a large body of water, such as a coastline, lake, or lagoon. An ancient elemental spirit awakens in the water, seeking instantly to defend itself from aggressors or punish trespassers. You must cast this ritual either directly above the surface of the water or completely submerged at the bottom of the body of water. Such spirits are known to crash ships, devastate shores, and drag enemies under the waves, but can also respond favorably to competent casters.

This new entity must be appeased by those who sail it. Appeasing the spirit requires a @Check[diplomacy|overrideTraits:true] or @Check[nature|overrideTraits:true] check at the ritual's casting DC. Those negotiating with the spirit might make offerings to gain the spirit's favor, but such reprieve is short in duration and must be attempted each time a vessel passes near. The nature of these offerings is subject to the GM's discretion.

Krytyczny Sukces As success, except the spirit looks kindly on the caster and those who travel with them. The spirit never takes hostile action against them or any vessel they travel on and increases their swim Speed or their vessel's Speed by 10 feet while within the affected area. Additionally, the spirit's Strike gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.i18TlebMzwONyPhI]{Improved Grab} ability with an Athletics modifier of +38.

Sukces The spirit takes up residence in the body of water, defending it aggressively or attacking organized threats on adjacent shores. The spirit manifests as either a massive tsunami (GM Core 90, 96) that repeats every hour or a massive fist of water that can make a melee Strike every round against any target within the affected area. This Strike has a +33 modifier and deals 3k8+19 bludgeoning damage. The spirit can make this Strike against two targets within 30 feet, rolling once to attack and comparing the result against the AC of both targets.

Porażka The ritual has no effect, though tides and waves are more severe than normal for 24 hours.

Krytyczna Porażka The ritual backfires, causing four @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-monster-core.Actor.R427CMT90S7fv7MY]{Elemental Tsunamis} to appear surrounding the casters and attack them for their insolence. If not defeated, the tsunamis remain for 1 week, attacking any waterborne vessels within the targeted area.
Ocean's Roar.target: body of water no larger than a 7-mile radius area

Ocular Overload.name: Ocular Overload
Ocular Overload.description:
Just as a creature is about to attack you, you assault them with jarring illusions, completely surrounding their eyes with blinding flashes of motion and color. When the spell is complete, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ZJcc7KGOEsYvN6SE]{Overload Vision} reaction; once you use the reaction, the spell ends.

@Check[fortitude|name:Overload Vision|traits:illusion]

Ode to Ouroboros.name: Ode to Ouroboros
Ode to Ouroboros.description:
Aktywator A creature's dying condition would reach the value at which they would die.

Your ode staves off death. The target's dying condition remains 1 below the value at which it dies. This doesn't help prevent death from effects that kill the target without increasing its dying condition, such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r7ihOgKv19eJQnik]{Dezintegracja} and death effects.

Omnidirectional Scan.name: Omnidirectional Scan
Omnidirectional Scan.description:
You quickly view your surroundings from a variety of angles, your senses constructing an overall mental picture. You can choose to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Szukanie} the entire emanation of the spell.

Regardless of whether you Seek, target one ally and one enemy in the area; if a target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Schowany} from you, you automatically succeed at the flat check to target it with this spell. You prepare to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{Wsparcie} the target ally on an attack roll against the target enemy. If you take this Aid reaction, you use your spell attack modifier and proficiency rank on your check to Aid. If you critically fail the roll to Aid, you get a failure instead.

One with Plants.name: Jedność z Roślinami
One with Plants.description:
Możesz albo przemienić się w roślinę albo zjednoczyć z materią roślinną. Kiedy jesteś przemieniony, nie możesz się poruszać, ani wpływać na nic innego poza samą rośliną, ale możesz rzucać zaklęcia, tak długo jak nie wymagają one linii efektu wykraczającej poza roślinę. Możesz Odwołać to zaklęcie.

  • Zjednoczenie z Roślinami Czas trwania zaklęcia wynosi 10 minut. Rzucając zaklęcie musisz dotknąć rośliny o objętości dość dużej, aby pomieścić cię wraz z całym dobytkiem lub zaklęcie zostanie rozproszone. Kiedy pozostajesz zjednoczony z rośliną możesz słyszeć, ale nie widzieć, co dzieje się wokół niej. Jeśli roślina odniesie obrażenia, kiedy jesteś wewnątrz niej, jesteś wyrzucany z rośliny i odnosisz @Damage[10d6]{10k6 obrażeń}. Magiczne przejście wyrzuca cię bez zadawania obrażeń. Zaklęcie kończy się jeśli w którymkolwiek momencie znajdziesz się poza rośliną.
  • Zmiana w Roślinę Czas trwania zaklęcia wynosi 8 godzin. Stajesz się Dużą rośliną — na ogół drzewem. Testy percepcji nie zdradzają twojej prawdziwej natury, ale udany test Przyrody lub Sztuki Przetrwania przeciwko twoejmu ST zaklęć ujawnia, że wyglądasz na roślinę, która jest dziwnie nowa dla tej okolicy. Będąc w tej postaci jesteś w stanie postrzegać wszystko wokół ciebie używając swoich normalnych zmysłów. Jako roślina masz KP równą 20 i mają na ciebie wpływ jedynie statusowe premie, statusowe kary, sytuacyjne premie oraz sytuacyjne kary. Każdy sukces i krytyczny sukces, który wyrzucisz na rzucie obronnym Refleksu jest zamiast tego porażką.

One with Stone.name: Jedność z Kamieniem
One with Stone.description:
Możesz albo przemienić się w kamień albo zjednoczyć z kamieniem. Kiedy jesteś przemieniony, nie możesz się poruszać, ani wpływać na nic innego poza samym kamieniem, ale możesz rzucać zaklęcia, tak długo jak nie wymagają one linii efektu wykraczającej poza kamień. Możesz Odwołać to zaklęcie.

  • Zjednoczenie z Kamieniem Czas trwania zaklęcia wynosi 10 minut. Rzucając zaklęcie musisz dotknąć kamienia o objętości dość dużej, aby pomieścić cię wraz z całym dobytkiem lub zaklęcie zostanie rozproszone. Kiedy pozostajesz zjednoczony z kamieniem możesz słyszeć, ale nie widzieć, co dzieje się wokół niego. Jeśli kamień odniesie obrażenia, kiedy jesteś wewnątrz niego, jesteś wyrzucany z kamienia i odnosisz @Damage[10d6]{10k6 obrażeń}. Magiczne przejście wyrzuca cię bez zadawania obrażeń. Zaklęcie kończy się jeśli w którymkolwiek momencie znajdziesz się poza kamieniem.
  • Zmiana w Kamień Czas trwania zaklęcia wynosi 8 godzin. Stajesz się Dużym kamieniem. Testy percepcji nie zdradzają twojej prawdziwej natury, ale udany test Przyrody lub Sztuki Przetrwania przeciwko twoejmu ST zaklęć ujawnia, że wyglądasz na kamień, który jest dziwnie nowy dla tej okolicy. Będąc w tej postaci jesteś w stanie postrzegać wszystko wokół ciebie używając swoich normalnych zmysłów. Jako kamień masz KP równą 23 i mają na ciebie wpływ jedynie statusowe premie, statusowe kary, sytuacyjne premie oraz sytuacyjne kary. Każdy sukces i krytyczny sukces, który wyrzucisz na rzucie obronnym Refleksu jest zamiast tego porażką.

One with the Land.name: One with the Land
One with the Land.description:
You merge with an adjacent natural feature with enough volume to fit you and your worn and held possessions, such as the ground or a large tree. Your merged form is visible within the feature, and creatures can target and attack you normally, though you have cover and can use it to Hide or Take Cover within the feature. You can cast spells while in the feature as long as they don't require line of effect beyond the feature. You can Dismiss the spell. While merged, you gain the following additional benefits.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Mp7252yAsSA8lCEA]{Efekt Zaklęcia: One with the Land}

  • You immediately become aware of the surrounding terrain features, and you gain tremorsense as an imprecise sense with a range of 200 feet.
  • You can make terrain vengeance Strikes by commanding plants, rocks, and other natural features to attack your foes. These are melee Strikes that use your spell attack roll, can target any creature within 60 feet of you, and deal 5k12 @Damage[5d12[bludgeoning]]{bludgeoning}, @Damage[5d12[piercing]]{piercing}, or @Damage[5d12[slashing]]{slashing} damage. You choose the damage type each time you make a terrain vengeance Strike.
  • By spending a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can increase or decrease the environmental temperature changing it to either one step warmer than normal, one step colder than normal, or the normal temperature.
  • As a 2-action activity that has the concentrate trait, you can create or remove difficult terrain caused by natural terrain in a 20-foot burst within 200 feet. All of your alterations to the land end when the spell ends. Significant physical damage to the natural feature while you are inside it expels you and deals @Damage[10d6[untyped]]{10k6 damage} to you.

Oneiric Mire.name: Oneiric Mire
Oneiric Mire.description:
You shroud an area in illusory dreamstuff, making the ground look and feel like a deep mire or quicksand. Ground in the area is difficult terrain.

Each creature in the area when the spell is cast, or that enters the area, must attempt a Will save. On a failure, it believes it's being pulled down by the earth, taking a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds. On a critical failure, it's also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony}. In addition to the normal actions to Escape, at the end of an affected creature's turn, it can attempt a Will save, removing the effects on a success. On a critical success at any Will save made against oneiric mire, the creature fully disbelieves the illusion and no longer needs to make Will saves to risk a Speed penalty or being immobilized, though the area is still difficult terrain.

Ooze Form.name: Ooze Form
Ooze Form.description:
You invoke all things that seep and ooze, your body dissolving into a thick slurry and then reconstituting itself into a Medium ooze battle form. When you first cast this spell, choose black pudding, gelatinous cube, gray ooze, or ochre jelly. While in this form, you gain the ooze trait. You can Dismiss the spell. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 7 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • You are immune to critical hits, precision damage, and visual effects.
  • Resistance 5 to acid, piercing, and slashing damage.
  • No vision and motion sense 30 feet. You can sense nearby motion through vibration and air movement as a precise sense.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +14, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +14, unless your own is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the ooze:

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.EKdqKCuyWSkpXpyJ]{Black Pudding} Speed 15 feet, climb 15 feet;

    • Melee 1 pseudopod, Damage 2k6+5 bludgeoning and 1k8 acid.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.3zdBGENpmaze1bpq]{Gelatinous Cube} Speed 15 feet;

    • Melee 1 cube face, Damage 1k6+5 acid;
    • a creature hit by your cube face Strike must succeed at a Fortitude save against your spell DC or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Sparaliżowany} for 1 round on a critical failure); this save has the incapacitation trait.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.7tfF8ifVvOKNud8t]{Gray Ooze} Speed 15 feet, climb 15 feet, swim 15 feet

    • Melee 1 pseudopod, Damage 1k6+5 bludgeoning and 1k6 acid, and you can spend an action after a hit to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.Tkd8sH4pwFIPzqTr]{Grab} the target.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.PpkOZVoHkBZUmddx]{Ochre Jelly} Speed 15 feet, climb 10 feet; resistance 5 to electricity;

    • Melee 1 pseudopod, Damage 1k8+5 bludgeoning and 1k8 acid, and you can spend an action after a hit to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.Tkd8sH4pwFIPzqTr]{Grab} the target.

Wywyższenie (4th) Your battle form is Large, and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 30 temporary HP; resistance 7 to acid, piercing, and slashing; attack modifier +16; damage bonus +9; and Athletics +16. Your motion sense has a range of 40 feet.

Wywyższenie (5th) Your battle form is Huge, and your attacks have 15-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 40 temporary HP; resistance 10 to acid, piercing, and slashing; attack modifier +18; damage bonus +6 and double damage dice; and Athletics +20. Your motion sense has a range of 60 feet.

Wywyższenie (8th) Your battle form is Gargantuan (20-foot- by-20-foot space), and your attacks have 20-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 60 temporary HP; resistance 12 to acid, piercing, and slashing; attack modifier +28; damage bonus +13 and double damage dice; and Athletics +29. Your motion sense has a range of 60 feet.

Open the Wall of Ghosts.name: Open the Wall of Ghosts
Open the Wall of Ghosts.cost: rice grains and incense worth 60 gp
Open the Wall of Ghosts.gmNote:
Your research into the nature of the so-called Willowshore Curse has revealed a possible method of opening a doorway through the eerie Wall of Ghosts found west of town. By starting with a consecrate ritual and then applying Sangpotshi theories of the cyclical nature of life and reincarnation, along with insights gleaned from Zoudou's notes, you've created a magical ritual that can quiet the angry spirits that haunt this misty barrier and allow other creatures to pass through into the regions beyond. This ritual is unlikely to grant total protection from the ghosts or evil spirits within the wall itself, so once you open the wall, you and your allies might need to face additional dangers within before you can exit the other side. In addition, the ritual must be performed during a crescent or new moon (a time that equates to the second half of each month).

Krytyczny Sukces The ritual succeeds and offers unexpected protection while you're passing through the Wall of Ghosts. While navigating the Wall of Ghosts, you and the secondary casters to the ritual gain a +2 status bonus to Armor Class and saving throws.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.lGU4GIF2GUn21zFa]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Open the Wall of Ghosts (Krytyczny Sukces)}

Sukces The ritual succeeds.

Porażka The ritual fails.

Krytyczna Porażka The ritual fails spectacularly, and two of the ghosts trapped within the wall tear free and attack. Treat each of these ghosts as a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-monster-core.Actor.N98ug9jQHqeFoK1N]{Ghost Commoner}, save that their ghostly hand attacks deal mental damage rather than void damage.

Ordained Purpose.name: Ordained Purpose
Ordained Purpose.description:
You call upon the authority of cosmic forces of order, overwhelming creatures with remorse and agony for acting outside of their station and purpose.

Enemies in the area take 4k6 mental damage and must attempt a Will save. A creature that has lost abilities as a result of performing acts anathema to its deity or beliefs (such as a champion who violated their tenets and hasn't atoned) uses the outcome one degree of success worse than the result of its saving throw.

At the GM's discretion, a creature currently filling its appointed station and purpose (such as a farmer working in a field or a criminal in the act of committing a crime) uses the outcome one degree of success better than the result of its saving throw.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia and must @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.HYNhdaPtF1QmQbR3]{Drop Prone} as its first action on its next turn.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota odnosi podwójne obrażenia, must @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.HYNhdaPtF1QmQbR3]{Drop Prone} as its first action on its next turn, and can't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OdIUybJ3ddfL7wzj]{Stand} during its next turn.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6.

Organsight.name: Organsight
Organsight.description:
You see the target as though it's dissected and arrayed before you. For the duration, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on Medicine checks against the target that depend on its organs, but a –2 circumstance penalty on Medicine checks depending on seeing its skin.

When you Cast the Spell, attempt a special Recall Knowledge check using Medicine to spot and discern a vital organ. If you have a Lore skill appropriate to the creature, you can use that skill instead of Medicine. If you succeed, the next time you deal piercing or slashing damage to the target with a Strike or spell, you deal 4k6 additional precision damage. Once on each of your subsequent turns, you can use a single action to attempt the special Recall Knowledge check again. The extra damage isn't cumulative, so making the check more than once before a Strike or spell has no extra benefit.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Uj9VFXoVMH0mTTdt]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Organsight}

Wywyższenie (+1) The precision damage increases by 1k6.
Organsight.target: 1 living or undead creature that has organs

Osseous Cage.name: Osseous Cage
Osseous Cage.description:
You conjure a prison made of bone. Creatures in the space where you create the cage can attempt a Reflex save; if they fail or don't attempt the save, they're trapped within it. The spell automatically fails if the space contains a creature larger than the spell's area.

A creature inside the cage is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony} until it Escapes, uses an effect that can pass through solid objects, or destroys the cage. The cage has AC 10, Hardness 5, and 10 Hit Points, and it's immune to critical hits and precision damage.

The osseus cage provides lesser cover from attacks that pass through the cage, either from the outside to the inside or visa versa.

Wywyższenie (+2) The spell's area grows by 5 feet on aside and it's Hit Points increase by 20.

Outcast's Curse.name: Outcast's Curse
Outcast's Curse.description:
You afflict the target with a curse that makes its presence abrasive and off-putting. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces For 10 minutes, the target must roll twice and use the worse result whenever attempting a Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation, or Performance check, and creatures they encounter have an initial attitude toward them of one step worse (for instance, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.I1ffBVISxLr2gC4u]{Nieprzyjazny} instead of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fuG8dgthlDWfWjIA]{Obojętny}).

Porażka As success, but the effect is permanent.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, and creatures that the target encounters have an initial attitude toward them of two steps worse.

Over the Coals.name: Over the Coals
Over the Coals.description:
You accuse the target of breaking its word to you and invoke the wrath of your patron to claim what's due, demanding the target pay you in currency, fulfill an order, or stand down. The demand can't be obviously self-destructive, or the spell fails. If the target resists, you take your payment from its life force. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli. Regardless of the result of its save, the target is temporarily immune for 1 day.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected and is immune to your pact broker cantrips for 1 day.

Sukces If the target doesn't comply with your request by the end of its next turn, it takes @Damage[3d8[persistent,void]] damage. If it later complies, the spell automatically ends.

Porażka As success, but if the target doesn't comply, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 1} and takes @Damage[6d8[persistent,void]] damage.

Krytyczna Porażka As success, but if the target doesn't comply, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 2}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1}, and takes @Damage[6d8[persistent,void]] damage. Even if the target completes your commands later, the spell doesn't end until all the conditions end.

Wywyższenie (9.) You can target up to two creatures.

Overflowing Sorrow.name: Overflowing Sorrow
Overflowing Sorrow.description:
Sadness flows out of you into nearby creatures, blotting out any other thoughts they had. The first time a creature begins its turn in the area or enters the area, it must attempt a Will save. If it later leaves and reenters the area, it uses the same effect as before.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature is unaffected.

Sukces The creature takes a –1 status penalty to skill checks and Perception checks as long as it remains in the area.

Porażka While the creature is in the area, any emotion effects of lower counteract rank than overflowing sorrow are suppressed, and whenever the creature attempts to use an emotion action or cast an emotion spell, it must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:11|showDC:all] or the action or spell is disrupted.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the creature can't use emotion actions or spells.

Wywyższenie (+2) When you Cast the Spell, you can choose to increase the area by 5 feet.

Overselling Flourish.name: Przesadna Akcentacja
Overselling Flourish.description:
Aktywator Istota zadaje ci obrażenia.

Robisz z odniesionej rany wielkie widowisko. Ten wzmocniony magią spektakl, przedstawia rozpryski krwi, udręczone krzyki i inne przerysowane konsekwencje wydające się wynikać z ataku wroga. Wywołująca istota musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota jest zbita z tropu przez twój pokaz. Istota staje się @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczona} do początku twojej następnej tury.

Porażka Istota w pełni wierzy w realność twojego występu, odsłaniając się na atak. Istota staje się zamroczona oraz ma @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczoną Gardę} do początku twojej następnej tury.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota jest w całości zaabsorbowana twoim występem. Istota zużywa swoje pozostałe akcje obserwując cię w zdumieniu. Następnie pozostaje zamroczona i ma opuszczoną gardę do początku twojej następnej tury.

Overstuff.name: Overstuff
Overstuff.description:
Huge amounts of food and drink fill the target. It receives a full meal's worth of nourishment and must attempt a Fortitude save. A target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony} by this spell takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speed until it's no longer Sickened.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1}, but if it spends an action to end the condition, it succeeds automatically.

Porażka The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1}.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 2}.

Overwhelming Memory.name: Przytłaczające Wspomnienie
Overwhelming Memory.description:
Sprawiasz, że cel przypomina sobie określony typ wspomnienia wybrany z poniższej listy, przywołując go na pierwszy plan swojoj jaźni z doskonałą klarownością.

  • Radosne Wspomnienie sprawia, że cel śmieje się niekontrolowanie. Nie może używać reakcji.
  • Romantyczne Istota jest pochłonięta miłością do kogoś innego. Jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Zafascynowana} wspomnieniem.
  • Przerażające Istota jest przepełniona grozą i staje się @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażona 1}.
  • Tragiczne Istota jest przytłoczona smutkiem. Jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczona} od łez w oczach.

Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Wspomnienie wpływa na cel do początku twojej następnej tury.

Porażka Wspomnienie wpływa na cel do początku twojej następnej tury, a cel staje się @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 2} na czas trwania zaklęcia.

Krytyczna Porażka Jak przy porażce, ale cel staje się @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 3} na czas trwania zaklęcia.

Overwhelming Presence.name: Overwhelming Presence
Overwhelming Presence.description:
You surround yourself with supernatural splendor, appearing to be a god or similarly majestic being, with an appearance, regalia, and iconography of your choice. Targets must attempt a Will save. Regardless of the outcome, the target is then temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target must pay tribute to you two times. Paying tribute requires that the target spend a single action, which has either the move trait (as they bow) or manipulate trait (as they offer up a token in their hands). They must pay tribute at least once on each of their turns, if possible. While affected, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Zafascynowany} by you and can't use hostile actions against you.

Porażka As success, but the target must pay tribute a total of six times.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the target must spend all its actions paying tribute, and they cannot take other actions until the tribute is fully paid.

Owb Pact.name: Owb Pact
Owb Pact.description:
You call upon an owb to assist you in a goal. Only caligni callers can use this ritual with relative safety. If a different type of caligni attempts this ritual, they use an outcome one degree of success worse than the result of their check. If a non-caligni attempts this ritual, the result is an automatic critical failure.

Krytyczny Sukces You conjure the owb. It decides your goals closely match its own and doesn't request a favor in return.

Sukces You conjure the owb. It isn't eager to pursue the task, so it requires a favor in return.

Porażka You don't conjure an owb.

Krytyczna Porażka You conjure an owb, but it deems you unworthy and siphons away some of your soul energy. All casters become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 2}.

Pack Attack.name: Atak Stadny
Pack Attack.description:
You and one other target gain an uncanny coordination that helps you take down foes. You and the other target flank any enemy to which you are both adjacent, whether or not you are on opposite sides of the enemy's space.

Wywyższenie (5.) The spell can target you and up to 4 willing creatures touched.

Pack Breaker.name: Pack Breaker
Pack Breaker.description:
You can deceive creatures by changing their perception of their allies' behavior. Each affected creature suspects their allies have changed allegiance, depending on the outcome of their Will save. Regardless of the effects of the saving throw, the creature is then temporarily immune to pack breaker for 1 hour.

Krytyczny Sukces Efekt nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.I1ffBVISxLr2gC4u]{Nieprzyjazny} to all creatures to which it wasn't already hostile, even those that were previously allies. It treats no one as an ally for 1 minute. Each of its former allies within its reach must attempt a save against pack breaker.

Porażka As success, but the creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Zdezorientowany} for 1 round.

Krytyczna Porażka As success, but the creature is confused for 1 minute.

Pact Broker.name: Pact Broker
Pact Broker.description:
You offer to broker a pact of peace. If the target accepts and doesn't take hostile actions against you and your allies during the hex's duration, you take a –1 status penalty to Deception checks to Lie to them. If they refuse and take a hostile action against you or an ally during the hex's duration, they must first attempt a Will save. If they accepted the offer and then take a hostile action against you or an ally during the hex's duration, they must first attempt a Will save and treat the result as one category worse. Regardless of the outcome, the target is then temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Sukces The target is unaffected.

Porażka The target takes 2k4 mental damage and a –1 status penalty to attack and damage rolls against you and your allies for the hex's duration.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the penalty is –2.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.vFZ7hG2j2DIQGkXg]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Pact Broker}

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k4.

Painful Vibrations.name: Painful Vibrations
Painful Vibrations.description:
You send powerful sound waves through an opponent's body, vibrating its bones and internal organs painfully. The creature takes 8k6 sonic damage and must attempt a Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Cel odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1}, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Ogłuchły} for 1 round.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia. is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 2}, and is deafened for 1 minute.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6.

Painted Scout.name: Painted Scout
Painted Scout.description:
You press your hand to the stone, causing hand-drawn scouts to spread out from your fingers. As long as you keep your hand on the wall and Sustain the Spell, you can see, hear, and smell through the painted scout using whatever senses you have (including natural senses like scent or darkvision, or magical effects like @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{Dojrzenie Niedostrzegalnego}). You can move the scout up to your Speed along the wall each time you Sustain the Spell. The scout can move anywhere along the wall to a range of 120 feet as long as its path is unbroken; it treats sharp corners and particularly craggy spots on the wall as difficult terrain. The painted scout is bonded to the wall on which you created it and can't move onto another surface or material.

You can spend an action to make the scout @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Schować Się} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Przekradanie Się}, and you can roll a Nature or Occultism check in place of the usual Stealth check. The painted scout must be near a suitably obscured nook or cranny to Hide; it can't Hide or Sneak along a flat, featureless wall. If the painted scout is smeared or doused in water, the scout is destroyed and the spell ends.

Wywyższenie (6.) You create up to five separate painted scouts, and the range to which the scouts can move along the wall increases to 500 feet. Each time you Sustain the Spell, you can move one scout up to your Speed, and you can see, hear, and smell through all five scouts simultaneously. A destroyed scout can't be replaced, and the spell ends if all the scouts are destroyed.
Painted Scout.target: a cave wall or other stone surface

Paralyze.name: Paraliż
Paralyze.description:
Blokujesz impulsy nerwowe celu zanim zdążą opuścić jego umysł, co może sprawić, że zastygnie on bez ruchu. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Cel jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1}.

Porażka Cel jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Sparaliżowany} na 1 rundę.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel jest Sparaliżowany na 4 rundy. Na końcu każdej swojej turymoże on ponowić rzut obronny Woli aby zmniejszyć pozostały czas efektu o 1 rundę czy nawet przerwać go w zupełności przy krytycznym sukcesie.

Wywyższenie (7.) Możesz obrać za cel do 10 istot.

Paranoia.name: Paranoja
Paranoia.description:
Sprawiasz, że cel postrzega wszystkie inne istoty jako śmiertelne zagrożenie. Cel dopada silna paranoja kierowana wobec wszystkich otaczających go istot i musi on wykonać rzut obronny Woli.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Cel wierzy, że wszyscy, których widzi, stanowią potencjalne zagrożenie. Staje się @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.I1ffBVISxLr2gC4u]{Nieprzyjazny} wobec wszystkich istot, wobec których nie był jeszcze wrogi, nawet wobec tych, które były chwilę temu jego sojusznikami. Nie traktuje on nikogo jako sojusznika. Zaklęcie kończy się po 1 rundzie.

Porażka Jak sukces, ale efekt trwa 1 minutę.

Krytyczna Porażka Jak porażka, ale cel wierzy, że wszyscy, których widzi, to jego śmiertelni wrogowie. Używa swoich reakcji i darmowych akcji przeciw wszystkim, niezależnie od tego czy byli oni wcześniej sojusznikami, co określa MG. Poza tym zachowuje się w sposób racjonalny i zgodny z jego zwyczajnym zachowaniem oraz najpewniej preferować będzie atakowanie istot, które aktywnie go atakują lub mu przeszkadzają, nad atakowanie tych, które zostawiają go w spokoju.

Wywyższenie (6.) Możesz obrać za cel do 5 istot.

Parch.name: Parch
Parch.description:
Dry winds dehydrate a creature. The target must attempt a Fortitude save; if used on a creature that has the water trait or a creature made primarily of liquid (such as many oozes), the creature uses the outcome for one degree of success worse than the result. Creatures whose bodies contain no significant moisture (such as earth elementals) are immune to parch.

If a creature affected by parch drinks a liquid, such as a swig of water or a potion, the spell ends. Affected creatures that have the water trait or are made primarily of liquid, as well as affected creatures that can't drink, can end the effect as a two-action activity, which has the concentrate trait.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected.

Sukces The target takes a –1 status penalty to its checks and DCs for 1 round.

Porażka The target takes a –1 status penalty to its checks and DCs for 1 minute.

Krytyczna Porażka The target takes a –2 status penalty to its checks and DCs for 1 minute and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} as long as it has this penalty.

Wywyższenie (4th) You can target up to 4 creatures.

Part the Mists to Paradise.name: Part the Mists to Paradise
Part the Mists to Paradise.description:
You conjure a pathway to paradise, visible only to you and your allies through a dense cloud of magical mist. You and the other targets within range are transported through this mist to an extradimensional paradise of idyllic geographical features. Creatures within this paradise don't need to eat or drink. For each minute you spend within this paradise, all creatures within experience the benefits of 24 hours passing, gaining the healing benefits of a full night's rest, as well as the elapse of any afflictions or spells with day-long intervals. However, for any afflictions or spells with intervals measured in shorter periods of time, only one of those intervals passes for every minute spent within the paradise. This means that at the end of a minute, a creature can attempt a saving throw against a disease whose interval is 1 day, a poison whose interval is 1 minute, and a harmful spell that allows a saving throw each round. Each saving throw attempted while within the paradise gains a +4 status bonus.

You and your allies can act normally while within the paradise and can use the time to cast spells, Refocus, or perform other exploration activities that take less than 10 minutes. When the spell ends, you and all other targets depart the paradise, returning through the mists to your previous locations or in the nearest unoccupied spaces. You can Dismiss this spell.
Part the Mists to Paradise.target: you and up to 6 willing creatures

Path of Least Resistance.name: Path of Least Resistance
Path of Least Resistance.description: You trace several possible routes, quickly resetting the timeline until you find the safest one. Choose three spaces you could reach with two Stride actions. Each must be at least 20 feet from the other two. You Stride twice to one of the spaces, determined randomly by the GM from among the paths you chose. If some of the paths contain a hidden danger, such as a trap that you would trigger by walking into the trap's affected area, the GM doesn't consider this path when randomly determining which one you take, but if all options have a hidden danger, the GM randomly chooses between all three paths. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.

Patron's Puppet.name: Pacynka Patrona
Patron's Puppet.description:
Aktywator Zaczyna się twoja tura.

W odpowiedzi na twą niewypowiedzianą prośbę, twój patron tymczasowo przejmuje kontrolę nad twoim chowańcem. Panujesz nad swoim chowańcem, pozwalając mu na normalne podjęcie jego akcji w tej turze. Twoje Panowanie nie ma cech słuchowości ani koncentracji; twój patron przemieszcza swojego wysłannika w bezpośredni sposób.

Pave Ground.name: Pave Ground
Pave Ground.description:
You even out the ground and push aside low obstacles. Non-magical difficult terrain or greater difficult terrain composed of earth, rubble, sand, and the like in the area becomes normal terrain. You can attempt a counteract check against magical difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain composed of earthen materials in the area, too, making it normal terrain for the duration if you succeed. The ground doesn't change quickly enough to cause anyone to lose footing, and it doesn't clear concealing features enough to make them non-concealing. At the GM's discretion, if you use this spell on "ground" that has no underlying surface to flatten and clear, such as ice on the surface of a lake, the spell fails.

Wywyższenie (4.) The area increases to a @Template[line|distance:120] along the ground.

Wywyższenie (6.) The area increases to a @Template[line|distance:500] along the ground.

Peaceful Bubble.name: Peaceful Bubble
Peaceful Bubble.description:
An opaque shell of drifting, iridescent runes covers the area, creating a bubble. You can choose to make the burst smaller, in 10-foot increments. The runes don't block travel, but those inside the bubble can't perceive those outside it and vice versa. Detection and scrying effects are likewise blocked.

Creatures sleeping within the bubble are immune to dreams sent by spells. Those sleeping 8 hours reduce their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Zgubiony} condition by 2 instead of 1.

Peaceful Rest.name: Spokojny Spoczynek
Peaceful Rest.description:
Obrane za cel zwłoki nie ulegają rozkładowi ani nie mogę zostać przemienione w nieumarłego. Jeśli zwłoki staną się celem zaklęcia wymagającego aby ich śmierć nastąpiła w określonym odstępie czasu (na przykład, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IkGYwHRLhkuoGReG]{Powstanie z Martwych}), nie wliczaj czasu trwania spokojnego odpoczynku do tego czasu. Zaklęcie to zapobiega również pożeraniu ciała przez zwyczajne szkodniki i robaki (takie jak czerwie).

Wywyższenie (5.) Czas trwania zaklęcia jest nieograniczony, ale rzucanie go trwa jedną akcję dłużej oraz wymaga kosztu (płynu do balsamowania wartego 6 sz).

Penumbral Disguise.name: Penumbral Disguise
Penumbral Disguise.description:
You wrap the target in shadows, granting it a +1 status bonus to Stealth checks to Hide while in dim light or darkness. In addition, the shadows mask the target's features. While the target is in dim light or darkness, other creatures must succeed at a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Szukanie} action against the spell's DC to discern details about its appearance. For example, without using Seek, other creatures can determine the target's general shape (such as humanoid), but they must Seek to determine the target's precise appearance. Creatures with darkvision can still see the target and its features normally. The target's normal appearance is revealed in bright light.

Wywyższenie (4th) The status bonus is +2. Creatures with darkvision can no longer discern details about the target while the target is in dim light or darkness without Seeking, though creatures with greater darkvision can still determine these details.

Wywyższenie (6th) As 4th rank, except the status bonus is +3, and creatures without darkvision can't determine even general details about the target while the target is in dim light or darkness unless they successfully Seek the target; these creatures see a vague shadow instead. Even on a successful Seek, they only determine general features, though they can see details on a critical success.

Wywyższenie (8th) As 6th rank, except the status bonus is +4, and even creatures with greater darkvision must Seek to discern details about the target while the target is in dim light or darkness.

Penumbral Shroud.name: Całun Półcienia
Penumbral Shroud.description:
Otaczasz cel zasłoną cienia. Cel postrzega światło jakby było o jeden stopień ciemniejsze niż w rzeczywistości (przykładowo, jasne światło staje się słabym światłem), co wpływa odpowiednio na jego zdolność do postrzegania istot i obiektów.

Całun zapewnia też celowi premię statusową +1 do efektów światła. Ten efekt jest pomocny dla istot, które są wrażliwe na światło, a objęta nim istota może dobrowolnie zadecydować, że zostaje objęta efektem porażki rzutu obronnego przeciw zaklęciu.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Efekt trwa 1 rundę.

Porażka Efekt trwa normalną ilość czasu.

Perceive the Threads of Fate.name: Perceive the Threads of Fate
Perceive the Threads of Fate.description:
You open your mind to the grand design of existence, enabling you to view the threads of fate in all their complex, tangled glory. You attempt Perception checks and Reflex saving throws at mythic proficiency for the duration.

You can Sustain the spell once per round to untangle these threads. When you do, if your next action requires you to attempt an attack roll or skill check, you roll this check twice and use the higher result. You can untangle the threads of fate up to three times. After the third time, the spell ends.

Percussive Impact.name: Percussive Impact
Percussive Impact.description:
You lob a compressed ball of sound at a foe. The ball explodes on impact, unleashing a powerful blast of sound. Make a spell attack roll. If you hit, you deal 4k8 bludgeoning damage plus 1k4 sonic splash damage. On a critical success, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Ogłuchły} for 1 round.

Wywyższenie (+2) The bludgeoning damages increases by 4k8, the sonic splash damage increases by 1k4, and the duration of the deafened condition increases by 2 rounds.

Perfect Strike.name: Perfect Strike
Perfect Strike.description:
Aktywator You miss a Strike with an unarmed attack.

You call upon insight from your training to recover accuracy. Reroll the missed attack roll and keep the new result.

Perfected Body.name: Perfected Body
Perfected Body.description:
Aktywator You fail or critically fail a saving throw against an effect that has the morph, poison, or polymorph trait, or that would make you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Zgubiony}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{Spetryfikowany}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony}.

Your body's perfection keeps you just a little bit healthier than most. You get a failure if you rolled a critical failure or a success if you rolled a failure.

Perfected Mind.name: Perfected Mind
Perfected Mind.description: You meditate upon perfection to remove all distractions from your mind. Attempt a new Will save against one mental effect currently affecting you that required a Will save. Use the result of this new save to determine the outcome of the mental effect, unless the new save would have a worse result than the original save, in which case nothing happens. You can use perfected mind against a given effect only once.

Perfection of Essence.name: Perfection of Essence
Perfection of Essence.cost: special foods, herbs, and minerals worth a total value of 45 000 gp
Perfection of Essence.description:
Many have pursued alchemical means to immortality, and most haven't survived the attempt. The most common manner of purifying one's essence requires ingesting the following poison, and surviving the effects unassisted for at least a day.

Rzut Obronny @Check[fortitude|dc:43]

Nadejście Objawów 1 hour

Maksymalny Czas Trwania 5 days

Stadium 1 @Damage[7d12[spirit]] damage plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} (1 hour)

Stadium 2 @Damage[9d12[spirit]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Zdezorientowany} for 1 minute once every [[/gmr 1d4 #minutes]]{1k4 minutes}, plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 2} (1 hour)

Stadium 3 @Damage[9d12[spirit]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 3} (1 dzień)

Stadium 4 death

Anathema for this ritual is determined at the time of the ritual. You choose 1 anathema, and the GM chooses 2 anathema. You're aware of all of your anathema. Appropriate anathema might include avoiding physical contact with a certain creature or substance (such as members of your bloodline or jade), eating certain foods (such as meat or grains), or wearing certain items or materials (such as silk or cotton). If the ritual is ended in this way, you must conduct an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.7Fd4lxozd11MQ55N]{Atone} ritual before attempting this ritual again.

Krytyczny Sukces As success, except you choose 1 anathema and your GM chooses 1 anathema.

Sukces You've purified your body enough to attempt to attain immortality. You're bound by the ritual's anathema and must ingest the final potion to complete your apotheosis. Once you've withstood the effects of the poison for 1 day or completely recovered from the poison's effects without outside assistance, you gain immortality as follows: you don't age unless you wish to. You can't die except due to old age; if your dying or doomed condition would increase to a high enough value to kill you, it doesn't increase, and any effect that would instantly kill you instead just reduces you to 0 Hit Points. If you ever truly die and aren't returned to life within 1 year, you descend from the Heavens as an adult into a new mortal body somewhere in the world.

Porażka Your actions don't achieve immortality, and you automatically fail the first save against the poison.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, except the poison is also virulent.

Pernicious Poltergeist.name: Pernicious Poltergeist
Pernicious Poltergeist.description:
You create an echo of a powerful poltergeist, temporarily anchoring it to the area to terrorize and harm any opponents foolish enough to remain in the area. Because the poltergeist is a manifestation and is not truly present, it can't be attacked or hurt; it remains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialny} unless otherwise stated. When you Cast the Spell, and the first time you Sustain it on subsequent rounds, the poltergeist creates your choice of one of the following effects.

  • Deathly Assault (negative) The poltergeist focuses on one creature in the area and flies through that creature's space, dealing @Damage[4d10[void]] damage (@Check[fortitude|name:Deathly Assault|traits:void|basic] save).
  • Frighten (emotion, fear, mental) The poltergeist becomes visible, appearing as a skeletal, ghostlike humanoid. Creatures in the area must attempt a @Check[will|name:Frighten|traits:emotion,fear,mental] save, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2} on a failure.
  • Telekinetic Storm (force) The poltergeist hurls debris and quasi-real objects around in the area. All creatures in the area take @Damage[4d8[force]] damage (@Check[reflex|name:Telekinetic Storm|traits:force|basic] save).

Wywyższenie (+2) The damage of the deathly assault effect increases by [[/r 1d10]], and the damage of the telekinetic storm effect increases by [[/r 1d8]].

Perseis's Precautions.name: Perseis's Precautions
Perseis's Precautions.description:
Leaving nothing to chance, you weave divinatory precautions against an ambush, alerting the target to danger. Once during the duration of this spell, the target can roll one Perception, Arcana, Crafting, Lore, Occultism, or Society initiative roll twice and take the better result, after which the spell ends.

The strain of staying so prepared is too much for a mind to handle for long; the target is temporarily immune to this spell for 24 hours once the spell ends, whether they used the initiative benefit or not.

Persistent Servant.name: Persistent Servant
Persistent Servant.description:
You call forth an unseen servant and task it to perform a specific chore repeatedly. Choose a basic instruction, such as sweeping the floor, or picking up all objects from the floor and putting them in a designated bin. The servant performs the task over and over again throughout the duration, though it can't ever leave the spell's area.

The servant isn't a minion, and you don't need to Sustain the Spell in order for it to continue to act. However, it acts on its own time, and thus can't accomplish anything useful during an encounter, even if an encounter happens within the spell's range.

Tasks that rely on timing, discretion, or significant manual dexterity are doomed to failure. For instance, a servant tasked to pick objects off the floor won't discriminate between trash, misplaced treasure, or objects that are supposed to be on the floor, like a mousetrap.

Personal Blizzard.name: Personal Blizzard
Personal Blizzard.description:
Your patron's breath becomes blizzard of obscuring, scouring ice that follows your target. The target attempts a Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target takes @Damage[1d6[cold]] damage, and the spell ends.

Porażka The target takes @Damage[1d6[cold]] damage and @Damage[1d6[persistent,cold]] damage. The persistent damage automatically ends when the spell ends. It is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} to other creatures, and other creatures are concealed to it.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but both the cold damage and the persistent cold damage increase to 2k6.

Wywyższenie (+1) The cold damage and persistent cold damage increase by 1 (2 on a critical failure).

Personal Ocean.name: Personal Ocean
Personal Ocean.description:
You surround yourself in a bubble-like shroud of seawater that fills your space completely and moves with you. You can breathe, speak, and perceive normally while within your personal ocean, and you gain a swim Speed equal to your land Speed if you don't have one. The rules of aquatic combat apply to you, attacks targeting you, or attacks passing through your square. For instance, a bludgeoning or slashing melee attack targeting you would take a –2 circumstance penalty, and you can't cast fire spells or use actions with the fire trait.

Each time you move, you extinguish non-magical fires in spaces you pass through and can attempt to counteract magical fires you move through. If you successfully counteract a fire larger than the spaces you moved through, you merely push it out of the spaces along your path. If you fail to counteract a given fire, you can't counteract that fire for the duration of the spell.

You can Dismiss the spell.

Personal Rain Cloud.name: Osobista Chmura Deszczowa
Personal Rain Cloud.description:
Przyzywasz chmurę deszczową o szerokości 5 stóp, która podąża za celem wszędzie tam, gdzie on pójdzie. Pozostaje mniej więcej na wyciągnięcie ręki w górę ponad celem, chyba, że musi opaść niżej aby zmieścić się pod sufitem. Chmura nieustannie siąpi deszczem na cel, mocząc go i ziemię w jego pobliżu w obliczu każdego ruchu. Deszcz gasi niemagiczne płomienie. Cel zyskuje odporność na ogień 2. Istoty z podatnością na wodę odnoszą obrażenia równe ich podatności na koniec każdej swojej tury. Istota może wykonać rzut obronny Refleksu aby spróbować uniknąć chmury.

Wywyższenie (+1) Wartość odporności na ogień zwiększa się o 2.

Personal Runewell.name: Personal Runewell
Personal Runewell.description:
Area (continued) 15-foot radius, 30-foot-tall cylinder

The runelords of Thassilon pioneered the creation of runewells, magical artifacts that could extract and store the power of sin magic from mortal souls. A circle of light carves its way across the ground as you create your very own runewell, your personal rune flaring to life within it as you add your own sin to those seven revered in the past. Whenever any creature Casts a Spell within your personal runewell, the well resonates, with your choice of effects.

  • The runewell amplifies the power of your spells, as well as those of your allies. If the spell deals damage and doesn't have a duration, the well adds a status bonus to damage equal to the spell's rank.

    @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.ZwTwuNuvHuQhIjcu]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Personal Runewell}

  • The runewell punishes enemies foolish enough to attempt magic in your seat of power, firing arcane bolts at the spell's caster that deal 4k6 force damage, with a basic Reflex save.

If you cast personal runewell a second time, your previous personal runewell vanishes. You can Dismiss the spell.

Wywyższenie (+1) The amount of damage dealt by the runewell's bolts increases by 1k6.

PFS Note: Within the area of a personal runewell spell, the caster chooses the effect each time a spell is cast. This can be a different effect for different spells.

Pest Form.name: Postać Szkodnika
Pest Form.description:
Przemieniasz się w postać bojową Malutkiego zwierzęcia, takiego jak insekt, jaszczurka, kot czy szczur. Możesz określić dokładny typ stworzenia (na przykład szczur albo modliszka), ale nie ma to wpływu na Rozmiar i statystyki postaci. Będąc w tej postaci zyskujesz cechę zwierzę oraz nie możesz wykonywać Ciosów. Możesz Odwołać to zaklęcie.

Zyskujesz poniższe statystyki i zdolności:

  • KP = 15 + twój poziom. Ignorujesz kary do testów i redukcję Prędkości swojego pancerza.
  • Prędkość 20 stóp.
