  • Podatność 5 na obrażenia fizyczne. (Jeśli odniesiesz w tej postaci obrażenia fizyczne, odnosisz 5 dodatkowych punktów obrażeń.)
  • Widzenie w słabym świetle i nieprecyzyjny zmysł węchu na 30 stóp.
  • Modyfikatory Akrobatyki i Skradania Się +10, chyba, że twoje własne są wyższe; Modyfikator Atletyki –4.

Wywyższenie (4.) Możesz zmienić się w latającą istotę, na przykład ptaka, co zapewnia ci Prędkość latania 20 stóp.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.ydsLEGjY89Akc4oZ]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Postać Szkodnika}

Pet Cache.name: Skrytka na Zwierzątko
Pet Cache.description:
Otwierasz poły swojego ubrania lub składasz razem ręce, przenosząc cel do kieszonkowego wymiaru na tyle dużego aby spełnić wszyskie jego podstawowe potrzeby. Żadna inna istota nie może wkroczyć do tej przestrzeni międzywymiarowej a cel zaklęcia może przenieść ze sobą tylko te obiekty, które zostały zaprojektowane do noszenia przez istotę jego pokroju. Przestrzeń zawiera dostatecznie dużo powietrza, pożywienia i wody aby utrzymać istotę w zdrowiu do końca czasutrwania zaklęcia.

Możesz @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Odwołać} to zaklęcie. Zaklęcie kończy się również kiedy umrzesz, lub wkroczysz w przestrzeń międzywymiarową. Kiedy zaklęcie się kończy, cel pojawia się w najbliższej niezajętej przestrzeni (poza wszelką międzywymiarową przestrzenią, w którą potencjalnie wkraczałeś).
Pet Cache.target: 1 godząca się istota będąca twoim towarzyszem

Petal Storm.name: Petal Storm
Petal Storm.description:
You bring forth a cloud of razor-sharp flower petals that thrash violently in the wind. A creature that enters the storm or starts its turn in the storm is sliced by the razor-sharp edges of the petals. It takes 2k10 slashing damage with a basic Reflex save. A creature can take damage from the petals only once per round. At the end of the duration, the storm calms and the petals fall harmlessly to the ground.

Wywyższenie (+2) The damage increases by 1k10.

Petrify.name: Petrify
Petrify.description:
The target's body slowly turns into a stone statue. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Krzepy.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} for 1 round as stone begins to form on their body.

Porażka The target is slowed 1 and must attempt a Fortitude save at the end of each of its turns; this ongoing save has the incapacitation trait. On a failed save, the slowed condition increases by 1 (or 2 on a critical failure) as stone growths creep across their body. A successful save reduces the slowed condition by 1. When a creature becomes fully unable to act due to the slowed condition from petrify, the spell then ends in a flash of gray light, leaving the target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{Spetryfikowany} permanently as they become a statue. The spell also ends if the slowed condition is removed, which causes the stone to break off harmlessly.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the target is initially @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 2}.

Phantasmagoria.name: Phantasmagoria
Phantasmagoria.description:
You fill the targets' minds with endless images, like countless dreams and lives colliding with each other. The onrushing information deals @Damage[16d6[mental]] damage to each target, depending on its Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target takes half damage and can't use reactions until the start of your next turn.

Porażka Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Zdezorientowany} until the start of your next turn.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia and is confused for 1 minute.

Phantasmal Calamity.name: Phantasmal Calamity
Phantasmal Calamity.description:
A vision of apocalyptic destruction fills the mind of each creature in the area. The vision deals 11k6 mental damage (podstawowy rzut obronny Woli). On a critical failure, the creature must also succeed at a Reflex save or believe it's trapped (stuck in a fissure, adrift at sea, or some other fate in keeping with its vision). If it fails the second save, it's also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony} for 1 minute. It can attempt a new Will save at the end of each of its turns, and on a success, it disbelieves the illusion and recovers from the Stunned condition.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6.

Phantasmal Custodians.name: Phantasmal Custodians
Phantasmal Custodians.cost: rare oils, salts, and herbs worth a total value of 15 gp
Phantasmal Custodians.description:
Area 100 feet × 100 feet, up to 20 feet high

You create a long-lasting adaptation of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.xqmHD8JIjak15lRk]{Phantasmal Minion}, forming entities to carry out basic tasks at a fixed location.

Krytyczny Sukces The ritual creates six phantasmal minions. You don't need to concentrate on them, and they aren't summoned minions. You can spend an action, which has the concentrate trait, to command one to perform a basic task; it continues to perform the task until commanded again.

Sukces As critical success, but the ritual creates three minions.

Porażka The ritual fails to create any phantasmal minions.

Krytyczna Porażka The ritual creates six phantasmal minions, but these creatures are hostile and capable of making fist Strikes with an attack bonus equal to your skill modifier for the primary skill check, dealing 1k6 force damage. They attack you and your allies and attempt to break objects belonging to you and your allies within the area.

Wywyższenie (6.) If destroyed, the phantasmal minions reform the next morning. The cost increases to 30 gp
Phantasmal Custodians.secondarycheck: Arcana or Occultism (whichever isn't used for the primary check), Diplomacy

Phantasmal Killer.name: Urojony Zabójca
Phantasmal Killer.description:
Tworzysz w umyśle celu urojony obraz najstraszliwszej istoty, którą potrafi on sobie wyobrazić. Tylko cel zaklęcia widzi zabójcę, chociaż możesz dostrzec niewyraźną sylwetkę iluzji gdy naciera ona na cel. Efekt działania zabójcy jest zależny od rzutu obronnego Woli celu.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Cel odnosi 4k6 obrażeń mentalnych i jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1}.

Porażka Cel odnosi 8k6 obrażeń mentalnych i jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2}.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel jest tak przerażony, że grozi to jego śmiercią. Musi wykonać rzut obronny Krzepy; jeśli odniesie porażkę, umiera. Przy udanym rzucie obronnym Krzepy cel odnosi 12k6 obrażeń mentalnych, jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Uciekający} do końca swojej następnej tury oraz jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 4}. Ten efekt ma cechę obezwładnienia.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6 przy porażce oraz o 3k6 przy krytycznej porażce.

Phantasmal Minion.name: Widmowy Sługa
Phantasmal Minion.description: Przywołujesz @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.j7NNPfZwD19BwSEZ]{Widmowego Sługę}. Sługa ma względnie humanoidalny kształt. Możesz wybrać, czy ma być @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialny} czy posiadać efemeryczny wygląd, ale jest on w oczywisty sposób efektem magicznym a nie realną istotą.

Phantasmal Protagonist.name: Phantasmal Protagonist
Phantasmal Protagonist.description:
You create a phantasmal incarnation of a significant character from a novel, historical work, or religious parable. The phantasm is Medium, regardless of the size of the character as it was described in the inspirational work. When you Cast the Spell, decide what theme the protagonist is, choosing from hero, ally, or villain. The protagonist appears in an unoccupied space within range, and the first time each round that you Sustain the Spell, you can direct the protagonist to Stride or take the action granted by its theme. The phantasmal protagonist has a speed of 25 feet and an AC of 22. Its saving throw modifiers, Perception modifier, and skill modifiers are +12. It has 90 HP.

Hero: The protagonist takes the form of a legendary hero. Its thematic action is to attempt a melee Strike, using your spell attack roll to make the attack and inflicting 4k6+6 mental damage on a hit.

Ally: The protagonist takes the form of a recognizable support character. Its thematic action is to grant an adjacent creature 4k4 temporary Hit Points, which last for 1 round.

Villain: The protagonist takes the form of a notorious villain. Its thematic action is to harry and mock an adjacent target. The target must succeed at a Will save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} on a critical failure) until the end of your next turn.

Wywyższenie (+1) The protagonist's AC, saving throw modifiers, skill modifiers, and Perception modifier increases by 3, and its HP increase by 30. A heroic protagonist's damage increases by 1k6. An ally protagonist's temporary Hit Points granted increases by 1k4.

Phantasmal Treasure.name: Phantasmal Treasure
Phantasmal Treasure.description:
A phantasmal image of the most precious thing imaginable to the target appears in a location of your choice within the spell's range. Only the spell's target can see the treasure, though you can see the vague shape of the treasure-be it a pile of items, a deific avatar, or a cherished loved one or hero. The target's response to the treasure is based on the outcome of the target's Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Zafascynowany} with the treasure, and the duration is until the end of its turn. The target can also try to disbelieve the illusion if it touches the treasure, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seeks} to examine it, or speaks to it if the illusion appears to be a person or the like. If the target disbelieves the illusion, the spell ends.

Porażka As success, but the duration is 1 minute.

Krytyczna Porażka As success, but the duration is 1 minute. The target finds the treasure so appealing that until the spell ends, it must spend each action focused on it. This can include moving toward the treasure if the target isn't next to it, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interacting} with the treasure if the target is next to it. (If the illusion appears to be a person or the like, the target can also Interact to converse with it.)

Phantom Crowd.name: Phantom Crowd
Phantom Crowd.description:
A tightly packed crowd of humanoids appropriate to the area appear, facing you and agreeing loudly with anything you say. A creature that touches a member of the crowd or makes a Seek action to examine the crowd can attempt to disbelieve your illusion. The crowd is difficult terrain for anyone who hasn't disbelieved the illusion.

When you spend 1 or more actions to cast a composition spell or to perform an activity that includes a Performance check, you can also Sustain this Spell as part of that action.

Wywyższenie (+1) The crowd occupies an additional 10-foot square in range. The additional square doesn't need to be adjacent to any other square created by the spell. It can overlap, but there's no additional effect in the overlapped squares.

Phantom Orchestra.name: Phantom Orchestra
Phantom Orchestra.description:
You orchestrate an invisible ensemble of lost sounds captured inside errant breezes across the Plane of Air, and you can direct this symphony to attack foes within range. The sounds materialize and manifest as directed, appearing as silhouetted instruments and musicians that dance and bob in the wind.

When you Cast the Spell, a captured breath of ephemeral music explodes in a great crescendo, appearing in a space you choose within range. On subsequent rounds, the first time you Sustain the Spell each round, you can move your conjured melody to a space within range (if needed) and create another explosion of music.

Each explosion of sound from the phantom orchestra deals 8k6 sonic damage to all creatures in a 10-foot burst (basic Fortitude save). The phantom orchestra doesn't take up space, grant flanking, or have any other attributes a creature would.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k6.

Phantom Pain.name: Ból Fantomowy
Phantom Pain.description:
Celem targa iluzoryczny ból, zadając 2k4 obrażeń mentalnych oraz @Damage[(@item.level)d4[persistent,mental]]. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia wstępne ale nie odnosi obrażeń przewlekłych a zaklęcie natychmiast się kończy.

Porażka Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia wstępne oraz przewlekłe, oraz staje się @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1}. Jeśli cel przestanie być Zemdlony, przewlekłe obrażenia oraz zaklęcie kończą się.

Krytyczna Porażka Jak porażka, ale cel jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 2}.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k4 a obrażenia przewlekłe zwiększają się o 1k4.

Phantom Prison.name: Phantom Prison
Phantom Prison.description:
You completely surround a Large or smaller creature in immobile illusory walls, trapping it inside a false prison it can't escape. No other creatures see or feel these walls, and the target can't see anything outside of the illusory walls. The target can attempt a Will save when the spell is cast, each time it attempts to interact with or escape the walls, and each time something from outside the walls affects the target. On a success, it disbelieves the illusion and the spell ends.

Wywyższenie (8.) You can target up to 5 creatures.

Phantom Ship.name: Phantom Ship
Phantom Ship.cost: pearls or other gems worth a total value of 50 gp
Phantom Ship.description:
You create a link between a ship and an undead member of its crew to temporarily make the ship, and its passengers and crew, as incorporeal as ghosts. The targeted ship must be intact and on or near the surface of some water, and an undead who was a member of the ship's crew in life must be present for the entire ritual.

Krytyczny Sukces The ship and all creatures aboard it become incorporeal for 1 hour. During this time, the ship can sail at its top speed in any heading chosen by the primary caster, regardless of the winds. The ship can pass through any corporeal obstacles in its path (such as rocks or other vessels), but it must remain in contact with water or the ritual's effects end prematurely. Any skill checks required to sail the ship through rough weather gain a +2 status bonus. A creature that disembarks the ship while the ritual is in effect becomes corporeal again.

Sukces As critical success, but the status bonus to skill checks is only +1.

Porażka The ritual has no effect.

Krytyczna Porażka The ship, but not its passengers or crew, becomes incorporeal for 10 minutes, usually resulting in the passengers and crew falling through the ship into the waters below. If the ship was already sailing, it continues in its current direction at its current speed.
Phantom Ship.target: 1 ship no more than 175 feet long

Phase Bolt.name: Pocisk Fazowy
Phase Bolt.description:
Wskazujesz palcem i wystrzeliwujesz pocisk magicznej enrgii, który migoce to pojawiając się to znikając z rzeczywistości. Wykonaj rzut ataku dystansowy zaklęciem przeciw KP celu; jeśli cel ma jakąkolwiek premię sytuacyjną do KP (taką jak z tarczy lub z osłony), zredukuj wartość tej premii o 2 dla tego ataku. Przy sukcesie zadajesz 3k4 obrażeń kłutych. Przy trafieniu krytycznym cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia pocisku zwiększają się o 1k4.

Phase Familiar.name: Rozmycie Chowańca
Phase Familiar.description:
Aktywator Your familiar would take damage.

Your patron momentarily recalls your familiar to the ether, shifting it from its solid, physical form into a ghostly version of itself. Against the triggering damage, your familiar gains resistance 5 to all damage and is immune to precision damage.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.61Hl31nyzt63vvX9]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Rozmycie Chowańca}

Wywyższenie (+1) Increase the resistance by 2.

Phoenix Ward.name: Phoenix Ward
Phoenix Ward.description:
You raise a fiery shield around yourself, gaining resistance 10 to fire. If you take fire damage that would reduce you to 0 Hit Points, the phoenix ward absorbs any damage beyond the amount that would bring you to 1 Hit Point. The ward then heals you in a brilliant display of flames in the shape of a phoenix's wings and envelop you in light. You regain Hit Points equal to 4k8 + the absorbed damage; this is a healing vitality effect. The phoenix ward then ends, and you can't cast it again for 24 hours.

Wywyższenie (+1) The healing increases by 1k8.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.0eP0JRBPwfRyu7gN]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Phoenix Ward}

Physical Boost.name: Physical Boost
Physical Boost.description:
You temporarily improve the target's physique. The target gains a +2 status bonus to the next Acrobatics check, Athletics check, Fortitude save, or Reflex save it attempts.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.XT3AyRfx4xeXfAjP]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Physical Boost}

Pied Piping.name: Pied Piping
Pied Piping.description:
Your performance enraptures listeners, compelling them to follow you. Each creature within the emanation must attempt a Will save when you Cast the Spell or the first time they enter the area, after which they become temporarily immune for 1 day. Once per turn, you can Sustain the composition to increase the emanation's radius by 5 feet. You can Dismiss the spell.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Zafascynowany} with you.

Porażka The creature is fascinated by you and uses all its actions to move toward you and compliment your performance. This effect ends if a hostile action is used against the affected creature.

Krytyczna Porażka The target gains the minion trait and is controlled by you. This effect ends if a hostile action is used against the affected creature, or if you direct the creature to use any action that causes it harm.

Pillar of Water.name: Pillar of Water
Pillar of Water.description: You create a large, self-contained cylinder of still, clear fresh water. You choose the radius and height of the pillar, to a maximum radius of 15 feet and a maximum height of 60 feet. Creatures inside the pillar can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim} through the water as normal (@Check[athletics|traits:action:swim|dc:10]), or if the spell was cast on solid ground, walk along the bottom (which is difficult terrain). Any creature that exits the pillar falls or lands accordingly.

Pillars of Sand.name: Pillars of Sand
Pillars of Sand.description:
You raise one or more pillars of solid sand from the earth. The total height of the pillars is 30 feet, which must be used in 10-foot increments (for example, you could create three 10-foot-tall pillars, one 20-foot-tall pillar and one 10-foot-tall pillar, or one 30-foot-tall pillar). Each pillar is 5 feet by 5 feet in length and width. The pillars must be conjured on a relatively flat area of natural earthen terrain such as sand, dirt, stone, or clay. Regardless of the terrain, the pillars are always made of tightly compacted sand particles that together become as hard and solid as stone (@Check[athletics|dc:15|traits:action:climb] to Climb).

If a creature occupies the space where you cast this spell, it is carried upward atop the pillar. The creature can attempt a Reflex save (DC equal to the caster's spell DC); on a success, the creature can either attempt to Grab an Edge or move into an adjacent unoccupied square. If the pillar would rise higher than the ceiling, it firmly abuts the ceiling but does not rise any higher. A creature caught between a pillar and a ceiling takes no damage (subject to GM discretion, such as is in the case of stalactites or other hazards) but becomes immobilized. The creature can attempt an Escape check to free itself, but it must thereafter Grab an Edge, Climb down, or fall from the top of the pillar. The Grab an Edge and Escape DCs are the same as the Reflex save.

As part of your action to Sustain the Spell, you can choose to either destroy one of your pillars, causing it to immediately crumble into nothing, or create a new pillar, as long as doing so wouldn't exceed the total number of feet of pillar you can create. You can Sustain the Spell two or more times on a single turn to destroy or create a pillar.

Wywyższenie (+1) The total height of the pillars increases by 10 feet, but must still be used in 10-foot increments (this also increases the total number of pillars that can be created by one).

Pinpoint.name: Namierzenie
Pinpoint.description: Poznajesz nazwę dokładnej lokalizacji celu (w tym budynek, społeczność i kraj) oraz plan istnienia. Możesz obrać za cel istotę tylko wtedy, gdy widziałeś ją osobiście, posiadasz jedną z jej ważnych rzeczy lub masz kawałek jej ciała, taki jak kosmyk włosów. Aby obrać za cel obiekt, musi być to obiekt którego kiedyś dotknąłeś lub musisz mieć jego fragment. Namierzenie automatycznie pokonuje ochrony przed wykryciem o niższym kręgu niż to zaklęcie, nawet jeśli normalnie miałyby one szansę je zablokować.

Planar Displacement.name: Planar Displacement
Planar Displacement.cost: rare incense, precious metals, and purified chalk worth 500 gp
Planar Displacement.description:
You draw a ritual circle, and when the ritual is complete, you shift all creatures in the area to a different plane of existence. The skill you use for the primary check must be one that can be used to make a Recall Knowledge check about the intended destination, such as Arcana or Nature for the Plane of Fire or Occultism for the Astral Plane.

A secondary caster can be located at the exact site of the destination, instead of with you at the point of origin. If a secondary caster at the destination succeeds at its check and you roll a success, the ritual is a critical success instead.

Krytyczny Sukces You arrive on the intended plane at the last place one of the targets (of your choice) was located the last time the target traveled to that plane. If it's the first time traveling to a particular plane for all targets, you appear at a random location on the plane. The circle remains active for 1 minute, during which time any creature the ritual transported can return to the origin point with a single action, which has the concentrate trait.

Sukces As critical success, but you arrive 1k10×25 miles from your destination.

Porażka Your attempt is unsuccessful.

Krytyczna Porażka The ritual fails, and the GM determines whether you travel to the wrong plane or are barred from planar travel for 1 week.
Planar Displacement.requirements: planar key for the destination plane used as a locus
Planar Displacement.secondarycheck: Lore (related to the destination plane), Survival

Planar Palace.name: Planar Palace
Planar Palace.description:
You grow an extradimensional demiplane consisting of a spacious dwelling with a single entrance. The entrance connects to the plane where you Cast the Spell, appearing anywhere within the spell's range as a faint, shimmering, vertical rectangle 5 feet wide and 10 feet high. You designate who can enter when you Cast the Spell. Once inside, you can shut the entrance, making it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialny}. You and the creatures you designated can reopen the door at will.

Inside, the demiplane appears to be a mansion featuring a magnificent foyer and numerous opulent chambers. The mansion can have any floor plan you imagine as you Cast the Spell, provided it fits within a space 40 feet wide, 40 feet deep, and 30 feet tall. While the entrance to the mansion is closed, effects from outside the mansion fail to penetrate it, and vice versa, except for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5bTt2CvYHPvaR7QQ]{Teleportacja Międzyplanarna}, which can be used to enter the mansion. You can use scrying magic and similar effects to observe the outside only if they're capable of crossing planes.

A staff of up to 24 servants attends to anyone within the mansion. These are like the servant created by the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.xqmHD8JIjak15lRk]{Widmowy Sługa} spell, though they're visible, with an appearance you determine during casting. The mansion is stocked with enough food to serve a nine-course banquet to 150 people.

Planar Seal.name: Planarna Pieczęć
Planar Seal.description: Tworzysz widzialną magiczną barierę, która próbuje przeciwdziałać efektom teleportacji i podróży planarnych do lub z obszaru, w tym przedmiotom, które umożliwiają dostęp do przestrzeni międzywymiarowych. Planarna pieczęć próbuje przeciwdziałać każdej próbie przywołania istoty do obszaru, ale nie powstrzymuje istoty przed opuszczeniem obszaru, gdy przywołanie się kończy.

Planar Servitor.name: Planar Servitor
Planar Servitor.cost: rare incense and offerings worth a total value of 2 gp × the spell rank × the target's level, see text for more details
Planar Servitor.description:
You call upon a deity (or other divine power) to grant you aid in the form of a divine servitor of your deity's choice, with a level no greater than double the ritual's spell rank. The secondary casters explain what sort of assistance you need and why you need it; if the task is incredibly fitting to the deity, the GM can grant a circumstance bonus to the secondary Diplomacy check or rule that the check is automatically a critical success. If you use the ritual without good reason, the result is automatically a critical failure.

If the ritual succeeds, you must offer the servitor payment depending on factors such as the duration and danger of the task. Payment always costs at least as much as a consumable item of the creature's level, and often costs as much as a permanent magic item of the creature's level to persuade a creature to fight alongside you. Your offerings should align with the personal tastes of the deity.

You can alternatively name a being native to the deity's realm that you know personally, with the same level restriction. Such a creature might request something they personally want as payment.

Krytyczny Sukces The deity sends a servitor, and the servitor's payment costs only half as much as normal. If you ask for a particular servitor by name, the deity is likely to send that servitor unless the servitor is busy.

Sukces Your deity sends a servitor.

Porażka Your deity does not send a servitor.

Krytyczna Porażka The deity is offended and sends a sign of displeasure or possibly even a servitor to scold or attack you, depending on your deity's nature. A deity might also opt to strip divine powers from its followers who participated until they atone

Planar Tether.name: Planar Tether
Planar Tether.description:
You stitch the target to its current plane. While the target is affected by planar tether, the spell attempts to counteract any teleportation effect that would move the target, or any effect that would transport it to a different plane. Planar tether's duration is determined by the target's Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The effect's duration is 1 minute.

Porażka The effect's duration is 10 minutes.

Krytyczna Porażka The effect's duration is 1 hour.

Plant Form.name: Plant Form
Plant Form.description:
Taking inspiration from verdant creatures, you transform into a Large plant battle form. When you Cast this Spell, choose a listed battle form. You can substitute a similar specific plant to turn into (such as a pitcher plant instead of a flytrap), but this has no effect on the form's Size or statistics. While in this form, you gain the plant trait. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 19 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 12 temporary Hit Points.
  • Resistance 10 to poison.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +17, and your damage bonus is +11. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +19, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of plant you choose:

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.tu8FyCtmL3YYR2jL]{Arboreal}
    • Speed 30 feet
    • Melee 1 branch (reach 15 feet), Damage 2k10 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 foot, Damage 2k8 bludgeoning;
    • you can speak in this form
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.JrNHFNxJayevlv2G]{Flytrap}
    • Speed 15 feet; resistance 10 to acid;
    • Melee 1 leaf (reach 10 feet), Damage 2k8 piercing, and you can spend an action after a hit to Grab the target.

Wywyższenie (6.) Your battle form is Huge, and the reach of your attacks increases by 5 feet. You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 24 temporary HP, attack modifier +21, damage bonus +16, and Athletics +22.

Plant Growth.name: Plant Growth
Plant Growth.description:
Area 1/2-mile-radius circle centered on you

You cause the plants within the area to be healthier and more fruitful. In addition to other benefits of healthy plants, this increases the crop yield for farms, depending on your success. If you cast it in the area of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.7yWXx3qC4eFNHhxD]{Blight}, plant growth attempts to counteract the blight instead of producing its usual effect.

Krytyczny Sukces Double the crop yield in the area, or increase the area to a 1-mile radius.

Sukces Increase the crop yield in the area by one-third.

Porażka The ritual has no effect.

Krytyczna Porażka The flora in the area changes in an unanticipated way, determined by the GM but generally as contradictory to your true desires as possible (for instance, blighting crops when you would prefer to enrich them).

Pocket Library.name: Kieszonkowa Biblioteka
Pocket Library.description:
Tak jak Vil Seral, zbierasz zewsząd informacje i przechowujesz je w postaci książki w międzywymiarowej bibliotece. Kiedy rzucasz to zaklęcie, wybierz dowolną umiejętność, w której jesteś przynajmniej wytrenowany, i która posiada akcję Pozyskania Wiedzy.

W trakcie trwania tego zaklęcia, kiedy wykonujesz test Pozyskiwania Wiedzy z użyciem wybranej umiejętności możesz wydobyć z międzywymiarowej biblioteki księgę. Jest to częścią akcji Pozyskiwania Wiedzy. Musisz mieć w tym celu wolną rękę. Księga pojawia się w twojej ręce, otwarta na adekwatnej stronie. Zapewnia ci to premię statusową +1 do testu Pozyskania Wiedzy. Jeśli wyrzucisz na tym teście krytyczną porażkę, uzyskujesz zamiast tego porażkę. Jeśli rzut zakończy się sukcesem a celem Pozyskania Wiedzy była istota, zyskujesz dodatkowe informacje lub szerszy kontekst dotyczący istoty. Kiedy odniesiesz się do księgi ze swojej kieszonkowej biblioteki, zaklęcie kończy się.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.9ZIP6gWSp9OTEu8i]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Kieszonkowa Biblioteka}

Wywyższenie (3.) Premia statusowa zwiększa się do +2 i możesz odnieść się do swojej kieszonkowej biblioteki dwukrotnie przez zakończeniem zaklęcia.

Wywyższenie (6.) Premia statusowa zwiększa się do +3 i możesz odnieść się do swojej kieszonkowej biblioteki trzykrotnie przez zakończeniem zaklęcia.

Wywyższenie (9.) Premia statusowa zwiększa się do +4 i możesz odnieść się do swojej kieszonkowej biblioteki czterokrotnie przez zakończeniem zaklęcia.

Polar Ray.name: Polar Ray
Polar Ray.description:
You fire a blue-white ray of freezing air and sleet that deals 10k8 cold damage. Make a spell attack roll against the target.

Krytyczny Sukces Cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 2}

Sukces Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 2}

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k8

Pollen Pods.name: Pollen Pods
Pollen Pods.description:
Area four unoccupied 5-foot squares, each of which is at least 20 feet apart

You cultivate four wooden bulbs, each filled with toxic pollen and sensitive to motion. When a creature enters a space adjacent to a bulb, or when a bulb is touched or damaged (each bulb has AC 5), the bulb blossoms and releases pollen in a @Template[emanation|distance:15]. Creatures in the area take 8k8 poison damage and must attempt a Fortitude save with the following results.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature takes half damage and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} for 1 round.

Porażka The creature takes full damage, becomes dazzled for 1 round, and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 1} for 1 minute.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature takes double damage, is dazzled for 1 round, and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 2} for 1 minute.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 2k8.

Poltergeist's Fury.name: Poltergeist's Fury
Poltergeist's Fury.description:
Your fury spills over in a telekinetic storm of terrifying proportions. Any loose, unattended objects of 1 Bulk or less within range are picked up and begin to orbit you at breathtaking speeds. All creatures in the area take 6k4 piercing damage with a basic Reflex save. Each time you Sustain the Spell, you can increase the radius of the storm by 10 feet, to a maximum of 100 feet. The storm moves with you and provides you with lesser cover, though you can't use this cover to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Schować Się} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Przekradanie Się}. Allies within the storm who roll a success on their Reflex save against your poltergeist's fury get a critical success instead, as you attempt to avoid hitting them.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k4.

Portrait of Spite.name: Portrait of Spite
Portrait of Spite.cost: splendid art supplies worth at least 100 gp × the target's level, at least one pint of blood from the target;
Portrait of Spite.description:
Using the blood, you compose a portrait of the target in perfect health. Once the portrait is complete, you recite your grievances against the target and enact on the portrait the punishments you wish to see them face, choosing from the clumsy, enfeebled, drained, or stupefied condition.

The target must attempt a Will saving throw. You're only able to perform this ritual if you know the target's name and are able to see their face clearly in your mind's eye, and the secondary caster who performs the Crafting check must be able to paint or draw the target from memory. The target suffers the effects over the course of 1k6 hours, during which time the portrait transforms to reveal a caricature of the punishment you chose-muscles atrophied into nothing for enfeebled, pallid and sickly for drained, and so on. The target is immediately aware that they're under the effects of a magical ailment. If the duration expires or the target removes the curse with a remove curse or similar effect, their portrait slowly returns back to its original form. Destroying the portrait also ends the effect immediately.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is either @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 4}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 4}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 4}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 4}, depending on the punishment you chose. On a successful Will save, the condition value is 2, and the target is unaffected on a critical success.

Sukces The target is either @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 2}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 2}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 2}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 2}, depending on the punishment you chose. On a successful Will save, the condition value is 1, and the target is unaffected on a critical success.

Porażka The portrait doesn't change, and the ritual has no effect on the target.

Krytyczna Porażka The portrait turns into a sickening mimicry of your form and the forms of the secondary casters, and the blood of your target extracts itself from the canvas, dripping down and drying immediately to prevent you from reattempting the ritual. Over the course of the next 1k6 hours, you and the secondary casters experience the curse you had intended to place upon the target with the effects of a critical success.
Portrait of Spite.secondarycheck: Crafting, Occultism or Religion (whichever isn't used for the primary check)

Portrait of the Artist.name: Portrait of the Artist
Portrait of the Artist.description:
You change your appearance to look like a well-known artist talented at a particular craft or performance, such as a painter, singer, or orator, with the effects of illusory disguise. Additionally, you appear to mimic their skill, although such appearances are merely an illusion. If they are famous for physical art, the spell creates illusions of physical artwork matching their style, and onlookers who don't disbelieve are convinced these works are as impressive as the real thing. If they are famous for their ability to perform, you create an illusory performance that tricks onlookers into thinking you are as skillful as the performer you're pretending to be. The audience can disbelieve this spell if they interact with your art or actively listen to the performance, using either Perception or an appropriate Lore, whichever is higher. When the duration ends, any fake art disappears, and those who were duped by a performance realize it wasn't as good as they thought, though they still might not discover that you weren't really the artist you claimed to be.

This spell can't grant you any benefits from special abilities that take such skill they require a Performance check, such as the lingering performance focus spell. Using the spell to maintain the ruse long enough to Earn Income from your art is also quite difficult; because it requires careful timing and repeated deceit, it can't be assumed to automatically work on an Earn Income check.

Positive Attunement.name: Positive Attunement
Positive Attunement.description:
You attune a creature to the Forge of Creation, connecting its life force without fully transporting it. The creature's appearance becomes more brightly colored. If the creature is living, it heals 1k8 Hit Points immediately and at the end of each of your turns. Effects that increase healing only increase the initial healing.

If the creature is undead or has void healing, it instead takes 1k8 vitality damage, depending on the result of its Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature is damaged once and the spell ends.

Porażka The creature is damaged immediately and at the end of each of your turns (so twice in the round you Cast the Spell).

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, and the damage is doubled.

Wywyższenie (+3) The damage and healing each increase by 1k8.

Possession.name: Possession
Possession.description:
You send your mind and soul into the target's body, attempting to take control. The target must attempt a Will save. If you want to exert less control over the target, you can choose to use the effects of any degree of success more favorable to the target.

While you're possessing a target, your own body is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Nieprzytomny} and can't wake up normally. You can sense everything the possessed target does. You can Dismiss this spell. If the possessed body dies, the spell ends and you must succeed at a Fortitude save against your spell DC or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Sparaliżowany} for 1 hour, or 24 hours on a critical failure. If the spell ends during an encounter, you act just before the possessed creature's initiative.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected.

Sukces You possess the target but can't control it. You ride along in the body while the spell lasts.

Porażka You possess the target and take partial control of it. You no longer have a separate turn; instead, you might control the target. At the start of each of the target's turns, it attempts another Will save. If it fails, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Kontrolowany} by you on that turn; if it succeeds, it chooses its own actions; and if it critically succeeds, it forces you out and the spell ends.

Krytyczna Porażka You possess the target fully, and it can only watch as you manipulate it like a puppet. The target is controlled by you.

Wywyższenie (9th) The duration is 10 minutes, and you can physically enter the creature's body, protecting your physical body while the spell lasts.

Power Word Blind.name: Power Word Blind
Power Word Blind.description:
You utter an arcane word of power that can make the target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiony} upon hearing it. Once targeted, the target is then temporarily immune for 10 minutes. The effect of the spell depends on the target's level.

11. or Lower The target is Blinded permanently.

12.-13. The target is Blinded for [[/r 1d4 #minutes]]{1k4 minutes}.

14. or Higher The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} for 1 minute.

Wywyższenie (+1) The levels at which each outcome applies increase by 2.

Power Word Kill.name: Power Word Kill
Power Word Kill.description:
You utter the most powerful arcane word of power. Once targeted, the target is then temporarily immune for 10 minutes. The effect of the spell depends on the target's level.

  • 14. or Lower The target dies instantly.
  • 15. If the target has 50 Hit Points or fewer, it dies instantly; otherwise, it drops to 0 Hit Points and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Umierający 1}, or increases its Dying condition by 1 if it's already Dying.
  • 16. or Higher The target takes 50 damage; if this brings the target to 0 Hit Points, the target dies instantly.

Wywyższenie (10.) The levels at which each outcome applies increase by 2.

Power Word Stun.name: Power Word Stun
Power Word Stun.description:
You stun the target with an arcane word of power. Once targeted, the target is then temporarily immune for 10 minutes.

The effect of the spell depends on the target's level.

  • 13. or Lower The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony} for [[/r 1d6 #rounds]]{1k6 rounds}.
  • 14.-15. The target is Stunned for 1 round.
  • 16. or Higher The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1}.

Wywyższenie (+1) The levels at which each outcome applies increase by 2.

Power of the Beasts.name: Power of the Beasts
Power of the Beasts.cost: bones, teeth, or claws of beasts worth 150 gp
Power of the Beasts.description:
To simply kill the magical beasts who populate Tian Xia is needless and wasteful. The gods reward a hunter who seeks to truly understand their prey, approaching the creatures on their own level and seeking to gain their strength. Powdering the bones of strong beasts, for use in a soup or wine, is often the first step in the process of capturing part of their power.

Using weapons is anathema to this ritual and immediately ends its benefits. If the ritual is ended in this way, you must conduct an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.7Fd4lxozd11MQ55N]{Pokuta} ritual before attempting this ritual again.

Krytyczny Sukces As success, except you can defeat three enemies that are only one size larger than you instead.

Sukces The power begins to take root. Once you've defeated an enemy two or more sizes larger than you in single combat, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.KxaYlC50zzHysJj8]{Titan Wrestler} feat.

Porażka You drink the soup or wine, but the understanding eludes you.

Krytyczna Porażka The drink contains shards of bone you didn't grind down properly. You're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 2} for 1 week, during which the condition can't be reduced.

Powerful Inhalation.name: Powerful Inhalation
Powerful Inhalation.description:
You rapidly draw the air from your surroundings, hoarding it for yourself. Creatures in the area when the spell is cast take 5k6 bludgeoning damage with a basic Fortitude save. A creature that fails its save can't speak above a raspy whisper for 1 round. A creature that critically fails can't speak or use abilities that require it to breathe for 1 round. This prevents it from using effects that require speech, such as casting spells with verbal components, and from using a breath weapon or similar ability.

Creatures made of air (such as air elementals) attempting a save against this spell get a degree of success one worse than they rolled.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6.

Practice Makes Perfect.name: Practice Makes Perfect
Practice Makes Perfect.description:
Aktywator You or an ally within range fails a skill check for a skill in which you or they are trained.

The target gains a +2 status bonus to the triggering check, or a +3 bonus if the target has master or better proficiency in the skill. This bonus can change the outcome of the target's skill check.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.XMBoKRRyooKnGkHk]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Practice Makes Perfect}

Precious Gleam.name: Precious Gleam
Precious Gleam.description:
You temporarily enhance a weapon, replacing it with finer materials. On the next successful attack with that weapon during the spell's duration, the attack deals an additional 1k6 precision damage. You can choose for the metal to become your choice of cold iron, silver, or steel, causing the attack to bypass resistances accordingly.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k6.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.ojC0jckNHOEIFFtB]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Precious Gleam}

Precious Metals.name: Precious Metals
Precious Metals.description:
Your deity blesses base metals to transform them into precious materials. The metal in the target transforms from its normal metal into cold iron, copper, gold, iron, silver, or steel. If the spell's rank is 8. or higher, add adamantine and dawnsilver to the options. If you transform an object into copper, gold, or silver, its Hardness is reduced to 1. Otherwise, its Hardness is increased to 10 if it was lower. An item transmuted in this way deals damage according to its new material. For example, a steel sword transmuted to cold iron would deal additional damage to a creature with a weakness to cold iron. It can have other effects of the new material at the GM's discretion.

This change is clearly magical and temporary, so the item's monetary value doesn't change; you couldn't transmute copper coins to gold and use them to purchase something.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.vf2KJ4oGJY4efnKE]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Precious Metals}

Wywyższenie (+1) If you increase the Hardness of the object, the new Hardness is 2 higher.
Precious Metals.target: 1 metal shield or weapon, 1 suit of metal armor, or up to 1 Bulk of metal material (such as coins or metal-tipped ammunition)

Pressure Zone.name: Pressure Zone
Pressure Zone.description:
Air pressure drops precipitously, causing pain and debilitation in creatures' inner ears and joints. Each living creature in the area of the spell when you cast it or that enters the area during the spell's duration must attempt a Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Ogłuchły} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1} until the end of its next turn, after which it's temporarily immune for 1 hour.

Porażka The creature is deafened and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 2}. At the end of each of its turns, it can attempt a new save if it's no longer in the pressure zone. On a success, it ends the effects and is temporarily immune for 1 hour.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is deafened and clumsy 2 for the duration of the spell.

A creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Ogłuchły} by this spell can attempt to end the condition by popping its ears. It can use a single action to attempt a new Fortitude save, losing the deafened condition from this spell on a success. Some creatures with anatomies that lack inner ears or joints might be immune to these effects, as determined by the GM.

Prestidigitation.name: Kuglarstwo
Prestidigitation.description:
Masz na swoje posługi najprostrzą z magii. Tak długo jak Podtrzymujesz zaklęcie możesz wowoływać proste magiczne efekty. Za każdym razem kiedy Podtrzymujesz zaklęcie możesz wybrać jedną z czterech opcji.

  • Gotowanie Ochłodź, ogrzej lub dopraw 0.5 kilograma nieożywionej materii.
  • Unoszenie Powoli unosisz niepilnowany obiekt, o Naręczu lekkim lub mniejszym, 1 stopę nad ziemię.
  • Wytwarzanie Stwórz tymczasowy obiekt o znikomym Naręczu, stworzony ze skoagulowanej magicznej materii. Obiekt wygląda prowizorycznie i wyraźnie sztucznie oraz jest niebywale kruchy — nie można go użyć jako narzędzia, broni ani lokusu czy w ramach kosztu zaklęcia.
  • Oczyszczenie Zabarw, oczyść lub ubrudź przedmiot o Naręczu lekkim lub mniejszym. Możesz wpłynąć na obiekt o Naręczu 1 w przeciągu 10 rund koncentracji, a na większy w przeciągu 1 minuty za każde Naręcze.

Kuglarstwo nie może zadawać obrażeń ani wywoływać szkodliwych statusów. Wszelkie realne zmiany w obiekcie (poza tymi wymienionymi powyżej) trwają jedynie tak długo, jak zaklęcie jest Podtrzymywane.
Prestidigitation.target: 1 obiekt (tylko dla czyszczenia, gotowania lub unoszenia)

Primal Call.name: Primal Call
Primal Call.cost: faerie circle ingredients worth a total value of 1 gp × the spell rank × the target's level
Primal Call.description: This functions as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vgy00hnqxN9VoeoF]{Planar Servitor} except you craft a faerie circle and call an animal, beast, fey, fungus, or plant from within 100 miles.
Primal Call.target: 1 animal, beast, fey, fungus, or plant

Primal Chorus.name: Primal Chorus
Primal Chorus.description:
You let loose a primal howl that incites animals and beasts to join in the chorus. Doing so gives you a general idea of how many creatures with the animal or beast trait are within the range of the spell, but significant creatures can attempt a Will save against your spell DC to resist responding to your call. You gain a +1 status bonus to your next Initiative roll in an encounter with an enemy creature that replies to your call. For purposes of using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.tHCqgwjtQtzNqVvd]{Wymuszenie} during exploration mode, you can communicate with a creature that responds to your call for the duration of the spell. You can only make simple commands, such as approach or hide, and only understand simple ideas, such as compliance with the order or the presence of natural hazards.

Wywyższenie (+2) The status bonus increases by 1.

Primal Herd.name: Primal Herd
Primal Herd.description:
Summoning the power of the natural world, you transform the targets into a herd of mammoths, and they each assume a Huge battle form. Each target must have enough space to expand into or the spell fails for that target. Each target gains the animal trait. Each target can Dismiss the spell's effects on themself. Each target gains the following while transformed:

  • AC = 22 + the target's level. Ignore any armor check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Speed 40 feet.
  • Low-light vision.
  • The following unarmed melee attacks, which are the only attacks the target can use to Strike. When Striking with these attacks, the target uses their attack modifier with the proficiency and item bonuses of their most favorable weapon or unarmed Strike, and the damage is listed for each attack. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony} condition, for example). Melee A tusk (reach 15 feet), Damage 4k8+19 piercing; Melee A trunk (agile, reach 15 feet), Damage 4k6+16 bludgeoning; Melee A foot (agile, reach 15 feet), Damage 4k6+13 bludgeoning.
  • Athletics modifier of +30, unless the target's own modifier is higher. 3 You move up to twice your Speed and move through the space of Large or smaller creatures, trampling each creature whose space you enter. A trampled creature takes damage from its foot Strike based on a basic Reflex save (DC = 19 + the target's level).
Primal Herd.target: you and up to 5 willing targets

Primal Phenomenon.name: Primal Phenomenon
Primal Phenomenon.description:
You request a direct intercession from the natural world. Nature always refuses unnatural requests and might grant a different request (potentially more powerful or better fitting its character) than the one you asked for. A primal phenomenon spell can do any of the following things.

  • Duplicate any spell from the primal spell list of 9. rank or lower to which you have access.
  • Duplicate any spell from another spell list of 7. rank or lower. It must be common or you must have access.
  • Produce any effect whose power level is in line with the above effects.
  • Reverse certain effects that refer to the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{Wish} spell.

At the GM's discretion, you can try to use primal phenomenon to produce greater effects than these, but doing so may be dangerous, or the spell may have only a partial effect.

Primal Summons.name: Primal Summons
Primal Summons.description:
You enhance a summoned creature with the power of the elements. If your next action is to cast either @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4YnON9JHYqtLzccu]{Przywołanie Zwierzęcia} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jSRAyd57kd4WZ4yE]{Przywołanie Grzyba lub Rośliny}, choose air, earth, fire, metal, water or wood; the creature you summon gains the corresponding abilities.

  • Air The creature gains a fly Speed of 60 feet.
  • Earth The creature gains a burrow Speed of 20 feet, reduces its land Speed by 10 feet (minimum 5 feet), and gains resistance 5 to physical damage.
  • Fire The creature's Strikes deal 1k6 extra fire damage, and it gains resistance 10 to fire and weakness 5 to cold and water.
  • Metal The creature's Strikes deal 1k6 extra electricity damage, and it gains resistance 5 to electricity.
  • Water The creature gains a swim Speed of 60 feet, can spend 1 action after a melee attack to attempt a Shove (ignoring multiple attack penalty), and gains resistance 5 to fire.
  • Wood The creature gains a climb speed of 30 feet and resistance 2 to bludgeoning and piercing damage.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.PQuQtDixruZmmvT4]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Primal Summons}

Prismatic Armor.name: Prismatic Armor
Prismatic Armor.description:
You wrap the target in armor made of multicolored light. It functions as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.NBSBFHxBm88qxQUy]{Chromatic Armor} that is all colors (granting resistance 5 to acid, electricity, fire, force, mental, poison, and sonic). An attacker that critically fails on its saving throw against the spell is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiony} rather than @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.8gqb5FMTaArsKdWB]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Prismatic Armor}

Wywyższenie (9.) The resistances increase to 10 each.

Prismatic Shield.name: Prismatic Shield
Prismatic Shield.description:
Shield-sized shards of multicolored light manifest in the air around you, each rotating quickly to intercept attacks.

Melee attacks against you impact a randomly colored shard, subjecting the attacker to a random effect from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.d6o52BnjViNz7Gub]{Prismatic Spray}, with a saving throw of the type indicated in that spell.

The shards automatically block physical ranged attacks the size of a spear or smaller, such as arrows, bolts, and javelins. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your AC against attacks with larger ranged weapons.

Any spell that targets you requires the caster to succeed at a counteract check against your spell DC, or it fails to affect you.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Pfllo68qdQjC4Qv6]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Prismatic Shield}

Prismatic Sphere.name: Prismatic Sphere
Prismatic Sphere.description: You create a seven-layered sphere to protect an area. This multicolored sphere functions like a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.iL6TujgTCtRRa0Y0]{Prismatic Wall} but is shaped in a 10-foot burst centered on a corner of your space. You must form the sphere in an unbroken open space so its edges don't pass through any creatures or objects, or the spell is lost.

Prismatic Spray.name: Prismatic Spray
Prismatic Spray.description:
A spray of rainbow light beams cascades from your open hand. Each creature in the area must roll 1k8 on the table below to see which beam affects it, then attempt a saving throw of the indicated type. The table notes any additional traits that apply to each type of ray. If a creature is struck by multiple beams, it uses the same k20 result for all its saving throws. For all rays, a successful saving throw negates the effect for that creature.

Prismatic Spray

[[/r 1d8 #Prismatic Spray]]ColorSaveEffects (Traits)
1RedReflex@Damage[50[fire]] damage (fire)
2OrangeReflex@Damage[60[acid]] damage (acid)
3YellowReflex@Damage[70[electricity]] damage (electricity)
4GreenFortitude@Damage[30[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 1} for 1 minute (poison)
5BlueFortitudeAffected as if by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.znv4ECL7ZtuiagtA]{Petrify}
6IndigoWill@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Zdezorientowany}, as the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8kJbiBEjMWG4VUjs]{Warp Mind} spell (mental)
7VioletWill@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony} for 1 minute; if a critical failure, sent to another plane, as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5bTt2CvYHPvaR7QQ]{Teleportacja Międzyplanarna} (teleportation)
8Potent beam-Affected by two beams - roll twice, rerolling any duplicates or results of 8

Prismatic Wall.name: Prismatic Wall
Prismatic Wall.description:
You create an opaque wall of shimmering, multicolored light. The wall is straight and vertical, stretching 60 feet long and 30 feet high. You must form the wall in an unbroken open space so its edges don't pass through any creatures or objects, or the spell is lost. You can pass through the wall and ignore its effects. The wall sheds bright light out to 20 feet on each side (and dim light to the next 20 feet). Creatures other than you that come into the wall's light must attempt a @Check[will|against:spell] save; they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} for 1 round on a success, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiony} for 1 round on a failure, and Blinded for 1 minute on a critical failure. They are then temporarily immune to the blinding effect for 1 hour.

A prismatic wall has seven different layers, each a different color. Red, orange, yellow, and green have the effect of a 5. kręgu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.forsqeofEszBNtLq]{Chromatic Wall} spell of that color, and the others have the effect of a 7. kręgu chromatic wall spell of that color. A creature that tries to pass through the wall must attempt a saving throw against each component wall. The effects take place simultaneously, so a creature turned to stone by the blue wall is still treated as a creature for the indigo and violet walls.

The wall as a whole is immune to counteracting effects of the wall's level or lower; each color must be counteracted by its specific spell, as described in chromatic wall. This must be done in order (red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, then violet). A given color can't be affected until the previous color is counteracted. Counteracting a color wall removes that color's effect from the wall, and counteracting them all ends prismatic wall. You can Dismiss the spell.

Procyal Philosophy.name: Procyal Philosophy
Procyal Philosophy.description:
The racoon-like visage of a sagacious procyal appears, dispensing helpful advice. The image appears floating next to the target. The image is just a floating magical manifestation and doesn't occupy any space. The procyal offers helpful suggestions, preparing to Aid the target as though the procyal had its own reaction. The procyal uses a bonus equal to your spell DC - 10 for its rolls to Aid.

On each of your turns, the procyal prepares to Aid its target again. You can use a free action, which has the concentrate trait, to redirect the procyal image to a different creature, changing the target of the spell. Otherwise, the procyal keeps aiding the same creature for the duration of the spell.

Produce Flame.name: Wytworzenie Płomienia
Produce Flame.description:
Mała kula płomieni pojawia się w twojej dłoni, i możesz zaatakować nią w zwarciu lub na dystans. Wykonaj rzut ataku zaklęciem przeciwko KP celu. Zazwyczaj jest to atak dystansowy, ale możesz też wykonać atak w zwarciu przeciw istocie w wysięgu twoich ataków wręcz.

Przy sukcesie zadajesz 2k4 obrażeń od ognia. Przy krytycznym sukcesie cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia oraz obrazenia @Damage[(@item.level)d4[persistent,fire]].

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k4 a obrażenia przewlekłe przy trafieniu krytycznym zwiększają się o 1k4.

Project Image.name: Project Image
Project Image.description:
You project an illusory image of yourself. You must stay within range of the image, and if at any point you can't see the image, the spell ends. Whenever you Cast a Spell other than one whose area is an emanation, you can cause the spell effect to originate from either yourself or the image. Because the image is an illusion, it can't benefit from spells, though visual manifestations of the spell appear. The image has the same AC and saves as you. If it is hit by an attack or fails a save, the spell ends.

Wywyższenie (+2) The maximum duration you can Sustain the spell increases to 10 minutes.

Proliferating Eyes.name: Proliferating Eyes
Proliferating Eyes.description:
You implant an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialny}, magical eye sensor on the target's body. The eye has sight and vision, but no other special senses. The eye is highly contagious-the first two times the target touches another creature during the duration, the spell buds off an additional eye that implants itself on that creature, which can then bud off two eyes of its own. This process can propagate up to four times from the original target, for a potential maximum of 31 eyes if each affected creature touches two new creatures.

You can switch between perceiving through your own senses or the vision of any of the eye sensors using a single action, which has the concentrate trait. You always know how many eyes there are and can tell which original eyes budded off to make which new eyes, though you gain no special insight into the identity of the new targets other than what you can glean from spying on them.

Prophet's Luck.name: Prophet's Luck
Prophet's Luck.description:
Aktywator You or a creature within range attempts a saving throw against an obvious threat.

You prophesize the result of the triggering saving throw as either a success (including a critical success) or a failure (including a critical failure). The target gains a +1 status bonus to the save if you predict success or a –1 status penalty if you predict failure. If you predict the result correctly, fortune favors you, and you gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws. If you predict incorrectly, fortune spurns the target, imparting a –1 status penalty to its saving throws.

Wywyższenie (6.) The save bonus or penalty increases to +2 or –2.

Wywyższenie (9.) The save bonus or penalty increases to +3 or –3.

Propulsive Breeze.name: Propulsive Breeze
Propulsive Breeze.description:
Aktywator An ally in range Strides or Leaps.

You create a current of wind at your ally's back, propelling their movement. When your ally's Stride or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Skok} ends, the current propels them an additional 15 feet in the same direction as the last 5 feet of their Stride or Leap.

Protect Companion.name: Ochrona Towarzysza
Protect Companion.description:
Rozciągasz swoją aurę, tworząc magiczną tarczę chroniącą twojego eidolona lub sługusa. Cel zyskuje premię sytuacyjną +1 do KP do początku twojej następnej tury. Zyskujesz reakcję @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Iuq8CeNqv3a0oWfQ]{Blok Żywotnością}; po użyciu tej reakcji zaklęcie kończy się i nie możesz rzucać ochrony towarzysza przez następne 10 minut.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.pPMldkAbPVOSOPIF]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Ochrona Towarzysza}

Wywyższenie (+2) Reakcja redukuje obrażenia o kolejne 10 punktów a ty tracisz dodatkowe 5 Punktów Żywotności. Jeśli chcesz utracić mniej Punktów Żywotności, możesz zmniejszyć liczbę redukowanych obrażeń oraz traconych Punktów Żywotności tak, aby odpowiadała dowolnej z niższych kręgiem wersji tego zaklęcia bez obniżania realnego kręgu zaklęcia.
Protect Companion.target: twój eidolon lub istota z cechą sługusa, którą kontrolujesz

Protection.name: Ochrona
Protection.description:
Chronisz istotę przed zagrożeniem. Cel zyskuje premię statusową +1 do Klasy Pancerza i rzutów obronnych.

Wywyższenie (3.) Możesz wybrać, że premie z zaklęcia dotyczą również wszystkich sojuszników w @Template[emanation|distance:10] wokół celu.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.RawLEPwyT5CtCZ4D]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Ochrona}

Protective Wards.name: Ochronne Bariery
Protective Wards.description:
Roztaczasz krąg glifów, który osłania twoich sojuszników. Ty i wszyscy sojusznicy w obszarze zyskujecie premię statusową +1 do KP. Za każdym razem, gdy Podtrzymujesz zaklęcie, promień emanacji zwiększa się o 5 stóp, do maksymalnie 30 stóp.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.5p3bKvWsJgo83FS1]{Aura: Ochronne Bariery}

Protector Tree.name: Protector Tree
Protector Tree.description:
A Medium tree suddenly grows in an unoccupied square within range. The tree has AC 10 and 10 Hit Points. Whenever an ally adjacent to the tree is hit by a Strike, the tree interposes its branches and takes the damage first. Any additional damage beyond what it takes to reduce the tree to 0 Hit Points is dealt to the original target. The tree isn't large enough to impede movement through its square. If the tree is in soil and survives to the end of the spell's duration, it remains as an ordinary, non-magical tree and continues to grow and thrive. The GM might determine that the tree disappears immediately in certain inhospitable situations.

Wywyższenie (+1) The tree has an additional 10 Hit Points.

Protector's Sacrifice.name: Protector's Sacrifice
Protector's Sacrifice.description:
Aktywator An ally within 30 feet takes damage.

You protect your ally by suffering in their stead. Reduce the damage the triggering ally would take by 3. You redirect this damage to yourself, but your immunities, weaknesses, resistances and so on do not apply.

You aren't subject to any conditions or other effects of whatever damaged your ally (such as poison from a venomous bite). Your ally is still subject to those effects even if you redirect all of the triggering damage to yourself.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage you redirect increases by 3.

Protector's Sphere.name: Protector's Sphere
Protector's Sphere.description:
A protective aura emanates out from you, safeguarding you and your allies. You gain resistance 3 to all damage. Your allies also gain this resistance while in the area.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.3bcUiWwc5KLc4X0T]{Aura: Protector's Sphere}

Wywyższenie (+1) The resistance increases by 1.

Prying Survey.name: Prying Survey
Prying Survey.description:
You create eight invisible, floating eyes, each about 3 inches in diameter, that scan the area around you, transmitting rough impressions of the environment. The eyes constantly examine and send you summaries of their findings. They are solid and can't move through barriers, and they don't follow routes that they fail to find while Searching. Any damage to an eye destroys it. When all eyes are destroyed, the spell ends.

As a single action, which has the concentrate trait, you can concentrate on a location within the area that an eye can reach. An eye travels to that location, and you Seek visually as if you were there. As an exploration activity, you can travel at half speed while continuing to concentrate on the eyes to gain the benefits of both the Scout and Search activities. With the eyes, you can check everything even if you are traveling faster than 300 feet per minute. The eyes use your Perception modifier. You can have only one prying survey in effect at a time.

Wywyższenie (10.) The area increases to a 500-foot emanation.

Puff of Poison.name: Obłok Trucizny
Puff of Poison.description:
Wydychasz połyskliwą chmurę toksycznego oddechu prosto w twarz wroga. Cel odnosi 1k4 obrażeń od trucizny i @Damage[(ceil(@item.level/2))d4[persistent,poison]], zależnie od wyniku jego rzutu obronnego Krzepy.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Cel odnosi połowę wstępnych obrażeń i nie odnosi obrażeń przewklekłych.

Porażka Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia wstępne oraz przewlekłe.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia wstępne oraz przewlekłe.

Wywyższenie (+2) Wstępne obrażenia od trucizny zwiększają się o 1k4 oraz przewlekłe obrażenia od trucizny zwiększają się o 1k4.

Pulse of Civilization.name: Pulse of Civilization
Pulse of Civilization.description:
You tap into the zeitgeist of any settlements in range. You learn the names of the settlements. On all Lore checks to Recall Knowledge about those settlements or to Gather Information in or about those settlements, you gain a +2 status bonus and use your level as your proficiency bonus even if you're untrained. When you Cast the Spell, you can immediately Recall Knowledge about one of the settlements using its Lore skill (such as Absalom Lore), which benefits from the bonus. If you cast pulse of civilization again, any previous casting ends.

Wywyższenie (5.) The range is 100 miles.

Wywyższenie (7.) The range is 500 miles and the bonus is +3

Pulverizing Cascade.name: Pulverizing Cascade
Pulverizing Cascade.description:
You raise a pair of towering waves and slam them into each other, crushing creatures caught between them. Creatures in the area take 5k6 bludgeoning damage with a basic Reflex save.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6.

Pulverizing Wake.name: Pulverizing Wake
Pulverizing Wake.description:
Imitating raptorial creatures, you attack with such speed it drives a sonic shockwave. Make a melee Strike against a creature in your reach; if you hit, you deal an additional 3k8 sonic damage. Regardless of the result of your Strike, that creature becomes the point of origin of a 15-foot cone, aimed directly away from you. All creatures in that cone take 6k8 sonic damage (basic Fortitude save).

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage of the cone increases by 1k8.

Pummeling Rubble.name: Obijający Gruz
Pummeling Rubble.description:
W powietrze przed tobą wystrzeliwuje rój ciężkich skał. Gruz zadaje 2k4 obrażeń obuchowych wszystkim istotom w obszarze. Każda istota musi wykonać rzut obronny Refleksu.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia i jest odpychana 5 stóp od ciebie.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota odnosi podwójne obrażenia i jest odpychana 10 stóp od ciebie.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k4.

Punishing Winds.name: Punishing Winds
Punishing Winds.description:
Area (continued) 30-foot-radius, 100-foot-tall cylinder

Violent winds and a powerful downdraft fill the area, forming a cyclone. All flying creatures in the area descend 40 feet. The entire area is greater difficult terrain for Flying creatures, and difficult terrain for creatures on the ground or Climbing. Any creature that ends its turn Flying within the area descends 20 feet. Any creature pushed into a surface by this spell's winds takes bludgeoning damage as though it had fallen.

The squares at the outside vertical edges of the cylinder prevent creatures from leaving. These squares are greater difficult terrain, and a creature attempting to push through must succeed at an Athletics check or Acrobatics check to Maneuver in Flight against your spell DC to get through. A creature that fails ends its current action but can try again.

Purging Toxins.name: Purging Toxins
Purging Toxins.description:
In the right dose, a scourge can become a cure. Deal poison damage equal to the spell's rank to the target, then attempt a counteract check against one disease or poison afflicting the target. The target is then temporarily immune for 24 hours. If the target is immune to poison, this spell has no effect.

Wywyższenie (5th) You can attempt counteract checks against any number of poisons or diseases afflicting the target.

Purify Soul Path.name: Purify Soul Path
Purify Soul Path.cost: rare incense and offering worth a total of 10 gp x your level
Purify Soul Path.description:
You delve inward, spending extensive time contemplating the purity of your own soul and the actions of your past. If you aren't truly penitent, the outcome is always a critical failure.

Krytyczny Sukces You reconcile your misdeeds with your soul path, removing your soulforged corruption. The corruption flaw from your armament no longer affects you. Before your reconciliation is complete, you must perform a special quest or other task in accord with your soul path. If completed during downtime, this task should take no less than 1 week. For 1 month, you receive divine insight just before performing an act that would be anathema to your soul path.

Sukces As critical success, but you gain no special insight regarding its subsequent actions.

Porażka You don't reconcile and must continue to meditate and redress your misdeeds. Any future purify soul path rituals for the same misdeeds cost half as much and gain a +4 circumstance bonus to the primary check.

Wywyższenie (+1) Increase the maximum target level by 2 and the base cost by 10 gp.

Purify Tanglebriar.name: Purify Tanglebriar
Purify Tanglebriar.cost: rare incense and offerings worth a total value of 2,000 gp
Purify Tanglebriar.description:
You call upon the primal presence of the Fierani Forest and the elven legacy of Kyonin in an attempt to purify a portion of the blighted realm of Tanglebriar. Initially created by the elven wizard Aelthian in hopes of banishing Treerazer himself, this revision to that faulty ritual focuses instead upon the region he blighted rather than the nascent demon lord himself. Thus avoiding the catastrophic repercussions Aelthian experienced when he attempted to direct this magic against a foe too powerful to directly harm.

This version draws upon the ancient legacy of the forest itself by calling upon the remnants of primal spirits that remain locked away in Tanglebriar, bolstering them with elven magic. Successfully performing the ritual in an area in which Treerazer is currently located is more difficult, but the ritual's effects can weaken and distract him. If Treerazer is slain or banished, the effects of this ritual are longer lasting and less expensive — see "Cleansing Tanglebriar" on page 67 of this volume for more details.

Purify Tanglebriar's primary caster must succeed at a DC 41 check, while the secondary casters must succeed at a DC 36 check. If Treerazer is present in the ritual's targeted area, these checks increase to DC 43 for the primary caster and DC 38 for the secondary casters, but if the primary caster wears the Viridian Crown, all checks for the primary and secondary casters are reduced by 5.

Krytyczny Sukces The region within the area grows less blighted for 1 month (during which time additional purify Tanglebriar attempts in this area have no additional effect). Greater difficult terrain becomes difficult terrain; difficult terrain becomes regular terrain, and hazardous terrain becomes non-hazardous. All DCs to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.fJImDBQfqfjKJOhk]{Sense Direction}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.49y9Ec4bDii8pcD3]{Subsist}, and to resist environmental afflictions in the area are reduced by 4. Creatures allied with Treerazer take a –2 status penalty to Initiative checks within this region. If Treerazer is in the area when the ritual is performed, the party gains 2 Torment points toward weakening the demon lord and 2 Triumph Points.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.4ne9K5IQm2whokHP]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Purify Tanglebriar}

Sukces As critical success, but for 1 week (during which time additional purify Tanglebriar attempts in this area have no additional effect). Creatures allied with Treerazer take no penalty to Initiative checks. If Treerazer is in the area when the ritual is performed, the party gains 1 Torment Point and 1 Triumph Point.

Porażka The region is unaffected.

Krytyczna Porażka The region is unaffected, and the magic itself becomes corrupted and backfires on the casters. Each caster takes @Damage[20d6[void]] damage (@Check[fortitude|dc:38|basic] save) as the purification energies sap away life itself. For 1 month, any attempt by that same primary caster to perform purify Tanglebriar increases its DCs by 5.
Purify Tanglebriar.secondarycheck: Arcana, Nature, Religion, Survival, or Tanglebriar Lore

Purifying Icicle.name: Purifying Icicle
Purifying Icicle.description:
You evoke life essence into the form of water and freeze it, then launch the icicle at a foe. Wykonaj rzut ataku zaklęciem. On a success, the icicle deals 2k6 piercing damage and 1k6 cold damage, and if the target is undead, the icicle deals an additional 1k4 vitality damage. On a critical success, the target takes double damage and takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round as the icicle lodges inside them before melting away.

Wywyższenie (+1) The piercing damage and cold damage each increase by 1k6. The vitality damage increases by 1k4.

Purifying Veil.name: Purifying Veil
Purifying Veil.description:
Drawing on the purifying powers of water, you call forth a veil of fine water droplets suffused with holy energy. The veil surrounds the target.
