Everything on each side of the veil is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} from creatures on the opposite side, but the water doesn't impede attacks or movement across the veil. If the target moves through the veil, it takes 4k6 spirit damage with a basic Will save. If the target leaves the veil, the spell ends.

Wywyższenie (+1) The spirit damage increases by 1k6.

Purple Worm Sting.name: Purple Worm Sting
Purple Worm Sting.description:
You replicate the attack of a deadly purple worm. You deal 3k6 piercing damage to the touched creature and afflict it with purple worm venom. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Krzepy.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target takes 3k6 poison damage.

Porażka The target is afflicted with purple worm venom at stage 1.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is afflicted with purple worm venom at stage 2.

Purple Worm Venom (trucizna)

Poziom 11

Maksymalny Czas Trwania 6 rounds.

Stadium 1 @Damage[3d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 2} (1 runda)

Stadium 2 @Damage[4d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 2} (1 runda)

Stadium 3 @Damage[6d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 2} (1 runda).

Pushing Gust.name: Pushing Gust
Pushing Gust.description:
Giving the air a push, you buffet the target with a powerful gust of wind; it must attempt a Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target is pushed 5 feet away from you.

Porażka The target is pushed 10 feet away from you.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is pushed 10 feet away from you and knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}.

Putrefy Food and Drink.name: Putrefy Food and Drink
Putrefy Food and Drink.description:
You cause otherwise edible food to rot and spoil instantly, and water and other liquids to become brackish and undrinkable. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.z9T4c1hXwOotsMCp]{Woda Święcona}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.EGhUorZhB7nV73Ev]{Woda Wyklęta}, and similar food and drink of significance are spoiled by this spell, unless they are associated with a deity of decay or putrefaction, but it has no effect on creatures of any type, potions, or alchemical elixirs. One cubic foot of liquid is roughly 8 gallons.

Wywyższenie (2.) You can target an alchemical elixir with this spell, attempting a counteract check against it. If you succeed, the elixir spoils and becomes a mundane item.

Wywyższenie (3.) You can target a potion or alchemical elixir with this spell, attempting a counteract check against it. If you succeed, the elixir or potion spoils and becomes a mundane item.

2.target: 1 stopa sześcienna of clean food or water, or an alchemical elixir

3.target: 1 stopa sześcienna of clean food or water, or a potion or alchemical elixir

Putrefy Food and Drink.target: 1 stopa sześcienna of clean food or water

Pyrotechnics.name: Pyrotechnics
Pyrotechnics.description:
You turn a fire into either a burst of blinding fireworks or a thick cloud of choking smoke, chosen when you Cast the Spell. The spell targets one fire source, which is immediately extinguished if it is a non-magical fire the size of a campfire or smaller. If the fire source is a creature, the creature takes 1k6 points of cold damage and is not extinguished.

  • Fireworks The targeted fire explodes into a colorful array of flashy, fiery, glowing aerial fireworks in a 20-foot-radius burst. The first time you Sustain the Spell each round, you can cause the area of fireworks to ascend up to 20 feet, but you cannot move the area laterally. Creatures that start their turn within the area of the fireworks must attempt a Fortitude save, and are then temporarily immune for 1 minute.

    Krytyczny Sukces The creature is unaffected

    Sukces The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} until the end of its next turn.

    Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiony} until the end of its next turn.

    Krytyczna Porażka The creature is Blinded for 1 minute.

  • Smoke Cloud Thick smoke billows out from the fire and coalesces into a cloud that spreads to fill a 20-foot-radius burst centered on the targeted fire. Creatures within the smoke cloud take a –4 circumstance penalty to visual Perception checks, and creatures outside the smoke cloud take a –4 circumstance penalty to visual Perception checks to detect creatures or objects within it. The first time you Sustain the Spell each round, you can cause the smoke cloud to descend up to 20 feet, but you cannot move the area laterally. Creatures that start their turn within the smoke cloud must attempt a Fortitude save, and are then temporarily immune for 1 minute.

    Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

    Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1}.

    Krytyczna Porażka The creature is Sickened 1 and cannot recover from the sickened condition while in the area of the smoke cloud.

Qi Blast.name: Qi Blast
Qi Blast.description:
You unleash your qi as a powerful blast that deals 2k6 force damage. If you use 2 actions to cast qi blast, increase the size of the cone to 30 feet and the damage to 3k6. If you use 3 actions to cast qi blast, increase the cone to 60 feet and the damage to 4k6. Each creature in the area must attempt a Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature takes half damage.

Porażka The creature takes full damage and is pushed 5 feet.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature takes double damage and is pushed 10 feet.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k6, or by 2k6 if you use 2 or 3 actions.

Qi Form.name: Qi Form
Qi Form.description:
Drawing from deep wells of spiritual power, you take on a special qi form. In your qi form, your hair, feathers, skin, or scales change color and begin to glow.

In this form, you gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed. Choose force, spirit, vitality, or void damage. All your Strikes deal 1k6 additional damage of the chosen type.

Your entire body is also surrounded by a glowing corona of the same color as your inner qi; this is a light effect. Your corona is an aura in a 5-foot emanation that deals 2k6 damage of the chosen type to creatures who start their turn within the emanation. If the emanation overlaps with a darkness effect, the corona's glow attempts to counteract the darkness. Regardless of the outcome, the corona can't attempt to counteract that effect again for 1 day. You can Sustain to flare your corona out to become a 30-foot emanation or return the corona to a 5-foot emanation.

In your qi form, your emotions surge to the forefront, and it's difficult to moderate your attacks. Your weapons and unarmed attacks lose the nonlethal trait. You take a –2 status penalty to saves against emotion effects but gain a +2 status bonus to saves against all other mental effects.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.rQaltMIEi2bn1Z4k]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Qi Form}

Qi Rush.name: Qi Rush
Qi Rush.description:
Accelerated by your qi, you move with such speed you become a blur. Move two times: two Strides, two Steps, or one Stride and one Step (in either order).

You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} condition during this movement and until the start of your next turn.

Quandary.name: Zagwozdka
Quandary.description:
Przenosisz cel do pozaplanarnego pokoju-zagadki o tajemniczym pochodzeniu, zamykając go tam. Raz na turę, jako w ramach pojedynczej akcji, cel może wykonać test Okultyzmu, Percepcji lub Złodziejstwa przeciwko twojemu ST zaklęć, aby rozwiązać zagadkę. Efekty teleportacji nie mogą przenieść celu poza pokój-zagadkę, chyba że mogą również przenosić przez plany, jak @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5bTt2CvYHPvaR7QQ]{Teleportacja Międzyplanarna}. Kiedy zaklęcie się kończy, cel powraca na pole, które zajmował, gdy został wygnany, lub na najbliższe pole, jeśli jego pierwotne jest teraz zajęte.

Krytyczny Sukces Cel rozwiązuje zagadkę i ucieka.

Sukces Cel jest na dobrej drodze do rozwiązania zagadki. Jeśli już był na dobrej drodze, rozwiązuje zagadkę i ucieka.

Porażka Cel nie czyni postępów w kierunku rozwiązania.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel nie czyni postępów, a jeśli był na dobrej drodze do rozwiązania zagadki, już na niej nie jest.

Quench.name: Ugaszenie
Quench.description:
Powodujesz, że powietrze w obszarze działania staje się przesycone oparami wody. Niemagiczne płomienie w obszarze działania gasną automatycznie. Ogniste istoty w obszarze działania odnoszą 4k8 obrażeń (podstawowy rzut obronny Krzepy). Wybierz jeden magiczny płomień, zaklęcie lub przedmiot z cechą ognia w obszarze i wykonaj podejmij próbę przeciwdziałania mu. Jeśli odniesiesz sukces przeciw przedmiotowi, przedmiot traci swoje ogniste zdolności na 1 minutę (przykładowo Miecz Długi Płomieni +1 stałby się Mieczem Długim +1). Jeśli cel jest artefaktem lub przedmiotem o podobnej mocy, automatycznie odnosisz porażkę w próbie przeciwdziałanie mu.

Przy pierwszym Podtrzymaniu zaklęcia w każdej rundzie, możesz przemieścić obszar oparów w dowolne miejsce w zasięgu, ale jedyny efekt jaki to przynosi to automatyczne ugaszenie niemagicznych płomieni.

Jeśli masz reakcję Przeciwzaklęcia, możesz wykorzystać ugaszenie aby kontrować dowolne zaklęcie z cechą ognia zamiast konieczności posiadania wywołującego reakcję zaklęcia ognia przygotowanego lub w repertuarze.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zadawane ognistym istotm zwiększają się o 2k8.

Quick Sort.name: Szybkie Sortowanie
Quick Sort.description:
Magicznie sortujesz grupę obiektów na schludne stosy lub kupki. Możesz sortować obiekty na dwa różne sposoby. Pierwszy z nich to dzielenie ich na odrębne stosy w zależności od łatwo obserwowalnej cechy, takiej jak kolor czy kształt. Aleternatywnie, możesz sortowac obiekty w uporządkowane stosy, na podstawie jasno widocznego oznaczenia, takiego jak numer strony, tytuł czy data. Obiekty sortują się samoczynnie na przestrzeni czasu trwania zaklęcia, chociaż posortowanie mniejszej liczby obiektów zajmuje mniej czasu, aż do 1 rundy w wypadku nie więcej niż 30 obiektów.

Wywyższenie (3.) Zaklęcie może posortować do 400 obiektów w minutę lub 60 w rundę.

Wywyższenie (5.) Zaklęcie może posortować do 800 obiektów w minutę lub 120 w rundę.

3.target: do 400 niepilnowanych obiektów w zasięgu, każdy o Naręczu nie większym niż lekkie

5.target: do 800 niepilnowanych obiektów w zasięgu, każdy o Naręczu nie większym niż lekkie

Quick Sort.target: do 200 niepilnowanych obiektów w zasięgu, każdy o Naręczu nie większym niż lekkie

Quicken Time.name: Quicken Time
Quicken Time.description: You speed up the time stream in an area, stretching and pulling it until time flows swift and wild. Any creature that begins its turn in the area is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Przyspieszony} and can use the extra action each round to Stride or Strike. Unfortunately, speeding up time is much more difficult than slowing it down, and the effect is uneven and jittery, making accuracy between times painfully difficult; creatures inside the area are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} to those outside it, and vice versa.

Radiant Beam.name: Radiant Beam
Radiant Beam.description:
You fire a beam of blinding light from your outstretched hands. The beam deals 5k10 spirit damage. On a failed saving throw, a creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} for 1 round, or dazzled for 4 rounds on a critical failure.

If the light passes through an area of magical darkness or targets a creature affected by magical darkness, radiant beam attempts to counteract the darkness. If you need to determine whether the light passes through an area of darkness, draw a line between yourself and the target.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k10.

Radiant Field.name: Radiant Field
Radiant Field.description:
You create an area of bright light. Creatures with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.I0HYG0ctCLP5JRsW]{Light Blindness} that are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiony} by radiant field and remain in the area must attempt a Fortitude save at the start of their turns. On a failure, a creature remains blinded for 1 round; this is an incapacitation effect.

This spell also suppresses magical darkness of your radiant field spell's rank or lower.

Wywyższenie (4th) Creatures seen through the area are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} to creatures outside the area. Creatures with light blindness can continue to be blinded by the field as long as the field is visible, even when outside of the field.

Radiant Heart of Devotion.name: Radiant Heart of Devotion
Radiant Heart of Devotion.description:
You speak a fervent prayer for the heavens to assist you and your righteous allies. Your heart begins to glow with a radiance that fills the area with bright light. The spell has the following effects on creatures in the area, based on the creature's alignment on the good-evil axis.

  • Good Creatures Good creatures in the emanation gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and their Strikes deal an additional 1k6 spirit damage.
  • Neutral Creatures Neutral creatures that begin their turn in the emanation must succeed at a Will save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} for 1 round.
  • Evil Creatures Evil creatures that begin their turn in the emanation must succeed at a Will save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiony} for 1 round.

Wywyższenie (+2) The additional spirit damage increases by 1k6.

Raga of Remembrance.name: Raga of Remembrance
Raga of Remembrance.cost: ceramics, incense, and pigments worth 100 000 gp
Raga of Remembrance.description:
You scribe occult symbols on unblighted Vudran ground, laying the ceramics within them to create a ritual space. To perform the ritual, light incense in the ceramics and sit at the center of the ritual space. You then play the disharmonic instrument, drawing on musical skill, occult harmonics, or religious tradition. This establishes an underlying drone atop which the secondary casters layer their own performances. The song calls to the millions who died defending Vudra from Kothogaz, investing their power in Vanitapati, the legendary psychic.

Krytyczny Sukces A towering, ethereal avatar of Vanitapati manifests around you, surrounded by swirling spirits. The avatar weakens Kothogaz's spirit. While Kothogaz is within 1 mile of you, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2} and is permanently destroyed if reduced to 0 Hit Points.

Sukces As critical success, but Kothogaz is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1}.

Porażka The dead come to your aid, but their presence is unnerving. As success, but Kothogaz isn't frightened, and the primary and secondary casters take a –1 status penalty to saving throws against emotion effects.

Krytyczna Porażka Rather than the dead, Kothogaz hears the ritual's call and immediately teleports to the primary caster with its Disharmonic Door ability. Primary and secondary casters are afflicted with many-eyed blight.
Raga of Remembrance.secondarycheck: Diplomacy or Performance; Nature; Religion or Society

Rainbow Fumarole.name: Rainbow Fumarole
Rainbow Fumarole.description:
Obszar 20-foot radius, 60-foot-tall cylinder

Multi-hued flames break through cracks in the ground, reaching high into the sky and giving off dangerous fumes. When you cast the spell, roll 1k8 on the table below to determine the effects of the fumarole.

Any creature caught inside the area of rainbow fumarole when you cast it takes the indicated damage with a basic Reflex save and, on a failure, takes any added effect listed. Creatures must also attempt a saving throw when they move through the spell's area or end their turn in it. Squares within the area of the rainbow fumarole are difficult terrain.

[[/r 1d8]]{k8}ColorDamageAdded Effect
1Red@Damage[50[fire],2k6[persistent,fire]]{50 fire plus 2k6 persistent fire} —
2Orange@Damage[50[fire]]Knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}
3Yellow@Damage[30[fire],20[bludgeoning]]{30 fire plus 20 bludgeoning}Pushed 10 feet
4Green@Damage[20[fire],20[acid]]{20 fire plus 20 acid}@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 2}
5Blue@Damage[30[fire]]@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Sparaliżowany} for 1 round
6Indigo@Damage[30[fire]]@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Zdezorientowany} for 1 minute
7Violet@Damage[30[fire]]@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} for 1 minute
8AllChoose the color for each affected creature and use that color's damage and added effect; if a creature is affected again, you can choose a different color. —

Rainbow's End.name: Rainbow's End
Rainbow's End.description:
You reach upward to wrest down a rainbow and harness its power to connect this world to the heavens. Each creature in the area takes 1k4 spirit damage with a basic Fortitude save. Any creature that fails this save is additionally @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} for 1 round. For the spell's duration, an ally who's adjacent to you can Interact and be instantly teleported to an unoccupied space in the spell's area, as long as they don't travel more than 60 feet. This effect has the teleportation trait.

Wywyższenie (+2) The damage increases by 2k4, the duration of the dazzled condition on a failed save increases by 1 round, and the maximum distance an ally can use the rainbow to teleport increases by 10 feet.

Raise Dead.name: Powstanie z Martwych
Raise Dead.cost: klejnoty o całkowitej wartości równej poziomowi celu (minimum 1) × 200 sz
Raise Dead.description:
Próbujesz przywrócić na świat duszę smarłej istoty, co wymaga aby ciało tej istoty było obecne i we względnie nienaruszonym stanie. Istota musiała umrzeć w przeciągu ostatnich 3 dni. Jeśli Pharasma zadecydowała, że nadszedł czas tej istoty (wedle uznania MG), lub jeśli istota nie chce powrócić do życia, zaklęcie to automatycznie kończy się porażką, ale jego koszt nie jest zużywany w procesie jego rzucania.

Jeśli rzucanie zaklęcia zakończy się powodzeniem, istota powraca do życia z 1 Punktem Żywotności, bez przygotowanych zaklęć ani dostępnych komórek zaklęć, bez żadnego punktu w jakiejkolwiek codziennej puli zasobów, oraz nadal obraczona wszelkimi długoterminowymi okaleczeniami jej poprzedniego ciała. Czas spędzony na Cmentarzysku powoduje u istoty tymczasową niemoc, pozostawiając ją @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarną 2}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczoną 2} i @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabioną 2} na 1 tydzień; te statusy nie mogą zostać usunięte ani zredukowane w żaden sposób. Czas spędzony w zaświatach odbija się również na istocie poprzez permanentną zmianę, taką jak drobna zmiana osobowości, białe pasemko we włosach lub nowe dziwne znamię.

Wywyższenie (7.) Maksymalny poziom celu zwieksza się do 15. Koszt zwiększa się do poziomu celu (minimum 1) × 400 sz.

Wywyższenie (8.) Maksymalny poziom celu zwiększa się do 17. Koszt zwiększa się do poziomu celu (minimum 1) × 800 sz.

Wywyższenie (9.) Maksymalny poziom celu zwiększa się do 19. Koszt zwiększa się do poziomu celu (minimum 1) × 1600 sz.

Wywyższenie (10.) Maksymalny poziom celu zwiększa się do 21. Koszt zwiększa się do poziomu celu (minimum 1) × 3200 gp.

Rally Point.name: Rally Point
Rally Point.description:
You mark the area touched as a rally point. During the spell's duration, you can take a single action, which has the concentrate trait, to teleport to the rally point along with items you are wearing or holding. This teleportation fails if the area is occupied, if the rally point is more than 120 feet away, or if you try to bring along any other creature, even if it's in an extradimensional container. Once you teleport to the rally point, the spell's duration ends.

Wywyższenie (7.) You can target up to four other creatures within 30 feet, in addition to yourself. Each of you can teleport to the rally point once during the spell's duration, by taking a single action, which has the concentrate trait. The duration no longer ends once you teleport to the rally point, though you still can't teleport to the rally point again.

Rallying Anthem.name: Hymn Pokrzepienia
Rallying Anthem.description:
Twoja pieśń pobudza sojuszników do skuteczniejszej obrony. Ty i twoi sojusznicy w obszarze zyskujecie premię statusową +1 do KP i rzutów obronnych, oraz odporność na obrażenia fizyczne równą połowie kręgu zaklęcia.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.DLwTvjjnqs2sNGuG]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Hymn Pokrzepienia}

Rallying Banner.name: Rallying Banner
Rallying Banner.description:
You create an illusory banner representing a revolution, social movement, or organization such as the Firebrands. This banner is 30 feet tall, 30 feet wide, and hovers 20 feet in the air above the target. The banner is surrounded by flashing colors, bursting fireworks, and the sounds of cheering crowds, which draw attention and make it clearly obvious that the target is the bearer of the banner.

Your allies and any members of the banner's associated group who are within 200 feet and who can see and hear the banner are inspired by its presence. They gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +1 status bonus to saves against fear, emotion effects that inflict despair, and effects that would impose the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Zdezorientowany} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Kontrolowany} condition. When the bearer of the banner would gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Uciekający} condition, they can choose to stand their ground and be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony} for the effect's duration instead. During the duration, the target can touch a willing creature and transfer the banner to the touched creature, making them the new bearer of the banner. Touching a creature for this purpose is an action with the concentrate and manipulate traits.

Ranage's Circle.name: Ranage's Circle
Ranage's Circle.description:
Many stories tell of a clearing deep in the Mwangi jungle, surrounded by ancient cypress trees. At the center stands an ancient baobab tree growing around a large sphere of black basalt. Legends say that two spirit brothers, Ranage and Golokango, dwelled there long ago until Golokango's evil ways forced the virtuous Ranage to encase his brother in stone. Ranage then transformed himself into a tree to surround and protect the rock for all time. By telling this tale, you condemn an enemy to a stony fate similar to Golokango's and summon plants to surround them.

When you Cast this Spell, every square adjacent to the target becomes difficult terrain from the sudden eruption of plant life for 1 minute. The target also attempts a Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected.

Sukces The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1} as their feet are bound within stone. This condition lasts until they move from their current position.

Porażka The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony} as their legs are encased in rock. The clumsy condition lasts until they move from their current position, and they can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} from being immobilized with a check against your spell DC.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is clumsy 2 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Spętany} as nearly their entire body is covered in basalt. The clumsy condition lasts until they move from their current position, and they can Escape from being restrained with a successful check against your spell DC.

Ranger's Bramble.name: Ranger's Bramble
Ranger's Bramble.description:
You cause plants in the area to entangle your foes, with the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.J6vNvrUT3b1hx2iA]{Entangling Flora}. A creature that critically fails the save takes @Damage[(max(0,@item.level –1))d4[bleed]] damage in addition to being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony}. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escaping} your bramble doesn't end the bleed damage.

Wywyższenie (+1) The bleed damage on a critical failure increases by 1k4.

Ransack the Night.name: Ransack the Night
Ransack the Night.cost: blessed salt, citrus fruits (such as yuzu or limes), and rare spices worth 25 gp × the spell rank
Ransack the Night.description:
When Fumeiyoshi was punished by the Celestial Court for deicide and fratricide, the rat who would become Lao Shu Po robbed the cangue-bound Fumeiyoshi of a sizable chunk of his shadow. This fully catalyzed the rat's transformation into Lao Shu Po, the new Tian goddess of night. Ransack the night is a Laoite ritual allowing you to mimic this divine thievery and shroud yourself in the night's cerements.

This ritual can only be performed at night. You dig narrow troughs into the dirt and toss blessed salt as well as the juice of citrus fruits into these gashes in the ground. Performing this ritual in an area actively haunted by undead or frequented by fiends reduces the DCs of the ritual's skill checks by 2. If the ritual is successful, a smoky black miasma, said to be the blood and tears of Fumeiyoshi himself, emerges from the broken earth to augment and enhance your spiritual aura, helping you to remain undetected by fiends and undead.

Krytyczny Sukces Fiends and undead who are 5. level or lower treat you as if you were @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty}. If you take a hostile action against a fiend or undead, you lose this concealment against that fiend or undead until the end of your next turn.

Sukces As critical success, but when you lose concealment against a fiend or undead, you don't regain concealment from this ritual against that fiend or undead.

Porażka The ritual has no effect.

Krytyczna Porażka The miasma occludes your senses instead; for 24 hours, the targets treat fiends and undead as if they were concealed.

Wywyższenie (+1) Increase the level of affected creatures by 2.

Rapid Adaptation.name: Rapid Adaptation
Rapid Adaptation.description:
You flood the target with energy from the terrain around it, compressing centuries of evolution into a single moment. The target gains one of the following natural adaptations based on the surrounding environment.

  • Aquatic The target gains a swim Speed equal to its land Speed. If it already had a swim Speed, it gains a +10-foot status bonus to its swim Speed.
  • Arctic The target isn't affected by severe or extreme cold, and when it rolls a success on an Acrobatics check to Balance on ice and snow, it gets a critical success instead.
  • Desert The target isn't affected by severe or extreme heat, and when it rolls a success on an Acrobatics check to Balance on sand, it gets a critical success instead.
  • Forest The target gains scent as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet.
  • Mountain The target isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda} when Climbing, and when it rolls a success on an Acrobatics check to Balance on rubble, it gets a critical success instead.
  • Plains The target gains a +10-foot status bonus to its land Speed.
  • Underground The target gains darkvision.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.fGK6zJ7mWz9D5QYo]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Rapid Adaptation}

Ravening Maw.name: Ravening Maw
Ravening Maw.description:
You evoke Zevgavizeb's unceasing hunger and inflict it upon your target. The target becomes overwhelmed with cannibalistic hunger and can restore its vitality by feasting on the flesh of the fallen. On its turn, the target can use 2 actions (these actions have the manipulate trait) to cannibalize an adjacent @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Umierający} or dead creature. If the cannibalized creature is Dying, it dies. If the cannibalized creature is an ally of the target, the target regains 5k8 HP; otherwise, the target regains 5k4 HP. Certain monsters (such as those whose blood is acidic or magical) might inflict additional effects on those who cannibalize them at the GM's discretion. Once cannibalized, a particular creature's body doesn't have enough meat to cannibalize again. During any round that there's a Dying or dead creature within 30 feet of the target, if the target can't or doesn't cannibalize a creature, the target takes 5k4 mental damage.

Wywyższenie (+1) The amount of HP restored by cannibalizing a creature increases by 1k8 for eating an ally and 1k4 otherwise, and the mental damage increases by 1k4.

Ravenous Darkness.name: Ravenous Darkness
Ravenous Darkness.description: You create a shroud of magical darkness that feeds on those inside it. This globe of pure darkness is identical to that created by a 4. kręgu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4GE2ZdODgIQtg51c]{Ciemność} spell. Blunt, gnashing teeth made of shadows gnaw at the creatures within. Make a spell attack roll against the Fortitude DC of each creature in the area. Any creature that fails takes 4k6 bludgeoning damage as teeth attach to it. While the teeth are attached, it takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds and can't Step. Whenever a creature ends its turn in the area, the teeth attempt to attach to that creature if they haven't already, and they deal 1k6 bludgeoning damage to any creature they're already attached to. The shadowy teeth become unattached from any creature that leaves the area but can't otherwise be detached from a creature while that creature remains in the area. You can Dismiss the spell.

Ravenous Portal.name: Ravenous Portal
Ravenous Portal.description:
You place a ward upon the door that triggers when a creature attempts to open, unlock, or destroy the door. When that happens, the door transforms into a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.Br1AtKUHe3nbzjnY]{Mimic} that can't move and is hostile to all creatures. When Casting the Spell, you designate yourself and up to 10 other creatures of your choice; these creatures don't trigger the ward, and the mimic is helpful to them instead of hostile. No effect can move the mimic unless it's also capable of moving the entire door. Once the door transforms into a mimic, it attacks creatures in its reach for up to 1 minute, and then the spell ends. If the mimic is killed before that time, the spell ends and the door returns to its normal form.

While turned into a mimic, the door can't be opened, unlocked, or bypassed-not even by the designated creatures. It's a creature, not a door, during that time. When the spell ends, the door returns to the state it was in before the ward was triggered.
Ravenous Portal.target: 1 door no more than 10 feet tall and 5 feet wide

Ravenous Reanimation.name: Ravenous Reanimation
Ravenous Reanimation.cost: valuable treasures from the target dragon's hoard worth a total value of 50 000 gp
Ravenous Reanimation.description:
You destroy the gathered treasures with your breath weapon or other powerful magic, then invoke necromantic energies before you feed upon the charred and melted remains. As you do so, void energy courses through your flesh, automatically killing you. Each individual ravener's ravenous reanimation requires three to five unique additional components. Whether or not you return as a ravener depends on the success of the ritual.

Krytyczny Sukces You immediately transform into a ravener upon finishing the ritual; your soul ward starts at full Hit Points (equal to 5 × your level).

Sukces You rise as a ravener 24 hours after completing the ritual, as long as your body remains relatively intact. When you rise as a ravener, your soul ward starts at 1 Hit Point.

Porażka You rise as a ravener husk 24 hours after completing the ritual.

Krytyczna Porażka You die.
Ravenous Reanimation.requirements: You must be an evil dragon

Ray of Corruption.name: Ray of Corruption
Ray of Corruption.description:
You unleash a sickly gray beam of toxic spores at your target. Make a spell attack against the target. If you hit a non-magical object that's made of organic material (such as a tree, wooden house, or massive skull), it melts away into a foul-smelling sludge. A single casting can destroy no more than a 10-foot cube of matter.

If you hit a creature, it takes 6k12 poison damage and 6k12 spirit damage with a basic Fortitude save. If you critically hit, the target gets a result one degree of success worse than the outcome of its Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected.

Sukces The target takes half damage.

Porażka The target takes full damage. Fungal tendrils swiftly digest the body and reduce it to sludge — the target takes @Damage[2d12[persistent,acid]] damage.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the target takes double damage, plus @Damage[4d12[persistent,acid]] damage.

Wywyższenie (+1) The poison damage and spirit damage each increase by 1k12.

Ray of Frost.name: Promień Mrozu
Ray of Frost.description:
Wystrzeliwujesz wiązkę lodu. Wykonaj rzut ataku zaklęciem. Promień zadaje 2k4 obrażeń od zimna.

Krytyczny Sukces Cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia oraz ponosi karę statusową –10 stóp do swoich Prędkości na 1 rundę.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.I4PsUAaYSUJ8pwKC]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Promień Mrozu}

Sukces Cel odnosi normalne obrażenia.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k4.

Read Aura.name: Odczytanie Aury
Read Aura.description:
Skupiasz się na objętym za cel obiekcie, otwierając swój umysł na postrzeganie aur magicznych. Po zakończeniu rzucania zaklęcia wiesz czy przedmiot jest magiczny. Ty albo ktokolwiek z kim podzielisz się swoimi obserwacjami o aurze przedmiotu zyskuje premię sytuacyjną +2 podczas @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.eReSHVEPCsdkSL4G]{Identyfikacji Magii} na przedmiocie. Jeśli obiekt jest iluzoryczny, wykrywasz to jedynie wtedy gdy krąg efektu jest niższy niż krąg twojego zaklęcia odczytania aury.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.J6OhRNSN23KzOPRL]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Odczytanie Aury}

Wywyższenie (3.) Możesz objąć za cel do 10 obiektów.

Wywyższenie (6.) Możesz objąć za cel dowolną liczbę obiektów.

Read Fate.name: Read Fate
Read Fate.description:
You attempt to learn more about the target's fate in the short term, usually within the next day for most prosaic creatures, or the next hour or less for someone likely to have multiple rapid experiences, such as someone actively adventuring.

You learn a single enigmatic word connected to the creature's fate in that time frame. Fate is notoriously inscrutable, and the word isn't necessarily meant to be taken at face value, so the meaning is often clear only in hindsight. The GM rolls a secret @Check[flat|dc:6|traits:secret]. If the creature's fate is too uncertain, or on a failed flat check, the spell yields the word "inconclusive." Either way, the creature is then temporarily immune for 24 hours.

Read Omens.name: Odczytanie Omenów
Read Omens.description: Wyglądasz w przyszłość. Wybierz określony cel lub aktywność, które masz zamiar podejmować w najbliższym tygodniu albo wydarzenie, które twoim zdaniem może nastąpić w przeciągu tygodnia. Zdobywasz kryptyczną wskazówkę lub radę, która może cię wspomóc w uprzednio wybranej sprawie — często w postaci rymu lub omenu.

Read the Air.name: Read the Air
Read the Air.description:
You take a deep breath as you survey a social situation, showing courtesy to all around you as your intuition swiftly picks up clues about social contexts and unspoken assumptions of behavior. Your body language subconsciously changes to take advantage of this information and use it in your own interactions with those creatures.

As part of Casting this Spell, you Recall Knowledge using Society to gain information about the immediate social situation. You also gain a +1 status bonus on your next Diplomacy check to Make an Impression on those creatures present when you cast this spell, as long as the check occurs during the duration of the spell. You can read the air only once in a given social situation; casting it again has no effect.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.a3uZckqOY9zQWzZ2]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Read the Air}

Reaper's Lantern.name: Reaper's Lantern
Reaper's Lantern.description:
You call forth a ghostly lantern that guides the living toward death and the undead toward true death. It sheds bright light in the spell's area and dim light to twice that area. The lantern is insubstantial and floats near you, suspended from an ephemeral, skeletal hand. Living creatures and undead in the area when you Cast the Spell, or that enter the area later, must attempt Fortitude saves. Living creatures that fail their Fortitude saves gain only half the normal benefit from healing effects while within the area. Undead targets that fail their Fortitude saves become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 1} while within the area. Once a creature attempts a save against reaper's lantern, it uses the same outcome if it leaves the area and enters it again.

Once per turn, starting on the round after you cast reaper's lantern, you can Sustain the spell to increase the emanation's radius by 5 feet. When you do so, you force creatures in the area that haven't yet attempted a save against reaper's lantern to attempt one.

Rebounding Barrier.name: Rebounding Barrier
Rebounding Barrier.description:
Aktywator You are hit by a physical Strike.

You swiftly raise a reflective barrier, reducing physical damage and rebounding it onto your attacker. You gain resistance 10 against one physical damage type the triggering attack deals. Your attacker takes 5 damage of the same type.

Wywyższenie (+1) The resistance increases by 2. Damage dealt to your attacker increases by 1.

Rebuke Death.name: Rebuke Death
Rebuke Death.description:
You snatch creatures from the jaws of death, restoring them without the straing of a typical close call. You can spend 1 to 3 actions Casting this Spell, and you can target a number of creatures equal to the actions spent. Each target regains 3k6 Hit Points. If the target had the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Umierający} condition, coming back from Dying due to this healing doesn't increase its @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Ranny} condition.

Wywyższenie (+1) Increase the healing by 1k6.
Rebuke Death.target: 1 living creature per action spent to Cast this Spell

Recall Legacy.name: Recall Legacy
Recall Legacy.description:
You establish a mental link with the target, focusing on a piece of knowledge important to their culture, family (by birth or choice), or home settlement. Both you and the target must be aware this knowledge exists, even if you don't know the exact details.

As your magic connects them to this legacy, the target gains a non-lineage ancestry feat from their ancestry. The feat must be of a level no higher than twice recall legacy's rank and the target must meet any prerequisites for the feat.

The target is then immune to any further castings of recall legacy until their next daily preparations.

Recall Past Life.name: Recall Past Life
Recall Past Life.cost: 100 gp in special wine and symbolic herbs
Recall Past Life.description:
You and the secondary casters spend 2 days drawing sigils on one another. At the end of the second day, the secondary caster responsible for the Crafting check carefully mixes the wine with the herbs and a small amount of saliva or blood from the target. The target then drinks the concoction, entering a state of metaphorical death and rebirth, their body becoming comatose for the final day of the ritual. During this time, you and the other secondary caster bathe the body in dirt, symbolizing a grave, and sprinkle the remainder of the wine around the body. If done properly, swaddled baby orchids grow around the area, enveloping the body in a bed of flowers.

On the final hour, the target returns to life, waking up temporarily possessed by an incarnation from one of their past lives. Though they retain the memories from their current life, their demeanor and personality are different for the remaining duration of the ritual, and they also remember vivid details from their past life. Unfortunately, it's impossible to choose a particular past self or to know whether a given former incarnation has good or bad intentions.

Krytyczny Sukces The target's personality reverts to a previous incarnation, determined by the GM. Normally they keep their abilities, but in rare cases, the GM might determine that the past incarnation has a different set of abilities based on their previous life. The lingering knowledge of the past incarnation is powerful and sticks with the target, allowing them to retrain one of their skills increases into a skill in which the past incarnation was particularly talented; the list of possible skills depends on the nature of the past incarnation and is determined by the GM.

Sukces As critical success, except there's no lingering knowledge, and the target isn't able to retrain a skill increase.

Porażka Nothing happens, though the target's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Nieprzytomny} state is disturbing, and they wake up @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Wyczerpany} as well as likely hungry and thirsty.

Krytyczna Porażka The sigils are drawn improperly, or the wine was tainted. The swaddled baby orchids that grow around the body scream at the moment when the target would've awakened. The target dies and immediately animates as a malevolent zombie that carries the rot with them and seeks to destroy their former allies. Use the statistics for a husk zombie (Book of the Dead 170), or another zombie as appropriate for the target's ancestry.
Recall Past Life.target: the secondary caster who doesn't perform the Crafting check

Reclined Apport.name: Reclined Apport
Reclined Apport.description:
Walking over to an item to pick it up is so much effort. Whether it's your spellbook, a reagent, or a glass of wine, it's simply more efficient to call it to your hand. You teleport the target into your open hand. If you don't have a hand free, it falls to the ground at your feet.

Wywyższenie (3rd) You can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.

Wywyższenie (5th) The range increases to 120 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.

Wywyższenie (7th) The range increases to 120 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 2 or less.

3.target: an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less

5.target: an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less

7.target: an unattended object with a Bulk of 2 or less

Reclined Apport.target: 1 unattended object of light Bulk or less

Redact.name: Redact
Redact.description:
You strike mention of a specific name from one or more documents. When you Cast the Spell, give one proper name, be it a creature, location, or object. Any mention of that name within the document becomes blurred, smudged, or otherwise completely illegible. Epithets and unambiguous references to the name are redacted as well; for instance, redacting the name of the goddess Sarenrae from a book would also remove references to her title "the Dawnflower." Attempts to use this reference material to Recall Knowledge about the given proper name automatically fail.

Wywyższenie (3rd) Instead of striking out a given name, you can replace it with a different name you choose. Epithets and references are substituted with similar ones relating to the replacement name. Anyone reading the text can attempt a Perception or Society check against your spell DC to notice the altered text, though that doesn't tell them what the original said.

Wywyższenie (4th) At your choice, the duration is unlimited.
Redact.target: unattended written materials of up to 1 Bulk or less

Redistribute Potential.name: Redistribute Potential
Redistribute Potential.description:
Area two adjacent 5-foot squares

Energy attempts to balance out, but with your magic, you can shunt all the energy in one area to another. Creatures in either area take 4k4 damage with a @Check[fortitude|basic]{basic Fortitude save}. Choose one of the squares to steal heat, dealing cold damage, and the other to concentrate the stolen heat, dealing fire damage. A creature that fails its save also becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1} from numbness if it's in the area of stolen heat or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 1} from heat stroke if it's in the area of concentrated heat; these conditions last until the start of your next turn. If a creature is large enough to be in both squares, you choose only one of the areas for it to attempt its save against; it's unaffected by the other area.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k4.

Reed Whistle.name: Reed Whistle
Reed Whistle.description:
You enchant a blade of grass that you can easily hold in your mouth without inhibiting your speech or other actions. As a reaction, you can reduce the spell's remaining duration by 1 hour to Point Out a creature you detect as you sharply whistle through the reed. You and your allies also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Szukanie} the creature for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1k4 rounds}.

Wywyższenie (3.) The spell's duration becomes 4 hours.

Reflected Beauty.name: Reflected Beauty
Reflected Beauty.description: When you cast reflected beauty, choose a willing creature that's the same size as you and that you can see within 30 feet. The spell then disguises you with a realistic illusion, as if via @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Illusory Disguise} heightened to 3. rank, but includes tactile and olfactory sensation in addition to visual and voice. The appearance of the illusion that disguises you includes any changes to sex characteristics or other aspects needed to match the target creature's heart's desire, allowing you to interact with them as the person they could be. If you're ever more than 30 feet from the subject you're reflecting, reflected beauty immediately ends. You can Dismiss this spell.

Reflective Scales.name: Reflective Scales
Reflective Scales.description:
You grow a set of colored, glowing scales or scaled armor that stores energy before releasing it in a final burst. When you cast this spell, choose acid, cold, fire, electricity, or poison damage. You gain resistance 5 against that type of damage. The scales' color depends on the damage type you chose, such as red or orange for fire damage.

The scales store up energy as they protect you. Keep track of how much damage the scales have prevented. As a 2-action activity that has the concentrate and manipulate traits, you can explode your scales outward in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20], dealing 1k6 damage of the chosen type to all creatures in the area for every 10 damage the scales have prevented, to a maximum of 10k6 damage (after preventing 100 damage). Each creature in the area must attempt a basic Reflex save. Once you do so, the spell ends.

Wywyższenie (+2) The resistance increases by 5, and the maximum damage from the scale explosion increases by 5k6.

Regale the Lost Ones.name: Regale the Lost Ones
Regale the Lost Ones.cost: fees for opera actors, their meals, facial paint, costumes, incense, and offerings of alcohol, tobacco, and food for the lost ones with a total value of 2 gp × the spell rank × the settlement's level
Regale the Lost Ones.description:
Autumn's shorter days herald an increase in hauntings, which only intensify during winter's cold, dark nights. As fall draws to a close, some of Shenmen's villages hire or set up Tian opera troupes to enact rituals to regale the lost ones, where they perform dramas drawn from literary classics and historical events that incorporate acting, music, acrobatics, and martial arts.

These ritual performances fulfill a dual purpose; not only do they bring cheer to the living, but they also entertain and placate the "lost ones" — a euphemism for ghosts and other spirits — and seek to reduce the likelihood of attacks from such entities. Performing this ritual during the season of fall reduces the DCs of the ritual's skill checks by 2.

If the ritual is successful, sentient undead and other spirits become less hostile, allowing villagers to focus their efforts on dealing with mindless undead and other more physical threats. This ritual can only be attempted once per year per settlement; additional attempts to regale the lost ones in the same settlement automatically result in a Critical Failure.

Krytyczny Sukces Haunts and undead in the settlement that are level 3 or lower become easier to defeat. Reduce all Disable DCs for affected haunts in the settlement by 2, and all affected undead within the settlement begin combat @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1}. If the PCs perform this ritual during this adventure, they gain 3 Hope Points.

Sukces Haunts in the settlement that are level 3 or lower become easier to notice and defeat. Reduce all Disable DCs for affected haunts in the settlement by 1. If the PCs perform this ritual during this adventure, they gain 1 Hope Point.

Porażka The ritual has no effect.

Krytyczna Porażka Haunts and undead in the settlement that are level 3 or lower become more difficult to notice and defeat. Increase all Disable DCs for affected haunts in the settlement by 2, and all affected undead within the settlement gain the elite adjustment. If the PCs perform this ritual during this adventure, they lose 3 Hope Points.

Wywyższenie (+1) Increase the level of affected haunts and undead by 2.
Regale the Lost Ones.target: a settlement with a level equal to or lower than twice the ritual's level

Regenerate.name: Regenerate
Regenerate.description:
An infusion of vital energy grants a creature continuous healing. The target temporarily gains regeneration 15, which restores 15 Hit Points to it at the start of each of its turns. While it has regeneration, the target can't die from taking Hit Point damage and its @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Umierający} condition can't increase to a value that would kill it (this stops most creatures' dying condition at dying 3), though if its @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Ranny} value becomes 4 or higher, it stays @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Nieprzytomny} until its wounds are treated. If the target takes acid or fire damage, its regeneration deactivates until after the end of its next turn.

Each time the creature regains Hit Points from regeneration, it also regrows one damaged or ruined organ (if any). During the spell's duration, the creature can also reattach severed body parts by spending an Interact action to hold the body part to the area it was severed from.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.dXq7z633ve4E0nlX]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Regenerate}

Wywyższenie (9.) The regeneration increases to 20.

Reincarnate.name: Reincarnate
Reincarnate.cost: rare herbs worth a total value of the target's level (minimum 1) × 25 gp
Reincarnate.description:
You call forth the target's soul and attempt to incarnate it into a brand-new body. As the soul won't be returning to the original body, only a small portion of the creature's remains are required. These remains must have been part of the original body at the time of death, and the target must have died within the past week. If Pharasma has decided that the target's time has come or the target's soul is trapped or doesn't wish to return, this ritual automatically fails, but you discover this after you succeed at the Religion check and can end the ritual without paying the cost.

If the ritual is successful, the target's new body has a random ancestry. Roll [[/r 1d20]]. On a result of 1 through 14, the new body is one of a common ancestry, while on a 15 through 20 they become a member of an uncommon or rare ancestry. The GM chooses possible ancestries based on those found in the region and randomly determines the ancestry. For instance, the GM could roll 1k8 to choose a common ancestry from Player Core. The target replaces their ancestry Hit Points, size, Speeds, attribute boosts and flaws, traits, and special abilities with those of their new ancestry. The target loses their heritage and ancestry feats, selecting replacements from their new ancestry. The target's background, class features, and languages remain unaltered.

Krytyczny Sukces You reincarnate the target into a new adult body. This new body has full HP and has the same spells prepared as the original did when it died.

Sukces As critical success, except the new body has 1 HP and no spells prepared. The soul takes some time to adjust to their new body, leaving them @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 2}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 2}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 2} for 1 week; these conditions can't be removed or reduced by any means until the week has passed.

Porażka You fail to reincarnate the target.

Krytyczna Porażka The target's soul becomes trapped in an unintelligent animal creature of the GM's choosing, with a level no greater than half the target's level. While trapped, the target has an Intelligence score of 1 (–5 modifier) and can't use any of their own abilities.

Wywyższenie (4.) The maximum level of the target increases to 10. The cost is the target's level (minimum 1) × 40 gp.

Wywyższenie (5.) The maximum level of the target increases to 12. The cost is the target's level (minimum 1) × 75 gp.

Wywyższenie (6.) The maximum level of the target increases to 14. The cost is the target's level (minimum 1) × 125 gp. The target must have died within the past month.

Wywyższenie (7.) The maximum level of the target increases to 16. The cost is the target's level (minimum 1) × 200 gp. The target must have died within the past month.

Wywyższenie (8.) The maximum level of the target increases to 18. The cost is the target's level (minimum 1) × 300 gp. The target must have died within the past year.

Wywyższenie (9.) The maximum level of the target increases to 20. The cost is the target's level (minimum 1) × 600 gp. The target must have died within the past decade.
Reincarnate.target: 1 dead creature of up to 8. level

Reinforce Eidolon.name: Reinforce Eidolon
Reinforce Eidolon.description:
You focus deeply on the link between you and your eidolon and reinforce your eidolon's defenses. Your eidolon gains a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws, plus resistance to all damage equal to half the spell's rank. Your eidolon can benefit from either @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.HStu2Yhw3iQER9tY]{Boost Eidolon} or Reinforce Eidolon, but not both; if you cast one of these spells during the other's duration, the newer spell replaces the older one.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.UVrEe0nukiSmiwfF]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Reinforce Eidolon}

Rejuvenating Flames.name: Odżywcze Płomienie
Rejuvenating Flames.description:
You create a gout of flame that both heals and burns. You restore @Damage[(@item.level)d4[healing]] HP to all allies in the area, and those allies gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude saves for 1 minute. Enemies in the area take 1k4 fire damage with a basic Reflex save.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.06zdFoxzuTpPPGyJ]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Rejuvenating Flames}

Wywyższenie (+1) You restore an additional 1k4 HP to your allies and deal an additional 1k4 fire damage to enemies.

Remake.name: Odtworzenie
Remake.description:
Ponownie odtwarzasz obiekt od podstaw, nawet jeśli był on zniszczony. Aby to zrobić, musisz być w stanie zwizualizwać sobie przedmiot w myślach. Pozostałość przedmiotu, na podstaswie któej go odtwarzasz może być zupełnie znikoma (wystarczy nawet dtobinka pyłu pozostałego po zaklęciu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r7ihOgKv19eJQnik]{Dezintegracji}). Zaklęcie rozprasza się, jeśli twoje wyobrażenie przedmiotu jest oparte na zbyt wielu domysłach, jeśli obiekt nie zmieściłby się w sześcianie o krawędzi 5 stóp, jeśli obiekt dalej istnieje tylko jesteś tego nieświadomy lub jeśli obiekt jest artefaktem, ma poziom większy od 20. albo potężną magiczną moc podobnego kalibru.

Przedmiot jest odtwarzany w stanie idealnym. Nawet jeśli twoja mentalna wizualizacja przedmiotu przedstawiała go w uszkodzonej czy zużytej postaci, nowy przedmiot jest w doskonałej kondycji. Jeśli przedmiot był magiczny, zaklęcie to na ogół przywraca jego stałe magiczne właściwościm, ale nie tymczasowe, takie jak ładunki czy jednokrotne użycia. Przedmiot posiadający ładunki lub limit dziennych użyć ma po odtworzeniu wykorzystane wszystkie użycia, ale odnawia je normalnie w późnieszym czasie.

Remember the Lost.name: Remember the Lost
Remember the Lost.description:
You call upon the lost and forgotten, assailing your foes' minds with the memories of those who died with a grievance toward them. Enemies in the area take 6k6 mental damage (basic Will save) and are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1} on a critical failure.

If you know the names of anyone murdered or grievously wronged by an enemy in the area, you can chant those victims' names when you Cast the Spell to improve the clarity of the visions, increasing the damage to the corresponding enemy from 6k6 to @Damage[(2*(@item.level - 1))d10[mental]|shortLabel]; you can do so for multiple enemies if you know specific victims of each enemy. The visions are personal to each foe in the area, and you can't use this spell to discern a murderer by guessing a name. A creature that truly knows no one who died with any sort of grievance to that creature is immune to this effect.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 2k6 (or 2k10 to an enemy when you name a specific victim).

Repel Metal.name: Repel Metal
Repel Metal.description:
Aktywator A Strike with a metallic weapon or projectile would hit you or an ally within range.

You call forth a repelling field. The target gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the attack then misses, you direct the Strike back at the attacker, who compares the attack roll to their own AC. The target then becomes immune to this spell for 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.vhFnQBvguBXo6vxx]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Repel Metal}
Repel Metal.target: the creature targeted by the triggering Strike

Repelling Pulse.name: Repelling Pulse
Repelling Pulse.description:
You unleash a powerful pulse of telekinetic power, and the pulse violently hurls creatures away from you. Each creature in the area takes 7k10 force damage depending on its Reflex save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia and is pushed 10 feet away from you.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota odnosi podwójne obrażenia. The creature is pushed 20 feet away from you and is then knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}.

Wywyższenie (+2) The force damage increases by 2k10, and the distance the target is moved on a failure and critical failure increases by 5 feet.

Replicate.name: Replicate
Replicate.description:
You create an illusory magical double that physically looks and behaves very similarly to the target. This double is limited to moving, Interacting, speaking short sentences, and other similar basic tasks. It is unable to cast spells, attack, or use any complex skills.

The illusory duplicate is your minion. You can issue new commands to the double as part of Sustaining the Spell. You can command the duplicate telepathically as long as the spell lasts, provided it's within 1 mile of you. You can switch between using your own senses and the duplicate's senses with a single action, which has the concentrate trait. The illusory duplicate has the same statistics as the original creature, except it doesn't have any of the original's item bonuses, and it has one quarter of the original's Hit Points. If the double's Hit Points are reduced to 0, the spell ends.

Wywyższenie (+1) The maximum level of the target increases by 2.
Replicate.target: 1 willing or unconscious creature of 8. level or lower

Repulsion.name: Odpychanie
Repulsion.description:
Manifestujesz aurę, która uniemożliwia istotom zbliżenie się do ciebie. Rzucając Zaklęcie, możesz nadać obszarowi dowolny promień, do 40 stóp. Istota musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli, jeśli znajduje się w obszarze, gdy Rzucasz Zaklęcie, lub gdy tylko wejdzie do obszaru, podczas gdy zaklęcie jest aktywne. Gdy istota wykona już rzut obronny, używa tego samego wyniku dla tego rzucenia odpychania. Wszelkie ograniczenia nakładane na ruch istoty mają zastosowanie tylko wtedy, gdy dobrowolnie porusza się ona w twoim kierunku. Na przykład, jeśli to ty zbliżysz się do istoty, nie musi się ona odsuwać.

Krytyczny Sukces Ruch istoty nie jest ograniczony.

Sukces Istota traktuje każde pole w obszarze jako trudny teren podczas zbliżania się do ciebie.

Porażka Istota nie może zbliżyć się do ciebie będąc w obrębie obszaru.

Resist Energy.name: Odparcie Energii
Resist Energy.description:
Tarcza żywiołowej energii chroni istotę przed wybranym rodzajem obrażeń od energii. Wybierz obrażenia od dźwięku, elektryczności, kwasu, ognia lub zimna. Cel oraz jego wyposażenie zyskują odporność 5 na wybrany przez ciebie typ obrażeń.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.con2Hzt47JjpuUej]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Odparcie Energii}

Wywyższenie (4.) Odporność zwiększa się do 10 i możesz objąć za cel zaklęcia do dwóch istot.

Wywyższenie (7.) Odporność zwiększa się do 15 i możesz objąć za cel zaklęcia do pięciu istot.

Resplendent Mansion.name: Resplendent Mansion
Resplendent Mansion.description:
You conjure a towering mansion up to four stories tall and up to 300 feet on a side. While Casting the Spell, you hold an image of the mansion and its desired appearance in your mind. The mansion can contain as many or as few rooms as you desire, and it's decorated as you imagine it. You can imagine a purpose for each room of the mansion, and the proper accouterments appear within. Any furniture or other mundane fixtures function normally for anyone inside the mansion, but they cease to exist if taken beyond its walls. No fixture created with this spell can create magical effects, but magical devices brought into the mansion function normally.

Your mansion contains the same types and quantities of foodstuffs and servants as created by the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vPWMEyVTreMOoFnm]{Planar Palace} spell.

Each of the mansion's exterior doorways and windows are protected by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4WAib3GichxLjp5p]{Alarm} spells. You choose whether each alarm is audible or mental as you Cast the Spell, and each has a different sound (for an audible alarm) or sensation (for a mental one), allowing you to instantly determine which portal has been used.

Rest Eternal.name: Rest Eternal
Rest Eternal.cost: rare oils to anoint the body worth a total value of the target's level (minimum 1) × 25 gp;
Rest Eternal.description:
You call upon gods, spirits, and stranger beings to bar a creature's spirit from ever returning. A spirit that doesn't wish to be so constrained can attempt a Will save to resist this ritual; on a critical success, it fools you into believing the ritual succeeded. This ritual has no effect on a target who is undead or whose soul is otherwise not in the afterlife.

Krytyczny Sukces You sequester the subject's spirit to the afterlife. Attempts to communicate with the dead creature, return it to life, turn it into an undead, or otherwise disturb its afterlife fail unless the effect's counteract rank is at least 2 higher than that of rest eternal or originates from an artifact or a deity. Successfully returning the creature to life ends the restrictions placed by rest eternal.

Sukces As critical success, but effects to interact with the spirit fail unless the effect's counteract rank is higher than that of rest eternal or originates from an artifact or a deity.

Porażka The ritual has no effect.

Krytyczna Porażka The ritual fails, and the spirits you appealed to are angered. All casters become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} for 1 week.

Restoration.name: Przywrócenie
Restoration.description:
Przywracająca siły magia przeciwdziała efektom toksyn i statusów nie pozwalających istocie na działanie na pełną miarę jej możliwości. Kiedy rzucasz przywrócenie, wybierz między zredukowaniem statusu lub osłabieniem działania toksyny. Istota może odnieść korzyści tylko z jednego zaklęcia przywrócenia dziennie, oraz nie może odnieść korzyści z przywrócenia więcej niż raz na rzecz zmiejszania stadium konkretnej toksyny.

  • Osłabienie Toksyny Zmniejsz stadium jednej z toksyn, które dotykają celu, o jedno stadium. Nie może to zredukować stadium poniżej 1 ani uleczyć tej dolegliwości.
  • Redukcja Statusu Zmniejsz wartość @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdatności}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabienia} lub @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupienia} celu o 2. Możesz zamiast tego zredukować wartość dwóch wybranych z tej listy statusów o 1 każdą.

Wywyższenie (4.) Dodaj do listy statusów, których wartość możesz zmniejszyć @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczenie}. Kiedy osłabiasz toksynę, zmniejsz jej stadium o dwa. Zyskujesz też trzecią opcję, która pozwala ci na zmniejszenie wartości @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Zgubienia} o 1. Nie możesz użyć tej opcji aby zmniejszyć wartość trwałego efektu Zguby.

Wywyższenie (6.) Jak przywrócenie 4. kręgu ale możesz zmniejszyć wartość trwałego efektu jeśli zapewnisz zaklęciu koszt diamentowego pyłu o wartości 100 sz.

Restorative Moment.name: Restorative Moment
Restorative Moment.description: Your patron weaves the threads of time around the target, giving them some of the benefits of a day's passage. The target decreases the values of any @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Zgubiony} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony} conditions it has by 1 and can immediately attempt one saving throw against each affliction it has with a stage length of 1 day or less. The target is then temporarily immune for 1 day.

Restore Ground.name: Przywrócenie Gruntu
Restore Ground.description:
Czujesz, że to miejsce pragnie zrzucić kajdany cywilizacji. Próbujesz przywrócić obszar wewnątrz wybuchu do naturalnego stanu, usuwając wszystkie sztuczne obiekty i budynki oraz pobudzając wzrost roślin na pozostałym gruncie. Istoty nie zostają dodknięte zaklęciem, chyba że w skutek w zawalenia się konstrukcji.

  • Grunt Cały grunt w obszarze staje się bardzo trudnym terenem na 1 rundę.
  • Obiekty Każdy niepilnowany obiekt o Naręczu 4 lub mniejszym zostaje zniszczony, niezależnie od Twardości, chyba że jest to artefakt lub podobnie trudny do zniszczenia przedmiot.
  • Rośliny Rośliny w obszarze stają się zdrowsze i bardziej owocne przez 1 rok.
  • Konstrukcje Konstrukcje w zasięgu są wstrząsane i mogą się zawalić, jakby były dotknięte przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.x7SPrsRxGb2Vy2nu]{Trzęsienie Ziemi}.

Restyle.name: Restylizacja
Restyle.description: Trwale zmieniasz wygląd jednej części garderoby noszonej aktualnie przez ciebie lub sojusznika, aby lepiej spełniała wasze zapotrzebowania estetyczne. Możesz zmienić kolor, teksturę, wzór i inne drobne elementy stylu, ale zmiany nie mogą wpłynąć na ogólny kształt, rozmiar ani przeznaczenie ubrania. Zmiany nie mogą podnieść jakości wykonania ani artyzmu elementu ubioru, ale szczególnie niedbały wybór nowego koloru i wzoru może obniżyć atrakcyjność jego wyglądu. Zaklęcie to przekształca istniejące materiały nadając im pożądany wygląd i nigdy nie zmienia materiału ani nie tworzy większej ilości materiału niż zawierał początkowo obiekt. Statystyki obiektu również nie ulegają zmianie.
Restyle.target: 1 część garderoby noszona obecnie przez ciebie lub sojusznika

Resurrect.name: Wskrzeszenie
Resurrect.cost: gemstones worth a total value of 75 gp × the target's level
Resurrect.description:
You attempt to call forth the target's soul and return it to its body. This requires the target's body to be present and relatively intact. The target must have died within the past year. If @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Item.QZD0u1jxwz0kj8uI]{Farazma} has decided that the target's time has come or the target doesn't wish to return, this ritual automatically fails, but you discover this after the successful Religion check and can end the ritual without paying the cost.

Krytyczny Sukces You resurrect the target. They return to life with full Hit Points and the same spells prepared and points in their pools they had when they died, and still suffering from any long-term debilitations of the old body. The target meets an agent of their deity during the resurrection who inspires them, granting them a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, Perception, saving throws, and skill checks for 1 week. The target is also permanently changed in some way by their time in the afterlife, such as gaining a slight personality shift, a streak of white in the hair, or a strange new birthmark.

Sukces As critical success, except the target returns to life with 1 Hit Point and no spells prepared or points in any pools, and still is affected by any long-term debilitations of the old body. Instead of inspiring them, the character's time in the Boneyard has left them temporarily debilitated. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 1}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 1} for 1 week; these conditions can't be removed or reduced by any means until the week has passed.

Porażka Your attempt is unsuccessful.

Krytyczna Porażka Something goes horribly wrong-an evil spirit possesses the body, the body transforms into a special kind of undead, or some worse fate befalls the target.

Wywyższenie (6.) You can resurrect a target of up to 12. level, and the base cost is 125 gp.

Wywyższenie (7.) You can use resurrect even with only a small portion of the body; the ritual creates a new body on a success or critical success. The target must have died within the past decade. The ritual requires four secondary casters, each of whom must be at least half the target's level. The target can be up to 14. level, and the base cost is 200 gp.

Wywyższenie (8.) As 7. rank, but the target can be up to 16. level and the base cost is 300 gp.

Wywyższenie (9.) You can use resurrect even without the body as long as you know the target's name and have touched a portion of its body at any time. The target must have died within the past century, and it doesn't gain the negative conditions on a success. The ritual requires eight secondary casters, each of whom must be at least half the target's level. The target can be up to 18. level, and the base cost is 600 gp.

Wywyższenie (10.) As 9. rank, except it doesn't matter how long ago the target died. The ritual requires 16 secondary casters, each of whom must be at least half the target's level. The target can be up to 20. level, and the ritual's base cost is 1 000 gp.
Resurrect.target: 1 dead creature of up to 10. level

Retreat Among the Rains.name: Retreat Among the Rains
Retreat Among the Rains.cost: at least 5 drops of water from a naturally occurring source (such as rainfall, rivers, or the seas) placed on the primary caster's face
Retreat Among the Rains.description:
Ganhil developed this ritual to emulate the epiphanies and flowing mental states he experienced during 4718's Challenge of Sky and Heaven: intense focus, emotional acceptance, dilated perceptions, and growing awareness of elemental perfection.

During the casting of this ritual, your thoughts enter a mindscape whose subjective flow of time is different, allowing you to perform retraining that would take a least a week of downtime. Your physical body still requires food or shelter during this time, so the secondary caster must nourish you with milk porridge or protect you from the elements with a raised parasol or similar item.

Krytyczny Sukces At the end of the ritual, you can retrain a class feature, feat, or skill.

Sukces At the end of the ritual, you can retrain a feat or skill.

Porażka At the end of the ritual, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Wyczerpany} condition.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, and you also suffer from starvation and thirst as if you hadn't eaten for a week, taking @Damage[(10d4+7)] damage that cannot be healed until you eat and drink.

Retributive Pain.name: Retributive Pain
Retributive Pain.description:
Aktywator A creature in range damages you.

You vengefully reflect your pain upon your tormentor. The target takes mental damage equal to half the triggering damage.

Retrocognition.name: Retrokognicja
Retrocognition.description:
Otwierając swój umysł na mentalne echa, zyskujesz wrażenia z przeszłych wydarzeń, które miały miejsce w twojej obecnej okolicy. Retrokognicja ujawnia psychiczne ślady wydarzeń, które miały miejsce w ciągu ostatniego dnia przez pierwszą minutę trwania, następnie ślady dnia poprzedniego przez następną minutę i tak dalej. Te echa nie odtwarzają się jak wizja, ale zamiast tego ujawniają ślady emocji i metafory, które dostarczają zagadkowych wskazówek i detali z przeszłości. Jeśli doświadczysz przez taki ślad traumatycznego lub burzliwego wydarzenia, zaklęcie kończy się, chyba że odniesiesz sukces w rzucie obronnym Woli o ST co najmniej 30 do być może nawet 50, w zależności od powagi wydarzenia. MG określa, czy wydarzenie jest traumatyczne i wybiera ST.

Wywyższenie (8.) Odkrywasz ślady wydarzeń, które miały miejsce w ciągu poprzedniego roku, zamiast poprzedniego dnia, za każdą minutę koncentracji, chociaż szczegóły zanikają, co utrudnia odczytanie śladów innych, niż te pochodzące z największych i najważniejszych wydarzeń.

Wywyższenie (9.) Odkrywasz ślady wydarzeń, które miały miejsce w ciągu poprzedniego stulecia, zamiast poprzedniego dnia, za każdą minutę koncentracji, chociaż szczegóły zanikają, co czyni niemal niemożliwym odczytanie śladów innych, niż te pochodzące z największych i najważniejszych wydarzeń.

Return Beacon.name: Return Beacon
Return Beacon.description:
You create a unique planar beacon somewhere within the spell's range that remains in place. The beacon is invisible except when detected by detect magic, in which case it looks like a 10-foot-wide tower of bright light stretching into the sky. At any time during the duration of the beacon, you can complete a 1-minute activity, which has the concentrate and manipulate traits, to focus on the beacon and transport yourself and any items you're wearing and holding from your current space to the location of the beacon. Transporting yourself in this way ends the spell. If this would bring another creature with you-even if you're carrying it in an extradimensional container-the beacon collapses, ending the spell, and the transportation attempt fails.

Casting return beacon while a beacon is active causes the previous return beacon spell to end. If you are not within 1 mile of the beacon, your attempt to transport yourself to the beacon fails. If a solid object is in the same space as the beacon when you transport yourself, you arrive in the nearest open space to the beacon. If there is not an open space within 30 feet of the beacon, your attempt to transport yourself fails, but the beacon remains intact.

Wywyższenie (7.) The duration is 8 hours and you can transport yourself to the beacon from up to 100 miles away.

Wywyższenie (8.) The duration is 24 hours and you can transport yourself to the beacon from up to 1 000 miles away. In addition, you can bring 1 willing ally you touch with you when you transport to the beacon.

Wywyższenie (9.) The duration is 1 week and you can transport yourself to the beacon from anywhere on the same plane. In addition, you can bring up to 4 willing allies you touch with you when you transport to the beacon.

Wywyższenie (10.) The duration is unlimited and you can transport yourself to the beacon from any distance, even across other planes. In addition, you can bring up to 8 willing allies you touch when you transport to the beacon.

Return To Essence.name: Return To Essence
Return To Essence.description:
You unravel the magic of a spell that affects a container, door, or lock, converting it into energy you can repurpose to power your own spells.

Attempt a counteract check against the target spell or magical effect that wards or seals a doorway or chest, such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Azoh0BSoCASrA1lr]{Zamknięcie}, or against a spell or effect that deals damage or delivers secondary effects when it's opened, such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.o0l57UfBm9ScEUMW]{Rune Trap}. If you succeed, you recover its energy, restoring one of your expended spell slots of 3. rank or lower.

Wywyższenie (8.) You can restore an expended spell slot of 4. rank or lower.

Wywyższenie (9.) You can restore an expended spell slot of 5. rank or lower.

Wywyższenie (10.) You can restore an expended spell slot of 6. rank or lower.
Return To Essence.target: one magically sealed or warded doorway or chest

Return the Favor.name: Return the Favor
Return the Favor.description:
Aktywator An ally uses a reaction to grant you a beneficial effect during a combat encounter.

You're unable to leave any debts unpaid. When an ally supports you in a fight, you offer assistance in turn for the favor. The triggering ally gains 12 temporary Hit Points for 1 minute.

Wywyższenie (+1) The temporary Hit Points increase by 4.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.cSoL5aMy3PCzM4Yv]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Return the Favor}

Revealing Light.name: Ujawniające Światło
Revealing Light.description:
Po obszarze rozchodzi się fala magicznego światła. Wybierasz wygląd światła, taki jak kolorowe zorze, nieszkodliwe płomienie lub błyszczące iskierki. Istota objęta ujawniającym światłem jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczona}. Jeśli istota była @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialna}, staje się zamiast tego @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięta}. Jeśli istota była już z jakiegokolwiek powodu przysłonięta, przestaje taka być.
