Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Światło wywiera wpływ na istotę na 2 rundy.

Porażka Światło wywiera wpływ na istotę na 1 minutę.

Krytyczna Porażka Światło wywiera wpływ na istotę na 10 minut.

Revel in Retribution.name: Revel in Retribution
Revel in Retribution.description:
Time seems to slow for you, allowing you to strike your opponents mid-move. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.KAVf7AmRnbCAHrkT]{Reactive Strike} ability, and you immediately gain a second reaction that you can use only to use Reactive Strike. At the start of each of your subsequent turns when you regain your actions, you gain an additional reaction that can be used only to attempt a Reactive Strike.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.3TRArzn1UdcWHkja]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Revel in Retribution}

Lashing out at a defenseless enemy invigorates you with the thrill of combat, granting you 5 temporary Hit Points whenever you successfully hit with a Reactive Strike. The temporary Hit Points last for the spell's duration.

Wywyższenie (+1) The temporary Hit Points you gain from a successful Reactive Strike increase by 1.

Reverse Gravity.name: Reverse Gravity
Reverse Gravity.description:
Area (continued) 20-foot radius, 40-foot tall cylinder

You reverse gravity in the area. Creatures and objects that aren't secured to the ground immediately fall upward to the top of the area. A creature might be able to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.3yoajuKjwHZ9ApUY]{Grab an Edge} to arrest its fall if it falls past an appropriate surface. If a creature falls against a solid object (such as a ceiling), it takes the appropriate amount of falling damage and lands on the surface. Once an object or creature reaches the top of the area, it floats, caught between the normal and reversed gravity. The creature can move along the plane where the two forms of gravity meet. Creatures that can levitate or fly can use those abilities to mitigate the effects of reverse gravity.

When reverse gravity ends, all creatures and objects caught in the area fall back down. Likewise, anything that moves beyond the spell's area is subjected to normal gravity again.

Revival.name: Zmartwychwstanie
Revival.description:
A burst of healing energy soothes living creatures and temporarily rouses those recently slain. All living targets regain 10k8+40 Hit Points.

In addition, you return any number of dead targets to life temporarily, with the same effects and limitations as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IkGYwHRLhkuoGReG]{Raise Dead}. The raised creatures have a number of temporary Hit Points equal to the Hit Points you gave living creatures, but no normal Hit Points. The raised creatures can't regain Hit Points or gain temporary Hit Points in other ways, and once revival's duration ends, they lose all temporary Hit Points and die.

Revival can't resurrect creatures killed by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r7ihOgKv19eJQnik]{Disintegrate} or a death effect. It has no effect on undead.
Revival.target: dead creatures and living creatures of your choice within range

Rewinding Step.name: Rewinding Step
Rewinding Step.description:
You anchor your location in time so that you can swiftly retrace your steps later with complex chronomancy. The space you're in when you cast the spell becomes your temporal anchor space. While you're within 500 feet of your temporal anchor space, you can spend a single action that has the concentrate trait to instantaneously return to that space (you don't need to have line of effect to the space). The spell then ends. You bring any items that are in your possession with you when you take the action to return.

If the anchor space is occupied when you attempt to return to it or if this spell would bring another creature with you, the spell fails to transport you, then ends.

Wywyższenie (7.) You can return if you're within 1 000 feet of your anchor space.

Wywyższenie (9.) You can return if you're within 1 mile of your anchor space.

Rewrite Memory.name: Rewrite Memory
Rewrite Memory.description:
You alter the target's memories by erasing a memory, enhancing a memory's clarity, altering a memory, or adding a false memory. The target can attempt a Will save to resist the spell.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected and realizes you tried to alter its memory.

Sukces The target is unaffected but thinks your spell was something harmless instead of rewrite memory, unless it identifies the spell.

Porażka During the first 5 minutes of the spell's duration, you can Sustain the spell to modify a memory once each round. When you do, you imagine up to 6 seconds of memory to modify, to a maximum of 5 continuous minutes of memory.

Any memories you've altered remain changed as long as the spell is active. If the target moves out of range before the 5 minutes is up, you can't alter any further memories.

Wywyższenie (6.) You can Cast the Spell on a willing target to suppress all memory of a particular topic, detailed in 50 words or fewer. The effect is permanent, and it patches these omissions with an indistinct haze.

Rewrite Possibility.name: Rewrite Possibility
Rewrite Possibility.description:
You continually glimpse into the target's future and nudge fate to guide them toward the best possible outcome. Due to the amount of information this spell requires you to process, you can't have more than one rewrite possibility spell in effect at a time. Casting it again ends the previous casting. While rewrite possibility is in effect, the target gains a +1 status bonus to initiative rolls. In addition, you gain the following reaction.

Rewrite Possibility r

Aktywator The target fails a check

Efekt The target rolls again with a +2 status bonus and uses the higher result.

Rigid Form.name: Rigid Form
Rigid Form.description:
You utilize wood's rigidity to prevent harmful shapechanging effects. For the duration of this spell, whenever you're targeted by a harmful polymorph effect, you can use your reaction to attempt to counteract the effect.

Wywyższenie (6.) Czas trwania zwiększa się do 10 minutes.

Rime Slick.name: Rime Slick
Rime Slick.description:
You call down a chill wind. When you Cast this Spell, you deal 2k4 cold damage to each creature in the area (podstawowy rzut obronny Refleksu). If a creature in the area critically fails its Reflex save and was standing, it also falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}.

You also create a layer of ice on all surfaces in the area, which become difficult terrain. Unattended objects in the area become slick with ice, and picking them up requires a successful Reflex save or Acrobatics check against your spell DC. The ice melts on any object that takes fire damage as well as in any square included in the area of a higher-rank spell or effect with the fire trait.

Wywyższenie (5.) Obrażenia zwiększają się do 8k4 cold damage and the area is a 30-foot burst.

Wywyższenie (8.) Obrażenia zwiększają się do 14k4 cold damage and the area is a 60-foot burst.

Ring of Truth.name: Ring of Truth
Ring of Truth.description:
You designate an area in which lies are revealed. Creatures in the area also take a –2 status penalty to Deception checks. Each time a creature in the area speaks a true statement, the soft ring of a bell sounds in the area. Creatures are aware of the magic; therefore, they can avoid answering questions to which they would normally respond with a lie, or they can be evasive as long as they remain within the boundaries of the truth. If a creature is in the area when the spell is cast or later enters the area, that creature attempts a Will save. It uses the results of this initial save if it leaves and reenters the area.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is so convincing that the bell rings even if they lie.

Sukces If the target lies and succeeds at their Deception check against all targets, the bell still rings.

Porażka The bell accurately sees through their deception and will never ring if they lie.

Rip the Spirit.name: Rip the Spirit
Rip the Spirit.description:
You supernaturally rip the spirit from a living creature's body, dooming the target to pain and death. The target takes 5k6 void damage, depending on its basic Fortitude save, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 1} if it fails its save. The spell's effect is based on how many actions you spend when Casting the Spell.

1 (somatic) The spell targets one living creature in range.

2 (somatic, verbal) The spell targets one living creature in range and the damage is @Damage[10d6[void]] damage instead of 5k6.

3 (material, somatic, verbal) The spell targets all living creatures in a 30-foot emanation.

Wywyższenie (+1) The amount of damage increases by 1k6, or by [[/r 2d6]] for the 2-action version.

Rising Surf.name: Rising Surf
Rising Surf.description:
You create a wave of water that you ride, banking around obstacles and surfing to higher ground. You move up to 35 feet, raising yourself up to 5 feet above the ground. (You can avoid many types of difficult terrain in this way.) You must end your movement on an unoccupied space where you have solid footing. This movement isn't a Stride, but you measure the distance in a similar way, and it still triggers reactions caused by movement. You can't transport anyone else with you.

Wywyższenie (+2) Increase the distance you move by 5 feet and the maximum height traveled above the ground by 5 feet.

Rite of Repatriation.name: Rite of Repatriation
Rite of Repatriation.cost: rare incense, offerings, or charitable donations to the rightful owners worth a total value of 5 gp × the target's level (minimum 1 gp)
Rite of Repatriation.description:
You call upon and apologize to local spirits as you ritually return a culturally important object to its creators, heirs, or resting place. If the spirits accept, they repair some of any damage the object might have sustained since it was last in their possession. Learning about the item's significance and its rightful owners' history often makes this ritual easier to perform, as does performing significant deeds to repair past harm. The deeds or depth of knowledge required is subject to the GM's discretion. Typically, this gives the primary check a hard DC (rather than very hard) for a level that's twice the spell's rank, and it gives the secondary checks an easy DC (rather than standard).

Sukces The ritual restores up to 5 Hit Points per spell rank to the object, potentially removing the broken condition if this repairs it past the item's Broken Threshold; the ritual does not replace lost pieces, not does it repair an object that's been destroyed. This restores only Hit Points lost since the item was last in its rightful owners' possession. In addition, the primary caster attempts a counteract check against one curse, spell effect, creature occupying the item with a possession effect, or similar effect that began affecting the item since it was last in its rightful owners' possession. This functions as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Rozproszenie Magii} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SUKaxVZW2TlM8lu0]{Ulżenie w Dolegliwości}. If the primary caster successfully counteracts a possession effect, the possessing creature either manifests adjacent to the item (if incorporeal) or returns to its body (if not).

Porażka As success, but the spirits lambast the casters for letting the item become lost in the first place, making the casters @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1}.

Krytyczna Porażka The ritual fails, and the casters become doomed 1.

Wywyższenie (+1) Increase the maximum target level by 2, the cast time by 1 hour, and the base cost by 10 sz
Rite of Repatriation.secondarycheck: Occultism or Religion (którekolwiek używane jest do testu głównego); Diplomacy, Performance, Society, or a Lore corresponding to the rightful owners

Rite of the Red Star.name: Rite of the Red Star
Rite of the Red Star.description:
You invoke the latent power within the Doorway to the Red Star through repetitive chanting and ritual movements in an attempt to open a portal to the planet Akiton.

Krytyczny Sukces The plaza hums with magical energy that vibrates bones, causes hair to rise as if in a static field, and graces the tongue with flavors both unbearably sweet and terribly foul. The crimson pillars of the Doorway itself begin to smoke, then shimmer with red light, while the air within the ring shifts and ripples as if in the throes of intense heat. A moment later, a portal to Akiton opens at the center of the standing stones. This portal is vertical and semi-circular, with a radius of 30 feet, and is filled with shimmering red energy-it doesn't provide a view of the other side. Any caster who steps through this portal is instantly transported to area B1 of the Hall of Reason on Akiton.

Sukces As critical success, but the portal's magic is distressed and unstable. When a caster steps through the portal, they must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:36|traits:conjuration] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 1} from the stress of the magical journey.

Porażka The portal fails to open, and all casters must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:36|traits:conjuration] save to avoid becoming drained 1 from the backlash of magical energy.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the misfire attracts the attention of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.Actor.qjAtPDIi7OyUGsNy]{Bythos} aeon which appears in the area at once and attempts to destroy the stones of the Doorway. After one round of attacks, it realizes the portal is beyond its ability to damage, and attempts to slay those who attempted to activate the portal in the first place.
Rite of the Red Star.secondarycheck: DC 35 Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion

Ritual Obstruction.name: Ritual Obstruction
Ritual Obstruction.description: You establish a zone of magical feedback that makes it impossible to succeed at rituals of this spell's rank or lower in the area. Ritual obstruction ignores all cover, including walls and ceilings, to the extent of its area. Anyone attempting to cast a ritual within the area knows, when they begin to cast the ritual, the area is cursed to impede rituals. Any ritual cast in the area can't have a final result better than failure.

River Carving Mountains.name: River Carving Mountains
River Carving Mountains.description:
Your apparition solidifies around you into roaring water and spraying mist. For the duration of this spell, you have lesser cover against ranged attacks and gain a +10-foot status bonus to each Speed you have. When you first cast this spell and each time you Sustain it, you can Stride up to your speed while your apparition fills each square you pass through with the lingering energy of a coursing river. These squares become difficult terrain until the start of your next turn. You can use river carving mountains while Burrowing, Climbing, Flying, or Swimming instead of Striding if you have the corresponding movement type.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.aaA6cgroFMRMsisy]{Efekt Zaklęcia: River Carving Mountains}

Roar of the Dragon.name: Roar of the Dragon
Roar of the Dragon.description:
You channel the might of dragons into your voice, letting out a roar that engenders respect in dragonkind but that instills fear in most other creatures. The impressive roar grants you a +2 circumstance bonus to Diplomacy checks for 10 minutes against dragons that were in the area at the time of casting.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.0s6YaL3IjqECmjab]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Roar of the Dragon}

Roar of the dragon affects non-dragon creatures with deep ties to dragonkind (such as a barbarian with the draconic instinct, a sorcerer with the draconic bloodline, or a member of a culture that reveres dragons) as if they had the dragon trait. The GM decides if a creature is aligned enough with dragonkind to be affected in this way. All enemies within the area other than dragons must attempt a Will save; to these enemies, roar of the dragon is a fear effect.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature is unaffected.

Sukces The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1}.

Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2}.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 3} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Uciekający} for 1 round.

Roaring Applause.name: Roaring Applause
Roaring Applause.description:
Your flamboyant flourish invokes such powerful feelings in your audience that you incite cheers and applause. Targets of this spell must be able to see, hear, or otherwise understand you. The targets must attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target becomes mildly distracted by your display and applauds while it isn't fully occupied. It can't use reactions.

Porażka The target applauds you so vigorously that it can't use reactions and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1}. The applause is so involved that it has the manipulate trait. This triggers reactions based on the manipulate trait at the start of the target's turn.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, plus the target is so distracted by its vigorous applauding of you that it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Zafascynowany} with you.

Wywyższenie (6.) Możesz obrać za cel do 10 istot.

Root Reading.name: Czytanie z Korzeni
Root Reading.description: Zyskujesz ogólne pojęcie o najbliższej okolicy dzięki posłaniu swoich zmysłów ku systemowi korzeni drzew i krzewów. Jeśli w obszarze znajdują się jakiekolwiek niezauważone istoty o Rozmiarze Średnim lub większym, dowiadujesz się o ich obecności i stają się dla ciebie niewykryte. Możesz natychmiast spróbować @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Poszukać} niewykrytej istoty i zyskujesz premię statusową +1 do tej próby jak i wszystkich swoich innych prób poszukiwania @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Schowanych} lub niewykrytych istot, aż do końca swojej następnej tury. Dowiadujesz się dodatkowo, czy jakiekolwiek tego typu istoty przemierzały ten obszar w przeciągu ostatniej godziny, chociaż zaklęcie dostarcza ci jedynie nikłego pojęcia o ich kierunku. Jeśli zaczniesz @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Tropić} wykrytą w ten sposób istotę zyskujesz premię statusową +1 do początkowego testu.

Rope Trick.name: Rope Trick
Rope Trick.description:
You cause the target rope to rise vertically into the air. Where it ends, an extradimensional space opens, connected to the top of the rope. This space can be reached only by climbing the rope.

The entrance to the space can't be seen, and it can be pinpointed only by the presence of the rope. The rope can't be removed or hidden, though it can be detached from the extradimensional space by pulling it with 16 000 pounds of weight, critically succeeding at an Athletics check against the spell's DC, or destroying the rope. The space holds up to eight Medium creatures and their gear. A Large creature counts as two Medium creatures, a Huge creature counts as four Medium creatures, and a Gargantuan creature fills the space on its own.

If the rope is detached or destroyed, or if a creature attempts to enter the space that would put it over its capacity, the space begins to unravel. It disappears in [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1k4 rounds}, depositing the creatures within safely on the ground below.
Rope Trick.target: 1 touched piece of rope from 5 to 30 feet long

Rose's Thorns.name: Rose's Thorns
Rose's Thorns.description:
Rose bushes with razor-sharp thorns sprout from the ground in the area. The rose bushes deal 8k8 piercing damage to each creature that's in the area when the spell is cast or that ends its turn in the area (basic Reflex save). A creature that critically fails its saving throw also takes @Damage[(ternary(gte(@item.rank,9),2,1))d8[persistent,bleed]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony} for 1 round or until the creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes} (against your spell DC), whichever comes first. The area is difficult terrain and hazardous terrain. A creature that moves through the area takes @Damage[(ternary(gte(@item.rank,9),8,5))[piercing]] damage for every square of that area it moves into. Each time you sustain this spell, the radius of the burst increases by 5 feet.

Wywyższenie (9th) The initial damage increases to 12k8, the persistent bleed damage increases to 2k8, and the hazardous terrain damage increases to 8.

Rouse Skeletons.name: Rouse Skeletons
Rouse Skeletons.description:
Misshapen skeletal forms erupt from a solid surface, such as a stone floor, and fill the burst. The area they fill is difficult terrain. Their grasping claws deal 2k6 slashing damage to creatures on the ground in the area when the skeletons first appear with a basic Reflex save.

On subsequent rounds, the first time you Sustain the Spell each round, you can move the area of skeletons up to 20 feet within the range of the spell and deal 2k6 slashing damage with a basic Reflex save to each creature in the new area.

Damaging or destroying the skeletons is irrelevant, as new bones pull forth from the ground to repair and replace any that are obliterated.

Wywyższenie (+2) The damage increases by 1k6.

Rousing Splash.name: Rousing Splash
Rousing Splash.description:
You cause a splash of cold water to descend on an ally's head, granting some temporary vigor. The target gains 1k4 temporary Hit Points, which last for 1 minute. The target is then temporarily immune to the temporary Hit Points from rousing splash for 10 minutes. The target can also attempt an immediate flat check to recover from a single source of persistent acid or fire damage, with the DC reduction from appropriate assistance.

Wywyższenie (+1) The amount of temporary Hit Points granted increases by 1k4.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.IYvzqymG4xOhqFir]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Rousing Splash}

Rubble Step.name: Rubble Step
Rubble Step.description:
The target leaves behind a trail of shifting rubble that typically consists of stones, but you could choose another earthen material, such as loose sand or soil. For 2 rounds, when the target willingly moves out of a space, and if the target is in contact with the ground, the ground in that space becomes difficult terrain. The difficult terrain remains for the spell's duration.

Wywyższenie (4.) The target leaves difficult terrain behind for 1 minute instead of two rounds, and the spell's duration is 10 minutes.

Rune Trap.name: Rune Trap
Rune Trap.cost: pigments and oils worth a total value of 5 gp x the rank of the spell to be stored
Rune Trap.description:
You create a magical trap by binding a hostile spell into a rune. As part of performing this ritual, you also Cast a Spell to store in the rune. The stored spell must take 3 actions or fewer to cast, have a hostile effect, and target one creature or have an area. You can set a password, a trigger, or both for the rune. Any creature that moves, opens, or touches the target container or enters the target area that doesn't speak the password or that matches the trigger activates the rune, releasing the harmful spell within.

Once a spell is stored in the rune, the rune gains all the traits of that spell. If the stored spell targets one or more creatures, it targets the creature that set off the rune. If it has an area, that area is centered on the creature that set off the rune. The rune is a magical trap, using your spell DC for both the Perception check to notice it and the Thievery check to disable it; both checks require the creature attempting them to be trained in order to succeed. You can Dismiss the rune you create with this ritual so long as you can see it.

Krytyczny Sukces You create a particularly effective rune, granting a +2 circumstance bonus to the DC to notice and disable the rune.

Sukces You create the rune successfully.

Porażka You fail to create the rune.

Krytyczna Porażka The rune backfires, dealing 4k6 force damage per rank of the rune's spell to you, the secondary caster, and all creatures within 10 feet of the ritual's area
Rune Trap.primarycheck: Arcana (eksperctwo), Nature (eksperctwo), Occultism (eksperctwo), or Religion (eksperctwo) as determined by the tradition of spell cast in the ritual

Rune of Observation.name: Rune of Observation
Rune of Observation.description:
You inscribe an invisible eye-shaped rune in the air, creating a sensor as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zvKWclOZ7A53DObE]{Jasnowidzenie}. When created, this eye must be in your line of sight.

Each time the spell's duration ends, you can spend 1 Focus Point as a free action to extend the duration for another hour, though as normal, it ends immediately during your next daily preparations.

Runic Body.name: Runiczne Ciało
Runic Body.description:
Na ciele celu pojawiają się świecące runy. Wszystkie jego ataki wręcz stają się atakami ciosów +1, zyskując premię przedmiotu +1 do rzutów ataku i zwiększając ilość kości obrażeń do dwóch.

Wywyższenie (6.) Ataki wręcz stają się atakami większych ciosów +2.

Wywyższenie (9.) Ataki wręcz stają się atakami potężnych ciosów +3.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.MqZ6FScbfGtXB8tt]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Runiczne Ciało}

Runic Impression.name: Runic Impression
Runic Impression.description:
Your unarmed attacks or weapon gain the benefits of a weapon rune you choose when you cast this spell: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Wm0X7Pfd1bfocPSv]{Corrosive}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.XszNvxnymWYRaoTp]{Flaming}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.M5M1WJ5KzbYfRGsY]{Frost}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.qlunQzfnzPQpMG6U]{Returning}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.NVst7e69agGG9Qwd]{Shock}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.dTxbaa7HSiJbIuNN]{Thundering}. If you cast runic impression on a weapon, this spell ends if you cease holding the weapon, with the exception of throwing a returning weapon. If this spell would give a weapon more property runes than its normal maximum, one of the existing property runes (you choose) is suppressed until the spell ends. For unarmed attacks, if this spell would give you more property runes than you could have from handwraps of mighty blows, one of the existing property runes is similarly suppressed.

Wywyższenie (8th) Add keen to the list of runes you can choose as well as the greater types of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.vQUIUAFOTOWj3ohh]{Corrosive}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.RSZwUlCzUX7Nb4UA]{Flaming}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Sexud7FdxIrg50vU]{Frost}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.TEa1oKZbwsOvC6TZ]{Shock}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Lb7F2BR9X9TF1vjX]{Thundering}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Vc97f8ChfcZzprlZ]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Runic Impression}
Runic Impression.target: you or one weapon you're wielding

Runic Weapon.name: Runiczna Broń
Runic Weapon.description:
Broń mieni się magią, która rzeźbi tymczasowe runy na całej jej długości. Obrana za cel broń staje się bronią ciosów +1, zapewniając mu premię przedmiotu +1 do rzutów ataku oraz zwiększając liczbę kości obrażeń do dwóch.

Wywyższenie (6.) Broń staje się bronią większych ciosów +2.

Wywyższenie (9.) Broń staje się bronią potężnych ciosów +3.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.GnWkI3T3LYRlm3X8]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Runiczna Broń}
Runic Weapon.target: 1 broń, która jest niepilnowana lub dzierżona przez godzącą się istotę

Rust Cloud.name: Rust Cloud
Rust Cloud.description:
Red-blown flecks of rust jitter in the air, forming a cloud of agitated particles. All creatures within the cloud become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty}, and all creatures outside the cloud become concealed to creatures within it. The cloud deals 5k10 slashing damage to any creature that starts its turn in the area, with a basic Fortitude save.

Metal that rusts off of a creature adds to the cloud. When a metal creature takes damage from the cloud, the cloud's area increases by 5 feet (to a maximum of a @Template[burst|distance:40]), and the creature starts to rust, taking @Damage[(floor(@item.level/2)-1)d4[persistent,slashing]] damage. You can Dismiss the cloud.

Wywyższenie (+2) The cloud's slashing damage increases by 1k10 and the persistent damage increases by 1k4.

Rusting Grasp.name: Rusting Grasp
Rusting Grasp.description:
You cause the target to rapidly rust. This magical rust can affect nonferrous materials, but the target must be all or mostly metal. Skymetals such as adamantine and orichalcum are immune to this rust, and the GM might determine other precious materials are similarly resilient. Ultimately, the GM decides if an object or creature can be targeted with this spell.

All damage from this spell ignores Hardness. If the spell causes persistent damage from rust, a creature can attempt to scrape off the rust to assist the target in recovering from the persistent damage (reducing the DC of the flat check to end persistent damage to 10 and granting an immediate flat check). The effect of the spell depends on its target.

  • Creature or Hazard A creature or hazard must be made of all or mostly metal to be affected (this includes many mechanical traps). The grasp deals 8k6 damage (podstawowy rzut obronny Krzepy), plus @Damage[2d6[persistent]] on a failed save. Touching a hazard to affect it with this spell might trigger the hazard, as determined by the GM.

  • Item The rust deals [[/r {2d6}]]{2k6 damage}, subject to a basic Reflex save by the creature wearing or holding the item; if the item is unattended, it automatically gets a critical failure. On a failed save, the item also takes @Damage[1d6[persistent]]. For an attended item, this persistent damage occurs at the end of the attending creature's turns; if the item was unattended when you Cast the Spell, the damage happens at the end of your turns.

    When targeting armor someone is wearing, its Bulk is 1 higher than the listed value, since carrying armor is more cumbersome than wearing it. Thin iron or steel items, such as weapons, have 20 HP and a Broken Threshold of 10, and thicker iron or steel items, such as most suits of armor, have 36 HP and a Broken Threshold of 18.

Wywyższenie (+1) Increase the initial damage to creatures or hazards by 2k6, and increase the maximum Bulk of an item you can target by 1.
Rusting Grasp.target: 1 metal creature, 1 non-magical metal hazard, or 1 non-magical metal item of up to 1 Bulk

Sacred Beasts.name: Święte Bestie
Sacred Beasts.description:
Wymagania Wyznajesz bóstwo.

Wzywasz dzikie zwierzęta obłaskawiane przez twoje bóstwo. Szybko przyzywasz święte zwierzę twojego bóstwa (lub ich niewielki rój, jeśli zwierzę to jest zwykle Malutkie). Przykładowo, przyzwałbyś lwa jeśli wyznajesz Iomedae lub rój pająków jeśli wyznajesz Norgorbera. Jeśli twoje bóstwo nie posiada znanego świętego zwierzęcia, współpracuj z MG aby odnaleźć tematycznien pasujące zwierzę. Zwierzę lub ich rój atakują wszystkie istoty w obszarze, zadając 2k6 obrażeń. Obrażenia te są cięte, kłute lub obuchowe, zależnie od przyzwanego zwierzęcia, wedle uznania MG. Po zakończeniu ataku, zwierzęta powracają na plan twojego bóstwa.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6.

Sacred Form.name: Sacred Form
Sacred Form.description:
You focus all your divine energy and transform yourself into a battle form, similar to your normal form and of the same size as you, but wielding powerful divine armaments. While in this form, you gain the statistics and abilities listed below. You have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell. You gain the following statistics and abilities.

  • AC = 20 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 10 temporary Hit Points.
  • Speed 40 feet.
  • Resistance 3 against physical damage.
  • Darkvision.
  • A special attack with a sacred armament, which is the only attack you can use. Your attack modifier with the sacred armament is +21, and your damage bonus is +8 (or +6 for a ranged attack). The damage dice for Strikes with the weapon are 3k6 bludgeoning damage plus 1k6 spirit damage. If you have a deity, you can have the weapon take the form of your deity's favored weapon and use its damage die size, damage type, and traits. If the favored weapon is a simple weapon with 1k4 or 1k6 damage die, the weapon damage dice are one size larger than normal, though the spirit damage is unchanged. You can also use your attack modifier with this favored weapon if it's higher than that given by the spell.
  • Athletics modifier of +23, unless your own is higher.

Wywyższenie (8.) You instead gain AC = 21 + your level, 15 temporary Hit Points, resistance 4 against physical damage, attack modifier +28, damage bonus +15 (+12 for a ranged attack), and Athletics +29. If you're Medium or smaller, your battle form is Large, and your attacks also have 10-foot reach, or 15-foot reach if you're using a favored weapon with reach.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.W4lb3417rNDd9tCq]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Sacred Form}

Sacred Nimbus.name: Sacred Nimbus
Sacred Nimbus.description:
You summon a small, fluffy white nimbus cloud that floats 10 feet above the ground and rains down pleasantly warm sanctified water. The rain deals 5k6 spirit damage to fiends, undead, and creatures that have a weakness to holy in the area at the end of your turn. When you Sustain the Spell, you can move the cloud at a fly speed of 15 feet to anywhere in the spell's range. The water dissipates as it makes contact with any creatures or surfaces, leaving only a bit of humidity in its place.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k6.

Safe Passage.name: Safe Passage
Safe Passage.description:
Area 10-foot-wide, 10-foot-tall, 60-foot-long section of terrain

You make passage through the area safe for a brief amount of time. Anyone passing through the area gains the following benefits against harmful effects of the terrain and environment, including environmental damage, hazardous terrain, and hazards in the area. The spell grants a +2 status bonus to AC and saves against such effects, and resistance 5 to all damage from such effects. Furthermore, the spell prevents anything in the area that's prone to collapse, such as a rickety bridge or an unstable ceiling, from collapsing, except under extreme strain that would collapse a normal structure of its type.

Safe passage protects only against harm, not inconvenience, and it doesn't reduce difficult terrain, remove the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} condition caused by precipitation, or the like, nor does it protect against creatures within the spell's area.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.5blVLpIH65hvFJpn]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Safe Passage}

Wywyższenie (5th) The granted resistance increases to 10, and the area can be 120 feet long.

Wywyższenie (8th) The granted resistance increases to 15, and the area can be 500 feet long.

Safeguard Secret.name: Safeguard Secret
Safeguard Secret.description:
You ensure a secret remains safe from prying spies. Choose one piece of information that at least some of the targets know, such as "the location of the stolen treasure" or "the password to enter the guild house." The spell grants those who know the piece of knowledge you have chosen a +4 status bonus to skill checks (typically Deception checks) to conceal this knowledge, and to saving throws against spells that specifically attempt to obtain this knowledge from them, and to effects that would force them to reveal it.

If you Cast this Spell again, any previous safeguard secret you had cast ends.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.3HEiYVhqypfc4IsP]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Safeguard Secret}
Safeguard Secret.target: you and any number of willing allies

Sage's Curse.name: Sage's Curse
Sage's Curse.description:
You afflict the target with a curse that fills its mind with distracting and hyperspecialized minutiae, causing it to second-guess even simple facts. The target must attempt a Will saving throw.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces For 10 minutes, the target must roll twice and use the worse result whenever attempting an Arcana, Lore, Occultism, or Society check. If the target succeeds at a check to Recall Knowledge, it gains one piece of true knowledge and one piece of erroneous knowledge, but it has no way of knowing which is which (this has no effect if the target critically succeeds at a check to Recall Knowledge).

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.6SAUuqvptTeXtyfH]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Sage's Curse (Sukces)}

Porażka As success, but the effect is permanent.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.DAAtzP2QYmCzSNXk]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Sage's Curse (Porażka)}

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, and the target treats the outcomes of all checks to Recall Knowledge as one degree of success worse than the result the target rolled (a critical success becomes a success, a success becomes a failure, and a failure becomes a critical failure).

Sanctuary.name: Sanktuarium
Sanctuary.description:
Otaczasz istotę ochronną energią, która zniechęca atakujących. Istoty próbujące zaatakować cel muszą za każdym raziem wykonać rzut obronny Woli. Jeśli cel wykona wrogą akcję, zakręcie kończy się.

Krytyczny Sukces Sanktuarium kończy się.

Sukces Istota może wykonać wywołujący atak, oraz wszelkie inne ataki mierzone w cel w tej turze.

Porażka Istota nie może zaatakować celu i marnuje swoją akcję. Nie może też podejmować dalszych prób zaatakowania celu w tej turze.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota marnuje swoją akcję oraz nie jest w stanie zaatakować celu przez resztę czasu trwania sanktuarium.

Sand Form.name: Sand Form
Sand Form.description:
You grant the target's body and gear aspects of sand. The target gains resistance 5 to piercing and slashing damage, has no scent, and can't bleed. In sandy terrain, even when out in the open, the target has enough concealment to attempt to Hide. Each time the target takes damage to which sand form grants resistance, reduce the duration of the spell by 1 minute.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.qO1Gj9l8gh5CMEbf]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Sand Form}

Wywyższenie (5.) The resistance is 10.

Wywyższenie (7.) The resistance is 15.

Sanguine Mist.name: Sanguine Mist
Sanguine Mist.description:
You unleash a cloud of foul, blood-sucking fog that drains the vitality from the living to bolster your own. Each living creature in the area when you Cast the Spell, aside from you, takes 6k6 void damage with a basic Fortitude save. Creatures in the area are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty}, and all creatures outside the cloud become concealed to creatures within it.

The first time each round you Sustain this Spell on subsequent turns, living creatures in the area take an additional @Damage[(@item.rank –2)d6[void]] damage with another basic Fortitude save. You also gain temporary Hit Points equal to half the damage a single creature took when you Sustained the spell this turn; calculate these temporary Hit Points using the creature that took the most damage. You lose any remaining temporary Hit Points after 1 minute.

Wywyższenie (+1) The initial damage increases by 2k6 and the secondary damage increases by 1k6.

Savor the Sting.name: Savor the Sting
Savor the Sting.description:
You inflict pain upon the target and revel in their anguish. This deals 1k4 mental damage and @Damage[(@item.level)d4[persistent,mental]] damage; the target must attempt a Will save. As long as the target is taking persistent damage from this spell, you gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and skill checks against the target.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target takes half damage and no persistent damage.

Porażka Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia wstępne oraz przewlekłe.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia wstępne oraz przewlekłe.

Wywyższenie (+1) Wstępne obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k4 and the persistent damage increases by 1k4.

Sawtooth Terrain.name: Sawtooth Terrain
Sawtooth Terrain.description:
You cause long, serrated mantis limbs to appear, swiping at and obstructing creatures in the area. The area is difficult terrain. Each creature in the area when the spell is cast and who end their turn within the area take 3k6 slashing damage and @Damage[(floor((@item.level -1)/2)d6)[bleed]] damage, as determined by its Reflex save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature takes half damage and no persistent damage.

Porażka The creature takes full damage and a –10-foot circumstance penalty to their Speed until they receive magical healing or benefit from a successful Medicine check against your spell DC to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.MHLuKy4nQO2Z4Am1]{Administer First Aid}.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature takes double damage and a –15-foot circumstance penalty to their Speed until they receive magical healing or benefit from a successful Medicine check against your spell DC to administer First Aid.

Wywyższenie (+2) The damage increases by 3k6, and the persistent bleed damage increases by 1k6.

Scatter Scree.name: Rozprysk Żwiru
Scatter Scree.description:
Rozprysk skał zasypuje obszarz zaklęcia. Rozrzucane odłamki skalne zadają istotom w obszarze 2k4 obrażeń obuchowych (podstawowy rzut obronny Refleksu). Na czas trwania zaklęcia, podłoże w obszarze staje się trudnym terenem. Istota może wykorzystać Interakcję aby oczyścić jedno pole ze żwiru.

Jeśli rzucisz to zaklęcie ponownie, jakikolwiek rozprysk żwiru, który wcześniej rzucałeś kończy działać.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k4.

Schadenfreude.name: Schadenfreude
Schadenfreude.description:
Aktywator Odnosisz krytyczną porażkę w rzucie obronnym przeciw efektowi wroga.

Wykorzystujesz swoją katastrofalną porażkę aby zdekoncentrować wroga jego poczuciem zadowolenia z siebie. Musi on wykonać rzut obronny Woli.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota jest dekoncentrowana przez swoje zadowolenie i ponosi karę statusową –1 do testów Percepcji i rzutów obronnych Woli na 1 rundę. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.TjGHxli0edXI6rAg]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Schadenfreude (Sukces)}

Porażka Istota jest przytłaczana przez uczucie zadowolenia i staje się @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiona 1} na 1 rundę.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota gubi się we własnym zadowoleniu i staje się @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiona 2} na 1 rundę oraz @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszona 1}.

Scholarly Recollection.name: Analiza Uczonego
Scholarly Recollection.description:
Aktywator Wykonujesz test Percepcji celem Szukania lub test umiejętności celem Pozyskania Wiedzy z użyciem umiejętności, w której jesteś wytrenowany.

Wymawiając krótką modlitwę podczas zbierania swoich myśli, zostajesz pobłogosławiony wskazówką pchającą cię we właściwym kierunku. MG rzuca wywołujący test dwukrotnie i używa lepszego z wyników.

Scintillating Safeguard.name: Scintillating Safeguard
Scintillating Safeguard.description:
Aktywator An effect would deal physical or energy damage to you or a creature in range.

A sparkling magical barrier envelops each target, shielding them against the triggering effect. Choose one type of physical or energy damage the triggering effect deals. Each target gains resistance 10 against that damage type for the triggering effect. The resistance applies only against the initial damage, not against any persistent damage or other lingering effects.

Wywyższenie (+1) The resistance increases by 1.
Scintillating Safeguard.target: up to 5 willing creatures who would be harmed by the triggering effect

Scorching Blast.name: Spopielające Uderzenie
Scorching Blast.description:
Wyczarowujesz masę ognia w powietrzu wokół swojej wyciągniętej pięści. Do końca swojej tury możesz uderzać tym ogniem cele w promieniu 30 stóp, za pomocją pojedynczej akcji o cechach ataku i koncentracji. Kiedy to robisz, wykonaj rzut na dystansowy atak zaklęciem. Trafienie zadaje 2k8 obrażeń od ognia. Przy trafieniu krytycznym cel odnosi obrażenia @Damage[(1d6+((@item.rank -1)*2))[persistent,fire]].

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia podstawowe zwiększają się o 1k8 a przewlekłe obrażenia od ognia przy trafieniu krytycznym zwiększają się o 2.

Scouring Pulse.name: Scouring Pulse
Scouring Pulse.description:
Area 10-foot radius, 60-foot-tall cylinder

You inundate the area with concentrated vitality energy, which scours away the stain of undeath. Each creature in the area takes 6k8 vitality damage and must attempt a basic Reflex save. Creatures that fail the save also take @Damage[(ternary(gte(@item.level,5),1,2))d8[persistent,vitality]] damage. Creatures that take persistent vitality damage from scouring pulse are wreathed in a heatless halo of light. They emit bright light in a 5-foot radius preventing them from being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty}; if the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialny}, they're concealed while affected by scouring pulse, rather than being undetected.

Wywyższenie (8th) The vitality damage increases to 9k8 damage, and the persistent vitality damage increases to 2k8 persistent vitality damage. Creatures remain suffused in light for [[/r 1d4 #Rounds]]{1k4 additional rounds} after removing the persistent vitality damage.

Scouring Sand.name: Ścierający Piach
Scouring Sand.description:
Uderzasz we wszystko w obszarze piachem, który ściera glebę oraz dostaje się istotom do oczu. Na czas trwania zaklęcia wszelki trudny teren wywołany przez rośliny mniejsze niż drzewa zostaje obluzowany, pozwalając na wyczyszczenie pola 5-stóp za pomocą podedynczej akcji Interakcji. Dodatkowo, ścierający piach podejmuje próbę przeciwdziałania @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.J6vNvrUT3b1hx2iA]{Plączącej Florze} i innym efektom, które tworzą w obszarze rośliny lub nimi manipulują. Udane przeciwdziałanie efektowi usuwa jedynie tę jego część, która pokrywa się z obszarem ścierającego piachu. Po jednej takiej próbie, efekt staje się tymczasowo niewrazliwy na próby przeciwdziałania mu przez ścierający piach na 24 godziny. Każda istota znajdująca się w obszarze w momencie Rzucania Zaklęcia, lub kończąca turę w jego obszarze, musi wykonać rzut obronny Refleksu.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Porażka Istota jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczona} na 1 minutę lub aż nie użyje akcji Interakcji aby pozbyć się piachu z oczu.

Krytyczna Porażka Jak porażka, ale istota jest dodatkowo @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiona} na czas jej następnej akcji.

Wywyższenie (3.) Raz na rundę, kiedy Podtrzymujesz Zaklęcie możesz przemieścić centrum wybuchu do innego punktu w zasięgu.

Wywyższenie (6.) Jak na 3. kręgu ale zasięg wynosi 120 stóp a obszar to wybuch 20 stóp.

Scouting Eye.name: Oko Zwiadowcy
Scouting Eye.description:
Tworzysz @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialne}, latające oko, o średnicy 2.5 cm, w miejscu, które widzisz, w zasięgu 500 stóp. Widzi ono we wszystkich kierunkach za pomocą twoich normalnych zmysłów wzrokowych i ciągle przesyła ci to, co widzi.

Za pierwszym razem, gdy Podtrzymujesz zaklęcie w każdej rundzie, możesz albo przesunąć oko o maksymalnie 30 stóp, widząc tylko rzeczy przed okiem, albo przesunąć je o maksymalnie 10 stóp, widząc we wszystkich kierunkach wokół niego. Nie ma ograniczenia co do odległości, na jaką oko może się od ciebie oddalić, ale zaklęcie kończy się natychmiast, jeśli ty i oko kiedykolwiek przestaniecie znajdować się na tym samym planie istnienia. Możesz wykonywać akcje Szukania przez oko, jeśli chcesz wykonać za jego pomocą testy Percepcji. Wszelkie obrażenia zadane oku niszczą je i kończą zaklęcie.

Scramble Body.name: Scramble Body
Scramble Body.description:
Your magic throws the creature's biology into disarray, inducing nausea, fever, and other unpleasant conditions.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Porażka The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1}.

Krytyczna Porażka The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} as long as it's sickened.

Scrounger's Glee.name: Scrounger's Glee
Scrounger's Glee.description:
With a cruel laugh and a flash of your canines, you make a target understand that death is coming to claim it and that its demise will serve to strengthen another. The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1} if it fails a Will save (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2} on a critical failure). This condition can't be reduced below 1 while the spell is active and the target can hear you. You can Dismiss the spell as a reaction when an ally critically succeeds at a Strike against the target, restoring @Damage[(ceil(@item.level/2))d4[healing]] Hit Points to that ally.

Wywyższenie (+2) The number of Hit Points restored when you Dismiss the spell increases by 1k4.

Scrying.name: Scrying
Scrying.description:
You magically spy on a creature of your choice. Scrying works like @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zvKWclOZ7A53DObE]{Jasnowidzenie}, except that the image you receive is less precise, insufficient for teleport and similar spells. Instead of creating an eye in a set location within 500 feet, you instead create an eye that manifests just above the target. You can choose a target either by name or by touching one of its possessions or a piece of its body. If you haven't met the target in person, scrying's DC is 2 lower, and if you are unaware of the target's identity (perhaps because you found an unknown creature's fang at a crime scene), the DC is instead 10 lower.

The effect of scrying depends on the target's Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces The spell fails and the target is temporarily immune for 1 week. The target also gains a glimpse of you and learns its rough distance and direction from you.

Sukces The spell fails and the target is temporarily immune for 1 day.

Porażka The spell succeeds.

Krytyczna Porażka The spell succeeds, and the eye follows the target if it moves, traveling up to 60 feet per round.

Scrying Ripples.name: Scrying Ripples
Scrying Ripples.description:
You touch the water's surface, and as the ripples spread out, so do your senses. When you Cast this Spell, you automatically know the location of any unoccupied, flowing water with a surface area of at least 1 square within 500 feet. You can pick any one of these streams to see and hear out of for the duration of the spell, though your field of vision is perpendicular to the flowing surface. For example, you could look normally out of a waterfall but would look straight up from out of a river. Each time you Sustain the spell, you can change to a different water source or move elsewhere along the same one.

If the water you're scrying through ceases flowing, such as by a faucet turning off, a river damming, or a waterfall freezing over, this spell ends. Additionally, your face appears as a faint reflection in the water's surface as you peek through. A creature that Seeks and succeeds at their Perception check against your spell DC detects your presence in the water.

Wywyższenie (5.) You know the location of and can scry through flowing water within 1 mile.

Sculpt Sound.name: Sculpt Sound
Sculpt Sound.description:
You change the sounds made by a creature or object. Choose how you're altering the sounds when you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast the Spell}; you can't alter it later. You can cause something that didn't create a sound to make sound, alter the voice of a creature, amplify or deaden a sound, or transform one sound into another. A creature who succeeds at a Perception check against your spell DC can determine that the sound was altered by an illusion, including hearing faint sounds if you deadened the sound, but they can't determine the true sound unless they critically succeed at the Perception check. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} the spell.

Because this spell obscures sound instead of preventing it, using the spell to quiet a creature doesn't prevent that creature from using verbal spell components, though it does prevent most auditory effects that rely on another creature hearing them accurately. An unwilling target can attempt a Will save.

Sukces The affected sound from the creature isn't altered.

Porażka The affected sound from the creature is altered in the way you determine.

Krytyczna Porażka The affected sound from the creature is altered and the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 2} for 1 minute as it struggles with the disorienting effects of its altered sound.

Wywyższenie (5.) You can target up to 6 creatures or 6 objects, altering the sounds of all affected creatures or objects in the same way.

Sea Surge.name: Sea Surge
Sea Surge.description:
You slap or stomp on a nearby solid or liquid surface, sending a surge of water rushing away from you. The water forms a flat, 5-foot-thick, 10-foot-high wall of water between 5 and 15 feet wide (you decide). It moves 60 feet in a direction of your choice along the struck surface, extinguishing all non-magical fires, carrying along unattended objects of 1 Bulk or less, and pushing larger objects. The wave moves another 60 feet in the same direction at the start of your next turn, then vanishes. Large or smaller creatures in the area or that enter the area the wave moves through must attempt a Fortitude save.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Porażka The creature is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}. If the creature was Swimming, it gets a critical failure instead.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is pushed 20 feet in the wave's direction, is knocked Prone, and takes 3k6 bludgeoning damage.

Sea of Thought.name: Sea of Thought
Sea of Thought.description:
You cover the area in a sloshing torrent of semi-solidified thought, roughly ankle high. The area becomes difficult terrain, similarly to a shallow bog. Each round that a creature starts its turn in the area, it must attempt a Fortitude save against the shifting waves of thought. On a failure, it takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until it leaves the area, and on a critical failure, it is also knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}.

Wywyższenie (+1) The radius of the spell's area increases by 5 feet.

Seal Fate.name: Seal Fate
Seal Fate.description:
You utter a curse that a creature will meet a certain end — a death by freezing, stabbing, or another means you devise. Choose one type of damage from the following list: acid, bludgeoning, cold, electricity, fire, piercing, slashing, sonic, or void. The effect is based on the target's Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target gains weakness 2 to the chosen damage type until the end of your next turn.

Porażka As success, but the duration is 1 minute. If the creature is reduced to 0 Hit Points by the chosen damage and its level is 7 or less, it dies.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the duration is unlimited.

Wywyższenie (+2) The weakness increases by 1, and the maximum level of creature that can be automatically killed increases by 4.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.r4XX7yzeEOPK7l2a]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Seal Fate}

Seashell of Stolen Sound.name: Muszelka Skradzionego Dźwięku
Seashell of Stolen Sound.description:
Aktywator Istota w zasięgu zaczyna wydawać dźwięk.

Przechowujesz dźwięk w muszelce aby wykorzystać go wedle uznania: ostatnie słowa ukochanej osoby, potężny ryk smoka, kompromitująca konwersacja między dwoma wpływowymi dyplomatami lub jeszcze dziwniejsze sekrety. W ramach Rzucania tego Zaklęcia musisz dostarczyć niezniszczoną muszelkę. Kiedy Rzucisz Zaklęcie magia wiruje wokół celu rejestrując przez najbliższą minutę wszelkie wydawane przez niego dźwięki oraz wszelkie towarzyszące dźwięki otoczenia, a następnie zamyka dźwięk w muszelce.

Ty albo inna istota możecie następnie przez czas działania zaklęcia odtworzyć dźwięk z muszelki poprzez Interakcję z nią, ale gdy tylko odtwarzanie dźwięku dobiegnie końca, muszelka roztrzaskuje się a zaklęcie się kończy.

Tak jak to standardowo przebiega dla zaklęć o czasie trwania do następnych codziennych przygotowań, możesz zdecydować o ciągłym wydawaniu komórki zaklęć aby przedłużyć czas trwania zaklęcia na muszelce skradzionego dźwięku na kolejny dzień. Chociaż zaklęcie dokładnie kopiuje wszelkie dźwięki wokół celu, nie jest ono w stanie odtworzyć żadnych ich efektów słuchowych czy dźwiękowych.

Secret Chest.name: Secret Chest
Secret Chest.description:
You banish a container and its contents to the Ethereal Plane, where you can retrieve it from later. The container's physical properties-the material from which it is made, any locks, or other features-are irrelevant to the casting of this spell, but the container can't contain any creatures. When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast this Spell}, the container and all its contents are transported to a random location deep in the Ethereal Plane. Time passes normally for the container and its contents, and the environmental effects of the Ethereal Plane apply to it. Though very unlikely, it's possible for a creature on the Ethereal Plane to stumble upon the chest.

You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} the spell to return the chest to your current location. If the spell ends by any other means, the container is lost on the Ethereal Plane and you can no longer recall it with this spell, though you could search for it in other ways.
Secret Chest.target: 1 container and its contents, totaling 10 Bulk or less

Secret Page.name: Secret Page
Secret Page.description: You change the target's text to different text entirely. If the text is a spellbook or a scroll, you can change it to show a spell you know of secret page's level or lower. The replacement spell cannot be cast or used to prepare a spell. You can also transform the text into some other text you have written or have access to. You can specify a password that allows a creature touching the page to change the text back and forth. You must choose the replacement text and the password, if any, when you Cast the Spell.
Secret Page.target: 1 page up to 3 square feet in size

See the Unseen.name: Dojrzenie Niedostrzegalnego
See the Unseen.description:
Twoje spojrzenie przenika przez iluzje i odnajduje @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialne} stworzenia i duchy. Możesz widzieć niewidzialne stworzenia tak, jakby nie były niewidzialne, chociaż ich rysy są zamazane, co czyni je @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłoniętymi} i trudnymi do zidentyfikowania. Możesz także widzieć istoty bezcielesne, takie jak duchy, przenikające przez obiekt w promieniu 10 stóp od jego powierzchni jako rozmyte kształty widoczne przez te obiekty. Subtelniejsze wskazówki zapewniają ci również premię statusową +2 do testów podważenia wiary w iluzje.

Wywyższenie (5.) Czas trwania tego zaklęcia wynosi 8 godzin.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.T5bk6UH7yuYog1Fp]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Dojrzenie Niedostrzegalnego}

Seed of Mercy.name: Seed of Mercy
Seed of Mercy.description:
The gods who value benevolence and the caretaking of small and vulnerable beings also value those qualities in the mortal adventurers who journey through the lands of Tian Xia. You demonstrate your willingness to aid even the most helpless of life by nursing a small, injured bird to health and allowing it to fly away to freedom, earning in return the protection of the natural world. If you're able to nurse the bird to health, it will return to you with a seed, which will grow into a sprout bearing a single flower.

The sprout withers if you don't personally water it with at least 1 Bulk of pure spring water a day or if it's left unattended in dangerous circumstances. It's anathema to this ritual to let the sprout wither, and doing so immediately ends its benefits. If the ritual is ended in this way, you must conduct an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.7Fd4lxozd11MQ55N]{Pokuta} ritual before attempting this ritual again.

Krytyczny Sukces As success, except the sprout also grows a single fruit after you've cared for it for a week. Removing the fruit causes the sapling to wither, but the fruit can be eaten as a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.G7haQ5gDt30ftJLC]{Moderate Healing Potion}.

Sukces You nurse the bird to health. It returns to you with a seed that, when planted and watered, grows into a sprout with a single flower. Once you've cared for it for a week, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AmP0qu7c5dlBSath]{Toughness} feat. If you lose Toughness due to violating the ritual's anathema, you lose a number of Hit Points equal to the decrease in your maximum Hit Points.

Porażka You aren't able to heal the bird, but you help its passing to be as painless as possible.

Krytyczna Porażka Your attempt to heal the bird causes greater suffering. Another bird brings you a seed that, if planted, will grow into a gourd that releases a small demon to attack you.

Seize Identity.name: Seize Identity
Seize Identity.description:
With a gleeful cackle, you seize an individual's voice and swallow it. For the duration, you look and sound like the target, and the target can't speak. The effects depend on the result of the target's Will saving throw.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature is unaffected.

Sukces You take on the target's appearance, with the same effects of a 3. kręgu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Illusory Disguise} spell, and the target can't speak, with the same effects of a 2. kręgu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gIdDLrbswTV3OBJy]{Silence} spell.

Porażka As success, but the target also takes 4k6 mental damage from the transformation.

Krytyczna Porażka As success, but the target also takes 8k6 mental damage from the transformation.

The first time each round you Sustain this spell after you cast this spell, the target ages rapidly, taking @Damage[(ternary(gte(@item.rank,9),3,2))d8[void]] damage (@Check[will|basic] save). On a failure, the target also becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 1} or increases the value of its enfeebled condition by 1.

Wywyższenie (9th) The mental damage increases by 4k6, and the void damage increases by 1k8.

Seize Soul.name: Seize Soul
Seize Soul.cost: item worth at least the target's level x 100 gp
Seize Soul.description:
You trap the target's soul in the item before the soul can pass on to the afterlife. The item used to contain the soul can be anything as long as it's of the appropriate value. The item has AC 16 and its normal Hardness and HP. Destroying (not just breaking) an item or counteracting seize soul releases the soul to the afterlife.

While the soul is in the item, the target can't be returned to life through any means, even powerful magic such as a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{Wish} ritual. If the item is destroyed or seize soul is counteracted on the item, the soul is freed. An item can't hold more than one soul, and any attempt wastes the spell.

You can also target an item that has had a soul trapped in it with a second casting of seize soul, which destroys the item and either releases the soul or relocates it to a different item, whichever you choose. This fails if the target is an artifact or the trapped soul is a creature of 19th level or higher.
Seize Soul.target: 1 creature that died within the last minute

Sending.name: Nadanie Wiadomości
Sending.description: Wysyłasz istocie mentalną wiadomość składającą się z nie więcej niż 25 słów, a ona może natychmiast odpowiedzieć własną wiadomością składającą się z nie więcej niż 25 słów.

Sepulchral Mask.name: Sepulchral Mask
Sepulchral Mask.description:
You manifest a supernatural funerary mask, granting you a +1 status bonus to Will saving throws against emotion effects for 1 minute. Its somber countenance forces your foes to confront their regrets and sins. Each enemy in the area when you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast the Spell} or that starts its turn in the area takes @Damage[1d4[mental]] damage and must attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia and takes a –1 status penalty to Will saves against emotion effects for 1 round.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota odnosi podwójne obrażenia and a –1 status penalty to Will saves against emotion effects for 1 minute.

Wywyższenie (+2) Increase the mental damage by @Damage[2d4[mental]] and the emanation's radius by 5 feet.

Serrate.name: Serrate
Serrate.description:
With a pinch, the metal of a weapon twists, adding numerous jagged blades along its surface. Strikes with the target weapon deal an additional 1k4 slashing damage until the start of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.CDNKDV3UsAp95D1m]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Serrate}

Wywyższenie (+2) The extra damage increased by 1k4.

Shadow Army.name: Shadow Army
Shadow Army.description:
You create dozens of semi-real copies of yourself that swarm across the battlefield and fight your enemies. You are virtually indistinguishable from your clones, allowing you to Hide and Sneak among them. An enemy that's in the area when the spell is cast or that ends its turn in the area takes 3k10 mental damage and 3k10 bludgeoning damage, and is possibly inflicted with a condition, depending on the result of its Will save. When you Cast the Spell, you choose a condition your shadows impose on a failed save: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 2}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 2}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1}.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature takes no damage. For the duration of the spell, the creature gets a result one step better than it rolled on further saves against the spell, and can distinguish you from your clones without difficulty.

Sukces Istota odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia, and gains the chosen condition.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota odnosi podwójne obrażenia, and gains the chosen condition.

Shadow Blast.name: Shadow Blast
Shadow Blast.description:
You shape the shadow substance of the Netherworld into a blast. Choose acid, bludgeoning, cold, electricity, fire, force, piercing, slashing, sonic, or spirit damage, and choose a @Template[cone|distance:30], a @Template[burst|distance:15] within 120 feet, or a @Template[line|distance:50]. The blast deals 6k8 damage of the type you chose to each creature in the area (@Damage[(@item.rank+1)d8[acid]], @Damage[(@item.rank+1)d8[bludgeoning]], @Damage[(@item.rank+1)d8[cold]], @Damage[(@item.rank+1)d8[electricity]], @Damage[(@item.rank+1)d8[fire]], @Damage[(@item.rank+1)d8[force]], @Damage[(@item.rank+1)d8[piercing]], @Damage[(@item.rank+1)d8[slashing]], @Damage[(@item.rank+1)d8[sonic]], or @Damage[(@item.rank+1)d8[spirit]]).

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k8.

Shadow Double.name: Cienisty Sobowtór
Shadow Double.cost: Niewielki przedmiot o znaczeniu osobistym dla duplikowanej istoty (taki jak noszony przez nią codziennie fragment garderoby lub pamiątka po romantycznej schadzce) plus rzadkie oleje, minerały oraz pigmenty o całkowitej wartości 300 sz
Shadow Double.description:
Tworzysz iluzoryczny duplikat obranej za cel istoty, przywołując cienistą materię z Zaświatów i rzeźbiąc z niej półstałą postać. Cienisty Sobowtór jest istotą 4. poziomu pozbawioną jakichkolwiek szczególnych zdolności. Jeśli musi on podjąć się testu lub użyć ST, użyj średniej wartości dla potwora jego poziomu, poza wyjątkami opisanymi poniżej. Nie posiada on żadnych konkretnych wspomnień celu, ale może on wykorzystywać informacje o oryginalnej istocie pozyskane od rzucających rytuał, aby Podszywać Się pod cel. Wygląda on dokładnie tak samo jak cel, a jego modyfikator Oszukiwania na rzecz Podszywania Się pod cel jest równy modyfikatorowi asystającego użytkownika magii, który wykonaywał test Oszukiwania, z premią statusową +4. Chociaż nie posiada on żadnych specjalnych zdolności oryginału, takichj jak smocze zionięcie, iluzje pozwalają mu na udawanie, że używa tych zdolności; wydają się one po prostu nigdy nie mieć efektu. Przykładowo, wszystkie istoty objęte zionięciem cienistego sobowtóra wydają się odnosić na rzucie obronnym krytyczny sukces i nie otrzymywać obrażeń. Istoty mogą podjąć próbę podważenia swojej wiary w iluzję poprzez podjęcie testu Percepcji przeciw ST Oszukiwania asystującego użytkownika magii, który rzucał test Oszukiwania.

Krytyczny Sukces Tworzysz cienistego sobowtóra. Ma on cechę sługus i znajduje się pod twoją pełną kontrolą. Zyskujesz bezpośrednią mentalną więź z sobowtórem i możesz poświęcić akcję na wydanie sobowtórowi polecenia poprzez tę wieź, nawet na odległość.

Sukces Jak krytyczny sukces, ale między tobą a sobowtórem nie ma żadnej szczególnej mentalnej więzi. Musisz poświęcić akcję aby wydać mu polecenie w sposób werbalny lub z użyciem innych środków.

Porażka Rytuał kończy się niepowodzeniem i nie odnosi żadnych skutków.

Krytyczna Porażka Cienisty sobowtór zostaje stworzony, ale nie jest twoim sługusem i jest wrogi wobec wszystkich rzucających rytuał. Robi wszystko co w jego mocy aby ich zniszczyć, ale jeśli nie jest w stanie zabić ich natychmiast, będzie chciał uciec i uknuć plan prowadzący do ich śmierci.
Shadow Double.primarycheck: Okultyzm lub Wiedza Tajemna (mistrzostwo, test ma cechę sekretność)
Shadow Double.secondarycheck: Okultyzm, Przyroda, Religia, Wiedza Tajemna lub Społeczeństwo (którekolwiek z nich wymagane jest do Pozyskania Wiedzy na temat duplikowanej istoty); Rzemiosło; Oszukiwanie

Shadow Illusion.name: Shadow Illusion
Shadow Illusion.description:
You create a shadowy illusion of a creature or a stationary object, but the illusion can exist only in an area of dim light or darkness. The spell ends if the illusion is ever out of an area of dim light or darkness. If the illusion is an object, it must fit within a 20-foot burst, and the creature can be of any size up to Gargantuan, filling a 20-foot-by-20-foot space.

The object or creature appears to animate naturally; it even generates the appropriate sounds and smells, and feels believable to the touch, though its coloring is always muted.

If the illusion is a creature, shadow illusion has the effects of an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.f8SBoXiXQjlCKqly]{Illusory Creature} spell of the same rank, except it deals 3k8 damage, instead of the amount listed in illusory creature.

Wywyższenie (+2) The area that an illusory object can fit in increases by 10 feet.

The damage of the illusory creature's Strike increases by 1k8.

Shadow Jump.name: Shadow Jump
Shadow Jump.description:
You instantly transport yourself from one shadow to another. Teleport yourself and any items you're wearing and holding from your current space to a clear space you can see that's in dim light or darkness and within range. You can transport your familiar with this spell, but if shadow jump would bring any other creature with you-even if you're carrying the creature in an extradimensional container-the spell is disrupted.

Wywyższenie (8.) When you arrive at your destination, you can become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialny} until the end of your next turn or until you are no longer in an area of dim light or darkness, whichever comes first. The invisibility is an illusion effect.
Shadow Jump.requirements: You are in dim light or darkness

Shadow Projectile.name: Shadow Projectile
Shadow Projectile.description:
Aktywator An ally within 20 feet of you makes a ranged attack roll.

You create an illusory duplicate of your ally's ranged attack to confuse your opponents. You launch an illusory double of your ally's projectile or spell at the same target, leaving the enemy unsure which attack to avoid. The target takes 3k8 mental damage, depending on its Will save. Regardless of the result of its save, it's temporarily immune to shadow projectile spells for 1 hour.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda} against the triggering attack.

Porażka The creature is off-guard against the triggering attack and takes full damage from your illusory projectile.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but double damage.

Wywyższenie (+2) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k8.

Shadow Raid.name: Shadow Raid
Shadow Raid.description:
You spin illusions of flying shadows throughout the area. The shadows strike and cavort, harming your foes and blocking their vision with twisting shadow. Enemies in the area when you Cast the Spell take 6k8 bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage, with a @Check[reflex|basic|traits:illusion] or @Check[will|basic|traits:illusion] save, as shadows explode into being. You choose the damage type when you Cast the Spell, and each creature chooses the type of save it attempts before it rolls the save. The shadows then persist in the area for 1 minute, dealing @Damage[3d8[untyped]]{3k8 obrażeń} of the type you chose to any enemy that ends its turn in the area. All creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} to enemies in the area, as the illusory shadows swarm over them and block light.

A creature that spends an action to Seek or otherwise interact with the shadow raid can attempt a Perception check to disbelieve it. On a success, the creature halves the damage it takes from the shadows, and the shadows no longer impede its vision. These benefits last until the spell ends.

Wywyższenie (9.) The initial damage increases by 2k8, and the damage to a creature that ends its turn in the area increases by 1k8 ([[/r 4d8]]).

Shadow Siphon.name: Shadow Siphon
Shadow Siphon.description:
Aktywator A spell or magical effect deals damage.

Exchanging material energy with that of the Shadow Plane, you transform the triggering spell into a partially illusory version of itself. Attempt to counteract the target spell. If the attempt is successful, any creatures that would be damaged by the spell instead take only half as much damage, but the spell otherwise works as normal. Treat shadow siphon's counteract rank as 2 higher for this attempt.

Shadow Spy.name: Shadow Spy
Shadow Spy.description: You mix blood, soil, and shadow together to form a half-real homunculus in the shape of a crow, sparrow, or other bird. You then command the bird to fly to a location within range and observe all around it. The bird has the statistics of a homunculus, save that it has all of your senses and shares your Perception modifier. Once the spell's duration elapses or upon a trigger you set (which must be fairly simple-"at dusk" or "when the judge leaves"), the bird flies to your location. If you wring its neck and drink its blood, you learn all that it saw since its creation.

Shadow Zombie.name: Shadow Zombie
Shadow Zombie.description:
You cast a shadow over the target zombie, briefly turning it into shadowy vapor and controlling its movement. While in this vaporous state, the zombie is a minion under your control, gains resistance 8 to physical damage, and is immune to precision damage. It can't cast spells, activate items, or use actions that have the attack or manipulate traits. It gains a fly Speed of 10 feet and can slip through tiny cracks. If the target is already your minion when you cast the spell, it doesn't get a saving throw and becomes vaporous for 10 minutes. If the target is not your minion, it can attempt a Will save to resist the spell. If it's already under someone else's command, the controlling creature also rolls a Will save, and the zombie uses the better result.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected and is temporarily immune for 24 hours.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Porażka The target becomes your shadowy minion for 1 minute.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but for 10 minutes.

Wywyższenie (4.) You can target a zombie of level 5 or lower.

Shadow's Web.name: Shadow's Web
Shadow's Web.description:
Grasping darkness surges from you, dealing 14k4 void damage. Each creature in the area must attempt a Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces Efekt nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature takes half damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 1} for 1 round.

Porażka The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 2} for 1 round.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature takes double damage, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 2} for 1 round, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony} for 1 round or until it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes}, whichever comes first.

Wywyższenie (+1) The void damage increases by 2k4.
Shadow's Web.requirements: You are in clinging shadow stance.

Shaken Confidence.name: Shaken Confidence
Shaken Confidence.description:
Aktywator An enemy within 30 feet of you critically fails an attack roll, Perception check, or skill check.

You mock the target for all its failings, twisting its self-confidence into doubt. The enemy attempts a Will saving throw.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Porażka The target is briefly shaken and unsure of its abilities. It must roll twice and take the worse result on the next roll of the same type as the critical failure that triggered the spell (such as the target's next Acrobatics check if the spell's trigger was a critical failure on an Acrobatics check). If the target doesn't attempt any qualifying checks, the spell ends at the end of the target's next turn.
Shaken Confidence.target: An enemy that critically failed an attack roll, Perception check, or skill check

Shall not Falter, Shall not Rout.name: Shall not Falter, Shall not Rout
Shall not Falter, Shall not Rout.description: Calling out the fifth line of the Crimson Oath, you seal your most grievous injuries with a stroke of your blade. The first time each round that you Strike with your weapon and deal damage to a foe, you recover a number of HP equal to twice shall not falter, shall not rout's level. This healing can't raise your current HP above half of your maximum HP.

Shambling Horror.name: Shambling Horror
