Shambling Horror.description:
You reanimate the corpse of a fallen creature as an undead minion under your control. The reanimated creature is an undead skeleton or zombie. Choose a skeleton or zombie stat block of the same size as the original creature and of a level no higher than the creature's original level. The shambling horror keeps Speeds it had in life, as well as melee Strikes that deal only physical damage. These attacks use the highest attack modifier from the skeleton or zombie you choose. Some of the skeleton's or zombie's abilities might not make sense for the shambling horror, and some abilities the creature had in life might not persist in undeath; the GM makes the final choice of what abilities the horror has.

A shambling horror has the minion trait. You can't control more than one shambling horror at the same time-if you create a new one while one is already under your control, you must choose one to release, causing it to lose the minion trait. Shambling horrors that have been released expire when the spell duration does. After the duration expires, you can cast shambling horror again on the same corpse to animate it once more. However, after the next sunrise, you can no longer animate the corpse as a shambling horror.

Undead Skeletons

Shambling Horror.target: 1 corpse of a Gargantuan or smaller creature that has a level no greater than your level –4 and has died since the last sunrise

Shape Stone.name: Kształtowanie Kamienia
Shape Stone.description:
Kształtujesz kamień w zgrubny kształt własnego wyboru. Proces kształtowania jest zbyt prymitywny, aby stworzyć skomplikowane części, drobne detale, ruchome elementy i tym podobne. Wszelkie istoty stojące na kamieniu, gdy go przekształcasz, muszą wykonać rzut obronny Refleksu lub test Akrobatyki.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Porażka Istota pada @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalona} na kamień.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota spada z kamienia (jeśli to możliwe) i ląduje Powalona.
Shape Stone.target: kamienny sześcian o boku 10 stóp lub mniejszym

Shape Wood.name: Kształtowanie Drewna
Shape Wood.description: Kształtujesz drewno w zgrubny kształt własnego wyboru. Moc kształtowania jest zbyt prymitywna, aby stworzyć skomplikowane części, drobne detale, ruchome elementy i tym podobne. Nie możesz użyć tego zaklęcia, aby zwiększyć wartość drewnianego przedmiotu, który kształtujesz.
Shape Wood.target: nieobrobiony kawałek drewna o objętości do 20 stóp sześciennych (0.5 metra sześciennego)

Share Burden.name: Share Burden
Share Burden.description:
Aktywator An ally within range is about to attempt a saving throw against a harmful emotion effect, and you would not otherwise have to save against the effect.

You shoulder some of your ally's pain. Both you and your ally use the outcome one degree of success better than the result of your ally's saving throw, even if the triggering effect usually affects only one target.

Share Life.name: Share Life
Share Life.description: You forge a temporary link between the target's life essence and your own. The target takes half damage from all effects that deal Hit Point damage, and you take the remainder of the damage. When you take damage through this link, you don't apply any resistances, weaknesses, or other abilities you have to that damage; you simply take that amount of damage. The spell ends if the target is ever more than 30 feet away from you. If either you or the target is reduced to 0 Hit Points, any damage from this spell is resolved and then the spell ends.

Share Lore.name: Współdzielenie Obeznania
Share Lore.description:
Dzielisz się wiedzą z dotkniętymi istotami. Wybierz jedną umiejętność Obeznania, w której jesteś wytrenowany. Cele stają się wytrenowane w tej umiejętności Obeznania na czas działania zaklęcia.

Wywyższenie (3.) Czas działania zaklęcia wynosi 1 godzinę i możesz obrać za cel do pięciu istot.

Wywyższenie (5.) Czas trwania zaklęcia wynosi 8 godzin, możesz obrać za cel do pięciu istot i możesz się podzielić nie więcej niż dwoma umiejętnościami Obeznania, w których jesteś wytrenowany.

Share Vision.name: Share Vision
Share Vision.description:
Your patron temporarily links your vision with that of another, causing both of you to be able to see through each other's eyes. For the duration of the hex, the two of you share any vision-based senses (such as darkvision or low-light vision) and gain a +2 status bonus to Perception checks, but if either of you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiony} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony}, you both are.

If you cast share vision while a previous casting of this hex is still in effect, the previous effect ends.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.eQzFYXLYPrGc9EBI]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Share Vision}

Shared Invisibility.name: Shared Invisibility
Shared Invisibility.description:
You and all targets are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialny} except to each other as long as the targets remain within the emanation. If a creature made invisible by this spell leaves the spell's area, it becomes visible and remains so even if it returns to the spell's area. If any creature made invisible by this spell uses a hostile action, the spell ends after the hostile action is completed.

Wywyższenie (5.) The targets increase to you and up to 10 willing creatures. The duration increases to 1 hour.
Shared Invisibility.target: you and up to 5 willing creatures

Shared Nightmare.name: Shared Nightmare
Shared Nightmare.description:
Merging minds with the target, you swap distressing visions. One of you will become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Zdezorientowany}, based on the target's Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces You are Confused for 1 round.

Sukces At the start of your next turn, you spend your first action with the Confused condition, then act normally.

Porażka The target spends the first action of each of its turns Confused. The duration is 1 minute.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is Confused. The duration is 1 minute.

Shatter.name: Shatter
Shatter.description:
A high-frequency sonic attack shatters a nearby object. You deal 2k10 sonic damage to the object, ignoring the object's Hardness if it is 4 or lower.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k10, and the Hardness the spell ignores increases by 2.

Shatter Mind.name: Strzaskanie Umysłu
Shatter Mind.description:
You telepathically assail the minds of your foes. You deal 3k4 mental damage to all enemies in the area, with a basic Will save.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k4.

Shattering Gem.name: Rozpryskliwy Klejnot
Shattering Gem.description:
Wielki klejnot zaczyna unosić się wokół celu w chaotyczny sposób. Klejnot ma 5 Punktów Żywotności. Za każdym razem kiedy istota zada celowi Cios cel wykonuje @Check[flat|dc:11|showDC:all]. Przy sukcesie klejnot blokuje atak, a więc obrażenia są najpierw zadawane klejnotow a dopiero potem pozostałe obrażenia dotykają celu. Jeśli klejnot zostanie sprowadzony do 0 Punktów Żywotności, rozpryskuje się, natychmiast zadając niszczącej go istocie 1k8 obrażeń ciętych (podstawowy rzut obronny Refleksu), tak długo jak ta istota zajduje się w promieniu 10 stóp od celu.

Wywyższenie (+1) Klejnot ma dodatkowe 5 Punktów Żywotności a obrażenia zadawane przez detonację zwiększają się o 1k8.

Sheltering Wings.name: Sheltering Wings
Sheltering Wings.description:
Aktywator An ally moves through a square within 15 feet of you or uses an action that has the move trait.

Like migratory birds, you know everyone flies farther together. You cause immense wings to sprout from your familiar. Your familiar Flies up to 30 feet, though it must move toward the triggering ally. If your familiar ends this movement adjacent to the triggering ally, it lands on their back; until the beginning of your next turn, the familiar automatically is carried by the ally, and its wings provide them cover. When the spell ends, the familiar hops off your ally into an adjacent square.
Sheltering Wings.requirements: An ally moves through a square within 15 feet of you or uses an action that has the move trait.

Shepherd of Souls.name: Shepherd of Souls
Shepherd of Souls.description:
You stay the hand of fate for one not yet destined to die, sacrificing some of your own vitality to heal them.

You lose up to 15 Hit Points as a sacrifice, and the target reduces the damage by twice the number of Hit Points sacrificed. If this reduction exceeds the amount of damage, the target recovers Hit Points equal to the excess amount.

Wywyższenie (+2) The maximum number of Hit Points you can sacrifice increases by 5.

Shield.name: Tarcza
Shield.description:
Wznosisz magiczną tarczę z czystej energii. Liczy się to jako @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Wzniesienie Tarczy}, zapewniając ci premię sytuacyjną +1 do KP do początku twojej następnej tury, ale nie wymaga użycia ręki.

Kiedy trwa zaklęcie możesz użyć reakcji @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Bloku Tarczą} wykorzystując swoją magiczną tarczę. Tarcza ma Twardość 5. Możesz użyć reakcji tego zaklęcia do redukcji obrażeń dowolnego zaklęcia lub efektu magicznego, nawet jeśli nie zadaje on obrażeń fizycznych. Po użyciu Bloku Tarczą zaklęcie kończy się a ty nie możesz go rzucać ponownie przez 10 minut.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Jemq5UknGdMO7b73]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Tarcza}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.QF6RDlCoTvkVHRo4]{Efekt: Niewrażliwość na Tarczę}

Wywyższenie (+2) Twardość tarczy wzrasta o 5.

Shielded Arm.name: Opancerzenie Ręki
Shielded Arm.description:
Na ręce celu pojawiają się wzmacniające je żyły rudy, pozwalając na odpieranie ataków nagą skórą. Cel może użyć akcji Wzniesienia Tarczy wznosząc zamiast tarczy swoją rękę, zyskując premię sytuacyjną +2 do KP. Może równiez używać Bloku Tarczą za pomocą wzniesionej ręki; kiedy to uczyni redukuje obrażenia jakby posiadał tarczę o Twardości 4 i 15 Punktach Żywotności. Ta tarcza nie posiada Progu Uszkodzenia a zaklęcie kończy się, kiedy Punkty Żywotności tarczy zostaną w pełni wykorzystane.

To zaklęcie nie wpływa na ataki wręcz celu ani nie może zostać użyte aby wykonać Cios uderzenia tarczą. Rzucanie tego zaklęcie lub wchodzenie z nim w kontakt liczy się jak użytkowanie metalowego obiektu na rzecz anatem.

Wywyższenie (+2) Twardość zwiększa się o 4 a Punkty Żywotności zwiększają się o 15.

Shielding Strike.name: Cios Osłonowy
Shielding Strike.description: Kiedy atakujesz wroga, ochronna magia przemienia pęd uderzenia w czyn, wznosząc twoją tarczę. Wykonaj Cios w zwarciu. Możesz albo @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Wznieść Tarczę} jeśli jakąś nosisz albo rzucić @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{Tarczę} jeśli masz to zaklęcie.

Shields of the Spirit.name: Shields of the Spirit
Shields of the Spirit.description:
Wymagania You are wielding a shield.

You Raise your Shield, causing ephemeral spirit shields to float within your champion's aura. The shields last until the start of your next turn or until you're no longer raising your shield, whichever comes first. While one of your allies is in your champion's aura, the shields grant them a +1 status bonus to AC, and each time an enemy makes an attack against the ally, the enemy takes 1k4 spirit damage (even if it misses).

The benefit applies only while an ally is in your aura, ending for any ally that leaves and applying to any that enters later. As normal, you don't count as your own ally and therefore don't get the benefits of the spirit shields yourself.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.mlvDokpnQBhvQrSk]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Shields of the Spirit}

Wywyższenie (+2) The damage increases by 1k4.

Shift Blame.name: Shift Blame
Shift Blame.description:
Aktywator You or another creature attacks a creature or fails at a Deception, Diplomacy, or Intimidation check.

You alter the target's memories of the triggering event as they form. You choose another creature (which can be you) with the capacity to make the triggering attack or skill check, and you alter the target's memories to recall the creature you chose as responsible for the triggering attack or skill check. The target must attempt a Will save and is then temporarily immune for 24 hours.

Krytyczny Sukces The target knows you attempted to alter its memories.

Sukces The target doesn't realize you attempted to alter its memories, though it knows you cast a spell.

Porażka You successfully alter the target's memory. It isn't forced to react to the new memories in a particular way, and it's likely to question them if they contradict other information it knows or are implausible for the situation.
Shift Blame.target: the target of the triggering attack or skill check

Shifting Form.name: Shifting Form
Shifting Form.description:
You change your body to better suit the moment. You gain one of the following abilities of your choice. You can Dismiss this spell.

  • You gain a 20-foot status bonus to your Speed.
  • You gain a climb or swim Speed equal to half your Speed.
  • You gain darkvision.
  • You gain a pair of claws. These are agile finesse unarmed attacks that deal 1k8 slashing damage.
  • You gain scent 60 feet (imprecise).

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.iN6shVYuzvQ4A95i]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Shifting Form}

Shifting Sand.name: Shifting Sand
Shifting Sand.description:
Area (continued) a horizontal earthen or sandy surface within a 20-foot burst

You cause the surface to heave. The area becomes difficult terrain, and any tracks in the area are destroyed by the churning ground. Creatures standing in the area take a –1 status penalty to Acrobatics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.M76ycLAqHoAgbcej]{Balance} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through} and Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{Skok Wzwyż} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Skok w Dal}. The first time each round you Sustain the Spell, you can move the churning area up to 20 feet in any direction. Creatures @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony} by the spell are carried along with the shifting sand in the same direction, if possible. Creatures that enter or begin their turn standing in the shifting sand must attempt a Reflex save.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature is unaffected and ignores the area's difficult terrain and penalty to skill checks until the end of its turn.

Sukces The creature ignores the area's penalty to skill checks until the end of its turn.

Porażka The creature is affected normally by the spell this turn.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature becomes immobilized within the spell's area until it Escapes. If the creature was already immobilized by shifting sand, it also falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}.

Wywyższenie (5th) The status penalty increases to –2, and the spell's range increases to 60 feet.

Wywyższenie (7th) The status penalty increases to –3, the spell's range increases to 60 feet, and the spell's area increases to a 30-foot burst.

Wywyższenie (9th) The status penalty increases to –4, the spell's range increases to 60 feet, and the spell's area increases to a 40-foot burst.

Shillelagh.name: Shillelagh
Shillelagh.description:
The target grows vines and leaves, brimming with primal energy. The target becomes a +1 striking weapon while in your hands, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of weapon damage dice to two. Additionally, as long as you are on your home plane, attacks you make with the target against aberrations, extraplanar creatures, and undead increase the number of weapon damage dice to three.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.deG1dtfuQph03Kkg]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Shillelagh}

Shining Starlight Attack.name: Shining Starlight Attack
Shining Starlight Attack.description:
Area varies (see below)

You brandish your sentinel weapon, summoning the image of your constellation above your head. The constellation then releases a powerful blast that deals 2k10 damage to all enemies in either a @Template[type:line|distance:30] or @Template[type:cone|distance:15], with a basic save against your arcane spell DC. Enemies that critically fail are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} until the start of your next turn. The damage type, traits, area, and saving throw are determined by your zodiac constellation (see below).

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k10.

ConstellationAttack (Area, Save, Damage Type; Traits)
Underworld DragonVolcanic vents (line, Reflex, fire)
OgreWild club swing (cone, Fortitude, bludgeoning)
SwordswomanFalling blades of light (line, Reflex, piercing)
Forest DragonSwarm of insects (cone, Fortitude, poison)
Sea DragonPressurized seawater (line, Reflex, piercing; water trait)
BlossomStorming petals and pollen (line, Fortitude; poison, plant, wood)
SwallowWing gust (cone, Reflex, slashing; air)
DogA biting dog (line, Reflex, slashing)
OxA trampling ox (line, Reflex, bludgeoning)
Sky DragonDraconic lightning (line, Reflex, electricity)
Sovereign DragonPsychic roar (cone, Will, mental)
ArcherHail of silver arrows (piercing, cone, Reflex)

Shock to the System.name: Shock to the System
Shock to the System.description:
A dense lightning cloud descends to fill the target's space, then fires a jolt of revitalizing lightning into the target. If the target is a corpse that died within the last round, the creature comes back to life with 0 Hit Points, and any effects and conditions it had when it died, with the exception of dying, and its wounded condition increases by 1. The creature's initiative is right before yours.

Regardless of whether the creature came back to life or was already alive, it regains 8k8 Hit Points, and the bolt wakes it up if it was @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Nieprzytomny}. For the duration of the spell, the target is supercharged. It becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Przyspieszony} and can use the extra action to Stand, Stride, Strike, or Fly (if it has a fly Speed). In addition, it can cast 5. kręgu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zDJS8E66UI0himqV]{Thunderstrike} as an innate spell at will, using your spell DC.

The cloud that covered the creature remains until the end of the target's next turn. Any creature in the cloud is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Schowany}, and anything outside the cloud is hidden to any creature inside the cloud.

Wywyższenie (+1) The healing increases by 2k8, and the thunderstrike rank increases by 1.
Shock to the System.target: 1 living creature or 1 corpse that died within the last round

Shocking Grasp.name: Porażający Dotyk
Shocking Grasp.description:
Pokrywasz swoje dłonie polem trzaskających błyskawić. Wykonaj rzut ataku zaklęciem w zwarciu. Przy trafieniu cel odnosi 2k12 obrażeń od elektryczności. Jeśli cel nosi metalowy pancerz lub jest wykonany z metalu, zyskujesz premię sytuacyjną +1 do twojego rzutu ataku porażającym dotykiem, a cel odnosi przy trafieniu dodatkowo obrażenia @Damage[(1d4+((@item.level)-1))[persistent,electricity]]. Przy trafieniu krytycznym podwój wstępne obrażenia, ale nie obrażenia przewlekłe.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k12 a przewlekłe obrażenia od elektryczności zwiększają się o 1.

Shockwave.name: Fala Uderzeniowa
Shockwave.description:
Tworzysz falę energii przemierzającą ziemię. Istoty lądowe na obszarze działania muszą wykonać rzut obronny Refleksu aby uniknąć potknięcia, kiedy fala uderzeniowa wstrząsa podłożem.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota ma @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczoną Gardę} do początku swojej następnej tury.

Porażka Istota pada @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalona}.

Krytyczna Porażka Jak porażka, plus istota odnosi 1k6 obrażeń obuchowych.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obszar działania zwiększa się o 5 stóp (do stożka 20 stóp na 2. kręgu i tak dalej).

Shooting Star.name: Shooting Star
Shooting Star.description: You let loose a projectile that flies true and leaves the blazing trail of a meteor behind it. Make a ranged Strike, ignoring the target's concealment and reducing the target's cover by one degree for this Strike only (greater to standard, standard to lesser, and lesser to none). If the Strike hits, the meteor trail hangs in the air. This gives the benefits of concealment negation and cover reduction to any attacks made against the creature (by anyone) until the start of your next turn.
Shooting Star.requirements: You're wielding a ranged weapon or a thrown weapon.

Show the Path.name: Show the Path
Show the Path.description:
You grant the target insight on things to come, guiding them toward a fate they find most fitting and encouraging them to continue this journey. The creature rolls a k20 at the start of each of its turns. The creature can use the result of the roll instead of rolling for any check before the start of their next turn. If the creature does substitute the roll in this way, they gain a +1 status bonus to whatever check they substitute on the following turn. Repeated substitutions increase the status bonus by 1, up to a total of +2. If the creature begins their turn without having substituted a roll in the previous round, the spell ends.

Wywyższenie (7th) The status bonus can increase up to a total of +3.

Wywyższenie (10th) The status bonus can increase up to a total of +4.

Show the Way.name: Show the Way
Show the Way.description:
You and allies in the area gain preternatural knowledge of the path ahead, allowing you to intuit the best way forward and avoid potential obstacles, such as difficult or confusing terrain. For the purpose of long-distance overland travel during exploration mode, traveling through difficult terrain reduces you to only three-quarters your travel Speed instead of half, and traveling through greater difficult terrain reduces your travel Speed to only half your travel Speed instead of one-third. Show the way doesn't prevent you from falling into traps or encountering other artificial obstacles and hazards.

Wywyższenie (6th) For the purpose of long-distance overland travel during exploration mode, traveling through difficult terrain doesn't reduce your travel Speed at all, and traveling through greater difficult terrain reduces your travel Speed to only three-quarters of its normal value instead of one-third.

Shrink.name: Shrink
Shrink.description:
You warp space to make a creature smaller. The target shrinks to become Tiny in size. Its equipment shrinks with it but returns to its original size if removed. The creature's reach changes to 0 feet. This spell has no effect on a Tiny creature.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.LXf1Cqi1zyo4DaLv]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Shrink}

Wywyższenie (6.) The spell can target up to 10 creatures.

Shrink Item.name: Shrink Item
Shrink Item.description: You shrink the target to roughly the size of a coin with negligible Bulk. You can Dismiss the spell, and the spell ends if you toss the object onto a solid surface. The object can't be used to attack or cause damage during the process of it returning to normal size. If there isn't room for the object to return to normal size when the spell ends, the spell's duration continues until the object is in a location large enough to accommodate its normal size.
Shrink Item.target: 1 non-magical object up to 20 cubic feet in volume and up to 80 Bulk

Shrink the Span.name: Shrink the Span
Shrink the Span.description: You move so fast you blur across planar boundaries. You teleport up to a distance equal to your Speed within your line of sight.

Shroud of Flame.name: Shroud of Flame
Shroud of Flame.description:
You encircle yourself in an aura of protective flames. Each creature that hits you with an unarmed attack, Grapples you, or otherwise touches you takes @Damage[3[fire]] damage. When you Cast the Spell and the first time you sustain it each round, each creature in the area takes @Damage[3d6[fire]] damage (podstawowy rzut obronny Refleksu).

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage caused by touching you increases by 1, and the fire damage when you Cast the Spell or sustain it increases by 1k6.

Shroud of Night.name: Shroud of Night
Shroud of Night.description:
Your patron blankets the target's eyes in darkness. If you cast this hex on a willing ally (for instance, one with light blindness), the ally can choose which result it gets without rolling.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Porażka The target is shrouded in murky darkness. It treats bright light as dim light, and unless it has greater darkvision, all creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} to it.

Shroud of the Mantis.name: Shroud of the Mantis
Shroud of the Mantis.description:
You wrap yourself in a crimson cloak that renders you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialny}, with the same restrictions as a 2. kręgu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibility} spell.

Wywyższenie (6.) The duration increases to 10 minutes.

Wywyższenie (8.) The duration increases to 1 hour.

Sigil.name: Sigil
Sigil.description:
Umieszczasz, w nieszkodliwy sposób, na istocie lub obiekcie będącym celem zaklęcia unikalny magiczny sygil o rozmiarze około 5 cm kwadradowych. Znak ten może być widzialny lub niewidzialny i możesz zmieniać ten stan poprzez Interakcję, w ramach której dotykasz celu. Znak może zostać zeskrobany lub zszorowany w ciągu 5 minut pracy. Jeśli został umieszczony na istocie, zanika w naturalny sposób po upłynięciu tygodnia. Czas do zaniknięcia znaku zwiększa się w zależności od kręgu, do którego wywyższono zaklęcie.

Wywyższenie (3.) Sigil zanika po upłynięciu 1 miesiąca.

Wywyższenie (5.) Sigil zanika po upłynięciu 1 roku.

Wywyższenie (7.) Sigil nigdy nie zanika.

Sign of Conviction.name: Sign of Conviction
Sign of Conviction.description:
You conjure the religious symbol of your deity into the air above you in the same space you stand in, wielding the power of your faith to smite your foes. This religious symbol is immobile, made of pure magical force, and can't be damaged. As long as you Sustain sign of conviction, you gain a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws and are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony}. The DC for any effect to force you to move out of your space (such as the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Odepchnięcie} action) is equal to your spell DC or the normal DC, whichever is higher. If you stop being immobilized or are moved out of your space, sign of conviction immediately ends.

When you Cast the Spell and each time you Sustain the Spell, the religious symbol emits a blast of energy at a target within 100 feet. Make a spell attack roll that deals 2k10 damage on a success (see below for determining damage type) and double damage on a critical success. You can Sustain the Spell multiple times in the same round to emit an array of blasts.

If you worship a good deity, the spell gains the good and light traits, deals your choice of either fire or spirit damage, and emits bright light in a @Template[burst|distance:20]. If you worship an evil deity, the spell gains the evil and darkness traits, deals your choice of cold or spirit damage, and reduces the light level in a @Template[burst|distance:20] to dim light if it would be brighter. If you worship a neutral deity, the spell gains the force trait and deals force damage.

Wywyższenie (+2) The damage increases by 1k10.

Signal Skyrocket.name: Rakieta Sygnałowa
Signal Skyrocket.description:
Z pomocą szczypty prochu strzelniczego i sproszkowanych metali tworzysz jarząco czerwoną energię, wystrzeliwującą prosto w niebo i wybuchającą z głośnym hukiem. Na procesie udoskonalania zaklęcia, możesz nawet z czasem być w stanie nadać rakiecie twój własny wybrany kolor i wzór.

Nie możesz zmienić kierunku i odległości, na które leci rakieta - musi zmierzać ona prosto do góry, i na maksymalną wysokośc o ile to możliwe. Jeśli rakieta eksploduje na maksymalnej wysokości, wytworzone jasne światło jest widoczne z odległości do 10 mil, a przy sprzyjających warunkach pogodowych odgłos eksplozji jest słyszalny z odległości mili.

Jeśli rakieta wybuchnie w zamkniętej przestrzeni mniejszej od pełnego rozmiaru wybuchu, każda istota odnosi 1k10 obrażeń od dźwięku w oparciu o rzut obronny Refleksu.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia i jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczona} na 1 rundę.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota odnosi podwójne obrażenia and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiona} na 1 rundę.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia od dźwięku zwiększają się o 1k10.

Silence.name: Cisza
Silence.description:
Cel nie wydaje żadnych dźwięków, co zapobiega zauważaniu go przez inne istoty z użyciem jedynie słuchu. Cel nie może wykonywać ataków dźwiękowych ani używać akcji z cechą słuchowości. Zapobiega to rzucaniu przez niego zaklęć, ze względu na magiczne słowa zawierane w procesie ich rzucania, za wyłączeniem subtelnych zaklęć.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.mmJNE57hC7G3SPae]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Cisza}

Wywyższenie (4.) Zaklęcie tworzy aurę w emanacji 10 stóp wokół celu, wyciszając wszelkie dźwięki wydobywajace się w niej lub przechodzące przez nią. Istoty znajdujące się w aurze zostają objęte tymi samymi efektami co cel. Zależnie od umiejscowienia efektu, istota może zauważyć brak dochodzącego do niej dźwięku (na przykład kiedy blokowane są odgłosy dochodzące od drużyny).

Silver's Refrain.name: Silver's Refrain
Silver's Refrain.description:
The "Song of Silver" was an enchanted song used by the Silver Ravens to battle diabolic forces. You pull from select verses to temporarily replicate some of the legendary song's benefits, albeit on a much smaller scale.

Weapon and unarmed attacks by allies in the area are treated as silver. In addition, this spell automatically attempts to counteract any @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{Translocate} cast by a devil within the area or cast by a devil attempting to enter the area using dimension door. If a devil attempts to enter the area using dimension door and the spell is counteracted, the devil remains where it started.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.2W4qAipPVlapaWbc]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Silver's Refrain}

Sky Laughs at Waves.name: Sky Laughs at Waves
Sky Laughs at Waves.description:
Wymagania You're wielding a one-handed weapon in the sword group.

You soar and leave the world's squabbles behind before your violent intentions ground you once more. Fly up to your Speed, then make a Strike with your sword against an adjacent creature at the end of your movement. If you don't have any other means of flying, you fall after the Strike. If you can't end your movement adjacent to an enemy, this spell is disrupted.
Sky Laughs at Waves.requirements: You're wielding a one-handed weapon in the sword group.

Sky Signs.name: Sky Signs
Sky Signs.cost: lenses and fine mineral dusts worth 300 gp total
Sky Signs.description:
You emblazon a message across the sky itself. Casting the ritual requires choosing a set of symbols for the message you want to send, which you can convey with an atmospheric phenomenon of your choice. Common choices include carefully shaped clouds during the day and auroras at night. Some cultures — such as the many denizens of the Plane of Air and star-gazing iruxis — develop complex symbology to communicate clearly using sky signs.

The message appears in the sky above you and can be seen to the horizon. To be conveyed in this way, the message must be very simple — typically something that can be expressed in 5 words or fewer. The symbols look the same to anyone who sees them. If you wish to conceal a message, you need to choose symbols that will make sense to your chosen audience but not to any other onlookers.

Krytyczny Sukces You display your chosen signs, and the message is clear to anyone who sees it.

Sukces You display a somewhat muddled version of your message. The signs aren't entirely clear and require interpretation from those who view them — and many interpret them incorrectly.

Porażka You're unable to show your message.

Krytyczna Porażka The spirits of air find your message audacious and offensive. As punishment, they emblazon the opposite of your intended message across the sky, and the message is clear to anyone who sees it.

Wywyższenie (10.) The scope of your message is truly staggering and can be seen across the entire planet.

Slashing Gust.name: Tnący Wiatr
Slashing Gust.description:
Przecinasz ręką powietrze, dobywając z każdego ze swoich palców miniaturowe fale powietrza szatkujące wroga. Jeśli masz wolne obie ręce, możesz objąć za cel tego zaklęcia dwie osobne istoty; w przeciwnym razie obierasz za cel jedną.

Wykonaj rzut ataku zaklęciem przeciwko KP każdego z celów. Zadaje on 2k4 obrażeń ciętych. Przy sukcesie krytycznym cel odnosi dodatkowo obrażenia @Damage[(@item.level)d4[bleed]]. Jeśli atakujesz dwie istoty, liczy się to jako dwa ataki na rzecz obliczania twojej kary za atak wielokrotny, ale nie zwiększasz jej aż do momentu wykonania obu ataków.

Krytyczny Sukces Cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia i 1k4 przewlekłych obrażeń od krwawienia.

Sukces Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k4 a przewlekłe obrażenia przy trafieniu krytycznym zwiekszają się o 1k4.
Slashing Gust.requirements: You have at least one free hand.

Sleep.name: Sen
Sleep.description:
Każda istota w obszarze staje sie senna i może zasnąć. Istota, która stanie się @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Nieprzytomna} w wyniku tego zaklęcia nie pada @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalona} ani nie puszcza tego, co trzyma. To zaklęcie nie zapobiega budzeniu się istot ze snu w wyniku udanych testów Percepcji, co ogranicza jego użytecznosć w walce.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota ponosi karę statusową –1 do testów Percepcji przez 1 rundę.

Porażka Istota staje się Nieprzytomna. Jeśli po upływie 1 minuty nadal jest Nieprzytomna budzi się automatycznie.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota staje się Nieprzytomna. Jeśli po upływie 1 godziny nadal jest Nieprzytomna budzi się automatycznie.

Wywyższenie (4.) Istoty stają się Nieprzytomne na 1 rundę w wyniku porażki i na 1 minutę w wyniku krytycznej porażki. Padają Powalone, upuszczają trzymane przedmiory oraz nie mogą podejmować testów Percepcji celem obudzenia się. Po zakończeniu czasu trwania zaklęcia istoty zaczynają spać normalnym snem, zamiast automatycznie przebudzać się.

Sliding Blocks.name: Sliding Blocks
Sliding Blocks.description:
You conjure up to six 5-foot stone cubes you can gently move with a gesture. Each cube appears in any space within range, and they're capable of levitating. If you conjure a cube in an occupied space or in a space that can't accommodate it, it fails to appear. Each 5-foot cube can be Climbed with a successful @Check[athletics|dc:10] check and has AC 10, Hardness 10, and 40 Hit Points. If any of the cubes is ever farther away from you than the range of this spell, it immediately crumbles into dust.

Each time you Sustain this spell, you can move up to two of the conjured cubes up to 10 feet each in any direction, including vertically. You can choose different cubes to move each time you Sustain.

Wywyższenie (+2) The cubes have 10 additional Hit Points, and you can move the chosen cubes an additional 5 feet each time you Sustain this Spell.

Slime Spit.name: Slime Spit
Slime Spit.description:
You spit toxic goo that coats your target's face and eyes, dealing 2k6 poison damage. It must attempt a Reflex save.

Krytyczny Sukces The target takes no damage.

Sukces The target takes half damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} for 1 round, though it can Interact to wipe its eyes and remove the condition.

Porażka The target takes full damage and is dazzled until the end of your next turn.

Krytyczna Porażka The target takes double damage, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiony} for 1 round, and is dazzled until it uses an Interact action to wipe its eyes.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 2k6.

Slither.name: Slither
Slither.description:
A mass of snakes made of shadow rise up to capture creatures in the area. Each creature in the area when you Cast the Spell takes @Damage[3d6[piercing]] damage and @Damage[1d6[persistent,poison]] damage from a biting snake, and it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Pochwycony} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Spętany} depending on its Reflex save. A creature that ends its turn in the area must also attempt this save, even if it's already grabbed or restrained by the snakes. You can Dismiss the spell.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia and is grabbed by a snake. The snakes' @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} DC is equal to your spell DC. A creature can attack a snake to release the creature. A snake's AC is equal to your spell DC, and it's destroyed if it takes 12 or more damage at once. New snakes continually regrow as long as the spell lasts, so destroying snakes doesn't prevent slither from capturing more creatures.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the creature takes double damage and is restrained by a snake.

Wywyższenie (+2) The persistent poison damage increases by 1k6 and snake HP increases by 6.

Slough Skin.name: Slough Skin
Slough Skin.description:
You continually and harmlessly slough off the top layer of your skin while new skin regenerates immediately, quickly moving damaging substances away from your body. The flat check to remove persistent damage from effects that coat your skin (such as most persistent acid damage) is reduced to 5, and you gain a +2 status bonus to your initial save against contact poison (but not to further saves since, by that point, the toxin has already entered your system).

If you're affected by an effect other than persistent damage that depends on continuous contact with your skin, and if that effect allows a saving throw, you receive a new saving throw against that effect at the end of each turn when you attempt your flat checks against persistent damage, and you also receive a +2 status bonus to those saving throws.

While affected by this spell, your continually shedding skin makes you much easier to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track}. Anyone Tracking you gains a +2 circumstance bonus to do so, and you can't Hide Your Tracks.

Slow.name: Spowolnienie
Slow.description:
Zakrzywiasz upływ czasu wokół celu, spowalniając jego działania.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Cel jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} na 1 rundę.

Porażka Cel jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} na 1 minutę.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 2} na 1 minutę.

Wywyższenie (6.) Możesz obrać za cel do 10 istot.

Snake Fangs.name: Snake Fangs
Snake Fangs.description:
Your jaw unhinges as your teeth extend into wicked fangs. For the spell's duration, you gain a fangs unarmed attack. They're a finesse, grapple, unarmed attack that deals 1k8 piercing damage and an extra 2k10 poison damage. If you have a creature at least one size smaller than you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Pochwycony} with your fangs, you can use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.uJSseLa57HZYSMUu]{Połknięcie w Całości} ability that deals @Damage[4d6[bludgeoning]] damage and has a Rupture value of 17. A swallowed creature is transported to an extraplanar space that resembles the inside of a snake's stomach, so when it gets free, it appears in a space adjacent to you. If you're killed or the spell ends, the swallowed creature is immediately freed.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.ubKx634Kbl1hHzL9]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Snake Fangs}

Wywyższenie (+3) The extra poison damage of your fangs unarmed attack increases by 1k10, the damage dealt by the Swallow Whole ability increases by 6k6, and the Rupture value increases by 9.

Snare Hopping.name: Snare Hopping
Snare Hopping.description:
You may not have placed your snare in the right place, but you can magically move it there. You teleport the target snare to another unoccupied location in range.

Wywyższenie (+1) The range of the spell increases by 10 feet.

Snowball.name: Śnieżka
Snowball.description:
Miotasz magicznie napędzaną i chłodzoną kulkę gęstego śniegu. Cel odnosi 2k4 obrażeń od zimna i potencjalnie ponosi inne efekty, w zależnosi od wyniku twojego rzutu ataku zaklęciem.

Krytyczny Sukces Cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia i ponosi karę statusową –10 stóp do swoich Prędkości na 1 rundę.

Sukces Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia i ponosi karę statusową –5 do swoich Prędkości na 1 rundę.

Porażka Brak efektu.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k4.

Soft Landing.name: Soft Landing
Soft Landing.description: You create a magical field that buoys any creature or object falling into the area, providing a harmless landing from any height. As you generally fall 1 500 feet per round, you can cast this spell while you are falling to ensure a safe landing, provided you can see your landing point and it's within range.

Solid Fog.name: Solid Fog
Solid Fog.description: You conjure a bank of fog so thick it impedes movement as well as sight. This functions as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{Mist}, except that the area is also difficult terrain. You can Dismiss the spell.

Sonata Span.name: Sonata Span
Sonata Span.description: By playing a brief tune on an instrument or in song, you cause the notes of the melody to physically manifest into a shimmering, translucent path. This path doesn't need to be over solid ground and can tilt up or down diagonally up to 45 degrees, but it must be a straight, 5-foot-wide line. It can support as many creatures as can physically fit on the bridge.

Song of Marching.name: Song of Marching
Song of Marching.description:
You maintain a brisk performance that keeps allies on the move. You and your allies in the area can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.JuqmIAnkL9hVGai8]{Hustle} for the spell's duration, in addition to your other exploration activities (your exploration activity is Sustaining this spell). You and your allies then become temporarily immune for 1 day.

If you enter an encounter while performing this song, you can use your Performance modifier for the initiative roll. You and your affected allies also receive a +1 status bonus to that initiative roll.

Wywyższenie (6.) You can Sustain the Spell for up to 2 hours.

Wywyższenie (9.) You can Sustain the Spell for up to 4 hours.

Song of Silver.name: Song of Silver
Song of Silver.description:
The majority of the Song of Silver's time needed to Cast it consists of preparations for the performance, which must take place on a stage in Kintargo. While the Song of Silver can be cast by a single primary caster, up to six secondary casters can assist by helping to decorate the stage with Crafting or by spreading word and gathering an audience with Society. At the end of this 8-hour period, the primary caster performs the song, which takes up the final minute of the casting time.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.BdgWuULYjFwlVkr7]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Song of Silver}

Krytyczny Sukces The stage and rooftop above any stage where the song was performed glows softly with silver radiance for 1 week. During this time, the ritual tries to counteract teleportation effects and planar travel into or out of Kintargo attempted by unholy creatures, and all weapons wielded within Kintargo are treated as if they were made of silver for the purposes of calculating damage against creatures who possess weakness to silver. The ritual also generates the Success effects below. The Song of Silver can't be attempted again for 1 month.

Sukces For 1 week, the primary and secondary casters gain a +2 status bonus to all saving throws against mental effects; this bonus doubles to a +4 status bonus against all fear effects. Each caster gains the ability to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Hnc7eGi7vyZenAIm]{Breath of Life} as an innate occult spell at a rank equal to what the Song of Silver was cast at, once during the week. These benefits are suppressed as long as the character is outside of Kintargo. The Song of Silver can't be attempted again for 1 month.

Porażka The Song of Silver fails, and it can't be attempted again for 1 month.

Krytyczna Porażka Not only does the ritual fail, but the primary caster is overwhelmed with shame at the failure and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 2} for 1 week (can't be removed by any means). The Song of Silver can't be attempted again for 6 months.

Wywyższenie (10.) The effects of the Song of Silver expand to cover all of Ravounel.

Song of Strength.name: Song of Strength
Song of Strength.description:
You bolster your allies' physical strength with a hearty exhortation. You and your allies gain a +1 status bonus to Athletics checks and to their DCs against Athletics skill actions such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Rozbrojenie}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.lOE4yjUnETTdaf2T]{Przemieszczenie}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Odepchnięcie}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Podcięcie}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.8adLKKzJy49USYJt]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Song of Strength}

Song of the Fallen.name: Song of the Fallen
Song of the Fallen.description:
You chant a dirge or an elegy that either rouses the dead to action or reminds undead that they should lay to rest.

If you target dead creatures, the bodies animate and can continue acting as if they were alive. A creature animated in this way has 60 temporary Hit Points. The animated creatures are slowed 1 but can otherwise act normally. Creatures animated with this spell die again once the spell ends.

If you target undead creatures, each undead must attempt a basic Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces The undead takes 5k6 vitality damage.

Sukces The undead takes 10k6 vitality damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} for 1 round.

Porażka The undead takes 100 vitality damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} for 1 minute.

Krytyczna Porażka The undead is destroyed.
Song of the Fallen.target: up to 4 dead creatures or up to 4 undead creatures

Songbird's Call.name: Songbird's Call
Songbird's Call.description:
Your voice calls a storm of songbirds that whirl around you and peck at your enemies. All creatures within the area of whirling birds become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty}, and all creatures outside the area become concealed to creatures within it. A creature other than you that enters or ends its turn in the area takes 1k6 piercing damage as the birds peck at it.

Wywyższenie (+2) The damage increases by 1k6.

Soothe.name: Ukojenie
Soothe.description:
Obłaskawiasz umysł celu, zwiększając jego mentalną obronę oraz lecząc jego rany. Cel odzyskuje 1k10+4 Punktów Żywotności kiedy Rzucisz Zaklęcie oraz zyskuje na czas jego trwania premię statusową +2 do rzutów obronnych przeciw mentalnym efektom.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.nkk4O5fyzrC0057i]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Ukojenie}

Wywyższenie (+1) Wartość leczenia zwiększa się o 1k10+4.

Soothing Ballad.name: Soothing Ballad
Soothing Ballad.description:
You draw upon your muse to soothe your allies. Choose one of the following three effects:

  • The spell attempts to counteract fear effects on the targets.
  • The spell attempts to counteract effects imposing paralysis on the targets.
  • The spell restores 7k8 Hit Points to the targets.

Wywyższenie (+1) When used to heal, soothing ballad restores 1k8 more Hit Points.

Soothing Blossoms.name: Soothing Blossoms
Soothing Blossoms.description:
Blossoms grow from the ground in a small area, soothing away afflictions and persistent pains and harm. When any creature in that area rolls a successful save against a poison or disease effect, it gets a critical success instead. The blossoms grant assisted recovery to everyone in the area to end their persistent damage, both when the spell is cast and at the start of each of your turns. Once the duration ends, the flowers lose their magical effect, but a few of them might survive in the area as long as they can naturally. This spell doesn't give a benefit on a save against an affliction unless the stage lasts 10 minutes or less.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.nIryhRgeiacQw1Em]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Soothing Blossoms}

Soothing Mist.name: Soothing Mist
Soothing Mist.description:
You call forth a magical mist that envelops a creature. The mist restores 2k8 Hit Points to a target living creature and ends one source of persistent acid, bleed, fire, poison, or void damage affecting it. If the creature is taking persistent damage from multiple sources, you select which one is removed. Against an undead target, you deal 2k8 vitality damage (basic Fortitude save); if it fails the save, it also takes @Damage[(@item.rank)[persistent,vitality]] damage.

Wywyższenie (+1) The amount of healing (or damage to an undead target) increases by 1k8, and the persistent vitality damage to an undead creature increases by 1.
Soothing Mist.target: 1 willing living creature or 1 undead creature

Soothing Spring.name: Soothing Spring
Soothing Spring.description:
Steam wisps into the air as a stone-lined pool appears in the ground and fills with hot water that bubbles up from the earth. The water is comfortably hot and smells mildly sulfurous in a not-unpleasant way. You are able to draw out the full energizing potential of the mineral-rich water. Any creature that spends the full hour soaking in the hot spring or basking in the mud from the bottom of the pit regains 10k8 Hit Points and feels refreshed, losing the fatigued condition. As normal for effects that remove fatigue, this doesn't remove any underlying source of fatigue, such as lack of sleep, causing the condition to return if the underlying source isn't addressed.

The pool is 20 feet on each side, and it's 5 feet deep. It can contain 16 Medium or smaller creatures at a time. A Large creature counts as eight Medium creatures and a Huge creature fills the entire pool. This pool has the structure trait and the same restrictions as magic items that create structures.

Wywyższenie (+1) The healing increases by 2k8.

Soothing Words.name: Soothing Words
Soothing Words.description:
You attempt to calm the target by uttering soothing words in a calm and even tone. The target gains a +1 status bonus to Will saving throws. This bonus increases to +2 against emotion effects.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.an4yZ6dyIDOFa1wa]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Soothing Words}

In addition, when you Cast this Spell, you can attempt to counteract one emotion effect on the target.

Wywyższenie (5.) The bonus to saves increases to +2, or +3 against emotion effects.

Soul Siphon.name: Soul Siphon
Soul Siphon.description:
You siphon off a portion of the target's soul to bolster your own vitality. The target must attempt a Fortitude save or take 1k4 void damage. You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the total amount of HP the target loses, including the HP lost from becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony}.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 1}.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota odnosi podwójne obrażenia and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 2}.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k4.

Soulshelter Vessel.name: Soulshelter Vessel
Soulshelter Vessel.description:
You connect the spirit of the target creature with the target object, giving their spirit a durable vessel that protects and empowers their body. You create a pool of healing within the object, which starts out with 40 HP worth of healing per Bulk of the object. (These HP can only be used by the creature, and don't increase the object's HP.) When you Cast the Spell, the targeted creature regains 10 HP, which come out of the object's pool. You can also spend a single action-which has the concentrate, good, healing, necromancy, and vitality traits-to repeat this transfer. When the pool is empty, the object becomes broken. The spell ends if the object becomes broken or the targets are no longer within 500 feet of each other.

If the target creature would be reduced to 0 Hit Points, the creature regains either 20 HP or the amount left in the object's pool, whichever is lower. The object immediately becomes broken, ending the spell.

Wywyższenie (+2) Increase the maximum Bulk of the item by 1 (potentially increasing the size of the healing pool), the amount of HP exchanged each time the stone is used by 5, and the amount of HP exchanged when the creature would be reduced to 0 HP by 10 (or by the amount left in the pool, if it's lower).
Soulshelter Vessel.target: 1 willing creature and 1 non-magical stone object of 1 or 2 Bulk

Sound Body.name: Zdrowe Ciało
Sound Body.description:
Wysyłasz falę leczniczej energii aby przywrócić ciało celu do stanu zdrowia. Spróbuj przeciwdziałać jednemu wybranemu przez siebie efektowi nakładającego na cel jeden z następujących statusów: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepienie}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczenie}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Głuchota}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabienie} lub @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlenie}. Jeśli nie udało ci się przeciwdziałać efektowi, ale udałoby się to gdyby jego ranga przeciwdziałania była o 2 niższa, zamiast tego tłumisz efekt do początku swojej następnej tury. Czas działania efektu nie upływa kiedy jest stłumiony.

To zaklęcie nie może tłumić ani przeciwdziałać klątwom, chorobom lub statusom, które są częścią normalnego stanu celu.

Wywyższenie (4.) Dodaj do listy statusów @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczenie} i @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolnienie}.

Wywyższenie (8.) Dodaj do listy statusów @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszenie}.

Sparkleskin.name: Sparkleskin
Sparkleskin.description:
You coat a creature's body in a layer of brilliantly sparkling glitter. The target gains a +2 status bonus on Deception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.GkmbTGfg8KcgynOA]{Create a Diversion} and to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint}, and on Performance checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EEDElIyin4z60PXx]{Perform} that have the visual trait. When the target take damage, glitter bursts out of its wound in a @Template[emanation|distance:5]. Creatures in the area must attempt a Fortitude save.

Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} for 1 round.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is dazzled for 3 rounds.

Speak with Animals.name: Rozmawianie ze Zwierzętami
Speak with Animals.description: Możesz zadawać zwierzętom pytania, otrzymywać odpowiedzi na nie, oraz używać w kontaktach z nimi umiejętności Dyplomacji. Zaklęcie nie sprawia, że są one bardziej przyjazne niż zwykle. Przebiegłe zwierzęta są w swoich wypowiedziach zazwyczaj zwięzłe i wymijające, podczas gdy mniej inteligentne często wygłaszają bezsensowne komentarze.

Speak with Plants.name: Rozmawianie z Roślinami
Speak with Plants.description:
Możesz zadawać grzybom lub roślinom pytania i otrzymywać odpowiedzi na nie, ale zaklęcie to nie sprawia, że są one bardziej przyjazne, czy bardziej inteligentne, niż zwykle. Większość normalnych roślin i grzybów ma osobliwy pogląd na otaczający je świat, więc nie rozpoznaje szczegółów na temat stworzeń ani nie wie nic o świecie poza ich bezpośrednim sąsiedztwem. Przebiegłe potwory roślinne lub grzybowe są w swoich wypowiedziach zazwyczaj zwięzłe i wymijające, podczas gdy mniej inteligentne potwory często wygłaszają bezsensowne komentarze.

Wywyższenie (4.) Czas trwania wynosi 8 godzin.

Speak with Stones.name: Rozmawianie z Kamieniami
Speak with Stones.description:
Możesz zadawać naturalnemu lub ociosanemu kamieniowi pytania i otrzymywać odpowiedzi na nie. Chociaż kamień nie jest bytem inteligentnym, rozmawiasz z naturalnymi duchami kamienia, których osobowość zależy od rodzaju skały oraz struktury, której jest ona częścią, w wypadku kamienia ciosnaego. Perspektywa, postrzeganie oraz wiedza kamienia zapewniają mu światopogląd na tyle odmienny od ludzkiego, że nie uznaje on za istotne tego samego rodzaju szczegółów. Kamienie są zwykle w stanie odpowiedzieć na pytania dotyczące istot, które dotknęły ich w przeszłości oraz o to co skrywa się pod nimi lub za nimi.

Wywyższenie (6.) Czas trwania wynosi 8 godzin.

Speaking Sky.name: Speaking Sky
Speaking Sky.description:
The air speaks to you. You can precisely sense any motion within 60 feet through vibration and air movement.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.mhklZ6wjfty0bF44]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Speaking Sky}

Spectral Advance.name: Spectral Advance
Spectral Advance.description:
Taking on a spiritual form, you flash across the battlefield to engage an enemy. You Stride to a space adjacent to an enemy. If you cast the spell using 2 actions, you can Stride twice instead of once. If you have a fly Speed, you can Fly instead of Striding.

If you're mounted, you can have your mount move instead of you. Movement from spectral advance doesn't trigger reactions and ignores difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain. During the movement, you (or your mount) have resistance equal to your level to all damage.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.5gpsh5UviUnFIRXY]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Spectral Advance}

Spell Immunity.name: Spell Immunity
Spell Immunity.description: You ward a creature against the effects of a single spell. Choose a spell and name it aloud as part of the verbal component. Spell immunity attempts to counteract that spell whenever spell immunity's target is the target of the named spell or in that spell's area. Successfully counteracting a spell that targets an area or multiple targets with spell immunity negates the effects only for the target affected by spell immunity.

Spell Riposte.name: Spell Riposte
Spell Riposte.description:
Aktywator You're the target of a spell you're aware of.

You attempt to counteract the triggering spell. If the spell would be counteracted, it instead continues with the caster as a target instead of you. Spell riposte can't affect spells that aren't targeted (such as area spells).

Spell Turning.name: Spell Turning
Spell Turning.description: This abjuration reflects spells cast at you back at their caster. When a spell targets you, you can spend a reaction to attempt to reflect it. This uses the rules for counteracting the spell, but if the spell is successfully counteracted, the effect is turned back on the caster. Whether or not the counteract attempt is successful, spell turning then ends. Spell turning can't affect spells that aren't targeted (such as area spells). If spell turning reflects a spell back at a caster who is also under the effect of spell turning, their spell turning can attempt to reflect their own spell back at you again; if they do so, their counteract attempt automatically succeeds.

Spellmaster's Ward.name: Spellmaster's Ward
Spellmaster's Ward.description:
You create one or more glowing protective runes that revolve around you. For each additional action you use when Casting the Spell, increase the number of runes you create by one, to a maximum of three runes for 3 actions.

When you next take damage from a spell, a rune is expended to prevent @Damage[2d6 + (@item.rank - 5)[untyped]] of that spell's damage. If damage from the triggering spell remains, additional runes are expended until the damage is completely negated, or until all runes have been spent, whichever comes first.

Wywyższenie (+1) Each rune prevents an additional 1 damage.

Spellsurge.name: Spellsurge
Spellsurge.description:
Magic surges to life around you, feeding on the raw power you radiate. Choose one of the following abilities to affect creatures in your aura. You can choose a different effect, ending the previous one, by Sustaining the spell. You can Dismiss the aura.

  • Interference The excess magic surrounding you creates a mental static. All saving throws against mental effects gain a +2 circumstance bonus.
  • Mana Well You become a source of pure magic that allows spells to be cast more freely. Allied creatures that would normally be required to attempt a flat check to Cast a Spell (such as from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony} condition) automatically succeed.
  • Overpower Resistance Surging magic penetrates most defenses. Any time a spell affects a creature within the aura, that spell ignores an amount of the creature's resistance equal to your level. This applies to all damage the spell deals, including persistent damage and damage caused by an ongoing effect of the spell. This doesn't cause the spell to ignore immunities.
  • Ward Stray magical energy diffuses damaging spells. Any time a spell affects a creature within the aura, the damage dealt by the spell is reduced by an amount equal to your level. This applies to all damage the spell deals, including persistent damage and damage caused by an ongoing effect of the spell.

Spellwrack.name: Mór Zaklęć
Spellwrack.description:
Sprawiasz, że wszelkie zaklęcia rzucone na cel wylewają swoją energię w szkodliwych falach. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Ilekroć cel znajdzie się pod wpływem zaklęcia posiadającego czas trwania, otrzymuje @Damage[2d12[persistent,force]]{2k12 przewlekłych obrażeń od mocy}. Za każdym razem, gdy otrzymuje przewlekłe obrażenia od mocy od moru zaklęć, skraca pozostały czas trwania wpływających na niego zaklęć o 1 rundę. Tylko udany test @Check[arcana]{Wiedzy Tajemnej} przeciwko twojemu ST zaklęć może pomóc celowi w ozdrowieniu z tych obrażeń przewlekłych. Klątwa i obrażenia przewlekłe kończą się po 1 minucie.

Porażka Jak przy sukcesie, ale klątwa i obrażenia przewlekłe nie kończą się same.

Krytyczna Porażka Jak przy porażce, ale przewlekłe obrażenia od mocy wynoszą @Damage[4d12[persistent,force]]{4k12}.

Spider Sting.name: Pajęcze Ukąszenie
Spider Sting.description:
Magicznie odzwierciedlasz jadowite ukąszenie pająka. Zadajesz dotkniętej istocie 1k4 obrażeń kłutych i poddajesz ją pod działanie pajęczego jadu. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Krzepy.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Cel odnosi obrażenia @Damage[1d4[poison]].

Porażka Cel jest dotknięty pajęczym jadem w stadium 1.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel jest dotknięty pajęczym jadem w stadium 2.

Pajęczy Jad (trucizna)

Poziom 1

Maksymalny Czas Trwania 4 rundy.

Stadium 1 1k4 obrażeń od trucizny i @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabienie 1} (1 runda)

Stadium 2 1k4 obrażeń od trucizny i @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabienie 2} (1 runda)

Spike Stones.name: Spike Stones
Spike Stones.description:
Long, sharp spikes of solid rock thrust up from the ground in the area. The area becomes difficult terrain and hazardous terrain. A creature that moves on the ground through the area takes 3 piercing damage for every square of that area it moves into.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1.

Spinning Staff.name: Spinning Staff
Spinning Staff.description: You spin your staff with a twirling flourish, attacking two foes and transforming the momentum into magical energy to charge for your next @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QDW9H8XLIjuW2fE4]{Czarocios}. Make a melee Strike with your staff against one foe and then a second melee Strike with your staff against a different foe. Your multiple attack penalty applies to both of these attacks as normal.

Spiral of Horrors.name: Spirala Grozy
Spiral of Horrors.description:
Cienie i duchy wyją i wirują wokół ciebie w pokazie, który zasiewa strach w sercach wszystkich, którzy go widzą. Wrogowie w obszarze stają się @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażeni 1} i nie mogą zmniejszyć swojej wartości przerażenia poniżej 1 przez czas trwania zaklęcia.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.HF1r1psnITHD52B9]{Aura: Spirala Grozy}

Spirit Blast.name: Spirit Blast
Spirit Blast.description:
You concentrate ethereal energy and attack a creature's spirit, dealing 16k6 spirit damage with a basic Fortitude save.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6.

Spirit Link.name: Duchowe Łącze
Spirit Link.description:
Tworzysz duchowe łącze między tobą a inną istotą, absorbując jej ból. Kiedy Rzucisz to Zaklęcie oraz na początku każdej twojej tury, jeśli cel jest poniżej swojej maksymalnej liczby Punktów Żywotności, odzyskuje on 2 Punkty Żywotności (lub różnicę między swoimi obecnymi i maksymalnymi Punktami Żywtoności, jeśli jest ona niższa). Ty tracisz taką samą liczbę Punktów Żywotności jaką odzyskał cel.

Jest to duchowy przepływ sił, nie mają więc dla niego zastosowania żadne efekty, które zwiększyłyby liczbę Punktów Żywotności odzyskiwanych przez cel, ani zmniejszyły liczbę Punktów Żywotności traconych przez ciebie. Przepływ ten ignoruje również wszelkie tymczasowe Punkty Żywotności posiadane przez ciebie i przez cel. Jako, że efekt ten nie jest związany z witalnością ani energią pustki, duchowe łącze działa nawet jeśli ty lub cel jesteście niemuarli. Podczas trwania zaklęcia, nie odnosisz żadnych korzyści z regeneracji ani szybkiego leczenia. Możesz Odwołać to zaklęcie, a jeśli kiedykolwiek osiągniesz 0 Punktów Żywotności, duchowe łącze kończy się automatycznie.

Wywyższenie (+1) Liczba Punktów Żywotności przesyłanych za każdym razem zwiększa się o 2.

Spirit Object.name: Spirit Object
Spirit Object.description:
Using a sliver of Baba Yaga's power, you briefly bring a nearby object to life. The object gains a means of locomotion if it does not already have one, such as sprouting chicken legs, and Strides up to 25 feet to a space you decide within range. Once per round, you can Sustain the spell to command the object further, either prompting it to move again or to Strike. If prompted to move, the object Strides up to 25 feet again to a space within 30 feet of you. If prompted to Strike, the object attacks one creature of your choice adjacent to its space. Make a melee spell attack roll against the creature. On a success, the creature takes 2k4 damage. The damage is either bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage, as appropriate for the object. The object doesn't do anything if it doesn't receive further commands from you. If you cast spirit object again, any previously affected object reverts back to normal. You can Dismiss the spell.

Wywyższenie (+1) Increase the maximum Bulk of the target by 1 and the damage by 2k4.

Spirit Sense.name: Spirit Sense
Spirit Sense.description:
You open your mind to the metaphysical, enabling you to sense nearby spirits. Even if you aren't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.TiNDYUGlMmxzxBYU]{Searching}, you get a check to find haunts and spirits in the area. You gain a +1 status bonus to the following checks regarding haunts or spirits: Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Szukanie}, attempts to Recall Knowledge, skill checks to determine the reason for their existence, and skill checks to disable a haunt. You also gain a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws against haunts and spirits.

Wywyższenie (6.) The spell's duration lasts until the next time you make your daily preparations.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.uHUcP59Z5fAdomda]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Spirit Sense}

Spirit Song.name: Spirit Song
Spirit Song.description:
Your eldritch song sends pulsing waves of ethereal energy to attack creatures' spirits in the area, dealing 14k6 spirit damage that causes their bodies to momentarily freeze up from the hypnotic nature of the tune, depending on the result of their Fortitude save. The vibrating waves of spirit song penetrate into, but not through, solid barriers, damaging incorporeal creatures hiding in solid objects in the area but not passing onward to damage creatures in other rooms.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature takes no damage.

Sukces The creature takes half damage and can't use reactions until the beginning of its turn.

Porażka The creature takes full damage, can't use reactions until the beginning of its turn, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1}.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature takes double damage, can't use reactions until the beginning of its turn, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 2}.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 2k6.

Spirit Veil.name: Spirit Veil
Spirit Veil.description:
You draw an occluding veil of spirits around yourself, blocking yourself especially well from undead eyes. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} to all creatures, and you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Schowany} from undead creatures regardless of what precise senses they have; this grants the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Niewidzialność}, but against all the undead creature's precise senses. If you physically @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} with an undead creature or use a hostile action, the spell ends.

Wywyższenie (+1) You can target one additional willing creature within 30 feet. The spell ends if any target physically Interacts with an undead creature or uses a hostile action.

Spirit of the Beast.name: Spirit of the Beast
Spirit of the Beast.description:
You bring out the spirit of another animal that lives within your companion. Its body morphs slightly to take on an aspect of the animal you choose to have it emulate — for example, it might grow a pair of horns if the spirit is a bull or a tail if the spirit is a monkey. When you Cast this Spell, select from one of the following aspects.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.l9kHsnm7dBQx52JI]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Spirit of the Beast}

  • Aspect of Might: Your companion gains a +1 status bonus to Athletics checks, Intimidation checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralizacja}, and Fortitude saves.
  • Aspect of Swiftness: Your companion gains a +1 status bonus to Acrobatics checks, Stealth checks to Hide or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Przekradanie Się}, and Reflex saves.
  • Aspect of Insight: Your companion gains a +1 status bonus to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Szukanie}, Survival checks to Sense Direction or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track}, and Will saves.

Wywyższenie (5.) The status bonuses increase to +2.

Wywyższenie (8.) The status bonuses increase to +3.

Spiritual Anamnesis.name: Spiritual Anamnesis
Spiritual Anamnesis.description:
Memories of a past life that seem incredibly real (and may even be) overwhelm the target's mind. This is especially disorienting for undead and creatures that have lived a previous life (such as celestials, fiends, monitors, and many other extraplanar creatures); if such creatures roll a critical success on their save, they get a success instead, and if they roll a failure, they get a critical failure instead.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} for 1 round.

Porażka The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} for 1 minute and babbles about the visions, possibly providing information about what they saw.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 3}.

Spiritual Armament.name: Duchowe Uzbrojenie
Spiritual Armament.description:
Tworzysz duchowe, magiczne echo jednej z dzierżonych przez siebie broni i ciskasz nim. Wykonaj rzut ataku czarem przeciw KP celu, zadając 2k8 obrażeń przy trafieniu (oraz podwójne obrażenia przy trafieniu krytycznym). Obrażenia ataku są zgodne z obrażeniami wybranej broni (lub dowolnymi z jej obrażeń, w wypadku broni wszechstronnych). Atak zadaje obrażenia duchowe jeśli byłoby to bardziej szkodliwe dla danej istoty (co określa MG). Ten atak wlicza się do twojej kary za atak wielokrotny oraz uwzględnia ją. Po wykonaniu ataku broń powraca do twojego boku. Jeśli namaścisz zaklęcie, ataki również są namaszczone. Za każdym razem kiedy Podtrzymasz zaklęcie, możesz powtórzyć atak obierając za cel dowolną istotę w zasięgu 120 stóp.

Wywyższenie (+2) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k8.

Spiritual Attunement.name: Spiritual Attunement
Spiritual Attunement.description:
You attune yourself to a spiritual plane of the Outer Sphere, connecting your spirit without fully transporting to it. Your Strikes and spells gain the alignment traits of the plane you chose, which deals additional damage to creatures with a weakness to either of those alignment traits. Furthermore, the plane protects you from energy of the alignments that oppose the plane. You gain resistance 5 to damage of the alignments that oppose those of your chosen plane. For example, if you chose Heaven, your Strikes would gain the good and lawful traits, and you would gain resistance to chaotic and evil. If you choose the Boneyard, the resistance is to vitality and void damage instead.

Wywyższenie (+2) The resistance increases by 5.

The nine main planes of the Outer Sphere are the homes of many deities, celestials, monitors, and fiends. Their names, along with their alignments, are: Heaven (LG), Nirvana (NG), Elysium (CG), Axis (LN), the Boneyard (N), the Maelstrom (CN), Hell (LE), Abaddon (NE), and the Abyss (CE).

Spiritual Epidemic.name: Spiritual Epidemic
Spiritual Epidemic.description:
You curse the target, sapping its spirit and leaving a contagious trap in its essence. The target must attempt a Will save. Any creature that casts a divine or occult spell on the target while it's affected is targeted by spiritual epidemic and must also attempt a Will save. The curse continues to spread in this way.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 2} for 1 round.

Porażka The target is enfeebled 2 and stupefied 2 for 1 minute and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 1} permanently.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 3} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 3} for 1 minute and enfeebled 2 and stupefied 2 permanently.

Spiritual Guardian.name: Spiritual Guardian
Spiritual Guardian.description:
A Medium guardian made of magical force appears in an unoccupied space in range. The spiritual guardian is translucent and wields a ghostly echo of one weapon you're wielding or wearing. If you have a deity, the guardian takes the form of one of your deity's attendants or servitors. If you sanctify the spell, the guardian's attacks are sanctified as well.

Creatures can move through the guardian's space but can't end their movement in it. You and your allies can flank with the guardian. The guardian doesn't have any other attributes a creature would normally have, aside from 50 Hit Points that it can't recover by any means and that it can lose only when protecting a creature (see below).

When you Cast the Spell and each time you Sustain it, you can have the guardian move to any unoccupied space within 120 feet of you and either attack or protect.

  • Attack The guardian makes a melee spell attack against an adjacent creature, dealing 3k8 damage on a hit (or double damage on a critical hit). The damage type is the same as the chosen weapon (or any of its types for a versatile weapon). The attack deals spirit damage instead if that would be more detrimental to the creature (as determined by the GM). This attack uses and contributes to your multiple attack penalty.
  • Protect The guardian protects a creature of your choice. Each time the chosen creature would take damage and the guardian is adjacent to it, the guardian takes the first 10 damage instead of the ally. This protection lasts until you command the guardian to attack or to protect a different creature, or the guardian is destroyed.

Wywyższenie (+2) The guardian's damage increases by 1k8, and its Hit Points increase by 20.

Spiritual Torrent.name: Spiritual Torrent
Spiritual Torrent.description:
You release your spiritual essence in a torrential blast of energy, dealing 10k6 damage. If you're a living creature, this spell deals vitality damage and gains the vitality trait. If you're an undead creature, this spell deals void damage and gains the void trait. The spell's effect is based on how many actions you spend when Casting the Spell.

2 (somatic, verbal) The spell targets all creatures in a 60-foot line.

3 (material, somatic, verbal) The spell targets all creatures in a 60-foot cone.

Wywyższenie (+1) The spell's damage increases by 2k6.

Spiritual Weapon.name: Spiritual Weapon
Spiritual Weapon.description:
A weapon made of pure magical force materializes and attacks foes you designate within range. This weapon has a ghostly appearance and manifests as a club, a dagger, or your deity's favored weapon.

When you cast the spell, the weapon appears next to a foe you choose within range and makes a Strike against it. Each time you Sustain the Spell, you can move the weapon to a new target within range (if needed) and Strike with it. The spiritual weapon uses and contributes to your multiple attack penalty.

The weapon's Strikes are melee spell attacks. Regardless of its appearance, the weapon deals 2k8 force damage. You can deal damage of the type normally dealt by the weapon instead of force damage (or any of the available damage types for a versatile weapon). No other statistics or traits of the weapon apply, and even a ranged weapon attacks adjacent creatures only.
