Despite making a spell attack, the spiritual weapon is a weapon for purposes of triggers, resistances, and so forth.

The weapon doesn't take up space, grant flanking, or have any other attributes a creature would. The weapon can't make any attack other than its Strike, and feats or spells that affect weapons do not apply to it.

Wywyższenie (+2) The weapon's damage increases by 1k8.

Splinter Volley.name: Splinter Volley
Splinter Volley.description:
You launch a volley of splinters at your foes. Make a spell attack roll against a single creature. On a hit, the splinters deal 4k6 piercing damage. The splinters deal double damage on a critical hit and @Damage[(floor(@item.level/2))[bleed]] damage. You can spend a third action while casting this spell to fire splinters at two different targets instead of one. These attacks each increase your multiple attack penalty, but you don't increase your multiple attack penalty until after you make both spell attack rolls for splinter volley.

Wywyższenie (+2) Increase the damage dealt to each target by 4k6 and the persistent bleed damage by 1.

Split Shadow.name: Split Shadow
Split Shadow.cost: a precious possession or drop of blood from the creature to be duplicated, plus an ornate silver mirror worth 7 000 gp
Split Shadow.description:
You create a shadow double of the target by drawing energy directly from the Shadow Plane into a mirror and shaping it into an exact, quasi-real duplicate. When the mirror is shattered at the end of the ritual, the double steps out and comes into existence. The duplicate is a creature 3 levels lower than the target, with the same abilities as the target but reduced to the appropriate level. The shadow double looks identical to the target and has the same general mannerisms and personality. However, it only has a vague sense of the target's memories. It has a Deception modifier to Impersonate the target equal to the modifier of the secondary spellcaster who rolled the Deception or Performance check, with a +4 status bonus.

Krytyczny Sukces You bring the shadow double to life. It is under your absolute control. You gain a direct mental link with the shadow double and can spend an action to command it via this link, even at a distance.

Sukces As a critical success, but there is no special link between you and the shadow double. You must spend an action to command it verbally or by some other means.

Porażka The ritual fails and has no effect.

Krytyczna Porażka When the mirror is broken at the end of the ritual, the double appears but has the statistics of an elite greater shadow with all the knowledge of the target and the same Deception modifier a shadow double would have had if the ritual had succeeded.
Split Shadow.primarycheck: Arcana or Occultism (master, the check has the secret trait)

Split the Tongue.name: Split the Tongue
Split the Tongue.description:
The deceiving creature's tongue splits like a serpent's tongue. The creature takes 1k8 slashing damage and must attempt a Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 1} for [[/r 1d4]]{1k4 rounds}.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the creature takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 2} for [[/r 1d4]]{1k4 rounds}.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k8.
Split the Tongue.target: A creature within 30 feet fails a Deception or Diplomacy check.

Spout.name: Chluśnięcie
Spout.description:
Woda wystrzeliwuje ku górze, wydobywając się spod ziemi, wznosząc się ze zbiornika wodnego czy nawet pojawiając znikąd. Wszystkie istoty w obszarze odnoszą 2k4 obrażeń obuchowych z podstawowym rzutem obronnym Refleksu. Istota, która odniesie na rzucie obronnym krytyczną porażkę staje się zdezorientowana eksplozją wody i @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszcza Gardę} do końca twojej następnej tury.

Możesz zmienić obszar tego zaklęcia na @Template[burst|distance:5]{wybuch 5 stóp} o ile wybierzesz jako centrum wybuchu zbiornik wodny. Może być to zbiornik wodny tak mały jak staw czy potok, ale nie aż tak mały jak kałuża czy bala z wodą.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k4.

Spray of Stars.name: Spray of Stars
Spray of Stars.description:
You fling a spray of tiny shooting stars, dealing 2k4 fire damage. Każda istota w obszarze musi wykonać rzut obronny Refleksu.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature takes half damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} for 1 round.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia and is dazzled for 3 rounds.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota odnosi podwójne obrażenia and is dazzled for 1 minute.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k4.

Spy's Mark.name: Spy's Mark
Spy's Mark.description:
By pressing your hand to a wall or other solid immobile surface, you cause the crossed-swords symbol of the Firebrands — or a different symbol of your choosing — to appear on the targeted surface. This symbol is immobile. You can use an action, which has the concentrate trait, to shut your eyes and focus on the symbol, projecting your senses into the symbol. While projecting your senses, you can see, hear, and smell through the symbol using whatever senses you have (including natural senses like scent and darkvision and magical senses like see invisibility). You must be within 100 feet to sense through the symbol in this way. You can Dismiss the projection effect but can otherwise freely project your senses into the symbol at any time during the spell's duration.

A creature can erase the symbol (and end the spell) by spending 3 Interact actions to scrub the symbol away. These actions do not need to be consecutive.

Wywyższenie (4.) Czas trwania zwiększa się do 8 hours. You can sense through the symbol at a distance up to 500 feet away. Scrubbing the symbol requires 6 Interact actions.

Wywyższenie (9.) The symbol remains until the next time you make your daily preparations. You can sense through the symbol at a distance up to 1 mile away. Scrubbing the symbol requires 1 total minute of work.
Spy's Mark.target: a wall or other solid, immobile surface

Stabilize.name: Stabilizacja
Stabilize.description: Energia życiowa zabiera cel znad progu śmierci. Cel traci status @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Umierający}, chociaż pozostaje on @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Nieprzytomny} oraz ma 0 Punktów Żywotności.

Stagnate Time.name: Stagnate Time
Stagnate Time.description:
You examine the time stream in a particular area, then proceed to stick a few metaphorical pins into it, thickening and slowing down the flow of time until it rumbles along like a river of molasses. Any creature that begins its turn in the area must attempt a Will save.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} this turn.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 2} this turn.

Stasis.name: Stasis
Stasis.description:
The flow of time congeals around an object or creature, holding it in place. The target must attempt a Will save (an unattended object automatically critically fails its save).

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected.

Sukces The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1} as time thickens around it.

Porażka Time ceases to pass for the target for 1 round. It is invulnerable to all damage, it can't be targeted or affected by anything, and no rounds elapse for any timed durations, conditions, afflictions, and other effects it has. While in stasis, the target can't be moved, and it remains fixed in place, defying gravity if need be.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the target is held in stasis for 3 rounds. At the end of each of its turns, it can attempt a Will save to reduce the remaining duration by 1 round or end it entirely on a critical success.
Stasis.target: 1 creature or up to 1 Bulk of objects

Statuette.name: Statuette
Statuette.description:
This ritual is a variant of the shrink item spell that allows for the transformation of significantly larger items. You transform the object into a tiny statuette of itself that is Light Bulk. The ritual does not shrink any creatures inside or on top of the item when it is transformed. The item remains in statuette form until the ritual's duration expires or until a creature places it on a stable surface and uses a 10-minute activity to Interact with the item to enlarge it. When restored to its normal size, the object simply pushes other creatures and objects aside or harmlessly contains them, as a magic item with the structure trait.

Your Arcana check determines how long the object remains in statuette form.

Krytyczny Sukces The object remains a statuette for 1 week.

Sukces The object remains a statuette for 1 day.

Porażka You fail to shrink the object.

Krytyczna Porażka You fail to shrink the object, and the highest-level item you carry of light Bulk or more shrinks to a tiny, unusable figurine of itself, weighing negligible bulk, for 1 week.
Statuette.target: 1 freestanding, non-magical object no larger than 3 000 cubic feet (the size of a Huge creature)

Status.name: Status
Status.description:
As long as you and the target are on the same plane of existence and both alive, you remain aware of its present state. You know the target's direction from you, distance from you, and any conditions affecting it.

Wywyższenie (4.) Zasięg zaklęcia zwiększa się do 30 feet, and you can target up to 10 creatures.

Steal Shadow.name: Skradnięcie Cienia
Steal Shadow.description:
You steal a creature's shadow, leaving it weakened and vulnerable. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Krzepy.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 1} for 1 round.

Porażka The target takes @Damage[3d4[void]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 1} for the spell's duration as you tear its shadow away, collecting it in your hand. On subsequent rounds, the first time each round you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.3f5DMFu8fPiqHpRg]{Sustain the Spell}, you can throttle the shadow to deal @Damage[3d4[void]] damage to the target (podstawowy rzut obronny Krzepy). Until the spell ends, the target doesn't cast a shadow.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 2}.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage when the spell is cast and when it is sustained increases by @Damage[1d4[void]].

Steal Voice.name: Steal Voice
Steal Voice.description:
You steal a creature's voice, rendering them mute. The effect is determined by the target's Fortitude save. The target then becomes temporarily immune for 1 minute. A creature that has no voice or can't speak is immune to this spell.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target becomes voiceless until the end of its next turn. A voiceless creature can't speak, create vocal sounds, or take auditory actions (including supplying verbal or command components). As long as the target is voiceless, whenever you speak, you can choose to have your voice sound like either your voice or the target's voice.

Porażka As success, but the duration is 1 minute.

Krytyczna Porażka As success, but the duration is permanent.

Steal the Sky.name: Steal the Sky
Steal the Sky.description:
Aktywator You make a successful unarmed Strike against a flying creature.

You deny a flying creature the support of the air.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The target descends 60 feet. If it hits a surface, it takes bludgeoning damage as if it had fallen.

Porażka As success; if the target hits a surface, it falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony} and can't Fly, levitate, or otherwise leave the ground for 1 minute.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, and the creature takes double damage from hitting a surface.

Wywyższenie (+1) Increase the distance the creature must descend by 20 feet.

Stifling Stillness.name: Stifling Stillness
Stifling Stillness.description:
You make all air in the target area unnaturally still and unyielding, creating a shimmering haze. The stagnant, heavy air becomes an area of difficult terrain. Creatures in the area that breathe air and aren't holding their breath must spend a single action on their turn straining to breathe the stagnant air; once they do, they still mostly breathe their own exhaled air, taking 3k6 poison damage (basic Fortitude save) and becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Wyczerpany}.

Wywyższenie (+2) The damage increases by 3k6.

Sting of the Sea.name: Sting of the Sea
Sting of the Sea.description:
A long tentacle like that belonging to an octopus, anemone, or man-of-war, dripping with briny water, appears from a glowing blue portal to wrap around the target's face, blocking its vision. For the duration of the spell, the target must attempt a Fortitude save at the beginning of its turn. The portal follows the target around, and the tentacle can't be targeted or harmed.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target takes a –2 penalty to Perception checks involving vision until the end of its turn. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.GA8SSGtpuyUunP4D]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Sting of the Sea}

Porażka The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} until the end of its turn.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiony} until the end of its turn.

Stinking Cloud.name: Stinking Cloud
Stinking Cloud.description:
You create a cloud of putrid mist in the area. The cloud functions as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{Mist} except it sickens creatures that end their turns within the cloud. (The @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} condition is not a poison effect.)

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1}.

Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} while in the cloud.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} until it leaves the cloud.

Stoke the Heart.name: Stoke the Heart
Stoke the Heart.description:
Your patron fills a creature with fervor, empowering their blows. The target gains a +2 status bonus to damage rolls.

Wywyższenie (+2) The status bonus to damage increases by 1.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.TpVkVALUBrBQjULn]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Stoke the Heart}

Stone Lance.name: Stone Lance
Stone Lance.description:
You conjure a jagged lance of stone and then launch it at a foe. Make a spell attack roll against the target. On a hit, you deal 6k6 piercing damage and the lance impales the creature, giving it a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds unless it Escapes. On a critical hit, if the creature is on the ground, the lance also embeds into the ground and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilizes} the creature until it Escapes. A creature that Escapes after being impaled takes @Damage[3[bleed]] damage. When the spell ends, the lance crumbles into dirt, freeing the target if it hasn't Escaped.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6 and the persistent bleed damage for Escapes by 1.

Stone to Flesh.name: Stone to Flesh
Stone to Flesh.description: Manipulating the fundamental particles of matter, you convert stone into flesh and blood. You restore a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{Spetryfikowany} creature to its normal state or transform a stone object into a mass of inert flesh (without stone's Hardness) in roughly the same shape.
Stone to Flesh.target: petrified creature or human-size stone object

Stonesense.name: Stonesense
Stonesense.description: You gain tremorsense as an imprecise sense to a range of 100 feet, but you can only sense vibrations through natural stone (not masonry, adobe, or any other manufactured edifice).

Store Time.name: Store Time
Store Time.description: You store time for later use. When you Cast this Spell and the first time you Sustain it each round, you gain a bonus reaction that you can use for any animist or apparition reaction you have. As normal, this reaction is lost if you do not use it before you regain your actions at the start of your next turn.

Storm Lord.name: Storm Lord
Storm Lord.description:
The sky above you darkens in a matter of moments, swirling with ominous clouds punctuated by flashes of lighting. When you Cast the Spell and the first time you Sustain it each turn on subsequent rounds, select one of the following effects to occur in the area.

  • Calm No additional effect.
  • Fog Heavy fog rolls in, concealing the area with the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{Mist}.
  • Rain Torrential rain falls from the sky, dousing ordinary flames. Creatures in the area take a –2 circumstance penalty to Acrobatics and Perception checks.
  • Wind Powerful winds buffet the area in all directions. Ranged attacks take a –4 circumstance penalty, and the area is difficult terrain for flying creatures.

In addition, once per round you can use a single action, which has the concentrate and manipulate traits, to call down a bolt of lightning, striking any target in range that you can see. You deal 10k6 electricity damage to the target; it must attempt a basic Reflex save. On a failure, it is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Ogłuchły} for 1 round.

Storm of Vengeance.name: Storm of Vengeance
Storm of Vengeance.description:
A massive storm cloud forms in the air in a 360-foot burst. Beneath it, rain begins to fall, and gales impose a –4 circumstance penalty to physical ranged attacks and weapon ranged attacks, and the air in the area becomes greater difficult terrain for flying creatures. When you Cast this Spell and the first time each round you Sustain the Spell, you can choose one of the following storm effects. You can't choose the same effect twice in a row.

  • Acid Rain Each creature in the storm takes 4k8 acid damage with no saving throw.
  • Hail The storm deals 4k10 bludgeoning damage to creatures beneath it (podstawowy rzut obronny Krzepy).
  • Lightning Up to 10 bolts of lightning strike down, targeting creatures of your choice in the storm. No more than one bolt can target any one creature. Each bolt deals 7k6 electricity damage (podstawowy rzut obronny Refleksu).
  • Rain and Wind Heavy rain and whipping wind reduce visibility and mobility, making the area under the storm cloud difficult terrain and making everything seen within or through the area @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty}.
  • Thunderclap Each creature in the storm must succeed at a Fortitude save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Ogłuchły} for 10 minutes. A creature that succeeds is temporarily immune to thunderclaps from storm of vengeance for 1 hour.

Wywyższenie (10.) The range increases to 2 200 feet, and the cloud is a 1 000-foot burst.

Stormburst.name: Stormburst
Stormburst.description:
Your voice projects like cracking thunder as you summon a localized storm, creating a fearsome surge of lightning and wind that deals 6k6 electricity damage. Each creature must attempt a Reflex saving throw.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia and is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota odnosi podwójne obrażenia, is knocked prone, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1}.

Wywyższenie (7.) Obrażenia zwiększają się do 8k6, and targets who critically fail are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 2}.

Wywyższenie (9.) Obrażenia zwiększają się do 10k6, and targets who critically fail are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 3}.

Stormwind Flight.name: Stormwind Flight
Stormwind Flight.description:
Powerful winds carry you smoothly through the air, giving you a fly Speed equal to your Speed. When this spell's duration would end, if you're still flying, you float to the ground, as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TTwOKGqmZeKSyNMH]{Gentle Landing}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.8GUkKvCeI0xljCOk]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Stormwind Flight}

Wywyższenie (6.) When you fly using stormwind flight, you ignore difficult terrain from wind.

Strange Geometry.name: Strange Geometry
Strange Geometry.description:
Area 4 cubes, each 10 feet on a side

You cause the areas to appear to swell, bend, and break, twisting together in a bizarre spatial geometry. The cubes of the spell's area can't be adjacent to one another. A creature must attempt a Will save if it's in one of the cubes when you Cast the Spell, or if it later enters one of the areas, with the following effects. A creature interacting with the illusion can also attempt a Will save to disbelieve the illusion, as normal.

Sukces The creature disbelieves the illusion.

Porażka All terrain in the cubes is difficult terrain for the creature, including the air if the creature is flying, walls if it's climbing, and so on. When the creature would exit one of the cubes, it exits from one randomly determined by the GM. This is a teleportation effect. It can exit from any edge of that cube it chooses. When selecting a random cube, the GM excludes any that don't match the creature's terrain; for instance, if the creature were exiting along the ground, the GM would exclude any cube that didn't have an exit on the ground.

Strength of Mind.name: Strength of Mind
Strength of Mind.description:
You bolster your ally with reminders of their physical prowess, granting them additional defenses against harmful mental effects. The target gains a +1 status bonus to saving throws against mental effects and against effects that hinder movement (including those that reduce Speed or apply the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Pochwycony}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Spętany} conditions). This bonus increases to +2 if the source of the effect has the fear trait.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.pW1jauNjZ1owaciQ]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Strength of Mind}

String of Fate.name: String of Fate
String of Fate.description: You bond yourself to a cherished friend, vowing to share their fate for good or for ill. Whenever an effect would require both you and the target to attempt a saving throw, if one of you succeeds at your saving throw and the other critically fails, you can choose to both fail instead. You and the ally must agree to fail; otherwise, use your normal save results instead.

Stumbling Curse.name: Stumbling Curse
Stumbling Curse.description:
With a twist of a finger, you send a creature careening on a haphazard trajectory. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Refleksu.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target takes a –2 status penalty to Athletics and Acrobatics checks.

Porażka As success, and each time the target Strides, it uses the first 5 feet of movement of the Stride to move 5 feet in a random direction (this is forced movement). This has no effect on a creature with only 5 feet of movement.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, except you control the direction of the target's first 5 feet of movement of the Stride.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.ViBlOrd6hno3DiPP]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Stumbling Curse}

Stupefy.name: Ogłupienie
Stupefy.description:
Otępiasz umysł istoty w oparciu o jej rzut obronny Woli.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Cel jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 1} do początku twojej następnej tury.

Porażka Cel jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 2} for 1 minutę.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 3} na 1 minutę.

Subconscious Suggestion.name: Subconscious Suggestion
Subconscious Suggestion.description:
You implant a subconscious suggestion deep within the target's mind for them to follow when a trigger you specify occurs. You suggest a course of action to the target. Your directive must be phrased in such a way as to seem like a logical course of action to the target, and it can't be self-destructive or obviously against the target's self-interest. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected and knows you tried to control it.

Sukces The target is unaffected and thinks you were talking to them normally, not casting a spell on them.

Porażka The suggestion remains in the target's subconscious until the next time you prepare. If the trigger occurs before then, the target immediately follows your suggestion. The effect has a duration of 1 minute, or until the target has completed a finite suggestion or the suggestion becomes self-destructive or has other obvious negative effects.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the duration is 1 hour.

Wywyższenie (9.) Możesz obrać za cel do 10 istot.

Subjugate Undead.name: Subjugate Undead
Subjugate Undead.description:
You attempt to seize control of the target. It can attempt a Will save to resist the effect. If the target is already being controlled by another creature, the controlling creature also rolls a saving throw and the undead uses the better result. Casting subjugate undead again ends any previous subjugate undead you cast.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected and is temporarily immune for 24 hours.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Porażka The undead creature becomes a minion under your control for 1 minute. The spell is dismissed if you or an ally takes a hostile action against the minion undead.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, except the duration is 10 minutes.
Subjugate Undead.target: one undead creature with a level of no more than your level –4

Sudden Blight.name: Sudden Blight
Sudden Blight.description:
You accelerate the processes of decay in the area. Each living creature in the area takes 2k10 void damage with a basic Fortitude save. A creature afflicted by a disease takes a –2 circumstance penalty to this save. You can also direct the blight to rot all Small and Tiny non-creature plants in the area, eliminating non-magical undergrowth and any resulting difficult terrain, cover, and concealment. Sudden blight attempts to counteract any magical effect on the plants before withering them.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k10.

Sudden Bolt.name: Sudden Bolt
Sudden Bolt.description:
You call down a small bolt of lightning on the target, dealing 4k12 electricity damage.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k12.

Sudden Recollection.name: Sudden Recollection
Sudden Recollection.description:
You place a bit of knowledge deep in a creature's subconscious or make a willing creature forget some information until a specific trigger occurs. The target gets a Will saving throw to resist the effect. A willing creature can choose to fail its save.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected and realizes you tried to alter its memory.

Sukces The target is unaffected but thinks your spell was something harmless instead of sudden recollection, unless it identifies the spell.

Porażka You choose a piece of information the target didn't already know and create a trigger, such as seeing an object, hearing a key phrase, or witnessing an event. As soon as the target experiences the trigger, it receives the information and the spell ends. If the target was willing, you can instead choose a piece of information the target already knew and suppress its memory of that information until it experiences the trigger, after which it recovers the information and the spell ends.

Sudden Shift.name: Sudden Shift
Sudden Shift.description:
Aktywator An enemy misses you with a melee attack.

You swiftly move from a dangerous spot and veil yourself. You Step and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty}.

Suffocate.name: Suffocate
Suffocate.description:
You forcefully and cruelly draw the living breath from a creature's lungs, dealing 4k8 bludgeoning damage. Istota musi wykonać rzut obronny Krzepy.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia. For the duration, the creature must hold its breath or suffocate.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota odnosi podwójne obrażenia, and all the air is pulled from the creature's lungs. The creature falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Nieprzytomny} and starts suffocating for the duration.

Wywyższenie (9.) You can target up to 5 creatures.
Suffocate.target: 1 living creature that needs to breathe

Suggestion.name: Sugestia
Suggestion.description:
Istotom trudno oprzeć się twoim słodkim słowom. Sugerujesz celowi kierunek działania, który musi być sformułowany tak, aby wydawał się logiczny dla celu i który nie może być autodestruktywny ani w oczywisty sposób sprzeczny z jego własnym interesem. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel, który ponadto wie, że próbowałeś go kontrolować.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Porażka Cel natychmiast podąża za twoją sugestią. Zaklęcie ma czas trwania 1 minuty lub do momentu, gdy cel zakończy wykonywanie skończonej sugestii, albo sugestia stanie się autodestruktywna lub zacznie mieć inne w oczywisty sposób negatywne skutki.

Krytyczna Porażka Jak przy porażce, ale podstawowy czas trwania wynosi 1 godzinę.

Wywyższenie (8.) Możesz obrać za cel do 10 istot.

Summerland Spell.name: Summerland Spell
Summerland Spell.cost: 1 000 gp worth of precious stones ground to dust
Summerland Spell.description:
The Summerland Spell is an extension of a unique ritual developed by Brogan the Grasswalker. The ritual dramatically dampens harsh weather around Hillcross, causing the temperature of the area to move up to two categories closer to normal. As a result, autumns and winters are far less brutal around Hillcross, while spring and summer months are practically mild and pleasant.

The ritual as presented is lower rank, easier to cast, and much less dangerous to the casters than the original version cast by Brogan the Grasswalker because it simply extends the original ritual's effects over Hillcross. A character who wishes to duplicate the effects somewhere else would need to develop a unique 10. kręgu ritual with a 5. kręgu ritual to extend the duration, as Brogan did, and then find someone willing to cast the deadlier initial ritual.

Krytyczny Sukces The ritual takes effect normally, continuing the duration for 1 more year.

Sukces The ritual takes effect normally, continuing the duration for 1 more year, but the primary caster is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 1}. If the primary caster was already drained, increase the value of the drained condition by 1. This drained condition is a curse effect and is permanent until counteracted with remove curse or similar magic.

Porażka The ritual fails.

Krytyczna Porażka The ritual fails. The primary caster is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 2}, and the secondary casters are drained 1 (increasing the value of any drained condition they already have). This drained condition is a curse effect and is permanent until counteracted with remove curse or similar magic.
Summerland Spell.secondarycheck: Performance, Religion, Society, Mammoth Lord Lore or a similar Lore skill, Survival

Summon Anarch.name: Przywołanie Anarch
Summon Anarch.description:
You conjure a chaotic celestial, monitor, or fiend to fight on your behalf. You summon a common chaotic creature that has the celestial, monitor, or fiend trait and whose level is 5 or lower. You can't summon a creature unless its alignment is one of your deity's preferred alignments (or, if you don't have a deity, is within one step of your alignment). At the GM's discretion, some deities might restrict specific types of creatures, even if their alignments match. Heightening the spell increases the maximum level of creature you can summon.

Wywyższenie (6.) Level 7.

Wywyższenie (7.) Level 9.

Wywyższenie (8.) Level 11.

Wywyższenie (9.) Level 13.

Wywyższenie (10.) Level 15.

Summon Ancient Fleshforged.name: Przywołanie Ancient Fleshforged
Summon Ancient Fleshforged.description:
You summon an ancient Fleshforged, one of Nex's personal weaponized monstrosities unleashed in the first wars against Geb. It squeezes itself into its war form from time long forgotten, unleashing its wrath upon your foes. The Fleshforged occupies the space noted in the spell description. When you Cast this Spell, choose one of the Fleshforged below to summon.

  • Bone Breaker Size Gargantuan, Speed 40 feet, climb 100 feet

    Arrive Skull Breaking Hum (evocation, sonic) The Bone Breaker appears in a shower of bone fragments. Its form is that of an immense titan of flesh and metal with long, muscular, twisted arms. The Bone Breaker releases a hum at a harmonic frequency that weakens bones in creatures' bodies. Each foe within an 80-foot emanation must attempt a Fortitude save. On a critical success, they're unaffected; on a success, they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 2} for 1 round; on a failure they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 3} for 1 minute; and on a critical failure, they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 4} for 10 minutes. A skeleton or other undead foe made almost entirely of bones treats their result as one degree of success worse than they rolled.

    Depart Bruising Departure The Bone Breaker pounds its long arms into the ground, creating a long shockwave. Each foe within a @Template[line|distance:100|width:10]{100-foot-long, 10-foot-wide line} takes @Damage[8d12[bludgeoning]] damage, with a basic Fortitude save.

  • Thorn Caller Size Gargantuan, Speed 100 feet

    Arrive (evocation, light) Thorn's Guidance The Thorn Caller appears in a burst of light. The Thorn Caller's body is an ornate armored sphere with black panther masks surrounding a glowing light. The ball floats in the air due to six glowing, thornlike wings. Two clusters of bird heads emerge from both sides of the body with long necks that twirl together like tentacles. The Thorn Caller's burst of light illuminates all foes within 200 feet. The foes become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} and off-guard, and if they were @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialny}, they become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} instead. These effects last until the Thorn Caller departs.

    Depart Thorn-Burst The Thorn Caller launches its thorned wings at various targets. Attempt spell attack rolls against up to 6 different targets within 300 feet. On a hit, the target takes @Damage[10d8[piercing]] damage, double on a critical hit, half on a failure, and none on a critical failure.

  • The Thousand Size Medium (see below), Speed 30 feet

    Arrive (emotion, enchantment, fear, mental) Disconcerting Arrival Select five spaces in range and summon a Medium-sized polyp of The Thousand in each of these spaces. The Thousand is an entity whose full scope is 1,000 polyps of oozing flesh, each physically separate but mentally part of a single creature. Not all 1,000 polyps have survived, and the spell summons five of them. Each creature within 10 feet of any of the polyps must attempt a Will Save. On a critical success, they're unaffected; on a success, they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1}; on a failure, they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 3}; and on a critical failure, they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 4} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Uciekający} for 1 round

    Depart (illusion, mental) Violent Omen Each frightened foe within a 60-foot emanation of any of the five polyps takes @Damage[10d8[mental]] damage, with a basic Will save.

  • Scion of Desiccation Size Gargantuan, Speed 100 feet, fly 100 feet

    Arrive (necromancy, negative) Ashes to Ashes The Scion of Desiccation appears in a swirl of screaming wind, a gargantuan form of twisted flesh that's constantly flensed by gritty ash and dust, and just as constantly regenerating itself. Each foe within a 40-foot emanation takes 10k10 void energy damage, with a basic Fortitude save

    Depart (necromancy, negative) Dust to Dust Each foe within a 60-foot emanation must attempt a Fortitude save; they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 2} on a failure or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 4} on a critical failure.

Summon Animal.name: Przywołanie Zwierzęcia
Summon Animal.description:
Przywołujesz istotę, która ma cechę zwierzę i poziom –1, aby walczyła u twego boku.

Wywyższenie Jak opisano w cesze @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.S55aqwWIzpQRFhcq.JournalEntryPage.8gcp880pEWZ9VPnF]{przywołanie}.

Summon Archmage.name: Przywołanie Archmage
Summon Archmage.description:
You briefly call forth the spirit of a legendary wizard from ages long past, which manifests as an immense humanoid figure (typically an elf or a human). The archmage occupies the space of a Large creature and has a Speed of 60 feet.

Arrive (evocation, force) Archmage's Amplification The archmage arrives in a fierce burst of magical force, automatically dealing 3k4+3 force damage to up to 5 creatures it chooses within 100 feet of it. Like @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]{Grad Magii}, this can be blocked by the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{Tarcza} spell. The archmage also feeds magical power into some spells. Beneficial spells last longer due to the archmage's influence. When the remaining duration of a beneficial spell affecting you or one of your allies would decrease (usually at the start of the caster's turn), it doesn't decrease if the subject of the spell is within 100 feet of the archmage. This applies only if the spell's maximum duration was 3 rounds or longer.

Depart (abjuration) Archmage's Rebuke The archmage drains the magic from your foes. Each of your enemies within 100 feet of the archmage must attempt a Will save. On a failure, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 2} for 1 round, and if it's currently benefiting from any spells of a lower level than summon archmage, the archmage can choose any one of them and end the spell.

Summon Axiom.name: Przywołanie Axiom
Summon Axiom.description:
You conjure a lawful celestial, monitor, or fiend to fight on your behalf. You summon a common lawful creature that has the celestial, monitor, or fiend trait and whose level is 5 or lower. You can't summon a creature unless its alignment is one of your deity's preferred alignments (or, if you don't have a deity, is within one step of your alignment). At the GM's discretion, some deities might restrict specific types of creatures, even if their alignments match. Heightening the spell increases the maximum level of creature you can summon.

Wywyższenie (6.) Level 7.

Wywyższenie (7.) Level 9.

Wywyższenie (8.) Level 11.

Wywyższenie (9.) Level 13.

Wywyższenie (10.) Level 15.

Summon Celestial.name: Przywołanie Celestial
Summon Celestial.description:
Przywołujesz istotę, która ma cechę celestial i poziom nie większy od 5, aby walczyła u twego boku. The GM might determine your deity restricts the specific types of celestials you can summon in certain cases. For instance, Calistria doesn't typically allow her followers to summon aeons.

Wywyższenie Jak opisano w cesze @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.S55aqwWIzpQRFhcq.JournalEntryPage.8gcp880pEWZ9VPnF]{przywołanie}.

Summon Construct.name: Przywołanie Konstruktu
Summon Construct.description:
Przywołujesz istotę, która ma cechę konstrukt i poziom –1, aby walczyła u twego boku.

Wywyższenie Jak opisano w cesze @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.S55aqwWIzpQRFhcq.JournalEntryPage.8gcp880pEWZ9VPnF]{przywołanie}.

Summon Deific Herald.name: Przywołanie Deific Herald
Summon Deific Herald.description:
Your faith is strong enough to briefly summon a direct representative of your deity, such as the deity's herald. The herald occupies the space of a Huge creature and has a Speed of 60 feet. The effects of this spell depend on your deity's alignment.

  • Lawful Good Arrive (enchantment, good, lawful) Aura of Retribution While within 100 feet of the herald, you and your allies gain the champion's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EAP98XaChJEbgKcK]{Retributive Strike} reaction; Depart Holy Smite The herald casts 5. kręgu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.hVU9msO9yGkxKZ3J]{Divine Wrath} (choosing good) in a 100-foot emanation.
  • Neutral Good Arrive (enchantment, good) Aura of Redemption While within 100 feet of the herald, you and your allies gain the champion's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.tuZnRWHixLArvaIf]{Glimpse of Redemption} reaction; Depart Merciful Healing The herald casts the 3-action version of 5. kręgu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Leczenie} with a radius of 100 feet. This spell targets only you and your allies.
  • Chaotic Good Arrive (chaotic, enchantment, good) Aura of Liberation While within 100 feet of the herald, you and your allies gain the champion's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.IX1VlVCL5sFTptEE]{Liberating Step} reaction; Depart Radiating Freedom The herald affects you and all your allies within 100 feet with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{Unfettered Movement}. The duration is reduced to 3 rounds.
  • Lawful Neutral Arrive (abjuration, lawful) Defy Chaos You and each ally within 100 feet of the herald gain resistance 20 against spirit damage while the herald is present; Depart Order's Wrath The herald casts 5. kręgu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.hVU9msO9yGkxKZ3J]{Divine Wrath} (choosing lawful) in a 100-foot emanation
  • Neutral Arrive (transmutation) Quickening Ripple You and each ally within 100 feet of the herald are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Przyspieszony} while the herald is present, and can use the additional action to Step, Stride, or Strike; Depart Sapping Beam The herald casts 6. kręgu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.eexkxcqnkXazsGfK]{Enervation} in a 100-foot line.
  • Chaotic Neutral Arrive (abjuration, chaotic) Defy Law You and each ally within 100 feet of the herald gain resistance 20 against spirit damage while the herald is present; Depart Chaos Hammer The herald casts 5. kręgu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.hVU9msO9yGkxKZ3J]{Divine Wrath} (choosing chaotic) in a 100-foot emanation.
  • Lawful Evil Arrive Aura of Iron While within 100 feet of the herald, you and your allies gain the champion's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.M8RCbthRhB4bxO9t]{Iron Command} reaction; Depart Unholy Blight The herald casts 5. kręgu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.hVU9msO9yGkxKZ3J]{Divine Wrath} (choosing evil) in a 100-foot emanation.
  • Neutral Evil Arrive Aura of Selfishness While within 100 feet of the herald, you and your allies gain the champion's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.enQieRrITuEQZxx2]{Selfish Shield} reaction; Depart Infinite Despair The herald casts 5. kręgu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.GaRQlC9Yw1BGKHfN]{Fala Rozpaczy} in a 100-foot cone.
  • Chaotic Evil Arrive Aura of Vengeance While within 100 feet of the herald, you and your allies gain the champion's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.r5Uth6yvCoE4tr9z]{Destructive Vengeance} reaction; Depart Weapon Hurricane The herald casts 5. kręgu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8M03UxGXjYyDFAoy]{Weapon Storm} in a 100-foot cone, using k12 for the die size.

Summon Draconic Legion.name: Przywołanie Draconic Legion
Summon Draconic Legion.description:
You momentarily summon an army of powerful dragons that unleash annihilating blasts as they descend upon your location. These dragons act as one and collectively occupy the space of a Gargantuan creature. They have a fly Speed of 100 feet. When you Cast this Spell, choose whether it summons chromatic or metallic dragons.

Arrive (evocation) Energy Annihilation The draconic legion breathes out two blasts of energy: a @Template[line|distance:120] and a @Template[cone|distance:60] that can't overlap. Each creature in either of the areas takes 10k8 damage (basic Reflex save). The dragons choose the damage type of each breath weapon, depending on the category of dragons summoned. Chromatic dragons can choose cold, fire, or poison for the cone and acid or electricity for the line; metallic dragons can choose cold or fire for the cone and acid, electricity, or fire for the line.

Depart Draconic Whirlwind The draconic legion strikes with fury, dealing @Damage[9d8[slashing]] damage (basic Reflex save) to all enemy creatures in its location or within 20 feet.

Summon Dragon.name: Przywołanie Dragon
Summon Dragon.description:
Przywołujesz istotę, która ma cechę dragon i poziom nie większy od 5, aby walczyła u twego boku. If the dragon has a magical tradition trait (arcane, divine, occult, or primal), you can summon it only if you're using that tradition to cast summon dragon.

Wywyższenie Jak opisano w cesze @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.S55aqwWIzpQRFhcq.JournalEntryPage.8gcp880pEWZ9VPnF]{przywołanie}.

Summon Elemental.name: Przywołanie Elemental
Summon Elemental.description:
Przywołujesz istotę, która ma cechę elemental i poziom nie większy od 1, aby walczyła u twego boku.

Wywyższenie Jak opisano w cesze @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.S55aqwWIzpQRFhcq.JournalEntryPage.8gcp880pEWZ9VPnF]{przywołanie}.

Summon Elemental Herald.name: Przywołanie Elemental Herald
Summon Elemental Herald.description:
Your meditation into the different elemental planes connects you to them deeply, and this connection allows you to summon a herald of an elemental lord. The herald arrives in the form of a natural disaster centralized on your enemies. The herald occupies the space of a Huge creature. When you Cast this Spell, choose one of the elemental heralds below to summon; if you're a divine spellcaster who worships an elemental lord, you must choose the option matching your deity's element. This spell gains the trait (air, earth, fire, metal, water, or wood) matching your choice.

  • Air Speed fly 60 feet; Arrive(air) Supercell Front The herald of air arrives in the form of a twisting tornado, with high-speed winds slamming into your enemies. Each enemy in a @Template[emanation|distance:100] takes @Damage[10d8[bludgeoning]] damage with a basic Fortitude save; Depart (air) Twister Downdraft Each enemy in a @Template[line|distance:60] must attempt a Fortitude save. A creature that fails is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony} if it's on the ground or descends 40 feet if it's in the air. A creature that descends takes falling damage if this forced movement brings it to the ground.
  • Earth Speed 50 feet, burrow 30 feet; Arrive(earth) Tectonic Rise The herald of earth erupts from the ground, splitting it open in a @Template[emanation|distance:50]. Each enemy in the emanation takes @Damage[10d6[slashing]] damage from the flying debris with a basic Reflex save. Enemies who critically fail fall 30 feet into the crevasse, taking falling damage (the sides of the fissure require successful @Check[athletics|dc:15] checks to Climb); Depart (sonic) Plate Crash The herald of earth sinks back into the ground, and the sides of the crevasse slam together with a deafening blow, dealing @Damage[5d10[sonic]] damage with a basic Fortitude save to all enemies in a @Template[emanation|distance:30]. An enemy that critically fails is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Ogłuchły} for 10 minutes.
  • Fire Speed 60 feet, fly 40 feet; Arrive(fire) Magma Flow The herald of fire flows into the area as living magma, dealing @Damage[10d6[fire]] damage and @Damage[3d6[persistent,fire]] damage to all enemies in a @Template[emanation|distance:60] with a basic Reflex save; Depart(fire) Flame Vortex Each enemy in a 60-foot line takes @Damage[6d6[fire]] damage and @Damage[3d6[persistent,fire]] damage with a basic Reflex save as the fire herald whips into a fire pillar before vanishing.
  • Metal Speed 50 feet, fly 50 feet; Arrive(metal) Shard Cloud The herald of metal arrives as a cloud of metal shards and static electricity, dealing @Damage[4d8[slashing]] damage and @Damage[4d12[electricity]] damage to all enemies in a @Template[emanation|distance:50] with a basic Reflex save; Depart(metal) Rust Mist The shards in the cloud rapidly rust and cling to enemies in the @Template[emanation|distance:50], dealing 10k6 damage to metal creatures and objects in the area with a basic Reflex save, ignoring Hardness. Unattended objects automatically critically fail this save.
  • Water Speed 40 feet, swim 60 feet; Arrive(cold, water) Hurricane Formation The herald of water forms as a miniature hurricane. Each enemy in a @Template[emanation|distance:60] takes @Damage[4d10[bludgeoning]] damage from the slamming rains and @Damage[4d10[cold]] damage from the falling hail with a basic Fortitude save; Depart(cold, water) Cataclysmic Deluge The hurricane collapses into a rushing flood, dealing @Damage[6d8[bludgeoning]] damage to all enemies in a @Template[cone|distance:120] with a basic Fortitude save. A creature that fails its save is pushed 20 feet away from the herald (or 40 feet on a critical failure).
  • Wood Speed 50 feet, burrow 30 feet; Arrive(plant, wood) Advantageous Roots The herald of wood bursts forth from the ground as a complex root system. Each enemy in a @Template[emanation|distance:50] takes @Damage[6d10[piercing]] damage with a basic Reflex save as the roots skewer its limbs and body. Each enemy that fails its save takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speeds until the herald departs; Depart(plant, wood) Retreat to Soil The roots retreat into the ground, dealing @Damage[6d10[piercing]] damage to each enemy in a @Template[emanation|distance:50] with a basic Reflex save. Any creature with a penalty to Speeds from its initial save automatically takes @Damage[2d6[persistent,bleed]] damage. The ground in the emanation is difficult terrain after the roots retreat.

Summon Entity.name: Przywołanie Entity
Summon Entity.description:
Przywołujesz istotę, która ma cechę aberration i poziom nie większy od 5, aby walczyła u twego boku.

Wywyższenie Jak opisano w cesze @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.S55aqwWIzpQRFhcq.JournalEntryPage.8gcp880pEWZ9VPnF]{przywołanie}.

Summon Fey.name: Przywołanie Feya
Summon Fey.description:
Przywołujesz istotę, która ma cechę fey i poziom –1, aby walczyła u twego boku.

Wywyższenie Jak opisano w cesze @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.S55aqwWIzpQRFhcq.JournalEntryPage.8gcp880pEWZ9VPnF]{przywołanie}.

Summon Fiend.name: Przywołanie Fiend
Summon Fiend.description:
Przywołujesz istotę, która ma cechę fiend i poziom nie większy od 5, aby walczyła u twego boku. The GM might determine your deity restricts the specific types of fiends you can summon in certain cases. For instance, archdevils typically allow their followers to summon devils, but not other fiends.

Wywyższenie Jak opisano w cesze @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.S55aqwWIzpQRFhcq.JournalEntryPage.8gcp880pEWZ9VPnF]{przywołanie}.

Summon Giant.name: Przywołanie Giant
Summon Giant.description:
Przywołujesz istotę, która ma cechę giant i poziom nie większy od 5, aby walczyła u twego boku.

Wywyższenie Jak opisano w cesze @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.S55aqwWIzpQRFhcq.JournalEntryPage.8gcp880pEWZ9VPnF]{przywołanie}.

Summon Healing Servitor.name: Przywołanie Healing Servitor
Summon Healing Servitor.description:
You call forth a servitor forged from raw vitality energy to heal and bolster your allies. The servitor occupies the space of a Huge creature and has a speed of 60 feet.

Arrive (healing, necromancy, vitality) Servitor's Protection The servitor appears in a flash of light, moving from ally to ally and granting them a temporary reprieve. All allies within 20 feet of the Servitor gain 20 temporary Hit Points until the servitor departs.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.T3NbslG6huktyNRm]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Summon Healing Servitor}

Depart (healing, necromancy, vitality) Servitor's Blessing The servitor disappears in a @Template[emanation|distance:30] of vitality energy. All willing living creatures within heal 3k8 Hit Points. All undead within take that much damage, with a basic Fortitude save.

Wywyższenie (+2) The Arrive effect's temporary Hit Points increase by 8, and the Depart effect's healing and damage to undead increase by 1k8.

Summon Instrument.name: Przyzwanie Instrumentu
Summon Instrument.description:
Materializujesz w swoich dłoniach @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.MPv5Yx4w7scZGj2Y]{Instrumeny Muzyczny (Podręczny)}. Instrument jest typowym przedstawicielem swojego gatunku, ale gra tylko i wyłącznie dla ciebie. Znika on po zakończeniu trwania zaklęcia. Jeśli rzucisz przyzwanie instrumentu ponownie, instrument, który poprzednio przywowałeś, znika.

Wywyższenie (5.) Instrument jest zamiast tego @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.3ld14dsn2RLu9owg]{Instrumentem Muzycznym (Podręcznym Wirtuoza)}.

Summon Irii.name: Przywołanie Irii
Summon Irii.description:
You cast your spell, whisper your words of power, and find that an irii is already here-indeed, they have always been here, and always were, and always will be. The temporal being occupies the space of a Medium creature and has a Speed of 60 feet and a fly Speed of 60 feet. When you Cast this Spell, choose whether it summons a fate irii or a fortune irii.

  • Fate The fate stands before you with its stained-glass wings and animal-headed gaze, floating eyes circling about it
    Arrive (divination, fortune, lawful, prediction)
    Decree the Immutability of Time While within 30 feet of the fate, you and your allies who roll below 10 on a k20 for an attack roll, Perception check, saving throw, or skill check get a 10 instead
    Depart (divination, misfortune, prediction)
    Observe the Inevitability of Destiny Each enemy within a @Template[emanation|distance:30] must attempt a Will save. If a creature fails its save, until the end of its next turn, any time it rolls above 10 on a k20 for an attack roll, Perception check, saving throw, or skill check, it gets a 10 instead.
  • Fortune The fortune stands before you with its golden horns and moth-scale wings, a sly smirk on its elfin face
    Arrive (chaotic, divination, fortune, prediction) Decree the Chaos of Infinity While within 30 feet of the fortune, you and your allies roll twice and take the higher roll on all damage rolls, Perception checks, and saving throws
    Depart (divination, misfortune, prediction) Sunder Eternity's Authority Each enemy within a @Template[emanation|distance:30] must attempt a Will save. A creature that fails its save must roll twice and take the lower result on all damage rolls, Perception checks, and saving throws until the end of its next turn.

Summon Kaiju.name: Przywołanie Kaiju
Summon Kaiju.description:
You briefly conjure a kaiju, a massive, rampaging monster with a unique name and legendary reputation. It rises from its secluded lair to annihilate your foes. The summoned kaiju occupies the space of a Gargantuan creature. When you Cast this Spell, choose one of the kaiju below to summon.

  • Agmazar the Star Titan Speed 100 feet, climb 50 feet; Arrive (necromancy, negative) Channel Void Each foe in a 100-foot emanation takes @Damage[16d8[void]] damage with a basic Fortitude save; Depart (transmutation) Gravitic Repulsion Each foe in a 50-foot emanation is pushed 100 feet away unless it succeeds at a Fortitude save.
  • Agyra, the Forever Storm Speed 80 feet, fly 200 feet; Arrive (electricity, evocation) Breath of a Thousand Storms Agyra shoots two 1,200-foot lines of electricity, one from each of her heads. The lines can't overlap. Each creature along one of the lines takes @Damage[6d12[electricity]] damage with a basic Reflex save. On a failure, the creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} for 1 round (or for 1 minute on a critical failure); Depart (evocation, sonic) Thunderous Blast Each creature within a 100-foot emanation takes @Damage[6d10[sonic]] damage with a basic Reflex save, and is also knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony} on a failed save.
  • Bezravnis, the Inferno Below Speed 100 feet, burrow 100 feet; Arrive (earth, evocation) Burrow from the Earth's Heart Bezravnis explodes from the ground where it was summoned, causing all creatures in a 50-foot emanation to take @Damage[8d12[bludgeoning]] damage with a basic Reflex save. This potentially collapses structures with the collapse effect of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.x7SPrsRxGb2Vy2nu]{Trzęsienie Ziemi} spell, except there is no chance of falling into a fissure; Depart Web Hurricane Bezravnis departs with a hurricane of webbing. All creatures within a 50-foot emanation must succeed at a Reflex save or take a –20-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until it Escapes (or is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony} until it escapes on a critical failure). The Escape DC is your spell DC.
  • Mogaru, the Final King Speed 100 feet, swim 100 feet; Arrive (auditory, enchantment, mental) Trance of the King's Melody Mogaru manifests with a burst of the song that summoned him, requiring all foes within 60 feet who can hear him to attempt a Will save, leaving them @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 3} on a failure; Depart (evocation, fire) Volcanic Breath Mogaru unleashes his scorching breath in a 120-foot cone. Each creature in the area takes @Damage[10d6[fire]] damage with a basic Reflex save. On a failure, it also takes @Damage[4d6[persistent,fire]] damage.
  • Vorgozen, the Shapeless Feeder Speed 50 feet, climb 50 feet, swim 100 feet; Arrive (necromancy) Pollute Magic Vorgozen's foul presence pollutes magic around her. Each of your enemies within a 60-foot emanation that are under the effects of a spell must attempt a Fortitude save. On a failure, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 2}. Any of your enemies that Casts a Spell within 60 feet of Vorgozen must attempt a Fortitude save with the same effects unless it's already sickened; Depart (acid, evocation) Beam of Purest Vitriol Each creature in a 1,200-foot line takes @Damage[10d6[acid]] damage and @Damage[10d6[bludgeoning]] damage with a basic Fortitude save.
  • Yarthoon, the Moon Grub Speed 60 feet, burrow 100 feet, fly 100 feet, swim 100 feet; Arrive (cold, evocation) Algid Beam Barrage Yarthoon fires countless beams, targeting each of your enemies within 200 feet of it. The beams deal @Damage[10d6[cold]] damage with a basic Reflex save; Depart (cold, conjuration, water) Frostbite Mist Chilling mist surges out in a 100-foot burst centered on Yarthoon and remains for 1 minute. This mist has the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{Mist}, plus any creature within the area at the end of its turn take @Damage[5d6[cold]] damage with a basic Fortitude save.
  • Ebeshra, the Winged Razor Speed 75 feet, fly 100 feet; Arrive (conjuration, teleportation) Planar Draw Each foe in a @Template[emanation|distance:100] is pulled 50 feet towards the center, unless it succeeds at a Fortitude save. Creatures that fail and reach the center take @Damage[10d6[bludgeoning]] damage; Depart (electricity, evocation) Storm Discharge Each foe in a @Template[line|distance:240] takes @Damage[12d8[electricity]] damage with a basic Reflex save.

Summon Lesser Servitor.name: Przywołanie Lesser Servitor
Summon Lesser Servitor.description:
While deities jealously guard their most powerful servants from the summoning spells of those who aren't steeped in the faith, this spell allows you to conjure an inhabitant of the Outer Sphere with or without the deity's permission. You summon a common celestial, fiend, or monitor of level –1. You can choose to instead summon a common animal of level –1 that hails from the Outer Sphere; you can choose for this animal to gain the celestial and holy traits, the fiend and unholy traits, or the monitor trait. It's anathema to summon a servitor if it has a holy or unholy trait that isn't allowed for your deity's sanctification. For example, Sarenrae's sanctification is "can choose holy," so you couldn't summon an unholy creature, and Pharasma's is "none," so you couldn't summon a holy or unholy creature. The GM might determine that your deity restricts specific types of creatures further, making it anathema to summon them as well.

Wywyższenie (2nd) The creature can be level 1 or lower.

Wywyższenie (3rd) The creature can be level 2 or lower.

Wywyższenie (4th) The creature can be level 3 or lower.

Summon Monitor.name: Przywołanie Monitor
Summon Monitor.description:
Przywołujesz istotę, która ma cechę monitor i poziom nie większy od 5, aby walczyła u twego boku. The GM might determine your deity restricts the specific types of monitors you can summon in certain cases. For instance, Urgathoa typically doesn't allow her followers to summon psychopomps.

Wywyższenie Jak opisano w cesze @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.S55aqwWIzpQRFhcq.JournalEntryPage.8gcp880pEWZ9VPnF]{przywołanie}.

Summon Oliphaunt of Jandelay.name: Summon Oliphaunt of Jandelay
Summon Oliphaunt of Jandelay.description:
You briefly summon the mythical Oliphaunt of Jandelay, unleashing a manifestation of pure destruction that obliterates everything unfortunate enough to stand in its path. The summoned Oliphaunt occupies the space of a Gargantuan creature. It has a Speed of 200 feet.

Arrive (force) Devastating Displacement Using hidden magics and long-lost techniques, you conjure an immense gate to Jandelay, compelling the Oliphaunt to step through. The Oliphaunt arrives in a @Template[type:burst|distance:60]. Each creature in the area takes @Damage[8d10[force]] damage (basic Reflex save). On a failure, the creature is also pushed 60 feet away from the Oliphaunt.

Depart Annihilating Trample The Oliphaunt becomes aware that it has been summoned to a world that isn't on the verge of annihilation. It summons another enormous gate to Jandelay 200 feet in front of it. The Oliphaunt then rages forward through the gate, crushing everything in its path, before closing the gate behind it and disappearing. The Oliphaunt creates an @Template[line|distance:200|width:80]{80-foot-wide path of devastation} that extends 200 feet. Each creature and vehicle in the area takes @Damage[8d8[bludgeoning]] damage (basic Fortitude save). A creature or vehicle reduced to 0 Hit Points is smashed into fine powder; its gear, passengers, and cargo remain. An unattended object in the area is destroyed unless it succeeds at a Fortitude save, regardless of Hardness, or unless it's an artifact or similarly hard to destroy. This trample automatically destroys any force effect, such as a wall of force.

Summon Plant or Fungus.name: Przywołanie Grzyba lub Rośliny
Summon Plant or Fungus.description:
Przywołujesz istotę, która ma cechę grzyb lub cechę roślina i poziom nie większy od –1, aby walczyła u twego boku.

Wywyższenie Jak opisano w cesze @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.S55aqwWIzpQRFhcq.JournalEntryPage.8gcp880pEWZ9VPnF]{przywołanie}.

Summon Stampede.name: Przywołanie Stampede
Summon Stampede.description:
You summon an unstoppable stampede of panicking beasts. Whether you conjure wild beasts or tamed cattle, the stampede is a force of nature that leaves behind nothing in its wake. The stampede occupies the space of a Gargantuan creature and has a Speed of 60 feet.

Arrive(emotion, fear, mental) Foreboding Tremors The sheer energy of a stampede can cause even apex predators to panic. Each creature within a @Template[emanation|distance:60] must attempt a Will save with the following effects.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1}.

Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2}.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 3} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Uciekający} for 1 round.

DepartFlatten the Earth The stampede Strides up to double its Speed, trampling each Large or smaller creature, hazard, and structure whose space it enters, dealing @Damage[(8d8)[bludgeoning]] damage (basic Reflex save). The stampede ignores and attempts to counteract all difficult terrain it enters caused by debris, overgrowth, rubble, or thick ground cover.

Summon Undead.name: Przywołanie Nieumarłego
Summon Undead.description:
Przywołujesz istotę, która ma cechę nieumarły i poziom –1, aby walczyła u twego boku.

Wywyższenie Jak opisano w cesze @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.S55aqwWIzpQRFhcq.JournalEntryPage.8gcp880pEWZ9VPnF]{przywołanie}.

Summon Warden of the Wild.name: Przywołanie Warden of the Wild
Summon Warden of the Wild.description:
You briefly call forth the spirit of one of the Wardens of the Wild, the legendary guardians of nature. The warden occupies the space of a Gargantuan creature. When you Cast this Spell, you summon a warden depending on the biome in which the spell is cast (for instance, summoning the Warden of Caverns and Burrows if summoned in a cave, canyon, or other underground environment). In an unnatural environment, the warden summoned depends on the region's most recent or similar natural biome, as decided by the GM.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.howl-of-the-wild-bestiary.Actor.NYRk2xqxid0lfNka]{Warden of Caverns and Burrows}: Speed 60 feet, burrow 100 feet; Arrive (earth) Obsidian Cage Obsidian stalagmites burst from the earth as the warden surfaces, impaling enemies and trapping them in stalagmites. Enemies on the ground within @Template[emanation|distance:40]{40 feet} take @Damage[6d6[piercing]] damage (@Check[reflex|basic] save). Creatures that fail their save become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony} until they @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} (the DC is your spell DC); Depart (earth) Blessing of the Depths The squares occupied by the warden remain disheveled and broken, becoming difficult terrain. The warden affects you and all your allies within @Template[emanation|distance:60]{60 feet} with a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.2BV2yYPfVJ5zirZt]{Mountain Resilience} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.bVtkBJvGLP69qVGI]{Unfettered Pack}. The duration for both spells is reduced to 3 rounds, but the duration of mountain resilience isn't reduced when an affected target is hit by a bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing attack.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.howl-of-the-wild-bestiary.Actor.Z5c8wJajbyEMNhEB]{Warden of Forests and Meadows}: Speed 120 feet; Arrive (illusion, mental) Idyllic Panorama The warden's presence unpredictably warps the appearances and perceived distances of creatures and obstacles around it. Each time an enemy within 40 feet of the warden attempts a Strike or Stride action, it takes @Damage[4d6[mental]] damage (@Check[will|basic] save). On a critical failure, the creature Strikes a random target within reach or Strides in a random direction. On a critical success, the creature becomes temporarily immune for 1 round; Depart Fox's Insightful Trickery The warden affects you and all your allies within 60 feet with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.3JG1t3T4mWn6vTke]{Rozmycie} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{Prawdowidzenie}. The duration for both spells is reduced to 3 rounds.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.howl-of-the-wild-bestiary.Actor.ApQvWxwCc5vtDvFD]{Warden of Oceans and Rivers}: Speed 60 feet, swim 120 feet; Arrive I Am the Tide If the warden is summoned in a body of water, it creates a churning whirlpool that deals @Damage[10d6[bludgeoning]] damage to all creatures within @Template[emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} (basic Reflex save). A creature that fails this save is pulled 15 feet closer to the warden (30 feet on a critical failure). If the warden is summoned outside of a body of water, it creates a wave of water that deals @Damage[8d6[bludgeoning]] damage to all creatures within 30 feet (basic Reflex save). A creature that fails this save is pushed 10 feet away from the warden; Depart Acclimation to the Deep The warden affects you and your allies within 60 feet with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.RvBlSIJmxiqfCpR9]{Feet to Fins} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.MZGkMsPBztFN0pUO]{Water Breathing}. The duration for both spells is reduced to 3 rounds, but a creature affected by feet to fins retains its normal land Speed.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.howl-of-the-wild-bestiary.Actor.nQ6g5UbZFirINZoB]{Warden of Peaks and Skies}: Speed 60 feet, fly 240 feet; Arrive Precipice Plummet The warden appears, flying downward from the sky and sends a shockwave where she lands. Creatures within @Template[emanation|distance:20]{20 feet} take @Damage[10d6[sonic]] damage (@Check[fortitude|basic] save). Creatures that critically fail their saves are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1}; Depart (auditory) Song of the Skies The warden affects you and all your allies within 60 feet with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{Unfettered Movement}. The duration for both spells is reduced to 3 rounds.

Summoner's Precaution.name: Przezorność Przywoływacza
Summoner's Precaution.description: Tworzysz na więzi łączącej cię z twoim eidolonem bufor, zapobiegający polegnięciu w walce razem z nim. Zyskujesz reakcję @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VCUz5EnBUJF07j1a]{Zerwanie Łącza}; po jej użyciu zaklęcie się kończy.

Summoner's Visage.name: Summoner's Visage
Summoner's Visage.description:
You transform your eidolon into your identical twin. Assuming you are a humanoid, the eidolon gains the humanoid trait in addition to its other traits while it's in this form, as well as any other trait related to your form (such as elf or gnome). Your eidolon gains a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to Impersonate you and can add its level to such checks even if it's untrained.

Although your eidolon looks like you, it doesn't gain any new abilities, and its statistics don't change in any way-the transformation is purely cosmetic. If this transformation reduces your eidolon's size, the eidolon loses any other effects of its larger size, such as any increase to reach. Your eidolon can still use gear only if it has the eidolon trait, which allows eidolons to use it. Any such eidolon items the eidolon was wearing change size and shape, if necessary, and its effects remain active.

You can Dismiss the spell.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.0OC945wcZ4H4akLz]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Summoner's Visage}

Wywyższenie (4.) Czas trwania zwiększa się do 1 hour.

Sun Blade.name: Sun Blade
Sun Blade.description:
You fire a ray of burning sunlight from your weapon. You must be wielding a sword or spear to cast sun blade, and you perform this spell's somatic component with the weapon. Wykonaj rzut ataku zaklęciem. The ray deals 1k4 fire damage. If the target is unholy, the ray deals an additional 1k4 spirit damage, and if the target is undead, the ray deals an additional 1k4 vitality damage (both effects apply against creatures that are both unholy and undead). If you are in an area of bright natural sunlight, increase the die size of each damage die by one step (from k4 to k6).

Krytyczny Sukces The ray deals double damage.

Sukces The ray deals full damage.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k4 fire, 1k4 spirit, and 1k4 vitality (or 1k6 of each type of damage in bright natural sunlight).

Sun's Fury.name: Sun's Fury
Sun's Fury.description:
The target weapon becomes wreathed in a glowing flame. The weapon deals an additional 1k4 fire and 1 spirit damage on a successful Strike. In addition, the flame causes the weapon to glow as bright as a torch. You can Dismiss the spell.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.4wZaiZJtAA0iyWR5]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Sun's Fury}
Sun's Fury.target: 1 weapon without an unholy rune that is unattended or wielded by you or a willing ally

Sunburst.name: Sunburst
Sunburst.description:
A powerful globe of searing sunlight explodes in the area, dealing 8k10 fire damage to all creatures in the area, plus an additional @Damage[(@item.level+1)d10[vitality]] damage to undead creatures. Każda istota w obszarze musi wykonać rzut obronny Refleksu.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature takes full damage and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiony} permanently.

If the globe overlaps with an area of magical darkness, sunburst attempts to counteract the darkness effect.

Wywyższenie (+1) The fire damage increases by 1k10, and the vitality damage against undead increases by 1k10.

Supreme Connection.name: Supreme Connection
Supreme Connection.description:
In a show of power, you call forth a powerful entity in front of a crowd of onlookers, forcing the entity to manifest and answer your questions. The being appears as a twisted ball of vines and branches that springs forth from a nearby patch of dirt or up from between cobblestones or bricks. The ball of vines is relatively formless, giving no indication of the being that controls it. However, when you make a request, it twists into a rough face to answer your request.

You can ask up to seven questions that could be answered with "yes" or "no," although the entity can give you any one working answer it wants, including vague answers like "likely" or "unknown." The entity is likely to know answers related to its nature and priorities. Depending on the entity you call, it might attempt to deceive you and likely has its own agenda. The entity can only respond when surrounded by the energy of a crowd.

Once it has answered your questions, the vines freeze in place, contorted in pain, a reminder of where the powerful creature touched this world.

Krytyczny Sukces The entity is in a good mood or is more honest than most. It won't attempt to deceive you, though it still might not know the answers. When it's important to provide clarity, the entity will answer your questions with up to five words, such as "if you leave immediately" or "that was true once." The words of the entity ring with truth, and the crowd takes the statements as gospel. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to Diplomacy checks made to influence the crowd and to any Deception checks to Lie to the crowd by directly incorporating the entity's answers.

Sukces You can ask and receive your seven answers normally. The crowd is excited by the entity's words and believes them to be true. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Diplomacy checks made to influence the crowd and to any Deception checks to Lie to the crowd by directly incorporating the entity's answers.

Porażka The vines reach out in a weighted gasp before dying. The crowd is likely disappointed, especially if you made them wait, but they don't necessarily change their attitude toward you.

Krytyczna Porażka The vines wrap around you in desperation, trying to squeeze out your life force to survive. You take @Damage[10d6[bludgeoning]] damage and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 3}, and you can't reduce the drained condition for 1 week. The attitude of the most members of the crowd toward you become one step worse, though individual members of the crowd might have different reactions.

Sure Footing.name: Pewny Grunt
Sure Footing.description:
Uwalniasz kończyny celu spod wpływu dolegliwości ograniczających ruchomość. Spróbuj przeciwdziałać jednemu wybranemu przez siebie efektowi nakładającego na cel jeden z następujących statusów: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarność}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Pochwycenie} lub @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paraliż}. Jeśli nie udało ci się przeciwdziałać efektowi, ale udałoby się to gdyby jego ranga przeciwdziałania była o 2 niższa, zamiast tego tłumisz efekt do początku swojej następnej tury. Czas działania efektu nie upływa kiedy jest stłumiony.

To zaklęcie nie może tłumić ani przeciwdziałać klątwom, chorobom lub statusom, które są częścią normalnego stanu celu.

Wywyższenie (4.) Dodaj do listy statusów @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomienie}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolnienie} i @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Spętanie}.

Wywyższenie (6.) Dodaj do listy statusów @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{Petryfikację}.

Wywyższenie (8.) Dodaj do listy statusów @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszenie}.

Sure Strike.name: Pewny Cios
Sure Strike.description:
Następnym razem kiedy wykonasz rzut ataku przed końcem swojej tury, wykonaj rzut dwa razy i wybierz korzystniejszy wynik. Atak ignoruje kary sytuacyjne do trafienia oraz konieczność wykonywania testów płaskich wywoływanych przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięcie} lub @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Schowanie} celu. Jesteś następnie tymczasowo niewrażliwy na pewny cios przez 10 minut.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.fpGDAz2v5PG0zUSl]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Pewny Cios}

Suspended Retribution.name: Suspended Retribution
Suspended Retribution.description:
All life dances one step from the precipice, one heartbeat from disaster. You open your eyes wide and see doom waiting in the wings, then invite it to step forward.
