A spectral omen of disaster appears above the target's head- traditionally, this is a downward-pointing sword, but some spellcasters report seeing a hangman's noose or a grinning skull instead. When you Cast this Spell, pick one of the following triggers.

  • The target moves more than its Speed in a single round.
  • The target makes more than one Strike in a single round.
  • The target Casts a Spell.
  • The target uses a specific skill you name.
  • The target uses a specific ability you name.

If the target takes the triggering action, the portent of doom activates-the sword strikes down, the noose loops around the target's neck, the skull bares its fangs-and the target takes @Damage[70[mental]] damage with a basic Reflex save. The target instinctively knows which action will trigger the omen and can ward off the omen by spending a total of 3 actions, which have the concentrate trait, to pray, make signs against doom, or similar apotropaic actions. These actions need not be consecutive. After the creature spends the actions, the spell ends.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 10.

Swallow Light.name: Swallow Light
Swallow Light.description:
You draw magical light into your open mouth, consuming it and turning its essence into fuel for a gout of life-draining shadows. Attempt a counteract check against the light effect. If you successfully counteract it, you gain a breath weapon of chilling shadows you can use until the spell ends. Exhaling the breath is a two-action activity. The breath weapon is a 15-foot cone and deals 1k6 cold damage plus 1k6 void damage. Creatures in the area can attempt a basic Reflex save against your spell DC. Once activated, you can't use the breath weapon again for [[/r 1d4 #Rounds]] rounds.

Wywyższenie (+2) Increase the damage of the breath weapon by 1k6 cold damage and 1k6 void damage.

Swamp of Sloth.name: Swamp of Sloth
Swamp of Sloth.description:
Ground in the area turns swampy and fetid. The area is difficult terrain. The sludge at the bottom of the morass animates into diminutive sludge beasts that have a demonic appearance. These don't function as normal creatures, but they swarm over creatures in the swamp and exude a noxious stench. The swamp deals 1k6 poison damage to creatures that end their turn in the area (basic Fortitude save). For each additional action you use when Casting the Spell, increase the burst's radius by 5 feet.

Wywyższenie (+2) The damage increases by 1k6, and the initial radius increases by 5 feet

Swampcall.name: Swampcall
Swampcall.description:
You call upon the spirits of the soil to twist and churn, transforming the terrain in the targeted area into a sodden mess. The area becomes difficult terrain. Creatures in the area when you Cast this Spell must attempt a Reflex saving throw.

Sukces Efekt nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Porażka The creature sinks partially into the mud. The creature takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds (except for its swim Speed, if any) and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda}. These effects last until the creature leaves the area or until the end of its next turn, whichever comes first.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the penalty to Speeds (except Swim speed) is –15 feet.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.fcalovjrB3bzpiDH]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Swampcall}

Wywyższenie (3.) The range increases to 60 feet, and the area increases to a 20-foot burst.

Swarm Form.name: Swarm Form
Swarm Form.description:
You discorporate into a swarm of Tiny creatures. While in swarm form, you are the same size, you have the swarm trait and you gain resistance 5 to slashing and piercing damage and weakness 5 to area and splash damage. You can fit into spaces only a few inches wide, moving your constituent creatures through the gap, and you can share a space with another creature. You don't gain the swarm mind ability, so you are still affected normally by mental effects. As a swarm, you can't speak, cast spells, use manipulate actions requiring your hands, activate your magic items, or make any of your Strikes with your normal body. While in swarm form, you can crawl all over any creature that shares your space as a single action. That creature must attempt a Fortitude save against your spell DC or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 2} on a critical failure). You can Dismiss the Spell.

Wywyższenie (+2) Your resistances and weaknesses each increase by 5.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.tC0Qk4AjYRd3csL7]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Swarm Form}

Swarming Wasp Stings.name: Swarming Wasp Stings
Swarming Wasp Stings.description:
You manifest a swarm of disembodied wasp stingers that stab creatures in the area, possibly poisoning them. Creatures in the affected area take @Damage[1d6[piercing]] damage. Each creature that takes piercing damage must attempt a Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target takes @Damage[2d6[poison]] damage.

Porażka The target is afflicted with Swarming Wasp Venom at stage 1.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is afflicted with swarming wasp venom at stage 2.

Swarming Wasp Venom (trucizna)

Level 7

Maksymalny Czas Trwania 6 rund

Stadium 1 @Damage[2d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1} (1 runda)

Stadium 2 @Damage[3d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 2} (1 runda)

Swarmsense.name: Swarmsense
Swarmsense.description:
You extend your senses through a multitude of crawling and flying creatures. You create a crawling swarm in your square. You can hear through the swarm as if using your normal auditory senses. When you Cast this Spell and the first time you Sustain it each round, you can move the swarm 10 feet along the ground in any direction. The swarm has AC 15 and a +0 bonus to its saves. Any damage dealt to the swarm destroys it and ends the spell.

Wywyższenie (3rd) The swarm has a climb Speed of 10 feet.

Wywyższenie (5th) The swarm has a fly Speed of 10 feet. You can see through the swarm using your visual senses.

Wywyższenie (7th) The swarm gains a 10-foot status bonus to its Speeds.

Swear Oath.name: Swear Oath
Swear Oath.description:
You loudly and firmly state a course of action that you swear to fulfill. When you Cast this Spell, Ready a single action or free action you can use. If the action is in line with your personal edicts or the edicts presented by your religion, you can Cast this Spell as a single action.

If the trigger you designate occurs and you can use the chosen action as a reaction, you gain a +1 status bonus to any attack roll or skill check required. If the trigger you designate doesn't occur, you can Sustain the spell on your next turn to regain the Focus Point spent for this spell.

Wywyższenie (5th) The status bonus is +2.

Wywyższenie (9th) The status bonus is +3.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.GcEFca6I8f5Y06z7]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Swear Oath}

Sweet Dream.name: Sweet Dream
Sweet Dream.description:
With your soothing words, you lull the target into an enchanting dream. When you Cast the Spell, the target falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Nieprzytomny} if it wasn't already. While unconscious, it experiences a dream of your choice, though lucidly enough it can wake when it pleases. If it wakes up before 1 minute of sleep has passed, the spell ends.

  • Dream of Insight +1 status bonus to Intelligence-based skill checks
  • Dream of Glamor +1 status bonus to Charisma-based skill checks
  • Dream of Voyaging +5-foot status bonus to Speed

If you Cast this Spell again, any previous sweet dream you cast ends.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.yEQXaB7XyaROVqyb]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Sweet Dream}

Wywyższenie (4.) The bonus for a dream of insight or glamor is +2.

Wywyższenie (7.) The bonus for a dream of insight or glamor is +3.

Sweetest Solstice.name: Sweetest Solstice
Sweetest Solstice.cost: sesame paste, sugar, rice balls, food dye, cooking pots, and utensils with a total value of 2 gp × the spell rank × the settlement's level
Sweetest Solstice.description:
On long winter nights, many families in Tian Xia share a dish of glutinous rice balls. Wealthier families also dye these rice balls an auspicious pinkish-red in jujube juice and might serve or stuff them with expensive sweetened pastes of red beans, sesame, taro, or lotus. Sweetest solstice is a folk ritual that incorporates this tradition and allows entire villages to experience communal goodwill by celebrating a luxurious version of this dish together.

This ritual is performed over 1 hour of cooking a soup of crushed black sesame and sugar in several large cauldrons while good-natured jokes and puns praising Daikitsu, Kofusachi, and other benevolent deities are uttered; quips inspired by Hei Feng and Sun Wukong are usually included in these jovialities, for these rambunctious deities are always ready for feasts and humor. Each time a joke or pun is made, a rice ball is dropped into the boiling soups.

This ritual can only be performed once each winter season. If performed on the night of the winter solstice, the DCs of the ritual's skill checks are reduced by 2.

If the ritual is successful, the delicious black sesame soup, like the longest of nights, seems never-ending and even hides windfalls of chewy sweetness. Sometimes, this small mercy of hot meals, and the hope for pleasant surprises to come, is all a community needs to endure the bleakest of winters together.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.HDT5oiQXXnRdDIKR]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Sweetest Solstice}

Krytyczny Sukces The pot contains enough black sesame soup and rice balls to feed a hot meal to everyone in the settlement for a month. The casters of the ritual gain a +1 status bonus to saves against emotion and fear effects until the end of winter.

Sukces The pot contains enough black sesame soup and rice balls to feed a hot meal to everyone in the settlement for a week. The casters of the ritual gain a +1 status bonus to saves against fear effects for 1 month or until the end of winter, whichever comes first.

Porażka The ritual has no effect.

Krytyczna Porażka The soup becomes tainted; it not only provides no nourishment but spreads food poisoning through the town (this might have disastrous effects, as detailed in the next adventure). The casters of the ritual become particularly affected by illness and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 4} and can't reduce the condition for 12 hours.
Sweetest Solstice.target: a settlement with a level equal to or lower than twice the ritual's level

Symphony of the Unfettered Heart.name: Symphony of the Unfettered Heart
Symphony of the Unfettered Heart.description:
Your symphony lifts listeners from their worldly concerns. Attempt a Performance check to counteract an effect applying one of the following conditions to the target: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Pochwycony}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Sparaliżowany}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Spętany}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony}. If you fail, you can't target the same effect on the target for 1 day. Use the condition's source to determine the counteract DC (for example, the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} DC for grabbed).

Wywyższenie (9.) You can target up to four creatures.

Synaptic Pulse.name: Synaptic Pulse
Synaptic Pulse.description:
You emit a pulsating mental blast that penetrates the minds of all enemies in the area. Each enemy in the area must attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1}.

Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 2}.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is Stunned for 1 round.

Synchronize.name: Synchronizacja
Synchronize.description:
Umieszczasz, w nieszkodliwy sposób, na celach swój unikalny magiczny sygil, który ma rozmiar około 5cm kwadradowych. Kiedy Rzucasz Zaklęcie ustalasz czas, po którego upłynięciu sygil zamruga trzykrotnie słabym światłem. Po tym momencie zaklęcie kończy się. Mimo tego, że zwykle czas trwania zaklęć jest nieco nieprecyzyjny, efekt zaklęcia synchronizacji są dokładne co do sekundy. Czasomierz jest oparty o miejsce, w kórym zostało rzucone zaklęcie, a więc wejście na plan lub obszar, w którym czas płynie inaczej, wpływa na sposób odmierzania upłyniętego czasu.

Wywyższenie (2.) Zaklęcie może obrać za cel do 20 godzących się istot.

Synchronize Steps.name: Synchronizacja Kroków
Synchronize Steps.description:
Łączysz umysły dwóch celów, pozwalając im na przemieszczanie się w tandemie. Kiedy jeden z celów wykona Krok, drugi cel może użyć reakcji aby wkonać Krok. Kiedy jeden z celów wykona Bieg, drugi cel może użyć reakcji aby wkonać Bieg.

Wywyższenie (5.) Zasięg zwiększa się do 60 stóp i możesz obrać za cel do 10 godzących się istot.

Synesthesia.name: Synesthesia
Synesthesia.description:
The target's senses are suddenly rewired in unexpected ways, causing them to process noises as bursts of color, smells as sounds, and so on. This has three effects, and the target must attempt a Will save.

  • Due to the distraction, the target must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:5] each time it uses a concentrate action, or the action fails and is wasted.
  • The target's difficulty processing visual input makes all creatures and objects @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} from it.

  • The creature has trouble moving, making it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 3} and giving it a –10-foot status penalty to its Speeds.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target is affected for 1 round.

Porażka The target is affected for 1 minute.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, and the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 2} as it attempts to process the sensory shifts.

Wywyższenie (9.) You can target up to five creatures.

Tailwind.name: Wiatr w Plecy
Tailwind.description:
Wiatr wiejący w plecy popycha cię do odkrywania nowych horyzontów. Zyskujesz premię statusową +10 stóp do swojej prędkości.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.PQHP7Oph3BQX1GhF]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Wiatr w Plecy}

Wywyższenie (2.) Czas trwania wzrasta do 8 godzin.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.7vIUF5zbvHzVcJA0]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Wiatr w Plecy (8 godzin)}

Take Root.name: Zakorzenienie
Take Root.description:
Z ciała celu wyrastają korzenie, wijące się po podłożu i okolicznych obiektach, wzmacniając jego postawę lub chwyt. Obrana za cel istota zyskuje premię sytuacyjną +1 do swojego ST Krzepy przeciw próbom @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Odepchnięcia} jej oraz premię sytuacyjną +1 do jej ST Refleksu przeciw próbom @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Rozbrojenia} i @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Podcięcia} jej. Ta premia ma zastosowanie również do rzutów obronnych przeciw wszelkim efektom, które próbowałyby wyrwać jej trzymany przez nią obiekt.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.ZGzhNFB3SM8owk85]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Zakorzenienie}

Take Your Places.name: Take Your Places
Take Your Places.description: The scene would play out exactly as you envisioned it, if only the actors would respect their blocking. You instantly transport the targeted creatures and any items they're wearing and holding from their current space to an unoccupied space within range. You don't need to be able to see the destinations as long as you've been there in the past and know its relative location and distance from each target. Creatures affected by take your places are then temporarily immune to this spell for 1 minute.

Take its Course.name: Take its Course
Take its Course.description:
When someone has overindulged, you can hasten them past the worst of their affliction or intensify their misery. This spell attempts to progress a disease affliction, a poison affliction, or persistent poison damage affecting the target. If the target is affected by more than one of these, you can choose from among those you are aware of; otherwise the GM chooses randomly. An unwilling target can attempt a Will save to negate take its course.

The effect of this spell depends on whether you're attempting to end an affliction or persistent poison damage, and whether you are attempting to help or hinder the target's recovery.

  • Affliction The target immediately attempts its next saving throw against the affliction. You can grant the creature your choice of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.nHXKK4pRXAzrLdEP]{+2 status bonus} or a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.R27azQfzeFuFc48G]{-2 status penalty} to its saving throw against the affliction.
  • Persistent Poison You can cause the target take the persistent poison damage immediately when you Cast this Spell (in addition to taking it at the end of its next turn). Whether or not you do so, the target attempts an additional flat check against the persistent poison damage. You can set the DC of that flat check to 5 or 20 instead of the normal DC.

Wywyższenie (7.) You can attempt to progress any number of the target's eligible afflictions and persistent poison damage.

Talking Corpse.name: Talking Corpse
Talking Corpse.description:
You grant the target corpse a semblance of life, which it uses to speak the answers to three questions posed to it. This spell calls on the physical body's latent memories rather than summoning back the deceased's spirit, so the corpse must be mostly intact for the spell to function. The more damage the corpse has taken, the more inaccurate or patchwork its answers are, and it must have a throat and mouth to speak at all. If anyone has previously cast this spell on the corpse in the last week, the spell automatically fails. The corpse can attempt a Will save to resist answering the questions using the statistics of the original creature at its time of death, with the following effects.

Krytyczny Sukces The target can lie or refuse to answer your questions, and the target's spirit haunts you for 24 hours, bothering you and causing you to be unable to gain any rest for that time.

Sukces The target can provide false information or refuse to answer your questions.

Porażka The target must answer truthfully, but its answers can be brief, cryptic, and repetitive. It can still mislead you or attempt to stall so that the spell's duration runs out before you can ask all your questions.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the target's answers are more direct and less repetitive, though still cryptic. It takes a –2 status penalty to Deception checks to deceive or mislead you.

Tame.name: Tame
Tame.description:
As you make comforting sounds and gestures, you approach the target in a friendly manner combining caution and confidence. You improve the target's attitude to you by one step (unfriendly to neutral, neutral to friendly, friendly to helpful) for the duration of the spell unless it succeeds at a Will save. Afterward, the target is temporarily immune for 1 day.

This spell works on only domesticated animals; for example, you could use it on guard dogs or stray dogs, but not feral dogs or wolves. If the socialization of the animal is in question, the decision is up to the GM.

Wywyższenie (3.) The duration becomes 10 minutes.

Wywyższenie (6.) The duration becomes 1 hour.

Tangle Vine.name: Plączące Pnącze
Tangle Vine.description:
Znikąd pojawia się pnącze, wystrzeliwując z twojej dłoni i przyczepiając się do celu. Wykonaj rzut ataku zaklęciem przeciw celowi.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.TwtUIEyenrtAbeiX]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Plączące Pnącze}

Krytyczny Sukces Cel staje się @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony} i ponosi karę sytuacyjną –10 stóp do swoich Prędkości na 1 rundę. Może spróbować @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Uciec} przeciwko twojemu ST zaklęć aby usunąć zaróno tę karę, co status unieruchomienia.

Sukces Cel ponosi karę sytuacyjną –10 stóp do swoich Prędkości na 1 rundę. Może spróbować @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Uciec} przeciwko twojemu ST zaklęć aby usunąć tę karę.

Porażka Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Wywyższenie (2.) Efekt trwa 2 rundy.

Wywyższenie (4.) Efekt trwa 1 minutę.

Tanglecurse.name: Tanglecurse
Tanglecurse.description:
Tanglebriar has been called a "curse on the land," which has inspired Treerazer's cult to develop this notorious spell. The target must attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected.

Sukces A fungal bloom springs up from the ground in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5] around the target. This area is difficult terrain for creatures that enter the area. The target treats all terrain as difficult terrain since this swath of fungus moves with them as they do, transforming into a tangle of spores and floating tendrils if the target flies or a thick swath of stringy floating algae if the target swims. This effect ends after 1 minute or as soon as the curse is lifted, whichever comes first.

Porażka As success, but the fungal bloom increases to 10 feet. It persists until the curse is lifted. In addition, the target is also affected by the spores exuded by the fungal bloom — roll [[/r 1d4]] and consult the results below to see how the spores affect them. This affect reactivates automatically every 24 hours, replacing the previous result.

1: The spores cause atrophy; the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 1}.

2: The spores cause fibrous fungal growths to sprout from the target; the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1}.

3: The spores settle in the target's blood and flesh and cause great pain; the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 1}.

4: The spores intrude upon the mind and cause hallucinations; the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 1}.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the emanation increases to 15 feet, and the condition value caused by the spores increases to 2.

Tangling Creepers.name: Tangling Creepers
Tangling Creepers.description:
Dense, twitching creepers sprout from every surface and fill any bodies of water in the area. Any creature moving on the land, or Climbing or Swimming within the creepers, takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds while in the area. Once per round, you can Sustain the spell to make a vine lash out from any square within the expanse of creepers. This vine has a 15-foot reach. Make a melee spell attack roll against the target; on a success, the vine pulls the target into the creepers and makes it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony} for 1 round or until the creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes} (against your spell DC), whichever comes first.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.5RiskDnSXaRI6F4n]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Tangling Creepers}

Tattoo Whispers.name: Tattoo Whispers
Tattoo Whispers.cost: tattoo inks and silver tattooing needles worth 20 gp for each secondary caster
Tattoo Whispers.description:
You carefully tattoo the same design upon each secondary caster. The tattoo can be of any shape or symbol, but it must include a mouth. The tattoo fades naturally over the course of 1 month.

Krytyczny Sukces The tattoos on the secondary casters are all magically linked for 1 week, providing a semi-telepathic bond. Each secondary caster can communicate secretly with any other secondary casters at any time by mouthing words but making no sound. The person receiving a message must be within 120 feet of the sender, must be within the sender's line of sight, and must have their tattoo uncovered. The mouth of the tattoo moves to match the words, which the tattoo whispers, but only the tattoo's bearer can hear it.

Sukces As critical success, but the effect lasts for 1 day.

Porażka The ritual has no effect.

Krytyczna Porażka The ritual has no effect and creates a backlash of persistent mental static. All casters are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 1} for 1 day.

Teeth to Terror.name: Teeth to Terror
Teeth to Terror.description:
The target believes its teeth are falling out, crawling along its face, stabbing into its body, and cramming themselves down its throat. The target takes 2k4 mental damage and @Damage[1d4[persistent,mental]], depending on its Will save. The target takes a –1 circumstance penalty to Strikes with its jaws or teeth while it is taking persistent mental damage.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target takes half damage and no persistent mental damage.

Porażka Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia and persistent mental damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1}.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia and persistent mental damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 3}.

Wywyższenie (+2) You can target two additional creatures, the mental damage increases by 2k4, and the persistent mental damage increases by 1k4.

Telekinetic Bombardment.name: Telekinetic Bombardment
Telekinetic Bombardment.description:
You grasp a piece of the landscape-such as a tree, carriage, or piece of masonry-and lob it in your foe's direction. Your missile crashes down in either a 10-foot burst (for most missiles) or a 30-foot line (for something long and tall, like a tree or a ship's mast), dealing 14k6 bludgeoning damage and turning its area into difficult terrain as it breaks into rubble. All creatures in the area must attempt a Reflex save. If the area is a line, it doesn't have to start from your square but can instead start anywhere in range, as long as the entire area remains within range.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia and is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota odnosi podwójne obrażenia, is knocked prone, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1}.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6.

Telekinetic Hand.name: Telekinetyczna Dłoń
Telekinetic Hand.description:
Tworzysz unuszącą się w powietrzu magiczną dłoń, niewidzialną lub widmową, która chwyta obiekt będący celem zaklęcia i przenosi go powoli o nie więcej niż 20 stóp w dowolnym kierunku. Kiedy Podtrzymujesz zaklęcie możesz przemieścić przedmiot o kolejne 20 stóp. Jeśli obiekt jest w powietrzu w momencie kiedy zaklęcie się kończy, zaczyna spadać.

Wywyższenie (3.) Możesz obrać za cel niepilnowany obiekt o Naręczu 1 lub mniejszym.

Wywyższenie (5.) Zasięg zaklęcia wzrasta do 60 stóp, oraz możesz obrać za cel niepilnowany obiekt o Naręczu 1 lub mniejszym.

Wywyższenie (7.) Zasięg zaklęcia wzrasta do 60 stóp, oraz możesz obrać za cel niepilnowany obiekt o Naręczu 1 lub mniejszym.

3.target: 1 niepilnowany obiekt o Naręczu 1 lub mniejszym

7.target: 1 niepilnowany obiekt o Naręczu 2 lub mniejszym

Telekinetic Hand.target: 1 niepilnowany obiekt o Naręczu lekkim lub mniejszym

Telekinetic Haul.name: Telekinetic Haul
Telekinetic Haul.description: You move the target up to 20 feet, potentially suspending it in midair. When you Sustain the Spell, you can do so again, or you can shift your telekinetic focus to a different eligible target within range, moving it instead.
Telekinetic Haul.target: 1 unattended object of up to 80 Bulk with no dimension longer than 20 feet

Telekinetic Maneuver.name: Manewr Telekinetyczny
Telekinetic Maneuver.description: Za pomocą nagłego zrywu telekinetycznej energii przemieszczasz wroga lub coś co nosi. Możesz spróbować @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Odepchnąć}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Podciąć}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.lOE4yjUnETTdaf2T]{Przemieścić} lub @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Rozbroić} cel z użyciem rzutu na atak zaklęciem zamiast testu Atletyki.

Telekinetic Projectile.name: Telekinetyczny Pocisk
Telekinetic Projectile.description:
Ciskacz w kierunku celu luźno leżący, niepilnowany obiekt znajdujący się w zasięgu, który ma Naręcze 1 lub mniejsze. Wykonaj rzut ataku zaklęciem w cel. Jeśli trafisz zadajesz 2k6 obrażeń ciętych, kłutych lub obuchowych - cokolwiek jest adekwatne dla ciśniętego przez ciebie obiektu. Żadne specyficzne cechy ani właściwości magiczne używanego obiektu nie mają wpływu na atak ani na obrażenia.

Krytyczny Sukces Zadajesz podwójne obrażenia.

Sukces Zadajesz pełne obrażenia.

Wywyższenie (+1) obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k6.

Telekinetic Rend.name: Telekinetic Rend
Telekinetic Rend.description:
Your mind creates a violent axis of motion in a nearby space. You deal your choice of 1k6 bludgeoning or 1k6 slashing damage to all creatures in the area, with a basic Fortitude save. A creature large enough to be in more than one of the bursts takes damage only once.

Wywyższenie (+2) The damage increases by 1k6.

Telepathic Bond.name: Telepathic Bond
Telepathic Bond.description: The targets can communicate telepathically with any or all of the other targets from any point on the same planet.
Telepathic Bond.target: you and up to 4 willing creatures touched

Telepathic Demand.name: Telepathic Demand
Telepathic Demand.description: You send the target a message of 25 words or fewer, and it can respond immediately with its own message of 25 words or fewer. Your message is insidious and has the effect of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.qwlh6aDgi86U3Q7H]{Sugestia} spell, with the message substituting for the spoken suggestion. On a successful save, the target is temporarily immune for 1 day, and on a critical success, the target is temporarily immune for 1 month. You can target a creature only if you've previously been in telepathic contact with it before, such as via the telepathy spell.

Telepathy.name: Telepathy
Telepathy.description:
You can communicate telepathically with creatures within 30 feet. Once you establish a connection by communicating with a creature, the communication is two-way. You can communicate only with creatures that share a language with you.

Wywyższenie (6.) You can communicate telepathically with creatures using shared mental imagery even if you don't share a language; telepathy loses the linguistic trait.

Teleport.name: Teleportacja
Teleport.description:
Ty i cele jesteście natychmiast przenoszeni do dowolnego miejsca w zasięgu, o ile potrafisz precyzyjnie określić jego lokalizację zarówno pod względem jej położenia względem pozycji początkowej, jak i wyglądu (lub innych cech identyfikujących). Błędna wiedza o wyglądzie miejsca docelowego zazwyczaj powoduje niepowodzenie zaklęcia, ale może zamiast tego doprowadzić do teleportacji do niepożądanej lokalizacji lub innego nietypowego niepowodzenia określonego przez MG. Teleportacja nie jest precyzyjna na duże odległości. Cele pojawiają się przemieszczone względem zamierzonego celu w kierunku określonym przez MG, i w odegłości równej mniej więcej 1 procentowi całkowitego przebytego dystansu. W przypadku krótkich podróży ten brak precyzji jest nieistotny, ale na duże odległości może wynosić nawet 1 milę (1.5 km).

Wywyższenie (7.) Ty i pozostałe cele możecie podróżować do dowolnego miejsca w promieniu 1 000 mil (1 500 km).

Wywyższenie (8.) Ty i pozostałe cele możecie podróżować do dowolnego miejsca na tej samej planecie. Jeśli podróżujesz na odległość większą niż 1 000 mil (1 500 km), przybywasz jedynie 10 mil (15 km) od miejsca docelowego.

Wywyższenie (9.) Ty i pozostałe cele możecie podróżować do dowolnego miejsca na innej planecie w tym samym układzie słonecznym. Zakładając, że posiadasz dokładną wiedzę o położeniu i wyglądzie miejsca docelowego, przybywasz na nową planetę 100 mil (150 km) od niego.

Wywyższenie (10.) Jak na kręgu 9., ale ty i pozostałe cele możecie podróżować na dowolną planetę w tej samej galaktyce.
Teleport.target: ty i do 4 dotkniętych celów, będących albo godzącymi się istotami, albo obiektami mniej więcej wielkości istoty.

Teleportation Circle.name: Krąg Teleportacyjny
Teleportation Circle.cost: Rzadkie kadzidła, drogocenne metale i oczyszczona kreda, warte 500 sz
Teleportation Circle.description:
Tworzysz na ziemi krąg o średnicy 10 stóp, który funkcjonuje jako portal prowadzący do miejsca docelowego określonego w momencie przeprowadzania rytuału. Określasz miejsce docelowe w ramach procesu przeprowadzania rytuału. Miejsce to nie może być zmienione. Miejscem docelowym musi być lokalizacja w promieniu 1 000 mil (1 500 km) znajdująca się na tym samym planie co krąg teleportacyjny. Musisz być w stanie precyzyjnie określić lokalizację zarówno pod względem jej pozycji względem umiejscowienia kręgu teleportacyjnego oraz wyglądu miejsca docelowego (lub innych cech charakterystycznych). Miejsce docelowe również musi być kręgiem o średnicy 10 stóp, który nie pokrywa się z żadnymi stałymi strukturami, ale może być miejscem szkodliwym lub niebezpiecznym.

Asystujący użytkownik magii używający testu Sztuki Przetrwania na rzecz tego rytuału może znajdować się punkcie docelowym zamiast punktu startowego. Jeśli asystujący użytkownik magii znajduje się w punkcie docelowym i odniesie sukces na swoim teście i ty odniesiesz sukces na swoim, rytuał kończy się zamiast tego sukcesem krytycznym.

Kiedy krąg jest aktywny, każda istota wkraczająca w całości w krąg jest natychmiastowo teleportowana do miejsca docelowego. Istota, która nie chce się teleportować może podjąć się rzutu obronnego Woli aby opszeć się efektowi. Jeśli pozostanie ona w kręgu, musi ponawiać ten rzut obronny na końcu każdej ze swoich tur.

Krąg zazwyczaj działa tylko w jednym kierunku, ale możesz podwoić koszt rytuału aby sporządzić kręgi działające dwukierunkowo.

Krytyczny Sukces Tworzysz krąg teleportacyjny i jest on niezwykle precyzyjny niezależnie od przemierzanego nim dystansu. Podróżujący nim pojawiają się dokładnie w punkcie docelowym.

Sukces Jak krytyczny sukces, ale miejsce docelowe zbacza z celu o około 1 procent przemierzanego portalem dystansu, do maksymalnie 10 mil (15 km) odległości od celu.

Porażka Krąg teleportacyjny nie funkcjonuje.

Krytyczna Porażka Krąg teleportacyjny jest koszmarnie nieprecyzyjny. Prowadzi do losowego miejsca o podobnej odległości od punktu startowego a szanse na dodatkowe komplikacje podczas podróży nim są znacznie większe.

Wywyższenie (9.) Koszt wynosi 2 000 sz, czas wynosi 1 miesiąc a celem może być dowolne miejsce na tej samej planecie.

Wywyższenie (10.) Koszt wynosi 10 000 sz, czas trwania jest nieograniczony a celem może być dowolne miejsce na tej samej planecie.

Tempest Cloak.name: Tempest Cloak
Tempest Cloak.description:
You shroud one creature in a cloak of fierce, howling winds, shielding it from attacks and making it difficult to approach. The twisting shield of wind creates difficult terrain in a @Template[burst|distance:5] surrounding the target. The target also gains a +2 circumstance bonus to its AC against physical ranged attacks, such as attacks made with bows, javelins, or slings. In addition, the sound of the swirling storms makes it easier for the target to ignore anything it doesn't want to hear, granting the target a +2 circumstance bonus to all defenses against auditory effects.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.8y6Ap9xIsnseYYvk]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Tempest Cloak}

Tempest Form.name: Tempest Form
Tempest Form.description:
Your body becomes fluid to better suit your surroundings. Choose whether to become air, water, or mist. The spell gains the air trait if you choose air or mist, and the water trait if you choose water or mist. You become amorphous, as does your armor. You lose any item bonus to AC and use your proficiency bonus for unarmored defense to determine your AC. You also gain resistance 10 to physical damage and become immune to precision damage. You can slip through tiny cracks and don't need to breathe. You can't cast spells, activate items, or use actions that have the attack or manipulate trait, except those granted by this spell. You also gain the following effects based on your form.

  • Air You gain a fly Speed of 20 feet and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialny} while you are in the air. You can create the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.g8QqHpv2CWDwmIm1]{Podmuch Wiatru} from your space as a 2-action activity, which has the manipulate trait.
  • Mist You gain a fly Speed of 20 feet, and it becomes hard to see through you. Any creature on one side of your space who is targeted by a creature on the opposite side is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} to the targeting creature.
  • Water You gain a swim Speed of 20 feet and become invisible while you are in the water. You can electrically charge yourself by taking a single action, which has the manipulate trait. If you do, you are no longer invisible in the water due to electricity indicating your location, but any creature that makes a melee attack against you takes @Damage[(1d6+max(0,floor(@item.rank/2) -3))[electricity]] damage.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.mKw9WvqnhaUsPvvy]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Tempest Form}

Wywyższenie (+2) Increase the resistance by 5 and the electricity damage from the charged water form by 1.

Tempest Surge.name: Tempest Surge
Tempest Surge.description:
You surround a foe in a swirling storm of violent winds, roiling clouds, and crackling lightning. The storm deals 1k12 electricity damage to the target with a basic Reflex save. On a failure, the target also is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 2} for 1 round.

Wywyższenie (+1) Wstępne obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k12.

Tempest Touch.name: Tempest Touch
Tempest Touch.description:
Your touch calls forth a churning mass of icy water that clings to your target, dealing 1k4 bludgeoning damage and 1k4 cold damage. The target must attempt a Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected.

Sukces The target takes half damage and a –5-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until the end of your next turn.

Porażka The target takes full damage and a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until the end of your next turn.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the target takes double damage.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.NY4oUb2RNgkY0AfL]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Tempest Touch}

Wywyższenie (+1) The bludgeoning and cold damage each increase by 1k4.

Tempest of Shades.name: Tempest of Shades
Tempest of Shades.description:
You channel the forces of undeath to briefly call forth an amalgam of the vengeful dead slain by your enemies and allies alike. This amalgam manifests as a large tornado of insubstantial, howling faces. It occupies the space of a Huge creature and has a Speed of 60 feet.

Arrive (negative) Vortex of Death Each enemy creature within a 60-foot emanation must attempt a Fortitude save with the following effects.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature is unaffected

Sukces The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 1}.

Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 2}.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 3}.

Depart (emotion, fear, mental) Howl of Eternity The vengeful dead lets out an anguished scream. All your enemies within a 100-foot emanation must attempt @Check[will|name:Tempest of Shades Depart|traits:necromancy,emotion,fear,mental] saves with the following effects.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1}.

Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 3}.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is frightened 3. It's also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Uciekający} for 1 round or until it's no longer frightened, whichever comes first.

Temporal Distortion.name: Temporal Distortion
Temporal Distortion.description:
You share some of your own temporal distortions with a foe, altering their mind and body unpredictably as they're thrown backward or forward in time. Roll [[/r 1d4]]{1k4}. On a 1, the foe becomes clumsy; on a 2, it becomes enfeebled; on a 3, it becomes stupefied; and on a 4, you choose which condition applies.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected.

Sukces The target is either @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 1}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 1} for 1 round, depending on the result of the k4.

Porażka The target is either clumsy 1, enfeebled 1, or stupefied 1 for 4 rounds, depending on the result of the k4.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the time warp is stronger, increasing the condition's effects but making it run its course faster. The condition's value is 3, and the condition lasts for 2 rounds.

Temporal Twin.name: Temporal Twin
Temporal Twin.description:
You pull a fleeting duplicate of your ally from the recent past. The duplicate appears in an unoccupied space of your choice within 30 feet of you and repeats a basic single action the target took since the end of your last turn, such as making a Strike or Interacting to pull a lever. Because the other basic single actions don't produce much of a result on their own, this is typically used for Strike and Interact, though occasionally it could be useful to have a temporal twin Stride through a potentially dangerous area to expose a hazard. The target ally spends a reaction to create the duplicate, makes any decisions, and rolls for the repeated action, such as choosing a target for a Strike and making the attack roll. If the ally doesn't have a reaction to spend, temporal twin fails. Use the duplicate's location for determining flanking, cover, and the like. Using this spell requires remembering what your ally did, and if you don't remember the details, the GM might not allow you to cast temporal twin.

This action can't be used for anything but a basic single action, nor can it use limited resources. The action can have a different target than the original action but must be very similar in form. For example, if the original action were to Interact to pull a lever, the time duplicate could pull a different lever, but couldn't turn a doorknob or pick up an item from a table.

Being pulled through time to create a twin destabilizes the target's timeline. Once an ally has been the target of temporal twin, they're temporarily immune for 1 day.

Temporal Ward.name: Temporal Ward
Temporal Ward.description:
You ward a target doorway or container with a temporal trap that rewinds the personal timeline of creatures trying to open it. A creature attempting to open a warded doorway or container must attempt a Will save with the below results.

You can set a password for the ward. Any creature that attempts to open the target container, or to open or pass through the target doorway without speaking the password must attempt a save as normal.

The ward vanishes automatically once the spell's duration ends, but can be removed before then as if it were a magical trap, using your spell DC for both the Perception check to notice it and Thievery check to disable it. Both checks require the creature attempting them to have expert proficiency in order to succeed.

You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} temporal ward. The maximum number of temporal wards you can have active at a time is equal to your spellcasting ability modifier.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature is unaffected and opens the doorway or the container as normal.

Sukces The creature experiences a brief moment of déjà-vu in which they're convinced they already opened the door. They must use an additional action to open the door. If they can't or don't want to do so, the action or activity they used to open the door or container is wasted, and the door or container remains closed.

Porażka The creature is thrown briefly backwards in time. The action or activity they used to open the door or container is wasted and they're returned to the position they were located at during the start of their turn. Their turn then ends.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the temporal displacement also causes the creature to lose their bearings, making them @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Zdezorientowany} for 1 minute.

Wywyższenie (10.) The temporal ward has an unlimited duration, until it is counteracted, Dismissed, or Disarmed.

Temporary Glyph.name: Temporary Glyph
Temporary Glyph.description:
Obszar 5-foot square

You temporarily bind a hostile spell into a symbol. While Casting this Spell, you also Cast a Spell of a lower spell rank to store in the glyph. The stored spell must take 2 actions or fewer to Cast, have a hostile effect, and target one creature or have an area. Any creature that enters temporary glyph's area activates the glyph, releasing the harmful spell within. You can set a password for the glyph. Speaking it when entering the spell's area prevents the glyph from triggering. You can also set a more specific trigger to limit which types of creatures set off the glyph.

Once a spell is stored in the glyph, the glyph gains all the traits of that spell. If the stored spell can target one or more creatures, it targets the creature that set off the glyph. If it has an area, that area is centered on the creature that set off the glyph. Temporary glyph's duration ends when the glyph is triggered. The glyph is a magical trap, using your spell DC for both the Perception check to notice it and the Thievery check to disable it; both checks require the creature attempting them to be trained in order to succeed.

You can Dismiss temporary glyph.

Temporary Tool.name: Tymczasowe Narzędzie
Temporary Tool.description: Przyzywasz w dłoniach tymczasowe proste narzędzie, takie jak łopata czy lina. Istnieje ono dopóki nie zostanie użyte do pojedynczej aktywności lub przez 1 minutę, cokolwiek nastąpi pierwsze, po czym znika. Narzędzie jest w widoczny sposób tymczasowo przywołane, w związku z czym nie może zostać sprzedane ani predstawione jako prawdziwy przedmiot.

Tempt Fate.name: Tempt Fate
Tempt Fate.description:
Aktywator You or an ally within range attempts a saving throw.

You twist the forces of fate to make a moment dire or uneventful, with no in-between. The target gains a +1 status bonus to the triggering saving throw. If the saving throw's result is a success, it becomes a critical success. If it's a failure, it becomes a critical failure, and the critical failure can't be reduced by abilities that usually reduce critical failure.

If the triggering ability did not have both a critical success and critical failure condition, tempt fate fails, but you don't expend the Focus Point for Casting this Spell.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.AJkRUIdYLnt4QOOg]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Tempt Fate}

Wywyższenie (8.) The bonus on the saving throw is +2.

Tentacular Limbs.name: Tentacular Limbs
Tentacular Limbs.description:
Your arms turn into long, pliable tentacles, increasing your reach when you're delivering touch range spells and making unarmed Strikes with your arms (such as fist and claw Strikes) to 10 feet. This doesn't change the reach of your melee weapon attacks. During the duration, whenever you Cast a Spell, you can add an additional action to that spell's casting to temporarily extend your reach to 20 feet to deliver that spell.

Wywyższenie (+2) When you add an additional action to a spell to temporarily extend your reach, your reach increases by an additional 10 feet to deliver that spell.

Terminate Bloodline.name: Terminate Bloodline
Terminate Bloodline.cost: a bodily sample from the target, and valuables belonging to the target worth a total value of 100 gp × the spell rank × the target's level
Terminate Bloodline.description:
Mighty drow noble houses, including House Shraen, use this ritual to stamp out fledgling noble houses before they rise to power. At the ritual's completion, you place a contagious wasting disease upon the target creature with the intention of ending their familial bloodline.

The ritual is easiest to cast on a subdued target, typically a low-ranking member of the targeted family bloodline who is kidnapped and has their memory wiped. If the target is conscious when the ritual is cast, the target attempts a Fortitude save against the ritual's DC; on a success, the ritual fails. Otherwise, the target is automatically affected by the dying bloodline disease.

Dying Bloodline (curse, disease) Failing or critically failing this disease's Fortitude save causes the disease to progress to the next stage as normal; however, succeeding or critically succeeding at the save has no effect. The disease can be removed only by first successfully counteracting the curse and then counteracting the disease

Poziom equal to twice the ritual's rank

Stadium 1 carrier with no effect (1 month)

Stadium 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Wyczerpany} (1 week)

Stadium 3 fatigued and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 1} (1 dzień)

Stadium 4 fatigued and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 3} (1 dzień)

Stadium 5 death.

Every member of an infected creature's immediate family (blood relationship or parent or child) that comes into physical contact with that infected creature must attempt a Fortitude save or contract the disease.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature does not contract the disease and does not need to attempt further saves when coming into physical contact with that particular creature (the creature is not immune to the disease, however, and must attempt a save as normal if it comes into physical contact with a different infected family member).

Sukces The creature is not affected but must attempt another save the next time they come into physical contact with that particular infected creature.

Porażka The creature contracts the disease and can spread it in the same way as the original target.
Terminate Bloodline.target: 1 creature of a level no greater than double the terminate bloodline ritual's rank

Terrain Transposition.name: Terrain Transposition
Terrain Transposition.description: You mystically transpose your current location with another. While in a wilderness environment, you transport yourself and items you're holding to a clear space you can see within range. If you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{Preferowany Teren} and both your starting and ending position are in your favored terrain, the range increases to 180 feet. If you have an animal companion and it is adjacent to you, you can transport it along with you to an adjacent open space, but if this spell would bring any other creature with you, even in an extradimensional container, the spell is lost.

Tesseract Tunnel.name: Tesseract Tunnel
Tesseract Tunnel.description:
You race from point to point, tearing open a tunnel in space. You create a portal in your current space and then @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Bieg}, creating another portal in the space you end your Stride. Until the beginning of your next turn, any creature that enters the first portal can immediately transport itself to the exit portal as part of its move action, which adds the teleportation trait to its movement.

You can have only one tesseract tunnel open at a time; creating another causes the first to immediately close. You can use tesseract tunnel while @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.H6v1VgowHaKHnVlG]{Burrowing}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climbing}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]{Flying}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swimming} instead of Striding if you have the corresponding movement type.

Tether.name: Uwięź
Tether.description:
Używasz magicznych łańcuchów, pnączy lub innej uwięzi aby przykuć do siebie cel. Istota nadal może próbować @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Uciec}, a uwięź może być zniszczona przez nią lub jej sojuszników (uwięź ma KP 15 i 10 Punktów Żywotności). Kiedy cel pozostaje na uwięzi musisz pozostawać zasięgu 30 stóp od niego; poruszanie się dalej niż 30 stóp od celu kończy działanie zaklęcia. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Refleksu. Możesz Odwołać to zaklęćie.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Cel ponosi karę sytuacyjną –5 stóp do swojej Prędkości tak długo jak pozostaje w promieniu 30 stóp od ciebie.

Porażka Cel ponosi karę sytuacyjną –10 stóp do swojej Prędkości i nie może przemieścić się dalej niż 30 stóp od ciebie dopóki nie Ucieknie lub zaklęcie nie dobiegnie końca.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony} dopóki nie Ucieknie lub zaklęcie nie dobiegnie końca.

Wywyższenie (+1) KP uwięzi zwiększa się o 3 a jej Punkty Żywotności zwiekszają się o 10.

The Four Hunters.name: The Four Hunters
The Four Hunters.description:
This is a story of four evenly matched hunters who sought to capture a falling star. Each hunter was known by the region they came from, and this spell focuses on one of their attributes. When you cast this spell, you must choose East, North, South, or West.

  • East was steady and optimistic. The target gains 5 temporary Hit Points and a +1 status bonus to Athletics for 1 round.
  • North was careful and cautious. The target can Step as a free action and gains a +1 status bonus to Survival for 1 round.
  • South was clever and cunning. The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} and gains a +1 status bonus to Stealth for 1 round.
  • West was bold and competitive. The target gains a +10-foot status bonus to their land Speed and a +1 status bonus to Acrobatics for 1 round.

1 You quickly remind yourself of the story, granting only yourself the benefit.

2 You tell a trusted ally within 30 feet this story, granting them the benefit.

3 You impart this tale on all of your allies within 30 feet, granting them the benefit.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Bfcl6jQBEv505DM2]{Efekt Zaklęcia: The Four Hunters}

The Parrot's Whisper.name: The Parrot's Whisper
The Parrot's Whisper.description:
You call forth an echo of the gossiping parrot from the tale of the Witch and the Weaver to whisper the secrets of a creature you can see within range. The garrulous parrot is known to chatter on for some time while deciphering the information you seek. The target must attempt a Will saving throw.

Krytyczny Sukces The parrot chatters about various random topics for 1 round and reveals no relevant information.

Sukces The parrot tells you the target's highest weakness at the start of your next turn. In the meantime, the parrot chatters about various random topics.

Porażka The parrot tells you the target's highest weakness immediately, but sticks around for 1 round to chatter.

Krytyczna Porażka The parrot tells you the target's highest weakness immediately, and you can ask the parrot one question about the target creature. You might need to collaborate with the GM to narrow down the question. At the start of your next turn, the parrot answers the question truthfully.

The Queen's Rainbow.name: The Queen's Rainbow
The Queen's Rainbow.description: You tell the story of the Queen of Bees and her retinue trying to pass through a rainbow on their way to visit the King of Spiders. You conjure forth a large, transparent rainbow. Creatures who enter or begin their turn in the rainbow's space must succeed at a Fortitude saving throw or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} for 1 round (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiony} for 1 round on a critical failure).

The Unseeing Blade Master.name: The Unseeing Blade Master
The Unseeing Blade Master.description:
There are many legends of blade masters who, not wanting to rely on flawed mortal eyes, learned to fight through reliance on both their other keen senses and knowledge from the universe itself. Those who intentionally seek out the path often do so by running through forms in thick clouds of incense.

Making a Strike against an enemy you can see is anathema to this ritual and immediately ends its benefits. If the ritual is ended in this way, you must conduct an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.7Fd4lxozd11MQ55N]{Pokuta} ritual before attempting this ritual again.

Krytyczny Sukces As success, except you can instead defeat an enemy in single combat that both uses a sword and is higher level than you.

Sukces You call a blessing into your sword to guide you on the path and are bound by the ritual's anathema. Once you've used that sword against 20 enemies, each significant enough to grant XP, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.y2XeMe1F18lIyo59]{Blind-Fight} feat.

Porażka The incense is dispersed by a strange gust of wind and you learn nothing.

Krytyczna Porażka The sword you're intending to use for the ritual becomes broken. If you aren't permanently blind, you're instead @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiony} for 1 month and can't repeat this ritual during that time.

The World's a Stage.name: The World's a Stage
The World's a Stage.cost: costumes and a stage large enough to fit all casters;
The World's a Stage.description:
This famous ritual is a sophisticated example of symbolic magic, binding fate and fortune to follow a prepared script. To conduct the ritual, you and the secondary casters must put on a long-form, multi-person, plot-based performance that's usually a play or opera, though more unusual performances have been known. You take the role of the director, while the secondary casters are either actors (Performance) or significant backstage figures, such as set or costume designers (Crafting). The casting time of the ritual includes both preparations and rehearsals of various sorts and the actual performance, which must be at least an hour long.

The performance presents current events and offers a particular vision on how they resolve, often in metaphorical or allegorical format (proposing the overthrow of a tyrant by referring to a different, legendary tyrant who was overthrown, or suggesting that a murderous secret might be uncovered by presenting an allegory of truth defeating murder). This performance must be presented to an audience of at least a hundred people, a majority of whom must both be connected, at least peripherally, to the events in question (the people of the tyrant's city, or the residents of the village where the murder occurred) and who must understand what the metaphor or allegory actually refers to. For the magic to spark, the performance must declare its purpose loudly and clearly to the parties most concerned. If a major antagonist featured in the performance is in the audience and the ritual is a success, you get a critical success instead.

Krytyczny Sukces Something sublime sparks between performance and audience, and destiny conspires to push events in the right direction. You and each secondary caster can reroll up to three skill checks at any point during the duration of the ritual after determining the results, as long as the skill check is connected to ensuring the topic of the performance comes true (to sneak past the tyrant's guards or find the murder weapon, for instance).

Sukces As critical success except the sparks of destiny are weaker, so each caster can reroll only a single skill check.

Porażka The ritual has no effect.

Krytyczna Porażka The performance is a dramatic and horrendous botch, and fate strikes out at the casters. You and each secondary caster are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} for the next month, and this condition can't be removed by anything less than a wish or similarly powerful magic.

Thermal Remedy.name: Thermal Remedy
Thermal Remedy.description:
You adjust the delicate levels of bitter ingredients in food and drink to draw out their full restorative and fortifying properties. Choose one of the benefits listed below. Any creature that consumes the targeted drink or food gains that benefit. Up to 10 creatures can partake in the meal, and a creature gets no extra benefit for consuming more than one portion.

  • Gain 5 temporary Hit Points.
  • Gain resistance 2 to fire.
  • Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against disease.

Wywyższenie (4.) Your remedy provides two benefits of your choice instead of one. The temporary Hit Points increase to 10, the resistance to fire increases to 3, the bonus against disease increases to +2, and the duration is 2 hours.

Wywyższenie (7.) The remedy provides all three benefits. The temporary Hit Points increase to 15, the resistance to fire increases to 5, the bonus against disease increases to +3, and the duration is 8 hours.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.7wHYSgNG6LaxxlOz]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Thermal Remedy}
Thermal Remedy.target: up to 1 gallon of non-magical liquid or up to 5 pounds of food

Thermal Stasis.name: Thermal Stasis
Thermal Stasis.description:
The same abilities that let you raise or lower thermal energy also let you keep it at a safe medium. The target gains resistance 2 against fire damage and resistance 2 against cold damage.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Y6aNYnGVXdAMvL7Y]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Thermal Stasis}

Wywyższenie (+1) Each resistance increases by 2.

Thicket of Knives.name: Gąszcz Ostrzy
Thicket of Knives.description:
Tworzysz liczne widmowe kopie swojej ręki dzierżącej broń, ukrywając swoje prawdziwe ruchy i czyniąc swoje ataki nieprzewidywalnymi. Zyskujesz premię statusową +2 do testów Oszukiwania na rzecz Finty. Jeśli jesteś niewyszkolony w Oszukiwaniu, możesz użyć akcji Finty mimo to i dodajesz swój poziom jako wartość swojej premii z biegłości.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.8ecGfjmxnBY3WWao]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Gąszcz Ostrzy}

Thief of Fortune.name: Thief of Fortune
Thief of Fortune.description:
Seeing another creature improve themself with magic, you reach out and seize its benefits for yourself. Attempt a counteract check against the target spell effect. If you successfully counteract the effect, the effect does not end. Instead, you gain the effect of the target spell as well. If you would not be a valid target for the spell, you do not gain any of its benefits.

The spell's duration is halved as you siphon off its magical energy for yourself. Each round that both you and the original creature are affected by the spell counts for two rounds when determining the spell's duration. You can Dismiss the spell.
Thief of Fortune.target: one beneficial spell effect currently affecting a creature, with a duration of 10 minutes or less

Thoughtful Gift.name: Przemyślany Prezent
Thoughtful Gift.description:
Teleportujesz jeden trzymany w ręce obiekt o Naręczu lekkim lub znikomym ku celowi. Obiekt pojawia się natychmiastowo w ręce celu, jeśli cel ma wolną rękę, lub u jego stóp w przeciwnym wypadku. Cel wie, jaki obiekt masz zamiar ku niemu wysłać. Jeśli cel jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Nieprzytomny} lub odmawia przyjęcia twojego prezentu, lub jeśli zaklęcie skutkowałoby przeteleportowaniem istoty (nawet jeśli istota znajduje się w międzywymiarowym pojemniku), zaklęcie rozprasza się.

Wywyższenie (3.) Zasięg zaklęcia zwiększa się do 500 stóp.

Wywyższenie (5.) Jak na kręgu 3. oraz maksymalne Naręcze obiektu zwiększa się do 1. Możesz Rzucić Zaklęcie za pomocą 3 akcji zamiast 1; zrobienie tego zwiększa zasięg zaklęcia do 1 mili i usuwa wymóg linii wzroku do celu, ale musisz znać cel wyjątkowo dobrze.

Threatening Mimicry.name: Threatening Mimicry
Threatening Mimicry.description:
You appear larger and stronger to nearby creatures, appearing to possess threatening features like antlers, claws, or poison to their senses. Each non-allied creature in the area must attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces Efekt nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1}. This condition doesn't decrease at the end of its turn if it damaged you during that turn.

Porażka As success, but @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2}.

Krytyczna Porażka As success, but @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 3}.

Threefold Aspect.name: Threefold Aspect
Threefold Aspect.description:
This spell allows you to change between three versions of yourself of different ages: a maiden (young adult), a mother (adult), or a matriarch (elderly). Choose one when you Cast the Spell. While the spell lasts, you can change the age to any of the three or to your natural age by Sustaining the spell. Your form always looks like you regardless of the age, and creatures who know you still recognize you and can tell your age is different.

Threefold aspect alters your physical appearance and personality to present an authentic version of yourself at various ages. This grants you a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to pass as the chosen age, and you can add your level as a proficiency bonus to these checks even if you're untrained. Furthermore, unless a creature specifically uses a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Szukanie} action or otherwise carefully examines you, it doesn't get a chance to notice that you aren't at your true age. You can Dismiss this spell.

Threefold Limb.name: Threefold Limb
Threefold Limb.description:
You temporarily transform one of your limbs into water, taking the form of ice, liquid water, or steam as you desire. Make a melee spell attack roll. On a hit, the target takes 2k6 damage; the type of damage dealt and any additional effect depends on the form you choose. On a critical hit, double the damage.

  • Ice The limb deals cold damage, and the target takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speeds until the start of your next turn. This spell gains the cold trait.

    @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.cfREcFI2ZhrOlm3C]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Threefold Limb (Ice)}

  • Liquid Water The limb deals bludgeoning damage and you can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.lOE4yjUnETTdaf2T]{Przemieszczenie} the target up to 10 feet.
  • Steam The limb deals fire damage and steam clings to the target, making all creatures @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} to them until the start of your next turn or they perform an Interact action to wave the steam away. This spell gains the fire trait.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 2k6.

Thunderburst.name: Eksplozja Grzmotu
Thunderburst.description:
Tworzysz potężny podmuch powietrza i głośny huk grzmotu, zadając 2k6 obrażeń obuchowych i 2k6 obrażeń od dźwięku. Każda istota w obszarze musi wykonać rzut obronny Krzepy.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia i jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Ogłuchła} na 1 minutę.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota odnosi podwójne obrażenia i jest ogłuchła na 1 godzinę.

Wywyższenie (+2) Obrażenia obu typów zwiększają się o 2k6 a obszar zwiększa się o 5 stóp.

Thundering Dominance.name: Grzmiąca Dominacja
Thundering Dominance.description:
Otaczasz cel potężną aurą drapieżności i wzmaczniasz jego wokalizacje. Zyskuje on premię statusową +1 do testów Zastraszania. Raz podczas trwania tego zaklęcia, może on wykonać akcję @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.6SAdjml3OZw0BZnn]{Grzmiący Ryk}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.81TfqzTfIqkQA4Dy]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Grzmiąca Dominacja}

Wywyższenie (+2) Premia statusowa do testów Zastraszania wzrasta o 1 (do maksymalnie premii statusowej +4 na 8. kręgu) a obrażenia od ryku zwiększają się o 2k8.

Thunderous Strike.name: Grzmiący Cios
Thunderous Strike.description:
Zamachujesz się swoją masywną bronią, wywołując falę dźwięczących wibracji powalających istoty. Wykonaj Cios w zwarciu twoją bronią dwuręczną. Każda istota w @Template[cone|distance:15] od ciebie musi wykonać podstawowy rzut obronny Krzepy przeciw twojemu ST zaklęć lub otrzymuje 2 obrażenia od dźwięku. Przy krytycznej porażce istota jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalana}. Cel twojego Ciosu musi być w obszarze stożka lub efekt zawodzi.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1.
Thunderous Strike.requirements: You're wielding a melee weapon in two hands

Thunderstrike.name: Uderzenie Gromu
Thunderstrike.description:
Przyzywasz wiązkę błyskawicy, która spada na cel z donośnym hukiem, zadając mu 1k12 obrażeń od elektryczności i 1k4 obrażeń od dźwięku z podstawowym rzutem obronnym Refleksu. Cel złożony z metalu lub noszący metalowy pancerz ponosi karę sytuacyjną –1 do swojego rzutu obronnego, a jeśli odniesie obrażenia od zaklęcia staje się @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1} na 1 rundę.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k12 od elektryczności i 1k4 od dźwięku.

Tidal Surge.name: Tidal Surge
Tidal Surge.description: You call forth a tremendous wave to move the target either in a body of water or on the ground. You move the target up to 10 feet in any direction along the ground or 20 feet through a body of water. An unwilling target can attempt a Fortitude save, and it avoids being moved if it succeeds.

Timber.name: Kłoda
Timber.description:
Tworzysz w swojej przestrzeni małe martwe drzewo, które upada na wszystkie istoty na jego drodze, po czym natychmiast ulega rozkładowi. Wszystkie istoty w obszarze odnoszą 2k4 obrażeń obuchowych z podstawowym rzutem obronnym Refleksu. Jeśli istota odniesie na rzucie obronnym krytyczną porażkę, konar trafia ją bezpośrednio i staje się ona @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczona} co końca swojej następnej tury.

Wywyższenie (+1) Wstępne obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k4.

Time Beacon.name: Time Beacon
Time Beacon.description:
You create a beacon in time to return to it if things go wrong. You can cast time beacon only on your turn. Keep careful track of everything that happens this turn after you cast time beacon. At the end of your turn, you can choose to rewind time back to just after you cast time beacon, removing all effects of your turn since then.

Curses, traps, and other harmful effects that happen during your turn might prevent you from returning to the beacon if they're powerful enough. If you were affected by any harmful effects during your turn after casting time beacon, in order to return to your beacon, time beacon attempts a counteract check against each such effect. If it fails at any of these checks, you can't return. After returning to the time beacon, the spell ends.

Time Jump.name: Time Jump
Time Jump.description:
You leap forward a few seconds in time, appearing across the battlefield in the blink of an eye. You gain 2 actions, each of which must be used to Leap, Stand, Step, or Stride. If you have an appropriate Speed, you can add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.H6v1VgowHaKHnVlG]{Burrow}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Wspinaczka}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]{Fly}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim} to this list. While you take these actions, time pauses. All other creatures are completely unaware of your actions, can't speak, and can't use any actions that would be triggered by your movement.

While you're taking these actions, you can't take any other actions, including any that would be triggered by the move actions. Once the actions are complete, time starts again, and to onlookers, you seem to have suddenly teleported across the distance you traveled. Leaping forward through time is disorienting, so if you use time jump again within 1 minute of using the spell, you become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 4} for 1 minute.

Time Pocket.name: Time Pocket
Time Pocket.description:
You fling the target item forward in time and link it to the future of the creature holding it. The item disappears. When the spell ends, the item reappears with the creature that was holding it when you Cast the Spell. If the creature has enough hands free to hold the item, it appears in their hands. Otherwise, it falls to the ground in the creature's space.

You can Dismiss the spell, and it automatically ends if you're reduced to 0 Hit Points or cast time pocket again.
Time Pocket.target: one item of 1 Bulk or less that a willing creature is holding

Time Sense.name: Wyczucie Czasu
Time Sense.description:
Kiedy Rzucasz Zaklęcie zyskujesz doskonałe wyczucie czasu. Możesz dowiedzieć się jaka jest dokładnie godzina, co do sekundy. Zamiast tego możesz pozyskać idealne pojęcie o dniu kalendarzowym, jeśli masz wiedzę w tej dziedzinie - jeśli jesteś wytrenowany w Przyrodzie, możesz dowiedzieć się jak ile czasu pozostało do wschodu słońca oraz ile dni do najbliższego przesilenia. Jeśli jesteś wytrenowany w umiejętności Obeznania w Astronomii, możesz dowiedzieć się kiedy dokładnie rozpocznie się i zakończy dowolna możliwa do przewidzenia koniunkcja astronomiczna, i tak dalej.

Możesz zyskać premię statusową +1 do jednego ataku, testu Percepcji, rzutu obronnego lub testu umiejętności, którego podejmiesz się w tej samej turze, w której rzuciłeś wyczucie czasu, o ile wymaga on ekstremalnie dokładnego wyczucia czasu. Jeśli zdecydujesz się wykorzystać ten bonus, nie możesz go ponownie zyskac przez następną godzinę.

Time Skip.name: Time Skip
Time Skip.description:
You manipulate time around your ally, pushing them forward a few moments in time. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Przyspieszony} on its next turn and can use the action only to Step, Stride, or Strike.

Wywyższenie (6th) You can affect up to four willing creatures other than yourself within range.

Timely Tutor.name: Timely Tutor
Timely Tutor.description:
You serve as an astral connection between your eidolon or familiar and the Akashic Record-a demiplane consisting of a comprehensive psychic library-then turn to the creature for advice. If you cast this spell on your familiar, your familiar adds your spellcasting ability modifier on checks to Recall Knowledge with the Lore skill of your choice, much like it does for Acrobatics and Stealth. Your familiar must have the speech familiar ability in order to share any information it learns with you. If you cast this spell on your eidolon, it instead becomes trained in the Lore skill.

If you lose physical contact with the target, its connection to the Akashic Record is severed and timely tutor immediately ends.

Tireless Worker.name: Tireless Worker
Tireless Worker.description: You suppress your choice of one of the following conditions that's affecting the target: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.D5mg6Tc7Jzrj6ro7]{Przeciążony}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Wyczerpany}. The duration of the condition doesn't elapse while it is suppressed, so if you don't remove the effect that caused the condition, the condition returns after the spell's duration expires.

Tomorrow's Dawn.name: Tomorrow's Dawn
Tomorrow's Dawn.description:
The golden light of a new dawn and the promise of life beyond death radiates from your body. You cast bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet) and gain mental resistance 5. Any nindoru fiend or undead that begins its turn adjacent to you must attempt a Will save with the following results.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.SyF5kpZlZuBF4lMf]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Tomorrow's Dawn}

Krytyczny Sukces The creature is unaffected and immune to this spell's effects for the remainder of the spell's duration.

Sukces The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1} until the end of its turn.

Porażka The creature is sickened 1. In addition, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} until the end of its next turn.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 2} and the creature remains slowed 1 for the rest of the spell's duration.

Wywyższenie (6.) You gain mental resistance 10.

Wywyższenie (8.) You gain mental resistance 15.

Tortoise and the Hare.name: Tortoise and the Hare
Tortoise and the Hare.description:
You prove that slow and steady doesn't always win the race by turning a foe into a proverbial tortoise and yourself or an ally into a hare, siphoning some of the foe's speed and granting it to the other target. The effects depend on the foe's Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces The targets are unaffected.

Sukces The foe is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} for 1 round, and the other target is unaffected.

Porażka The foe is slowed 1 for 3 rounds and the other target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Przyspieszony} for 1 round. It can use the extra action to Step, Stride, or Strike.

Krytyczna Porażka The foe is slowed 1 for 3 minutes and the other target is quickened for 1 minute. It can use the extra action to Step, Stride, or Strike.
Tortoise and the Hare.target: 1 foe, and either yourself or 1 ally

Torturous Trauma.name: Katorżniczy Uraz
Torturous Trauma.description:
Za pomocą tego zaklęcia, zrodzonego z sadystycznej miłości Kemnebiego do tortur, obijasz wewnętrzne narządy celu, nie pozostawiając zewnętrznych śladów niebywałego bólu, którego jej przysporzyłeś. Cel odnosi obrażenia obuchowe w liczbie 1k4 + twój modyfikator cechy rzucania zaklęć z podstawowym rzutem obronnym Krzepy. Przy krytycznej porażce, cel staje się dodatkowo @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Wyczerpany} do początku twojej następnej tury. Zaklęcie nie wywiera efektu na istoty, które nie posiadają organów wewnętrznych.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia obuchowe zwiększają się o 1k4.

Touch of Death.name: Touch of Death
Touch of Death.description:
Make a melee unarmed Strike. If you hit and the target is alive, anytime during the duration, you can spend a single action, which has the auditory and concentrate traits, to speak a word of death that could instantly slay it. The target must attempt a Fortitude save.
