Krytyczny Sukces The target survives, the spell ends, and the target is then temporarily immune for 24 hours.

Sukces The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1} and takes @Damage[5*@item.level] damage, the spell ends, and the target is then temporarily immune for 24 hours.

Porażka The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 3} and takes @Damage[10*@item.level] damage. The spell's duration continues, but the target is then temporarily immune for 24 hours against being killed by touch of death.

Krytyczna Porażka The target dies.

If you cast touch of death again, the effects of any touch of death you had previously cast end.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 10 on a failure, or 5 on a success.

Touch of Obedience.name: Touch of Obedience
Touch of Obedience.description:
Your imperious touch erodes the target's willpower, making it easier to control. The target attempts a Will save. Regardless of the result, it's then temporarily immune for 1 hour.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 1} until the end of your next turn.

Porażka The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 2} until the end of your next turn.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 2} for 1 minute and is forced to its knees, becoming prone.

Touch of Undeath.name: Dotyk Nieśmierci
Touch of Undeath.description:
Atakujesz siły życiowe celu nieśmiercią, zadając 1k6 obrażeń od pustki. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Krzepy.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Cel odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia a leczące efekty witalności przywracają mu tylko połowę normalnych Punktów Żywotności przez okres 1 rundy.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel odnosi podwójne obrażenia a leczące efekty witalności przywracają mu tylko połowę normalnych Punktów Żywotności przez okres 1 minuty.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k6.

Touch of the Moon.name: Touch of the Moon
Touch of the Moon.description:
When you touch the target, a symbol of the moon appears on its forehead, glowing with soft moonlight. The target glows with dim light in a 20-foot radius. It also gets a benefit based on a phase of the moon, starting with the new moon and changing to the next phase at the end of each of its turns.

  • New Moon The target receives no benefit.
  • Waxing Moon The target gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +4 status bonus to damage rolls.
  • Full Moon The target gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, AC, and saves, and a +4 status bonus to damage.
  • Waning Moon The target gains a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws. After this phase, return to the new moon.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.3hDKcbhn0j6DsRgm]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Touch of the Moon}

Touch of the Void.name: Touch of the Void
Touch of the Void.description:
You infuse the target with void energy, healing undead or damaging a living creature.

  • Willing Undead Creature The target regains 6 Hit Points. If the target is yourself, you also gain a +2 status bonus to damage rolls for 1 round.

  • Living Creature The target takes 1k6 void damage with a basic Fortitude save; on a failure, the target also takes a –2 status penalty to AC for 1 round.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.GhNVAYtoF5hK3AlD]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Touch of the Void}

Wywyższenie (+1) The amount of healing increases by 6, and the damage to a living target increases by 1k6.
Touch of the Void.target: 1 willing undead creature or 1 living creature

Toxic Cloud.name: Toxic Cloud
Toxic Cloud.description:
You conjure a poisonous fog. This functions as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{Mist}, except the area moves 10 feet away from you each round. You deal 6k8 poison damage to each breathing creature that starts its turn in the spell's area. You can Dismiss the spell.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k8.

Trade Death for Life.name: Trade Death for Life
Trade Death for Life.description:
Your patron steals life from one of your enemies to grant it to another. The target takes 1k4 void damage (basic Fortitude save). If the target takes damage, a willing creature within the hex's range gains fast healing 1 for as long as you Sustain the hex. The target takes damage only once from this spell, whether or not you Sustain it.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.oNAqqcxPjzPCJJmW]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Trade Death for Life}

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k4 and the fast healing increases by 1.

Transcribe Conflict.name: Transcribe Conflict
Transcribe Conflict.description:
You cause a sheet of paper to appear in your hand, and a moment later a detailed description of a combat you experienced within the last hour is recorded on that sheet of paper in a language that you know of your choice. The description is detailed enough that anyone who spends 1 minute reading the page can attempt to Recall Knowledge about the event as if they had been there, but the primary purpose of the transcribed conflict is to give you additional insight into the fight by allowing you to study the conflict and learn from errors or tactical blunders participants in the battle may have committed.

When you cast this spell, choose a type of foe in the fight you transcribed and attempt to Recall Knowledge about that foe using your spell DC-10 instead of your skill modifier in an appropriate skill to do so. For this action, you can't use any special abilities, reactions, or free actions that trigger when you Recall Knowledge. If you are successful, you not only learn information about that foe as determined by the GM, but for the remainder of transcribe conflict's duration, you gain a +1 status bonus to Initiative checks in combats where you face that exact kind of foe. For example, if you made the check against a wrath demon, the bonus would apply only to wrath demons, not to other demons. The GM decides if a foe who is disguised grants you this bonus.

Wywyższenie (5.) The bonus to initiative increases to +2 and the duration increases to 8 hours.

Wywyższenie (8.) The bonus to initiative increases to +3 and the duration increases until the next time you do your daily preparations, and the status bonus to Initiative checks applies to any allies who took part in the fight you transcribed as long as they are within 30 feet of you when you cast the spell.

Transcribe Moment.name: Transcribe Moment
Transcribe Moment.description: You instantly create a small, permanent scroll that contains a magically precise written description of your current surroundings in every direction. Any creature who spends 1 minute to read the scroll-written in a language of your choice that you know-immediately sees and experiences your surroundings during the moment that you recorded (including whatever events transpired that round) exactly as you experienced it. This depiction records only what you can sense yourself. For example, if you can't see invisible creatures, the depiction doesn't reveal them even to a reader who could normally see them; a reader can't use their Perception to notice details you missed, but they can attempt a check to Recall Knowledge based on what they just experienced if they have knowledge that you lack. You can have multiple scrolls from transcribe moment in existence at the same time, up to a number equal to your Intelligence modifier. If you Cast the Spell again while already at the maximum number of scrolls, choose one of the current scrolls to lose its magic, then create the new one.

Translate.name: Tłumaczenie
Translate.description:
Cel może zrozumieć znaczenie jednego wybranego języka, który słyszy lub czyta w momencie kiedy rzucasz to zaklęcie. Nie pozwala mu to rozumieć szyfrów, języka spowitego metaforą i tym podobnych (wedle uznania MG). Jeśli cel słyszy lub czyta wiele różnych języków i jest tego świadomy, może wybrać, który z nich chce zrozumieć; w przeciwnym wypadku, wybierz losowo jeden z nich.

Wywyższenie (3.) Cel może również mówić w danym języku.

Wywyższenie (4.) Możesz objąć działaniem zaklęcia do 10 istot i cele te również mogą mówić tym językiem.

Translocate.name: Translokacja
Translocate.description:
Natychmiastowo przenosisz siebie oraz wszystkie noszone i trzymane przez ciebie przedmioty ze swojego obecnego pola, do niezajętego pola w zasięgu, które widzisz. Jeśli miałoby to przenieść z tobą inną istotę — nawet jeśli nosisz ją przy sobie z użyciem międzywymiarowego pojemnika — zaklęcie zostaje utracone.

Wywyższenie (5.) Zasięg zwiększa się do 1 mili. Nie musisz widzieć miejsca doceloweg, tak długo jak byłeś już tam w przeszłości i znasz jego położenie i odległość względem swojej pozycji. Następnie jesteś tymczasowo niewrażliwy na to zaklęcie na 1 godzinę.

Transmigrate.name: Transmigrate
Transmigrate.cost: heron feathers, incense, and specially prepared sakaki wood
Transmigrate.gmNote:
A slain creature whose soul became trapped between life and death in the Willowshore mindscape can't escape either back to life or into the afterlife. With the use of this ritual, you can temporarily transmigrate out of the mindscape to appear in the living world in a solid body made of ectoplasm, where you can exist for a short time in a hazy area between life and undeath.

Before casting this ritual, the PCs must construct a kiln made of earth and stone that is large enough for all of them to lie down inside of. Once the kiln is complete, the PCs must prepare beds of clay for themselves in the kiln, surrounding each one with heron feathers placed upright in the clay around the bed. When the four-hour casting of the ritual is completed, the PCs become infused with spiritual energy and must lie down on the still-wet clay beds, after which assistants come in to encase them in a three-inch-thick layer of additional clay. Short lengths of bamboo held in the mouth allow the clay-encased PCs to continue breathing. The incense and sakaki wood is then placed atop each encased PC, the kiln is closed, and the fires lit. Each PC is baked alive within their clay shells, but if the ritual is successful, they're sent into the living world as ectoplasmic apparitions.

Krytyczny Sukces The clay cracks open and the PCs transmigrate into the border between life and death, a small mindscape in which they face a challenge they must overcome if they're to transmigrate into the living world. This encounter is presented on page 45 of this book. During this encounter, the PCs gain a +1 status bonus to all Strikes, saving throws, and skill checks. If they defeat the encounter, they fully transmigrate into the living world for up to 1 month, and retain a +1 status bonus to all skill checks for the first week of this month.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.8jaYbxnP4Z5wvnQs]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Transmigrate (Encounter)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.FqG4zXjSoxq9qTlf]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Transmigrate (Skill)}

Sukces As critical success, but without the status bonus to skill checks.

Porażka As a critical success, but extra energy is sapped from the PCs. They gain a –1 status penalty to all Strikes, saving throws, and skill checks made in the border between life and death, and if they transmigrate to the living world, they also take a –1 status penalty to all skill checks for the first week of the ritual's month-long duration.

Krytyczna Porażka The ritual fails, and the PCs do not enter the border between life and death. Instead, they each take @Damage[9d6[fire]] damage as they each bake in their clay shells (@Check[fortitude|dc:24|basic] save) before the failed ritual snuffs out the flames and cracks open their partially fired clay casings. The ritual can be attempted again after 24 hours have passed.

Wywyższenie (5.) As long as the Tan Sugi stands tall above Kugaptee's grave (as it does, after the climax of the previous adventure) and Willowshore's Eternal Lantern is lit in both the mindscape and the living world, you can draw upon the artifact's power to transmigrate the entire Willowshore mindscape. This more complex version of the ritual has a cast time of 5 days and affects the entire mindscape. Furthermore, this ritual can only be attempted after the first day of the new year in the mindscape (the 72. day of this adventure), as it also draws upon that milestone societal event to work its magic. Any attempt to cast this version of transmigrate before either of those two requirements are fulfilled causes the casting to fail as it begins, before any checks are attempted or its costs are paid. This version of the ritual must be cast near Willowshore's Eternal Lantern, which is located on the southern side of Dawnstep Bridge. As with the 4. kręgu version of transmigrate, this ritual requires the creation of a kiln within 30 feet of the Eternal Lantern, within which a scale model of the town of Willowshore must be crafted from clay. On the first day of casting, the kiln itself is prepared and anointed with aromatic oils. On the second day, a platform of sakaki wood slats is built in the kiln and then anointed with additional oils. On the third day, the town of Willowshore is sculpted on the platform from clay. On the fourth day, heron feathers and sticks of incense are placed in the sculpture's still drying clay; the sticks of incense are lit and continually replaced through the day as they burn. Finally, on the fifth day, the kiln is lit and the sculpture is fired. The next day, as the people of Willowshore awaken from the ritual, its effects become apparent. See "Concluding the Adventure" on page 61 and Chapter 1 of the next adventure for more details.

Krytyczny Sukces The Willowshore mindscape transmigrates wholly into the living world. The full extent of what transmigrates depends on how many Preparation Points remain unspent at the end of this adventure, but the Critical Success at this ritual grants the party an additional 12 Preparation Points to determine this success, as detailed at the start of the next adventure.

Sukces As critical success, without bonus Preparation Points.

Porażka The ritual fails, but a new attempt can be made after 24 hours have passed.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the failed ritual also spreads waves of despair through town, causing food stores to rot away and buildings to take damage as if affected by years of neglect. The party loses 12 of their remaining Preparation Points, deducted as they see fit from Hope Points, Food Points, and Security Points. If the party can't deduct the full 12 points from their remaining Preparation Points, reduce all points to 0. Their next attempt to cast the ritual at 5. kręgu takes a –2 status penalty to its checks.
Transmigrate.secondarycheck: Crafting, Nature, Society, or Willowshore Lore

Transmute Rock And Mud.name: Transmute Rock And Mud
Transmute Rock And Mud.description:
Area 2 adjacent 10-foot cubes

You warp the structure of earthen material, turning rock into mud or mud into rock. Choose one of these two options when you Cast the Spell.

  • Rock to Mud You transform non-magical, unworked, and unattended stone in the area into an equal volume of mud. If you Cast this Spell on a stone floor, it becomes difficult terrain; if the resulting mud is at least 3 feet deep, it is greater difficult terrain, or the creature can try to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim} through it (@Check[athletics|dc:10|traits:action:swim]). If the mud is deep enough that a creature can't reach the bottom, the creature must Swim to move through it. If you Cast this Spell on a ceiling, the falling mud deals @Damage[8d6[bludgeoning]] damage (@Check[reflex|basic] save) and spreads out, creating difficult terrain in an area 10 feet larger in radius than the original spell's area. Once the rock is transformed into mud, the mud is non-magical and remains until natural conditions cause it to dry out or otherwise disperse.
  • Mud to Rock Mud in the area turns into unworked stone. If creatures are in the mud when it is transformed to stone, they must attempt a @Check[reflex] saving throw.
    • Krytyczny Sukces The creature escapes the mud and is atop the stone, unaffected.
    • Sukces The creature climbs out of the mud as it turns to rock and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony} atop the stone.
    • Porażka The creature is partially stuck in the mud and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Pochwycony} for 1 round or until it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes}, whichever comes first.
    • Krytyczna Porażka The creature is entirely stuck. It is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Spętany} for 1 round or until it Escapes, whichever comes first.

Wywyższenie (+2) Add an additional 10-foot cube to the area, adjacent to at least one of the other cubes.

Travel by Turtle.name: Travel by Turtle
Travel by Turtle.description:
You conjure an intelligent sea turtle, who agrees to carry you upon its shell on a water journey. This turtle must be conjured into a large body of water within range, such as a lake or broad river. The turtle conjured is Large, is capable of carrying one Medium creature or up to four Small creatures, and has a swim Speed of 30 feet. The turtle doesn't engage in combat and doesn't put itself intentionally into harm's way, but it does convey you to a destination of your choice and follows your suggestions. The turtle otherwise functions as a boat, save that it controls itself and doesn't need to be piloted.

Wywyższenie (5th) The turtle's size increases to Huge, making it capable of carrying one Large creature, up to four Medium creatures, or up to 16 Small creatures. Its swim Speed increases to 40 feet, and the duration increases to 1 day.

Wywyższenie (7th) The turtle's size increases to Gargantuan, making it capable of carrying one Huge creature, up to four Large creatures, up to 16 Medium creatures, or up to 32 Small creatures. Its swim Speed increases to 50 feet, and the duration increases to 1 week.

Wywyższenie (9th) The turtle's size increases to Gargantuan, making it capable of carrying two Huge creatures, up to eight Large creatures, up to 32 Medium creatures, or up to 64 Small creatures. Its swim Speed increases to 60 feet, and the duration increases to 1 month.

Traveler's Transit.name: Traveler's Transit
Traveler's Transit.description:
You add power to your muscles, allowing you to swim or climb walls with ease. When you Cast this Spell, you gain either a climb Speed or a swim Speed. The Speed is equal to your land Speed.

Wywyższenie (5.) You can choose to gain a fly Speed.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Ig9p2rDXGYHpEuTx]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Traveler's Transit}

Traveling Workshop.name: Traveling Workshop
Traveling Workshop.description:
Your apparition guides you through complex procedures while using your magic to provide you with whatever tools you need. For the duration of this spell, you are trained in Crafting and Thievery. When you Cast the Spell and as long as you Sustain it, your apparition provides you with an array of simple tools, granting you use of an alchemist's toolkit, a repair kit, and a thieves' toolkit; these tools are made of ephemeral magic and disappear if they leave your possession.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.qXWCvqt24iczeN8V]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Traveling Workshop}

You can cast this spell as an exploration or downtime activity with a casting time of 10 minutes; when you do, its duration increases to 8 hours (enough to complete 1 day of work), and you also gain an alchemist's lab and functioning forge. You are always treated as having spent a day of work setting up when using this spell to help you Craft an item and have whatever materials you need to Repair an item in your possession. You can't use a traveling workshop to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QyzlsLrqM0EEwd7j]{Earn Income} and any item you Craft using it disappears moments after it leaves your possession, making it unwise to Craft anything other than consumable items you intend to use yourself. A crafter in the vault is extremely proud of work you do together when using the spell in this way and demands to see the results of your work together. When you cast traveling workshop as an exploration or downtime activity, you must continue to choose crafter in the vault as one of your attuned apparitions during your next daily preparations until such time as you've used any Crafted items in combat.

Wywyższenie (3rd) Your proficiency in Crafting and Thievery is expert.

Wywyższenie (5th) Your proficiency in Crafting and Thievery is master.

Wywyższenie (9th) Your proficiency in Crafting and Thievery is legendary.

Tree of Seasons.name: Tree of Seasons
Tree of Seasons.description:
You cause a Small tree to instantly sprout in an unoccupied space on the ground. Four seedpods grow from the tree, each filled with the magic of a different one of the four seasons. A creature can Interact to pluck one of the pods, and can then either throw it up to 30 feet as part of the same action or do so with a separate Interact action later. When thrown, a pod explodes in a @Template[burst|distance:5], dealing 6k6 damage with a basic Reflex save against your spell DC. The damage type depends on the season of the pod: electricity for spring, fire for summer, poison for autumn, or cold for winter. When the spell ends, the tree withers away and any remaining pods rot, leaving behind non-magical seeds.

@Damage[(@item.level)d6[cold]]

@Damage[(@item.level)d6[electricity]]

@Damage[(@item.level)d6[fire]]

@Damage[(@item.level)d6[poison]]

Wywyższenie (+1) The burst's damage increases by 1k6.

Tremor Signs.name: Znaki Wstrząsowe
Tremor Signs.description:
Wysyłasz ku celowi serię wstrząsów, nie dłuższą niż krótkie zdanie w języku mówionym. Jeśli cel znajduje się w zasięgu oraz jest połączony z tą samą połacią podłoża co ty, wibracje docierają do niego przez nie. Nie potrzebujesz ani linii wzroku ani linii efektu, więc cel na innym piętrze tego samego budynku jest prawidłowy.

Cel może przesłać ci z pomocą wstrząsów krótką odpowiedź w ramach reakcji, lub jako darmową akcję w jego następnej turze jeśli woli, ale aby to zrobić musi być w zasięgu. Jeśli odpowie, wiadomość jest dostarczana do ciebie przez odczuwalne wstząsy, tak jak w wypadku oryginalnej wiadomości. Wstrząsy te przekazują jasną wiadomość tylko i wyłącznie wtedy, jeśli i ty i cel znacie ustalone znaczenie wstrząsów, na przykład trzy wstrząsy dla ostrzeżenia, dwa dla innego rodzaju informacji. Żadne z was nie może przekazać z pomocą tego zaklęcia nowego lub zniuansowanego przekazu informacyjnego.

Istota posiadająca wyczucie drgań może wyczuć wibracje wytworzone przez to zaklęcie, jeśli na dowolnym etapie ich podróży od nadawcy do dowolnego celu znalazły się one w zasięgu istoty.

Wywyższenie (4.) Zaklęcie może obrać za cel do 5 istot.

Tremorsense.name: Wyczucie Drgań
Tremorsense.description:
You become aware of vibrations in the ground around you. You gain tremorsense as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet. As normal for tremorsense, you can detect a creature only if it's on the same surface as you and only if the subject is moving along (or burrowing through) the surface.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.7cYUiOONB2lZfSaA]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Wyczucie Drgań}

Wywyższenie (3.) The spell's duration is 1 hour.

Wywyższenie (5.) The spell's duration is 8 hours.

Trickster's Feathers.name: Trickster's Feathers
Trickster's Feathers.description:
You conjure four magic feathers, each with the potential to hold a single illusory guise. These feathers have negligible Bulk and remain potent for the duration. As an Interact action, you can place one of these feathers into your hair or cap, or remove an already donned feather. When worn in this way, the feather causes you to appear as another creature of the same body shape, and with roughly similar height (within 6 inches) and weight (within 50 pounds), as yourself. The disguise is typically good enough to hide your identity but not to impersonate a specific individual. This disguise also changes your voice and scent, but it doesn't disguise your mannerisms or behavior. You can change the appearance of your clothing and worn items, such as making your armor look like a dress. Held items are unaffected, and any worn item you remove returns to its true appearance.

When you don a feather for the first time, you determine the illusory appearance that feather grants you, selecting the ancestry, age, gender, attire, and other visual features. For the duration, this feather is linked to that disguise. Wearing it in your hair or hat always imparts the linked appearance. Selecting a feather's appearance for the first time counts as setting up a disguise for the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Impersonate} use of Deception; attempt this Deception check at mythic proficiency.

You can only wear one feather at a time. When you remove a feather, you revert to your true appearance. If you give a feather to another creature, it can no longer impart a disguise.

Trickster's Mirrors.name: Trickster's Mirrors
Trickster's Mirrors.description:
You are surrounded by up to 3 mirrors that reflect twisted and distorted images of you, making it hard to tell where you actually are within your space and potentially causing those who attack you to hit one of the mirrors instead. You start with 1 mirror and gain an additional mirror each time you Sustain this spell, up to a maximum of 3 mirrors. Any attack that would hit you has a random chance of hitting one of your mirrors instead of you. With one mirror, the chances are 1 in 2 (1–3 on 1k6). With two mirrors, there is a 1 in 3 chance of hitting you (1–2 on 1k6). With three mirrors, there is a 1 in 4 chance of hitting you (1 on 1k4).

Once an image is hit, it is destroyed. If an attack roll fails to hit your AC but doesn't critically fail, it destroys a mirror. If the attacker was within 5 feet, they must succeed at a basic Will save or take 1k4 mental damage as they believe themselves cut by a shower of glass shards from the breaking mirror. A damaging effect that affects all targets within your space (such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.thAHF1zxNplLCJPO]{Caustic Blast}) destroys all of the mirrors.

Wywyższenie (+1) The mental damage dealt by a broken mirror increases by 1k4.

Trickster's Twin.name: Trickster's Twin
Trickster's Twin.description:
You rarely settle for being in just one place. Choose a location within 100 feet of the target that the target can see. You create an illusion of yourself there that only it can see and that mimics all your actions. The target must attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target believes you're in the designated location and can't see you in your actual location. The target automatically disbelieves the illusion when you use an action that doesn't make sense in the illusion's position, or if the target attacks, touches, Seeks, or otherwise engages with the illusion. If you use a hostile action against the target, the spell ends.

Porażka As success, but the target must succeed at a Will save to disbelieve the illusion when one of the listed events occurs.

Krytyczna Porażka As success, but the target must critically succeed at a Will save to disbelieve when one of the listed events occurs.

Trim the Blight.name: Trim the Blight
Trim the Blight.description:
You create a cone of shimmering energy that attempts to banish the influence of invasive, supernatural blight, such as that found in Tanglebriar. Blighted difficult terrain in the area becomes regular terrain, while blighted greater difficult terrain becomes difficult terrain; hazardous terrain in the area becomes nonhazardous. These effects persist for 1 hour.

Creatures in the area that carry features of this blight (as determined by the GM, but automatically including all creatures with the fiend trait in this adventure) are trimmed as well, their supernatural infusion of blight being drained. These creatures take 12k10 spirit damage and must attempt a Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature is unaffected.

Sukces The creature takes half damage.

Porażka The creature's reach with attacks is reduced by 5 feet (to a minimum of 5 feet) for 1 hour, they are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1} for 1 round.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature's reach is reduced to 5 feet for 1 hour, they are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 2} and slowed 1 for 1 minute.

Wywyższenie (10th) The spirit damage increases by 2k10, and 1 hour durations increase to 24 hours.

Triple Time.name: Triple Time
Triple Time.description:
Your music sets a fast pace. You and all allies in the area gain a +10-foot status bonus to all Speeds for 1 round.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.HtaDbgTIzdiTiKLX]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Triple Time}

True Target.name: True Target
True Target.description: You delve into the possible futures of the next few seconds to understand all the ways your foe might avoid harm, then cast out a vision of that future to those around you. Designate a creature. The first time each target makes an attack roll against that creature during true target's duration, the attacker rolls twice and uses the better result. The attacker also ignores circumstance penalties to the attack roll and any flat check required due to the designated creature being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Schowany}.

Truesight.name: Prawdowidzenie
Truesight.description: Widzisz rzeczy w promieniu 60 stóp takimi, jakimi są naprawdę. MG wykonuje tajny test przeciwdziałania przeciwko wszelkim efektom iluzji, morfu lub polimorfii w obszarze, ale tylko w celu ustalenia, czy je przejrzysz (na przykład, jeśli test zakończy się sukcesem przeciwko zaklęciu polimorfii, możesz zobaczyć prawdziwą postać istoty, ale nie kończysz samego zaklęcia polimorfii).

Truespeech.name: Prawdomowa
Truespeech.description:
Cel potrafi rozumieć wszystkie słowa niezależnie od języka, a także mówić językami innych istot. Gdy cel znajduje się w mieszanej grupie istot, za każdym razem, gdy mówi, może wybrać istotę i mówić w języku, który ta istota rozumie, nawet jeśli cel nie wie, jaki jest to język.

Wywyższenie (7.) Czas trwania wynosi 8 godzin.

Turbulent Tide.name: Turbulent Tide
Turbulent Tide.description:
You cause the sheath of water and the improvised weapon it surrounds to surge outward with stupendous force as you attack. Make a melee Strike with your improvised weapon. The weapon then breaks, and each creature adjacent to you must succeed at a Fortitude saving throw against your spell DC or be pushed 5 feet away from you (10 feet on a critical failure). You can Stride after the target of your Strike if they are pushed but you must move the same distance and in the same direction.

If the item has a Hardness greater than your level, or if it's an artifact, cursed item, or other item that's difficult to break or destroy, it doesn't break and adjacent creatures don't need to attempt Fortitude saves.

Ulcerous Canker.name: Ulcerous Canker
Ulcerous Canker.description:
Weeping sores open on the target as you expose it to decay, dealing 1k4 void damage and 1k4 poison damage plus @Damage[(2*ceil(@item.rank/2)-1)[bleed]] damage. The target must attempt a Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected.

Sukces The target takes half the initial damage and no persistent bleed damage.

Porażka The target takes full damage.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature takes double initial damage and double persistent bleed damage.

Wywyższenie (+2) The void damage and poison damage each increase by 1k4, and the persistent bleed damage increases by 2.

Umbral Extraction.name: Umbral Extraction
Umbral Extraction.description:
You prepare to steal spells from your foes, ripping them from the foe's shadow to stow them in an ephemeral pocket in the Shadow Plane. You gain a temporary spell slot, which you can fill only by stealing a spell from an enemy spellcaster. During umbral extraction's duration, you can use the Steal action to attempt to take one of the foe's prepared spells or unused spontaneous spell slots instead of an item. You can also make one attempt to Steal as part of Casting umbral extraction. If you succeed at your check to Steal a spell, you deal 1k4 mental damage to the target per rank of the spell stolen due to the psychological toll of the spiritual emptiness created by wrenching the spell away, and you place the stolen spell in your temporary spell slot. It gains the shadow trait if cast from this temporary slot.

Determine the stolen spell at random from the target's spells that are 1 rank lower than umbral extraction, or from spells of the same rank if you got a critical success. If the target has no spell slots of that rank, use the highest rank below that in which the target does have a spell slot. (If the target has no eligible spells, you get nothing, but you can continue to attempt to Steal spells for the remaining duration.) If the target is a prepared caster, you randomly steal one of their prepared spells. If the target is a spontaneous caster, you instead steal an unexpended spell slot of the appropriate rank and determine the spell at random from all the target's known spells at that level. You can't steal a target's innate spells, focus spells, or cantrips. You know what the spell is as soon as you steal it, and your temporary spell slot becomes a spell slot of the same rank as the spell you stole.

As normal, you can Steal only from a target within your reach. Once you've placed a spell in your temporary spell slot, you can't attempt to Steal more spells. If you succeed at your Thievery check, you must take the spell you stole. Even if you're a spontaneous caster, you can use the temporary spell slot only to cast the stolen spell and you can cast only the stolen spell from your temporary spell slot. When umbral extraction ends, you lose the temporary spell slot and any spell still stored in it. When you cast umbral extraction, any previous casting of umbral extraction currently affecting you ends.

Umbral Graft.name: Umbral Graft
Umbral Graft.description:
You reflect a spell into a shadowy version of itself, in the process depleting the power of the initial spell. During umbral graft's duration, you can use the Steal action to attempt to abscond with spells affecting a foe instead of stealing an item. You can also make one attempt to Steal as part of Casting umbral graft. If you succeed at your check to Steal a spell, randomly determine a spell affecting the foe that has a target entry. That spell ceases to affect the target, and you can either cause the spell to affect you or store it in your shadow. If your attempt to Steal was a critical success, you automatically steal the spell if its rank is equal to or lower than umbral graft. If it was a success, you automatically steal it if its rank is lower than umbral graft. If you succeeded, but the spell's rank was too high to steal automatically, you must attempt a counteract check to see if you steal the spell. You know what the spell is as soon as you steal it. If you store it, you can transfer it to a willing creature as a single action that has the manipulate trait. The spell lasts for its remaining duration, to a maximum of 1 minute, and any time you keep it stored subtracts from its duration normally. The spell gains the shadow trait.

You can't steal constant innate spells that are always active on a creature, such as a choral angel's constant tongues, or innate spells that have special restrictions that remove their ability to target other creatures, such as an imp's invisibility. At the GM's discretion, you might not be able to steal innate spells with other unusual modifications to the base spell.

As normal, you can Steal only from a target within your reach. Once you've stolen a spell, you can't attempt to Steal more spells, nor can you choose not to take a spell if you succeed at your Thievery check. When you cast umbral graft, any spells you stole with a previous umbral graft end even if their duration hasn't elapsed. If you're affected by both umbral graft and umbral extraction, you make the choice whether to steal a spell slot, an active spell, or an item each time you Steal.

Umbral Journey.name: Umbral Journey
Umbral Journey.description: You move partially into the Netherworld, using its warped nature to speed your travels. Each hour, you cover roughly as much ground as you normally would in 3 days. The landmarks are vague and symbolic rather than concrete, leaving you within a mile of your intended destination when you Dismiss the spell or its duration ends
Umbral Journey.target: you and up to 10 willing creatures touched

Umbral Mindtheft.name: Umbral Mindtheft
Umbral Mindtheft.description: You prepare to steal a broad field of knowledge from another creature, siphoning it from their mind and storing it in a pocket of the Shadow Plane connected to your own mind. During the spell's duration, you can use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.RDXXE7wMrSPCLv5k]{Kradzież} action to attempt to take one Lore skill proficiency from a creature instead of Stealing an item. You can also make one attempt to Steal as part of Casting the Spell. If you succeed at your check to Steal a Lore skill, you deal 2k6 mental damage to the target if they were trained in that skill, plus @Damage[2d6[mental]] damage per proficiency rank they have in that skill above trained, as the sudden loss of knowledge leaves an aching absence in the target's mind. Determine the Lore skill at random from among those known by the target; on a critical success, you learn what Lore skills the creature is proficient in and can select the skill rather than choosing at random. If the target isn't trained in any Lore skills, you get nothing, but you can continue to attempt to Steal Lore from other creatures for the remaining duration. The target loses the benefits of its training in that Lore skill, and you gain their proficiency rank in that Lore skill. This effect lasts until your next daily preparations or until you are incapacitated, in which case the Lore siphons back into the target creature's mind from the Shadow Plane, wherever you both may be. As normal, you can Steal only from a target within your reach. Once you've stolen one Lore skill, you can't attempt to Steal more Lore. If you succeed at your Thievery check, you must take the Lore you stole.

Unbearable Cacophony.name: Unbearable Cacophony
Unbearable Cacophony.cost: valuable crystals and tuning forks worth 300 gp
Unbearable Cacophony.description:
You amplify the sound of every item and creature to impossible levels. Deaf creatures and creatures immune to sonic damage remain unaffected in most cases.

Krytyczny Sukces As success, and you and the secondary casters gain sonic resistance equal to your level for the duration.

Sukces Any sound produced by a creature or object (such as a cricket, a ringing anvil, or a lion's roar) deals sonic damage equal to the level of the creature or item (minimum 1) to every creature within 15 feet (basic Fortitude save with a DC equal to the ritual's casting DC). For every size category over Tiny of the item or creature making noise, this damage increases by 2. Organized groups of creatures, such as a singing quartet or a swarm of insects, count as the next size category larger for this effect. Effects that normally deal sonic damage to creatures and objects ignore half the creature or object's sonic resistance or Hardness.

Porażka The ritual has no effect.

Krytyczna Porażka An intense sound of ringing echoes in each caster's ears, imparting a weakness to sonic damage equal to their level for 1 day.

Wywyższenie (+2) The increase in damage made by creatures larger than Tiny increases to 6 per size category.

Unblinking Flame Aura.name: Unblinking Flame Aura
Unblinking Flame Aura.description:
You focus your sight inside and call on your inner fire to grant you warmth, steady your vision, and soothe your body. You recover @Damage[(3*@item.level)[healing]]{15 Hit Points}. For the duration, you gain a +2 status bonus on Perception checks and resistance 10 to cold.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.HoCUCi2jL1OLfXWR]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Unblinking Flame Aura}

Wywyższenie (+1) You recover an additional 3 Hit Points, and the resistance to cold increases by 2.

Unblinking Flame Emblem.name: Unblinking Flame Emblem
Unblinking Flame Emblem.description:
Aktywator Your last action was a successful Strike against an enemy

You emblazon the target with a fiery sigil that projects your sight and your flame onto them, allowing you and your allies to track their movements and making it easier to hit them. Attack rolls against the target gain a +1 status bonus, and successful Strikes against the target deal @Damage[1d6[fire]] damage, and @Damage[1d10[persistent,fire]] damage on a critical hit. However, you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda} against other enemies, as the information from the emblem distracts you. The emblem takes your full attention; if you use unblinking flame emblem again before the original duration expires, the new casting replaces the previous casting.

Wywyższenie (9.) The fire damage increases to @Damage[1d8[fire]] damage, and the persistent fire damage on a critical hit increases to @Damage[1d12[persistent,fire]].

Unblinking Flame Ignition.name: Unblinking Flame Ignition
Unblinking Flame Ignition.description:
Aktywator A foe reduces you to half your Hit Points or fewer.

You feel the most alive when pushed into a corner, as the insights and vision granted by the flame stoke into overdrive. Your body begins to emit a blazing aura of flames. You gain greater darkvision, low‐light vision, and the ability to see invisible creatures. You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed as you launch flame from your aura to soar through the sky. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Przyspieszony}, and you can use the extra action each round only to Strike or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]{Fly} using your flames. Any creature who starts their turn within 5 feet of you takes @Damage[1d12[fire]] damage.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.hya8NfBB1GJofTXm]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Unblinking Flame Ignition}

Unblinking Flame Revelation.name: Unblinking Flame Revelation
Unblinking Flame Revelation.description: You light your foe with revealing flame. The GM attempts a secret counteract check against each illusion affecting the creature; on a success, you suppress the illusion for the duration, rather than end the effect.
Unblinking Flame Revelation.requirements: Your previous action was a successful unarmed Strike.

Unbreaking Wave Advance.name: Unbreaking Wave Advance
Unbreaking Wave Advance.description:
You unleash a mighty wave from your hand that buffets back your foes. Each creature in the area must attempt a Fortitude saving throw. If a creature pushed by unbreaking wave advance would be pushed into a solid barrier or another creature, it stops at that point and takes 3k6 damage.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Porażka The creature is pushed 10 feet.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is pushed 20 feet.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage for pushing a creature into a solid barrier increases by 1k6.

Unbreaking Wave Barrier.name: Unbreaking Wave Barrier
Unbreaking Wave Barrier.description:
You create a protective circle around yourself that repels your foes. You gain a +1 status bonus to AC. Any creature other than you within the area, or attempting to move into the area, must attempt a Fortitude saving throw; a creature needs to attempt the Fortitude saving throw only once each round. If a creature pushed by unbreaking wave barrier would be pushed into a solid barrier or another creature, it stops at that point and takes @Damage[2d6[bludgeoning]] damage for every additional 5 feet it would've been pushed. On subsequent rounds, the first time you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.3f5DMFu8fPiqHpRg]{Sustain} this Spell each round, you can increase the radius of the barrier by 5 feet.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.v09uwq1eHEAy2bgh]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Unbreaking Wave Barrier}

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature isn't pushed, but the space within the barrier is difficult terrain for it.

Porażka The creature is pushed 10 feet, and the space within the barrier is difficult terrain for it.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is pushed 20 feet and knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}, and the space within the barrier is difficult terrain for it.

Unbreaking Wave Containment.name: Unbreaking Wave Containment
Unbreaking Wave Containment.description: You wrap enemies in four strands of water. When you cast the spell, make a spell attack roll against the targets. On a success, they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony} until the spell ends or they @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape}; on a critical success, they're also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Spętany} until the spell ends or they Escape. Each target that's immobilized or restrained also takes 10k6 bludgeoning damage from the constricting waves, with a basic Fortitude save. The first time each subsequent round when you sustain the Spell, if all the targets aren't immobilized or restrained, make a spell attack roll against any targets who are free but remain within range, with the same effects as when you cast the spell, immobilizing or restraining them depending on your spell attack roll. Creatures who are immobilized or restrained take 10k6 bludgeoning damage with a basic Fortitude save.

Unbreaking Wave Vapor.name: Unbreaking Wave Vapor
Unbreaking Wave Vapor.description:
Aktywator You're targeted by an attack made by an attacker you can see.

You're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} against the triggering attack and gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against it. After the triggering attack is complete, you can Step if the triggering attack hit or Step twice if the triggering attack missed.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.m6x0IvoeX0a0bZiQ]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Unbreaking Wave Vapor}

Unbroken Panoply.name: Unbroken Panoply
Unbroken Panoply.description: As tools of violence undone by violence, broken weapons contain potent symbolic magic that faydhaans often call upon when forming alliances. Images of similar legendary weapons overlay the target, and the weapon's broken condition is suppressed for the duration. The weapon gains the nonlethal trait during this time. The weapon's wielder can apply the weapon's item bonus to attack rolls, if any, to their Diplomacy checks. If the weapon would be damaged or broken again, this spell ends.
Unbroken Panoply.target: 1 broken weapon that is unattended or held by a willing creature

Uncontrollable Dance.name: Uncontrollable Dance
Uncontrollable Dance.description:
The target is overcome with an all-consuming urge to dance. For the duration of the spell, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda} and can't use reactions. While affected, the creature can't use move actions except to dance, using the Stride action to move up to half its Speed.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The spell's duration is 3 rounds, and the target must spend at least 1 action each turn dancing.

Porażka The spell's duration is 1 minute, and the target must spend at least 2 actions each turn dancing.

Krytyczna Porażka The spell's duration is 1 minute, and the target must spend all its actions each turn dancing.

Undeath's Blessing.name: Undeath's Blessing
Undeath's Blessing.description:
You instill within a creature the touch of the grave. For the duration, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Krzywdzenie} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Leczenie} spells treat the creature as undead. In addition, harm spells gain a +2 status bonus to the Hit Points restored to the target. An unwilling target can attempt a Will save to reduce the effects.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target heals half as much from heal and takes half as much damage from harm for 1 round.

Porażka Effects as described above.

Wywyższenie (+1) The status bonus to the Hit Points restored increases by 2.

Undermine Reality.name: Undermine Reality
Undermine Reality.description:
You lash a target with tendrils of shadow that steal some of its substance, making it quasi-real. As long as it is quasi-real, its Strikes deal half damage, it can't critically succeed at any skill check, and creatures attempting saving throws against its spells and effects get a result one degree of success better than they rolled. The target must attempt a Will saving throw.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target is quasi-real until the end of its next turn.

Porażka The target is quasi-real for 1 minute. At the end of each of its turns, it can attempt another Will save, ending the spell on a success.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is quasi-real for an unlimited duration.

Undertaker.name: Undertaker
Undertaker.description:
You point your finger toward the target and whisper an epitaph that promises to grace their gravestone in the near future. This spell works best when both you and the target are in contact with solid ground. If either is not in contact with the ground, the target gains a +2 circumstance bonus on their saving throw against the spell, and if both you and the target are not in contact with solid ground, the target gains this bonus and treats the result of their save as one degree of success better than the actual result. The target of undertaker can resist with a Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target takes @Damage[40[void]] damage. If the target is in contact with solid ground, the ground in the target's space shifts and shakes, and is treated as difficult terrain until the start of your next turn.

Porażka The target takes @Damage[80[void]] damage. If the target is in contact with solid ground, the ground in the target's space churns and cracks open into an open but shallow grave. The target is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}, and that space is treated as difficult terrain until the grave is filled in.

Krytyczna Porażka The target takes @Damage[160[void]] damage. If the target is in contact with solid ground, a grave opens beneath their feet and they fall prone within. The grave then forms a stone sarcophagus-like shell around the victim. This stone shell cannot be opened and must be broken; it has AC 10, Hardness 14, and 80 Hit Points. At the start of your next turn, the grave fills in with soil. If the victim dies while inside this grave, at the next sundown the victim transforms into an evil ghast as the sarcophagus crumbles, allowing the new undead to dig its way up to the surface.

Unexpected Transposition.name: Unexpected Transposition
Unexpected Transposition.description:
Aktywator You are targeted with an enemy's Strike.

When attacked, you attempt to quickly swap your own position with that of another creature. A creature that is unwilling to swap places with you must attempt a Will save. Willing creatures automatically fail. If you successfully switch places with the target, the triggering attack is resolved against that creature as if it had been the original target of the attack. After the swap, you and the target are both temporarily immune to unexpected transposition spells for 1 minute. You automatically switch places if the target is willing. If it's unwilling, it can attempt a Will save. Neither of you teleports if the target succeeds at its save.
Unexpected Transposition.target: 1 creature other than the triggering enemy

Unfathomable Song.name: Unfathomable Song
Unfathomable Song.description:
Fleeting notes of a strange and unnatural song fill the air, overtaking the mind. Each target must attempt a Will save when you cast the spell, and again the first time you Sustain this Spell each round. A creature needs to attempt only one save against the song each round, and you have to keep the same targets when you Sustain the Spell.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected, can't be affected on subsequent rounds, and is temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Sukces The target is unaffected this round, but it can be affected on subsequent rounds.

Porażka Roll [[/r 1d4]] on the table below.

Krytyczna Porażka Roll [[/r 1d4+1]] on the table below.

ResultEfekt
1The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2}
2The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Zdezorientowany} for 1 round
3The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 4} for 1 round
4The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiony} for 1 round
5The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony} for 1 round and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 1} for an unlimited duration

Unfetter Eidolon.name: Unfetter Eidolon
Unfetter Eidolon.description: You loosen the link between yourself and your eidolon, allowing it to travel farther from you for a short period of time. While the spell is active, your eidolon can travel an unlimited distance away from you. When the spell ends, if your eidolon is more than 100 feet away from you, it unmanifests.

Unfettered Mark.name: Unfettered Mark
Unfettered Mark.cost: rare inks and needles worth a total value of 100 gp × the spell rank × the target's level
Unfettered Mark.description:
You tattoo the target with rare inks and create a magical tattoo called an unfettered mark. This particular version of the unfettered mark grants the target special powers to escape from the Black Whale and Stormholt (the demiplane that overlaps with the Black Whale). While Crafting is the easiest method for creating this tattoo, the artistry is less important than maintaining a feeling of freedom in your mind while performing the ritual. Because of this, you can use any skill as long as it holds a special significance to you. A ranger who is at home in the woods, for example, could use a Survival or Nature check while creating the tattoo. If the target already has a successful unfettered mark currently active, the magic fades from the old tattoo and is replaced by the results of the new ritual.

The ritual can be performed alone or with the aid of up to 10 secondary casters. Each secondary caster must tattoo themself with their own tattoo and pay the full ritual cost to participate. Creatures currently held captive in the prison have a special relationship with the ritual: for each month they spend drawing memories of home on the walls of their cell, they can reduce the total cost of the ritual by 50 gp.

Krytyczny Sukces The target and primary and secondary casters all gain the ability to leave Stormholt. To do so, they must leave the prison by swimming through the water or by riding in a vessel that is in contact with the water (such as a rowboat). When they reach the great whirlpool, they are pulled under as normal, but instead of being transported to the Flotsam Graveyard in Absalom, they are immediately transported (as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.69L70wKfGDY66Mk9]{Teleportacja}) to a location in Absalom of their choice. They also gain the benefits of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Seaah9amXg70RKw2]{Water Walk}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.MZGkMsPBztFN0pUO]{Water Breathing}, and resistance to electricity 10 for the duration of the ritual.

Sukces As critical success, except the affected creatures don't gain the benefits of water walk and water breathing.

Porażka You create the tattoo but fail to imbue it with magic.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the tattoo also creates an unwholesome bond with the demiplane of Stormholt. For 24 hours, the target and the primary and secondary casters gain a fishlike appearance and are covered in a slimy membrane. They gain the ability to breathe both water and air, but their skin quickly dries out when on land. After 1 hour on land they become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Wyczerpany}, conditions that can be removed only if they reenter water. Additionally, the membrane conducts electricity well, causing them to gain weakness 10 to electricity.

Unfettered Movement.name: Unfettered Movement
Unfettered Movement.description:
You repel effects that would hinder a creature or slow its movement. While under this spell's effect, the target ignores effects that would give them a circumstance penalty to Speed. When they attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} an effect that has them @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Pochwycony}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Spętany}, they automatically succeed unless the effect is magical and of a higher rank than the unfettered movement spell.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.CdAyAiMGESvgNQtz]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Unfettered Movement}

Unfettered Pack.name: Unfettered Pack
Unfettered Pack.description:
You free those who travel alongside you from environmental hindrances. Targets don't take circumstance penalties to Speed from vegetation, rubble, winds, or other properties of the environment, and they ignore difficult terrain from such environmental properties.

Wywyższenie (9.) The targets also ignore greater difficult terrain from environmental properties.

Unfolding Wind Blitz.name: Unfolding Wind Blitz
Unfolding Wind Blitz.description: You blitz forward so quickly that you soar through the air, and nothing can react to you. Fly up to twice your Speed. This movement doesn't trigger reactions. At any point along the way, you can make Strikes with an unarmed attack against up to three different targets within your reach. You increase your multiple attack penalty for these attacks only after completing all of the attacks.

Unfolding Wind Buffet.name: Unfolding Wind Buffet
Unfolding Wind Buffet.description:
You surround your unarmed attacks with the speed and force of air. Make three unarmed Strikes against the same target. If at least one was a successful hit, the target must attempt a Fortitude save or be pushed back 5 feet for each normal hit from the buffet, plus 10 feet for each critical hit.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target is pushed back half the normal distance.

Porażka The target is pushed back the normal distance.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is pushed back double the normal distance and then knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}.

Unfolding Wind Crash.name: Unfolding Wind Crash
Unfolding Wind Crash.description:
You jump up to 120 feet in any direction and then deal 18k6 bludgeoning damage to creatures within a 20‐foot emanation after you land, with a basic Reflex save. Creatures who critically fail are also knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}.

Wywyższenie (10.) Obrażenia zwiększają się do 20k6.

Unfolding Wind Rush.name: Unfolding Wind Rush
Unfolding Wind Rush.description:
You travel on a rushing wind. Move two times: two Strides, two Steps, or one Stride and one Step (in either order). You can Stride or Step into the air during this movement, moving upward at a 45-degree angle at most; if you end your movement in the air, you fall after taking one action or when your turn ends, whichever comes first. A @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.it4ZsAi6XgvGcodc]{Wall of Wind} appears in all the spaces you left during this movement, lasting for 1 round.

Wywyższenie (5.) The wall of wind lasts 3 rounds.

Unimpeded Stride.name: Unimpeded Stride
Unimpeded Stride.description: Divine grace ensure that nothing can keep you prisoner or hold you back. You immediately escape from every magical effect that has you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Pochwycony} unless the effect is of a higher rank than your unimpeded stride spell. You then Stride. During this movement, you ignore difficult terrain and any circumstance or status penalties to your Speed.

Unity.name: Unity
Unity.description:
Aktywator You and 1 or more allies within range are targeted by a spell or ability that allows a saving throw.

You put up a united defense. Each ally can use your saving throw modifier instead of its own against the triggering spell. Each ally decides individually which modifier to use.
Unity.target: each ally targeted by the triggering spell

Unravel Knowledge.name: Unravel Knowledge
Unravel Knowledge.description:
Your patron reaches into the target's mind, plucking out their past training like pulling a thread from a cloth. Choose a single action, activity, or spell you know the target can use, such as from seeing it previously or identifying the creature's capabilities with a Recall Knowledge check. You could select, for example, the Strike action, the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} action, a dragon's breath, or the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.o6YCGx4lycsYpww4]{Haste} spell if you were aware the target could use them. The target attempts a Will save.

Sukces The target is unaffected.

Porażka The target's memories of their ability grow foggy. The first time they use the chosen ability each round, they take 3k8 mental damage. This ability is less effective if you choose an ability almost anyone can use; the target takes 3k4 mental damage instead if you choose a basic action (such as Strike, Stride, or Raise a Shield) or a skill action that can be used untrained (such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} or Hide).

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, and the target takes a –2 status penalty to any check or DC for the ability the first time they use it each round.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.nTISJz13lhHlc9pk]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Unravel Knowledge}

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k8, or by 1k4 for a basic action or untrained skill action.

Unraveling Blast.name: Unraveling Blast
Unraveling Blast.description:
You unleash a small blast of potential that destroys one of a creature's possible futures, leaving them reeling. You deal 2k4 mental damage to the creature, and it must attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature takes half the mental damage.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda} until the start of its turn.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota odnosi podwójne obrażenia, becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1}, and is off-guard until the start of your next turn.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 3k4.

Unrelenting Observation.name: Nieustępliwa Obserwacja
Unrelenting Observation.description:
To zaklęcie zapewnia doskonały wzrok oparty na wróżbiarstwie, pozwalając kilku godzącym się celom śledzić dokładne ruchy lub pozycję jednej istoty lub obiektu. Obierz za cel do śledzenia jedną istotę lub obiekt w obszarze. Staje się on czujką dla zaklęcia. Do pięciu wybranych przez ciebie godzących się istot w obszarze może widzieć widmowy obraz tej istoty lub obiektu, gdy jest on poza ich zasięgiem wzroku. Mogą doskonale postrzegać istotę lub obiekt, co pozwala im ignorować stany @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięcia} lub @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialności}, chociaż fizyczne bariery nadal zapewniają celowi osłonę.

Śledzące istoty mogą widzieć śledzoną istotę lub obiekt przez wszystkie bariery inne niż ołów lub bieżąca woda, które blokują ich wizję. Odległość nie ma znaczenia, chociaż istota lub obiekt może oddalić się tak bardzo, że jej widmo stanie się zbyt mała, aby je dostrzec. Śledzące istoty nie widzą żadnego otoczenia wokół celu, chociaż widzą wszelkie wyposażenie, które istota nosi lub trzyma, i mogą stwierdzić, czy porzuca ona jakieś przedmioty.

Jeśli cel śledzenia wyraża na nie zgodę, czas trwania wynosi 1 godzinę. Jeśli próbujesz śledzić niegodzącą się istotę, cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę lub obiekt.

Sukces Jak opisano, a czas trwania wynosi 1 minutę.

Porażka Jak opisano, a czas trwania wynosi 1 godzinę.
Unrelenting Observation.target: 1 śledzona istota lub obiekt i do 5 innych godzących się istot

Unseasonable Squall.name: Unseasonable Squall
Unseasonable Squall.description:
You issue a blast of sudden wind that ripples outward from the center of the burst. The wind extinguishes small non-magical fires, disperses fog and mist, scatters objects of light Bulk or less, and pushes unsecured objects of 1 Bulk or less 5 feet away from the spell's origin point. Each Medium or smaller creature in the area when you Cast the Spell or that moves into spell's area must attempt a Fortitude saving throw.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Porażka The creature is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}. If the creature was Flying, it gets a critical failure instead.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is pushed 30 feet away from the center of the burst, is knocked Prone, and takes 2k6 bludgeoning damage.

Unseen Heralds.name: Unseen Heralds
Unseen Heralds.cost: rare oils, salts, and herbs worth a total value of 15 gp
Unseen Heralds.description:
Although this spell has spread throughout the Inner Sea, it likely came first from Nex, where it is used to raise alarms or notify the populace of new policies. In any case, the ritual works by placing several simple illusions throughout the area, allowing the caster to transmit their voice throughout the area.

Krytyczny Sukces The ritual creates six ‘mouths', like @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.eIQ86FOXK34HiNLs]{Embed Message}, at places you select within the area. By spending a single action with the concentrate trait, you can command the mouths to speak — they can say anything you like, and you can set them to repeat messages or announcements at any interval you choose. You can also choose to have only certain mouths speak. Any secondary casters you include in the ritual, even beyond the two required, can speak through the mouths in the same way you can.

Sukces As critical success, but the ritual creates three mouths.

Porażka The ritual has no effect.

Krytyczna Porażka The mouths form, and promptly start screaming, gibbering, and/or swearing at passers-by — it is impossible to get any rest or relaxation within hearing range of the mouths until their magic wears out in about a day.

Wywyższenie (6.) The area of the ritual is now 1 mile × 1 mile and it produces 30 mouths (60 on a critical success). The cost of the ritual increases to 300 gp.

Wywyższenie (9.) The area of the ritual is now 100 miles × 100 miles and it produces 500 mouths (1000 on a critical success). You can place mouths based on criteria. The cost of the ritual increases to 5 000 gp.
Unseen Heralds.secondarycheck: Arcana or Occultism (whichever isn't used for the primary check), Diplomacy

Unsettling Knowledge.name: Niepokojąca Wiedza
Unsettling Knowledge.description:
Dzielisz się z istotą fragmentem ukrytej wiedzy, który jest zarówno niepokojący, jak i intrygujący. Gdy Rzucasz to Zaklęcie, wybierz Wiedzę Tajemną, Przyrodę, Okultyzm, Religię lub Społeczeństwo jako tematykę tej wiedzy. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces Cel zostaje @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Zafascynowany} wiedzą, którą się podzieliłeś, na 1 rundę.

Porażka Cel jest zafascynowany wiedzą przez 1 minutę. Cel może zakończyć tę fascynację wcześniej, wykonując test umiejętności Pozyskania Wiedzy, aby zrozumieć wiedzę za pomocą wybranej umiejętności (używając twojego ST zaklęć jako ST). Niezależnie od wyniku, cel staje się @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2}, ale jeśli poniósł porażkę w teście, nie może zmniejszyć swojego statusu przerażenia poniżej 1 przez pozostały czas trwania zaklęcia.

Krytyczna Porażka Jak przy porażce, ale cel staje się @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 3}, jeśli spróbuje Pozyskać Wiedzę.

Unspeakable Shadow.name: Unspeakable Shadow
Unspeakable Shadow.description:
You alter a creature's shadow, transforming it into a terrifying monster out to devour the creature. Istota musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli. A creature that has the frightened condition from unspeakable shadow must spend at least one of its actions each turn to either attack its shadow (making a Strike ineffectually) or flee from its shadow (using one action to move away as though it had the fleeing condition).

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2}.

Porażka The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 3}. It can't reduce its frightened value below 1 for 1 minute.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is so afraid, it might instantly die. It must succeed at a Fortitude save or die; this saving throw has the incapacitation trait. If it succeeds at its save, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 4} and can't reduce its frightened value below 1 for 1 minute.

Untamed Form.name: Nieokiełznana Postać
Untamed Form.description:
Sięgasz w głąb siebie po inną część swojej istoty i uwalniasz ją, przemieniając swoje ciało w inną postać. Możesz przybrać dowolną postać wymienioną w @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gfPjmG6Fe6D3MFjl]{Postaci Szkodnika}, która utrzymuje się przez 10 minut. Wszystkie inne postaci nieokiełznanej postaci utrzymują się przez 1 minutę. Możesz dodawać więcej postaci do swojej listy nieokiełznanej postaci za pomocą atutów druida — atut może zapewnić ci niektóre lub wszystkie postaci z danego zaklęcia polimorfii.

Gdy przemieniasz się w postać zapewnianą przez zaklęcie, zyskujesz wszystkie efekty wybranej postaci z wersji zaklęcia wywyższonej do kręgu nieokiełznanej postaci. Nieokiełznana postać pozwala ci łatwiej wykorzystać twoją własną biegłość w zmianie kształtu niż większość zaklęć polimorfii. Gdy zdecydujesz się użyć swojego własnego modyfikatora ataku podczas polimorfii zamiast domyślnego modyfikatora ataku postaci, zyskujesz premię statusową +2 do swoich rzutów ataku.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.a5rWrWwuevTzs9Io]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Nieokiełznana Postać}

Wywyższenie (2.) Możesz przemieniać się w postaci wymienione w @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wp09USMB3GIW1qbp]{Postaci Zwierzęcia}.

Untamed Shift.name: Untamed Shift
Untamed Shift.description:
You transform just a part of your body. Choose any one effect that matches an untamed order feat you have.

  • Untamed Form Your hands transform into incredibly sharp claws. Untamed claws are an unarmed attack, have the agile and finesse traits, and and deal 1k6 slashing damage. You can still hold and use items with your hands while they're transformed by this spell, but you must have a hand free to attack with it.
  • Insect Shape Your mouth becomes deadly jaws. Untamed jaws are an unarmed attack that deal 1k8 piercing damage.
  • Elemental Shape You shift your body to be partially composed of elemental matter, granting you resistance 5 to critical hits and precision damage.
  • Plant Shape Your arms become long vines, increasing your reach to 10 feet (or 15 feet with a reach weapon).
  • Soaring Shape You must cast untamed shift using 2 actions for this benefit. You grow wings from your back, gaining a fly Speed of 30 feet.

Wywyższenie (6.) You can choose up to two effects from the list. Untamed claws leave terrible, ragged wounds that also deal 2k6 persistent bleed damage on a hit, and untamed jaws are envenomed, also dealing 2k6 persistent poison damage on a hit.

Wywyższenie (10.) You can choose up to three effects from the list. Untamed claws deal 4k6 persistent bleed damage on a hit, and untamed jaws deal 4k6 persistent poison damage on a hit

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.rTVZ0zwiKeslRw6p]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Untamed Shift}

Untwisting Iron Augmentation.name: Untwisting Iron Augmentation
Untwisting Iron Augmentation.description:
Your unarmed attacks are treated as cold iron and silver, they gain the earth trait, and they gain a +1 status bonus to damage rolls per damage die.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.4ktNx3cVz5GkcGJa]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Untwisting Iron Augmentation}

Wywyższenie (9.) Your unarmed attacks are also treated as adamantine.

Untwisting Iron Buffer.name: Untwisting Iron Buffer
Untwisting Iron Buffer.description:
You send currents of protective ki to the surface of your body that protect you from harm, at least until your enemies dissipate them. You gain 15 temporary Hit Points, which last for up to 3 rounds.

Wywyższenie (+1) The temporary Hit Points increase by 5.

Untwisting Iron Pillar.name: Untwisting Iron Pillar
Untwisting Iron Pillar.description:
You call upon the earth and your ki to shield you from your enemies. You gain 50 temporary Hit Points that last for the duration or until you lose them, as well as resistance 5 to all physical damage (except adamantine).

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.p8F3MVUkGmpsUDOn]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Untwisting Iron Pillar}

Untwisting Iron Roots.name: Untwisting Iron Roots
Untwisting Iron Roots.description:
You manipulate the earth beneath your feet to throw your enemies off balance, leaving chunks of rock and rubble behind. Creatures within range take 2k6 bludgeoning damage, with a basic Reflex save; on a failed save, they also fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}. The affected area becomes difficult terrain, but you can move through the difficult terrain normally.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k6.

Unusual Anatomy.name: Niezwykła Anatomia
Unusual Anatomy.description:
You transform your flesh and organs into a bizarre amalgam of glistening skin, rough scales, tufts of hair, and tumorous protuberances. This has three effects:

  • You gain resistance 10 to precision damage and resistance 10 to extra damage from critical hits. If the resistance is greater than the extra damage, it reduces the extra damage to 0 but doesn't reduce the attack's normal damage.
  • You gain darkvision.
  • Acid oozes from your skin. Any creature that hits you with an unarmed attack or with a non-reach melee weapon takes 2k6 acid damage.

Wywyższenie (+2) The resistances increase by 5, and the acid damage increases by 1k6.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.LMzFBnOEPzDGzHg4]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Niezwykła Anatomia}

Updraft.name: Updraft
Updraft.description:
A powerful blast of wind erupts from the ground, launching the target into the air and sending it crashing back down. The collision deals 2k6 bludgeoning damage with a basic Reflex save. On a failure, the target is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6.

Upheaval.name: Upheaval
Upheaval.description:
The ground in the area shudders and crumbles as huge pillars of stone erupt into the air, rending the terrain around them.

The GM might add additional effects in certain areas. Cliffs might collapse, causing creatures to fall, or a river might be blocked and flood the surrounding area.

  • Stone Debris The area becomes difficult terrain.
  • Rising Pillars Pillars of smooth stone rise from your chosen number of 10-foot squares on a surface in the area, ascending up to 60 feet in height. Each pillar stops when it hits a structure or ceiling unless that structure collapses (see below). The DC to Climb or Grab an Edge on a pillar is 30. Each creature on a pillar after it rises must succeed at a Reflex saving throw or fall off the nearest edge (the creature can choose which edge, if several are equally close). A creature on a pillar that is stopped by a structure falls without attempting a save.
  • Structural Collapse Structures and ceilings might collapse. The GM rolls a flat check for each (DC 14 for a sturdy structure, DC 9 for an average structure and most natural formations, all adjusted higher or lower as the GM sees fit). In general, shoddy structures automatically collapse. A collapse deals 11k6 bludgeoning damage to creatures beneath it; each creature caught in a collapse must attempt a Reflex save to avoid it. If the creature is forced to attempt a Reflex save because it was on a rising pillar, it uses the same result.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature takes half collapse damage.

Sukces The creature takes half the collapse damage and falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}.

Porażka The creature takes the full collapse damage and falls prone.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature takes the full collapse damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Spętany} by debris until it successfully Escapes (DC equal to the spell's save DC).

Uplifting Overture.name: Uplifting Overture
Uplifting Overture.description:
Your performance makes allies feel they can succeed at anything. This counts as having prepared to Aid your ally on a skill check of your choice. When you later use the Aid reaction, you can roll Performance instead of the normal skill check, and if you roll a failure, you get a success instead. If you are legendary in Performance, you automatically critically succeed.

The GM might rule that you can't use this ability if the act of encouraging your ally would interfere with the skill check (such as a check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Przekradanie Się} quietly or maintain a disguise).

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.ITErgFRfydm1xmnW]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Uplifting Overture}

Utter Destruction.name: Utter Destruction
Utter Destruction.description:
You screech with an unearthly voice made of destructive energy, smashing everything that lies before you. Creatures in the area take 4k8 sonic damage and 4k8 void damage. Each creature must attempt a Fortitude save. Unattended objects of Hardness 5 or less in the area of effect are destroyed.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature takes half damage.

Sukces The creature takes half damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Ogłuchły} for 1 round.
