Porażka The creature takes full damage and is deafened for 1 minute.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature takes double damage and is permanently deafened.

Wywyższenie (+1) The sonic and void damage each increase by 1k8. The Hardness threshold of items destroyed by the spell increases by 1.

Vacuum.name: Vacuum
Vacuum.description:
You inhale all air in the surrounding area, stealing the breath of nearby creatures. During vacuum's duration, you take a –1 circumstance penalty against inhaled threats, such as inhaled poisons. If you cast vacuum in an environment where you can't breathe, the spell fails and you immediately begin to suffocate.

Creatures in the area must attempt a Fortitude save. A creature that's holding its breath gets a result one degree of success better than it rolled, and creatures that don't need to breathe air are immune to the spell. A creature that later enters the area or ceases holding its breath must attempt a save against the effect. On subsequent rounds, the first time each round you Sustain the spell, you can force each creature in the area to save against the effect.

Sukces The creature begins holding its breath.

Porażka The creature wheezes and gasps as its breath is stolen, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1}. The creature then begins holding its breath but has only half its normal number of rounds of remaining air.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature has all the air sucked out from its lungs and immediately starts to suffocate.

Vampiric Exsanguination.name: Wampiryczne Wykrwawienie
Vampiric Exsanguination.description:
Wysysasz krew i siłę życiową innych istot przez swoje wyciągnięte ramiona. Zadajesz żyjącym istotom w obszarze 12k6 obrażeń od pustki z podstawowym rzutem obronnym Krzepy.

Zyskujesz tymczasowe Punkty Żywotności równe połowie obrażeń, które pojedyncza istota otrzymuje od tego zaklęcia. Oblicz te tymczasowe Punkty Żywotności w oparciu o istotę, która otrzymała najwięcej obrażeń. Tracisz wszelkie pozostałe tymczasowe Punkty Żywotności po 1 minucie.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6.

Vampiric Feast.name: Wampiryczna Uczta
Vampiric Feast.description:
Twój dotyk wysysa z celu esencję życiową i przekazuje ją tobie. Zadajesz celowi 6k6 obrażeń od pustki. Zyskujesz tymczasowe Punkty Żywotności w liczbie równej połowie obrażeń odnoszonych przez cel (po zastosowaniu odporności i tym podobnych). Po 1 minucie tracisz wszelkie pozostałę tymczasowe Punkty Żywotności.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 2k6.

Vampiric Maiden.name: Vampiric Maiden
Vampiric Maiden.description:
A ghostly iron maiden snaps shut on the target and drains its vitality for your gain. This deals 4k4 piercing damage and 4k4 void damage, and the target must attempt a Fortitude save. You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the void damage the target takes (after applying resistances, weaknesses, and the like). You lose any remaining temporary Hit Points after 1 minute.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target takes half damage.

Porażka The target is briefly trapped within the vampiric maiden. The target takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomiony} by the iron maiden for 1 round or until it uses an Interact action to extricate itself, whichever comes first.

Krytyczna Porażka The target takes double damage and is immobilized by the vampiric maiden for 1 round or until it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes} (the DC is your spell DC), whichever comes first.

Wywyższenie (+1) The piercing and void damage increase by 1k4 each.

Vanishing Tracks.name: Zanikające Ślady
Vanishing Tracks.description:
Ukrywasz pozostawiane za sobą ślady. ST testów Wytropienia cię zyskuje premię statusową +4 lub równa się ST twoich zaklęć, cokolwiek zapewnia wyższy ST.

Wywyższenie (2.) Czas trwania zwiększa się do 8 godzin.

Wywyższenie (4.) Czas trwania zwiększa się do 8 godzin. Zaklęcie zyskuje zasięg 20 stóp i obszar emanacji 20 stóp, obejmując swoim działaniem wybrane przez ciebie 10 istot w obszarze.

Vapor Form.name: Vapor Form
Vapor Form.description:
The target transforms into a vaporous state. In this state, the target is amorphous. It loses any item bonus to AC and all other effects and bonuses from armor, and it uses its proficiency modifier for unarmored defense. It gains resistance 8 to physical damage and is immune to precision damage. It can't cast spells, activate items, or use actions that have the attack or manipulate trait. It gains a fly Speed of 10 feet and can slip through tiny cracks. The target can Dismiss the spell.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.sILRkGTwoBywy0BU]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Vapor Form}

Variable Gravity.name: Variable Gravity
Variable Gravity.description:
You can adjust how strongly gravity grips you, changing between low gravity, normal gravity, and high gravity with ease. Choose one type of gravity when you cast the spell. While the spell lasts, you can change the type of gravity with a single action, which has the concentrate trait. The spell doesn't alter your physical appearance, so it's impossible to what type of gravity you're subjected to by casual observation.

  • Low Gravity You can jump double the normal distance when you Long Jump or Leap, though still to a maximum of your Speed. When you High Jump, you can use the calculation for a Long Jump but don't double the distance. Rather than the normal calculation for falling damage, when you fall, you take no damage for the first 10 feet and then take bludgeoning damage equal to a quarter of the remaining distance you fell. Abilities that adjust how much falling damage you take still apply.
  • High Gravity You become encumbered. You gain a +2 status bonus to your saving throws and DCs to resist forced movement and attempts to knock you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}. You reduce the distance forced movement moves you by half or 10 feet, whichever is more. You can only jump half as high and far. Rather than the normal calculation for falling damage, you take bludgeoning damage equal to the distance you fall. Abilities that adjust how much falling damage you take still apply. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.28NvrpZmELvyrHUt]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Variable Gravity (High Gravity)}

Wywyższenie (6.) Czas trwania zwiększa się do 1 hour

Vector Screen.name: Vector Screen
Vector Screen.description:
One five-foot square.

You set up a transparent, rippling screen of telekinetic energy that seizes small, fast-moving projectiles. Creatures can pass through the screen, but ammunition from physical ranged attacks-such as arrows, bolts, sling bullets, and other objects of similar size-is automatically trapped in the screen, clattering to the ground once the spell ends. Attacks with bigger ranged weapons, such as javelins, take a –2 circumstance penalty to their attack rolls if their paths pass through the screen. Massive ranged weapons and spell effects that don't create physical objects pass through the screen with no penalty.

Wywyższenie (5.) The screen is 10 feet wide.

Wywyższenie (6.) The screen is 10 feet wide and can interfere even with massless attacks, like magical blasts or gouts of flame. The screen imposes a –2 circumstance penalty to the attack rolls of spell effects even if they don't create physical objects. It also protects against area effects that pass through the screen, granting standard cover to creatures on the opposite side of the screen from the center or origin point of an area.

Veil of Confidence.name: Veil of Confidence
Veil of Confidence.description: You surround yourself in a veil of confidence. You reduce your current @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony} condition by 1, and whenever you would become Frightened during the duration, reduce the amount by 1. If you critically fail a save against fear, veil of confidence reduces your frightened value from that effect, and then ends.

Veil of Dreams.name: Veil of Dreams
Veil of Dreams.description:
Your patron draws the target into a drowsy state, causing daydreams and sluggishness. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target takes a –1 status penalty to Perception, attack rolls, and Will saves. This penalty increases to –2 for Will saves against sleep effects.

Porażka As success, and any time the target uses a concentrate action, it must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:5] or the action is disrupted.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.hkLhZsH3T6jc9S1y]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Veil of Dreams}

Veil of Privacy.name: Zasłona Prywatności
Veil of Privacy.description: Wznosisz ochronne bariery, które utrudniają wykrycie celu za pomocą magii. Zasłona prywatności próbuje przeciwdziałać wszystkim efektom wykrywania, objawienia i wróżbiarstwa użytym przeciwko celowi lub wyposażeniu celu przez cały czas trwania zaklęcia, licząc na rzecz tego przeciwdziałania sztuczki jako zaklęcia 1. kręgu. Udane przeciwdziałanie zaklęciu, które obiera za cel obszar lub wiele celów, neguje efekty tylko dla celu zasłony prywatności.

Vengeful Glare.name: Vengeful Glare
Vengeful Glare.description:
Your gaze falls on a creature, filled with icy vengeance or fiery wrath. The gaze deals 1k4 damage (basic Fortitude save). It deals your choice of cold damage or fire damage and gains the appropriate trait. If you already dealt damage to the creature earlier this turn, it also takes 1 persistent damage of the gaze's type (@Damage[(@item.rank)[cold,persistent]]{persistent cold damage} or @Damage[(@item.rank)[fire,persistent]]{persistent fire damage}).

Wywyższenie (+1) The initial damage increases by 1k4 and persistent damage by 1.

Ventriloquism.name: Brzuchomówstwo
Ventriloquism.description:
Za każdym razem, kiedy coś mówisz lub wydajsz wokalnie inny dźwięk, możesz sprawić, że wokalizacja zdaje się dochodzić z innego punktu w zasięgu 60 stóp i możesz dowolnie zmieniać tę pozorną lokalizację w trakcie wokalizowania. Każda istota słysząca dźwięk, może spróbować podważyć swoją wiarę w twoją iluzję.

Wywyższenie (2.) Czas trwania zaklęcia zwiększa się do 1 godziny oraz możesz zmieniać ton, jakość i inne aspekty swojego głosu. Zanim istota może spróować podważyć swoją wiarę w twoją iluzję musi aktywnie użyć testu Percepcji lub w inny sposób zinteraktować z dźwiękiem.

Verdant Sprout.name: Verdant Sprout
Verdant Sprout.description:
You imbue a single ordinary, inexpensive plant seed with primal energy and throw it onto a surface, where it gradually sprouts into a Medium plant. After 10 minutes, the plant is sturdy enough to provide standard cover, and its space is difficult terrain. The plant is laden with nutritious nuts or fruit sufficient to feed one Medium creature for a day. The plant has AC 10, Hardness 5, and 20 Hit Points.

Wywyższenie (+1) You throw an additional seed, which grows into an additional plant within range.

Verminous Lure.name: Verminous Lure
Verminous Lure.description:
Upon casting, the target emits a musk that's captivating to certain animals. Tiny animals and animal swarms of any size within range must attempt a Will save. On a failure, non-hostile animals or animal swarms try to touch the target. If hostile, such creatures choose to attack the target instead of other foes, if able to do so without spending additional actions or exposing themselves to additional danger.

Verminous lure doesn't change animals' attitudes towards the target and is easily overridden by more direct control, such as the Command an Animal action. Animals with imprecise sense can use their scent as a precise sense against the target.

Vibrant Pattern.name: Vibrant Pattern
Vibrant Pattern.description:
You create a pattern of lights that pulses with intensity. Creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} while inside the pattern. In addition, a creature must attempt a Will saving throw if it's inside the pattern when you cast it, enters the pattern, ends its turn within the pattern, or uses a Seek or Interact action on the pattern. A creature currently @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Oślepiony} by the pattern doesn't need to attempt new saving throws.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Porażka The creature is Blinded by the pattern. If it exits the pattern, it can attempt a new save to recover from the Blinded condition at the end of each of its turns, to a maximum duration of 1 minute.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature is Blinded for 1 minute.

Vibrant Thorns.name: Bujne Ciernie
Vibrant Thorns.description:
Twoje ciało pokrywa się warstwą kłujących cierni, które rosną bujnie dzięki magii życia. Sąsiadujące istoty, które trafią cię atakiem w zwarciu, w tym atakiem wręcz, otrzymują obrażenia @Damage[(@item.rank)[piercing]] za każdym razem, gdy to zrobią. Ilekroć rzucasz zaklęcie witalności, obrażenia od cierni wzrastają do @Damage[(@item.rank)d6[piercing]] do rozpoczęcia twojej następnej tury.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1, lub o 1k6 po rzuceniu zaklęcia witalności.

Vibrant Vibrato.name: Vibrant Vibrato
Vibrant Vibrato.description:
Your voice trills in perfect vibrato. When casting the spell, you can make the area any radius you choose, up to 40 feet. The reverberations of your voice continue to shimmer and hang in the air as long as you Sustain the spell but can't be heard at all outside of the area. A creature must attempt a Will save if it's within the area when you Cast the Spell or as soon as it enters the area while the spell is in effect. Once a creature has attempted the save, it uses the same result for that casting of vibrant vibrato.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature takes @Damage[5d10[persistent,sonic]] damage at the end of their turn as long as they remain within the aura's area of effect.

Porażka As success, but if the creature leaves the area, or if you move far enough from the creature that they're no longer in the area, the creature hears a shattering sound and takes 5k10 sonic damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 1}. The creature is then @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Ogłuchły} for the rest of the spell's duration.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the creature takes double the sonic damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Ogłuszony 3}.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage on a failed save increases by 1k10.

Vicious Jealousy.name: Vicious Jealousy
Vicious Jealousy.description:
The target is overcome by deep jealousy and resentment that twists its mind against other creatures. It must attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces For 1 round, the target no longer treats anyone as its allies. The spell then ends.

Porażka The target no longer treats anyone as its allies. The target can't take the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{Wsparcie} reaction or any action that would directly benefit another creature, such as casting a beneficial spell on them, though it can still take actions that indirectly benefit other creatures, such as fighting the same foes.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, and whenever the target starts its turn within reach of a creature it previously considered an ally, it must spend its first action on its turn to berate the creature or otherwise wave it away.

Wywyższenie (4.) Możesz obrać za cel do 10 istot.

Victory Cry.name: Victory Cry
Victory Cry.description:
Aktywator An ally within range critically succeeds at a melee Strike.

Your true might comes from your bonds with your allies, and you glory in their achievements. The weapon used to make the Strike deals an additional 1k6 sonic damage (not doubled due to the critical hit), and the ally can immediately attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Odepchnięcie} the creature struck, even if the ally's hands are full. Your ally can use its item bonus to the triggering attack roll on the Athletics check, if any, and it gains a +1 status bonus to the Athletics check if the triggering Strike was with a weapon that has the trip trait or an unarmed attack that has the trip trait.

Wywyższenie (+2) The sonic damage increases by 1k6.

Vindicator's Judgment.name: Vindicator's Judgment
Vindicator's Judgment.description:
You pronounce a terrible judgment upon your quarry that causes all of your attacks and divine spells to strike with deadly efficacy. The target takes extra damage from your attacks, depending on the result of its Fortitude save. The spell ends immediately if the target is no longer your hunted prey.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected.

Sukces The target has weakness 5 to the next Strike you make against it or damaging divine spell you cast that includes it as a target before the end of your next turn.

Porażka The target has weakness 5 to all Strikes you make against it or damaging divine spells you cast that includes it as a target for the duration of the spell.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda} against the first Strike or divine spell attack you make against it each round for the duration of the spell.

Wywyższenie (7th) The weakness is 10.

Wywyższenie (9th) The weakness is 15.

Vindicator's Mark.name: Vindicator's Mark
Vindicator's Mark.description:
You launch a magical dart at your hunted prey, which marks them with a nimbus only you can detect. Make a spell attack against the target. On a hit, you deal 2k4 spirit damage and the target is marked by a glowing nimbus of energy that only you can see. For the duration of your spell, the marked target takes an additional +2 damage from all your weapon or unarmed attacks. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialny} targets marked by your vindicator's mark are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} to you, rather than @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Niewykryty}.

You can Dismiss the spell on your turn if your last action dealt damage to the target with a weapon or unarmed attack, instantly dealing an additional @Damage[(ceil(@item.rank/2)+1)d6[spirit]] damage to it.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.zdyelSV3S2ZFHsT4]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Vindicator's Mark}

Wywyższenie (+2) The initial damage increases by 2k4, the additional damage you deal increases by 1, and the damage dealt when the spell is Dismissed increases by 1k6.

Vision of Beauty.name: Vision of Beauty
Vision of Beauty.description:
You create a phantasmal image of the most beautiful creature imaginable to the target at a location somewhere within the spell's range. Only the spell's target can see the beauty, though you can see the vague shape of the illusion as it manifests. The effect of the vision is based on the outcome of the target's Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target is intrigued by the vision, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 1} for 1 round.

Porażka The target is entranced by the vision, becoming stupefied 1 for 1 round and moving toward the image's location via the most direct route possible for 1 round, bypassing any obvious hazards and enemies in the way. The target is then @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Zafascynowany} by the illusion for 1 round.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, except the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 2} and becomes fascinated by the illusion for 1 minute instead of 1 round.

Wywyższenie (+2) You can target an additional creature in range.

Vision of Death.name: Vision of Death
Vision of Death.description:
You force the target to see a vision of its own death. It takes 8k6 mental damage with a Will save. If the target is reduced to 0 HP by this spell, its vision becomes reality and kills it instantly.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected.

Sukces The target takes half damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1}.

Porażka The target takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2}.

Krytyczna Porażka The target takes double damage, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 4} and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Uciekający} for as long as it's frightened.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 2k6.

Vision of Weakness.name: Vision of Weakness
Vision of Weakness.description:
You focus your gaze on a creature and gain a flash of divine insight into its nature. If the creature has any weaknesses, you learn them, as well as which of its three saving throw modifiers is lowest.

You also learn an inherent understanding of its movements and gain a +2 status bonus to your next attack roll (or skill check made as part of an attack action) against that foe before the end of your turn.

The target is then temporarily immune to Vision of Weakness for 1 day.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.70qdCBokXBvKIUIQ]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Vision of Weakness}

Visions of Danger.name: Visions of Danger
Visions of Danger.description:
An illusion of horrific creatures fills the spell's area. The creatures look like Tiny swarming monsters with a specific appearance of your choice, such as fiendish flies or animated saw blades. The burst deals 8k8 mental damage with a basic Will save to each creature that's inside the burst when it's created, enters the burst, or starts its turn inside the burst. A creature that critically succeeds at its Will save can immediately attempt to disbelieve the illusion. A creature that tries to Interact with the monsters or observes one with a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Szukanie} action can attempt to disbelieve the illusion. Creatures that disbelieve the illusion take no damage from the illusion thereafter.

Wywyższenie (+1) The mental damage increases by 1k8

Vital Beacon.name: Vital Beacon
Vital Beacon.description:
Vitality radiates outward from you, allowing others to supplicate and receive healing. Once per round, either you or an ally can use an Interact action to supplicate and lay hands upon you to regain Hit Points. Each time the beacon heals someone, it decreases in strength. It restores @Damage[(@item.rank)d10[healing,vitality]|shortLabel] Hit Points to the first creature, @Damage[(@item.rank)d8[healing,vitality]|shortLabel] Hit Points to the second, @Damage[(@item.rank)d6[healing,vitality]|shortLabel] Hit Points to the third, and @Damage[(@item.rank)d4[healing,vitality]|shortLabel] Hit Points to the fourth, after which the spell ends. You can have only one vital beacon active at a time.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.WWtSEJGwKY4bQpUn]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Vital Beacon}

Wywyższenie (+1) The beacon restores one additional die of Hit Points each time it heals, using the same die size as the others for that step.

Vital Luminance.name: Vital Luminance
Vital Luminance.description:
Drawing life force into yourself, you become a beacon of vitality. You glow with bright light in a 30-foot emanation (and dim light to the next 30 feet), and you gain an internal pool of light called a luminance reservoir, which begins with a value of 4. At the start of each of your turns, increase your reservoir by 4.

If an undead creature damages you with an attack or spell while it's within the bright light of your aura, that creature takes vitality damage equal to half your luminance reservoir value. It takes this damage only the first time it damages you in a round.

You can Dismiss this Spell. When you do, you can target a creature within your light and direct the vital energy into it. The target must be a willing living creature or an undead creature. This heals a living target or deals vitality damage to an undead target equal to your luminance reservoir's value.

If you Cast this Spell again, any previous casting ends.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.6ArAZeZyYSNLI0X5]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Vital Luminance}

Wywyższenie (+1) Both the initial value of your luminance reservoir and the amount you gain each turn increase by 1.

Vital Singularity.name: Vital Singularity
Vital Singularity.description:
When several companions or followers have reached a point of undying love and trust in you, they might be willing to die to save your life. You can grant them that wish. The secondary casters must be living creatures willing to sacrifice their energy to you, by allowing their life essence to drain out of them to protect you whenever you're in danger. If you're undead, the secondary casters must be undead instead, and if you're neither living nor undead, you can't cast vital singularity. Whenever you take damage, after calculating the total amount of damage, including immunities, resistances, weaknesses, and any other increases or mitigation, divide the amount by 4, rounding down. You and each of the secondary casters lose that many Hit Points. If a secondary caster doesn't have enough Hit Points to give before dropping to 0 Hit Points, you take any remaining damage for them as well. When a secondary caster reaches 0 Hit Points in this way, their skin dries out like leather as the last of their life leaves their bodies; this is a death effect.

Krytyczny Sukces The light from your secondary casters envelops you in a warm radiance. In addition to the effects described above, you're healed to full Hit Points upon completion of the ritual.

Sukces The secondary casters channel their energies to you, protecting you as described above.

Porażka The secondary casters cry out in sorrow, reaching out to you to feel your embrace, then they grow sad that they couldn't live up to your expectations. Nothing else happens.

Krytyczna Porażka The secondary casters' attempts to unite with you become desperate, but ultimately, the only function of the link was to disorient all of you, making your bodies feel like they aren't your own. You and all secondary casters become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 3} for 3 days.

Vitality Lash.name: Smagnięcie Witalności
Vitality Lash.description:
Dewastujesz spaczoną esencję celu energią z Kuźni Kreacji. Zadajesz 2k6 obrażeń witalności z podstawowym rzuten obronnym Krzepy. Jeśli istota odniesie na rzucie obronnym krytyczną porażkę, jest też dodatkowo @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 1} do początku twojej następnej tury.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k6.
Vitality Lash.target: 1 istota, która jest nieumarła lub posiada leczenie pustką

Vitrifying Blast.name: Vitrifying Blast
Vitrifying Blast.description:
You launch a cone of glass shards, which embed in creatures to turn them partially to glass. The shards deal 8k6 piercing damage to creatures in the area, based on each creature's saving throw.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target takes half damage and gains weakness 3 to sonic and bludgeoning damage for 1 round.

Porażka Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 1}, and gains weakness to sonic and bludgeoning damage. The weakness is equal to 3 × the slowed value it has from this spell. The target must attempt a Fortitude save at the end of each of its turns; this ongoing save has the incapacitation trait. On a failed save, the creature's slowed value increases by 1 (or by 2 on a critical failure), to a maximum of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 3}. A successful save reduces the creature's slowed value by 1 (or by 2 on a critical success). If the creature ends its turn with a slowed value of 0, the effect ends.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the target is initially @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniony 2}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.UFfItbPq9cVq3LNa]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Vitrifying Blast}

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k6.

Voice on the Breeze.name: Voice on the Breeze
Voice on the Breeze.description:
You whisper a secret message or sound into the wind, which carries it to a designated spot. The message travels to a specific @Template[burst|distance:10] within range that's familiar to you, provided there's a path for the wind to follow between you and the area. The gentle breeze goes all but unnoticed until it reaches its destination, where it delivers its whisper-quiet message. The message is delivered regardless of who or what is present to hear it, even if no one receives it at all. Once the message is delivered, the spell ends.

Your message can contain no more than 25 words, 1 round's worth of other sounds, or a simple rustling in the air at the target location. It moves at a speed of your choosing between 1 mile per hour and 1 mile per 10 minutes; when it arrives, the wind swirls around the area and whispers the full message. A voice on the breeze can't activate magical effects triggered by voices.

Wywyższenie (4.) The range increases to 1,000 miles, and the message can contain up to 100 words.

Void Harvest.name: Void Harvest
Void Harvest.description:
The sky darkens over the affected area and the air becomes oppressive as you open a direct conduit to the Void, a plane of vast nothingness. Living creatures start to feel their life force draining away as the terror of oblivion begins to grip their hearts.

Each year on the anniversary of the ritual's casting, a total of four casters can spend 1 hour at the center of the affected area to sustain the effect. To do so, one caster must spend 1 Mythic Point and succeed at a Religion check against the ritual's casting DC. Each year the ritual is successfully sustained, the radius increases from its original point by 1 mile. The effect fades away if the check fails or if there are no other attempts to sustain the ritual.

Krytyczny Sukces As success, but living creatures in the area take a –2 status penalty to saves against death effects or effects that deal void damage.

Sukces The first time each day a living creature in the area takes damage, it must succeed at a Will save with a DC equal to the ritual's casting DC or gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} condition; if it already has the doomed condition, it instead increases the value of it by 1. Dead creatures can't be raised or resurrected so long as their body remains in the ritual's area. Undead creatures gain vitality resistance equal to their level while in the area.

Porażka The ritual has no effect.

Krytyczna Porażka An explosion of energy from the Void washes over the casters. Each caster becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 4}. This condition can't be removed for 1 week.

Void Warp.name: Zakrzywienie Pustki
Void Warp.description:
Wzywasz potęgę Pustki aby niszczyć siłę życiową. Cel odnosi 2k4 obrażeń od pustki z podstawowym rzutem obronnym Krzepy. Przy krytycznej porażce cel jest dodatkowo @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 1} do początku twojej następnej tury.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 1k4.

Volcanic Eruption.name: Volcanic Eruption
Volcanic Eruption.description:
Area 5-foot radius, 80-foot-tall cylinder

The ground opens up, spraying a column of lava high into the air in a vertical cylinder, dealing 14k6 fire damage to creatures in the area. The lava rapidly cools and encases creatures in the area. A creature encased in rock is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1} and takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speeds. All normal terrain is difficult terrain to a flying creature, and such creatures immediately descend 20 feet the moment they're encased, but they don't take damage from this fall. A creature encased in rock can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} against your spell DC to end the effect. Otherwise, the creature remains encased until it takes a total of 50 damage, freeing it from the rock. Additionally, creatures in the area and those within 5 feet of the lava column automatically take @Damage[(@item.rank -4)d6[fire]] damage from the intense heat, regardless of the results of their saving throws.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.8UqFvOCZqecPam4Y]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Volcanic Eruption}

Krytyczny Sukces Efekt nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature takes half damage.

Porażka The creature takes full damage and is encased.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature takes double damage and is encased.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage in the area increases by 2k6, and the damage from the intense heat increases by 1k6.

Vomit Swarm.name: Vomit Swarm
Vomit Swarm.description:
You belch forth a swarm of magical vermin. You evoke and shape the creatures from your own imagination, allowing you to change the appearance of the creatures (typically a mix of centipedes, roaches, wasps, and worms), but this doesn't change the effect of the spell. The vermin swarm over anyone in the area, their bites and stings dealing 2k8 piercing damage (basic Reflex save). A creature that fails its saving throw also becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 1}. Once the spell ends, the swarm disappears.

Wywyższenie (+1) The damage increases by 1k8.

Voracious Gestalt.name: Voracious Gestalt
Voracious Gestalt.description:
You create a powerful spirit entity that grows and builds strength by consuming the spirits of foes you both slay. When you Cast the Spell, the gestalt deals 14k6 void damage to all living creatures of your choice in the area, with a basic Fortitude save. Creatures you choose that end their turns in the area take @Damage[(@item.level -3)d6[void]] damage, with a basic Fortitude save.

At the end of each of your turns, if you killed a living creature during that turn or if the gestalt's damage killed a creature since the end of your prior turn, you add the slain creature's soul to the gestalt. The emanation's radius increases by 20 feet and the damage dealt by the aura increases by 1k6. (Note that this increase only happens once, even if you killed multiple living creatures that turn.) As normal for determining threat level, the GM determines if a creature is of significant enough threat to empower the gestalt; in general, a creature several levels below you rarely poses a significant threat.

Wywyższenie (10th) The initial damage increases to 16k6 and the aura's damage starts at 7k6 void damage.

Wails of the Damned.name: Wails of the Damned
Wails of the Damned.description:
You howl a lament of damned souls. Each living enemy in the area takes 8k10 void damage and must attempt a Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The creature takes full damage.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony} [[/r 1d4]].

Krytyczna Porażka Istota odnosi podwójne obrażenia and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 4}.

Waking Dream.name: Waking Dream
Waking Dream.description:
You cloud the target's mind with vivid, dreamlike imagery, so they have difficulty distinguishing real threats from imagined ones.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target is distracted by the visions and treats all other creatures as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} for 1 round, and you can't Sustain the Spell to increase the duration.

Porażka The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Zdezorientowany}. In addition to the creatures present, the target might also attack wildly at thin air, attempting to fend off the dreams. It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns to end the confusion. Even if the confused effect ends early, the target treats all other creatures as concealed for 1 round.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the target gets no save to end the effect early.

Waking Nightmare.name: Waking Nightmare
Waking Nightmare.description:
You fill the creature's mind with a terrifying vision. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli. A creature frightened by this spell takes 1 additional mental damage each time it's hit by a Strike.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1}.

Porażka The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2}. If it's asleep, it wakes up and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Sparaliżowany} for 1 round.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 3}.

Wywyższenie (+1) The mental damage increases by 1.

Wall Of Mirrors.name: Wall Of Mirrors
Wall Of Mirrors.description:
You create a solid wall of shimmering reflective glass up to 50 feet long and 20 feet high. The wall is an inch thick and stands vertically. You must create the wall in an unbroken open space so its edges don't pass through any creatures or objects, or the spell is lost. Each 10-foot-by-10-foot section of the wall has AC 10, Hardness 10, and 40 Hit Points, and it's immune to critical hits and precision damage. Everything on each side of the wall is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} from creatures on the opposite side. If a creature Strikes the wall, the wall causes the creature to endure the mental anguish of that attack's pain as well; the creature takes 4k4 mental damage and can resist this damage with a basic Will save.

Wywyższenie (+1) The Hit Points of each section of the wall increase by 10.

Wall of Fire.name: Ściana Ognia
Wall of Fire.description:
Wznosisz płonącą ścianę, która parzy istoty przez nią przechodzące. Tworzysz albo ścianę płomieni o grubości 5 stóp, w linii prostej o długości do 60 stóp i wysokości 10 stóp, albo pierścień płomieni o grubości 5 stóp i promieniu 10 stóp o tej samej wysokości. W obu formach ściana stoi pionowo. Jeśli chcesz, ściana może mieć mniejszą długość lub wysokość. Wszystko po jednej stronie ściany jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięte} dla istot po stronie przeciwnej. Każda istota, która przekroczy ścianę lub zajmuje jej obszar na początku swojej tury, otrzymuje 4k6 obrażeń od ognia.

Wywyższenie (+1) Obrażenia od ognia zwiększają się 1k6.

Wall of Flesh.name: Wall of Flesh
Wall of Flesh.description:
You craft a 20-foot-tall wall of living flesh in a straight line up to 30 feet long. The wall is 3 feet thick, and each 5-foot-long section has AC 10 and 75 Hit Points. If you wish, the wall can be of a smaller length or height. You must create the wall in an unbroken open space so its edges don't pass through any creatures or objects, or the spell is lost. The wall can't be Repaired but can be healed by vitality, and healing spells and abilities. When you Cast the Spell, choose one of the following features for your wall.

  • Mouths The wall has countless toothy mouths along its surface. The mouths Strike any creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of the wall, using your spell attack modifier for these Strikes and dealing @Damage[(1+(ceil((@item.level - 4) / 2)))d6[piercing]] damage. The mouths are capable of consuming potions; since the wall is alive, it can recover Hit Points from a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.2RuepCemJhrpKKao]{Healing Potion}, but it can't benefit from any effect that would give it the ability to move. Otherwise, the GM determines which potions can affect the wall.
  • Eyes The wall sprouts hundreds of unblinking eyes. You can see through these eyes, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to visual Perception checks within the wall's line of sight. You can also use the eyes for determining line of sight for ranged attacks and spells, but you don't have line of effect through the wall.

  • Arms The wall is a mass of grasping arms. Any creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of the wall must attempt a Reflex save.

    • Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

    • Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Pochwycony} by the wall for 1 round or until it Escapes against your spell DC, whichever comes first.

    • Krytyczna Porażka The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Spętany} by the wall for 1 round or until it Escapes against your spell DC, whichever comes first.

Wywyższenie (+2) The Hit Points of each section of the wall increase by 10, and the piercing damage dealt by the wall's mouths increases by 1k6.

Wall of Force.name: Ściana Magii
Wall of Force.description:
Tworzysz @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialną} ścianę czystej magicznej mocy o długości do 50 stóp i wysokości do 20 stóp. Ściana zdaje się nie posiadać grubości. Musisz utworzyć ścianę na nieprzerwanej otwartej przestrzeni tak aby jej krawędzie nie przechodziły przez żadne istoty ani obiektu, lub zaklęcie rozprasza się. Ściana ma KP 10, Twardość 30 i 60 Punktów Żywotności oraz jest niewrażliwa na trafienia krytyczne i obrażenia precyzyjne. Ściana blokuje wszelkie efekty fizyczne, nie pozwalając im przez siebie przeniknąć, a w związku z tym, że wykonana jest ona z magicznej mocy, blokuje również istoty bezcielesne i eteryczne. Przez barierę mogą przedostać się efekty teleportacyjne oraz wzrokowe (jako, że jest ona niewidzialna). Ściana magii jest nieważliwa na przeciwdziałające jej efekty poziomu nie większego od jej poziomu, ale jest automatycznie niszczona przez zaklęcie @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r7ihOgKv19eJQnik]{Dezintegracji} dowolnego kręgu.

Wywyższenie (+2) Punkty Żywotności ściany zwiększają się o 20.

Wall of Ice.name: Wall of Ice
Wall of Ice.description:
You sculpt an ice barrier that blocks sight and, once shattered, freezes foes. You create either a 1-foot-thick wall of ice in a straight line up to 60 feet long and 10 feet high (the wall doesn't have to be vertical, but it must be anchored on both sides to a solid surface) or a 1-foot-thick, 10-foot radius hemisphere of ice. The ice that makes up the wall is opaque. If you wish, the wall can be of a smaller length, height, or radius.

You must create the wall in an unbroken open space so its edges don't pass through any creatures or objects, or the spell is lost. Each 10-foot-by-10-foot section of the wall has AC 10, Hardness 10, and 40 Hit Points, and it's immune to critical hits, cold damage, and precision damage. A section also has weakness 15 to fire; a section of the wall destroyed by fire melts, evaporating into water and steam. A section destroyed by means other than fire leaves behind a chilling mass of ice that is difficult terrain and deals 2k6 cold damage to any creature passing through it.

Wywyższenie (+2) The Hit Points of each section of the wall increase by 10, and the cold damage dealt to creatures crossing a destroyed section increases by 1k6.

Wall of Metal.name: Wall of Metal
Wall of Metal.description:
You call forth a sheet of metal, forming a wall of iron, low-grade cold iron, or standard-grade silver up to 60 feet long, 30 feet high, and 1/4 inch thick. The wall doesn't need to stand vertically but must form a straight line in an unbroken open space so it doesn't pass through any creatures or objects, or the spell is lost. Each 10-foot-by-10- foot section of the wall has AC 10 and is immune to critical hits and precision damage. The wall's Hardness, HP, and BT use the statistics of a structure of the material you chose. Creatures can move through a section of the wall that's broken.

Wywyższenie (7.) The wall is high-grade silver or standard-grade dawnsilver.

Wywyższenie (8.) The wall is standard-grade cold iron.

Wywyższenie (9.) The wall is high-grade dawnsilver.

Wywyższenie (10.) The wall is high-grade cold iron or standard-grade adamantine.

Wall of Radiance.name: Wall of Radiance
Wall of Radiance.description:
You create a thin wall of brilliant light in a straight line up to 60 feet long and 10 feet high. You must create the wall in an unbroken open space so its edges don't pass through any creatures or objects, or the spell is lost. The wall stands vertically and, if you wish, can be of a shorter length or height. Creatures adjacent to the wall are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony}. Creatures that move through the wall take 2k6 fire damage (basic Fortitude save) as the concentrated light burns them.

Wywyższenie (4th) The light makes it difficult to discern creatures on the other side. Creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} to other creatures on the opposite side of the wall from them. The fire damage increases to 3k6.

Wall of Shadow.name: Wall of Shadow
Wall of Shadow.description:
You form a wall of pure darkness in a straight line up to 60 feet long and 10 feet high. You must create the wall in an unbroken open space so its edges don't pass through any creatures or objects, or the spell is lost. The wall stands vertically and, if you wish, can be of a shorter length or height. The wall prevents light from passing through and appears as a sheet of pure darkness to creatures observing it.

Creatures without darkvision or those unable to see through darkness can't see creatures on the other side of the wall. The wall is too thin for creatures to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Schować Się} in the darkness itself, but creatures can Hide from creatures on the other side of the wall as normal.

Wywyższenie (5.) Creatures with darkvision (but not greater darkvision) can barely see through the wall. They treat targets seen through the wall as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty}.

Wywyższenie (7.) Creatures with greater darkvision can barely see through the darkness. They treat targets seen through the wall as concealed. All other creatures are unable to see through the darkness at all.

Wall of Shrubs.name: Ściana Krzewów
Wall of Shrubs.description:
Wyczarowujesz linię krzewów naturalnie występujących w danym regionie, która wyrasta z ziemi. Ściana krzewów rozciąga się w linii o długości 60 stóp, wysokości poniżej 5 stóp i grubości 1 stopy, zapewniając mniejszą osłonę.

Wywyższenie (3.) Krzewy mają wysokość 10 stóp i grubość 5 stóp, zapewniają standardową osłonę oraz stanowią trudny teren i mają ST Wspinaczki równe 15. Czas trwania zwiększa się do 10 minut.

Wywyższenie (5.) Jak na kręgu 3. ale krzewy zapewniają większą osłonę a czas trwania zwiększa się do 1 godziny. Zamiast linii, możewsz zadecydować, że układasz krzewy w pierścieniu o promieniu nie większym od 30 stóp.

Wall of Stone.name: Wall of Stone
Wall of Stone.description:
You shape a wall of solid stone. You create a 1-inch-thick wall of stone up to 120 feet long, and 20 feet high. You can shape the wall's path, placing each 5 feet of the wall on the border between squares. The wall doesn't need to stand vertically, so you can use it to form a bridge or set of stairs, for example. You must conjure the wall in an unbroken open space so its edges don't pass through any creatures or objects, or the spell is lost.

Each 10-foot-by-10-foot section of the wall has AC 10, Hardness 14, and 50 Hit Points, and it's immune to critical hits and precision damage. A destroyed section of the wall can be moved through, but the rubble created from it is difficult terrain.

Wywyższenie (+2) The Hit Points of each section of the wall increase by 15.

Wall of Thorns.name: Wall of Thorns
Wall of Thorns.description:
You grow a wall of thorny brambles from the ground. You create a 5-foot-thick wall of brambles and thorns in a straight line up to 60 feet long and 10 feet high. You must create the wall in an unbroken open space so its edges don't pass through any creatures or objects, or the spell is lost. The wall stands vertically. If you wish, the wall can be of a shorter length or height. Everything on each side of the wall has cover from creatures on the opposite side, and the wall's spaces are difficult terrain. For every move action a creature uses to enter at least one of the wall's spaces, that creature takes 3k4 piercing damage.

Each 10-foot-by-10-foot section of the wall has AC 10, Hardness 10, and 20 Hit Points. It's immune to critical hits and precision damage. A destroyed section can be moved through freely.

Wywyższenie (+1) The Hit Points of each section of the wall increase by 5, and the piercing damage increases by 1k4.

Wall of Virtue.name: Wall of Virtue
Wall of Virtue.description:
You create a translucent wall of light, which draws power from the celestial realms. You create either a 5-foot-thick wall in a straight line up to 60 feet long and 10 feet high or a 5-foot-thick, 10-foot-radius ring with the same height. The wall sheds bright light for 20 feet on each side and dim light for the next 20 feet.

If the light passes through an area of magical darkness or targets a creature affected by magical darkness, wall of virtue attempts to counteract the darkness.

Any creature that crosses the wall or is occupying the wall's area at the start of its turn takes 1k8 spirit damage and 1k8 vitality damage.

Wywyższenie (+2) The spirit damage increases by 1k8, and the vitality damage increases by 1k8.

Wall of Water.name: Wall of Water
Wall of Water.description:
Raising your hand in the air, you call a massive wave onto the battlefield. The wall stays upright in a straight line that is 60 feet long, 10 feet high, and 5 feet thick.

Any non-magical fires within the wall of water's area that are its size or smaller are put out instantly. It also attempts to counteract any magical fires in its area. Both of these effects happen when the spell is cast and whenever a fire enters the wall's area. If the wall fails to counteract a given fire, it can't counteract that fire for the duration of the spell.

Bludgeoning or slashing projectiles can't pass through the wall, and piercing projectiles have their range increments halved if they pass through the wall. A creature traversing the wall of water needs to Swim through. The rules of aquatic combat apply to creatures traversing the wall of water, targeting creatures within the wall, or passing through the wall. For instance, a bludgeoning or slashing melee attack targeting a creature in the wall would take a –2 circumstance penalty.

Wall of Wind.name: Wall of Wind
Wall of Wind.description:
You create a barrier of gusting winds that hinders anything moving through it. The wall of swirling winds is 5 feet thick, 60 feet long, and 30 feet high. The wall stands vertically, but you can shape its path. Though the wall of wind distorts the air, it does not hamper sight. The wall has the following effects.

  • Ammunition from physical ranged attacks-such as arrows, bolts, sling bullets, and other objects of similar size-can't pass through the wall. Attacks with bigger ranged weapons, such as javelins, take a –2 circumstance penalty to their attack rolls if their paths pass through the wall. Massive ranged weapons and spell effects that don't create physical objects pass through the wall with no penalty.
  • The wall is difficult terrain to creatures attempting to move overland through it. Gases, including creatures in@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.V8wXOsoejQhe6CyG]{Vapor Form}, can't pass through the wall.
  • A creature that attempts to fly through the wall using a move action must attempt a Fortitude save.

Krytyczny Sukces The creature can move through the wall normally this turn.

Sukces The flying creature can move through the wall this turn, but the wall is difficult terrain.

Porażka The wall stops the movement of the flying creature, and any remaining movement from its current action is wasted.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, and the creature is pushed 10 feet away from the wall.

Wanderer's Guide.name: Wanderer's Guide
Wanderer's Guide.description: You call upon the beyond to guide your route. When you Cast this Spell, choose a destination; you receive an inspired route to that destination, allowing you and allies who travel overland with you to reduce the movement penalty from difficult terrain by half for the duration, as long as you don't deviate from the inspired route. This doesn't have any effect on movement during encounters. If you use this ability again before the duration is over, this effect ends and is replaced by that of the new route.

Ward Domain.name: Ward Domain
Ward Domain.cost: rare incenses, oils, and powdered silver, worth 150 gp total
Ward Domain.description:
Area 100 feet × 100 feet, up to 50 feet high.

This ritual has long been used to guard the private sanctums of powerful rulers, spellcasters, and other figures of import. You and the other casters spend the casting time burning incense, anointing doorframes, and drawing lines of powered silver across entryways. The ritual creates the following magical effects within the area; these effects are heightened to the rank of ward domain and remain throughout the duration.

All gates, doors, windows, and similar apertures in the area (if any) are locked, with the effects of lock. In addition, you can obscure up to six doors, doorways, or similar entrances within the area with the effects of illusory object to appear as plain walls. Scrying spells can't perceive any stimuli from the area, and ward domain attempts to counteract teleportation effects into or out of the area, including attempts to summon creatures into the area, using a modifier equal to the ritual's save DC – 10.

A successful dispel magic used on a specific effect removes only that effect (such as the lock effect on one window). A successful detonate magic ends the entire ritual.

Krytyczny Sukces You create the effects described above, and you protect an area twice as large.

Sukces You create the effects described above.

Porażka The ritual has no effect.

Krytyczna Porażka The area becomes trapped and hostile to you and your allies in a way you didn't anticipate.

Wywyższenie (+1) The ward covers an additional area 100 feet × 100 feet, up to 50 feet high, contiguous with the original area.

Warding Aggression.name: Zapora Agresji
Warding Aggression.description:
Przesycasz swój atak ochronną zaporą, którą próbujesz następnie naznaczyć wroga. Ta zapora zwiększa skuteczność twojej ochrony przed danym wrogiem, tak długo jak będziesz ją podtrzymywał poprzez atakowanie go. Wymierz wrogowi Cios w zwarciu bronią lub atakiem wręcz. W dodatku do normalnych efektów tego Ciosu, ma on efekt opisany poniżej. Zapora agresji przestaje działać, jeśli zaatakowany przez ciebie wróg umrze lub na koniec tury w której nie trafiłeś tego wroga Ciosem w zwarciu.

Krytyczny Sukces Zyskujesz premię statusową +3 do KP przeciw temu wrogowi na 1 rundę oraz premię statusową +2 do KP przeciw temu wrogowi na resztę czasu trwania.

Sukces Zyskujesz premię statusową +2 do KP przeciw temu wrogowi.

Porażka Zyskujesz premię statusową +1 do KP przeciw temu wrogowi.

Krytyczna Porażka Nie zyskujesz dodatkowych korzyści.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.7zJPd2BsFl82qFRV]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Zapora Agresji}

Warning Stripes.name: Warning Stripes
Warning Stripes.description:
Your skin becomes painted with vivid stripes or bright aposematic swirls, warning other creatures of its toxic qualities. Any creature that touches you or hits you with an unarmed melee attack takes 2k8 poison damage. If you have an animal companion, you can cast this spell on them instead, with a range of 30 feet.

Wywyższenie (+2) The poison damage increases by 1k8.

Warp Mind.name: Warp Mind
Warp Mind.description:
You scramble a creature's mental faculties and sensory input. The target must attempt a Will saving throw. Regardless of the result of that save, the target is then temporarily immune for 10 minutes. Warp mind's effects happen instantly, so @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Rozproszenie Magii} and other effects that counteract spells can't counteract them. However, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{Wish} rituals and abilities that can remove non-magical effects can still counteract the effects.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target spends the first action on its next turn with the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Zdezorientowany} condition.

Porażka The target is Confused for 1 minute.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is Confused permanently.

Warp Step.name: Zakrzywiający Krok
Warp Step.description:
Kiedy kroczysz po ziemi, ta zagina się pod twoimi stopami, kroki wydłużają się, dystans kurczy i wszystko staje się odrobinę bliższe. Zyskujesz premię statusową +5 stóp do swojej Prędkości do końca swojej tury. Następnie Biegniesz dwa razy. Możesz używać Zakrzywiającego Kroku aby Latać, Pływać, Ryć czy Wspinać Się jeśli masz odpowiadającą temu typowi ruchu prędkość.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.9Tl9jGUKoj0wS73d]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Zakrzywiający Krok}

Warped Terrain.name: Warped Terrain
Warped Terrain.description:
You create illusory hazards that cover all surfaces in the area (typically the ground). Any creature moving through the illusion treats the squares as difficult terrain. A creature can attempt to disbelieve the effect as normal after using a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Szukanie} action or otherwise spending actions interacting with the illusion. If it successfully disbelieves, it ignores the effect for the remaining duration. For each additional action you use casting the spell, the burst's radius increases by 5 feet, to a maximum of 10 extra feet for 3 actions.

Wywyższenie (4.) You can make the illusion appear in the air rather than on a surface, causing it to function as difficult terrain for flying creatures.

Warrior's Regret.name: Warrior's Regret
Warrior's Regret.description:
Regret eats away at the target's mind, punishing it for its violence until it ceases its hostility. Cel musi wykonać rzut obronny Woli.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces At the end of its next turn, the target takes 1k8 damage per different creature it intentionally damaged on that turn (1k8 if it damaged one creature, 2k8 if it damaged two different creatures, and so on). The maximum is 4k8 if it damaged 4 different creatures.

Porażka As success, except the curse damages the target at the end of each of its turns and lasts until the target spends a complete round without intentionally damaging another creature.

Krytyczna Porażka As success, except the curse damages the target at the end of each of its turns and lasts until the target spends 24 hours atoning for its perceived sins.

Wywyższenie (+2) The amount of mental damage the target takes for each creature it damaged that turn increases by 1k8, and the maximum damage the target can take per turn increases by 4k8.

Wash Your Luck.name: Wash Your Luck
Wash Your Luck.description:
Some practitioners argue this spell literally washes your fortunes of all influences, malign or benign, while others claim it simply cleanses your mind of obsessions about luck and destiny. You adjust your garments, change the posture of your chair, fidget with a religious symbol, or make some other innocuous and personally significant action to wash away bad luck.

Once during the spell's duration, before rolling a check, you can cancel out a misfortune effect on that roll, as normal when a fortune and misfortune effect apply to the same roll. After canceling out the misfortune effect, the spell ends, and you are then temporarily immune to wash your luck for 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.npFFTAxN44WWrGnM]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Wash Your Luck}

Water Breathing.name: Water Breathing
Water Breathing.description:
The targets can breathe underwater.

Wywyższenie (3.) Czas trwania zwiększa się do 8 hours.

Wywyższenie (4.) Czas trwania zwiększa się do until your next daily preparations.

Water Walk.name: Water Walk
Water Walk.description:
The target can walk on the surface of water and other liquids without falling through. It can go underwater if it wishes, but in that case it must Swim normally. This spell doesn't grant the ability to breathe underwater.

Wywyższenie (4.) Zasięg zaklęcia zwiększa się do 30 feet, the duration increases to 1 hour, and you can target up to 10 creatures.

Waterproof.name: Waterproof
Waterproof.description:
You prevent the target item from taking on water or becoming wet for the duration of the spell. The hydrophobic properties of the spell also grant resistance 10 to acid and a +2 bonus to saves and DCs against damaging effects with the water or acid traits.

Wywyższenie (4.) The duration is 1 day.

Wywyższenie (8.) The duration is unlimited.

Waters of Prediction.name: Waters of Prediction
Waters of Prediction.cost: rare incense and herbs worth a total value of 300 gp
Waters of Prediction.description:
You and the secondary casters peer into the still waters of a natural pool or lake to divine your collective future. Over the course of the minute following the ritual's end, the waters display a scene of one possible future involving the primary caster and as many secondary casters as feasible. This scene is usually, but not necessarily, set within the next few days. The future is unwritten, so the casters would be wise to not read guarantees into the cryptic nature of the visions shown in the water.

Krytyczny Sukces The scene gives hints as to at least one danger the casters are likely to face, as well as at least one method of effectively addressing the danger (showing the group examining an area of a wall containing a secret hatch to bypass a trap, for example).

Sukces The scene gives a hint as to at least one danger the casters are likely to face, or some cryptic method to effectively address or bypass a danger (such as a scene of lurking trolls, or a scene of the casters lighting several torches and passing them out, but not both).

Porażka The scene consists of so many contradictory details that it's impossible to identify a single danger or effective course of action from them.

Krytyczna Porażka The scene is wrong; it shows the casters facing a danger they're unlikely to come across, or encourages actions that hinder a likely upcoming encounter (such as encouraging chopping down several trees before meeting an arboreal or a dryad).
Waters of Prediction.primarycheck: Nature or Religion (master, the check has the secret trait)

Wave of Despair.name: Fala Rozpaczy
Wave of Despair.description:
Powodujesz rozpacz u istot w obszarze. Efekty dla każdej z istot, określane są na podstawie jej rzutu obronnego Woli.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Przez 1 rundę istota nie może użyuwać reakcji, oraz musi wykonać kolejny rzut obronny na początku jej tury — przy porażce jest @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Spowolniona 1} na tę turę, szlochając w niekontrolowany sposób.

Porażka Jak sukces ale czas trwania to 1 minuta.

Krytyczna Porażka Jak poważka, ale istota jest automatycznie Spowalniana 1 na 1 minutę.

Wywyższenie (7.) Obszar zwiększa się do stożka 60 stóp.

Weaken Earth.name: Osłabienie Ziemi
Weaken Earth.description:
Osłabiasz więzy spajające ziemię i kamień. Jeśli twój cel ma Twardość, możesz objąć działaniem jeden sąsiadujący z tobą obiekt o rozmiarach nie większych niż sześcian 5 stóp lub jedną istotę, zmniejszając ich Twardość o 5 do minimum 0. Jeśli cel nie ma Twardości, zyskuje podatność 3 na obrażenia fizyczne. Cel z modyfikatorem Krzepy może wykonać rzut obronny Krzepy negując efekt przy sukcesie.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.uD13zIE22foqmFgt]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Osłabienie Ziemi}

Wywyższenie (+2) Redukcja twardości zwiększa się o 5, rozmiar sąsiadującego obiektu zwiększa się o dodatkowy sześcian 5 stóp a wartość nakładanej podatności zwiększa się o 3.
Weaken Earth.target: 1 istota, niepilnowany obiekt albo 1 zagrożenie lub struktura zbudowana z kamienia lub ziemi

Weapon Storm.name: Weapon Storm
Weapon Storm.description:
Area 30-foot cone or 10-foot emanation

You swing a weapon you're holding, and the weapon magically multiplies into duplicates that swipe at all creatures in either a cone or an emanation. This flurry deals four dice of damage to creatures in the area. This damage has the same type as the weapon and uses the same die size. Determine the die size as if you were attacking with the weapon; for instance, if you were wielding a two-hand weapon in both hands, you'd use its two-hand damage die.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces The target takes half damage.

Porażka Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia.

Krytyczna Porażka The target takes double damage and is subject to the weapon's critical specialization effect.

Wywyższenie (+1) Add another damage die.

Weapon Surge.name: Wzmocnienie Broni
Weapon Surge.description:
Unosząc broń wysoko, napełniasz ją boską energią. Przy twoim następnym Ciosie tą bronią, przed początkiem twojej następnej tury, zyskujesz premię statusową +1 do rzutu ataku a broń zadaje dodatkowe 1k6 obrażeń duchowych, dodatkowo Cios ten zyskuje cechę Namaszczenie. Wzmocnienie Broni kończy się kiedy zakończysz ten Cios lub kiedy broń przestanie znajdować się w twoim posiadaniu.

Wywyższenie (5.) Atak zadaje dodatkowe 2k6 obrażeń duchowych.

Wywyższenie (9.) Atak zadaje dodatkowe 3k6 obrażeń duchowych.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.qlz0sJIvqc0FdUdr]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Wzmocnienie Broni}

Weapon Trance.name: Weapon Trance
Weapon Trance.description:
The serenity of violence fills your mind, giving you a heightened sense of knowing exactly where your weapons need to be. For the duration, your proficiency with martial weapons is equal to your proficiency with simple weapons. You automatically Sustain this spell as a free action the first time you hit with a weapon Strike each round.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.FInDzRVFPfiRQl6l]{Efekt Zaklęcia: Weapon Trance}

Weapon of Judgment.name: Weapon of Judgment
Weapon of Judgment.description:
An immense weapon of spiritual energy appears, hovering in the air above the target. The weapon has the ghostly visual appearance of your deity's favored weapon. Name war or peace when you cast this spell.

If you name "war," mentally choose one creature. This must be a creature both you and the target can see. The target instinctively knows which creature this is. At the end of each of the target's turns, if the target didn't use a hostile action against the creature you chose during that turn, the weapon Strikes the target.

If you name "peace," mentally choose up to five allies. The target instinctively knows who those allies are. The weapon Strikes the target each time the target uses a hostile action against you or one of the chosen allies. The weapon Strikes only once per action, even if the action targets multiple allies (such as for a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{Fireball} or a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AGydz5DKJ2KHSO4S]{Whirlwind Strike}).

Strikes with the weapon are melee weapon attacks, but they use your spell attack modifier. Regardless of its appearance, the weapon deals 4k10 damage. The damage type is the same as the chosen weapon (or any of its types for a versatile weapon). The attack deals spirit damage instead if that would be more detrimental to the creature (as determined by the GM). No other statistics or attributes of the weapon apply, and even a ranged weapon attacks adjacent creatures only. The weapon takes a multiple attack penalty, which increases throughout the target's turn, but its penalty is separate from yours.

A weapon of judgment is a weapon for the purposes of triggers, resistances, and so forth. The weapon doesn't take up space, grant flanking, or have any other attributes a creature would. The weapon can't make any attack other than its Strike, and feats or spells that affect weapons don't apply to this weapon.

Wywyższenie (10.) The damage increases by 1k10.

Weaponize Secret.name: Weaponize Secret
Weaponize Secret.description:
You understand that holding a secret is in itself a kind of power. Each target must attempt a Will save.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Porażka A rune symbolizing a secret the target is keeping (at the GM's discretion) appears floating in front of you. If that creature attempts a Strike or spell attack against you while you hold their secret, you can discharge the rune as a reaction to deal @Damage[7d6[mental]] damage to the creature.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the target becomes convinced you know their secret and takes @Damage[1d6[persistent,mental]] damage from worry. If the rune with the secret is discharged while the creature is still taking the persistent mental damage, the persistent mental damage immediately ends.

Wywyższenie (+1) The mental damage increases by 2k6, and the persistent mental damage on a critical failure increases by 1.

Weave Wood.name: Zaplatanie Drewna
Weave Wood.description:
Za pomocą dotyku rozbijasz obiekt na pojedyncze włókna, które następnie zaplatają się tworząc niemagiczny pleciony obiekt o takim samym lub mniejszym Naręczu, taki jak kosz, kapelusz, tarcza albo mata. Pojedynczym rzuceniem zaklęcia możeż wytworzyć do 4 takich obiektów, o ile ich całkowite Naręcze nie przekracza Naręcza twojego celu. Obiekty mają Twardość 2 i 8 Punktów Żywotności.

Wywyższenie (+1) Maksymalne możliwe Naręcze celu zwiększa się o 1 a maksymalna liczba wytwarzanych obiektów zwiększa się o 2.
Weave Wood.target: 1 kawałek nieprzetworzonego drewna, trzciny lub włókien roślinnych o Naręczu nie większym od 1

Web.name: Sieć
Web.description:
Tworzysz w obszarze zaklęcia lepką sieć, która utrudnia ruchy istot. Pola wypełnione siecią stanowią trudny teren. Za każdym razem, kiedy istota znajdująca się w sieci rozpoczyna korzystanie z akcji ruchu lub wkracza w sieć podczas wykorzystywanej akcji ruchu, musi wykonać test @Check[athletics]{Atletyki} lub rzut obronny Refleksu przeciw twojemu ST twoich zaklęć aby uniknąć kary sytuacyjnej do swoich Prędkości lub zostania @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Unieruchomioną}. Istota, która wydostanie się z sieci przstaje ponosić nakładaną przez sieć karę sytuacyjną do swoich Prędkości. Każde pole może zostać oczyszczone z sieci z użyciem pojedynczego ataku lub efektu, który zadaje co najmniej 5 obrażeń ciętych lub 1 obrażenie od ognia. Pole ma KP 5 i automatycznie odnosi porażkę na swoich rzutach obronnych.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę oraz nie musi ona wykonywać dalszych testów Atletyki lub rzutów obronnych przeciwko sieci w tej turze. Jeśli użyła ona testu Atletyki, usuwa ona sieć z każdego pola, które opuści w trakcie swojego ruchu.

Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę na czas trwania jej obecnej akcji. Jeśli użyła ona testu Atletyki, usuwa ona sieć z każdego pola, które opuści w trakcie swojego ruchu.

Porażka Istota ponosi karę sytuacyjną –10 stóp do swoich Prędkości do początku jej następnej tury.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota jest unieruchomiona do początku jej następnej tury, po którym ponosi karę sytuacyjną –10 stóp do swoich Prędkości na 1 rundę. Może podjąć próbę @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Ucieczki} aby zakończyć status unieruchomienia.

Wywyższenie (4.) Obszar zaklęcia zwiększa się do @Template[burst|distance:20]{Wybuchu 20 stóp} a jego zasięg zwiększa się do 60 stóp.

Web of Eyes.name: Web of Eyes
Web of Eyes.description:
You place an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Niewidzialny} scrying sensor on each target just above their eyes. Each sensor looks where that target looks, and all the targets can link their vision briefly to help notice things one target sees but the others might not. Each target can use an action, which has the concentrate trait, to share what it sees with any number of other targets until the start of its next turn. Only one creature can share its vision at a time, so if another target takes this action, the effect ends for any target that was previously sharing its vision.

This improves how well the recipients can perceive anything the sharing creature is looking at. For instance, if a creature is undetected to a recipient but observed by the sharing creature, the creature becomes observed by the recipient as well. Typically, the creature is seen as a glowing outline superimposed on its position. This might allow the recipient to target a creature it couldn't otherwise; however, cover and line of effect still might prevent or impede targeting and attacks. This can only improve the recipient's vision, not reduce it; for example, if an enemy was undetected by the sharing creature and observed by a recipient, the recipient would still clearly observe the enemy.

Once the vision sharing stops, the benefit ends. Whether a creature is hidden or undetected is still based on the last information a target had before the vision sharing ended. For example, that means if a creature is behind a wall but hasn't moved, it's still hidden rather than undetected by a recipient that witnessed its current position.

Web of Influence.name: Web of Influence
Web of Influence.description:
You learn the location of the nearest creature to whom the target is connected in a magical manner. A creature sustaining a spell on the target is connected to it for the purposes of this spell, as are any creatures who are targets of a spell effect currently affecting the target (such as all the targets of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Iluzoryczne Przebranie} spell), members of a coven, and creatures that are magically bonded to the target (such as with the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.dZV8nZUKRhGIr6g9]{Heartbond} ritual). The GM is the final arbiter of whether a creature is magically connected to the target. If you already know individuals who are magically connected to the target, you can exclude them from the spell.

This spell doesn't tell you anything about the nearest magically connected creature other than its current distance and direction. If the nearest creature is on a different plane the spell indicates this but doesn't reveal which plane.

Weird.name: Weird
Weird.description:
You fill the targets' minds with terrifying images of fearsome creatures, each drawn from the targets' worst fears. Only the targets can see their assailants. Each target takes 16k6 mental damage and must attempt a Will save.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na cel.

Sukces The target takes half damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1}.

Porażka Cel odnosi pełne obrażenia and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2}.

Krytyczna Porażka The target is so afraid, it might instantly die. It must attempt a Fortitude saving throw. If the target succeeds, it takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 2}, and it's also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Uciekający} until the end of its next turn unless it critically succeeded. If it fails, it is reduced to 0 Hit Points and dies.

Whirling Flames.name: Whirling Flames
Whirling Flames.description:
You call forth a storm of whirling flames, engulfing all creatures in that area and dealing 5k6 fire damage with a basic Reflex save.

Wywyższenie (+2) Obrażenia zwiększają się o 3k6, and you can add another non-overlapping 5-foot burst to the area.

Whirling Scarves.name: Whirling Scarves
Whirling Scarves.description:
You surround yourself in a vortex of whirling colorful scarves of force that obfuscate you and disorient your foes. You gain the benefits of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} condition, but only against ranged and melee attacks. When a melee attack fails to hit you because of the flat check for the concealed condition, the scarves snag the weapon or unarmed attack, and the creature takes a –1 circumstance penalty to further attacks with that weapon or unarmed attack until the end of its turn (or the end of its next turn, if it wasn't the creature's turn). The timing of the scarves' movement is harder to predict for ranged attackers, so the flat check for the concealed condition against ranged attacks increases from DC 5 to DC 6. You can Dismiss this spell.

Wywyższenie (+2) The circumstance penalty to further attacks with a melee weapon or unarmed attack the scarves snag increases by 1. The DC of the flat check for the concealed condition against ranged attacks increases by 1.

Whirlpool.name: Whirlpool
Whirlpool.description:
Obszar 25-foot radius, 20-foot tall cylinder

With a spin of your hand, you create a large swirling vortex of storming waves. All squares in the whirlpool are difficult terrain. The constant churning of the fierce waves means that creatures are constantly tossed between areas of air and water, allowing both air- and water-breathing creatures to breathe within the vortex. Any creature with a swim Speed can Swim instead of Stride to move within the whirlpool; the DC to Swim within it is equal to your spell DC.

All creatures in the area take 6k10 bludgeoning damage as the waves crash into them. On subsequent rounds, the first time you Sustain the spell each round, the waves crash again with the same effect.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia and is drawn 10 feet toward the center of the whirlpool.

Krytyczna Porażka Istota odnosi podwójne obrażenia and is drawn to the center of the whirlpool.

Wywyższenie (+1) The bludgeoning damage increases by 1k10.

Whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
Whirlwind.description:
Obszar 15-foot radius, 80-foot-tall cylinder

Powerful winds coalesce into a devastating tornado. You can Cast this Spell only if you are outside or the ceiling is 80 feet or higher. All squares in the whirlwind are difficult terrain.

All creatures in the area take 5k10 bludgeoning damage as powerful winds and debris buffet them, with a Reflex save. Each time you Sustain the Spell, you can move the whirlwind up to 30 feet in a straight line. Each creature the whirlwind moves through takes the damage, also with a Reflex save. A creature can be affected by a whirlwind only once per round.

Krytyczny Sukces Zaklęcie nie wywiera wpływu na istotę.

Sukces Istota odnosi połowę obrażeń.

Porażka Istota odnosi pełne obrażenia and rises 10 feet into the air. If it doesn't have a fly Speed, the creature gains one equal to its Speed until it either reaches the ground or ceases to be in the whirlwind's area, potentially falling when the spell ends or when it leaves the area.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, except the creature takes double damage and rises 20 feet into the air.

Wywyższenie (+1) Increase the bludgeoning damage by 1k10.

Whispering Quiet.name: Whispering Quiet
Whispering Quiet.description: You suppress sound in an area, preventing anyone from giving away valuable secrets.
